#Text:Baudhāyanaśrautasūtra
#Edition:Kashikar
#Data entry:M. Fushimi
#Notes:BaudhŚS 30 moved to folder 'Sulba texts' (see Gonda, Hist. 516). Translation (Kashikar): 6-9 aligned.



1.1.1	āmāvāsyena vā paurṇamāsena vā haviṣā yakṣyamāṇo bhavati
1.1.2	sa purastād eva havirātañcanam upakalpayate
1.1.3	ekāhena vā dvyahena vā yathartu
1.1.4	atha vai brāhmaṇaṃ bhavati
1.1.5	dadhnātanakti sendratvāyāgnihotroccheṣaṇam abhyātanakti yajñasya saṃtatyā iti
1.1.6	candramasaṃ vānirjñāya saṃpūrṇaṃ vā vijñāyāgnīn anvādadhāti
1.1.7	trīṇi kāṣṭhāni gārhapatye 'bhyādadhāti trīṇy anvāhāryapacane trīṇy āhavanīye
1.1.8	parisamūhanti
1.1.9	upavasathasya rūpaṃ kurvanti
1.1.10	athāsya vratopetasya parṇaśākhām ācchaiti prāṅ vodaṅ vā vācaṃyamo yatra vā vetsyan manyate
1.1.11	sā yā prācī vodīcī vā bahuparṇā bahuśākhāpratiśuṣkāgrā bhavati tām ācchinattīṣe tvorje tveti
1.1.12	tayā vatsān apākaroti vāyava sthopāyava stheti
1.1.13	athaiṣāṃ mātṝḥ prerayati devo vaḥ savitā prārpayatu śreṣṭhatamāya karmaṇa āpyāyadhvam aghniyā devabhāgam ūrjasvatīḥ payasvatīḥ prajāvatīr anamīvā ayakṣmā mā va stena īśata māghaśaṃso rudrasya hetiḥ pari vo vṛṇaktv iti
1.1.14	dhruvā asmin gopatau syāta bahvīr iti yajamānam īkṣate
1.1.15	athaitāṃ śākhām agreṇāhavanīyaṃ paryāhṛtya pūrvayā dvārā prapādya jaghanena gārhapatyam agniṣṭhe 'nasyuttarārdhe vāgnyagārasyodgūhati yajamānasya paśūn pāhīti nu yadi saṃnayati
1.1.16	yady u vai na saṃnayati barhiḥ pratipad eva bhavati
1.2.1	atha jaghanena gārhapatyaṃ tiṣṭhann asidaṃ vāśvaparśuṃ vādatte devasya tvā savituḥ prasave 'śvinor bāhubhyāṃ pūṣṇo hastābhyām ādada iti
1.2.2	ādāyābhimantrayate yajñasya ghoṣad asīti
1.2.3	gārhapatye pratitapati pratyuṣṭaṃ rakṣaḥ pratyuṣṭā arātaya iti triḥ
1.2.4	athāhavanīyam abhipraiti preyam agād dhiṣaṇā barhir accha manunā kṛtā svadhayā vitaṣṭā ta āvahanti kavayaḥ purastād devebhyo juṣṭam iti
1.2.5	iha barhir āsada iti vediṃ pratyavekṣate
1.2.6	atha tāṃ diśam eti yatra barhir vetsyan manyate
1.2.7	darbhastambaṃ parigṛhṇāti yāvantam alaṃ prastarāya manyate devānāṃ pariṣūtam asīti
1.2.8	athainam ūrdhvam unmārṣṭi varṣavṛddham asīti
1.2.9	asidenopayacchati devabarhir mā tvānvaṅ mā tiryak parva te rādhyāsam iti
1.2.10	ācchinatty ācchettā te mā riṣam iti
1.2.11	ācchedanāny abhimṛśati devabarhiḥ śatavalśaṃ viroheti
1.2.12	sahasravalśā vi vayaṃ ruhemety ātmānaṃ pratyabhimṛśate
1.2.13	sarvaśa evainaṃ stambaṃ lunoti
1.2.14	kṛtvā prastaraṃ nidadhāti pṛthivyāḥ saṃpṛcaḥ pāhīti
1.2.15	tūṣṇīm ata ūrdhvam ayujo muṣṭīn lunoti
1.2.16	trīn vā pañca vā sapta vā nava vaikādaśa vā yāvato vālaṃ manyate
1.2.17	atha trir anvāhitaṃ śulbaṃ kṛtvāpasalair āveṣṭayaty adityai rāsnāsīti
1.2.18	tad udīcīnāgraṃ nidhāya
1.2.19	tasmin prastaram abhisaṃbharati susaṃbhṛtā tvā saṃbharāmīti
1.2.20	saṃnahyatīndrāṇyai saṃnahanam iti
1.2.21	granthiṃ karoti pūṣā te granthiṃ grathnātv iti
1.2.22	sa te māsthād iti paścāt prāñcam upagūhati
1.2.23	athainad udyacchata indrasya tvā bāhubhyām udyaccha iti
1.2.24	śīrṣann adhinidhatte bṛhaspater mūrdhnā harāmīti
1.2.25	aity urv antarikṣam anvihīti
1.2.26	etyottareṇa gārhapatyam anadhaḥ sādayati devaṃgamam asīti
1.2.27	tad uparīva nidadhāti yatra guptaṃ manyate
1.2.28	tūṣṇīṃ paribhojanīyāni lunoti
1.2.29	sakṛdācchinnaṃ pitṛbhya ācchinatti
1.2.30	atha tathaiva trir anvāhitaṃ śulbaṃ kṛtvaikaviṃśatidārum idhmaṃ saṃnahyati yat kṛṣṇo rūpaṃ kṛtvā prāviśas tvaṃ vanaspatīn / tatas tvām ekaviṃśatidhā saṃbharāmi susaṃbhṛteti
1.2.31	vedaṃ karoti vatsajñuṃ paśukāmasya mūtakāryam annādyakāmasya trivṛtaṃ tejaskāmasyordhvāgraṃ svargakāmasya
1.2.32	vediṃ karoti prāguttarāt parigrāhāt
1.2.33	athāparāhṇe piṇḍapitṛyajñena carati
1.3.1	athaitasyai śākhāyai parṇāni pracchidyāgreṇa gārhapatyaṃ nivapati
1.3.2	athainām adhastāt parivāsya jaghanena gārhapatyaṃ sthavimad upaveṣāya nidadhāti
1.3.3	athāsyāḥ prādeśamātraṃ pramāya darbhanāḍīḥ praveṣṭya tat trivṛc chākhāpavitraṃ karoti trivṛt palāśe darbha iyān prādeśasaṃmitaḥ / yajñe pavitraṃ potṛtamaṃ payo havyaṃ karotu ma iti
1.3.4	atha sāyaṃ hute 'gnihotra uttareṇa gārhapatyaṃ tṛṇāni saṃstīrya teṣu catuṣṭayaṃ saṃsādayati dohanaṃ pavitraṃ sāṃnāyyatapanyau sthālāv iti
1.3.5	athaināny adbhiḥ prokṣati śundhadhvaṃ daivyāya karmaṇe devayajyāyā iti triḥ
1.3.6	atha jaghanena gārhapatyam upaviśyopaveṣeṇodīco 'ṅgārān nirūhati mātariśvano gharmo 'sīti
1.3.7	teṣu sāṃnāyyatapanīm adhiśrayati dyaur asi pṛthivy asi viśvadhāyā asi parameṇa dhāmnā dṛṃhasva mā hvār iti
1.3.8	tasyāṃ prācīnāgraṃ śākhāpavitraṃ nidadhāti vasūnāṃ pavitram asi śatadhāraṃ vasūnāṃ pavitram asi sahasradhāram iti
1.3.9	tad anvārabhya vācaṃyama āste
1.3.10	atha gā āyatīḥ pratīkṣata etā ācaranti madhumad duhānāḥ prajāvatīr yaśaso viśvarūpāḥ / bahvīr bhavantīr upajāyamānā iha va indro ramayatu gāva iti mahendra iti vā yadi mahendrayājī bhavati
1.3.11	athāhopasṛṣṭāṃ me prabrūtād iti
1.3.12	upasṛṣṭāṃ prāhuḥ
1.3.13	dohyamānām anumantrayate huta stoko huto drapsaḥ
1.3.14	agnaye bṛhate nākāya svāhā dyāvāpṛthivībhyām iti
1.3.15	atha purastāt pratyag ānayantaṃ pṛcchati kām adhukṣa iti
1.3.16	amūm itītaraḥ pratyāha
1.3.17	tām anumantrayate sā viśvāyur iti
1.3.18	dvitīyam ānayantaṃ pṛcchati kām adhukṣa iti
1.3.19	amūm ity evetaraḥ pratyāha
1.3.20	tām anumantrayate sā viśvavyacā iti
1.3.21	tṛtīyam ānayantaṃ pṛcchati kām adhukṣa iti
1.3.22	amūm ity evetaraḥ pratyāha
1.3.23	tām anumantrayate sā viśvakarmeti
1.3.24	tisṛṣu dugdhāsu vācaṃ visṛjate bahu dugdhīndrāya devebhyo havyam āpyāyatāṃ punaḥ / vatsebhyo manuṣyebhyaḥ punardohāya kalpatām iti mahendrāyeti vā yadi mahendrayājī bhavati
1.3.25	visṛṣṭavāg ananvārabhya tūṣṇīm uttarā dohayitvā
1.3.26	dohane 'pa ānīya saṃkṣālanam ānayati saṃpṛcyadhvam ṛtāvarīr ūrmiṇīr madhumattamā mandrā dhanasya sātaya iti
1.3.27	athainat taptvodag udvāsya śītīkṛtvā tiraḥ pavitraṃ dadhnātanakti somena tvā tanacmīndrāya dadhīti mahendrāyeti vā yadi mahendrayājī bhavati
1.3.28	yāvatā mūrcchayiṣyan manyate tāvad ānayati
1.3.29	agnihotroccheṣaṇam abhyātanakti yajñasya saṃtatir asi yajñasya tvā saṃtatim anusaṃtanomīti
1.3.30	athainad udanvatā kaṃsena vā camasena vāpidadhāty adastam asi viṣṇave tvā yajñāyāpidadhāmy aham / adbhir ariktena pātreṇa yāḥ pūtāḥ pariśerata iti
1.3.31	tad uparīva nidadhāti yatra guptaṃ manyate viṣṇo havyaṃ rakṣasveti
1.3.32	etasmin kāle darbhaiḥ prātardohāya vatsān apākaroti tūṣṇīm
1.4.1	atha prātarhute 'gnihotre hastau saṃmṛśate karmaṇe vāṃ devebhyaḥ śakeyam iti
1.4.2	naktaṃ paristīrṇā evaite 'gnayo bhavanti
1.4.3	yady u vā aparistīrṇā bhavanty āhavanīyam evāgre purastāt paristṛṇāty atha dakṣiṇato 'tha paścād athottarataḥ
1.4.4	evam evānvāhāryapacanaṃ paristṛṇāti
1.4.5	evaṃ gārhapatyam
1.4.6	athāgreṇa gārhapatyaṃ tṛṇāni saṃstīrya teṣu dvandvaṃ nyañci yajñāyudhāni saṃsādayati
1.4.7	sphyaṃ ca kapālāni cāgnihotrahavaṇīṃ ca śūrpaṃ ca kṛṣṇājinaṃ ca śamyāṃ colūkhalaṃ ca musalaṃ ca dṛṣadaṃ copalāṃ ca juhūṃ copabhṛtaṃ ca sruvaṃ ca dhruvāṃ ca prāśitraharaṇaṃ ceḍāpātraṃ ca mekṣaṇaṃ ca piṣṭodvapanīṃ ca prāṇītāpraṇayanaṃ cājyasthālīṃ ca vedaṃ ca dārupātrīṃ ca yoktraṃ ca vedaparivāsanaṃ ca dhṛṣṭiṃ cedhmapravraścanaṃ cānvāhāryasthālīṃ ca madantīṃ ca yāni cānyāni pātrāṇi tāny evam eva dvandvaṃ saṃsādya
1.4.8	brahmāṇaṃ dakṣiṇata upaveśya
1.4.9	pṛṣṭhyāṃ stṛṇāti saṃtatāṃ gārhapatyādāhavanīyād yajñasya saṃtatir asi yajñasya tvā saṃtatyai stṝṇāmi saṃtatyai tvā yajñasya stṝṇāmīti
1.4.10	atha barhiṣaḥ pavitre kurute prādeśamātre same apraticchinnāgre anakhacchinne imau prāṇāpānau yajñasyāṅgāni sarvaśaḥ / āpyāyayantau saṃcaratāṃ pavitre havyaśodhane iti
1.4.11	athaine adbhir anumārṣṭi pavitre stho vaiṣṇavī stho yajñiye stho vāyupūte stho viṣṇor manasā pūte stho yajñasya pavane stha iti
1.4.12	athottareṇa gārhapatyam upaviśya kaṃsaṃ vā camasaṃ vā praṇītāpraṇayanam yācati
1.4.13	tasmiṃs tiraḥ pavitram apa ānayann āha brahmann apaḥ praṇeṣyāmi yajamāna vācaṃ yaccheti
1.4.14	prasūtaḥ samaṃ prāṇair dhārayamāṇo 'viṣiñcan hṛtvottareṇāhavanīyaṃ darbheṣu sādayitvā darbhaiḥ pracchādya
1.4.15	[pavitram ādāya] pradakṣiṇam āvṛtya pratyaṅṅ ādrutyādatte dakṣiṇenāgnihotrahavaṇīṃ savyena śūrpaṃ veṣāya tveti
1.4.16	gārhapatye pratitapati pratyuṣṭaṃ rakṣaḥ pratyuṣṭā arātaya iti triḥ
1.4.17	atha jaghanena gārhapatyam agniṣṭham ano bhavati
1.4.18	tasyottarāṃ dhuram abhimṛśati dhūr asi dhūrva dhūrvantaṃ dhūrva taṃ yo 'smān dhūrvati taṃ dhūrva yaṃ vayaṃ dhūrvāma iti
1.4.19	ano 'bhimantrayate tvaṃ devānām asi sasnitamaṃ papritamaṃ juṣṭatamaṃ vahnitamaṃ devahūtamam ahrutam asi havirdhānaṃ dṛṃhasva mā hvār iti
1.5.1	atha viṣṇoḥ kramo 'sīti dakṣiṇam akṣapāliṃ kramitvābhyāruhya prauge śūrpaṃ nidadhāti
1.5.2	śūrpe srucaṃ sruci pavitre
1.5.3	atha puroḍāśīyān prekṣate mitrasya tvā cakṣuṣā prekṣe mā bher mā saṃvikthā mā tvā hiṃsiṣam iti
1.5.4	uru vātāyeti tṛṇaṃ vā kiṃśāru vā nirasyati
1.5.5	athāpa upaspṛśya daśahotāraṃ vyākhyāya havir nirvapsyāmīti yajamānam āmantrya pavitravatyāgnihotrahavaṇyā nirvapati
1.5.6	yady u vai nāno bhavati jaghanena gārhapatyaṃ sphyaṃ nidadhāti sphyopari pātrīṃ pātryāṃ puroḍāśīyān āvapati
1.5.7	atha pūrvārdhaṃ pātryā abhimṛśati dhūr asi dhūrva dhūrvantaṃ dhūrva taṃ yo 'smān dhūrvati taṃ dhūrva yaṃ vayaṃ dhūrvāmas tvaṃ devānām asi sasnitamaṃ papritamaṃ juṣṭatamaṃ vahnitamaṃ devahūtamam ahrutam asi havirdhānaṃ dṛṃhasva mā hvār iti
1.5.8	atha puroḍāśīyān prekṣate mitrasya tvā cakṣuṣā prekṣe mā bher mā saṃvikthā mā tvā hiṃsiṣam iti
1.5.9	uru vātāyeti tṛṇaṃ vā kiṃśāru vā nirasyati
1.5.10	athāpa upaspṛśya daśahotāraṃ vyākhyāya havir nirvapsyāmīti yajamānam āmantrya pavitravatyāgnihotrahavaṇyā nirvapati
1.5.11	oṃ nirvapeti yajamāno 'nujānāti
1.5.12	atha nirvapati
1.5.13	devasya tvā savituḥ prasave 'śvinor bāhubhyāṃ pūṣṇo hastābhyām agnaye juṣṭaṃ nirvapāmīti trir etena yajuṣā
1.5.14	sakṛt tūṣṇīm
1.5.15	etām eva pratipadaṃ kṛtvāgnīṣomābhyām iti paurṇamāsyām indrāya vaimṛdhāyeti cendrāgnibhyām ity amāvāsyāyām asaṃnayata indrāyeti saṃnayato mahendrāyeti vā yadi mahendrayājī bhavati
1.5.16	atha niruptān abhimṛśatīdaṃ devānām iti
1.5.17	idam u naḥ saheti ye 'tiśiṣṭā bhavanti
1.5.18	sphātyai tvā nārātyā iti
1.5.19	athāhavanīyam īkṣate suvar abhivikhyeṣaṃ vaiśvānaraṃ jyotir iti
1.5.20	atha gṛhān anvīkṣate dṛṃhantāṃ duryā dyāvāpṛthivyor iti
1.5.21	athainān ādāyopottiṣṭhati
1.5.22	aity urv antarikṣam anvihīti
1.5.23	etyottareṇa gārhapatyam upasādayaty adityās tvopasthe sādayāmīti
1.5.24	gārhapatyam abhimantrayate 'gne havyaṃ rakṣasveti
1.6.1	athaitasyām eva sruci tiraḥ pavitram apa ānīyodīcīnāgrābhyāṃ pavitrābhyāṃ trir utpunāti devo vaḥ savitotpunātv acchidreṇa pavitreṇa vasoḥ sūryasya raśmibhir iti pacchaḥ
1.6.2	athainā unmahayann upottiṣṭhaty āpo devīr agrepuvo agreguvo 'gra imaṃ yajñaṃ nayatāgre yajñapatiṃ dhatta yuṣmān indro 'vṛṇīta vṛtratūrye yūyam indram avṛṇīdhvaṃ vṛtratūrya iti
1.6.3	adbhir evāpaḥ prokṣati prokṣitā stha prokṣitā stheti triḥ
1.6.4	atha puroḍāśīyān prokṣati devasya tvā savituḥ prasave 'śvinor bāhubhyāṃ pūṣṇo hastābhyām agnaye vo juṣṭaṃ prokṣāmy agnīṣomābhyām amuṣmā amuṣmā iti yathādevataṃ triḥ
1.6.5	uttānāni pātrāṇi kṛtvā prokṣati śundhadhvaṃ daivyāya karmaṇe devayajyāyā iti triḥ
1.6.6	atiśiṣṭāḥ prokṣaṇīr nidhāya
1.6.7	kṛṣṇājinam avadhūnoty ūrdhvagrīvam udaṅṅ āvṛtyāvadhūtaṃ rakṣo 'vadhūtā arātaya iti triḥ
1.6.8	athainat purastāt pratīcīnagrīvam uttaralomopastṛṇāty adityās tvag asi prati tvā pṛthivī vettv iti
1.6.9	tasminn ulūkhalam adhyūhaty adhiṣavaṇam asi vānaspatyaṃ prati tvādityās tvag vettv iti
1.6.10	tasmin puroḍāśīyān āvapaty agnes tanūr asi vāco visarjanaṃ devavītaye tvā gṛhṇāmīti
1.6.11	musalam avadadhāty adrir asi vānaspatyaḥ sa idaṃ devebhyo havyaṃ suśami śamiṣveti
1.6.12	atha haviṣkṛtam āhvayati haviṣkṛd ehi haviṣkṛd ehīti triḥ
1.6.13	[uccaiḥ samāhantavā iti ca] atha dṛṣadupale vṛṣāraveṇoccaiḥ samāhantīṣam āvadorjam āvada dyumad vadata vayaṃ saṃghātaṃ jeṣmeti
1.6.14	avahatyottuṣān kṛtvottarataḥ śūrpam upayacchati varṣavṛddham asīti
1.6.15	tasmin puroḍāśīyān udvapati prati tvā varṣavṛddhaṃ vettv iti
1.6.16	athodaṅ paryāvṛtya parāpunāti parāpūtaṃ rakṣaḥ parāpūtā arātaya iti
1.6.17	savyena tuṣān upahatyemāṃ diśaṃ nirasyati rakṣasāṃ bhāgo 'sīti
1.6.18	athāpa upaspṛśya vivinakti vāyur vo vivinaktv iti
1.6.19	pātryāṃ taṇḍulān praskandayati devo vaḥ savitā hiraṇyapāṇiḥ pratigṛhṇātv iti
1.6.20	avahantryai prayacchann āha triṣ phalīkartavai triṣphalīkṛtān me prabrūtād iti
1.6.21	triṣphalīkṛtān prāhuḥ
1.6.22	triṣ phalīkriyamāṇānāṃ yo nyaṅgo avaśiṣyate / rakṣasāṃ bhāgadheyam āpas tat pravahatād ita iti taṇḍulaprakṣālanam antarvedi ninayaty utkaradeśe vā
1.6.23	etasmin kāle prātardohaṃ dhenūr dohayaty udagagreṇa pavitreṇa
1.6.24	nātrātanakti
1.7.1	atha prokteṣu triṣphalīkṛteṣu tathaiva kṛṣṇājinam avadhūnoty ūrdhvagrīvam udaṅṅ āvṛtyāvadhūtaṃ rakṣas avadhūtā arātaya iti triḥ
1.7.2	athainat purastāt pratīcīnagrīvam uttaralomopastṛṇāty adityās tvag asi prati tvā pṛthivī vettv iti
1.7.3	tasminn udīcīnakumbāṃ śamyāṃ nidadhāti diva skambhanir asi prati tvādityās tvag vettv iti
1.7.4	tasyāṃ prācīṃ dṛṣadam adhyūhati dhiṣaṇāsi parvatyā prati tvā diva skambhanir vettv iti
1.7.5	dṛṣady upalām adhyūhati dhiṣaṇāsi pārvateyī prati tvā parvatir vettv iti
1.7.6	tasyāṃ puroḍāśīyān adhivapati devasya tvā savituḥ prasave 'śvinor bāhubhyāṃ pūṣṇo hastābhyām agnaye juṣṭam adhivapāmy agnīṣomābhyām amuṣmā amuṣmā iti yathādevatam
1.7.7	adhivadate dhānyam asi dhinuhi devān dhinuhi yajñaṃ dhinuhi yajñapatiṃ dhinuhi māṃ yajñaniyam iti
1.7.8	piṃṣati prāṇāya tvāpānāya tvā vyānāya tveti
1.7.9	bāhū anvavekṣate dīrghām anu prasitim āyuṣe dhām iti
1.7.10	kṛṣṇājine piṣṭāni praskandayati devo vaḥ savitā hiraṇyapāṇiḥ pratigṛhṇātv iti
1.7.11	haviḥpeṣyai prayacchann āhāsaṃvapantī piṃṣāṇūni kurutād iti
1.7.12	piṃṣanti puroḍāśīyān
1.7.13	ni caravyān dadhati
1.7.14	yadi caruṃ kariṣyan bhavati prāgadhivapanāc carupuroḍāśīyān vibhajeran
1.8.1	athaitāni kapālāni prakṣālitāni jaghanena gārhapatyam upasādayati
1.8.2	aṣṭau dakṣiṇata ekādaśottarataḥ
1.8.3	atha jaghanena gārhapatyam upaviśya dhṛṣṭim ādatte dhṛṣṭir asi brahma yaccheti
1.8.4	gārhapatyam abhimantrayate 'pāgne 'gnim āmādaṃ jahīti
1.8.5	niṣkravyādaṃ sedheti dakṣiṇāṅgāraṃ nirasyati
1.8.6	athānyam āvartayaty ā devayajaṃ vaheti
1.8.7	taṃ dakṣiṇeṣāṃ kapālānāṃ madhyamenābhyupadadhāti dhruvam asi pṛthivīṃ dṛṃhāyur dṛṃha prajāṃ dṛṃha sajātān asmai yajamānāya paryūheti
1.8.8	aṅgāram adhivartayati nirdagdhaṃ rakṣo nirdagdhā arātaya iti
1.8.9	atha pūrvārdhyam upadadhāti dhartram asy antarikṣaṃ dṛṃha prāṇaṃ dṛṃhāpānaṃ dṛṃha sajātān asmai yajamānāya paryūheti
1.8.10	athāparārdhyam upadadhāti dharuṇam asi divaṃ dṛṃha cakṣur dṛṃha śrotraṃ dṛṃha sajātān asmai yajamānāya paryūheti
1.8.11	atha dakṣiṇārdhyam upadadhāti dharmāsi diśo dṛṃha yoniṃ dṛṃha prajāṃ dṛṃha sajātān asmai yajamānāya paryūheti
1.8.12	atha pūrvam upadhim upadadhāti cita stha prajām asmai rayim asmai sajātān asmai yajamānāya paryūheti
1.8.13	athāparam evam eva
1.8.14	dve uttarataḥ saṃspṛṣṭe upadadhāti cita stha prajām asmai rayim asmai sajātān asmai yajamānāya paryūheti
1.8.15	athaināny aṅgārair adhivāsayati bhṛgūṇām aṅgirasāṃ tapasā tapyadhvam iti
1.8.16	athaināni yogena yunakti yāni gharme kapālāny upacinvanti vedhasaḥ / pūṣṇas tāny api vrata indravāyū yuṅktām iti
1.8.17	evam evottarāṇi kapālāny upadadhāti
1.8.18	abhīndhate kapālāni
1.8.19	upendhate carusthālīm
1.8.20	adhyasyanti śrapaṇāni
1.8.21	tapanti piṣṭasaṃyavanīyā āpaḥ
1.9.1	athottareṇa gārhapatyam upaviśya vācaṃyamas tiraḥ pavitraṃ pātryāṃ kṛṣṇājināt piṣṭāni saṃvapati devasya tvā savituḥ prasave 'śvinor bāhubhyāṃ pūṣṇo hastābhyām agnaye juṣṭaṃ saṃvapāmy agnīṣomābhyām amuṣmā amuṣmā iti yathādevatam
1.9.2	atha parikarmiṇam āhāharāpa ānayeti
1.9.3	āharati praiṣakāraḥ praṇītābhyaḥ sruveṇopahatya vedenopayamya pāṇiṃ vāntardhāya
1.9.4	evaṃ madantībhyaḥ
1.9.5	tā ubhayīr ānīyamānāḥ pratimantrayate sam āpo adbhir agmata sam oṣadhayo rasena saṃ revatīr jagatībhir madhumatīr madhumatībhiḥ sṛjyadhvam iti
1.9.6	athānupariplāvayaty adbhyaḥ pari prajātā stha sam adbhiḥ pṛcyadhvam iti
1.9.7	saṃyauti janayatyai tvā saṃyaumīti
1.9.8	saṃyutya vyūhyābhimṛśaty agnaye tvāgnīṣomābhyām amuṣmā amuṣmā iti yathādevatam
1.9.9	piṇḍaṃ karoti makhasya śiro 'sīti
1.9.10	taṃ dakṣiṇeṣāṃ kapālānāṃ pratyūhyāṅgārāṃs teṣv adhipṛṇakti gharmo 'si viśvāyur iti
1.9.11	prathayaty uru prathasvoru te yajñapatiḥ prathatām iti
1.9.12	taṃ tanvantaṃ kūrmaprakāraṃ karoti
1.9.13	sarvāṇi kapālāny abhiprathayatīti brāhmaṇam
1.10.1	atha tiraḥ pavitram ājyasthālyām ājyaṃ nirvapati mahīnāṃ payo 'sy oṣadhīnāṃ rasas tasya te 'kṣīyamāṇasya nirvapāmi devayajyāyā iti
1.10.2	athottarato bhasmamiśrān aṅgārān nirūhya teṣv adhiśrayati
1.10.3	evam evottaraṃ puroḍāśam adhipṛṇakti
1.10.4	atha śṛtam atha dadhi
1.10.5	atha pātryām apa ānīya dakṣiṇasya puroḍāśasya tvacaṃ grāhayati tvacaṃ gṛhṇīṣva tvacaṃ gṛhṇīṣveti triḥ
1.10.6	athottarasya
1.10.7	atha paryagni karoty antaritaṃ rakṣo 'ntaritā arātaya iti triḥ
1.10.8	atha dakṣiṇaṃ puroḍāśaṃ śrapayati devas tvā savitā śrapayatu varṣiṣṭhe adhi nāke 'gnis te tanuvaṃ māti dhāg iti
1.10.9	gārhapatyam abhimantrayate agne havyaṃ rakṣasveti
1.10.10	evam evottaraṃ puroḍāśaṃ śrapayati
1.10.11	atha dakṣiṇaṃ puroḍāśaṃ bhasmanābhivāsya vedenābhivāsayati saṃ brahmaṇā pṛcyasva saṃ brahmaṇā pṛcyasveti triḥ
1.10.12	athottaram
1.10.13	avidahanta śrapayateti vācaṃ visṛjate
1.10.14	atraitat pātrīsaṃkṣālanaṃ gārhapatyād aṅgāreṇābhitapya hṛtvāntarvedi pratīcīnaṃ tisṛṣu lekhāsu ninayaty ekatāya svāhā dvitāya svāhā tritāya svāheti
1.10.15	atha vedam ādatte 'yaṃ vedaḥ pṛthivīm anvavindad guhā satīṃ gahane gahvareṣu / sa vindatu yajamānāya lokam acchidraṃ yajñaṃ bhūrikarmā karotv iti
1.10.16	vedena vediṃ triḥ saṃmārṣṭi vedena vediṃ vividuḥ pṛthivīṃ sā paprathe pṛthivī pārthivāni / garbhaṃ bibharti bhuvaneṣv antas tato yajño jāyate viśvadānir iti
1.11.1	atha jaghanena vedyai tiṣṭhan sphyam ādatte devasya tvā savituḥ prasave 'śvinor bāhubhyāṃ pūṣṇo hastābhyām ādada iti
1.11.2	ādāyābhimantrayata indrasya bāhur asi dakṣiṇaḥ sahasrabhṛṣṭiḥ śatatejā iti
1.11.3	athainaṃ barhiṣā saṃśyati vāyur asi tigmatejāḥ śatabhṛṣṭir asi vānaspatyo dviṣato vadha iti
1.11.4	athāntarvedy udīcīnāgraṃ barhir nidadhāti pṛthivyai varmāsi varma yajamānāya bhaveti
1.11.5	tasmiṃ sphyena praharati pṛthivi devayajany oṣadhyās te mūlaṃ mā hiṃsiṣam iti
1.11.6	apahato 'raruḥ pṛthivyā ity ādatte
1.11.7	vrajaṃ gaccha gosthānam iti harati
1.11.8	vediṃ pratyavekṣate varṣatu te dyaur iti
1.11.9	hṛtvotkare nivapati badhāna deva savitaḥ paramasyāṃ parāvati śatena pāśair yo 'smān dveṣṭi yaṃ ca vayaṃ dviṣmas tam ato mā maug iti
1.11.10	dvitīyaṃ praharati pṛthivi devayajany oṣadhyās te mūlaṃ mā hiṃsiṣam iti
1.11.11	apahato 'raruḥ pṛthivyai devayajanyā ity ādatte
1.11.12	vrajaṃ gaccha gosthānam iti harati
1.11.13	vediṃ pratyavekṣate varṣatu te dyaur iti
1.11.14	hṛtvotkare nivapati badhāna deva savitaḥ paramasyāṃ parāvati śatena pāśair yo 'smān dveṣṭi yaṃ ca vayaṃ dviṣmas tam ato mā maug iti
1.11.15	tṛtīyaṃ praharati pṛthivi devayajany oṣadhyās te mūlaṃ mā hiṃsiṣam iti
1.11.16	apahato 'raruḥ pṛthivyā adevayajana ity ādatte
1.11.17	vrajaṃ gaccha gosthānam iti harati
1.11.18	vediṃ pratyavekṣate varṣatu te dyaur iti
1.11.19	hṛtvotkare nivapati badhāna deva savitaḥ paramasyāṃ parāvati śatena pāśair yo 'smān dveṣṭi yaṃ ca vayaṃ dviṣmas tam ato mā maug ararus te divaṃ mā skān ity atrānuvartayati
1.11.20	tūṣṇīṃ caturthaṃ harati saha barhiṣā
1.11.21	atha pūrvaṃ parigrāhaṃ parigṛhṇāti vasavas tvā parigṛhṇantu gāyatreṇa chandaseti dakṣiṇato rudrās tvā parigṛhṇantu traiṣṭubhena chandaseti paścād ādityās tvā parigṛhṇantu jāgatena chandasety uttarataḥ
1.11.22	atha karaṇaṃ japatīmāṃ narāḥ kṛṇuta vedim etya vasumatīṃ rudravatīm ādityavatīṃ varṣman divo nābhā pṛthivyā yathāyaṃ yajamāno na riṣyed iti
1.11.23	atha prācīṃ sphyena vedim uddhanti devasya savituḥ save karma kṛṇvanti vedhasa iti
1.11.24	athāgnīdhram āhāgnīd itas trir hareti
1.11.25	tatas trir āgnīdhro harati
1.11.26	yad āgnīdhras trir haraty atha saṃpraiṣam āha brahmann uttaraṃ parigrāhaṃ parigrahīṣyāmīti
1.11.27	prasūta uttaraṃ parigrāhaṃ parigṛhṇāty ṛtam asīti dakṣiṇata ṛtasadanam asīti paścād ṛtaśrīr asīty uttarataḥ
1.11.28	atha pratīcīṃ sphyena vediṃ yoyupyate dhā asi svadhā asy urvī cāsi vasvī cāsi purā krūrasya visṛpo virapśinn udādāya pṛthivīṃ jīradānur yām airayañ candramasi svadhābhis tāṃ dhīrāso anudṛśya yajanta iti
1.11.29	athāntarvedi tiryañcaṃ sphyaṃ stabdhvā saṃpraiṣam āha prokṣaṇīr āsādayedhmābarhir upasādaya sruvaṃ ca srucaś ca saṃmṛḍḍhi patnīṃ saṃnahyājyenodehīti
1.11.30	āharanty etāḥ prokṣaṇīr abhipūrya
1.11.31	dakṣiṇenādhvaryus tā sphya upaninīya sphyasya vartman sādayati
1.11.32	athotkare sphyaṃ nihanti yo mā hṛdā manasā yaś ca vācā yo brahmaṇā karmaṇā dveṣṭi devāḥ / yaḥ śrutena hṛdayeneṣṇatā ca tasyendravajreṇa śiraś chinadmīti
1.11.33	hastau prakṣālya sphyaṃ ca prakṣālayati
1.11.34	upasādayanty etad idhmābarhir dakṣiṇam idhmam uttaraṃ barhiḥ
1.12.1	athaitāḥ srucaḥ samādatte dakṣiṇena sruvaṃ juhūpabhṛtau savyena dhruvāṃ prāśitraharaṇaṃ vedaparivāsanānīti
1.12.2	gārhapatye pratitapati pratyuṣṭaṃ rakṣaḥ pratyuṣṭā arātayo 'gner vas tejiṣṭhena tejasā niṣṭapāmīti
1.12.3	atha sruvaṃ saṃmārṣṭi goṣṭhaṃ mā nirmṛkṣaṃ vājinaṃ tvā sapatnasāhaṃ saṃmārjmīti
1.12.4	trir antaratas trir bāhyatas trir evaṃ mūlair daṇḍaṃ saṃmṛjyādbhiḥ saṃsparśya pratitapyotprayacchati
1.12.5	atha juhūṃ saṃmārṣṭi vācaṃ prāṇaṃ mā nirmṛkṣaṃ vājinīṃ tvā sapatnasāhīṃ saṃmārjmīti
1.12.6	tathaiva saṃmṛjyādbhiḥ saṃsparśya pratitapyotprayacchati
1.12.7	athopabhṛtaṃ saṃmārṣṭi cakṣuḥ śrotraṃ mā nirmṛkṣaṃ vājinīṃ tvā sapatnasāhīṃ saṃmārjmīti
1.12.8	tathaiva saṃmṛjyādbhiḥ saṃsparśya pratitapyotprayacchati
1.12.9	atha dhruvāṃ saṃmārṣṭi prajāṃ yoniṃ mā nirmṛkṣaṃ vājinīṃ tvā sapatnasāhīṃ saṃmārjmīti
1.12.10	tathaiva saṃmṛjyādbhiḥ saṃsparśya pratitapyotprayacchati
1.12.11	atha prāśitraharaṇaṃ saṃmārṣṭi rūpaṃ varṇaṃ paśubhyo mā nirmṛkṣaṃ vājinaṃ tvā sapatnasāhaṃ saṃmārjmīti
1.12.12	tathaiva saṃmṛjyādbhiḥ saṃsparśya pratitapyotprayacchati
1.12.13	athaitāni sruksaṃmārjanāny adbhiḥ saṃsparśya gārhapatye 'nupraharati divaḥ śilpam avatataṃ pṛthivyāḥ kakubhiḥ śritaṃ tena vayaṃ sahasravalśena sapatnaṃ nāśayāmasi svāheti
1.12.14	athāgreṇotkaraṃ tṛṇāni saṃstīrya teṣu srucaḥ sādayitvā
1.12.15	athaitāṃ patnīm antareṇa vedyutkarau prapādya jaghanena dakṣiṇena gārhapatyam udīcīm upaveśya yoktreṇa saṃnahyaty āśāsānā saumanasaṃ prajāṃ saubhāgyaṃ tanūm agner anuvratā bhūtvā saṃnahye sukṛtāya kam iti
1.12.16	[athaināṃ vācayati yuktaṃ kriyātā āśīḥ kāme yujyātā iti]
1.12.17	athaināṃ tiraḥ pavitram apa ācāmayati payasvatīr oṣadhayaḥ payasvad vīrudhāṃ payaḥ / apāṃ payaso yat payas tena mām indra saṃsṛjeti
1.12.18	athaināṃ gārhapatye samidha ādhāpayaty agne vratapate vrataṃ cariṣyāmi tac chakeyaṃ tan me rādhyatāṃ svāhā vāyo vratapata āditya vratapate vratānāṃ vratapate vrataṃ cariṣyāmi tac chakeyaṃ tan me rādhyatāṃ svāheti
1.12.19	atha jaghanena gārhapatyam upasīdati suprajasas tvā vayaṃ supatnīr upasedima / agne sapatnadambhanam adabdhāso adābhyam indrāṇīvāvidhavā bhūyāsam aditir iva suputrā / asthūri tvā gārhapatyopaniṣade suprajāstvāya mama putrāḥ śatruhaṇo 'tho me duhitā virāṭ utāham asmi saṃjayā patyur me śloka uttama iti
1.12.20	[athaināṃ vācayaty ūne 'tiriktaṃ dhīyātā iti ca]
1.12.21	athaināṃ gārhapatyam īkṣayaty agne gṛhapata upa mā hvayasva devānāṃ patnīr upa mā hvayadhvaṃ patni patny eṣa te loko namas te astu mā mā hiṃsīr iti
1.12.22	athainām ājyam avekṣayati mahīnāṃ payo 'sy oṣadhīnāṃ raso 'dabdhena tvā cakṣuṣāvekṣe suprajāstvāyeti
1.12.23	athainad gārhapatye 'dhiśrayati tejo 'sīti
1.12.24	samidham upayatya prāṅ harati tejo 'nu prehīti
1.12.25	athainad āhavanīye 'dhiśrayaty agnis te tejo mā vinaid iti
1.12.26	atraitāṃ samidhaṃ madhyata āhavanīyasyābhyādadhāti [svāheti]
1.12.27	athainad agreṇa prokṣaṇīḥ paryāhṛtya dakṣiṇārdhe vedyai nidhāya yajamānam ājyam avekṣayati nimīlyāvekṣeteti brāhmaṇam
1.12.28	athainad yathāhṛtaṃ pratiparyāhṛtyottarārdhe vedyai nidhāyādhvaryur avekṣate 'gner jihvāsi subhūr devānāṃ dhāmnedhāmne devebhyo yajuṣeyajuṣe bhaveti
1.12.29	athainad udīcīnāgrābhyāṃ pavitrābhyāṃ punarāhāraṃ trir utpunāti śukram asi jyotir asi tejo 'sīti
1.12.30	atha prokṣaṇīr utpunāti devo vaḥ savitotpunātv acchidreṇa pavitreṇa vasoḥ sūryasya raśmibhir iti pacchaḥ
1.12.31	prokṣaṇīṣu pavitre avadhāyādatte dakṣiṇena sruvaṃ savyena juhūṃ vede pratiṣṭhāpya tasyāṃ gṛhṇīte śukraṃ tvā śukrāyāṃ dhāmnedhāmne devebhyo yajuṣeyajuṣe gṛhṇāmīty etena yajuṣā caturgṛhītaṃ gṛhītvā saṃmṛśyotprayacchati
1.12.32	athopabhṛti gṛhṇīte jyotis tvā jyotiṣi dhāmnedhāmne devebhyo yajuṣeyajuṣe gṛhṇāmīty etena yajuṣāṣṭagṛhītaṃ gṛhītvā bhūyaso grahān gṛhṇānaḥ kanīya ājyaṃ gṛhṇīte
1.12.33	tathaiva saṃmṛśyotprayacchati
1.12.34	atha dhruvāyāṃ gṛhṇīte 'rcis tvārciṣi dhāmnedhāmne devebhyo yajuṣeyajuṣe gṛhṇāmīty etena yajuṣā caturgṛhītaṃ gṛhītvābhipūrya tathaiva saṃmṛśyotprayacchati
1.13.1	athaitām ājyasthālīṃ sasruvāṃ jaghanena vedyai nidhāya prokṣaṇīr unmahayann upottiṣṭhaty āpo devīr agrepuvo agreguvo 'gra imaṃ yajñaṃ nayatāgre yajñapatim dhatta yuṣmān indro 'vṛṇīta vṛtratūrye yūyam indram avṛṇīdhvaṃ vṛtratūrya iti
1.13.2	adbhir evāpaḥ prokṣati prokṣitā stha prokṣitā stheti triḥ
1.13.3	athedhmaṃ visrasya prokṣati kṛṣṇo 'sy ākhareṣṭho 'gnaye tvā svāheti
1.13.4	vediṃ prokṣati vedir asi barhiṣe tvā svāheti
1.13.5	barhiḥ prokṣati barhir asi srugbhyas tvā svāheti
1.13.6	āharanty etad barhir antareṇa praṇītāś cāhavanīyaṃ ca
1.13.7	tad antarvedi purogranthyāsādya prokṣati dive tvety agrāṇy antarikṣāya tveti madhyāni pṛthivyai tveti mūlāni
1.13.8	saha srucā purastātpratyañcaṃ granthiṃ pratyukṣyātiśiṣṭāḥ prokṣaṇīr ninayati dakṣiṇāyai śroṇer ottarāyai śroṇeḥ svadhā pitṛbhya ūrg bhava barhiṣadbhya ūrjā pṛthivīṃ gacchatety udūhya prokṣaṇīdhānaṃ barhir visrasya purastāt prastaraṃ gṛhṇāti viṣṇo stūpo 'sīti
1.13.9	tasmin pavitre apisṛjati yajamāne prāṇāpānau dadhāmīti vā tūṣṇīṃ vā
1.13.10	taṃ yajamānāya vā brahmaṇe vā prayacchati
1.13.11	athaitāni barhiḥsaṃnahanāny āyātayati dakṣiṇāyai śroṇer ottarād aṃsāt
1.13.12	atha dakṣiṇe vedyante barhirmuṣṭiṃ stṛṇāti devabarhir ūrṇāmradasaṃ tvā stṝṇāmi svāsasthaṃ devebhya iti
1.13.13	tāṃ bahulāṃ purastāt pratīcīṃ trivṛtam anatidṛśnaṃ stṛṇāti
1.13.14	atha prastarapāṇiḥ prāṅ abhisṛpya paridhīn paridadhāti gandharvo 'si viśvāvasur viśvasmād īṣato yajamānasya paridhir iḍa īḍita iti madhyamam indrasya bāhur asi dakṣiṇo yajamānasya paridhir iḍa īḍita iti dakṣiṇaṃ mitrāvaruṇau tvottarataḥ paridhattāṃ dhruveṇa dharmaṇā yajamānasya paridhir iḍa īḍita ity uttaram
1.13.15	atha sūryeṇa purastāt paridadhāti sūryas tvā purastāt pātu kasyāś cid abhiśastyā iti
1.13.16	ūrdhve samidhāv ādadhāti vītihotraṃ tvā kave dyumantaṃ samidhīmahy agne bṛhantam adhvara iti dakṣiṇāṃ tūṣṇīm uttarām abhyādhāya
1.13.17	antarvedy udīcīnāgre vidhṛtī tiraścī sādayati viśo yantre stha iti
1.13.18	vidhṛtyoḥ prastaraṃ vasūnāṃ rudrāṇām ādityānāṃ sadasi sīdeti
1.13.19	prastare juhūṃ juhūr asi ghṛtācī nāmnā priyeṇa nāmnā priye sadasi sīdeti
1.13.20	uttarām upabhṛtam upabhṛd asi ghṛtācī nāmnā priyeṇa nāmnā priye sadasi sīdeti
1.13.21	uttarāṃ dhruvāṃ dhruvāsi ghṛtācī nāmnā priyeṇa nāmnā priye sadasi sīdeti
1.13.22	atha srucaḥ sannā abhimṛśaty etā asadant sukṛtasya loke tā viṣṇo pāhi pāhi yajñaṃ pāhi yajñapatiṃ pāhi māṃ yajñaniyam iti
1.13.23	atha viṣṇūni stha vaiṣṇavāni dhāmāni stha prājāpatyānīty ājyāny abhimantrayate
1.14.1	athādatte dakṣiṇenājyasthālīṃ sasruvāṃ savyena pātrīṃ vedam iti
1.14.2	etat samādāya pradakṣiṇam āvṛtya pratyaṅṅ ādrutya jaghanena gārhapatyam upaviśya pātryāṃ dvedhopastṛṇīte syonaṃ te sadanaṃ karomi ghṛtasya dhārayā suśevaṃ kalpayāmi / tasmint sīdāmṛte pratitiṣṭha vrīhīṇāṃ medha sumanasyamāna iti
1.14.3	atha dhṛṣṭim ādāya dakṣiṇasya puroḍāśasyāṅgārān apohatīdam ahaṃ senāyā abhītvaryai mukham apohāmīti
1.14.4	athainaṃ vidarśayati sūryajyotir vibhāhi mahata indriyāyeti
1.14.5	vedena virajasaṃ kṛtvābhighārayaty āpyāyatāṃ ghṛtayonir agnir havyānumanyatām / kham aṅkṣva tvacam aṅkṣva surūpaṃ tvā vasuvidaṃ paśūnāṃ tejasāgnaye juṣṭam abhighārayāmīti
1.14.6	yaddevatyo vā bhavati
1.14.7	athainam udvāsayati śṛta utsnāti janitā matīnām iti
1.14.8	ājyena susaṃtarpayaty ārdraḥ prathasnur bhuvanasya gopā iti
1.14.9	upariṣṭād abhyajyādhastād upānakti yas ta ātmā paśuṣu praviṣṭas tam aṅkṣveti
1.14.10	evam evottaraṃ puroḍāśam udvāsayati
1.14.11	atha śṛtam atha dadhi
1.14.12	atha sāṃnāyye alaṃkaroti yas ta ātmā paśuṣu praviṣṭo devānāṃ viṣṭhām anu yo vitasthe / ātmanvānt soma ghṛtavān hi bhūtvā devān gaccha suvar vinda yajamānāya mahyam iti
1.14.13	pratyajya kapālāny udvāsayatīrā bhūtiḥ pṛthivyai raso motkramīd iti
1.14.14	saṃkhyāyodvāsayati yajamānasya gopīthāyeti brāhmaṇam
1.14.15	athainaṃ sruvam ājyasya pūrayitvānatareṇa puroḍāśāv avadadhāti
1.14.16	athaināni saṃparigṛhyāntarvedy āsādayati bhūr bhuvaḥ suvar ity etābhir vyāhṛtībhiḥ
1.14.17	madhyataḥ puroḍāśāv āsādayati dakṣiṇataḥ śṛtam uttarato dadhi
1.14.18	athainaṃ sruvam agreṇa srucaḥ paryāhṛtya dakṣiṇena juhūṃ prastare sādayati syono me sīda suṣadaḥ pṛthivyāṃ prathayi prajayā paśubhiḥ suvarge loke / divi sīda pṛthivyām antarikṣe 'ham uttaro bhūyāsam adhare mat sapatnā iti
1.14.19	athainaṃ yathāhṛtaṃ pratiparyāhṛtya dhruvāyām avadadhāty ṛṣabho 'si śākvaro ghṛtācīnāṃ sūnuḥ priyeṇa nāmnā priye sadasi sīdeti
1.15.1	athedhmāt samidham ādadāna āhāgnaye samidhyamānāyānubrūhīti
1.15.2	atha yatra hotur abhijānāti pra vo vājā abhidyava iti tatprathamām abhyādadhāti
1.15.3	praṇavepraṇave 'bhyādadhāti
1.15.4	atha yatra hotur abhijānāti samiddho agna āhuteti tadantato 'bhyādadhāti
1.15.5	pari samidhaṃ śinaṣṭi
1.15.6	atha yatra hotur abhijānāty ājuhotā duvasyateti tad etena vedena trir āhavanīyam upavājayati
1.15.7	anūktāsu sāmidhenīṣu dhruvājyāt sruveṇopahatya vedenopayamya prājāpatyaṃ tiryañcam āghāram āghārayati prajāpataye svāheti manasā
1.15.8	atha saṃpraiṣam āhāgnīd agnīṃs tristriḥ saṃmṛḍḍhīti
1.15.9	athaiṣa āgnīdhra idhmasaṃnahanāni sphya upasaṃgṛhya paridhīn saṃmārṣṭi trir madhyamaṃ trir dakṣiṇārdhyaṃ trir uttarārdhyaṃ trir āhavanīyam upavājayaty agne vājajid vājaṃ tvāgne sariṣyantaṃ vājaṃ jeṣyantaṃ vājinaṃ vājajitaṃ vājajityāyai saṃmārjmy agnim annādam annādyāyeti
1.15.10	athāgreṇa juhūpabhṛtau prāñcam añjaliṃ karoti bhuvanam asi viprathasvāgne yaṣṭar idaṃ nama iti
1.15.11	athādatte dakṣiṇena juhūṃ juhv ehy agnis tvā hvayati devayajyāyā iti
1.15.12	savyenopabhṛtam upabhṛd ehi devas tvā savitā hvayati devayajyāyā iti
1.15.13	savyenātyākrāmañ japaty agnāviṣṇū mā vām avakramiṣaṃ vijihāthāṃ mā mā saṃtāptaṃ lokaṃ me lokakṛtau kṛṇutam iti
1.15.14	sthānaṃ kalpayate viṣṇo sthānam asīti
1.15.15	anvārabdhe yajamāne madhyame paridhau saṃsparśyarjum āghāram āghārayati saṃtataṃ prāñcam avyavacchindann ita indro akṛṇod vīryāṇi samārabhyordhvo adhvaro divispṛśam ahruto yajño yajñapater indrāvānt svāheti
1.15.16	bṛhad bhā iti srucam udgṛhṇāti
1.15.17	athāsaṃsparśayan srucāv udaṅṅ atyākrāmañ japati pāhi māgne duścaritād ā mā sucarite bhajeti
1.15.18	juhvā dhruvāṃ samanakti makhasya śiro 'si saṃ jyotiṣā jyotir aṅktām iti triḥ
1.15.19	atha yathāyatanaṃ srucau sādayitvā pravaraṃ pravṛṇīte
1.15.20	utkara idhmasaṃnahanāni sphya upasaṃgṛhya pṛṣṭham āgnīdhro 'nūpaśliṣyati
1.15.21	athāśrāvayaty o śrāvayāstu śrauṣaḍ agnir devo hotā devān yakṣad vidvāṃś cikitvān manuṣvad bharatavad amuvad amuvad brahmaṇvad eha vakṣad brāhmaṇā asya yajñasya prāvitāra ity asau mānuṣa iti hotur nāma gṛhṇāti
1.15.22	upotthāya hotā vimuñcati
1.15.23	vimukto 'dhvaryur upaviśati
1.15.24	prasavam ākāṅkṣann āste
1.16.1	atha yatra hotur abhijānāti ghṛtavatīm adhvaryo srucam āsyasveti taj juhūpabhṛtāv ādāyātyākramyāśrāvyāha samidho yajeti
1.16.2	vaṣaṭkṛte juhoti yaja yajeti
1.16.3	caturthaṃ yakṣyann ardham aupabhṛtasyājyasya juhvāṃ samānayate
1.16.4	pañca prayājān iṣṭvodaṅṅ atyākramya saṃsrāveṇānupūrvaṃ havīṃṣy abhighārayati dhruvām evāgre 'tha dakṣiṇaṃ puroḍāśam atha dhruvām athottaraṃ puroḍāśam atha śṛtam atha dadhy upabhṛtam antataḥ
1.16.5	atha catura ājyasya gṛhṇāna āhāgnaye 'nubrūhīti
1.16.6	atyākramyāśrāvyāhāgniṃ yajeti
1.16.7	vaṣaṭkṛta uttarārdhapūrvārdhe pratimukhaṃ prabāhug juhoti
1.16.8	athodaṅṅ atyākramya catura evājyasya gṛhṇāna āha somāyānubrūhīti
1.16.9	atyākramyāśrāvyāha somaṃ yajeti
1.16.10	vaṣaṭkṛte dakṣiṇārdhapūrvārdhe pratimukhaṃ prabāhug juhoti
1.16.11	athopastīrya dakṣiṇasya puroḍāśasya pūrvārdhād avadyann āhāgnaye 'nubrūhīti
1.16.12	athainam upatiṣṭhate mā bher mā saṃvikthā mā tvā hiṃsiṣaṃ mā te tejo 'pakramīd iti
1.16.13	athainam abhimṛśati bharatam uddharem anuṣiñcāvadānāni te pratyavadāsyāmi namas te astu mā mā hiṃsīr iti
1.16.14	pūrvārdhād avadāyāparārdhād avadyati
1.16.15	abhighārayati pratyanakti yad avadānāni te 'vadyan vilomākārṣam ātmanaḥ / ājyena pratyanajmy enat tat ta āpyāyatāṃ punar iti
1.16.16	atyākramyāśrāvyāhāgniṃ yajeti
1.16.17	vaṣaṭkṛte juhoti
1.16.18	atha catura ājyasya gṛhṇāna āha prajāpataya ity upāṃśv anubrūhīty uccaiḥ
1.16.19	atyākramyāśrāvyāha prajāpatim ity upāṃśu yajety uccaiḥ
1.16.20	vaṣaṭkṛte juhoti
1.16.21	athopastīryottarasya puroḍāśasyāparārdhād avadyann āhāgnīṣomābhyām iti paurṇamāsyām indrāya vaimṛdhāyeti cendrāgnibhyām ity amāvāsyāyām asaṃnayata indrāyeti saṃnayato mahendrāyeti vā yadi mahendrayājī bhavati
1.17.1	samāna upasthānaḥ
1.17.2	samāno 'bhimarśanaḥ
1.17.3	aparārdhād avadāya pūrvārdhād avadyati
1.17.4	abhighārayati
1.17.5	samānaḥ pratyañjanaḥ
1.17.6	atyākramyāśrāvyāhāgnīṣomau yajeti
1.17.7	vaṣaṭkṛte juhoti
1.17.8	athopastīrya dviḥ puroḍāśasyāvadyann āhendrāyānubrūhīti mahendrāyeti vā yadi mahendrayājī bhavati
1.17.9	dviḥ puroḍāśasyāvadyati dviḥ śṛtasya dvir dadhnaḥ
1.17.10	abhighārayati
1.17.11	pratyanakti
1.17.12	atyākramyāśrāvyāhendraṃ yajeti mahendram iti vā yadi mahendrayājī bhavati
1.17.13	vaṣaṭkṛte juhoti
1.17.14	athopastīrya dakṣiṇasya puroḍāśasyottarārdhād avadyann āhāgnaye sviṣṭakṛte 'nubrūhīti
1.17.15	sakṛd dakṣiṇasya puroḍāśasyottarārdhād avadyati sakṛd dhruvājyāt sakṛd uttarasya puroḍāśasya sakṛc chṛtasya sakṛd dadhnaḥ
1.17.16	dvir abhighārayati
1.17.17	na pratyanakti
1.17.18	avatte sviṣṭakṛti sruveṇa pārvaṇau homau juhoty ṛṣabhaṃ vājinaṃ vayaṃ pūrṇamāsaṃ yajāmahe / sa no dohatāṃ suvīryaṃ rāyaspoṣaṃ sahasriṇam / prāṇāya surādhase pūrṇamāsāya svāheti paurṇamāsyām
1.17.19	amāvāsyā subhagā suśevā dhenur iva bhūya āpyāyamānā / sā no dohatāṃ suvīryaṃ rāyaspoṣaṃ sahasriṇam / apānāya surādhase 'māvāsyāyai svāhety amāvāsyāyām
1.17.20	atyākramyāśrāvyāhāgniṃ sviṣṭakṛtaṃ yajeti
1.17.21	vaṣaṭkṛta uttarārdhapūrvārdhe 'tihāya pūrvā āhutīr juhoti
1.17.22	atraitan mekṣaṇam āhavanīye 'nupraharati
1.17.23	athainat saṃsrāveṇābhijuhoti
1.17.24	athodaṅṅ atyākramya juhvām apa ānīya saṃkṣālanam antaḥparidhi ninayati vaiśvānare havir idaṃ juhomi sāhasram utsaṃ śatadhāram etam / sa naḥ pitaraṃ pitāmahaṃ prapitāmahaṃ suvarge loke gacchatu pinvamānaṃ svadhā nama iti
1.17.25	nirṇijya srucaṃ niṣṭapyādbhiḥ pūrayitvā bahiḥparidhi ninayatīmaṃ samudraṃ śatadhāram utsaṃ vyacyamānaṃ bhuvanasya madhye / ghṛtaṃ duhānām aditiṃ janāyāgne mā hiṃsīḥ parame vyomann iti
1.17.26	atraitad aupabhṛtam ājyaṃ sarvaśa eva juhvāṃ samānayate
1.17.27	atha yathāyatanaṃ srucau sādayitvā prāśitram avadyati dakṣiṇasya puroḍāśasyottarārdhād yavamātram ajyāyo yavamātrād āvyādhāt kṛtyatām idam / mā rūrupāma yajñasya śuddhaṃ sviṣṭam idaṃ havir iti
1.17.28	athainat sruvadaṇḍenābhighārya jaghanena praṇītāḥ sādayitvādbhiḥ sruvadaṇḍaṃ saṃsparśyāvadadhāti
1.18.1	atha kaṃsaṃ vā camasaṃ veḍopahavanaṃ yācati
1.18.2	tam antarvedi nidhāya tasminn upastīrya dakṣiṇasya puroḍāśasya dakṣiṇārdhāt prarujyāvadadhāti manunā dṛṣṭāṃ ghṛtapadīṃ mitrāvaruṇasamīritām / dakṣiṇārdhād asaṃbhindann avadyāmy ekatomukhām iti
1.18.3	dvitīyam avadānāni saṃbhidyāvadadhāti
1.18.4	atha dakṣiṇasyaiva puroḍāśasya pūrvārdhāt tryaṅgulaṃ vā caturaṅgulaṃ vājyena susaṃtṛptaṃ saṃtarpyāgreṇa dhruvāṃ yajamānabhāgaṃ nidadhāti
1.18.5	dvir dhruvājyād avadyati dvir uttarasya puroḍāśasya dviḥ śṛtasya dvir dadhnaḥ
1.18.6	abhighārayati
1.18.7	atha hotur dvir aṅgulāv anakti
1.18.8	jighreṇa bhakṣayitvā
1.18.9	caturavāntareḍām avadyati
1.18.10	upastṛṇāti
1.18.11	dvir ādadhāti
1.18.12	abhighārayati
1.18.13	samanvārabhante 'dhvaryuś ca yajamānaś ca brahmā cāgnīdhraś ca
1.18.14	atha yatra hotur abhijānāti daivyā adhvaryava upahūtās upahūtā manuṣyā iti tad dakṣiṇaṃ puroḍāśaṃ caturdhā kṛtvā barhiṣadaṃ karoti
1.18.15	atha yatra hotur abhijānāty upahūto 'yaṃ yajamāna iti tarhi yajamāno hotāram īkṣamāṇo vāyuṃ manasā dhyāyed iti
1.18.16	upahūtāyām iḍāyām agnīdha ādadhāti ṣaḍavattam
1.18.17	upastṛṇāty ādadhāty abhighārayaty upastṛṇāty ādadhāty abhighārayati
1.18.18	prāśnanti
1.18.19	mārjayante
1.18.20	athāha brahmaṇe prāśitraṃ parihareti
1.18.21	pari prāśitraṃ haranti
1.18.22	anv apo 'nu vedena brahmabhāgam
1.18.23	athānvāhāryaṃ yācati
1.18.24	udvāsayanty etad dhavir ucchiṣṭam
1.19.1	atha saṃpraiṣam āha brahman prasthāsyāmaḥ samidham ādhāyāgnīd agnīn sakṛtsakṛt saṃmṛḍḍhīti
1.19.2	prasūto 'traitāṃ samidhaṃ madhyata āhavanīyasyābhyādadhāti
1.19.3	athaiṣa āgnīdhro 'sphyair evedhmasaṃnahanaiḥ paridhīn saṃmārṣṭi sakṛn madhyaṃ sakṛd dakṣiṇārdhyaṃ sakṛd uttarārdhyam
1.19.4	sakṛd āhavanīyam upavājayaty agne vājajid vājaṃ tvāgne sasṛvāṃsaṃ vājaṃ jigivāṃsaṃ vājinaṃ vājajitaṃ vājajityāyai saṃmārjmy agnim annādam annādyāyeti
1.19.5	athaitānīdhmasaṃnahanāny adbhiḥ saṃsparśyāhavanīye 'nupraharati yo bhūtānām adhipatī rudras tanticaro vṛṣā / paśūn asmākaṃ mā hiṃsīr etad astu hutaṃ tava svāheti
1.19.6	atha juhūpabhṛtāv ādāyātyākramyāśrāvyāha devān yajeti
1.19.7	vaṣaṭkṛte juhoti yaja yajeti
1.19.8	trīn pratīco 'nūyājān yajati
1.19.9	prācāntataḥ saṃbhinatti
1.19.10	athodaṅṅ atyākramya yathāyatanaṃ srucau sādayitvā vājavatībhyāṃ srucau vyūhati vājasya mā prasavenodgrābheṇodagrabhīd iti
1.19.11	dakṣiṇena juhūm udgṛhṇāti
1.19.12	athā sapatnāṃ indro me nigrābheṇādharāṃ akar iti savyenopabhṛtaṃ nigṛhṇāti
1.19.13	udgrābhaṃ ca nigrābhaṃ ca brahma devā avīvṛdhann iti prācīṃ juhūm ūhati
1.19.14	athā sapatnān indrāgnī me viṣūcīnān vyasyatām iti pratīcīm upabhṛtaṃ pratyūhati
1.19.15	prācyā paridhīn anakti vasubhyas tveti madhyamaṃ rudrebhyas tveti dakṣiṇam ādityebhyas tvety uttaram
1.19.16	athopabhṛtam adbhiḥ saṃsparśya yathāyatanaṃ srucau sādayitvā srukṣu prastaram anakti
1.19.17	aktaṃ rihāṇā iti juhvām agrāṇi viyantu vaya ity upabhṛti madhyāni prajāṃ yoniṃ mā nirmṛkṣam iti dhruvāyāṃ mūlāni
1.19.18	atha prastarāt tṛṇaṃ pracchidya juhvām avadadhāti
1.19.19	athāśrāvayaty o śrāvayāstu śrauṣaḍ iṣitā daivyā hotāro bhadravācyāya preṣito mānuṣaḥ sūktavākāya sūktā brūhīti
1.19.20	tam uparīva prāñcaṃ praharati nāty agraṃ praharati na purastāt pratyasyati na pratiśṛṇāti na viṣvañcaṃ viyauty ūrdhvam udyauty āpyāyantām āpa oṣadhayo marutāṃ pṛṣataya stha divaṃ gaccha tato no vṛṣṭim erayeti
1.19.21	athāgnīdhram īkṣate 'gnīd iti
1.19.22	tam āhāgnīdhraḥ saṃvadasveti
1.19.23	agān agnīd ity āhādhvaryuḥ
1.19.24	agann ity āhāgnīdhraḥ
1.19.25	śrāvayety āhādhvaryuḥ
1.19.26	śrauṣaḍ ity āhāgnīdhraḥ
1.19.27	idaṃ brūhīty āhādhvaryuḥ
1.19.28	anupraharety āhāgnīdhraḥ
1.19.29	anupraharati
1.19.30	svagā daivyā hotṛbhyaḥ svastir mānuṣebhyaḥ śaṃyor brūhīti
1.19.31	athopotthāyāhavanīyam upatiṣṭhata āyuṣpā agne 'sy āyur me pāhi cakṣuṣpā agne 'si cakṣur me pāhīti
1.19.32	athemām abhimṛśati dhruvāsīti
1.19.33	madhyamaṃ paridhim anupraharati yaṃ paridhiṃ paryadhatthā agne deva paṇibhir vīyamāṇaḥ / taṃ ta etam anu joṣaṃ bharāmi ned eṣa tvad apacetayātā iti
1.19.34	athetarāv upasamasyati yajñasya pātha upa samitam iti
1.19.35	athainān saṃsrāveṇābhijuhoti
1.19.36	juhvām upabhṛtaṃ saṃprasrāvayati saṃsrāvabhāgā stheṣā bṛhantaḥ prastareṣṭhā barhiṣadaś ca devā imāṃ vācam abhi viśve gṛṇanta āsadyāsmin barhiṣi mādayadhvaṃ svāheti
1.19.37	atha pradakṣiṇam āvṛtya pratyaṅṅ ādrutya dhuri srucau vimuñcaty agner vām apannagṛhasya sadasi sādayāmi sumnāya sumninī sumne mā dhattaṃ dhuri dhuryau pātam iti
1.19.38	yady u vai nāno bhavaty utkara evaine sphye vimuñcaty etenaiva mantreṇa
1.20.1	athādatte dakṣiṇenājyasthālīṃ sasruvāṃ savyena juhūṃ hotre vedaṃ pradāya
1.20.2	pradakṣiṇam āvṛtya pratyañcāv ādravataḥ
1.20.3	dakṣiṇenādhvaryur gārhapatyaṃ parikrāmaty uttareṇa hotā
1.20.4	tau jaghanena gārhapatyaṃ paścāt prāñcāv upaviśato dakṣiṇa evādhvaryur uttaro hotā
1.20.5	athādhvaryur vedam upabhṛtaṃ kṛtvā catura ājyasya gṛhṇāna āha somāyety upāṃśv anubrūhīty uccaiḥ
1.20.6	āśrāvyāha somam ity upāṃśu yajety uccaiḥ
1.20.7	vaṣaṭkṛte juhoti
1.20.8	catura evājyasya gṛhṇāna āha tvaṣṭra ity upāṃśv anubrūhīty uccaiḥ
1.20.9	āśrāvyāha tvaṣṭāram ity upāṃśu yajety uccaiḥ
1.20.10	vaṣaṭkṛte juhoti
1.20.11	catura evājyasya gṛhṇāna āha devānāṃ patnībhya ity upāṃśv anubrūhīty uccaiḥ
1.20.12	āśrāvyāha devānāṃ patnīr ity upāṃśu yajety uccaiḥ
1.20.13	vaṣaṭkṛte pariśrite devānāṃ patnīr juhoti
1.20.14	atha catura evājyasya gṛhṇāna āhāgnaye gṛhapataya ity upāṃśv anubrūhīty uccaiḥ
1.20.15	āśrāvyāhāgniṃ gṛhapatim ity upāṃśu yajety uccaiḥ
1.20.16	vaṣaṭkṛta uttarārdhapūrvārdhe 'tihāya pūrvā āhutīr juhoti
1.20.17	athāgreṇa hotāram upātītya hotur dvir aṅgulāv anakti
1.20.18	nighreṇa bhakṣayitvā
1.20.19	caturhasteḍāṃ saṃpādayaty ājyasyaiva
1.20.20	samanvārabhete adhvaryuś caiva patnī ca
1.20.21	upahūtāyām iḍāyām agnīdha ādadhāti ṣaḍavattam
1.20.22	prāśnītaḥ
1.20.23	mārjayete
1.20.24	atha sruci caturgṛhītaṃ gṛhītvāpasalaiḥ paryāvṛtyānvāhāryapacane prāyaścittaṃ juhoty ulūkhale musale yac ca śūrpa āśiśleṣa dṛṣadi kṛṣṇājine yat kapāle / avapruṣo vipruṣaḥ saṃyajāmi viśve devā havir idaṃ juṣantām / yajñe yā vipruṣaḥ santi bahvīr agnau tāḥ sarvāḥ sviṣṭāḥ sahutā juhomi svāheti
1.20.25	aparaṃ caturgṛhītaṃ gṛhītvānvāhāryapacana evedhmapravraścanāny abhyādhāya phalīkaraṇān opya phalīkaraṇahomaṃ juhoty agne 'dabdhāyo 'śītatano pāhi mādya divaḥ pāhi prasityai pāhi duriṣṭyai pāhi duradmanyai pāhi duścaritād aviṣaṃ naḥ pituṃ kṛṇu suṣadā yoniṃ svāheti
1.20.26	athaitenaiva yathetam etya [vede yajamānaṃ vācayati vedo 'si vittir asīty āntād anuvākasya] hotre vedaṃ pradāya patnīṃ viṣyatīmaṃ viṣyāmi varuṇasya pāśaṃ yam abadhnīta savitā suketaḥ / dhātuś ca yonau sukṛtasya loke syonaṃ me saha patyā karomīti
1.20.27	athāsyai yoktram añjalāv ādhāyodapātram ānayati sam āyuṣā saṃ prajayā sam agne varcasā punaḥ / saṃ patnī patyāhaṃ gacche sam ātmā tanuvā mamety atha mukhaṃ vimṛṣṭe yad apsu te sarasvati goṣv aśveṣu yan madhu / tena me vājinīvati mukham aṅdhi sarasvatīti
1.20.28	apo ninayaty avabhṛthasyaiva rūpaṃ kṛtvottiṣṭhatīti brāhmaṇam
1.21.1	athaināṃ tathaiva tiraḥ pavitram apa ācāmayati payasvatīr oṣadhayaḥ payasvad vīrudhāṃ payaḥ / apāṃ payaso yat payas tena mām indra saṃsṛjeti
1.21.2	athaināṃ gārhapatye samidha ādhāpayaty agne vratapate vratam acāriṣaṃ tad aśakaṃ tan me 'rādhi svāhā vāyo vratapata āditya vratapate vratānāṃ vratapate vratam acāriṣaṃ tad aśakaṃ tan me 'rādhi svāheti
1.21.3	atha yathāprapannaṃ niṣkrāmayati
1.21.4	atha prāṅ etya dhruvām āpyāyayaty āpyāyatāṃ dhruvā ghṛtena yajñaṃyajñaṃ prati devayadbhyaḥ / sūryāyā ūdho 'dityā upastha urudhārā pṛthivī yajñe asminn iti
1.21.5	athājyasthālyāḥ sruveṇopaghātaṃ prāyaścittāni juhoty āśrāvitam atyāśrāvitaṃ vaṣaṭkṛtam atyanūktaṃ ca yajñe / atiriktaṃ karmaṇo yac ca hīnaṃ yajñaḥ parvāṇi pratirann eti kalpayan / svāhākṛtāhutir etu devānt svāheti
1.21.6	atha yajñasamṛddhīr juhotīṣṭebhyaḥ svāhā vaṣaḍ aniṣṭebhyaḥ svāhā bheṣajaṃ duriṣṭyai svāhā niṣkṛtyai svāhā daurārddhyai svāhā daivībhyas tanūbhyaḥ svāhā ṛddhyai svāhā samṛddhyai svāhā sarvasamṛddhyai svāhā bhūḥ svāhā bhuvaḥ svāhā suvaḥ svāhā bhūr bhuvaḥ suvaḥ svāhemaṃ me varuṇa tat tvā yāmi tvaṃ no agne sa tvaṃ no agne tvam agne ayāsy ayā san manasā hitaḥ / ayā san havyam ūhiṣe ayā no dhehi bheṣajaṃ svāhāyāś cāgne 'sy anabhiśastīś ca satyam it tvam ayā asi / ayasā manasā dhṛto 'yasā havam ūhiṣe 'yā no dhehi bheṣajaṃ svāhā yad asmin karmaṇy antar agāma mantrataḥ karmato vā / anayāhutyā tac chamayāmi sarvaṃ tṛpyantu devā āvṛṣantāṃ ghṛtena svāhā yad asya karmaṇo 'tyarīricaṃ yad vā nyūnam ihākaram / agniṣ ṭat sviṣṭakṛd vidvān sarvaṃ sviṣṭaṃ suhutaṃ karotu me / agnaye sviṣṭakṛte suhutahuta āhutīnāṃ kāmānāṃ samardhayitre svāhā / prajāpate na tvad etāny anyo viśvā jātāni pari tā babhūva / yatkāmās te juhumas tan no astu vayaṃ syāma patayo rayīṇāṃ svāheti
1.21.7	atha barhiṣo dhātūnāṃ saṃpralupya dhruvāyāṃ samanakti samaṅktāṃ barhir haviṣā ghṛtena sam ādityair vasubhiḥ saṃ marudbhiḥ / sam indreṇa viśvebhir devebhir aṅktām iti
1.21.8	athainad āhavanīye 'nupraharati divyaṃ nabho gacchatu yat svāheti
1.21.9	athopotthāya dakṣiṇena padā vedim avakramya dhruvayā samiṣṭayajur juhoti devā gātuvido gātuṃ vittvā gātum ita manasaspata imaṃ no deva deveṣu yajñaṃ svāhā vāci svāhā vāte dhāḥ svāheti
1.21.10	udūhati srucam
1.21.11	ninayati praṇītāḥ
1.21.12	upotthāya yajamāno dakṣiṇena padā viṣṇukramān kramate
1.21.13	saṃtiṣṭhata āmāvāsyaṃ vā paurṇamāsyaṃ vā haviḥ
2.1.1	athopavyāharaṇam
2.1.2	vijñāyate kratvādau kratukāmaṃ kāmayīta yajñāṅgādau yajñāṅgakāmam iti
2.1.3	prāktūlān darbhān saṃstīrya teṣu prāṅmukho yajamāna upaviśya japati yāḥ purastāt prasravanty upariṣṭāt sarvataś ca yāḥ / ābhī raśmipavitrābhiḥ śraddhāṃ yajñam ārabhe devā gātuvido gātuṃ yajñāya vindata / manasaspatinā devena vātād yajñaḥ prayujyatām iti śraddha ehi satyena tvāhvayāmīti
2.1.4	ākūtyā vedanaṃ karoty ākūtyai tvā kāmāya tvā samṛdhe tvā puro dadhe / amṛtatvāya jīvase
2.1.5	ākūtim asyāvase kāmam asya samṛdhyai / indrasya yuñjate dhiyaḥ
2.1.6	ākūtiṃ devīṃ manasaḥ puro dadhe yajñasya mātā suhavā me astu / yad icchāmi manasā sakāmo videyam enad dhṛdaye niviṣṭam iti
2.1.7	manasā triḥ saṃkalpayate trir uccaiḥ
2.1.8	sarvakāmo 'gnīn ādhāsya ity agnyādheye
2.1.9	svargakāmo darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ yakṣya iti darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ
2.1.10	svargakāmaś cāturmāsyair yakṣya iti cāturmāsyeṣu
2.1.11	svargakāmaḥ paśunā yakṣya iti paśubandhe
2.1.12	svargakāmaḥ somena yakṣya iti some
2.1.13	svargakāmo 'gniṃ ceṣya ity agnicaye
2.1.14	ahīne 'hargaṇe vā yathākāmo yatkāmo vā yajate

2.1.17	oṃ tatheti prativacanam
2.2.1	athartvijo devayajanaṃ yācate
2.2.2	adhvaryo devayajanaṃ me dehīty adhvaryum
2.2.3	ādityo devo daivo 'dhvaryuḥ sa te devayajanaṃ dadātv iti
2.2.4	oṃ tatheti prativacanam
2.2.5	brahman devayajanaṃ me dehīti brahmāṇam

2.2.8	hotar devayajanaṃ me dehīti hotāram

2.2.10	oṃ tatheti prativacanam
2.2.11	udgātar devayajanaṃ me dehīty udgātāram

2.2.14	sadasya devayajanaṃ me dehīti sadasyam
2.2.15	ākāśo devo daivaḥ sadasyaḥ sa te devayajanaṃ dadātv iti
2.2.16	oṃ tatheti prativacanam
2.2.17	hotrakā devayajanaṃ me datteti hotrakān
2.2.18	āpo devyo daivyā hotrāśaṃsinyas tās te devayajanaṃ dadatv iti
2.2.19	oṃ tatheti prativacanam
2.2.20	camasādhvaryavo devayajanaṃ me datteti camasādhvaryūn
2.2.21	raśmayo devā daivāś camasādhvaryavas te te devayajanaṃ dadatv iti
2.2.22	oṃ tatheti prativacanam
2.2.23	api vā na devayajanaṃ yācate
2.2.24	ādita eva tīrthe snātvodetyāhataṃ vāsaḥ paridhāya
2.2.25	śuddho haiva śuciḥ pūto medhyo vipāpmā brahmacārī sahakāripratyaya ā caturthāt karmaṇo 'bhisamīkṣamāṇo vedakarmāṇi prayojayet
2.2.26	prāgapavargāṇy udagapavargāṇi vā prāṅmukhaḥ pradakṣiṇaṃ yajñopavītī daivāni karmāṇi karoti
2.2.27	dakṣiṇāmukhaḥ prasavyaṃ prācīnāvītī pitryāṇi
2.2.28	tiṣṭhann āsīnaḥ prahvo vā yathānyāyam
2.2.29	chandogabrāhmaṇaṃ yathā vai dakṣiṇaḥ pāṇir evaṃ devayajanam
2.2.30	yathā savyas tathā pitṛyajanam
2.2.31	yathā pitṛyajanaṃ tathā śmaśānakaraṇam
2.2.32	yathā śmaśānakaraṇaṃ tathābhicaraṇīyeṣv iṣṭipaśusomeṣu

2.3.1	athartvijāṃ varaṇam

2.3.3	na parikhātikrāntā nāntagā nāntyajā nānanūcānāḥ
2.3.4	hāleyavāleyaputrikāputraparakṣetrasahoḍhakānīnānujāvaradvipravarān parihāpya
2.3.5	āṅgiraso 'dhvaryur vāsiṣṭho brahmā vaiśvāmitro hotāyāsya udgātā kauṣītakaḥ sadasyaḥ
2.3.6	avaśiṣṭā bhṛgavo 'ṅgiraso vā

2.4.1	ādityo devo daivo 'dhvaryuḥ sa me 'dhvaryur adhvaryo 'dhvaryuṃ tvā vṛṇa ity adhvaryum
2.4.2	ādityo devo daivo 'dhvaryuḥ sa te 'dhvaryus tenānumataḥ karmaivāhaṃ kariṣyāmīti
2.4.3	oṃ tatheti prativacanam
2.4.4	candramā devo daivo brahmā sa me brahmā brahman brahmāṇaṃ tvā vṛṇa iti brahmāṇam
2.4.5	candramā devo daivo brahmā sa te brahmā tenānumataḥ karmaivāhaṃ kariṣyāmīti
2.4.6	oṃ tatheti prativacanam
2.4.7	agnir devo daivo hotā sa me hotā hotar hotāraṃ tvā vṛṇa iti hotāram
2.4.8	agnir devo daivo hotā sa te hotā tenānumataḥ karmaivāhaṃ kariṣyāmīti
2.4.9	oṃ tatheti prativacanam
2.4.10	parjanyo devo daiva udgātā sa ma udgātodgātar udgātāraṃ tvā vṛṇa ity udgātāram
2.4.11	parjanyo devo daiva udgātā sa ta udgātā tenānumataḥ karmaivāhaṃ kariṣyāmīti
2.4.12	oṃ tatheti prativacanam
2.4.13	ākāśo devo daivaḥ sadasyaḥ sa me sadasyaḥ sadasya sadasyaṃ tvā vṛṇa iti sadasyam
2.4.14	ākāśo devo daivaḥ sadasyaḥ sa te sadasyas tenānumataḥ karmaivāhaṃ kariṣyāmīti
2.4.15	oṃ tatheti prativacanam
2.4.16	āpo devyo daivyā hotrāśaṃsinyas tā me hotrāśaṃsinyo hotrakā hotrakān vo vṛṇa iti hotrakān
2.4.17	āpo devyo daivyā hotrāśaṃsinyas tās te hotrāśaṃsinyas tābhir anumatāḥ karmaiva vayaṃ kariṣyāma iti
2.4.18	oṃ tatheti prativacanam
2.4.19	raśmayo devā daivāś camasādhvaryavas te me camasādhvaryavaś camasādhvaryavaś camasādhvaryūn vo vṛṇa iti camasādhvaryūn
2.4.20	raśmayo devā daivāś camasādhvaryavas te te camasādhvaryavas tair anumatāḥ karmaiva vayaṃ kariṣyāma iti
2.4.21	oṃ tatheti prativacanam

2.5.36	sūkare me kladathuḥ
2.5.37	pṛdākhuni me svapnaḥ
2.5.38	ajagare me dusvapnaḥ
2.5.39	vidyuti me smayaśaḥ
2.5.40	lobhāyāṃ me kledaḥ
2.5.41	śalabhe me pāpmālakṣmī
2.5.42	strīṣu me 'nṛtam
2.5.43	ajāsu me karkaśaḥ
2.5.44	vrātye ma ītyā
2.5.45	śūdre me steyam
2.5.46	vaiśye me 'kārmakṛtyam
2.5.47	rājanyabandhuni me 'jñānam
2.5.48	naiṣāde me brahmahatyā
2.5.49	kuliṅge me kṣavathuḥ
2.5.50	ulale me vilāsaḥ
2.5.51	udriṇi me vamatiḥ
2.5.52	kiṃpuruṣe me rodaḥ
2.5.53	dvīpini me niṣṭapat
2.5.54	hastini me kilāsaḥ
2.5.55	śuni me duripram
2.5.56	snāvanyeṣu me mlecchaḥ
2.5.57	videheṣu me śīpathaḥ
2.5.58	mahāvarṣeṣu me glauḥ
2.5.59	mūjavatsu me tapnā
2.5.60	dundubhau me kāsikā
2.5.61	ikṣvākuṣu me pittam
2.5.62	kaliṅgeṣu me 'medhyam
2.5.63	aśvataryāṃ me 'prajastā
2.5.64	puṃścalyāṃ me duścaritam
2.5.65	ākhuni me dantarogaḥ
2.5.66	makṣikāyāṃ me śvalkaśaḥ
2.5.67	śuke me harimā
2.5.68	mayūre me jalpyā
2.5.69	vṛṣe me jarā
2.5.70	cāṣe me pāpavādaḥ
2.5.71	apsu me śramaḥ
2.5.72	brahmojjhe me kilbiṣam
2.5.73	apehi pāpman punar apanāśito bhavā naḥ pāpman sukṛtasya loke pāpman dhehy avihṛto yo naḥ pāpman na jahāti tam u tvā jahimo vayam
2.5.74	anyatrāsman niviśatāṃ sahasrākṣo amartyo yo no dveṣṭi sa riṣyatu yam u dviṣmas tam u jahīti
2.5.75	athāñjalināpa upahanti sumitrā na āpa oṣadhayaḥ santv iti
2.5.76	tāṃ diśam etā apa utsiñcati yasyām asya diśi dveṣyo bhavati durmitrās tasmai bhūyāsur yo 'smān dveṣṭi yaṃ ca vayaṃ dviṣma iti
2.5.77	athāpa upaspṛśya yathetaṃ praviśanti
2.6.1	athedam agnyādheyam
2.6.2	tasya kaḥ karmaṇa upakramo bhavatīti
2.6.3	uktāny ṛtunakṣatrāṇy uktam ātmanaḥ puraścaraṇam
2.6.4	katham atrānupūrvyaṃ bhavati
2.6.5	snānapavanamantraprokṣaṇapuṇyāhavācanāni śraddhām āhūyākūtyā vedanaṃ kṛtvopavyāhṛtyartvijo vṛtvārhayitvā devayajanaṃ yācitvā devayajanam ādāya sphyam ādāyāntareṇa vedyutkarāv uddeśena prapadya jaghanena gārhapatyaṃ tiṣṭhan prācīnaṃ sphyena gārhapatyasyāyatanam uddhanty uddhanyamānam asyā amedhyam apa pāpmānaṃ yajamānasya hantu / śivā naḥ santu pradiśaś catasraḥ śaṃ no mātā pṛthivī tokasāteti
2.6.6	athainad adbhir avokṣati śaṃ no devīr abhiṣṭaya āpo bhavantu pītaye / śaṃ yor abhisravantu na iti
2.6.7	evam evānvāhāryapacanasyāyatanam uddhanti
2.6.8	evam evāhavanīyasya
2.6.9	evam itarayor yadi kariṣyan bhavati
2.6.10	athāntareṇa vedyutkarāv uddeśenodaṅṅ upaniṣkramya tāṃ diśaṃ yanti yatrāsya saṃbhārā upak.lptā bhavanti
2.6.11	api vottareṇa śālāyāḥ sarve saṃbhārā upak.lptā bhavanti
2.6.12	api vāntarvedi prācīnaṃ tān mantrānupūrvyam ekaikaṃ saṃbhāram ekaikena yajuṣā saṃbharati
2.6.13	vaiśvānarasya rūpaṃ pṛthivyāṃ parisrasā / syonam āviśantu na iti sikatāḥ saṃbhṛtya nidadhāti
2.6.14	evam evottaramuttaraṃ saṃbhāram uttareṇottareṇa yajuṣā saṃbhṛtyasaṃbhṛtyaiva nidadhāti
2.6.15	ūṣāś ca sikatāś cākhūtkaraṃ ca valmīkavapāṃ ca sūdaṃ ca varāhavihataṃ ca puṣkaraparṇaṃ ca śarkarāś cety aṣṭau pārthivāḥ
2.6.16	athottareṇa yajuṣā ṣaḍ ḍhiraṇyaśalkān āharati
2.6.17	atha vānaspatyābhir vānaspatyāḥ
2.6.18	śākhā ārdrāḥ sapalāśāḥ saprārohāḥ prādeśamātrīr apratiśuṣkāgrā āharati
2.6.19	api vā yathālābham
2.6.20	parṇaṃ dvābhyām
2.6.21	citriyasyāśvatthasya tisraḥ samidha ārdrāḥ sapālāśāḥ saprārohāḥ prādeśamātrīr apratiśuṣkāgrā āharati citriyād aśvatthāt saṃbhṛtā bṛhatyaḥ śarīram abhisaṃskṛtā stha / prajāpatinā yajñamukhena saṃmitās tisras trivṛdbhir mithunāḥ prajātyā iti
2.6.22	atha muñjakulāyam āharati yā te agna ojasvinī tanūr oṣadhīṣu praviṣṭā / tāṃ ta iha saṃbharāmīti
2.6.23	athāsmā araṇī āharaty āśvatthīṃ śamīgarbhīm apy aśamīgarbhīṃ vā caturaṅgulam utsedhāṃ dvādaśāṅgulaṃ vistīrṇāṃ ṣoḍaśāṅgulam āyatām api vā prādeśamātrīṃ sarvataḥ samāṃ caturaṅgulam evotsedhām
2.6.24	tasyā uttānāyā anulomam adhastāt pratīcīnapravaṇaṃ prajananaṃ kurvanti
2.6.25	tāvatīm evottarāraṇim
2.6.26	athaine āharaty aśvatthād dhavyavāhād dhi jātām agnes tanūṃ yajñiyāṃ saṃbharāmi / śāntayoniṃ śamīgarbham agnaye prajanayitave
2.6.27	yo aśvatthaḥ śamīgarbha āruroha tve sacā / taṃ te harāmi brahmaṇā yajñiyaiḥ ketubhiḥ saheti
2.6.28	athaitān susaṃbhṛtān saṃbhārān punar eva saṃbharati yaṃ tvā samabharaṃ jātavedo yathā śarīraṃ bhūteṣu nyaktam / sa saṃbhṛtaḥ sīda śivaḥ prajābhya uruṃ no lokam anuneṣi vidvān iti
2.7.1	atha vai bhavati
2.7.2	indro vṛtraṃ hatvāsurān parābhāvya so 'māvāsyāṃ pratyāgacchat
2.7.3	te pitaraḥ pūrvedyur āgacchan
2.7.4	pitṝn yajño 'gacchat
2.7.5	taṃ devāḥ punar ayācanta
2.7.6	tam ebhyo na punar adadus te 'bruvan varaṃ vṛṇāmahā atha vaḥ punar dāsyāmo 'smabhyam eva pūrvedyuḥ kriyātā iti
2.7.7	tam ebhyaḥ punar adaduḥ
2.7.8	tasmāt pitṛbhyaḥ pūrvedyuḥ kriyate
2.7.9	yat pitṛbhyaḥ pūrvedyuḥ karoti pitṛbhya eva tad yajñaṃ niṣkrīya yajamānaḥ pratanuta iti brāhmaṇam
2.7.10	atha yadi gāṃ na labhate meṣam ajaṃ vā labhate
2.7.11	api vā dyūtam odanaṃ paktvā tasyopariṣṭāt prabhūtam ājyaṃ payo vānīya tasmād etat sarvaṃ karoti yad gavā kāryam
2.7.12	vijñāyate ca dhenvai vā etad reto yad ājyaṃ payo vānaḍuhas taṇḍulā iti
2.7.13	gaur evāṅgasāmānyāt
2.7.14	saṃpracchannā ambarīṣaṃ vottapanīyaṃ vābhipravrajanti
2.7.15	api vaupāsanam evābhipravrajanti
2.7.16	ardham aupāsanaṃ kurvanti sarvaṃ vā
2.7.17	brāhmaudanikam aupāsanaṃ kurvanti
2.7.18	so 'tra vaiva hi hūyata iti
2.7.19	samānaṃ karmā saṃbhāranivapanāt
2.7.20	atha tṛtīyaṃ saṃbhārāṇāṃ tredhā vibhajya sabhyāvasathyayoḥ
2.7.21	āhavanīye vā sabhyāvasathyayoḥ saṃkalpaḥ
2.7.22	samānaṃ karmā samidādhānāt
2.7.23	pañcapañca nānāvṛkṣyāḥ samidho 'bhyajyādadhāti
2.7.24	katham atrānupūrvyaṃ bhavati
2.7.25	aśvatthaś codumbaraś ca parṇaś ca śamī ca vikaṅkataś cety etad atrānupūrvyam bhavati
2.7.26	katham u khalv aindrāgnādityayor anta iti
2.7.27	aindrāgnādityayor anta udaśvapadikaṃ sṛjet
2.7.28	tato 'nyaṃ daśahotrartham uddhared iti
2.7.29	tantrasamāsa evaitad upapadyate nānyatra praṇītasyāgner laukikatvāt
2.7.30	yasmin hotrā hutaṃ syāt so 'gniḥ
2.7.31	karmāntaṃ tasya dhāraṇam iti
2.7.32	apavṛtte karmaṇi laukikaḥ saṃpadyate
2.7.33	prasiddhāni tanūhavīṃṣi
2.7.34	prasiddhā agnyādheyadakṣiṇā dadāti
2.7.35	tāś cen nādhigacched vāsāṃsy etāvanti manthān vaudanān vaitāvato dadyāt
2.7.36	teno haivaitaṃ kāmam avāpnotīti
2.7.37	apy ekāṃ gāṃ dakṣiṇāṃ dadyād iti paiṅgalāyanibrāhmaṇaṃ bhavati
2.7.38	na tv evānāhitāgniḥ syāt
2.7.39	vijñāyate ca devānāṃ vā eṣo 'nyatamo ya āhitāgnir iti
2.7.40	atha yad asyāgnim uddharati sahasraṃ tena kāmadughā avarunddhe
2.7.41	atha yad agnihotraṃ juhoti sahasraṃ teneti
2.7.42	aparimitam evedam uktaṃ bhavati
2.8.1	athāgnyādheyasyopavasatha ity upakalpayate gāṃ māṃsalām ahataṃ vāsaś catura udakumbhāṃs trīn audumbarāñ chūlān audumbarīṃ darvīm ekāṃ vapāśrapaṇīm aviśākhām audumbarīm eva sarvān evānyān sthālīpākāt paitṛyajñikān saṃbhārān erakopabarhaṇe āñjanābhyañjane ājyaṃ tṛṇamuṣṭiṃ sphyaṃ sūtram iti
2.8.2	dakṣiṇata etat pariśritaṃ bhavati
2.8.3	tasyaitasmin pariśrite prāṅāvṛttasya keśāntaṃ karoti tūṣṇīm
2.8.4	trīṇi darbhapuñjīlāny upaniyatya vapati vape pravape devena savitrā prasūto brahmaṇā saṃśito 'haṃ yāni ma ita ūrdhvaṃ lomāni tāni me svastaye santv iti
2.8.5	athainam uptakeśaśmaśruṃ nikṛttanakham udakumbhenābhyavanayan vācayatīmā ma āpaḥ śivāḥ santu duṣkṛtaṃ pravahantu me / śuddhāḥ prayuñjīmahi kratūn iti
2.8.6	snātaḥ prāṅ utsṛpyāhataṃ vāsaḥ paridhāyālaṅkṛtyāṅkte
2.8.7	athainam ekaviṃśatyā darbhapuñjīlais tredhā vibhaktaiḥ saptabhiḥsaptabhis tūṣṇīṃ pavayitvodapātram ādāyemāṃ diśaṃ nītvā catuṣpatha etasminn evodapātre 'vekṣamāṇaṃ pāpmano vinidhīn vācayati siṃhe me manyur vyāghre me 'ntarāmaya iti
2.8.8	āntam etam anuvākaṃ nigadya ninīyāpaḥ parāsya pātram anavekṣamāṇā āyanti
2.8.9	hastapādān prakṣālyaitenaiva yathetam etya pavamānaḥ suvarjana ity etam anuvākaṃ yajamānaṃ vācayann adbhir mārjayati
2.8.10	āmātyād idhmam ādīpyānvāhāryapacanavelāyāṃ sādayitvā śodhayitvā barhiṣā paristīryājyaṃ vilāpyotpūyottarata etān upasādayati catura udakumbhāṃs trīn audumbarāñ chūlān audumbarīṃ darvīm ekāṃ vapāśrapaṇīm aviśākhām audumbarīm eva dakṣiṇataḥ sarvān evānyān sthālīpākāt paitṛyajñikān saṃbhārān erakopabarhaṇe āñjanābhyañjane ājyaṃ tṛṇamuṣṭiṃ sphyaṃ sūtram iti
2.8.11	dakṣiṇato 'dhidevanaṃ karoti
2.8.12	tad ekānnapañcāśato 'kṣān nivapati
2.8.13	atha sphyam ādāya sakṛd eva dakṣiṇoddhanty apahatā asurā rakṣāṃsi piśācā ye kṣayanti pṛthivīm anu / anyatreto gacchantu yatraiṣāṃ gataṃ mana iti
2.8.14	athainad adbhir avokṣaty ud īratām avara ut parāsa un madhyamāḥ pitaraḥ somyāsaḥ / asuṃ ya īyur avṛkā ṛtajñās te no 'vantu pitaro haveṣv iti
2.9.1	atholmukam ādatte ya ādadānāḥ svadhayā navāni pitryāṇi rūpāṇy asurāś caranti / parāpuro nipuro ye bharanty agniṣ ṭān asmāt praṇunottu yajñād iti
2.9.2	tenoddhatam abhitapaty agniḥ pāvakaḥ sudināni kṛṇvann ito 'surān nudatād dūram okasaḥ / pitṝṇāṃ ye varṇaṃ kṛtveha bhāgam icchanta iti
2.9.3	tad atraiva vyantaṃ karoti
2.9.4	tasminn ulmuka ājyastokaṃ praścotayati
2.9.5	tad dakṣiṇāgraṃ barhi stṛṇāti sakṛdācchinnaṃ barhir ūrṇāmṛdu syonaṃ pitṛbhyas tvā bharāmy aham / asmint sīdantu me pitaraḥ somyāḥ pitāmahāḥ prapitāmahāś cānugaiḥ saheti
2.9.6	atha pitṝn āvāhayaty udīrāṇā iha santu naḥ somyāḥ pitaraḥ pitāmahāḥ prapitāmahāś cānugaiḥ saha / asuṃgamāḥ satyayujo 'vṛkāsa ā no havaṃ pitaro 'dyāgamantu
2.9.7	eha gacchantu pitaro haviṣe attave / asmin yajñe barhiṣy ā niṣadya mā vīraḥ pra mā yunag iti
2.9.8	athaibhya erakopabarhaṇe nivedayata āsanaṃ śayanaṃ ceme tayoḥ somyāsa āgatāḥ / priyā janāya no bhūtvā śivā bhavata śaṃkarā iti
2.9.9	athaibhyaḥ pānāny āharati madhupānaṃ kṣīrapānaṃ saktupānaṃ yad vā bhavati
2.9.10	anyad brāhmaṇebhyo dadāti
2.9.11	anyad upaninayati etad vaḥ pitaraḥ pitāmahāḥ prapitāmahāḥ pānam iti
2.9.12	atraikenodakumbhena mārjayati tūṣṇīm
2.9.13	tad akṣān paryupaviśanti catvāraḥ pitāputrāḥ
2.9.14	pitā purastāj jyeṣṭho dakṣiṇato 'nujaḥ paścāt kaniṣṭha uttarataḥ
2.9.15	dvādaśākṣān pitā pracchinatti
2.9.16	tad vijayate
2.9.17	dvādaśa jyeṣṭhaḥ
2.9.18	tad vijayate
2.9.19	dvādaśānujaḥ
2.9.20	tad vijayate
2.9.21	atha ye 'tiśiṣyante tān kanīyāṃsam upasamūhanti
2.9.22	atha yadi dvau bhavato dvirāyāmaḥ pitā
2.9.23	atha yady eko jāyā tṛtīyā
2.9.24	atha yadi naiva bhavanty ubhau dvirāyāmau jāyāpatī
2.9.25	eṣa eva triṣu nyāyaḥ
2.9.26	eṣa eva dvayoḥ
2.9.27	kṛtaṃkṛtam ity eva vyapagacchanti
2.9.28	dyūtā gaur ity uktvottiṣṭhanti
2.9.29	athaibhyo barhir ādāya gām upākaroti pitṛbhyas tvā pitāmahebhyas tvā prapitāmahebhyas tvā juṣṭām upākaromīti
2.9.30	tūṣṇīm ity eke
2.9.31	athainām adbhiḥ prokṣati pitṛbhyas tvā pitāmahebhyas tvā prapitāmahebhyas tvā juṣṭāṃ prokṣāmīti
2.9.32	tūṣṇīm ity eke
2.9.33	tām atraiva pratīcīnaśirasīṃ dakṣiṇāpadīṃ saṃjñapayanti
2.9.34	tasyai saṃjñaptāyā adbhir abhiṣekaṃ prāṇān āpyāyayati tūṣṇīm
2.9.35	tūṣṇīṃ vapām utkhidya hṛdayam uddharati prajñātāni cāvadānāni prajñātau ca matasnū tāny eteṣv eva śūleṣūpanikṣyaitasminn evāgnau śrapayanti
2.9.36	śṛtāyāṃ vapāyāṃ pañca sruvāhutīr juhoti
2.10.1	yāḥ prācīḥ saṃbhavanty āpa uttarataś ca yāḥ / adbhir viśvasya bhuvanasya dhartrībhir antar anyaṃ pitur dadhe svadhā namaḥ svāhā
2.10.2	antar dadhe parvatair antar mahyā pṛthivyā / divā digbhir anantābhir ūtibhir antar anyaṃ pitāmahād dadhe svadhā namaḥ svāhā
2.10.3	antar dadha ṛtubhiḥ sarvair ahorātraiḥ susandhikaiḥ / ardhamāsaiś ca māsaiś cāntar anyaṃ prapitāmahād dadhe svadhā namaḥ svāhā
2.10.4	yan me mātā pralulobha caraty ananuvratā / tan me retaḥ pitā vṛṅktām ābhur anyopapadyatām svadhā namaḥ svāhā
2.10.5	yad vaḥ kravyād aṅgam adahal lokān nayan praṇayañ jātavedāḥ / tad vo 'haṃ punar āveśayāmy ariṣṭāḥ sarvair aṅgaiḥ saṃbhavata pitaraḥ svadhā namaḥ svāheti
2.10.6	tredhā vapāṃ vicchidyaudumbaryā darvyā juhoti somāya pitṛmate śuṣmiṇe juhumo haviḥ / vājinn idaṃ juṣasva naḥ svajā havyaṃ devebhyaḥ pitṛbhyaḥ svadhā namaḥ svāhā
2.10.7	aṅgirasvantam ūtaye yamaṃ pitṛmantam āhuve / vaivasvatedam addhi naḥ svajā havyaṃ devebhyaḥ pitṛbhyaḥ svadhā namaḥ svāhā
2.10.8	yad agne kavyavāhana pitṝn yakṣy ṛtāvṛdhaḥ / pra devebhyo vahā havyaṃ pitṛbhyaś ca svajā havyaṃ devebhyaḥ pitṛbhyaḥ svadhā namaḥ svāheti
2.10.9	tūṣṇīṃ darvīm abhyādhāya piṇḍānām āvṛtaitāny avadānāni dadāti hṛdayam evāgre 'tha savyaṃ matasnum atha dakṣiṇam
2.10.10	etat te tatāsau ye ca tvām anu yāṃś ca tvam atrānv asy eṣā te tata svadhākṣitir yāvatī pṛthivī tāvatī te mātrā tāvatīṃ ta etāṃ mātrāṃ bhūtāṃ dadāmi pṛthivyā mitam asi tatāya mā kṣeṣṭhā iti
2.10.11	dvitīyaṃ dadāty etat te pitāmahāsau ye ca tvām anu yāṃś ca tvam atrānv asy eṣā te pitāmaha svadhākṣitir yāvad antarikṣaṃ tāvatī te mātrā tāvatīṃ ta etāṃ mātrāṃ bhūtāṃ dadāmy antarikṣeṇa mitam asi pitāmahāya mā kṣeṣṭhā iti
2.10.12	tṛtīyaṃ dadāty etat te prapitāmahāsau ye ca tvām anu yāṃś ca tvam atrānv asy eṣā te prapitāmaha svadhākṣitir yāvatī dyaus tāvatī te mātrā tāvatīṃ ta etāṃ mātrāṃ bhūtāṃ dadāmi divā mitam asi prapitāmahāya mā kṣeṣṭhā iti
2.10.13	atra pitaro yathābhāgaṃ mandadhvam ity uktvātraikenodakumbhena mārjayati tūṣṇīm
2.10.14	athaibhyo gām upaparetya lohitam upapravartayati yāni rakṣāṃsy asṛgbhāgāni ye cāpi pitaro harantāṃ viharantāṃ tṛpyantu rudhirasya te ye naḥ patitā garbhā asṛgbhāja upāsate / tebhyaḥ svajā svadhā namas tṛpṇuvantu madantu ca ya āmā ye ca pakvās ye ca duṣṭāḥ patanti naḥ / tebhyaḥ svajā svadhā namas tṛpṇuvantu madantu ca ye kumārā yā striyo ye 'vijñātāḥ patanti naḥ / tebhyaḥ svajā svadhā namas tṛpṇuvantu madantu ceti
2.10.15	āgatyāñjanaṃ dadāti
2.10.16	athābhyañjanaṃ dadāti
2.10.17	atha vāsāṃsi dadāti
2.10.18	atha ṣaḍbhir namaskārair viparyāsam upatiṣṭhate
2.10.19	atha vīraṃ yācate
2.10.20	athainān utthāpya pravāhya tiṣṛbhir mana āhvayate mano nv āhuvāmaha ā na etu manaḥ punaḥ punar naḥ pitaro mana iti
2.10.21	atraitad ahataṃ vāsa evaṃvide brāhmaṇāya dattvānyad asanīyaṃ vāsaḥ paridhāya dakṣiṇopaparetyādbhir mārjayate
2.11.1	yāsu gandhā rasā varṇā balaṃ ca nihite ubhe / tā ma āpaḥ śivāḥ santu duṣkṛtaṃ pravahantu me
2.11.2	yā ūrjam abhiṣiñcanti devapreṣitā mahīm / tā ma āpaḥ śivāḥ santu duṣkṛtaṃ pravahantu me yāsāṃ niṣkramaṇe sarvam idaṃ jāyate jagat / tā ma āpaḥ śivāḥ santu duṣkṛtaṃ pravahantu me yāsām ime trayo lokās tejasā yaśasāvṛtāḥ / tā ma āpaḥ śivāḥ santu duṣkṛtaṃ pravahantu me yāḥ prācīr yā dakṣiṇā yāḥ pratīcīr yā udīcīr yā ūrdhvā revatīr madhumatīr āpaḥ sravanti śukrāḥ / tā ma āpaḥ śivāḥ santu duṣkṛtaṃ pravahantu ma iti
2.11.3	atraitad asanīyaṃ vāso vimucyānyat paridhāya prājāpatyayarcāgner udeti prajāpate na tvad etāny anya iti
2.11.4	atholmukam apisṛjaty abhūd dūto haviṣo jātavedā avāḍ ḍhavyāni surabhīṇi kṛtvā / prādāḥ pitṛbhyaḥ svadhayā te akṣan prajānann agne punar apyehi devān iti
2.11.5	atraitāny avadānāni brāhmaṇebhyo dadāti hṛdayam evāgre 'tha savyaṃ matasnum atha dakṣiṇaṃ yathāśraddham annaṃ kurute
2.11.6	gām etām aṃśaśaḥ kṛtvā brāhmaṇebhyo varaṃ dadāti
2.11.7	sa ye ha ke caitasyai māṃsaṃ labhante sarve ha vā asyai te gobhājaśo bhavanti
2.11.8	āmātye jayān abhyātānān rāṣṭrabhṛta iti hutvāmātyahomāñ juhoti
2.11.9	eṣa ha vā upavasathaḥ
2.11.10	upa hy asmin devā vasanti prātar jeṣyāmo vāmaṃ vasv iti
2.11.11	etad dha vai devānāṃ vāmaṃ vasu yad āgneyo 'ṣṭākapālaḥ
2.11.12	upa hainaṃ vāmaṃ vasu gacchati yasya ha vā etām evaṃ vidvān gāṃ kalpayate
2.11.13	sarvaṃ pāpmānaṃ tarati
2.11.14	tarati brahmahatyām
2.11.15	apa punarmṛtyuṃ jayatīti hovāca prajāpatiḥ
2.11.16	tāni ha vā etāni kūśmāṇḍānīty ācakṣate kājavānīti vāmātyahomā iti vātīmokṣā iti vā
2.11.17	sa yat kiṃ cāsmin loke pāpaṃ karma karoti sarvasmāt tasmān nirmucyānṛṇaḥ svargaṃ lokam etīti hovāca prajāpatiḥ
2.12.1	agnīn ādhāsyamāno bhavati sa upakalpayata ūṣāś ca sikatāś cākhūtkaraṃ ca valmīkavapāṃ ca sūdaṃ ca varāhavihataṃ ca puṣkaraparṇaṃ ca śarkarāś cety aṣṭau pārthivāḥ
2.12.2	atha vānaspatyā aśvatthaś codumbaraś ca parṇaś ca śamī ca vikaṅkataś cāśanihataś ca śamīgarbhāv araṇī muñjakulāyaṃ citriyasyāśvatthasya tisraḥ samidha ārdrāḥ sapalāśāḥ saprārohāḥ prādeśamātrīr apratiśuṣkāgrāḥ ṣaḍ ḍhiraṇyaśalkāṃs trīn sauvarṇāṃs trīn rājatān aśvaṃ pūrvavāhaṃ rathacakraṃ brāhmaudanikān vrīhīn sarvauṣadhaṃ rohitaṃ carmānaḍuhaṃ navāni yajñapātrāṇīti
2.12.3	athāsmā araṇī āharati yo aśvatthaḥ śamīgarbha āruroha tve sacā / taṃ te harāmi brahmaṇā yajñiyaiḥ ketubhiḥ saheti
2.12.4	athāto nakṣatrāṇām eva mīmāṃsā
2.12.5	kṛttikāsv agnim ādadhīta
2.12.6	rohiṇyām agnim ādadhīta
2.12.7	punarvasvor agnim ādadhīta
2.12.8	pūrvayoḥ phalguṇyoḥ
2.12.9	uttarayoḥ phalguṇyoḥ
2.12.10	citrāyām iti
2.12.11	athāta ṛtūnām eva mīmāṃsā
2.12.12	vasante brāhmaṇo 'gnim ādadhīta
2.12.13	grīṣme rājanyaḥ
2.12.14	śaradi vaiśyaḥ
2.12.15	varṣāsu rathakāra iti
2.12.16	atho khalu yadaivainaṃ śraddhopanamed athādadhīta
2.12.17	saivāsyarddhir iti
2.12.18	tad etad ārtasyātivelaṃ vā śraddhāyuktasya
2.12.19	atha vai brāhmaṇaṃ bhavati
2.12.20	yo rohiṇyām agnim ādhatta ṛdhnoty eva sarvān rohān rohatīti
2.12.21	sā yā vaiśākhyāḥ paurṇamāsyā upariṣṭād amāvāsyā bhavati sā sakṛt saṃvatsarasya rohiṇyā saṃpadyate tasyām ādadhīteti
2.12.22	athāsyaitat purastād eva juṣṭe devayajane 'gāraṃ vā vimitaṃ vā kāritaṃ bhavati
2.12.23	tasya dve dvārau kurvanti prācīṃ ca dakṣiṇāṃ ca
2.12.24	madhye gārhapatyasyāyatanaṃ kurvanti
2.12.25	purastād dvādaśasu vikrāmeṣv āhavanīyasya
2.12.26	api vā cakṣur nimite
2.12.27	dakṣiṇato viṣuvaty anvāhāryapacanasya
2.12.28	api vā yathā dvau bhāgau prāk syātām ekaḥ paścād ity evam
2.12.29	tredhoddhatyāvokṣya keśaśmaśru vapate
2.12.30	nakhāni nikṛntate
2.12.31	evaṃ patnī keśavarjam
2.12.32	ubhau mānuṣeṇālaṅkāreṇālaṅkṛtau bhavato 'hatavāsasau
2.12.33	athābhyāṃ vratopāyanīyaṃ pācayati
2.12.34	tasyāśitau bhavataḥ sarpirmiśrasya payomiśrasya
2.13.1	athādhivṛkṣasūrye yācati sarvauṣadham ājyasthālīṃ sasruvāṃ srucaṃ barhir vāso dīpyāñ chakalān iti
2.13.2	etat samādāya saṃpracchannā ambarīṣaṃ vottapanīyaṃ vābhipravrajanti
2.13.3	tasmin dīpyāñ chakalān saṃprakīrya barhiṣā paristīryājyaṃ vilāpyotpūyāñjalinopastīrṇābhighāritaṃ sarvauṣadhaṃ juhoty agnaye sarvauṣadhāya puṣṭyai prajananāya svāheti
2.13.4	atha jayān abhyātānān rāṣṭrabhṛta iti hutvāmātyahomāñ juhoti
2.13.5	atha sruci caturgṛhītaṃ gṛhītvā prājāpatyāṃ juhoti prajāpate na tvad etāny anya iti
2.13.6	aparaṃ caturgṛhītaṃ gṛhītvānukhyāṃ juhoty anv agnir uṣasām agram akhyad anv ahāni prathamo jātavedāḥ / anu sūryasya purutrā ca raśmīn anu dyāvāpṛthivī ātatāna svāheti
2.13.7	athaitān aṅgārān sate vā śarāve vā yajamāno gṛhṇāti āyuṣe vo gṛhṇāmi tejase vo gṛhṇāmi tapase vo gṛhṇāmi vīryāya vo gṛhṇāmi brahmavarcasāya vo gṛhṇāmīti
2.13.8	athainān ādāyopottiṣṭhaty āyur mām āviśatu bhūtir mām āviśatu brahmavarcasaṃ mām āviśatv iti
2.13.9	tān adhvaryave saṃpradāyodāyanty anvārabdhe yajamāne
2.13.10	etenaiva yathetam etyottareṇāgāraṃ parītya pūrvayā dvārā prapādya gārhapatyasyāyatane nyupyopasamādadhāti
2.13.11	paristṛṇanti
2.13.12	dakṣiṇata upaviśato brahmā ca yajamānaś ca
2.13.13	athaitad rohitaṃ carmānaḍuhaṃ jaghanenāgniṃ prācīnagrīvam uttaralomopastṛṇāti
2.13.14	tasya vahasaḥ kāle caturaḥ pātrān vrīhīn nirvapati brahmaṇe juṣṭaṃ nirvapāmīti vā tūṣṇīṃ vā
2.13.15	atha niruptān abhimṛśaty ākūtyai tvā kāmāya tvā samṛdhe tveti
2.13.16	athaitān vrīhīñ chūrpe samupyādbhir abhyukṣya carmodūhati
2.13.17	athaitasminn eva carmaṇy ulūkhalamusale nidhāyāvahanti
2.13.18	athaitenaiva pātreṇa catura udapātrān ānayati yadi vīḍitā sthālī bhavati
2.13.19	yady u vā avīḍitā pañca vā bhūyaso vā
2.13.20	sa samodakaḥ saṃpadyate
2.14.1	taṃ ya eva kaś ca kuśalaḥ parīndhena śrapayitvābhighāryodañcam udvāsayati
2.14.2	athainam āyatigava ṛtvigbhyaḥ prāhuḥ
2.14.3	upasaṃgacchanta enam eta ṛtvijaḥ
2.14.4	athaitāṃ pātrīṃ nirṇijyopastīrya tasyām enam asaṃghnann ivoddharati
2.14.5	sarpirāsecanaṃ kṛtvā prabhūtam ājyam ānīya
2.14.6	athaitasyaivaudanasyopaghātaṃ juhoty upatiṣṭhate vā pra vedhase kavaye medhyāya vaco vandāru vṛṣabhāya vṛṣṇe / yato bhayam abhayaṃ tan no astv ava devān yaje heḍyān svāheti
2.14.7	athaitāṃś catura ārṣeyān uttarato 'nudiśam upaveśya tān anupūrvam ācamayya tebhya enaṃ bhūmiṃ spṛśann anucchindann ivopohati
2.14.8	triḥ prāśya praśaṃsanti rāddhas te brahmaudana iti
2.14.9	tebhyaḥ sāṇḍaṃ vatsataraṃ dadāti
2.14.10	athaiṣa uttarata āsīno brāhmaṇaḥ kṣāmakāṣaṃ prāśnāti
2.14.11	tasmai yad asyopakalpate tad dadāti
2.14.12	atha yad ājyam ucchiṣyate tena samidho 'bhyajyādadhāti samidhāgniṃ duvasyata ghṛtair bodhayatātithim / āsmin havyā juhotana svāhā upa tvāgne haviṣmatīr ghṛtācīr yantu haryata / juṣasva samidho mama svāhā taṃ tvā samidbhir aṅgiro ghṛtena vardhayāmasi / bṛhacchocā yaviṣṭhya svāheti gāyatrībhir brāhmaṇasya
2.14.13	triṣṭugbhī rājanyasya jigharmy agnim ā tvā jigharmy āyurdā agne haviṣo juṣāṇa iti
2.14.14	jagatībhir vaiśyasya janasya gopā ajaniṣṭa jāgṛvis tvām agne mānuṣīr īḍate viśaḥ sapta te agne samidhaḥ sapta jihvā iti
2.14.15	samitsu vatsatarīṃ dadāti
2.15.1	athāsmā araṇī prayacchann āha vācaṃyamo bhaviṣyasi saṃśādhi yat te saṃśiṣyam iti
2.15.2	sa āha brāhmaṇān āśayatāśvaṃ gopāyata saṃbhārān nidhatteti
2.15.3	tasya subhikṣam agnyādheyaṃ bhavati
2.15.4	sāgnyādheyasya samṛddhiḥ
2.15.5	tad āhur nāgnyādheye gāṃ kurvīta ghorarūpam iti
2.15.6	kurvītaivāpi tv eva na kurvīta
2.15.7	api bahvīr api kurvīta
2.15.8	anu caitasya bhavet puṇyā praśaṃseti kātyaḥ
2.15.9	athāsmā araṇī prayacchati
2.15.10	te pratigṛhṇāti mahī viśpatnī sadane ṛtasyārvācī etaṃ dharuṇe rayīṇām / antarvatnī janyaṃ jātavedasam adhvarāṇāṃ janayathaḥ purogām ārohataṃ daśataṃ śakvarīr mamartenāgna āyuṣā varcasā saha / jyog jīvanta uttarāmuttarāṃ samāṃ darśam ahaṃ pūrṇamāsaṃ yajñaṃ yathā yajā iti
2.15.11	athaine upanigṛhṇāty ṛtviyavatī stho agniretasau garbhaṃ dadhāthāṃ te vām ahaṃ dade / tat satyaṃ yad vīraṃ bibhṛtho vīraṃ janayiṣyathaḥ / te mat prātaḥ prajaniṣyethe te mā prajāte prajanayiṣyathaḥ / prajayā paśubhir brahmavarcasena suvarge loka iti
2.15.12	athainam anṛtāt satyam upanayati mānuṣād daivyam upanayatīdam aham anṛtāt satyam upaimi mānuṣād daivyam upaimi daivīṃ vācaṃ yacchāmīti
2.15.13	taṃ vācaṃyamaṃ rātriṃ jāgarayanta āsate
2.15.14	śalkais tāṃ rātrim agnim indhate śalkair agnim indhāna ubhau lokau sanem aham / ubhayor lokayor ṛddhvāti mṛtyuṃ tarāmy aham iti
2.15.15	uttareṇa gārhapatyasyāyatanaṃ kalmāṣam ajaṃ badhnāti tenainam ādhāsyamānaṃ saṃkhyāpayati prajā agne saṃvāsayāśāś ca paśubhiḥ saha / rāṣṭrāṇy asmā ādhehi yāny āsant savituḥ sava iti
2.16.1	athādhvaryur apararātra ādrutyāraṇī niṣṭapati jātavedo bhuvanasya reta iha siñca tapaso yaj janiṣyate / agnim aśvatthād adhi havyavāhaṃ śamīgarbhāj janayan yo mayobhūḥ
2.16.2	ayaṃ te yonir ṛtviyo yato jāto arocathāḥ / taṃ jānann agna ārohāthā no vardhayā rayim iti
2.16.3	athaitam agniṃ sate samupya dakṣiṇato jvalayanta āsate
2.16.4	athaitāny agnyāyatanāni śakṛtpiṇḍena parilepayati
2.16.5	atha tṛtīyaṃ saṃbhārāṇām ādāya gārhapatyasyāyatane nivapati yat pṛthivyā anāmṛtaṃ saṃbabhūva tve sacā / tad agnir agnaye 'dadāt tasminn ādhīyatām ayam iti
2.16.6	sa yatroṣān upādhigacchati taj japati yad adaś candramasi kṛṣṇaṃ tad apīheti
2.16.7	athainān ādadhāti divas tvā vīryeṇa pṛthivyai mahimnā / antarikṣasya poṣeṇa sarvapaśum ādadha iti
2.16.8	athainān saṃprayauti saṃ vaḥ sṛjāmi hṛdayāni saṃsṛṣṭaṃ mano astu vaḥ / saṃsṛṣṭaḥ prāṇo astu vaḥ
2.16.9	saṃ yā vaḥ priyās tanuvaḥ saṃ priyā hṛdayāni vaḥ / ātmā vo astu saṃpriyaḥ saṃpriyās tanuvo mameti
2.16.10	athainān kalpayati kalpetāṃ dyāvāpṛthivī kalpantām āpa oṣadhīḥ / kalpantām agnayaḥ pṛthaṅ mama jyaiṣṭhyāya savratāḥ
2.16.11	ye 'gnayaḥ samanaso 'ntarā dyāvāpṛthivī / vāsantikāv ṛtū abhikalpamānā indram iva devā abhisaṃviśantv iti
2.16.12	athātiśiṣṭānāṃ saṃbhārāṇām ardhān ādāya dakṣiṇayā dvāropanirhṛtyānvāhāryapacanasyāyatane nivapati yad antarikṣasyānāmṛtaṃ saṃbabhūva tve sacā / tad vāyur agnaye 'dadāt tasminn ādhīyatām ayam iti
2.16.13	sa yatroṣān upādhigacchati taj japati yad adaś candramasi kṛṣṇaṃ tad apīheti
2.16.14	tathādadhāti
2.16.15	tathā saṃprayauti
2.16.16	tathā kalpayati
2.16.17	athaitenaiva yathetam etyātiśiṣṭān saṃbhārān ādāya pūrvayā dvāropanirhṛtyāhavanīyasyāyatane nivapati yad divo 'nāmṛtaṃ saṃbabhūva tve sacā tad ādityo 'gnaye 'dadāt tasminn ādhīyatām ayam iti
2.16.18	sa yatroṣān upādhigacchati taj japati yad adaś candramasi kṛṣṇaṃ tad apīheti
2.16.19	tathādadhāti
2.16.20	tathā saṃprayauti
2.16.21	tathā kalpayati
2.16.22	atha goptāraṃ samādiśati
2.16.23	sa āha vihṛtā agnayo mā kaś canāntareṇa saṃcārīd iti
2.16.24	athādhvaryuḥ pradakṣiṇam āvṛtya pratyaṅṅ ādrutya gārhapatyasyāyatana upari saṃbhāreṣu muñjakulāyaṃ nidadhāti
2.16.25	tasmin pratīcīnaprajananām araṇiṃ nidhāya daśahotrottarāraṇim avadadhāti
2.16.26	sa āha manthateti
2.16.27	yajamānaḥ prathamo manthati
2.16.28	yajamāna uttamo manthati
2.16.29	janayati
2.16.30	jāte varaṃ dadāmīti vācaṃ visṛjate
2.16.31	athainam upatiṣṭhate 'jījanann amṛtaṃ martyāso 'sremāṇaṃ taraṇiṃ vīḍujambham / daśa svasāro agruvaḥ samīcīḥ pumāṃsaṃ jātam abhisaṃrabhantām iti
2.16.32	athainam abhiprāṇiti prajāpates tvā prāṇenābhiprāṇimi pūṣṇaḥ poṣeṇa mahyam / dīrghāyutvāya śataśāradāya śataṃ śaradbhya āyuṣe varcase jīvātvai puṇyāya
2.16.33	prāṇe tvāmṛtam ādadhāmy annādam annādyāya goptāraṃ guptyā iti
2.16.34	athodgātāram āha rathantaraṃ brūhīti
2.16.35	athainam ādadhāti
2.16.36	bhūr bhuvar gharmaḥ śiras tad ayam agniḥ saṃpriyaḥ paśubhir bhuvat / chardistokāya tanayāya yaccha
2.16.37	bhṛgūṇāṃ tvāṅgirasāṃ vratapate vratenādadhāmīti bhṛgvaṅgirasām ādadhyāt
2.16.38	ādityānāṃ tvā devānāṃ vratapate vratenādadhāmīty anyāsāṃ brāhmaṇīnāṃ prajānāṃ varuṇasya tvā rājño vratapate vratenādadhāmīti rājñaḥ
2.16.39	indrasya tvendriyeṇa vratapate vratenādadhāmīti rājanyasya
2.16.40	manos tvā grāmaṇyo vratapate vratenādadhāmīti vaiśyasya
2.16.41	ṛbhūṇāṃ tvā devānāṃ vratapate vratenādadhāmīti rathakārasyeti
2.16.42	yatharṣi yathāgotram
2.16.43	gāyatreṇa chandaseti
2.16.44	uttarato hiraṇyaśalkam upāsyati svayā tanuvā saṃbhaveti
2.16.45	athaitaṃ rājataṃ vṛṣalāya vājñātāya vātiprayacchati
2.16.46	ārtim evātiprayacchatīti brāhmaṇam
2.16.47	athainam upatiṣṭhate ahaṃ tvad asmi mad asi tvam etan mamāsi yonis tava yonir asmi / mamaiva san vaha havyāny agne putraḥ pitre lokakṛj jātavedaḥ

2.17.1	athaitam agnim ādadate ya eṣa sate samupto bhavati
2.17.2	taṃ dakṣiṇayā dvāropanirhṛtyānvāhāryapacanam ādadhāti bhūr bhuvar vātaḥ prāṇas tad ayam agniḥ saṃpriyaḥ paśubhir bhuvat / svaditaṃ tokāya tanayāya pituṃ paca

2.17.11	athainam upatiṣṭhata imā u mām upatiṣṭhantu rāya ābhiḥ prajābhir iha saṃvaseya / iho iḍā tiṣṭhatu viśvarūpī madhye vasor dīdihi jātaveda iti

2.17.18	athainam udyacchata ojase balāya tvodyacche vṛṣaṇe śuṣmāyāyuṣe varcase / sapatnatūr asi vṛtratūḥ
2.17.19	yas te deveṣu mahimā suvargo yas ta ātmā paśuṣu praviṣṭaḥ / puṣṭir yā te manuṣyeṣu paprathe tayā no agne juṣamāṇa ehi
2.17.20	divaḥ pṛthivyāḥ pary antarikṣād vātāt paśubhyo adhy oṣadhībhyaḥ / yatrayatra jātavedaḥ saṃbabhūtha tato no agne juṣamāṇa ehīti
2.17.21	iyaty agre harati
2.17.22	atheyati
2.17.23	atheyati
2.17.24	adho'dhaḥ śiro haratīti brāhmaṇam
2.17.25	ādadāna evaitā mātrā abhisaṃpādayed ity etad aparam
2.17.26	aśvaṃ pūrvaṃ nayanti
2.17.27	tam anumantrayate prācīm anu pradiśaṃ prehi vidvān agner agne puro agnir bhaveha / viśvā āśā dīdyāno vibhāhy ūrjaṃ no dhehi dvipade catuṣpada iti
2.17.28	viṣuvaty uparamanti vikramasva mahāṃ asi vediṣan mānuṣebhyas triṣu lokeṣu jāgṛhīti
2.17.29	athopātiyanty anv agnir uṣasām agram akhyad anv ahāni prathamo jātavedāḥ / anu sūryasya purutrā ca raśmīn anu dyāvāpṛthivī ātatāneti
2.17.30	athaitenāśvena prācottarataḥ pārśvataḥ saṃbhārāṇām ākramayati yathāhitasyāgner aṅgārā abhyavavarterann iti

2.17.35	prāṇaṃ tvām ṛta ādadhāmy annādam annādyāya goptāraṃ guptyā iti

2.17.37	sarvāṇi saṃpreṣyati

2.18.1	sarvauṣadhena vyāhṛtībhir agnīñ chamayitvā pañcapañca nānāvṛkṣyāḥ samidho 'bhyajyābhidadhāti samidhyamānaḥ prathamo nu dharma ity etābhiḥ pañcabhir āyurdā agne haviṣo juṣāṇa ity etām apoddhṛtya
2.18.2	atha pradakṣiṇam āvṛtya pratyaṅṅ ādrutya jaghanena gārhapatyaṃ tiṣṭhaṃs tanūbhir upatiṣṭhate ye te agne śive tanuvau virāṭ ca svarāṭ ca te mā viśatāṃ te mā jinvatām / ye te agne śive tanuvau samrāṭ cābhibhūś ca te mā viśatāṃ te mā jinvatām / ye te agne śive tanuvau vibhūś ca paribhūś ca te mā viśatāṃ te mā jinvatām / ye te agne śive tanuvau prabhvī ca prabhūtiś ca te mā viśatāṃ te mā jinvatām / yās te agne śivās tanuvas tābhis tvādadha iti
2.18.3	sarvābhir gārhapatyam
2.18.4	sarvābhir anvāhāryapacanam
2.18.5	sarvābhir āhavanīyam
2.18.6	atha ghorās tanūr anudiśati yās te agne ghorās tanuvas tābhir amuṃ gaccheti
2.18.7	atra yaṃ yajamāno dveṣṭi taṃ manasā dhyāyati
2.18.8	athāpa upaspṛśya virājakramair upatiṣṭhate
2.18.9	narya prajāṃ me gopāya / amṛtatvāya jīvase / jātāṃ janiṣyamāṇāṃ ca / amṛte satye pratiṣṭhitām iti gārhapatyam
2.18.10	atharva pituṃ me gopāya / rasam annam ihāyuṣe / adabdhāyo 'śītatano / aviṣaṃ naḥ pituṃ kṛṇv ity anvāhāryapacanam
2.18.11	śaṃsya paśūn me gopāya / dvipādo ye catuṣpadaḥ / aṣṭāśaphāś ca ya ihāgne / ye caikaśaphā āśugā ity āhavanīyam
2.18.12	sapratha sabhāṃ me gopāya / ye ca sabhyāḥ sabhāsadaḥ / tān indriyāvataḥ kuru / sarvam āyur upāsatām iti sabhyam
2.18.13	ahe budhniya mantraṃ me gopāya / yam ṛṣayas trayividā viduḥ / ṛcaḥ sāmāni yajūṃṣi / sā hi śrīr amṛtā satām ity āvasathīyam
2.18.14	atha gārhapatya ājyaṃ vilāpyotpūya sruci caturgṛhītaṃ gṛhītvā samidvatyāhavanīye pūrṇāhutiṃ juhoti sapta te agne samidhaḥ sapta jihvā iti
2.18.15	pūrṇāhutau varaṃ dadāti
2.18.16	athaitāny agnihotrapātrāṇi prakṣālitāny uttareṇa gārhapatyam upasādayati kūrce vā sūnāyāṃ vā sthālīṃ sasruvāṃ srucam abhidyotanaṃ samidham iti
2.18.17	athaitām agnihotrīṃ dakṣiṇata udīcīṃ sthāpayitvā brāhmaṇo dogdhi
2.18.18	pūrvau duhyāt
2.18.19	aparau duhyāt
2.18.20	na saṃmṛśet

2.18.22	adhiśrityottaram ānayati

2.18.24	jaghanenāhavanīyam upasādayati kūrce

2.21.1	athāto 'nvārambhasyaiva mīmāṃsā
