3.1.1	agnīn punarādhāsyamāno bhavati
3.1.2	tad āhur kṛtayajuḥ saṃbhṛtasaṃbhāro bhavati na saṃbhṛtyāḥ saṃbhārā na yajuḥ kartavyam iti
3.1.3	atho khalu saṃbhṛtyā eva saṃbhārāḥ kartavyaṃ yajuḥ punarādheyasya samṛddhyā iti
3.1.4	sa upakalpayate punarniṣkṛtaṃ rathaṃ punarutsyūtaṃ vāsaḥ punarutsṛṣṭam anaḍvāhaṃ darbhakulāyaṃ tisro darbhamayīr visūrmikāḥ
3.1.5	prajñātā āgnyādheyikāḥ saṃbhārāḥ
3.1.6	sā yāṣāḍhyāḥ paurṇamāsyāḥ purastād amāvāsyā bhavati sā sakṛt saṃvatsarasya punarvasubhyāṃ saṃpadyate tasyām ādadhīteti
3.1.7	tasyā upavasathe 'raṇyor agnīn samārohyodavasāya mathitvāgnīn vihṛtyāgneyam aṣṭākapālaṃ nirvapati vaiśvānaraṃ dvādaśakapālam agnim udvāsayiṣyann iti
3.1.8	sā prasiddheṣṭiḥ saṃtiṣṭhate
3.1.9	atha tadānīm evādbhir agnīn samukṣya brahmaudanaṃ śrapayitvopavasati
3.1.10	atha prātar āgnyādheyikaṃ karma tāyate
3.1.11	etāvad eva nānā
3.1.12	yad amutra muñjakulāyaṃ tad iha darbhakulāyam
3.1.13	yo 'mutredhmaḥ praṇayanīyaḥ sa iha darbhamayīr visūrmikāḥ
3.1.14	darbhair gārhapatyam ādadhāti darbhair anvāhāryapacanaṃ darbhair āhavanīyam
3.1.15	darbhair gārhapatyam ādadhāti
3.1.16	ādhāne sarparājñīr ṛco 'nuvartayati
3.2.1	bhūmir bhūmnā dyaur variṇeti catasro gārhapatye tisra āhavanīye
3.2.2	samānaṃ karmā rathacakrāt
3.2.3	etāvad eva nānā
3.2.4	yad amutra tūṣṇīm agnihotraṃ tad iha sapta te agne samidhaḥ sapta jihvā iti juhoti
3.2.5	yo 'mutrāgneyo 'ṣṭākapālaḥ sa ihāgneyaḥ pañcakapālaḥ
3.2.6	tasya prayājeṣu catasro vibhaktīr dadhāty agna āyāhi vītaye samidho agna ājyasya viyantv agniṃ dūtaṃ vṛṇīmahe tanūnapād agna ājyasya vetv agnināgniḥ samidhyata iḍo agna ājyasya viyantv agnir vṛtrāṇi jaṅghanad barhir agna ājyasya vetv iti
3.2.7	svayaṃ saṃpanna uttamaḥ prayājaḥ
3.2.8	athāta ājyabhāgayor eva mīmāṃsā
3.2.9	vārtraghnāv ājyabhāgau syātām ity eke
3.2.10	vṛdhanvantāv ājyabhāgau syātām ity eke
3.2.11	agniṃ stomena bodhaya tvaṃ naḥ somety etau syātām ity eke
3.2.12	agna āyūṃṣi pavase 'gne pavasvety etau syātām ity eke
3.2.13	yat pavamānaṃ tat somarūpam
3.2.14	paṅktyau haviṣo 'gne tam adyādhā hy agna iti
3.2.15	atha punar ūrjā saha rayyety abhitaḥ puroḍāśam āhutī juhoti
3.2.16	agniṃ prati sviṣṭakṛtaṃ nirāhābhiṣ ṭe adya ebhir no arkair iti saṃyājye
3.2.17	anvāhāryam āsādya
3.3.1	punarādheyadakṣiṇā dadāti punarniṣkṛtaṃ rathaṃ punarutsyūtaṃ vāsaḥ punarutsṛṣṭam anaḍvāham
3.3.2	tasyānūyājeṣu vibhaktī dadhāty agnā yo martyo duvo dhiyaṃ jujoṣa dhītibhiḥ / bhasan nu ṣa pra pūrvya iṣaṃ vurītāvase / devaṃ barhir vasuvane vasudheyasya vetv agne stomaṃ manāmahe sidhram adya divispṛśaḥ / devasya draviṇasyavo devo narāśaṃso vasuvane vasudheyasya vetv iti
3.3.3	svayaṃ saṃpanna uttamo 'nūyājaḥ
3.3.4	saṃtiṣṭhata eṣeṣṭiḥ sapūrṇapātraviṣṇukramā
3.3.5	visṛjate vratam
3.3.6	atha tadānīm eva pṛṣṭhyāṃ stīrtvāpaḥ praṇīyāgnivāruṇam ekādaśakapālam anunirvapati
3.3.7	śrapayitvāsādayati
3.3.8	tasyāḥ pañcadaśa sāmidhenyaḥ pañca prayājā vārtraghnāv ājyabhāgau
3.3.9	atha haviṣas tvaṃ no agne sa tvaṃ no agna iti
3.3.10	triṣṭubhau saṃyājye
3.3.11	anvāhāryam āsādyānaḍvāhaṃ dadāti
3.3.12	saṃtiṣṭhata eṣeṣṭiḥ sapūrṇapātraviṣṇukramā
3.3.13	visṛjate vratam
3.3.14	saṃtiṣṭhate punarādheyam iti
3.3.15	vṛddhipunarādheyam
3.3.16	atha vai bhavati
3.3.17	yaḥ parācīnaṃ punarādheyād agnim ādadhīta sa etān homāñ juhuyād iti
3.3.18	tṛtīyam ādhāna āgneyasya pañcakapālasya purastāt sviṣṭakṛtaḥ sruvāhutīr upajuhoti lekaḥ salekaḥ sulekas te na ādityā ājyaṃ juṣāṇā viyantu svāhā / ketaḥ saketaḥ suketas te na ādityā ājyaṃ juṣāṇā viyantu svāhā / vivasvāṃ aditir devajūtis te na ādityā ājyaṃ juṣāṇā viyantu svāheti
3.3.19	saṃtiṣṭhate tṛtīyam ādhānam
3.3.20	athāpahṛtāgner naṣṭāraṇīkasya ca brahmaudanenaiva pratipadyate
3.3.21	siddham agnyādheyam
3.4.1	purādityasyāstamayād gārhapatyam upasamādhāyānvāhāryapacanam āhṛtya jvalantam āhavanīyam uddharati sāyamāhutaye
3.4.2	purādityasyodayād gārhapatyam upasamādhāyānvāhāryapacanam āhṛtya jvalantam āhavanīyam uddharati prātarāhutaye
3.4.3	vācā tvā hotrā prāṇenodgātrā cakṣuṣādhvaryuṇā manasā brahmaṇā śrotreṇāgnīdhaitais tvā pañcabhir daivyair ṛtvigbhir uddharāmi bhūr bhuvaḥ suvar uddhriyamāṇa uddhara pāpmano mā yad avidvān yac ca vidvāṃś cakāra / ahnā yad enaḥ kṛtam asti pāpaṃ sarvasmān moddhṛto muñca tasmād iti sāyam
3.4.4	rātriyā yad enaḥ kṛtam asti pāpaṃ sarvasmān moddhṛto muñca tasmād iti prātar
3.4.5	agniṃ nidadhāty amṛtāhutim amṛtāyāṃ juhomy agniṃ pṛthivyām amṛtasya jityai / tayānantaṃ kāmam ito jayema prajāpatir yaṃ prathamo jigāyāgnim agnau vaiśvānare 'mṛtaṃ juhomi svāheti sāyam
3.4.6	sūryam agnau vaiśvānare 'mṛtaṃ juhomi svāheti prātaḥ
3.4.7	sāyaṃprātar evaiṣā patny anvāste
3.4.8	sāyaṃsāyam ity eke
3.4.9	athaitāny agnihotrapātrāṇi prakṣālitāny uttareṇa gārhapatyam upasādayati kūrce vā sūnāyāṃ vā sthālīṃ sasruvāṃ srucam abhidyotanaṃ samidham iti
3.4.10	athaitām agnihotrīṃ dakṣiṇata udīcīṃ sthāpayitvā brāhmaṇo dogdhi
3.4.11	pūrvau duhyāj jyeṣṭhasya jyaiṣṭhineyasya yo vā gataśrīḥ syāt
3.4.12	aparau duhyāt kaniṣṭhasya kāniṣṭhineyasya yo vā bubhūṣet
3.4.13	na saṃmṛśet
3.4.14	dvayor duhyāt paśukāmasyeti
3.4.15	adhiśrityottaram ānayati
3.4.16	athaitad agnihotram agreṇāhavanīyaṃ paryāhṛtya pūrvayā dvārā prapādya jaghanena gārhapatyam upasādyātha pariṣiñcati
3.5.1	ṛtaṃ tvā satyena pariṣiñcāmīti sāyaṃ pariṣiñcati
3.5.2	satyaṃ tvartena pariṣiñcāmīti prātar
3.5.3	evam eva hutvā pariṣiñcati
3.5.4	atha pradakṣiṇam āvṛtya pratyaṅṅ ādrutya jaghanena gārhapatyam upaviśyodīco 'ṅgārān nirūhya vyantān kṛtvā teṣv adhiśrityābhidyotanenābhidyotayaty agnis te tejo mā pratidhākṣīd iti
3.5.5	sruveṇāpaḥ pratyānayaty amṛtam asīti
3.5.6	punar evābhidyotya triḥ paryagni karoty antaritaṃ rakṣo 'ntaritā arātaya iti
3.5.7	vartma kurvann udag udvāsya pratyūhyāṅgārān ādatte dakṣiṇena sruvaṃ samidhaṃ ca savyenāgnihotrahavaṇīṃ devasya tvā savituḥ prasave 'śvinor bāhubhyāṃ pūṣṇo hastābhyām ādada iti
3.5.8	gārhapatye pratitapati pratyuṣṭaṃ rakṣaḥ pratyuṣṭā arātaya iti triḥ
3.5.9	atha kūrce srucaṃ nidhāya yajamānam āmantrayata om unneṣyāmīti
3.5.10	om unnayeti yajamāno 'nujānāti
3.5.11	atha caturaḥ sruvān unnayati pūrṇān vānūco vā bhūr iḍā bhuva iḍā suvar iḍā bhūr bhuvaḥ suvar iḍeti
3.5.12	sthālyāṃ sruvaṃ pratyavadhāyāthaine saṃmṛśati sajūr devaiḥ sāyaṃyāvabhiḥ sāyaṃyāvāno mā devāḥ svasti saṃpārayantu paśubhir iti sāyam
3.5.13	sajūr devaiḥ prātaryāvabhiḥ prātaryāvāṇo mā devāḥ svasti saṃpārayantu paśubhir iti prātar
3.5.14	atraitāṃ samidhaṃ srugdaṇḍa upasaṃgṛhya jaghanena gārhapatyam upasādayati kūrce nama īśānāya prajāḥ paśavo me vardhantām ahaṃ yajamāno mā riṣam iti
3.5.15	daśahotroddrutya prāṅ harati bhūr bhuvaḥ suvar urv antarikṣam anvihy ayaṃ panthā vitato devayāno yenāyann ṛṣayaḥ svargakāmās tena gacchāmi paramaṃ vyoma yathā na hīye sukṛtāṃ sakāśād iti
3.5.16	jaghanenāhavanīyam upasādayati kūrce nama īśānāya prajā me vardhatām ahaṃ yajamāno mā riṣam iti
3.5.17	atraitāṃ samidhaṃ madhyata āhavanīyasyābhyādadhāti
3.6.1	rajatāṃ tvāgnijyotiṣaṃ vāyumatīṃ svargyāṃ svargāya lokāya rātrim akṣitim iṣṭakām upadadhe 'mṛtaṃ prāṇe dadhāmi prajāpatis tvā sādayatv iti
3.6.2	tayādevataṃ karoti tayā devatayāṅgirasvad dhruvā sīdeti
3.6.3	atha sūdadohasaṃ karoti tā asya sūdadohasaḥ somaṃ śrīṇanti pṛśnayaḥ / janman devānāṃ viśas triṣv ā rocane diva iti sāyam
3.6.4	atha prātar hariṇīṃ tvā sūryajyotiṣaṃ vāyumatīṃ svargyāṃ svargāya lokāyāhar akṣitim iṣṭakām upadadhe 'mṛtam apāne dadhāmi prajāpatis tvā sādayatv iti
3.6.5	tayādevataṃ kṛtvā sūdadohasaṃ karoti
3.6.6	tasyām ādīptāyāṃ pratimukhaṃ juhoty agnir jyotir jyotiḥ sūryaḥ svāheti sāyam
3.6.7	sūryo jyotir jyotir agniḥ svāheti prātar
3.6.8	iti nu saṃsṛṣṭam
3.6.9	athāsaṃsṛṣṭam agnir jyotir jyotir agniḥ svāheti sāyam
3.6.10	sūryo jyotir jyotiḥ sūryaḥ svāheti prātar
3.6.11	atha sakṛd ativālya kūrce srucaṃ nidhāya dakṣiṇāvṛd gārhapatyaṃ pratīkṣata upapreta saṃgacchadhvaṃ mā bhāgināṃ bhāgadheyaṃ pramāyi / saptarṣīṇāṃ sukṛtāṃ yatra lokas tatremaṃ yajñaṃ yajamānaṃ ca dhatteti
3.6.12	atihāya pūrvām āhutim uttarāṃ bhūyaḥ samidhy eva juhoti prajāpataye svāheti manasā
3.6.13	atha trir ativālya kūrce srucaṃ nidhāyāvācīnam avamṛjya pratīcā nīcā pāṇinauṣadhīṣu lepaṃ nimārṣṭy oṣadhībhyas tvauṣadhīr jinveti
3.6.14	evam eva dvitīyam avamṛjyauṣadhīṣv eva nimārṣṭi dakṣiṇataḥ prācīnāvītī pitṛbhyas tvā pitṝñ jinveti sāyam
3.6.15	atha prātar ūrdhvam unmṛjya prācottānena pāṇinauṣadhīṣu lepam unmārṣṭy oṣadhībhyas tvauṣadhīr jinveti
3.6.16	evam eva dvitīyam avamṛjyauṣadhīṣv eva nimārṣṭi dakṣiṇataḥ prācīnāvītī pitṛbhyas tvā pitṝñ jinveti
3.6.17	athāpa upaspṛśya dvir aṅgulyā prāśnāti prajā jyotir iti
3.6.18	athodaṅ paryāvṛtya prācīnadaṇḍayā srucā bhakṣayati
3.7.1	idaṃ haviḥ prajananaṃ me astu daśavīraṃ sarvagaṇaṃ svastaye / ātmasani prajāsani paśusany abhayasani lokasani vṛṣṭisani
3.7.2	agniḥ prajāṃ bahulāṃ me karotv annaṃ payo reto asmāsu dhatta / rāyaspoṣam iṣam ūrjam asmāsu dīdharat svāheti sāyam
3.7.3	sūryaḥ prajāṃ bahulāṃ me karotv iti prātar
3.7.4	nirṇijya srucaṃ niṣṭapyādbhiḥ pūrayitvodag uddiśati saptarṣīn prīṇīhi saptarṣīñ jinva saptarṣibhyaḥ svāheti
3.7.5	saptarṣīn eva prīṇātīti brāhmaṇam
3.7.6	atha jaghanena gārhapatyam apo ninayatīdam aham agnau vaiśvānare 'mṛtaṃ juhomi svāheti
3.7.7	akṣityām akṣitāhutiṃ juhomi svāhety antarvedi ninayati
3.7.8	hutvopasaminddhe brahmavarcasasya samiddhyai
3.7.9	apo ninayaty avabhṛthasyaiva rūpam akar iti brāhmaṇam
3.8.1	atha sāyaṃ hute 'gnihotre yajñopavīty apa ācamya yajamānāyatane tiṣṭhann āhavanīyam upatiṣṭhata upaprayanto adhvaram iti ṣaḍbhir anucchandasam
3.8.2	ṣaḍbhir evottarābhir āgnipāvamānībhir āhavanīyam evopatiṣṭhate 'gna āyūṃṣi pavase 'gne pavasvāgne pāvaka sa naḥ pāvakāgniḥ śucivratatama ud agne śucayas taveti
3.8.3	athāhavanīyam evopatiṣṭhata āyurdā agne 'sy āyur me dehi varcodā agne 'si varco me dehi tanūpā agne 'si tanuvaṃ me pāhy agne yan me tanuvā ūnaṃ tan ma āpṛṇeti
3.8.4	atha rātrim upatiṣṭhate citrāvaso svasti te pāram aśīyeti
3.8.5	athāhavanīye samidham ādadhātīndhānās tvā śataṃ himā dyumantaḥ samidhīmahi vayasvanto vayaskṛtaṃ yaśasvanto yaśaskṛtaṃ suvīrāso adābhyam / agne sapatnadambhanaṃ varṣiṣṭhe adhi nāke svāheti
3.8.6	athāhavanīyam evopatiṣṭhate saṃ tvam agne sūryasya varcasāgathāḥ sam ṛṣīṇāṃ stutena saṃ priyeṇa dhāmnā
3.8.7	tvam agne sūryavarcā asi saṃ mām āyuṣā varcasā prajayā sṛjeti
3.8.8	atha vai bhavati
3.8.9	yathā vai puruṣo 'śvo gaur jīryaty evam agnir āhito jīryati saṃvatsarasya parastād āgnipāvamānībhir upatiṣṭhata iti
3.8.10	sa saṃvatsarasya parastād āgnipāvamānībhir gārhapatyam upatiṣṭhate
3.8.11	punarnavam evainam ajaraṃ karotīti brāhmaṇam
3.8.12	atha gṛhāṃś ca paśūṃś copatiṣṭhate saṃpaśyāmi prajā aham iḍaprajaso mānavīḥ / sarvā bhavantu no gṛhe
3.8.13	ambha sthāmbho vo bhakṣīya maha stha maho vo bhakṣīya saha stha saho vo bhakṣīyorja sthorjaṃ vo bhakṣīya / revatī ramadhvam asmin loke 'smin goṣṭhe 'smin kṣaye 'smin yonāv ihaiva steto māpa gāta bahvīr me bhūyāsteti
3.8.14	athāgnihotriyai vatsam abhimṛśati saṃhitāsi viśvarūpīr ā morjā viśā gaupatyenā rāyas poṣeṇa / sahasrapoṣaṃ vaḥ puṣyāsaṃ mayi vo rāyaḥ śrayantām iti
3.8.15	atha dvipadatripadābhir gārhapatyam upatiṣṭhata upa tvāgne divedive doṣāvastar dhiyā vayam / namo bharanta emasi
3.8.16	rājantam adhvarāṇāṃ gopām ṛtasya dīdivim / vardhamānaṃ sve dame
3.8.17	sa naḥ piteva sūnave agne sūpāyano bhava / sacasvā naḥ svastaye
3.8.18	agne tvaṃ no antama uta trātā śivo bhava varūthyaḥ
3.8.19	taṃ tvā śociṣṭha dīdivaḥ sumnāya nūnam īmahe sakhibhyaḥ
3.8.20	vasur agnir vasuśravā acchā nakṣi dyumattamo rayiṃ dā iti
3.8.21	atha gṛhāṃś caiva paśūṃś caivopatiṣṭhate
3.9.1	ūrjā vaḥ paśyāmy ūrjā mā paśyata rāyaspoṣeṇa vaḥ paśyāmi rāyaspoṣeṇa mā paśyateḍā stha madhukṛtaḥ syonā māviśaterā madaḥ / sahasrapoṣaṃ vaḥ puṣyāsaṃ mayi vo rāyaḥ śrayantām iti
3.9.2	athāhavanīyam upatiṣṭhate tat savitur vareṇyaṃ bhargo devasya dhīmahi / dhiyo yo naḥ pracodayād iti
3.9.3	āhavanīyam evopatiṣṭhate somānaṃ svaraṇaṃ kṛṇuhi brahmaṇas pate / kakṣīvantaṃ ya auśijam iti
3.9.4	atha rātrim upatiṣṭhate kadā cana starīr asi nendra saścasi dāśuṣe / upopen nu maghavan bhūya in nu te dānaṃ devasya pṛcyata iti
3.9.5	atha gārhapatyam upatiṣṭhate pari tvāgne puraṃ vayaṃ vipraṃ sahasya dhīmahi / dhṛṣadvarṇaṃ divedive bhettāraṃ bhaṅgurāvata iti
3.9.6	atha gārhapatyam evopatiṣṭhate 'gne gṛhapate sugṛhapatir ahaṃ tvayā gṛhapatinā bhūyāsaṃ sugṛhapatir mayā tvaṃ gṛhapatinā bhūyāḥ śataṃ himās tām āśiṣam āśāse mahyam amuṣmai jyotiṣmatīṃ tām āśiṣam āśāse 'muṣmā amuṣmā iti
3.9.7	yāvanto 'sya putrā jātā bhavanti tantava ity antataḥ
3.9.8	atha vai bhavati
3.9.9	yo vā agniṃ pratyaṅṅ upatiṣṭhate praty enam oṣati yaḥ parāṅ viṣvaṅ prajayā paśubhir eti kavātiryaṅṅ ivopatiṣṭheteti
3.9.10	sa kavātiryaṅṅ ivopatiṣṭhate naiva pratyaṅ na parāṅ
3.10.1	piṇḍapitṛyajñaṃ kariṣyann upakalpayate sakṛdāchinnaṃ barhir darbhāṃś ca paristaraṇīyān vrīhīṃś ca śūrpaṃ ca prakṣālite colūkhalamusale sthālīṃ sruvāṃ samekṣaṇām erakopabarhaṇe āñjanābhyañjane daśāṃ sphyam udakumbhaṃ yajñāyudhānīti
3.10.2	athānvāhāryapacanaṃ paristṛṇāti
3.10.3	tam uttareṇaikaikaṃ saṃsādayaty erakopabarhaṇe āñjanābhyañjane daśāṃ sphyam udakumbhaṃ yajñāyudhānīti
3.10.4	atha prācīnāvītaṃ kṛtvā jaghanenānvāhāryapacanam upaviśya pavitravatyāṃ sthālyāṃ vrīhīn nirvapati pitṛbhyo vo juṣṭaṃ nirvapāmīti vā tūṣṇīṃ vā
3.10.5	uparyardhāṃ sthālīṃ kṛtvaitasminn eva carmaṇy ulūkhalamusale nidhāyāvahanti sakṛd eva dakṣiṇāmukhaḥ
3.10.6	athainān avivicya
3.10.7	athaitasyām eva sthālyāṃ tiraḥ pavitram apa ānīyādhiśritya tiraḥ pavitraṃ taṇḍulān āvapati
3.10.8	athājyaṃ nirvapati
3.10.9	athājyam adhiśrayati
3.10.10	ubhayaṃ paryagni kṛtvā mekṣaṇaṃ sruvaṃ ca saṃmārṣṭi
3.10.11	athaitaṃ caruṃ śrapayitvābhighāryodañcam udvāsayati
3.10.12	atha yajñopavītaṃ kṛtvānvāhāryapacanam upasamādhāya mekṣaṇenopaghātaṃ tisra āhutīr juhoti somāya pitṛpītāya svadhā namaḥ svāhā yamāyāṅgirasvate pitṛmate svadhā namaḥ svāhāgnaye kavyavāhanāya sviṣṭakṛte svadhā namaḥ svāheti dakṣiṇārdhapūrvārdhe
3.10.13	tūṣṇīṃ mekṣaṇam abhyādhāya prācīnāvītaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇenānvāhāryapacanaṃ sphyenoddhatyāvokṣya dakṣiṇāgraṃ barhi stīrtvādbhir mārjayati mārjayantāṃ pitaro mārjayantāṃ pitāmahā mārjayantāṃ prapitāmahā iti
3.10.14	atha sruveṇopastīrṇābhighāritāṃs trīn piṇḍān dadāty etat te tatāsau ye ca tvām anv etat te pitāmahāsau ye ca tvām anv etat te prapitāmahāsau ye ca tvām anv iti
3.10.15	atra pitaro yathābhāgaṃ mandadhvam ity uktvodaṅ paryāvṛtyoṣmaṇo vyāvṛta upāste
3.10.16	vyāvṛtta ūṣmeti prāhuḥ
3.10.17	athābhiparyāvṛtyaitaṃ carum avajighrati
3.11.1	ye samānāḥ samanasaḥ pitaro yamarājye / teṣāṃ lokaḥ svadhā namo yajño deveṣu kalpatām
3.11.2	ye sajātāḥ samanaso jīvā jīveṣu māmakāḥ / teṣāṃ śrīr mayi kalpatām asmiṃ loke śataṃ samā iti
3.11.3	atha tathaivādbhir mārjayati mārjayantāṃ pitaro mārjayantāṃ pitāmahā mārjayantāṃ prapitāmahā iti
3.11.4	athāñjanaṃ dadāty āñjatāṃ pitara āñjatāṃ pitāmahā āñjatāṃ prapitāmahā iti
3.11.5	athābhyañjanaṃ dadāty abhyañjatāṃ pitaro 'bhyañjatāṃ pitāmahā abhyañjatāṃ prapitāmahā iti
3.11.6	atha vāsāṃsi dadāty etāni vaḥ pitaro vāsāṃsy etāni vaḥ pitāmahā vāsāṃsy etāni vaḥ prapitāmahā vāsāṃsīti
3.11.7	uttara āyuṣi loma chindīteti brāhmaṇam
3.11.8	atha ṣaḍbhir namaskārair viparyāsam upatiṣṭhate namo vaḥ pitaro rasāya namo vaḥ pitaraḥ śuṣmāya namo vaḥ pitaro jīvāya namo vaḥ pitaraḥ svadhāyai namo vaḥ pitaro manyave namo vaḥ pitaro ghorāya pitaro namo vo ya etasmiṃ loke stha yuṣmāṃs te 'nu ye 'smiṃ loke māṃ te 'nu ya etasmiṃ loke stha yūyaṃ teṣāṃ vasiṣṭhā bhūyāsta ye 'smiṃ loke 'haṃ teṣāṃ vasiṣṭho bhūyāsam iti
3.11.9	atha vīraṃ yācate vīraṃ me pitaro datta vīraṃ me pitāmahā datta vīram me prapitāmahā datta pitṛmān ahaṃ yuṣmābhir bhūyāsaṃ suprajaso mayā yūyaṃ bhūyāsteti
3.11.10	athainān utthāpayaty uttiṣṭhata pitaraḥ preta śūrā yamasya panthām anuyātā purāṇam / dhattād asmāsu draviṇaṃ yac ca bhadraṃ pra ṇo brūtād bhāgadhān devatāsv iti
3.11.11	athainān saṃsādhayati yantu pitaro yathālokaṃ manasā javena pareta pitaraḥ somyās gambhīraiḥ pathibhiḥ pūrvyaiḥ / athā pitṝnt suvidatrāṃ apīta yamena ye sadhamādaṃ madantīti
3.11.12	atha tisṛbhir mana āhvayate mano nv āhuvāmaha ā na etu manaḥ punaḥ punar naḥ pitaro mana iti
3.11.13	atraitān piṇḍān saha barhiṣāgnāv anupraharati
3.11.14	athaiteṣāṃ śastrāṇāṃ dvedve udāharanti
3.11.15	atha yajñopavītaṃ kṛtvā prājāpatyayarcā gārhapatyam upatiṣṭhate prajāpate na tvad etāny anya iti
3.11.16	atraitāṃ dvitīyāṃ japati yad antarikṣaṃ pṛthivīm uta dyām iti
3.11.17	saṃtiṣṭhate piṇḍapitṛyajñaḥ
3.12.1	varṣāsu śyāmākānām āgrayaṇaṃ kariṣyan bhavati
3.12.2	tasya prajñāta upavasathaḥ
3.12.3	atha prātar hute 'gnihotre pṛṣṭhyāṃ stīrtvāpaḥ praṇīya saumyaṃ śyāmākaṃ caruṃ nirvapati
3.12.4	haviṣkṛtā vācaṃ visṛjya gārhapatya ājyaṃ vilāpyotpūya sruci caturgṛhītaṃ gṛhītvāhavanīye 'jyānīr juhoti śatāyudhāya śatavīryāyeti pañca
3.12.5	śrapayitvāsādayati
3.12.6	tasyāḥ pañcadaśa sāmidhenyaḥ pañca prayājā vārtraghnāv ājyabhāgau
3.12.7	atha haviṣa āpyāyasva saṃ ta iti
3.12.8	triṣṭubhau saṃyājye
3.12.9	anvāhāryam āsādya vāso dadāti
3.12.10	atha yajamānabhāgaṃ prāśnāty agniḥ prathamaḥ prāśnātu sa hi veda yathā haviḥ / śivā asmabhyam oṣadhīḥ kṛṇotu viśvacarṣaṇir iti
3.12.11	saṃtiṣṭhata eṣeṣṭiḥ sapūrṇapātraviṣṇukramāḥ
3.12.12	visṛjate vratam
3.12.13	atha śaradi vrīhīṇām āgrayaṇaṃ kariṣyan bhavati
3.12.14	tasya prajñāta upavasathaḥ
3.12.15	atha prātar hute 'gnihotre pṛṣṭhyāṃ stīrtvāpaḥ praṇīyaindrāgnaṃ dvādaśakapālaṃ nirvapati vaiśvadevaṃ caruṃ dyāvāpṛthivyam ekakapālam iti
3.12.16	haviṣkṛtā vācaṃ visṛjya gārhapatya ājyaṃ vilāpyotpūya sruci caturgṛhītaṃ gṛhītvāhavanīye 'jyānīr juhoti śatāyudhāya śatavīryāyeti pañca
3.12.17	śrapayitvāsādayati
3.12.18	tasyāḥ pañcadaśa sāmidhenyaḥ pañca prayājā vārtraghnāv ājyabhāgau
3.12.19	atha haviṣām indrāgnī rocanā divaḥ śnathad vṛtram ity aindrāgnasya
3.12.20	viśve devā viśve devā iti vaiśvadevasya
3.12.21	dyāvā naḥ pṛthivī pra pūrvaje pitareti dyāvāpṛthivyasya
3.12.22	triṣṭubhau saṃyāje
3.12.23	anvāhāryam āsādya prathamajaṃ vatsaṃ dadāti
3.12.24	atha yajamānabhāgaṃ prāśnāti bhadrān naḥ śreyaḥ samanaiṣṭa devās tvayāvasena sam aśīmahi tvā / sa no mayobhūḥ pito ā viśasva śaṃ tokāya tanuve syona iti
3.12.25	saṃtiṣṭhata eṣeṣṭiḥ sapūrṇapātraviṣṇukramāḥ
3.12.26	visṛjate vratam
3.12.27	atha vasante yavānām āgrayaṇaṃ kariṣyan bhavati
3.12.28	tasya prajñāta upavasathaḥ
3.12.29	samānaṃ karma yathā vrīhyāgrayaṇasya
3.12.30	etāvad eva nānā
3.12.31	atha yajamānabhāgaṃ prāśnāty etam u tyaṃ madhunā saṃyutaṃ yavaṃ sarasvatyā adhi manāv acarkṛṣuḥ / indra āsīt sīrapatiḥ śatakratuḥ kīnāśā āsan marutaḥ sudānava iti
3.12.32	saṃtiṣṭhata eṣeṣṭiḥ sapūrṇapātraviṣṇukramāḥ
3.12.33	visṛjate vratam
3.13.1	agnibhyaḥ pravatsyan yajñopavīty apa ācamyāgreṇāhavanīyaṃ parītya yajamānāyatane tiṣṭhann āhavanīyam upatiṣṭhate mama nāma prathamaṃ jātavedaḥ pitā mātā ca dadhatur yad agre / tat tvaṃ bibhṛhi punar ā mad aitos tavāhaṃ nāma bibharāṇy agna iti
3.13.2	atha vācaṃyamo 'bhipravrajati
3.13.3	agnīnām asakāśe vācaṃ visṛjate
3.13.4	so 'dhaḥsaṃveśy amāṃsāśy astryupāyī pravasati
3.13.5	na dvādaśīm atipravasati
3.13.6	nopavasatham upātyeti
3.13.7	āyan prapathe samidhaḥ kurute
3.13.8	agnīn parākhyāya vācaṃ yacchati
3.13.9	āhavanīyam evopatiṣṭhate mama nāma tava ca jātavedo vāsasī iva vivasānau ye carāvaḥ / āyuṣe tvaṃ jīvase vayaṃ yathāyathaṃ viparidadhāvahai punas ta iti
3.13.10	atha gārhapatyam upatiṣṭhate namo 'gnaye 'pratividdhāya namo 'nādhṛṣṭāya namaḥ samrāje / aṣāḍho agnir bṛhadvayā viśvajit sahantyaḥ śreṣṭho gandharva iti
3.13.11	athānvāhāryapacanam upatiṣṭhate tvatpitāro agne devās tvāmāhutayas tvadvivācanāḥ / saṃ mām āyuṣā saṃ gaupatyena suhite mā dhā iti
3.13.12	athāhavanīyam upatiṣṭhate
3.14.1	ayam agniḥ śreṣṭhatamo 'yaṃ bhagavattamo 'yaṃ sahasrasātamaḥ / asmā astu suvīryam iti
3.14.2	sa yady asmai yajñabhreṣam ācakṣate na te 'hauṣīd iti tad gārhapatya ājyaṃ vilāpyotpūya sruci caturgṛhītaṃ gṛhītvāhavanīye saṃtanīṃ juhoti mano jyotir juṣatām ājyaṃ vicchinnaṃ yajñaṃ sam imaṃ dadhātu / yā iṣṭā uṣaso nimrucaś ca tāḥ saṃdadhāmi haviṣā ghṛtena svāheti
3.14.3	athāgnaye tantumate puroḍāśam aṣṭākapālaṃ nirvapati
3.14.4	śarāvaṃ dakṣiṇāṃ dadāti
3.14.5	sā prasiddheṣṭiḥ saṃtiṣṭhate
3.14.6	athātipannāḥ pratijuhoti
3.14.7	etena ha sma vai pūrve śrotriyā ṛtāyavas tejaskāmā yaśaskāmā brahmavarcasakāmā upatiṣṭhante
3.14.8	tad etad utsannaṃ vratasyaiva garimṇā
3.14.9	athāto vairājam evopasthānam
3.14.10	narya prajāṃ me gopāyeti gārhapatyam
3.14.11	atharva pituṃ me gopāyety anvāhāryapacanam
3.14.12	śaṃsya paśūn me gopāyety āhavanīyam
3.14.13	sapratha sabhāṃ me gopāyeti sabhyam
3.14.14	ahe budhniya mantraṃ me gopāyety āvasathīyam
3.14.15	so 'parimitaṃ pravasati
3.14.16	punarāyan prapathe samidhaḥ kurute
3.14.17	agnīn parākhyāya vācaṃ yacchati
3.14.18	āgatyaitenaivopatiṣṭhate
3.14.19	samānī prāyaścittiḥ
3.15.1	athopavasathīye 'han yajñopavīty apa ācamyāgreṇāhavanīyaṃ parītya yajamānāyatana upaviśya tiraḥ pavitram apa ācāmati payasvatīr oṣadhayaḥ payasvad vīrudhāṃ payaḥ / apāṃ payaso yat payas tena mām indra saṃsṛjeti
3.15.2	athāhavanīye samidha ādadhāty agne vratapate vrataṃ cariṣyāmi tac chakeyaṃ tan me rādhyatāṃ svāhā vāyo vratapata āditya vratapate vratānāṃ vratapate vrataṃ cariṣyāmi tac chakeyaṃ tan me rādhyatāṃ svāheti
3.15.3	atha śvo bhūte havir nirupyamāṇam abhimantrayate 'gniṃ hotāram iha taṃ huve devān yajñiyān iha yān havāmahe / āyantu devāḥ sumanasyamānā viyantu devā haviṣo me asyeti
3.15.4	tad uditvā vācaṃ yacchaty ā haviṣkṛtaḥ
3.15.5	haviṣkṛtā vācaṃ visṛjya yajñaṃ yogena yunakti kas tvā yunakti sa tvā yunaktv iti
3.15.6	kāle kapālāni yunakti yāni gharme kapālāny upacinvanti vedhasaḥ / pūṣṇas tāny api vrata indravāyū yuṅktām iti
3.15.7	teṣāṃ yajuṣkṛtānāṃ yad bhidyate tad utkara udasyaty abhinno gharmo jīradānur yata āttas tad agan punar iti
3.15.8	atha gārhapatya ājyaṃ vilāpyotpūya sruci caturgṛhītaṃ gṛhītvāhavanīye saṃtanīṃ juhotīdhmo vediḥ paridhayaś ca sarve yajñasyāyur anusaṃcaranti / trayastriṃśat tantavo ye vitatnire ya imaṃ yajñaṃ svadhayā dadante teṣāṃ chinnaṃ praty etad dadhāmi svāheti
3.15.9	athānyad apisṛjati gharmo devāṃ apyetv iti
3.15.10	atha vai bhavati
3.15.11	yadi naśyed āśvinaṃ dvikapālaṃ nirvaped dyāvāpṛthivyam ekakapālam iti
3.15.12	sā prasiddheṣṭiḥ saṃtiṣṭhate
3.15.13	atha tathaiva gārhapatya ājyaṃ vilāpyotpūya sruci caturgṛhītaṃ gṛhītvāhavanīye saṃtanīṃ juhotīdhmo vediḥ paridhayaś ca sarve yajñasyāyur anusaṃcaranti / trayastriṃśat tantavo ye vitatnire ya imaṃ yajñaṃ svadhayā dadante teṣāṃ chinnaṃ praty etad dadhāmi svāheti
3.15.14	athānyad apisṛjati gharmo devāṃ apyetv iti
3.15.15	atha yady ājyasya vā sāṃnāyyasya vānyatra barhiṣaḥ purottamāt prayājāt skandati tasya svadhāṃ saṃbharati
3.16.1	saṃ tvā siñcāmi yajuṣā prajām āyur dhanaṃ ca / bṛhaspatiprasūto yajamāna iha mā riṣad iti
3.16.2	skannam anumantrayate bhūpataye svāhā bhuvanapataye svāhā bhūtānāṃ pataye svāheti
3.16.3	atha yāvat pariśiṣṭena pracaraty atha yajamānam ājyam avekṣayaty ājyam asi satyam asi satyasyādhyakṣam asi havir asi vaiśvānaraṃ vaiśvadevam utpūtaśuṣmaṃ satyaujāḥ saho 'si sahamānam asi sahasvārātīḥ sahasvārātīyataḥ sahasva pṛtanāḥ sahasva pṛtanyataḥ sahasravīryam asi tan mā jinvājyasyājyam asi satyasya satyam asi satyāyur asi satyaśuṣmam asi satyena tvābhighārayāmi tasya te bhakṣīyeti
3.16.4	athājyagrahāṇām
3.16.5	gṛhītaṃgṛhītam anumantrayate pañcānāṃ tvā vātānāṃ yantrāya dhartrāya gṛhṇāmi pañcānāṃ tvartūnāṃ yantrāya dhartrāya gṛhṇāmi pañcānāṃ tvā diśāṃ yantrāya dhartrāya gṛhṇāmi pañcānāṃ tvā pañcajanānāṃ yantrāya dhartrāya gṛhṇāmīti caturbhir juhūm
3.16.6	aṣṭābhir upabhṛtaṃ caros tvā pañcabilasya yantrāya dhartrāya gṛhṇāmi brahmaṇas tvā tejase yantrāya dhartrāya gṛhṇāmi kṣatrasya tvaujase yantrāya dhartrāya gṛhṇāmi viśe tvā yantrāya dhartrāya gṛhṇāmi suvīryāya tvā gṛhṇāmi suprajāstvāya tvā gṛhṇāmi rāyaspoṣāya tvā gṛhṇāmi brahmavarcasāya tvā gṛhṇāmīti
3.16.7	caturbhir dhruvāṃ bhūr asmākaṃ havir devānām āśiṣo yajamānasya devānāṃ tvā devatābhyo gṛhṇāmīti
3.16.8	abhipūryamāṇām anumantrayate kāmāya tvā gṛhṇāmīti
3.16.9	paridhīn paridhīyamānān anumantrayate dhruvo 'si dhruvo 'haṃ sajāteṣu bhūyāsaṃ dhīraś cettā vasuvid iti madhyam
3.16.10	ugro 'sy ugro 'haṃ sajāteṣu bhūyāsam ugraś cettā vasuvid iti dakṣiṇam
3.16.11	abhibhūr asy abhibhūr ahaṃ sajāteṣu bhūyāsam abhibhūś cettā vasuvid ity uttaram
3.16.12	athāgniṃ yogena yunakti yunajmi tvā brahmaṇā daivyena havyāyāsmai voḍhave jātaveda iti
3.16.13	samidhor abhyādhīyamānayor japatīndhānās tvā suprajasaḥ suvīrā jyog jīvema balihṛto vayaṃ ta iti
3.16.14	athāntarvedi havīṃṣy āsannāny abhimantrayate yan me agne asya yajñasya riṣyād yad vā skandād ājyasyota viṣṇo / tena hanmi sapatnaṃ durmarāyum ainaṃ dadhāmi nirṛtyā upastha iti
3.17.1	atha bhūr bhuvaḥ suvar ity agnihotram etābhir vyāhṛtībhir upasādayet
3.17.2	yajñamukhaṃ vā agnihotraṃ brahmaitā vyāhṛtayaḥ
3.17.3	yajñamukha eva brahma kurute
3.17.4	saṃvatsare paryāgata etābhir evopasādayet
3.17.5	brahmaṇaivobhayataḥ saṃvatsaraṃ parigṛhṇātīti brāhmaṇam
3.17.6	atha vai bhavati
3.17.7	darśapūrṇamāsāv ālabhamāna etābhir vyāhṛtībhir havīṃṣy āsādayet
3.17.8	yajñamukhaṃ vai darśapūrṇamāsau brahmaitā vyāhṛtayaḥ
3.17.9	yajñamukha eva brahma kurute
3.17.10	saṃvatsare paryāgata etābhir evāsādayet
3.17.11	brahmaṇaivobhayataḥ saṃvatsaraṃ parigṛhṇātīti brāhmaṇam
3.17.12	atha vai bhavati
3.17.13	cāturmāsyāny ālabhamāna etābhir vyāhṛtībhir havīṃṣy āsādayet
3.17.14	yajñamukhaṃ vai cāturmāsyāni brahmaitā vyāhṛtayaḥ
3.17.15	yajñamukha eva brahma kurute
3.17.16	saṃvatsare paryāgata etābhir evāsādayet
3.17.17	brahmaṇaivobhayataḥ saṃvatsaraṃ parigṛhṇātīti brāhmaṇam
3.17.18	atha vai bhavati
3.17.19	yad vai yajñasya sāmnā kriyate rāṣṭraṃ yajñasyāśīr gacchati yad ṛcā viśaṃ yajñasyāśīr gacchati
3.17.20	atha brāhmaṇo 'nāśīrkeṇa yajñena yajate
3.17.21	sāmidhenīr anuvakṣyann etā vyāhṛtīḥ purastād dadhyāt
3.17.22	brahmaiva pratipadaṃ kurute
3.17.23	tathā brāmaṇaḥ sāśīrkeṇa yajñena yajata iti brāhmaṇam
3.17.24	atha vai bhavati
3.17.25	yaṃ kāmayeta yajamānaṃ bhrātṛvyam asya yajñasyāśīr gacched iti tasyaitā vyāhṛtīḥ puro'nuvākyāyāṃ dadhyāt
3.17.26	bhrātṛvyadevatyā vai puro'nuvākyā
3.17.27	bhrātṛvyam evāsya yajñasyāśīr gacchatīti brāhmaṇam
3.17.28	atha vai bhavati
3.17.29	yān kāmayeta yajamānānt samāvaty enān yajñasyāśīr gacched iti teṣām etā vyāhṛtīḥ puro'nuvākyāyā ardharca ekāṃ dadhyād yājyāyai purastād ekāṃ yājyāyā ardharca ekām
3.17.30	tathainānt samāvatī yajñasyāśīr gacchatīti brāhmaṇam
3.17.31	atha vai bhavati
3.17.32	yathā vai parjanyaḥ suvṛṣṭaḥ varṣaty evaṃ yajño yajamānāya varṣati
3.17.33	sthalayodakaṃ parigṛhṇanti
3.17.34	āśiṣā yajñaṃ yajamānaḥ parigṛhṇātīti brāhmaṇam
3.17.35	vyāhṛtībhir brāhmaṇasya pratipadyate hiṅkāreṇa rājanyasyarcā vaiśyasya sarvam evaitat trayaṃ kuryād ity etad aparam
3.17.36	idhmam abhyādhīyamānam anumantrayate
3.18.1	ucchuṣmo agne yajamānāyaidhi niśuṣmo abhidāsate / agne deveddha manviddha mandrajihveti
3.18.2	pravaraṃ pravriyamāṇam anumantrayate 'martyasya te hotar mūrdhann ājigharmi rāyas poṣāya suprajāstvāya suvīryāyeti
3.18.3	sruveṇāghāram āghāryamāṇam anumantrayate mano 'si prajāpatyaṃ manasā mā bhūtenāviśeti
3.18.4	srucyam āghāram āghāryamāṇam anumantrayate vāg asy aindrī sapatnakṣayaṇī vācā mendriyeṇāviśeti
3.18.5	prayājānām iṣṭamiṣṭam anumantrayate vasantam ṛtūnāṃ prīṇāmi sa mā prītaḥ prīṇātu grīṣmam ṛtūnāṃ prīṇāmi sa mā prītaḥ prīṇātu varṣā ṛtūnāṃ prīṇāmi tā mā prītāḥ prīṇantu śaradam ṛtūnāṃ prīṇāmi sā mā prītā prīṇātu hemantaśiśirāv ṛtūnāṃ prīṇāmi tau mā prītau prīṇītām iti
3.18.6	ājyabhāgāv iṣṭāv anumantrayate 'gnīṣomayor ahaṃ devayajyayā cakṣuṣmān bhūyāsam iti
3.18.7	agnim iṣṭam anumantrayate 'gner ahaṃ devayajyayānnādo bhūyāsam iti
3.18.8	upāṃśuyājam iṣṭam anumantrayate dabdhir asy adabdho bhūyāsam amuṃ dabheyam iti
3.18.9	atra yaṃ yajamāno dveṣṭi taṃ manasā dhyāyati
3.18.10	athāpa upaspṛśya
3.18.11	agnīṣomāv iṣṭāv anumantrayate 'gnīṣomayor ahaṃ devayajyayā vṛtrahā bhūyāsam iti
3.18.12	indrāgnī iṣṭāv anumantrayata indrāgniyor ahaṃ devayajyayendriyāvy annādo bhūyāsam iti
3.18.13	indram iṣṭam anumantrayata indrasyāhaṃ devayajyayendriyāvī bhūyāsam iti
3.18.14	mahendram iṣṭam anumantrayate mahendrasyāhaṃ devayajyayā jemānaṃ mahimānaṃ gameyam iti
3.18.15	sviṣṭakṛtam iṣṭam anumantrayate 'gneḥ sviṣṭakṛto 'haṃ devayajyayāyuṣmān yajñena pratiṣṭhāṃ gameyam iti
3.18.16	prāśitre 'vadīyamāne japaty agnir mā duriṣṭāt pātu savitāghaśaṃsād iti
3.18.17	yajamānabhāge yo me 'nti dūre 'rātīyati tam etena jeṣam iti
3.18.18	iḍām āhriyamāṇām anumantrayate surūpavarṣavarṇa ehīti pratipadya maghonīty ātaḥ
3.18.19	avāntareḍāṃ prāśyamānām anumantrayate juṣṭir asi juṣasva no juṣṭā no 'si juṣṭiṃ te gameyam iti
3.18.20	athāntarvedy adbhir mārjayate mano jyotir juṣatām ājyaṃ vicchinnaṃ yajñaṃ sam imaṃ dadhātu / bṛhaspatis tanutām imaṃ no viśve devā iha mādayantām iti
3.18.21	barhiṣadaṃ puroḍāśam abhimantrayate bradhna pinvasva dadato me mā kṣāyi kurvato me mopadasad iti
3.18.22	athānvāhāryaṃ yācati
3.18.23	tam antarvedy āsannam abhimantrayate prajāpater bhāgo 'sy ūrjasvān payasvān ity āntād anuvākasya
3.19.1	anūyājānām iṣṭamiṣṭam anumantrayate barhiṣo 'haṃ devayajyayā prajāvān bhūyāsaṃ narāśaṃsasyāhaṃ devayajyayā paśumān bhūyāsam agneḥ sviṣṭakṛto 'haṃ devayajyayāyuṣmān yajñena pratiṣṭhāṃ gameyam iti
3.19.2	atha yatra hotur abhijānāty agnir idaṃ havir ajuṣateti tad yajamānam ujjitiṃ vācayaty agner aham ujjitim anūjjeṣam iti yatheṣṭam
3.19.3	uktaṃ vājavatyor vyūhanam
3.19.4	atha yatra hotur abhijānāty āśāste 'yaṃ yajamāno 'sāv iti tad yajamānaṃ yajñasya dohaṃ vācayaty emā agmann āśiṣo dohakāmā indravanto vanāmahe dhukṣīmahi prajām iṣam iti
3.19.5	prastaraṃ prahriyamāṇam anumantrayate rohitena tvāgnir devatāṃ gamayatu haribhyāṃ tvendro devatāṃ gamayatv etaśena tvā sūryo devatāṃ gamayatv iti
3.19.6	paridhīn vimucyamānān anumantrayate vi te muñcāmi raśanā vi raśmīn vi yoktrā yāni paricartanāni / dhattād asmāsu draviṇaṃ yac ca bhadraṃ pra ṇo brūtād bhāgadhān devatāsv iti
3.19.7	śaṃyuvākam uktam anumantrayate viṣṇoḥ śaṃyor ahaṃ devayajyayā yajñena pratiṣṭhāṃ gameyam iti
3.19.8	patnīsaṃyājānām iṣṭamiṣṭam anumantrayate
3.20.1	somasyāhaṃ devayajyayā suretā reto dhiṣīya tvaṣṭur ahaṃ devayajyayā paśūnāṃ rūpaṃ puṣeyam iti
3.20.2	athetarāv upasamasyati devānāṃ patnīr agnir gṛhapatir yajñasya mithunaṃ tayor ahaṃ devayajyayā mithunena prabhūyāsam iti
3.20.3	vede yajamānaṃ vācayati vedo 'si vittir asi videyety āntād anuvākasya
3.20.4	dhruvām āpyāyyamānām anumantrayata āpyāyatāṃ dhruvā ghṛtena yajñaṃyajñaṃ prati devayadbhyaḥ / sūryāyā ūdho 'dityā upastha urudhārā pṛthivī yajñe asminn iti
3.20.5	atha yajamānabhāgaṃ prāśnāti prajāpater vibhān nāma lokas tasmiṃs tvā dadhāmi saha yajamāneneti saṃ yajñapatir āśiṣeti vā
3.20.6	atraitat pūrṇapātraṃ yācati
3.20.7	tam antarvedi nidhāya pūrṇapātre yajamānaṃ vācayati sad asi san me bhūyāḥ sarvam asi sarvaṃ me bhūyāḥ pūrṇam asi pūrṇaṃ me bhūyā akṣitam asi mā me kṣeṣṭhā iti
3.20.8	atha diśo vyunnayati prācyāṃ diśi devā ṛtvijo mārjayantāṃ dakṣiṇāyāṃ diśi māsāḥ pitaro mārjayantāṃ pratīcyāṃ diśi gṛhāḥ paśavo mārjayantām udīcyāṃ diśy āpa oṣadhayo vanaspatayo mārjayantām ūrdhvāyāṃ diśi yajñaḥ saṃvatsaro yajñapatir mārjayantām iti
3.20.9	athainā ninayati samudraṃ vaḥ prahiṇomy akṣitāḥ svāṃ yonim apigacchata / acchidraḥ prajayā bhūyāsaṃ mā parāseci matpaya iti
3.20.10	athopotthāya dakṣiṇena padā viṣṇukramān kramate
3.21.1	viṣṇoḥ kramo 'sy abhimātihā gāyatreṇa chandasā pṛthivīm anu vikrame nirbhaktaḥ sa yaṃ dviṣma iti caturbhir anucchandasam
3.21.2	tṛtīye caturtham anuvartayati
3.21.3	na caturthāya prakrāmati
3.21.4	nāhavanīyam upātyeti
3.21.5	athātraiva tiṣṭhann āhavanīyam upatiṣṭhate 'ganma suvaḥ suvar aganma saṃdṛśas te mā chitsi yat te tapas tasmai te mā vṛkṣīti
3.21.6	athādityam upatiṣṭhate subhūr asi śreṣṭho raśmīnām āyurdhā asy āyur me dhehi varcodhā asi varco mayi dhehīti
3.21.7	athaibhyo lokebhyo bhrātṛvyaṃ nirbhajatīdam aham amuṃ bhrātṛvyam ābhyo digbhyo 'syai divo 'smād antarikṣād asyai pṛthivyā asmād annādyān nirbhajāmi nirbhaktaḥ sa yaṃ dviṣma iti
3.21.8	athāpa upaspṛśya
3.21.9	saṃ jyotiṣābhuvam ity uraḥ praty ātmānaṃ pratyabhimṛśate
3.21.10	atha dakṣiṇam aṃsam abhi paryāvartate 'indrīm āvṛtam anvāvarta iti
3.21.11	athodaṅ paryāvartate sam ahaṃ prajayā saṃ mayā prajā sam ahaṃ rāyas poṣeṇa saṃ mayā rāyas poṣa iti
3.21.12	athāhavanīye samidham ādadhāti samiddho agne me dīdihi sameddhā te agne dīdyāsaṃ svāheti
3.21.13	athāhavanīyam upatiṣṭhate vasumān yajño vasīyān bhūyāsam iti
3.21.14	athāgnipāvamānībhyāṃ gārhapatyam upatiṣṭhate 'gna āyūṃṣi pavase 'gne pavasveti
3.21.15	atha gārhapatyam evopatiṣṭhate 'gne gṛhapate sugṛhapatir ahaṃ tvayā gṛhapatinā bhūyāsaṃ sugṛhapatir mayā tvaṃ gṛhapatinā bhūyāḥ śataṃ himās tām āśiṣam āśāse mahyam amuṣmai jyotiṣmatīṃ tām āśiṣam āśāse 'muṣmā amuṣmā iti
3.21.16	yāvanto 'sya putrā jātā bhavanti tantava ity antataḥ
3.22.1	atha vai bhavati
3.22.2	yo vai yajñaṃ prayujya na vimuñcaty apratiṣṭhāno vai sa bhavati
3.22.3	kas tvā yunakti sa tvā vimuñcatv iti
3.22.4	kāle kapālāni vimuñcati yāni gharme kapālāny upacinvanti vedhasaḥ / pūṣṇas tāny api vrata indravāyū vimuñcatām iti
3.22.5	athaitenaiva yathetam etya yajamānāyatana upaviśya tathaiva tiraḥ pavitram apa ācāmati payasvatīr oṣadhayaḥ payasvad vīrudhāṃ payaḥ / apāṃ payaso yat payas tena mām indra saṃsṛjeti
3.22.6	athāhavanīye samidha ādadhāty agne vratapate vratam acāriṣaṃ tad aśakaṃ tan me 'rādhi svāhā vāyo vratapata āditya vratapate vratānāṃ vratapate vratam acāriṣaṃ tad aśakaṃ tan me 'rādhi svāheti
3.22.7	athopotthāya yajñasya punar ālambhaṃ japati yajño babhūva sa ābabhūva sa prajajñe sa vāvṛdhe / sa devānām adhipatir babhūva so asmāṃ adhipatīn karotu vayaṃ syāma patayo rayīṇām iti
3.22.8	atha prāṅ utkramya japati gomāṃ agne 'vimāṃ aśvī yajño nṛvatsakhā sadam id apramṛṣyaḥ / iḍāvāṃ eṣo asura prajāvān dīrgho rayiḥ pṛthubudhnaḥ sabhāvān iti
3.22.9	atha brāhmaṇāṃs tarpayitavā iti saṃpreṣyati
3.23.1	brahmatvaṃ kariṣyan yajñopavīty apa ācamyāgreṇāhavanīyaṃ parītya dakṣiṇata udaṅmukhas tiṣṭhan brahmasadanam upatiṣṭhate namo brahmaṇe namo brahmasadanāyeti
3.23.2	athāsanāt tṛṇaṃ nirasyaty ahe daidhiṣavyod atas tiṣṭhānyasya sadane sīda yo 'smat pākatara iti
3.23.3	upaviśaty un nivata ud udvataś ca geṣam iti
3.23.4	atheme samīkṣate pātaṃ mā dyāvāpṛthivī adyāhna iti
3.23.5	upaviśya japati bhūr bhuvaḥ suvaḥ ka idaṃ brahmā bhaviṣyati sa idaṃ brahmā bhaviṣyati prāṇaḥ prajāpatiyukto 'haṃ yujye brahmaṇārveva vājī sudhura iva vahnir balīvarda iva yukto havyaṃ vakṣyāmy ahaṃ devatābhyo bhūḥ prapadye bhuvaḥ prapadye suvaḥ prapadye bhūr bhuvaḥ suvaḥ prapadye vāyuṃ prapadye brahma prapadye kṣatraṃ prapadye 'śmānam ākhaṇaṃ prapadye prajāpater brahmakośaṃ prapadye 'nārtāṃ devatāṃ vācaṃ prapadya oṃ prapadya iti
3.23.6	taṃ yajamāno brahmāṇaṃ vṛṇīte bhūpate bhuvanapate mahato bhūtasya pate brahmāṇaṃ tvā vṛṇīmahe vītahavye purohitaṃ yenāyann uttamaṃ suvar devā aṅgiraso divam iti
3.23.7	vṛto brahmā japaty ahaṃ bhūpatir ahaṃ bhuvanapatir ahaṃ mahato bhūtasya patir devena savitrā prasūta ārtvijyaṃ kariṣyāmi brahmāṇaṃ māvṛthā vītahavye purohitaṃ yenāyann uttamaṃ suvar devā aṅgiraso divaṃ deva savitar etaṃ tvā vṛṇate bṛhaspatiṃ daivyaṃ brahmāṇaṃ tad ahaṃ manase prabravīmi mano gāyatriyai gāyatrī triṣṭubhe triṣṭub jagatyai jagaty anuṣṭubhe 'nuṣṭup paṅktyai paṅktiḥ prajāpataye prajāpatir viśvebhyo devebhyo viśve devā bṛhaspataye bṛhaspatir brahmaṇe brahma bhūr bhuvaḥ suvar bṛhaspatir devānāṃ brahmāhaṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ bṛhaspate yajñaṃ gopāyeti
3.23.8	sa yatrāha brahmann apaḥ praṇeṣyāmi yajamāna vācaṃ yaccheti tad brahmā prasauti
3.24.1	deva savitaḥ praṇaya yajñaṃ devatā vardhayaitā nākasya pṛṣṭhe suvarge loke yajamāno astu / saptarṣīṇāṃ sukṛtāṃ yatra lokas tatremaṃ yajñaṃ yajamānaṃ ca dhehy oṃ praṇayeti
3.24.2	sa vācaṃyamo bhavati praṇītāsu praṇīyamānāsv ā haviṣkṛtaḥ
3.24.3	sāṃnāyye dohyamāna ā tato yad āha bahu dugdhīndrāya devebhyo havyam iti mahendrāyeti vā yadi mahendrayājī bhavati
3.24.4	adhivapane vācaṃ yacchaty ā kapālopadhānāt
3.24.5	saṃvapane vācaṃ yacchaty ā samabhivāsanāt
3.24.6	stambayajuṣy āhriyamāṇa ā prokṣaṇīnām āsādanāt
3.24.7	sa yatrāha brahmann uttaraṃ parigrāhaṃ parigrahīṣyāmīti tad brahmā prasauti bṛhaspate parigṛhāṇa vediṃ brahmaṇā yajñaṃ parigṛhṇīhīmam / saptarṣīṇāṃ sukṛtāṃ yatra lokas tatremaṃ yajñaṃ yajamānaṃ ca dhehy oṃ parigṛhāṇeti
3.24.8	ājyeṣu gṛhyamāṇeṣu vācaṃ yacchaty ā dhruvāsādanāt
3.24.9	sāmidhenīṣv anūcyamānāsv ā pravarād anūktāyāṃ puro'nuvākyāyām ā vaṣaṭkārāt
3.24.10	prāśitre 'vadīyamāna ā prasavāt
3.24.11	pariharanty asmā etat prāśitram agreṇāhavanīyam
3.24.12	tad āhriyamāṇaṃ pratipaśyati
3.25.1	sūryasya tvā cakṣuṣā pratipaśyāmīti
3.25.2	athainad ubhābhyāṃ hastābhyāṃ pratigṛhṇāti devasya tvā savituḥ prasave 'śvinor bāhubhyāṃ pūṣṇo hastābhyāṃ pratigṛhṇāmīti
3.25.3	athainat sādayati pṛthivyās tvā nābhau sādayāmīti
3.25.4	athainad avekṣate suparṇasya tvā garutmataś cakṣuṣāvekṣa iti
3.25.5	athainad aṅguṣṭhena ca mahānāmnyā copasaṃgṛhyātihāya dataḥ pūrvaṃ jihvāgre nidadhāty agnes tvāsyena prāśnāmīti
3.25.6	prāśyāpa ācamya sahādbhir avagirati brāhmaṇasyodareṇa bṛhaspater brahmaṇeti
3.25.7	athādbhir mārjayitvā prāṇān saṃmṛśate vāṅ ma āsan nasoḥ prāṇo 'kṣyoś cakṣuḥ karṇayoḥ śrotraṃ bāhuvor balam ūruvor ojo 'riṣṭā viśvāny aṅgāni tanūs tanuvā me saha namas te astu mā mā hiṃsīr iti
3.25.8	mayi prāṇā mayi prāṇā iti vā
3.25.9	āhṛtaṃ brahmabhāgaṃ prāśitraharaṇe nidadhāti
3.25.10	athānvāhāryaṃ yācati
3.25.11	tam antarvedy āsannam abhimantrayate
3.26.1	brahman brahmāsi namas te brahman brahmaṇe pāhi mām ahutādya sarvo mahyaṃ huto bhaveti
3.26.2	athāsya yāvanmātram avadāya prāśitraharaṇe nidadhāti śrīr asy ehi mām abhy annavān annādo bhūyāsam iti
3.26.3	athainam agreṇa sruca udañcaṃ nīyamānam anumantrayate yajño divaṃ rohatu yajño divaṃ gacchatu yo devayānaḥ panthās tena yajño devāṃ apyetv iti
3.26.4	sa yatrāha brahman prasthāsyāmaḥ samidham ādhāyāgnīd agnīn sakṛtsakṛt saṃmṛḍḍhīti tad brahmā prasauti deva savitar etat te prāha tat pra ca suva pra ca yaja bṛhaspatir brahmā sa yajñaṃ pāhi sa yajñapatiṃ pāhi sa māṃ pāhy oṃ pratiṣṭheti
3.26.5	pracarateti pravargye
3.26.6	so 'traivāsta ā samiṣṭayajuṣo homād dhute samiṣṭayajuṣy upotthāyāhavanīyam upatiṣṭhate 'yāḍ yajñaṃ haviṣo jātavedā adabdho 'ntataḥ pūrvo asmin niṣadya / sanvan saniṃ suvimucā no vimuñca dhehy asmāsu draviṇaṃ jātavedo yac ca bhadram iti
3.26.7	sa etenaiva brahmā bhavati darśapūrṇamāsayor iṣṭīnāṃ cāturmāsyānāṃ paśubandhasya sautrāmaṇyā iti
3.27.1	havīṃṣy āsādya hotāram āmantrayate
3.27.2	sa yajñopavīty apa ācamya hastau saṃmṛśate karmaṇe vāṃ devebhyaḥ śakeyaṃ śaktyai vāṃ sukṛtāya vām iti
3.27.3	atha dvābhyām ātmany agniṃ gṛhṇīte mayi gṛhṇāmy agre agniṃ yo no agnir iti
3.27.4	athāntareṇa vedyutkarau prapadyate satyaṃ prapadya ṛtaṃ prapadye 'mṛtaṃ prapadye prajāpateḥ priyāṃ tanuvam anārtāṃ prapadya idam ahaṃ pañcadaśena vajreṇa dviṣantaṃ bhrātṛvyam avakrāmāmi yo 'smān dveṣṭi yaṃ ca vayaṃ dviṣmo bhūr bhuvaḥ suvar viṣṇo sthāne tiṣṭhāmīti
3.27.5	dakṣiṇena prapadenottaraṃ vedyantam avakramya tiṣṭhati
3.27.6	yadā jānāty agnaye samidhyamānāyānubrūhīti tadedaṃ hautraṃ japati kaṃ prapadye taṃ prapadye yat te prajāpate śaraṇaṃ chandas tat prapadye yāvat te viṣṇo veda tāvat te kariṣyāmi devena savitrā prasūta ārtvijyaṃ kariṣyāmi namo 'gnaya upadraṣṭre namo vāyava upaśrotre nama ādityāyānukhyātre juṣṭām adya devebhyo vācam udyāsaṃ śuśrūṣeṇyāṃ manuṣyebhyaḥ svadhāvatīṃ pitṛbhyaḥ pratiṣṭhāṃ viśvasmai bhūtāya bhūr bhuvaḥ suvaḥ praśāsta ātmanā prajayā paśubhiḥ prajāpatiṃ prapadye abhayaṃ me astu prājāpatyam anuvakṣyāmi vācaṃ prapadye vāg ārtvijyaṃ kariṣyati yaśase tvā dyumnāya tvendriyāya tvā bhūtyai tvā yajño yajñāya mahi śarma yacchatām iti
3.27.7	atra trir abhihiṅkṛtyānavānam abhi hiṅkārād ṛcam upasaṃdadhāti
3.27.8	pra vo vājā abhidyava iti triḥ prathamām anvāha
3.27.9	trir uttamām
3.27.10	sarvā ardharcaśo 'pāniti
3.27.11	anūktāsu sāmidhenīṣu devatā āvāhya bhūmau prādeśaṃ kṛtvopaviśatīdam ahaṃ gāyatreṇa chandasā trivṛtā stomena rathantareṇa sāmnā vaṣaṭkāreṇa vajreṇa dviṣantaṃ bhrātṛvyam avabādhe 'vabāḍho dviṣann iti
3.27.12	sa āhavanīyaṃ prekṣamāṇa āste praṇītā vobhayaṃ vāntareṇa
3.27.13	neti veti vā vīkṣate
3.27.14	anapragalbho hāsmāj jāyate
3.27.15	yadā jānāty agnir devo hotety etaj japati deva savitar etaṃ tvā vṛṇate 'gniṃ hotrāya saha pitrā vaiśvānareṇeti
3.27.16	athopotthāya dakṣiṇena hastena dakṣiṇe 'ṃse 'dhvaryum anvārabhate savyena dakṣiṇe 'ṃsa āgnīdhram
3.27.17	yady u vai svayaṃ pratyāśrāvayen nīvideśa enaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ śroṇyām anvārabhetāgnim anvārabhāmahe hotṛvūrye purohitam / yenāyann uttamaṃ svar devā aṅgiraso divam
3.27.18	devā deveṣu parākramadhvaṃ prathamā dvitīyeṣu dvitīyās tṛtīyeṣu trir ekādaśā anusaṃrabhadhvam iti
3.27.19	athādhvaryave nāma prabrūte
3.27.20	atha dakṣiṇam aṃsam abhi paryāvartate 'indrīm āvṛtam anvāvarta iti
3.27.21	atha hotṛṣadanam abhivrajañ japati
3.28.1	ṣaṇ morvīr aṃhasas pāntu dyauś ca pṛthivī cāhaś ca rātriś cāpaś cauṣadhayaś ca tā mā rakṣantu tā mā gopāyantu tābhyo nama iti
3.28.2	athāsanāt tṛṇaṃ nirasyati śuṣkaṃ vā praticchinnāgraṃ vā dakṣiṇāyai ca sandhim anu pratīcyai ca nirastaḥ parāvasur iti
3.28.3	athāpa upaspṛśyopastīryopaviśatīdam aham arvāvasoḥ sadane sīdāmīti dakṣiṇottarī
3.28.4	atha dakṣiṇāvṛd gārhapatyaṃ pratīkṣate viśvakarmaṃs tanūpā asi tanuvaṃ me pāhīti
3.28.5	ubhau samīkṣata āhavanīyaṃ cāgnāviṣṇū mā vām avakramiṣam ojo 'śiṣṭaṃ vijihāthāṃ mā mā saṃtāptaṃ lokaṃ me lokakṛtau kṛṇutam iti
3.28.6	eṣa vāṃ loka iti manāg ivodaṅ sarpati
3.28.7	atha tisra ṛco japati viśve devāḥ śāstana mā yatheha hotā vṛto manavai yan niṣadya / pra me brūta bhāgadheyaṃ yathā vo yena pathā havyam ā vo vahāni
3.28.8	tad adya vācaḥ prathamaṃ masīya yenāsurāṃ abhi devā asāma / ūrjāda uta yajñiyāsaḥ pañca janā mama hotraṃ juṣadhvam
3.28.9	namo mahadbhyo namo arbhakebhyo namo yuvabhyo nama āśinebhyaḥ / yajāma devān yadi śaknavāma mā jyāyasaḥ śaṃsam ā vṛkṣi devā iti
3.28.10	atha srugādāpanena srucāv ādāpya yathādevataṃ haviṣo yajati
3.28.11	atha vaṣaṭkārāṇām anumantraṇo vaṣaṭkāra mā me pravṛṇmo ahaṃ tvāṃ bṛhatā mana upahvaye mātariśvanā prāṇān na me vācaṃ havyaṃ devebhyo 'bhivahāmy ojaḥ sahaḥ saha ojo vāg iti
3.28.12	yady u vā abhyagrā vaṣaṭkārāḥ syur etāvataivānumantrayata ojaḥ saha ojo vāg iti
3.28.13	atha hotur dvir aṅgulāv anakti
3.28.14	yat pūrvāktaṃ tad uttaroṣṭhe prohati vācaspataye tvā hutaṃ prāśnāmīṣe prāṇāyeti
3.28.15	sadasaspataye tvā hutaṃ prāśnāmy ūrje 'pānāyety adharoṣṭhe 'pohati
3.28.16	athāpa upaspṛśya caturavāntareḍām avadāpayate 'prasṛtena pāṇināsamastena
3.28.17	iḍāṃ mukhasaṃmitām upahvayate
3.29.1	upahūtaṃ rathantaraṃ saha pṛthivyā sahāgninā sahānnādyena saha vācopa mā rathantaraṃ saha pṛthivyā sahāgninā sahānnādyena saha vācā hvayatām
3.29.2	upahūtaṃ vāmadevyaṃ sahāntarikṣeṇa saha vāyunā saha prāṇena saha paśubhir upa mā vāmadevyaṃ sahāntarikṣeṇa saha vāyunā saha prāṇena saha paśubhir hvayatām
3.29.3	upahūtaṃ bṛhat saha divā sahādityena saha cakṣuṣopa mā bṛhat saha divā sahādityena saha cakṣuṣā hvayatām
3.29.4	upahūtaṃ sthāsnu bhuvanam upa mā sthāsnu bhuvanaṃ hvayatām
3.29.5	upahūtaṃ cariṣṇu bhuvanam upa mā cariṣṇu bhuvanaṃ hvayatām
3.29.6	upahūtāḥ sapta hotrā upa mā sapta hotrā hvayantām
3.29.7	upahūtā gāvaḥ sahāśirā upa mā gāvaḥ sahāśirā hvayantām
3.29.8	upahūtā dhenuḥ saharṣabhopa mā dhenuḥ saharṣabhā hvayatām
3.29.9	upahūteḍā vṛṣṭir upa mām iḍā vṛṣṭir hvayatām
3.29.10	upahūto bhakṣaḥ sakhopa mā bhakṣaḥ sakhā hvayatām
3.29.11	upahūtāṃ ho iḍā
3.29.12	upahūtā he sāsi juṣasva meḍa ity upāṃśūktvoccair niruktām upahvayate
3.29.13	sa yadi sarvāṃ prāśiṣyan syāt pāṇau kṛtāni prāśya camasād eva prāśnīyāt
3.29.14	atha yadi ditsed vā nidhitseta vā puroḍāśaśakalam avacchidyaiva prāśnīyād iḍāsi syonāsi syonakṛt sā no rāyaspoṣe suprajāstve dhā mukhasya tvā dyumnāya surabhyāsyatvāya prāśnāmīti
3.29.15	prāśyāpa ācamya prācīṃ vodīcīṃ vodakarājiṃ ninayati tūṣṇīm iti nv evājyasya vacaḥ
3.29.16	athāpy etaṃ japaṃ japati mano jyotir juṣatām ājyaṃ vicchinnaṃ yajñaṃ sam imaṃ dadhātu / bṛhaspatis tanutām imaṃ no viśve devā iha mādayantām iti
3.29.17	anūyājān iṣṭvā śaṃyuvākam uktvā barhiṣy añjaliṃ kṛtvā nihnute yajña śaṃ ca ma upa ca me prajāpate yajña yat te nyūnaṃ yad u te 'tiriktaṃ karma prajāpatau yajña tad iti
3.29.18	atha dakṣiṇārdhe vedyai vedaṃ nidhāya yajamānaṃ vācayati
3.30.1	yena tvaṃ deva veda devebhyo vedo 'bhavas tenāsmabhyaṃ veda edhi / vedo 'si vittir asi videyāhaṃ prajāṃ paśūn svargaṃ lokam / karmāsi karuṇam asi kriyāsam ahaṃ puṇyaṃ karma / sanir asi sanitāsi saneyam aham ado ghṛtavantaṃ kulāyinaṃ rāyaspoṣaṃ sahasriṇaṃ vedo dadātu vājinam iti
3.30.2	patnīsaṃyājān iṣṭvā phalīkarahome hute vede patnīṃ vācayati vedo 'si vittir asi videyāham adaḥ / karmāsi karuṇam asi kriyāsam aham adaḥ sanir asi sanitāsi saneyam aham ado ghṛtavantaṃ kulāyinaṃ rāyaspoṣaṃ sahasriṇaṃ vedo dadātu vājinam iti
3.30.3	visrasya vedam ardhāni patnyai prayacchati
3.30.4	tāni patny antarorū vā nyasyati dakṣiṇena voruṇopanigṛhṇīte
3.30.5	athetarāṇi prāṅ āvṛtta stṛṇann eti tantuṃ tanvan rajaso bhānum anvihi jyotiṣmataḥ patho rakṣa dhiyā kṛtān anulbaṇaṃ vayata joguvām apo manur bhava janayā daivyaṃ janam iti
3.30.6	atha yāny atiśiṣyante tāni barhiṣi saṃnyasyaty āpṛṇo 'si saṃpṛṇa prajayā mā paśubhir āpṛṇeti
3.30.7	atha yathāprapannaṃ niṣkramyāgreṇāhavanīyaṃ parītya dakṣiṇata udaṅmukhas tiṣṭhann āhavanīyam upatiṣṭhate 'yāḍ yajñaṃ haviṣo jātavedā adabdho 'ntataḥ pūrvo asmin niṣadya / sanvan saniṃ suvimucā no vimuñca dhehy asmāsu draviṇaṃ jātavedo yac ca bhadram
3.30.8	etenāgne brahmaṇā vāvṛdhasva śaktī vā yat te cakṛmā vidā vā / uta praṇeṣy abhi vasyo asmān saṃ naḥ sṛja sumatyā vājavatyā
3.30.9	ye te śataṃ varuṇa ye sahasraṃ yajñiyāḥ pāśā vitatā mahāntaḥ / tebhir no agnir indro bṛhaspatir viśve muñcantu marutaḥ svarkā iti
3.30.10	ete nv eva japā darśapūrṇamāsayor iṣṭīnāṃ cāturmāsyānāṃ paśubandhasya sautrāmaṇyā iti
3.31.1	atha paśāv upadhīyante
3.31.2	yadā jānāty agnaye mathyamānāyānubrūhīti tad ete ṛcau japati yad vo vayaṃ pramināma vratāni
3.31.3	yat pākatrā manasā dīnadakṣā na yajñasya manvate martyāsaḥ / agniṣ ṭad dhotā kratuvid vijānan yajiṣṭho devāṃ ṛtuśo yajātīti
3.31.4	maitrāvaruṇadaṇḍe 'dhvaryur yajamānaṃ vācayati tvāṃ gāvo 'vṛṇata rājyāya tvāṃ havanta marutaḥ svarkāḥ / varṣman kṣatrasya kakubhi śiśriyāṇas tato na ugro vibhajā vasūnīti
3.31.5	tam agre gṛhītvā maitrāvaruṇāya prayacchati mitrāvaruṇayos tvā praśāstroḥ praśiṣā prayacchāmīti
3.31.6	taṃ sa sthūrataḥ pratigṛhṇāti mitrāvaruṇayos tvā praśāstroḥ praśiṣā pratigṛhṇāmīti dakṣiṇottarī
3.31.7	athainam ūrdhvam unmārṣṭy avakro 'vidhuro bhūyāsam iti
3.31.8	tam ādāya saṃpreṣyati hotā yakṣad agniṃ samidhā suṣamidhā samiddham itīdhmāntaṃ paśoḥ
4.1.1	paśunā yakṣyamāṇo bhavati
4.1.2	sa upakalpayate pautudravān paridhīn gulgulu sugandhitejanaṃ śuklām ūrṇāstukāṃ yā petvasyāntarā śṛṅge dve raśane dviguṇāṃ ca triguṇāṃ ca dve vapāśrapaṇī viśākhāṃ cāviśākhāṃ ca hṛdayaśūlaṃ kārṣmaryamayān paridhīn audumbaraṃ maitrāvaruṇadaṇḍaṃ mukhena saṃmitam idhmābarhir idhmaṃ praṇayanīyaṃ plakṣaśākhām iḍasūnaṃ yavān yavamatībhyaḥ saktūn saktuhomāya pṛṣadājyāya dadhi hiraṇyam iti
4.1.3	athāmāvāsyena vā haviṣeṣṭvā nakṣatre vā gārhapatya ājyaṃ vilāpyotpūya sruci caturgṛhītaṃ gṛhītvā ṣaḍḍhotāraṃ manasānudrutyāhavanīye juhoty anvārabdhe yajamāne svāheti
4.1.4	aparaṃ caturgṛhītaṃ gṛhītvā yūpāhutiṃ juhoty uru viṣṇo vikramasvoru kṣayāya naḥ kṛdhi / ghṛtaṃ ghṛtayone piba prapra yajñapatiṃ tira svāheti
4.1.5	aparaṃ caturgṛhītaṃ gṛhītvātha yācaty ājyasthālīṃ sasruvāṃ barhir hiraṇyam udapātram
4.1.6	hvayanti takṣāṇaṃ saparaśum
4.1.7	āhaihi yajamāneti pūrvayā dvāropaniṣkramya tāṃ diśaṃ yanti yatrāsya yūpa spaṣṭo bhavati yatra vā vetsyan manyate
4.1.8	sa yaḥ same bhūmyai svād yone rūḍho bahuparṇo bahuśākho 'pratiśuṣkāgraḥ pratyaṅṅ upanatas tam upatiṣṭhate 'ty anyān agāṃ nānyān upāgām arvāk tvā parair avidaṃ paro 'varais taṃ tvā juṣe vaiṣṇavaṃ devayajyāyā iti
4.1.9	athainam ājyenānakti devas tvā savitā madhvānaktv iti
4.1.10	ūrdhvāgraṃ barhir anūcchrayaty oṣadhe trāyasvainam iti
4.1.11	svadhitinā tiryañcaṃ praharati svadhite mainaṃ hiṃsīr iti
4.1.12	yaḥ prathamaḥ śakalaḥ parāpatati taṃ prajñātaṃ nidadhāti
4.1.13	tam aparibhindann anakṣasaṅgaṃ vṛścati
4.1.14	prāñcaṃ vodañcaṃ vā prayāntam anumantrayate divam agreṇa mā lekhīr antarikṣaṃ madhyena mā hiṃsīḥ pṛthivyā saṃbhaveti
4.1.15	athāvraścane hiraṇyaṃ nidhāya saṃparistīryābhijuhoti vanaspate śatavalśo viroha svāheti
4.1.16	sahasravalśā vi vayaṃ ruhemety ātmānaṃ pratyabhimṛśate
4.1.17	anvagraṃ śākhāḥ prasūdayati yaṃ tvāyaṃ svadhitis tetijānaḥ praṇināya mahate saubhagāyeti
4.1.18	pañcāratniṃ tasmai vṛśced iti
4.1.19	eṣa brāhmaṇavatām avamaḥ
4.1.20	taṃ pariṣvaṅgaparamaṃ prādeśāvamaṃ caṣālasya kāle parivāsayaty acchinno rāyaḥ suvīra iti
4.1.21	yat paraṃ bhavati tasya caturaṅgulaṃ caṣālāya pracchedayati
4.1.22	taṃ caturaśriṃ vāṣṭāśriṃ vā kṛtvāvāhayaty ā vā hārayati
4.1.23	ohya nistiṣṭhati
4.1.24	avatakṣaṇānām eva svaruṃ kurute
4.1.25	athāsyaiṣā pūrvedyur eva paśubandhikī vedir vimitā bhavati
4.1.26	daśapadā paścāttiraścī dvādaśapadā prācy aṣṭāpadā purastāttiraścī
4.1.27	tāṃ paristīrya stambayajur harati
4.2.1	idam eva prasiddhaṃ pauroḍāśikam
4.2.2	trir yajuṣā tūṣṇīṃ caturtham
4.2.3	pūrvaṃ parigrāhaṃ parigṛhṇāti
4.2.4	karaṇaṃ japati
4.2.5	uddhanti
4.2.6	uddhatād āgnīdhras trir harati
4.2.7	yad āgnīdhras trir haraty atha yācati sphyam udapātraṃ barhiḥ śamyām iti
4.2.8	etat samādāyāhaihi yajamāneti
4.2.9	uttareṇa vediṃ dvayor vā triṣu vā prakrameṣu sphyenoddhatyāvokṣya śamyayā cātvālaṃ parimimīte
4.2.10	vittāyanī me 'sīti purastād udīcīnakumbayāntarata sphyenālikhati
4.2.11	tiktāyanī me 'sīti dakṣiṇataḥ prācīnakumbayāntarata sphyenālikhati
4.2.12	avatān mā nāthitam iti paścād udīcīnakumbayāntarata sphyenālikhati
4.2.13	avatān mā vyathitam ity uttarataḥ prācīnakumbayāntarata sphyenālikhati
4.2.14	atha cātvāle barhir nidhāya tasmin sphyena praharati vider agnir nabho nāmāgne aṅgiro yo 'syāṃ pṛthivyām asīti
4.2.15	ādatta āyuṣā nāmnehīti
4.2.16	hṛtvottaravedyāṃ nivapati yat te 'nādhṛṣṭaṃ nāma yajñiyaṃ tena tvādadha iti
4.2.17	dvitīyaṃ praharati vider agnir nabho nāmāgne aṅgiro yo dvitīyasyāṃ pṛthivyām asīti
4.2.18	ādatta āyuṣā nāmnehīti
4.2.19	hṛtvottaravedyāṃ nivapati yat te 'nādhṛṣṭaṃ nāma yajñiyaṃ tena tvādadha iti
4.2.20	tṛtīyaṃ praharati vider agnir nabho nāmāgne aṅgiro yas tṛtīyasyāṃ pṛthivyām asīti
4.2.21	ādatta āyuṣā nāmnehīti
4.2.22	hṛtvottaravedyāṃ nivapati yat te 'nādhṛṣṭaṃ nāma yajñiyaṃ tena tvādadha iti
4.2.23	tūṣṇīṃ caturthaṃ harati saha barhiṣāthādhvaryu sphyena cātvālāt purīṣam uddhanti
4.2.24	athāgnīdhram āhāgnīd itas trir hareti
4.2.25	tatas trir āgnīdhro harati
4.2.26	yad āgnīdhras trir haraty athādhvaryur uttaravedyai purīṣaṃ saṃprayauti siṃhīr asi mahiṣīr asīti
4.2.27	prathayaty uru prathasvoru te yajñapatiḥ prathatām iti
4.2.28	sphyena saṃhanti dhruvāsīti
4.2.29	athainām adbhir avokṣati
4.2.30	devebhyaḥ śundhasveti devebhyaḥ śumbhasveti sikatābhir anuprakirati
4.2.31	tāṃ prādeśamātrīṃ caturaśrāṃ niṣṭhāya śamyayā parimimīte
4.2.32	uttaranābhim utsādya
4.2.33	athaināṃ praticchādyābhrim ādatte devasya tvā savituḥ prasave 'śvinor bāhubhyāṃ pūṣṇo hastābhyām ādada iti
4.2.34	ādāyābhimantrayate 'bhrir asi nārir asīti
4.2.35	tayā yūpāvaṭaṃ parilikhati yathāntarvedy ardhaṃ syād bahirvedy ardhaṃ parilikhitaṃ rakṣaḥ parilikhitā arātaya idam ahaṃ rakṣaso grīvā api kṛntāmi yo 'smān dveṣṭi yaṃ ca vayaṃ dviṣma idam asya grīvā api kṛntāmīti
4.2.36	athāgnīdhram āhāgnīd ehīmaṃ yūpāvaṭaṃ khanoparasaṃmitaṃ prāk purīṣam udvapatāc caturaṅgulenoparam atikhanatād iti
4.2.37	taṃ sa khanati vā khānayati vā
4.2.38	yāvad evātrādhvaryuś ceṣṭati tāvad eṣa pratiprasthātābhyādadhātīdhmaṃ praṇayanīyam
4.2.39	upopayamanīḥ kalpayanti cātvālāt
4.2.40	ātmanendraghoṣavatīḥ prokṣaṇīr adhvaryur ādatte
4.2.41	parikarmiṇe pañcagṛhītam ājyaṃ prayacchati
4.2.42	brahmaṇi saṃbhārā bhavanti
4.2.43	atha saṃpraiṣam āhāgnaye praṇīyamānāyānubrūhy agnīd ekasphyayānusaṃdhehīti
4.2.44	triruktāyām udyacchante
4.2.45	hoturvaśaṃ yanti
4.2.46	uttareṇa vediṃ pratipadyante
4.2.47	dhārayanty etam agnim
4.2.48	athādhvaryur indraghoṣavatībhiḥ prokṣaṇībhir uttaravediṃ prokṣati
4.3.1	indraghoṣas tvā vasubhiḥ purastāt pātv iti purastāt
4.3.2	manojavās tvā pitṛbhir dakṣiṇataḥ pātv iti dakṣiṇataḥ
4.3.3	pracetās tvā rudraiḥ paścāt pātv iti paścāt
4.3.4	viśvakarmā tvādityair uttarataḥ pātv ity uttarataḥ
4.3.5	atha yat prokṣaṇīnām ucchiṣyate tad dakṣiṇata uttaravedyai ninayati
4.3.6	yad eva tatra krūraṃ tat tena śamayatīti brāhmaṇam
4.3.7	athaināṃ hiraṇyam antardhāyākṣṇayā pañcagṛhītena vyāghārayati
4.3.8	siṃhīr asi sapatnasāhī svāheti dakṣiṇe 'ṃse
4.3.9	siṃhīr asi suprajāvaniḥ svāhety uttarasyāṃ śroṇyām
4.3.10	siṃhīr asi rāyaspoṣavaniḥ svāheti dakṣiṇasyāṃ śroṇyām
4.3.11	siṃhīr asy ādityavaniḥ svāhety uttare 'ṃse
4.3.12	siṃhīr asy āvaha devān devayate yajamānāya svāheti madhye
4.3.13	atha bhūtebhyas tveti srucam udgṛhṇāti
4.3.14	atha pautudravān paridhīn paridadhāti
4.3.15	viśvāyur asi pṛthivīṃ dṛṃheti madhyamam
4.3.16	dhruvakṣid asy antarikṣaṃ dṛṃheti dakṣiṇam
4.3.17	acyutakṣid asi divaṃ dṛṃhety uttaram
4.3.18	athātiśiṣṭān saṃbhārān nivapati gulgulu sugandhitejanaṃ śuklām ūrṇāstukām agner bhasmāsy agneḥ purīṣam asīti
4.3.19	athainān saṃsrāveṇābhighārayati
4.3.20	atha pradakṣiṇam āvṛtyedhmaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati yajña pratitiṣṭha sumatau suśevā suśevāḥ ā tvā vasūni purudhā viśantu / dīrgham āyur yajamānāya kṛṇvann athāmṛtena jaritāram aṅdhīti
4.3.21	athainaṃ visrasyāhutiṣāhaṃ kṛtvādhvarāhutibhir abhijuhoti
4.3.22	agnir yajñaṃ nayatu prajānan mainaṃ yajñahano vidan / devebhyaḥ prabrūtād yajñaṃ prapra yajñapatiṃ tira svāhā
4.3.23	vāyur yajñaṃ nayatu prajānan mainaṃ yajñahano vidan / devebhyaḥ prabrūtād yajñaṃ prapra yajñapatiṃ tira svāhā
4.3.24	sūryo yajñaṃ nayatu prajānan mainaṃ yajñahano vidan / devebhyaḥ prabrūtād yajñaṃ prapra yajñapatiṃ tira svāhā
4.3.25	yajño yajñaṃ nayatu prajānan mainaṃ yajñahano vidan / devebhyaḥ prabrūtād yajñaṃ prapra yajñapatiṃ tira svāheti
4.3.26	athaitā yajamāna eva svayaṃ juhoty agnir annādo 'nnapatir annasyeśe sa me 'nnaṃ dadātu svāhā / vāyuḥ prāṇadāḥ prāṇasyeśe sa me prāṇaṃ dadātu svāhā / ādityo bhūridā bhūyiṣṭhānāṃ paśūnām īśe sa me bhūyiṣṭhān paśūn dadātu svāheti
4.3.27	agnivaty uttaraṃ parigrāhaṃ parigṛhya yoyupitvā tiryañcaṃ sphyaṃ stabdhvā saṃpraiṣam āha prokṣaṇīr āsādayedhmābarhir upasādaya sruvaṃ svadhitiṃ srucaś ca saṃmṛḍḍhi tūṣṇīṃ pṛṣadājyagrahaṇīṃ patnīṃ saṃnahyājyena ca dadhnā codehīti
4.3.28	āhṛtāsu prokṣaṇīṣūdasya sphyaṃ mārjayitvedhmābarhir upasādya pradakṣiṇam āvṛtya pratyaṅṅ ādrutya sruvaṃ svadhitiṃ srucaś ca saṃmārṣṭi tūṣṇīṃ pṛṣadājyagrahaṇīm
4.3.29	patnīṃ saṃnahyājyena ca dadhnā codetyājyaṃ ca prokṣaṇīś cotpūya prasiddham ājyāni gṛhītvā pṛṣadājyagrahaṇyām upastṛṇīte mahīnāṃ payo 'sīti
4.3.30	viśveṣāṃ devānāṃ tanūr iti dvitīyam
4.3.31	barhiṣī antardhāya dadhy ānayaty ṛdhyāsam adya pṛṣatīnāṃ grahaṃ pṛṣatīnāṃ graho 'sīti
4.3.32	apoddhṛtya barhiṣī athābhighārayati viṣṇor hṛdayam asīti
4.3.33	ekam iṣa viṣṇus tvānu vicakrama iti dvitīyam
4.4.1	atha prokṣaṇībhir upottiṣṭhatīdhmaṃ prokṣati
4.4.2	vediṃ prokṣati barhiḥ prokṣati
4.4.3	barhir āsannaṃ prokṣyopaninīya purastāt prastaraṃ gṛhṇāti
4.4.4	pañcavidhaṃ barhi stīrtvā prastarapāṇiḥ prāṅ abhisṛpya kārṣmaryamayān paridhīn paridadhāti
4.4.5	ūrdhve samidhāv ādadhāti
4.4.6	vidhṛtī tiraścī sādayati
4.4.7	vidhṛtyoḥ prastaram
4.4.8	prastare juhūm
4.4.9	barhiṣītarāḥ
4.4.10	etā asadann iti samabhimṛśya pradakṣiṇam āvṛtya pratyaṅṅ ādrutya yācati yavamatīḥ prokṣaṇīr barhirhastam ājyasthālīṃ sasruvāṃ svaruraśanaṃ maitrāvaruṇadaṇḍaṃ yūpaśakalaṃ hiraṇyam udapātram iti
4.4.11	etat saṃnidhāya yūpaṃ prakṣālayati yat te śikvaḥ parāvadhīt takṣā hastena vāsyā / āpas te tad vanaspate 'panudantu śundhanīr iti
4.4.12	yūpa eṣa prakṣālitaḥ prapannaḥ saṃpannacaṣālaḥ prāg avaṭād upaśete
4.4.13	tam uttareṇāhavanīyaṃ tiṣṭhan parāñcaṃ prokṣati pṛthivyai tvāntarikṣāya tvā dive tveti
4.4.14	avaṭe 'po 'vanayati śundhatāṃ lokaḥ pitṛṣadana iti
4.4.15	yavān praskandayati yavo 'si yavayāsmad dveṣo yavayārātīr iti
4.4.16	barhirhastaṃ vyatiṣajyāvastṛṇāti pitṝṇāṃ sadanam asīti
4.4.17	athainad dhiraṇyam antardhāya sruvāhutyābhijuhoti pitṛbhyaḥ svāheti
4.4.18	yūpaśakalam avāsyati svāveśo 'sy agregā netṝṇāṃ vanaspatir adhi tvā sthāsyati tasya vittād iti
4.4.19	athādatta ājyasthālīṃ sasruvāṃ svaruraśanaṃ maitrāvaruṇadaṇḍam udapātram iti
4.4.20	etat samādāyāhaihi yajamāneti
4.4.21	anvag yajamāno 'nūcī patny agreṇa yūpaṃ parītya dakṣiṇata udaṅmukhās tiṣṭhanti pūrva evādhvaryur aparo yajamāno 'parā patnī
4.4.22	atha pravṛhya caṣālaṃ yūpasyāgram anakti devas tvā savitā madhvānaktv ity antarataś ca bāhyataś ca
4.4.23	svabhyaktaṃ kṛtvā caṣālaṃ pratimuñcati supippalābhyas tvauṣadhībhya iti
4.4.24	atha sruveṇāgniṣṭhām aśrim abhighārayann āha yūpāyājyamānāyānubrūhīti
4.4.25	āntam anakty āntam eva yajamānaṃ tejasānakti
4.4.26	noparam anakti
4.4.27	patny uparam anakti
4.4.28	sarvataḥ parimṛśaty aparivargam evāsmin tejo dadhātīti brāhmaṇam
4.4.29	ucchrayann āhocchrīyamāṇāyānubrūhīti
4.4.30	ucchrayaty ud divaṃ stabhānāntarikṣaṃ pṛṇa pṛthivīm upareṇa dṛṃheti
4.4.31	athainaṃ vaiṣṇavībhyām ṛgbhyāṃ kalpayati te te dhāmāni viṣṇoḥ karmāṇi paśyateti dvābhyām
4.4.32	sa yatrāgniṣṭhām aśrim āhavanīyena saṃpādayati tad dhruvasya caṣālaṃ parekṣayati tad viṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padaṃ sadā paśyanti sūrayaḥ / divīva cakṣur ātatam iti
4.4.33	athainaṃ pradakṣiṇaṃ purīṣeṇa paryūhati brahmavaniṃ tvā kṣatravaniṃ suprajāvaniṃ rāyaspoṣavaniṃ paryūhāmīti
4.4.34	maitrāvaruṇadaṇḍena saṃhanti brahma dṛṃha kṣatraṃ dṛṃha prajāṃ dṛṃha rāyaspoṣaṃ dṛṃheti
4.4.35	anyūnam anatiriktaṃ parinyasyodapātram upaninīya
4.4.36	athaitāṃ triguṇāṃ raśanāṃ triḥ saṃbhujya madhyamena guṇena nābhidaghne parivyayann āha parivīyamāṇāyānubrūhīti
4.4.37	triḥ pradakṣiṇaṃ parivyayati parivīr asi pari tvā daivīr viśo vyayantāṃ parīmaṃ rāyaspoṣo yajamānaṃ manuṣyā iti
4.4.38	upānte vyatiṣajati
4.4.39	āntaṃ praveṣṭayati
4.4.40	aṇimati sthavimat pravayati
4.4.41	athottareṇāgniṣṭhām aśriṃ madhyame guṇe svarum avagūhaty antarikṣasya tvā sānāv avagūhāmīti
4.4.42	svarvantaṃ yūpam utsṛjati
4.5.1	athaitaṃ paśuṃ palpūlitam antareṇa cātvālotkarau prapādyāgreṇa yūpaṃ purastātpratyaṅmukham upasthāpayati
4.5.2	tam iṣe tveti barhiṣī ādāyopākaroty upavīr asy upo devān daivīr viśaḥ prāgur vahnīr uśijo bṛhaspate dhārayā vasūni havyā te svadantāṃ deva tvaṣṭar vasu raṇva revatī ramadhvaṃ prajāpater jāyamānā imaṃ paśuṃ paśupate te adyendrāgnibhyāṃ tvā juṣṭam upākaromīti
4.5.3	yaddevatyo vā bhavati
4.5.4	prajñāte barhiṣī nidhāyādhimanthanaṃ śakalaṃ nidadhāty agner janitram asīti
4.5.5	vṛṣaṇāv anvañcau vṛṣaṇau stha iti
4.5.6	athāraṇī ādatta urvaśy asy āyur asi purūravā iti
4.5.7	athaite ājyasthālyāṃ samanakti ghṛtenākte vṛṣaṇaṃ dadhāthām iti
4.5.8	atha prajātīr vācayati gāyatraṃ chando 'nu prajāyasva traiṣṭubhaṃ chando 'nu prajāyasva jāgataṃ chando 'nu prajāyasveti
4.5.9	athāhāgnaye mathyamānāyānubrūhīti
4.5.10	jāta āha jātāyānubrūhīti
4.5.11	praharann āha prahriyamāṇāyānubrūhīti
4.5.12	praharati bhavataṃ naḥ samanasāv iti
4.5.13	prahṛtyābhijuhoty agnāv agniś carati praviṣṭa iti
4.5.14	atha raśanām ādatte devasya tvā savituḥ prasave 'śvinor bāhubhyāṃ pūṣṇo hastābhyām ādada iti
4.5.15	tayākṣṇayā paśum abhidadhāti dakṣiṇam adhyardhaśīrṣam ṛtasya tvā devahaviḥ pāśenārabha iti
4.5.16	dviguṇāyai ca triguṇāyai cāntau saṃdadhāti dharṣā mānuṣān iti
4.5.17	niyunakti
4.5.18	athainam adbhiḥ prokṣaty adbhyas tvauṣadhībhya indrāgnibhyāṃ tvā juṣṭaṃ prokṣāmīti
4.5.19	yaddevatyo vā bhavati
4.5.20	pāyayaty apāṃ perur asīti
4.5.21	svāttaṃ cit sadevaṃ havyam āpo devīḥ svadatainam ity upariṣṭāt prokṣyādhastād upokṣati
4.5.22	sarvata evainaṃ medhyaṃ karotīti brāhmaṇam
4.5.23	udūhya prokṣaṇīdhānam
4.6.1	athedhmāt samidham ādadāna āhāgnaye samidhyamānāyānubrūhīti
4.6.2	abhyādadhātīdhmam
4.6.3	pari samidhaṃ śinaṣṭi
4.6.4	vedenopavājayati
4.6.5	anūktāsu sāmidhenīṣu sruveṇāghāram āghārayati
4.6.6	saṃmṛṣṭe srugbhyām uttaram
4.6.7	athāsaṃsparśayan srucāv udaṅṅ atyākramya juhvā paśuṃ samanakti
4.6.8	saṃ te prāṇo vāyunā gacchatām iti lalāṭe
4.6.9	saṃ yajatrair aṅgānīti kakudi
4.6.10	saṃ yajñapatir āśiṣeti dakṣiṇasyāṃ śroṇyām
4.6.11	atha yathāyatanaṃ srucau sādayitvā pravaraṃ pravṛṇīte
4.6.12	prasiddhaṃ hotāraṃ vṛṇīte
4.6.13	athāśrāvayaty o śrāvayāstu śrauṣaṇ mitrāvaruṇau praśāstārau praśāstrād ity asau mānuṣa iti maitrāvaruṇasya nāma gṛhṇāti
4.6.14	athāśrāvayati
4.6.15	yady atrātyāśrāvayaty o śrāvayāstu śrauṣaḍ agnir ha daivīnāṃ viśāṃ puraetāyaṃ yajamāno manuṣyāṇāṃ tayor asthūri gārhapatyaṃ dīdayac chataṃ himā dvā yū rādhāṃsīt saṃpṛñcānāv asaṃpṛñcānau tanva iti
4.6.16	sīdati hotā
4.6.17	prasavam ākāṅkṣati
4.6.18	prasūtaḥ srucāv ādāyātyākramyāśrāvyāha samidbhyaḥ preṣyeti
4.6.19	vaṣaṭkṛte juhoti preṣya preṣyeti
4.6.20	caturthāṣṭamayoḥ samānayamāno 'ṣṭame sarvaṃ samānayate
4.6.21	pari svāhākṛtībhyaḥ saṃsrāvaṃ śinaṣṭi
4.6.22	daśa prayājān iṣṭvodaṅṅ atyākramya svaruṃ ca śāsaṃ ca yācati
4.6.23	tau juhvām aṅktvā tābhyāṃ paśuṃ samanakti ghṛtenāktau paśuṃ trāyethām iti
4.6.24	prayacchati śāsam
4.6.25	avagūhati svarum
4.6.26	atha yathāyatanaṃ srucau sādayitvāha paryagnaye kriyamāṇāyānubrūhīti
4.6.27	athaiṣa āgnīdhra āhavanīyād ulmukam ādāyāntareṇa cātvālotkarāv uttareṇa śāmitradeśam agreṇa paśuṃ jaghanena sruca ity evaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇaṃ paryeti
4.6.28	athānuparisaraṇam apāvyāni juhoti prajānantaḥ pratigṛhṇanti pūrve yeṣām īśe paśupatiḥ paśūnāṃ ye badhyamānam anu badhyamānā ya āraṇyāḥ paśavo viśvarūpāḥ pramuñcamānā bhuvanasya reta iti
4.6.29	nidhāyāgnīdhra ulmukaṃ yathetaṃ triḥ punaḥ pratiparyeti
4.6.30	atholmukaprathamāḥ pratipadyante
4.6.31	anvak chamitā paśunā
4.6.32	paśum adhvaryur vapāśrapaṇībhyām anvārabhate
4.6.33	vapāśrapaṇī yajamānaḥ
4.6.34	athāśrāvya saṃpreṣyaty upapreṣya hotar havyā devebhya iti
4.6.35	athaitaṃ paśum antareṇa cātvālotkarāv udañcaṃ nīyamānam anumantrayate nānā prāṇo yajamānasya paśunā revatīr yajñapatiṃ priyadhā viśateti dvābhyām
4.6.36	sa yatraitad āgnīdhra ulmukaṃ nidadhāti tad agreṇa vottareṇa vā paśave nihanyamānāya barhir upāsyati pṛthivyāḥ saṃpṛcaḥ pāhīti
4.6.37	tad etaṃ paśuṃ pratīcīnaśirasam udīcīnapādaṃ nighnanty akṛṇvantaṃ māyuṃ saṃjñapayatety uktvaitenaiva yathetam etya pṛṣadājyāvakāśa āsata iha prajā viśvarūpā ramantām asmin yajñe viśvavido ghṛtācīḥ / agniṃ kulāyam abhisaṃvasānā asmāṃ avantu payasā ghṛteneti
4.6.38	saṃjñaptaṃ prāhuḥ
4.6.39	juhoti saṃjñaptāhutiṃ yat paśur māyum akṛteti
4.6.40	athābhyaiti śamitāra upetaneti
4.6.41	pāśāt paśuṃ pramucyamānam anumantrayate 'ditiḥ pāśaṃ pramumoktv etam iti
4.6.42	aviśākhayopasajyemāṃ diśaṃ nirasyaty arātīyantam adharaṃ kṛṇomi yaṃ dviṣmas tasmin pratimuñcāmi pāśam iti
4.6.43	atha pratiprasthātā patnīm udānayaty udakamaṇḍalum utthāpya
4.6.44	athainām ādityam udīkṣayati namas ta ātāneti
4.6.45	athainām antareṇa cātvālotkarāv udaṅṅ upaniṣkramya prācīm udānayan vācayaty anarvā prehi ghṛtasya kulyām anu saha prajayā saha rāyaspoṣeṇeti
4.6.46	āgatām adhvaryur apsu vācayaty āpo devīḥ śuddhāyuvaḥ śuddhā yūyaṃ devāṃ ūḍhvaṃ śuddhā vayaṃ pariviṣṭāḥ pariveṣṭāro vo bhūyāsmeti
4.6.47	sānupūrvaṃ paśoḥ prāṇān āpyāyayati
4.6.48	vāk ta āpyāyatām iti vācam
4.6.49	prāṇas ta āpyāyatām iti prāṇam
4.6.50	cakṣus ta āpyāyatām iti cakṣuḥ
4.6.51	śrotraṃ ta āpyāyatām iti śrotram
4.6.52	etān eva punaḥ saṃmṛśati yā te prāṇāñ chug jagāma yā cakṣur yā śrotraṃ yat te krūraṃ yad āsthitaṃ tat ta ā pyāyatāṃ tat ta etena śundhatām iti
4.6.53	nābhis ta āpyāyatām iti nābhim
4.6.54	pāyus ta āpyāyatām iti pāyum
4.6.55	saṃpragṛhya padaḥ prakṣālayati śuddhāś caritrāḥ śam adbhyaḥ śam oṣadhībhyaḥ śaṃ pṛthivyā iti
4.6.56	śam ahobhyām ity atiśiṣṭā dakṣiṇato 'nupṛṣṭhaṃ ninayati
4.6.57	nayanti patnīm
4.6.58	uttānaṃ paśuṃ paryasyanti
4.6.59	tasya dakṣiṇasya pārśvasya vivṛttam anu prācīnāgraṃ barhir nidadhāty oṣadhe trāyasvainam iti
4.6.60	svadhitiṃ tiryañcaṃ nidadhāti svadhite mainaṃ hiṃsīr iti
4.6.61	chinatti barhiḥ
4.6.62	vi tvacaṃ kṛṇatti
4.6.63	athaitasyaiva barhiṣo 'ṇimat sacate
4.6.64	sthavimad ubhayato lohitenāṅktvemāṃ diśaṃ nirasyati rakṣasāṃ bhāgo 'sīdam ahaṃ rakṣo 'dhamaṃ tamo nayāmi yo 'smān dveṣṭi yaṃ ca vayaṃ dviṣma idam enam adhamaṃ tamo nayāmīti
4.6.65	athāpa upaspṛśya varīya ācchāyeṣe tveti vapām utkhidati
4.6.66	tayā vapāśrapaṇī prorṇoti ghṛtena dyāvāpṛthivī prorṇvāthām iti
4.6.67	aviśākhayopatṛdyādhastāt parivāsayaty acchinno rāyaḥ suvīra iti
4.6.68	athaināṃ pradakṣiṇam āvṛtyādbhir abhyukṣya śāmitre pratitapati
4.6.69	atholmukaprathamāḥ pratipadyante
4.7.1	anvag adhvaryur vapayā
4.7.2	atra vapāśrapaṇī punar anvārabhate yajamānaḥ
4.7.3	aity urv antarikṣam anvihīti
4.7.4	etyāhavanīyasyāntam eṣv aṅgāreṣu vapāyai pratitapyamānāyai barhiṣo 'gram upāsyati vāyo vīhi stokānām iti
4.7.5	athainām antareṇa yūpaṃ cāhavanīyaṃ copātihṛtya tāṃ dakṣiṇata udaṅmukhaḥ pratiprasthātā śrapayati
4.7.6	athaināṃ sruvāhutyābhijuhoti tvām u te dadhire havyavāham iti
4.7.7	athāha stokebhyo 'nubrūhīti
4.7.8	parihitāsu stokīyāsu śṛtāyāṃ vapāyāṃ juhūpabhṛtāv ādāyātyākramyāśrāvyāha svāhākṛtībhyaḥ preṣyeti
4.7.9	vaṣaṭkṛte juhoti
4.7.10	athodaṅṅ atyākramya saṃsrāveṇa pṛṣadājyam abhighārya vapām abhighārayati
4.7.11	athopastīrya dviḥ sruveṇa vapāṃ samavalumpann āhendrāgnibhyāṃ chāgasya vapāyā medaso 'vadīyamānasyānubrūhīti
4.7.12	dvir abhighārayati
4.7.13	atyākramyāśrāvyāhendrāgnibhyāṃ chāgasya vapāṃ medaḥ prasthitaṃ preṣyeti
4.7.14	atha purastātsvāhākṛtiṃ sruvāhutiṃ juhoti svāhā devebhya iti
4.7.15	vaṣaṭkṛte vapāṃ juhoti jātavedo vapayā gaccha devān tvaṃ hi hotā prathamo babhūtha / ghṛtena tvaṃ tanuvo vardhayasva svāhākṛtaṃ havir adantu devāḥ svāheti
4.7.16	athopariṣṭātsvāhākṛtiṃ sruvāhutiṃ juhoti devebhyaḥ svāheti
4.7.17	atra vapāśrapaṇī anupraharati prācīṃ viśākhāṃ pratīcīm aviśākhāṃ svāhordhvanabhasaṃ mārutaṃ gacchatam iti
4.7.18	athaine saṃsrāveṇābhijuhoti
4.7.19	athodaṅṅ atyākramya yathāyatanaṃ srucau sādayitvā samutkramya cātvāle mārjayante
4.7.20	hvayanti patnīṃ hvayanti hotāraṃ hvayanti brahmāṇaṃ hvayanti pratiprasthātāraṃ hvayanti praśāstāraṃ hvayanty āgnīdhram ehi yajamānetīdam āpaḥ pravahatāvadyaṃ ca malaṃ ca yat / yac cābhidudrohānṛtaṃ yac ca śepe abhīruṇam nir mā muñcāmi śapathān nir mā varuṇād uta / nir mā yamasya paḍbīśāt sarvasmād devakilbiṣād atho manuṣyakilbiṣād iti
4.7.21	athāñjalināpa upahanti sumitrā na āpa oṣadhayaḥ santv iti
4.7.22	tāṃ diśam nirukṣati yasyām asya diśi dveṣyo bhavati durmitrās tasmai bhūyāsur yo 'smān dveṣṭi yaṃ ca vayaṃ dviṣma iti
4.7.23	athāpa upaspṛśya yathāyatanam upaviśanti
4.8.1	atha saṃpraiṣam āhāgnīt paśupuroḍāśaṃ nirvapa pratiprasthātaḥ paśuṃ viśādhīti
4.8.2	nirvapaty eṣa āgnīdhra aindrāgnam ekādaśakapālam
4.8.3	atha pratiprasthātā paśuṃ viśāsti śamitar hṛdayaṃ jihvāṃ vakṣas tāni sārdhaṃ kurutāt tanima matasnau tāni sārdhaṃ savyaṃ dor ekacaraṃ kurutān nānā pārśve avadhattād dakṣiṇāṃ śroṇim adhyuddhiṃ kurutād dakṣiṇaṃ doḥ savyāṃ śroṇim aṇimad gudasya tāni tryaṅgāni kurutād vaniṣṭhuṃ ca jāghanīṃ cāvadhattād bahu yūḥ kurutāt triḥ paśuṃ pracyāvayatāt triḥ pracyutasya paśor hṛdayam uttamaṃ kurutād iti
4.8.4	śṛte paśau paśupuroḍāśaṃ yācati
4.8.5	tam upastīrṇābhighāritam udvāsyāntarvedy āsādayati
4.8.6	atha juhūpabhṛtor upastṛṇāna āhendrāgnibhyāṃ puroḍāśasyāvadīyamānasyānubrūhīti
4.8.7	pūrvārdhād avadāyāparārdhād avadyati
4.8.8	abhighārayati
4.8.9	pratyanakti
4.8.10	athopabhṛti sviṣṭakṛte sakṛd uttarārdhād avadyati
4.8.11	dvir abhighārayati
4.8.12	na pratyanakti
4.8.13	atyākramyāśrāvyāhendrāgnibhyāṃ puroḍāśaṃ prasthitaṃ preṣyeti
4.8.14	vaṣaṭkṛte juhoti
4.8.15	atha samāvapamāna āhāgnaye 'nubrūhīti
4.8.16	āśrāvyāhāgnaye preṣyeti
4.8.17	vaṣaṭkṛta uttarārdhapūrvārdhe 'tihāya pūrvā āhutīr juhoti
4.8.18	athodaṅṅ atyākramya yathāyatanaṃ srucau sādayitvā prāśitram avadāyeḍām avadyati
4.8.19	upahūtāyām iḍāyām agnīdha ādadhāti ṣaḍavattam
4.8.20	prāśnanti
4.8.21	mārjayante
4.8.22	atha saṃpraiṣam āhāgnīd uttarabarhir upasādaya pratiprasthātaḥ paśau saṃvadasveti
4.8.23	athaiṣa āgnīdhraḥ plakṣaśākhāyām iḍasūnam upagūhati
4.8.24	tad uttarabarhir bhavati
4.8.25	atha pratiprasthātā pṛṣadājyaṃ vihatya juhvāṃ samānīyāntareṇa cātvālotkarāv udaṅṅ upaniṣkramya pṛcchati śṛtaṃ havī3ḥ śamitar iti
4.8.26	śamitaiṣa uttarato hṛdayaśūlaṃ dhārayaṃs tiṣṭhati
4.8.27	sa śṛtam iti pratyāha
4.8.28	taṃ tathaiva dvitīyam utkramya pṛcchati
4.8.29	taṃ tathaivetaraḥ pratyāha
4.8.30	taṃ tathaiva tṛtīyam utkramya pṛcchati
4.8.31	taṃ tathaivetaraḥ pratyāhātha śamitur hṛdayaśūlam ādāya tena hṛdayam upatṛdya taṃ śamitre saṃpradāya pṛṣadājyena hṛdayam abhighārayati saṃ te manasā manaḥ saṃ prāṇena prāṇo juṣṭaṃ devebhyo havyaṃ ghṛtavat svāheti
4.8.32	viyūḥ kṛtvā haratety uktvaitenaiva yathetam etya catasṛṣūpastṛṇīte juhūpabhṛtor iḍādhāne yasmiṃś ca vasāhomaṃ grahīṣyan bhavati
4.8.33	āharanti taṃ paśum antareṇa cātvālotkarāv antareṇa yūpaṃ cāhavanīyaṃ copātihṛtya taṃ dakṣiṇataḥ pañcahotrāsādayati
4.8.34	etenaiva yūr āharanti
4.8.35	etenaiveḍasūnam
4.8.36	atha plakṣaśākhāyāṃ hṛdayaṃ nidhāya svadhitinā tasyāgre 'vadyann āha
4.9.1	manotāyai haviṣo 'vadīyamānasyānubrūhīti
4.9.2	hṛdayasyaivāgre dvir avadyati
4.9.3	atha jihvāyā atha vakṣaso 'tha tanimno 'tha vṛkyayor atha savyasya doṣṇo 'tha dakṣiṇasya pārśvasyātha savyasyātha dakṣiṇāyai śroṇer adhyuddhyai
4.9.4	traidhaṃ gudaṃ kṛtvāṇimat sviṣṭakṛte nidadhāti sthavimad upayaḍbhyo madhyaṃ dvaidhaṃ kṛtvā juhvām avadadhāti
4.9.5	atha vṛkyamedo yūṣann avadhāya tena juhūṃ prorṇoti
4.9.6	yūṣṇopasiñcati
4.9.7	abhighārayati

4.9.10	yūṣṇopasiñcati
4.9.11	dvir abhighārayati
4.9.12	atha hṛdayaṃ jihvāṃ vakṣas tanima matasnau vaniṣṭhum iti pātryāṃ samavadhāya yūṣṇopasiñcati
4.9.13	abhighārayati
4.9.14	atha kaṃse vā camase vā vasāhomaṃ gṛhṇāti
4.9.15	yūṣṇopasiñcati
4.9.16	abhighārayati
4.9.17	atha paśor avadānāni saṃmṛśaty aindraḥ prāṇo aṅgeaṅge nidedhyad aindro 'pāno aṅgeaṅge vibobhuvad deva tvaṣṭar bhūri te saṃsam etu viṣurūpā yat salakṣmāṇo bhavatha / devatrā yantam avase sakhāyo 'nu tvā mātā pitaro madantv iti
4.9.18	atha dakṣiṇena pārśvena vasāhomaṃ prayauti kumbataḥ śrīr asy agnis tvā śrīṇātv āpaḥ sam ariṇan vātasya tvā dhrajyai pūṣṇo raṃhyā apām oṣadhīnāṃ rohiṣyā iti
4.9.19	saṃmṛṣṭasya paśoḥ pratīcīṃ jāghanīṃ haranti
4.9.20	pratipariharanti paśum
4.9.21	atha juhūpabhṛtāv ādadāna āhendrāgnibhyāṃ chāgasya haviṣo 'nubrūhīti
4.9.22	atyākramyāśrāvyāhendrāgnibhyāṃ chāgasya haviḥ prasthitaṃ preṣyeti
4.9.23	pratiprasthātaiṣa uttarato vasāhomaṃ dhārayaṃs tiṣṭhati
4.9.24	so 'rdharce yājyāyai vasāhomaṃ juhoti ghṛtaṃ ghṛtapāvānaḥ pibata vasāṃ vasāpāvānaḥ pibatāntarikṣasya havir asi svāhā tvāntarikṣāya svāheti
4.9.25	vaṣaṭkṛte havir juhoti
4.9.26	etasya homam anu pratiprasthātā vasāhomodrekeṇa diśo juhoti diśaḥ pradiśa ādiśo vidiśa uddiśaḥ svāhā digbhyo namo digbhyaḥ svāheti
4.9.27	atha pradakṣiṇam āvṛtya pṛṣadājyāt sruveṇopaghnann āha vanaspataye 'nubrūhīti
4.9.28	āśrāvyāha vanaspataye preṣyeti
4.9.29	vaṣaṭkṛta uttarārdhapūrvārdhe 'tihāya pūrvā āhutīr juhoti
4.9.30	atha samāvapamāna āhāgnaye sviṣṭakṛte 'nubrūhīti
4.9.31	āśrāvyāhāgnaye sviṣṭakṛte preṣyeti
4.9.32	vaṣaṭkṛta uttarārdhapūrvārdhe 'tihāya pūrvā āhutīr juhoti
4.9.33	athodaṅṅ atyākramya yathāyatanaṃ srucau sādayitvā hotra iḍām upodyacchante medasaḥ
4.9.34	upahūtāyām iḍāyām agnīdha ādadhāti ṣaḍavattam ardhavaniṣṭhum athārdhavaniṣṭhuṃ medasvat
4.9.35	prāśnanti
4.9.36	mārjayante
4.9.37	athāha brahmaṇe vakṣaḥ parihareti
4.9.38	tad brahmā pratigṛhṇāti
4.10.1	vayaṃ soma vrate tava manas tanūṣu bibhrataḥ / prajāvanto aśīmahīti
4.10.2	atha saṃpraiṣam āhāgnīd aupayajān aṅgārān āharopayaṣṭar upasīda brahman prasthāsyāmaḥ samidham ādhāyāgnīd agnīn sakṛtsakṛt saṃmṛḍḍhīti
4.10.3	āharanty etāñ chāmitrād aupayajān aṅgārān
4.10.4	tān agreṇa hotāraṃ nivapati
4.10.5	upasīdaty upayaṣṭā gudatṛtīyena
4.10.6	athādhvaryuḥ pṛṣadājyaṃ vihatya juhvāṃ samānīyātyākramyāśrāvyāha devebhyaḥ preṣyeti
4.10.7	vaṣaṭkṛte juhoti preṣya preṣyeti
4.10.8	evam evopayaṣṭopayajati gudasya pracchedaṃ samudraṃ gaccha svāhety etair ekādaśabhir
4.10.9	agniṃ vaiśvānaraṃ gaccha svāheti sarvam antato 'nupraharati
4.10.10	atha barhiṣi hastau nimārṣṭy adbhyas tvauṣadhībhyo mano me hārdi yaccheti
4.10.11	athāsya dhūmam anvīkṣate tanūṃ tvacaṃ putraṃ naptāram aśīyeti
4.10.12	ekādaśānūyājān iṣṭvodaṅṅ atyākramya juhvāṃ svarum avadhāya purastāt pratyaṅ tiṣṭhañ juhoti divaṃ te dhūmo gacchatv antarikṣam arciḥ pṛthivīṃ bhasmanā pṛṇasva svāheti
4.10.13	atha yathāyatanaṃ srucau sādayitvā vājavatībhyāṃ srucau vyūhati
4.10.14	śaṃyunā prastaraparidhi saṃprakīrya saṃprasrāvya srucau vimucya jāghanyā patnīṃ saṃyājayanti
4.10.15	ājyasyaiva somaṃ ca tvaṣṭāraṃ ca yajati
4.10.16	uttānāyai jāghanyai devānāṃ patnīr yajati
4.10.17	nīcyā agniṃ gṛhapatim
4.10.18	uttānāyai jāghanyai hotra iḍām avadyati
4.10.19	nīcyā agnīdhe ṣaḍavattam
4.10.20	prāśnītaḥ
4.10.21	mārjayete
4.10.22	atha sruci caturgṛhītaṃ gṛhītvāpasalaiḥ paryāvṛtyānvāhāryapacane prāyaścittaṃ hutvā na phalīkaraṇahomena carati
4.10.23	atha prāṅ etya dhruvām āpyāyya trīṇi samiṣṭayajūṃṣi juhoti yajña yajñaṃ gaccha yajñapatiṃ gaccha svāṃ yoniṃ gaccha svāheti
4.10.24	sruveṇaiva dvitīyam eṣa te yajño yajñapate sahasūktavākaḥ suvīraḥ svāheti
4.10.25	srucā tṛtīyaṃ devā gātuvido gātuṃ vittvā gātum ita / manasaspata imaṃ no deva deveṣu yajñaṃ svāhā vāci svāhā vāte dhāḥ svāheti
4.10.26	udūhati srucam
4.10.27	atha yācati sphyam udapātraṃ hṛdayaśūlam iti
4.10.28	etat samādāyāhaihi yajamāneti
4.10.29	anvag yajamāno 'nūcī patny antareṇa cātvālotkarāv udaṅṅ upaniṣkramyāgreṇa yūpaṃ sphyenoddhatyāvokṣya śuṣkasya cārdrasya ca sandhau hṛdayaśūlam udvāsayati
4.11.1	śug asi tam abhi śoca yo 'smān dveṣṭi yaṃ ca vayaṃ dviṣma iti
4.11.2	athādbhir mārjayante dhāmnodhāmno rājann ito varuṇa no muñca yad āpo aghniyā varuṇeti śapāmahe tato varuṇa no muñceti
4.11.3	athāpratīkṣam āyanti varuṇasyāntarhityai
4.11.4	prapathe samidhaḥ kurvata edho 'sy edhiṣīmahīti
4.11.5	etyāhavanīye 'bhyādadhāti samid asi tejo 'si tejo mayi dhehīti
4.11.6	athāhavanīyam upatiṣṭhante 'po anvacāriṣaṃ rasena sam asṛkṣmahi / payasvāṃ agna āgamaṃ taṃ mā saṃ sṛja varcaseti
4.11.7	athaupayajike 'gnau barhir upoṣati yat kusīdam apratīttaṃ mayi yena yamasya balinā carāmi / ihaiva san niravadaye tad etat tad agne anṛṇo bhavāmīti
4.11.8	athāñjalinopastīrṇābhighāritān saktūn pradāvye juhoti viśvalopa viśvadāvasya tvāsañ juhomi svāheti
4.11.9	hastau pradhvaṃsayate 'gdhād eko 'hutād ekaḥ samanasād ekas te naḥ kṛṇvantu bheṣajaṃ sadaḥ saho vareṇyam iti
4.11.10	dvitīyaṃ juhoti yāny apāmityāny apratīttāny asmi yamasya balinā carāmi / ihaiva santaḥ prati tad yātayāmo jīvā jīvebhyo niharāma enat svāheti
4.11.11	hastau pradhvaṃsayate 'gdhād eko 'hutād ekaḥ samanasād ekas te naḥ kṛṇvantu bheṣajaṃ sadaḥ saho vareṇyam iti
4.11.12	tṛtīyaṃ juhoty anṛṇā asminn anṛṇāḥ parasmiṃs tṛtīye loke anṛṇāḥ syāma / ye devayānā uta pitṛyāṇāḥ sarvān patho anṛṇā ākṣīyema svāheti
4.11.13	hastau pradhvaṃsayate 'gdhād eko 'hutād ekaḥ samanasād ekas te naḥ kṛṇvantu bheṣajaṃ sadaḥ saho vareṇyam iti
4.11.14	atha devatā upatiṣṭhate
4.11.15	ayaṃ no nabhasā pura ity agniṃ sa tvaṃ no nabhasaspata iti vāyum
4.11.16	deva saṃsphānety ādityam
4.11.17	atha yūpam upatiṣṭhata āśāsānaḥ suvīryaṃ rāyaspoṣaṃ svaśviyam / bṛhaspatinā rāyā svagākṛto mahyaṃ yajamānāya tiṣṭheti
4.11.18	atha pūrvāgniṃ śakale samāropayaty ayaṃ te yonir ṛtviya iti
4.11.19	taṃ madhyame 'gnāv apisṛjaty ājuhvāna ud budhyasvāgna iti dvābhyām
4.11.20	atha madhyamam agnim upasamādhāya madhyame 'gnau pūrṇāhutiṃ juhoti sapta te agne samidhaḥ sapta jihvā iti
4.11.21	pūrṇāhutau varaṃ dadāti
4.11.22	dhenuvaraṃ vānaḍudvaraṃ vā dadyād iti ha smāha baudhāyanaḥ
4.11.23	saṃtiṣṭhate paśubandhaḥ saṃtiṣṭhate paśubandhaḥ
5.1.1	vaiśvadevahavirbhir yakṣyamāṇo bhavati phālgunyāṃ vā caitryāṃ vā paurṇamāsyām
5.1.2	nakṣatraprayoga ity eka āhuḥ
5.1.3	udagayana āpūryamāṇapakṣasya puṇyāhe prayuñjīteti
5.1.4	sa upakalpayate treṇīṃ śalalīṃ lohitāyasasya ca kṣuraṃ catuṣṭayāni puroḍāśakapālāni catasraś carusthālīs tāvanti mekṣaṇāni dvayaṃ payaḥ pṛṣadājyāya ca dadhi havirātañcanāya ca tredhā barhiḥ saṃnaddhaṃ tad ekadhā punaḥ saṃnaddhaṃ prasūmayaṃ prastaram iti
5.1.5	athopavasthīye 'han dvihaviṣam ārambhaṇīyām iṣṭiṃ nirvapati vaiśvānaraṃ dvādaśakapālaṃ pārjanyaṃ carum
5.1.6	sā prasiddheṣṭiḥ saṃtiṣṭhate
5.1.7	athāsyaitad ahar viśvebhyo devebhyo vatsā apākṛtā bhavanti
5.1.8	vaiśvadevaṃ payo dohayitvopavasati sāṃnāyyasya vāvṛtā tūṣṇīṃ vā
5.1.9	atha prātar hute 'gnihotre purāpāṃ praṇayanād gārhapatya ājyaṃ vilāpyotpūya sruci caturgṛhītaṃ gṛhītvā pañcahotāraṃ manasānudrutyāhavanīye juhoty anvārabdhe yajamāne svāheti
5.1.10	atha pṛṣṭhyāṃ stīrtvāpaḥ praṇīyāgneyam aṣṭākapālaṃ nirvapati saumyaṃ caruṃ sāvitraṃ dvādaśakapālaṃ sārasvataṃ caruṃ pauṣṇaṃ caruṃ mārutaṃ saptakapālaṃ vaiśvadevīm āmikṣāṃ dyāvāpṛthivyam ekakapālam iti
5.1.11	haviṣkṛtā vācaṃ visṛjate
5.1.12	samānaṃ karmādhivapanāt
5.1.13	adhyupya dakṣiṇārdhe gārhapatyasyāṣṭau kapālāny upadadhāti
5.1.14	athottaratas tiraḥ pavitram apa ānīya saumyāya carave 'dhiśrayati
5.1.15	athottarataḥ sāvitrāya dvādaśakapālāny upadadhāti
5.1.16	athottaratas tiraḥ pavitram apa ānīya sārasvatapauṣṇābhyām adhiśrayati
5.1.17	athottarato mārutāya sapta kapālāny upadadhāti
5.1.18	athottaratas tiraḥ pavitraṃ paya ānīyāmikṣāyā adhiśrayati
5.1.19	athottarato dyāvāpṛthivyam ekakapālam upadadhāti
5.1.20	abhīndhate kapālāni
5.1.21	upendhate carusthālīḥ
5.1.22	kṛtāni piṣṭāni samupya saṃyutyāthādhipṛṇakty āgneyam aṣṭākapālam
5.1.23	tiraḥ pavitraṃ saumye caravyān āvapati
5.1.24	athādhipṛṇakti sāvitraṃ dvādaśakapālam
5.1.25	tiraḥ pavitraṃ sārasvatapauṣṇayoś caravyān āvapati
5.1.26	athādhipṛṇakti mārutaṃ saptakapālam
5.1.27	tiraḥ pavitraṃ tapte payasi dadhy ānayati
5.1.28	sāmikṣā bhavati
5.1.29	tāṃ ya eva kaś ca kuśalaḥ parīndhena śrapayitvā vivājināṃ kṛtvāpratāpe nidadhāti
5.1.30	athādhipṛṇakti dyāvāpṛthivyam ekakapālam iti
5.1.31	tvacaṃ puroḍāśānāṃ grāhayitvā śrapayitvābhivāsya prāṅ etyāpyebhyo ninīya stambayajur harati
5.2.1	idam eva prasiddhaṃ pauroḍāśikam
5.2.2	trir yajuṣā tūṣṇīṃ caturtham
5.2.3	pūrvaṃ parigrāhaṃ parigṛhṇāti
5.2.4	karaṇaṃ japati
5.2.5	uddhanti
5.2.6	uddhatād āgnīdhras trir harati
5.2.7	yad āgnīdhras trir haraty athottaraṃ parigrāhaṃ parigṛhya yoyupitvā tiryañcaṃ sphyaṃ stabdhvā saṃpraiṣam āha prokṣaṇīr āsādayedhmābarhir upasādaya sruvaṃ ca srucaś ca saṃmṛḍḍhi tūṣṇīṃ pṛṣadājyagrahaṇīṃ patnīṃ saṃnahyājyena ca dadhnā codehīti
5.2.8	āhṛtāsu prokṣāṇīṣūdasya sphyaṃ mārjayitvedhmābarhir upasādya pradakṣiṇam āvṛtya pratyaṅṅ ādrutya sruvaṃ ca srucaś ca saṃmārṣṭi tūṣṇīṃ pṛṣadājyagrahaṇīm
5.2.9	patnīṃ saṃnahyājyena ca dadhnā codetyājyaṃ ca prokṣaṇīś cotpūya prasiddhaṃ pṛṣadājyavanty ājyāni gṛhītvā prokṣaṇībhir upottiṣṭhati
5.2.10	idhmaṃ prokṣati
5.2.11	vediṃ prokṣati
5.2.12	barhiḥ prokṣati
5.2.13	barhir āsannaṃ prokṣyopaninīya purastāt prasūmayaṃ prastaraṃ gṛhṇāti
5.2.14	trividhaṃ barhi stīrtvā prastarapāṇiḥ prāṅ abhisṛpya kārṣmaryamayān paridhīn paridadhāti
5.2.15	ūrdhve samidhāv ādadhāti
