6.26.1	devasya tvā savituḥ prasave 'śvinor bāhubhyāṃ pūṣṇo hastābhyām ādada iti
6.26.2	ādāyābhimantrayate 'bhrir asi nārir asīti
6.26.3	tayaudumbaryā avaṭaṃ parilikhati parilikhitaṃ rakṣaḥ parilikhitā arātaya idam ahaṃ rakṣaso grīvā apikṛntāmi yo 'smān dveṣṭi yaṃ ca vayaṃ dviṣma idam asya grīvā apikṛntāmīti
6.26.4	athodgātāram āhodgātar ehīmam audumbaryā avaṭaṃ khana prāk purīṣam udvapatād iti
6.26.5	taṃ sa khanati vā khānayati vā
6.26.6	so 'ta eva sado vimimīte
6.26.7	yathā trīṇi chadīṃṣi tiryañcy evaṃ prākśaḥ
6.26.8	yathā trīṇi chadīṃṣy anvañcy evam udakśaḥ
6.26.9	api vā yathā dvau bhāgāv udak spandyāyai syātām eko dakṣiṇata iti
6.26.10	tasya triśreṇigartān khānayati
6.26.11	so 'ta eva prāṅ drutvā dakṣiṇasya havirdhānasya puro 'kṣam uparavān vimimīte prādeśamukhān prādeśāntaspādān
6.26.12	athonnetāram āhonnetar ehīmān uparavān khana prādeśamukhān prādeśāntaspādān bāhumātrān avāco 'saṃbhindann upariṣṭād adhastāt saṃtṛṇṇān iti
6.26.13	tān sa khanati vā khānayati vā
6.26.14	athaiṣāṃ purīṣaṃ dakṣiṇasya havirdhānasyāgreṇopastambhanaṃ nivapati
6.26.15	taṃ caturaśraṃ kharaṃ karoti
6.26.16	athainaṃ sikatābhir ābhrāśinaṃ karoti
6.26.17	athoparavāṇāṃ kālād abhrim ādatte devasya tvā savituḥ prasave 'śvinor bāhubhyāṃ pūṣṇo hastābhyām ādada iti
6.26.18	ādāyābhimantrayate 'bhrir asi nārir asīti
6.26.19	tayā yūpāvaṭaṃ parilikhati yathāntarvedy ardhaṃ syād bahirvedy ardhaṃ parilikhitaṃ rakṣaḥ parilikhitā arātaya idam ahaṃ rakṣaso grīvā apikṛntāmi yo 'smān dveṣṭi yaṃ ca vayaṃ dviṣma idam asya grīvā apikṛntāmīti
6.26.20	athāgnīdhram āhāgnīd ehīmaṃ yūpāvaṭaṃ khanoparasaṃmitaṃ prāk purīṣam udvapatāc caturaṅgulenoparam atikhanatād iti
6.26.21	taṃ sa khanati vā khānayati vā
6.26.22	yāvad evātrādhvaryuś ceṣṭati tāvad eṣa pratiprasthātaudumbarīṃ sthūṇāṃ yajamānena saṃmāyādhastāt parivāsayaty acchinno rāyaḥ suvīra iti
6.26.23	athādhvaryuḥ pradakṣiṇam āvṛtya pratyaṅṅ ādrutya yācati yavamatīḥ prokṣaṇīr barhirhastam ājyasthālīṃ sasruvāṃ maitrāvaruṇadaṇḍaṃ hiraṇyam udapātram iti
6.26.24	etat samādāyāhaihi yajamāneti
6.26.25	audumbary eṣā sthūṇā prakṣālitā prapannā prāg avaṭād upaśete
6.26.26	tāṃ parastād arvācīṃ prokṣati
6.27.1	dive tvāntarikṣāya tvā pṛthivyai tveti
6.27.2	avaṭe 'po 'vanayati śundhatāṃ lokaḥ pitṛṣadana iti
6.27.3	yavān praskandayati yavo 'si yavayāsmad dveṣo yavayārātīr iti
6.27.4	barhirhastaṃ vyatiṣajyāvastṛṇāti pitṝṇāṃ sadanam asīti
6.27.5	athainaddhiraṇyam antardhāya sruvāhutyābhijuhoti pitṛbhyaḥ svāheti
6.27.6	athainām ucchrayaty ud divaṃ stabhānāntarikṣaṃ pṛṇa pṛthivīṃ dṛṃheti
6.27.7	athaināṃ prācīnakarṇāṃ minoti dyutānas tvā māruto minotu mitrāvaruṇayor dhruveṇa dharmaṇeti
6.27.8	athaināṃ pradakṣiṇaṃ purīṣeṇa paryūhati brahmavaniṃ tvā kṣatravaniṃ suprajāvaniṃ rāyaspoṣavaniṃ paryūhāmīti
6.27.9	maitrāvaruṇadaṇḍena saṃhanti brahma dṛṃha kṣatraṃ dṛṃha prajāṃ dṛṃha rāyaspoṣaṃ dṛṃheti
6.27.10	anyūnam anatiriktaṃ parinyasyodapātram upaninīya
6.27.11	athāsyai viśākhe hiraṇyaṃ nidhāya sruvāhutyābhijuhoti ghṛtena dyāvāpṛthivī āpṛṇethāṃ svāheti
6.27.12	āntam anvavasrāvayati
6.27.13	āntam eva yajamānaṃ tejasānaktīti brāhmaṇam
6.27.14	athainām udgātṛbhyaḥ prāhuḥ
6.27.15	tasyāṃ tac ceṣṭanti yat te viduḥ
6.27.16	etasyā ucchrayaṇam anu prācīnakarṇā sthūṇā ucchrayanti
6.27.17	tāsūdīco vaṃśān prohanti
6.27.18	adhyasyanti madhyamaṃ chadir indrasya sado 'sīti
6.27.19	viśvajanasya chāyeti ye abhito bhavataḥ
6.27.20	navacchadi tejaskāmasya minuyād iti
6.27.21	trīṇi trīṇy eva sarvāṇi bhavanti
6.27.22	dakṣiṇāny uttarāṇi karoti
6.27.23	sa dakṣiṇāni dakṣiṇāny evottarāṇi karoti
6.27.24	antarvartān karoti vyāvṛttyā iti
6.27.25	sandhiṣu tṛṇavartān pratyasyati
6.27.26	te 'ntarvartāḥ
6.27.27	athainat pariśrayanti pari tvā girvaṇo gira imā bhavantu viśvato vṛddhāyum anu vṛddhayo juṣṭā bhavantu juṣṭaya iti
6.27.28	dakṣiṇataś cottarataś ca pariśrayanti
6.27.29	prācīṃ ca pratīcīṃ ca dvārau kurvanti
6.27.30	atha dakṣiṇe dvārbāhau kuśahastam upanigṛhya darbhaṇaṃ pravayati darbhaṇe spandyām indrasya syūr asīti
6.27.31	indrasya dhruvam asīti granthiṃ karoti
6.27.32	taṃ tadānīm eva visrasyāhākurvanto granthīn hastakauśalair nistiṣṭhateti
6.27.33	evam evottaraṃ dvārbāhum
6.27.34	evam apare dvārbāhū nistiṣṭhati
6.27.35	athainad abhimṛśaty aindram asīndrāya tveti
6.27.36	atha mahāvedyā uttarād aṃsīyāc chaṅkor vedyantenāṣṭādaśa pratīcaḥ prakramān prakrāmati
6.27.37	tad āgnīdhrāgāraṃ vimimīte yathāntarvedy ardhaṃ syād bahirvedy ardham
6.27.38	athainat samuccitya pariśrayanti
6.27.39	tasya dakṣiṇāṃ dvāraṃ kurvanti
6.27.40	āgnīdhrāgārasya pārśvamānī pañcāratniḥ
6.27.41	etena mārjālīyo vyākhyātaḥ
6.27.42	tasyodīcīṃ dvāraṃ kurvanti
6.28.1	athātraiva tiṣṭhan yācaty abhriṃ yavamatīḥ prokṣaṇīr barhirhastam ājyasthālīṃ sasruvām adhiṣavaṇaṃ carmādhiṣavaṇe phalake ṣaṭ chaṅkūn grāvāṇaṃ hiraṇyam udapātram iti
6.28.2	etat samādāyāhaihi yajamāneti
6.28.3	pūrvayā dvārā havirdhānaṃ prapādya dakṣiṇasya havirdhānasya nīḍa etac carmotsādayati
6.28.4	puro 'kṣam itarāṇi saṃsādayanti
6.28.5	athoparavāṇāṃ kālād abhrim ādatte devasya tvā savituḥ prasave 'śvinor bāhubhyāṃ pūṣṇo hastābhyām ādada iti
6.28.6	ādāyābhimantrayate 'bhrir asi nārir asīti
6.28.7	tayoparavān parilikhati pūrvayor dakṣiṇam evāgre parilikhitaṃ rakṣaḥ parilikhitā arātaya idam ahaṃ rakṣaso grīvā apikṛntāmi yo 'smān dveṣṭi yaṃ ca vayaṃ dviṣma idam asya grīvā apikṛntāmīti sarvān evānupūrvam
6.28.8	khanati rakṣohaṇo valagahano vaiṣṇavān khanāmīti sarvān evānupūrvam
6.28.9	athaibhyaḥ pāṃsūn udvapatīdam ahaṃ taṃ valagam udvapāmi yaṃ naḥ samāno yam asamāno nicakhānedam enam adharaṃ karomi yo naḥ samāno yo 'samāno 'rātīyati gāyatreṇa chandaseti
6.28.10	avabāḍho valaga iti yajamānasyādhaspadaṃ pāṃsūn udvapati pūrvayor dakṣiṇāt
6.28.11	traiṣṭubhena chandasety aparayor dakṣiṇāt
6.28.12	jāgatena chandasety aparayor uttarāt
6.28.13	ānuṣṭubhena chandaseti pūrvayor uttarāt
6.28.14	atraitān padapāṃsūn asaṃcare parāvapati
6.28.15	atra yaṃ yajamāno dveṣṭi taṃ manasā dhyāyati
6.28.16	athāpa upaspṛśyāthainān avamṛśato 'dhvaryuś ca yajamānaś ca pūrvayor dakṣiṇam evādhvaryur avamṛśaty uttaraṃ yajamānaḥ
6.28.17	atha yajamānaḥ pṛcchati adhvaryo kim atreti
6.28.18	bhadram iti
6.28.19	tan nau saheti
6.28.20	athādhvaryuḥ pṛcchati yajamāna kim atreti
6.28.21	bhadram iti
6.28.22	tan nau saheti
6.28.23	yam evādhvaryuḥ prajahāti taṃ yajamāno 'vamṛśati
6.28.24	dakṣiṇayor aparam evādhvaryur avamṛśati pūrvaṃ yajamānaḥ
6.28.25	adhvaryur atra pṛcchati
6.28.26	atha yajamānaḥ
6.28.27	aparayor uttaram evādhvaryur avamṛśati dakṣiṇaṃ yajamānaḥ
6.28.28	yajamāno 'tra pṛcchati
6.28.29	athādhvaryuḥ
6.28.30	uttarayoḥ pūrvam evādhvaryur avamṛśaty aparaṃ yajamānaḥ
6.28.31	adhvaryur atra pṛcchati
6.28.32	atha yajamānaḥ
6.28.33	yajamānaḥ prathamaḥ pṛcchati yajamāna uttamaḥ
6.28.34	athainān abhimṛśati virāḍ asi sapatnahā samrāḍ asi bhrātṛvyahā svarāḍ asy abhimātihā viśvārāḍ asi viśvāsāṃ nāṣṭrāṇāṃ hanteti sarvān evānupūrvam
6.28.35	athainān adbhiḥ prokṣati rakṣohaṇo valagahanaḥ prokṣāmi vaiṣṇavān iti sarvān evānupūrvam
6.28.36	athaiṣv apo 'vanayati rakṣohaṇo valagahano 'vanayāmi vaiṣṇavān iti sarveṣv evānupūrvam
6.28.37	athaiṣu yavān praskandayati yavo 'si yavayāsmad dveṣo yavayārātīr iti sarveṣv evānupūrvam
6.28.38	athainān barhiṣāvastṛṇāti rakṣohaṇo valagahano 'vastṛṇāmi vaiṣṇavān iti sarvān evānupūrvam
6.28.39	athainān hiraṇyam antardhāya sruvāhutyābhijuhoti rakṣohaṇo valagahano 'bhijuhomi vaiṣṇavān svāheti sarvān evānupūrvam
6.28.40	athāsyaite phalake dīrghasome saṃtṛṇṇe bhavato 'saṃtṛṇṇe ekāhe
6.28.41	te saṃspṛṣṭe upadadhāti rakṣohaṇau valagahanāv upadadhāmi vaiṣṇavī iti
6.28.42	athaine śaṅkubhiḥ pariṇihanti dvābhyāṃ purastād dvābhyāṃ paścād dvābhyām abhito 'navasarpaṇāya
6.28.43	athaine pradakṣiṇaṃ purīṣeṇa paryūhati rakṣohaṇau valagahanau paryūhāmi vaiṣṇavī iti
6.28.44	athaine barhiṣā paristṛṇāti rakṣohaṇau valagahanau paristṛṇāmi vaiṣṇavī iti
6.28.45	athaine abhimṛśati rakṣohaṇau valagahanau vaiṣṇavī iti
6.28.46	athaitac carma phalakayoḥ prācīnagrīvam uttaralomopastṛṇāti yajña pratitiṣṭheti vā tūṣṇīṃ vā
6.28.47	tiraścarman phalake grāvṇodvādayati
6.29.1	bṛhann asi bṛhadgrāvā bṛhatīm indrāya vācaṃ vadeti
6.29.2	nīḍa etac carmotsādayati
6.29.3	grāvasu grāvāṇam apyarjati
6.29.4	atha dakṣiṇasya havirdhānasyāgreṇopastambhanaṃ barhirmuṣṭim upanibadhnāti stotrebhyaḥ
6.29.5	atha yācati sphyam udapātraṃ cātvālātpurīṣaṃ sikatā iti
6.29.6	etat samādāyāhaihi yajamāneti
6.29.7	āgnīdhraṃ drutvā sphyenoddhatyāvokṣya cātvālāt purīṣaṃ sikatā iti nivapati vibhūr asi pravāhaṇo raudreṇānīkena pāhi māgne pipṛhi mā mā mā hiṃsīr iti
6.29.8	taṃ parimaṇḍalaṃ dhiṣṇiyaṃ karoti
6.29.9	athainaṃ sikatābhir ābhrāśinaṃ karoti
6.29.10	athāntaḥsadasaṃ dhiṣṇiyān nivapati hotuḥ prathamaṃ vahnir asi havyavāhana iti
6.29.11	śvātro 'si pracetā iti dakṣiṇato maitrāvaruṇasya
6.29.12	tutho 'si viśvavedā ity uttarato brāhmaṇācchaṃsinaḥ
6.29.13	uśig asi kavir ity uttarataḥ potuḥ
6.29.14	aṅghārir asi bambhārir ity uttarato neṣṭuḥ
6.29.15	avasyur asi duvasvān ity uttarato 'cchāvākasya
6.29.16	atha dakṣiṇe vedyante mārjālīyaṃ dhiṣṇiyaṃ nivapati śundhyūr asi mārjālīya iti
6.29.17	sarveṣv eva raudram anuvartayati
6.29.18	āgnīdhre 'ntato nivapaty udaksaṃsthatāyā iti
6.29.19	aṣṭau nyavāpsīd iti
6.29.20	athāṣṭāv anudiśati
6.29.21	samrāḍ asi kṛśānur ity āhavanīyam upatiṣṭhate
6.29.22	pariṣadyo 'si pavamāna ity āstāvam
6.29.23	pratakvāsi nabhasvān iti cātvālam
6.29.24	asaṃmṛṣṭo 'si havyasūda iti paśuśrapaṇam
6.29.25	atha sadaso dvāri tiṣṭhann audumbarīm upatiṣṭhata ṛtadhāmāsi suvarjyotir iti
6.29.26	brahmajyotir asi suvardhāmeti brahmasadanam
6.29.27	athātraiva tiṣṭhan gārhapatyam upatiṣṭhate 'jo 'sy ekapād iti
6.29.28	ahir asi budhniya iti yaṃ prahāsyanto bhavanti
6.30.1	athātraiva tiṣṭhan saṃpraiṣam āha stṛṇīta barhiḥ pra vrataṃ yacchata sam apivratān hvayadhvam āstāvaṃ bahulaṃ stṛṇīta sadohavirdhāne bahule stṛṇītonnetar grāvṇo vāyavyāni droṇakalaśe daśāpavitre samavadhāya patnīśāle saṃsādayāgnīd ājyam adhiśraya pratiprasthātaḥ srucaḥ saṃmṛḍḍhy ājyenodehi pṛṣadājyāya dadhy āhareti
6.30.2	yathāsaṃpraiṣaṃ te kurvanti
6.30.3	atha dakṣiṇe vedyante barhirmuṣṭiṃ stṛṇāti devabarhir ūrṇāmradasaṃ tvā stṛṇāmi svāsasthaṃ devebhya iti
6.30.4	tāṃ bahulāṃ purastāt pratyañca stṛṇanto yanti
6.30.5	athāntaḥśālaṃ pṛṣadājyavanty ājyāni gṛhītvā parikarmibhya utpradāya brahmaṇe rājānam utprayacchati
6.30.6	taṃ brahmādāyottaratas tiṣṭhati
6.30.7	uttaratas tiṣṭhann agnim anvānayaty ud agne tiṣṭhānu mām udehi viśvair devair yajñiyaiḥ saṃvidānaḥ / suvarge loke yajamānaṃ hi dhehi māsyai hāsthā āhutyai yām upema iti
6.30.8	athābhyādadhātīdhmaṃ praṇayanīyam
6.30.9	upopayamanīḥ kalpayanti cātvālāt
6.30.10	samanvārabdheṣv apivrateṣu saṃpracchanneṣu gārhapatya ājyaṃ vilāpyotpūya sruci caturgṛhītaṃ gṛhītvā śālāmukhīye vaisarjanāni juhoti tvaṃ soma tanūkṛdbhyo dveṣobhyo 'nyakṛtebhya uru yantāsi varūthaṃ svāheti
6.30.11	sruveṇāptuṃ praskandayati juṣāṇo aptur ājyasya vetu svāheti
6.30.12	aparaṃ caturgṛhītaṃ gṛhītvā saṃpraiṣam āhāgnīṣomābhyāṃ praṇīyamānābhyām anubrūhīti
6.30.13	trir uktāyām udyacchante
6.30.14	hotur vaśaṃ yanti
6.30.15	atha vai bhavati
6.30.16	prāñcam agniṃ praharanty ut patnīm ānayanty anv anāṃsi pravartayantīti
6.30.17	yad asyātra śastraṃ bhavati pūrvaṃ tenāgnim anvavasyanti
6.30.18	athāgniprathamāḥ pratipadyante 'nvagrājñā cājyaiś cānvaggrāvṇo vāyavyāni
6.30.19	pūrvayā dvāropaniṣkrāmanty ayaṃ no agnir varivaḥ kṛṇotv ayaṃ mṛdhaḥ pura etu prabhindan / ayaṃ śatrūñ jayatu jarhṛṣāṇo 'yaṃ vājaṃ jayatu vājasātāv iti
6.30.20	uttareṇa sadaḥ parītyāgnīdhrāgāre 'gniṃ nidhāya nayavatyarcāgnīdhre juhoty agne naya supathā rāye asmān viśvāni deva vayunāni vidvān / yuyodhy asmaj juhurāṇam eno bhūyiṣṭhāṃ te namauktiṃ vidhema svāheti
6.30.21	atraivaitad grāvovāyavyaṃ samupasādyopātiyanti rājñā cājyaiś ca
6.30.22	āhavanīye sruvāhutiṃ juhoty uru viṣṇo vikramasvoru kṣayāya naḥ kṛdhi / ghṛtaṃ ghṛtayone piba pra pra yajñapatiṃ tira svāheti
6.31.1	atha prokṣaṇībhir upottiṣṭhati
6.31.2	idhmaṃ prokṣati
6.31.3	vediṃ prokṣati
6.31.4	barhiḥ prokṣati
6.31.5	barhirāsannaṃ prokṣyopaninīya purastād āśvavālaṃ prastaraṃ gṛhṇāti
6.31.6	pañcavidhaṃ barhi stīrtvā prastarapāṇiḥ prāṅ abhisṛpya kārṣmaryamayān paridhīn paridadhāti
6.31.7	ūrdhve samidhāv ādadhāti
6.31.8	aikṣavī vidhṛtī tiraścī sādayati
6.31.9	vidhṛtyor āśvavālaṃ prastaram
6.31.10	prastare juhūm
6.31.11	barhiṣītarāḥ
6.31.12	etā asadann iti samabhimṛśyāthāpa upaspṛśya brahmaṇo rājānam ādāya pūrvayā dvārā havirdhānaṃ prapādayati somo jigāti gātuvid devānām eti niṣkṛtam ṛtasya yonim āsadam iti
6.31.13	atha dakṣiṇasya havirdhānasya nīḍe kṛṣṇājinam āstṛṇāty adityāḥ sado 'sīti
6.31.14	adityāḥ sada āsīdeti kṛṣṇājine rājānam
6.31.15	athainaṃ devatābhyaḥ saṃprayacchaty eṣa vo deva savitaḥ somas taṃ rakṣadhvaṃ mā vo dabhad iti
6.31.16	saṃpradāyopatiṣṭhata etat tvaṃ soma devo devān upāgā idam ahaṃ manuṣyo manuṣyān saha prajayā saha rāyaspoṣeṇeti
6.31.17	namo devebhya iti prāñcam añjaliṃ karoti
6.31.18	svadhā pitṛbhya iti dakṣiṇā nyacati
6.31.19	athopaniṣkrāmatīdam ahaṃ nir varuṇasya pāśād iti
6.31.20	athāhavanīyam upatiṣṭhate suvar abhivikhyeṣaṃ vaiśvānaraṃ jyotir iti
6.31.21	atha yajamānam avāntaradīkṣāṃ visarjayaty agne vratapate tvaṃ vratānāṃ vratapatir asi yā mama tanūs tvayy abhūd iyaṃ sā mayi yā tava tanūr mayy abhūd eṣā sā tvayi yathāyathaṃ nau vratapate vratinor vratānīti
6.31.22	athainaṃ saṃśāsti srasnīṣva mekhalāṃ pra muṣṭī sāraya maitrāvaruṇāya daṇḍaṃ prayaccha yajamāna iti tvācakṣatāṃ nāmagrāhaṃ te pitṛbhiḥ pitāmahaiḥ prapitāmahaiḥ putraiḥ pautraiḥ subrahmaṇyaḥ subrahmaṇyām āhvayatv iti
6.31.23	sa evam evaitat sarvaṃ karoti
6.31.24	atha yūpāhutiṃ hutvā yūpaṃ yajuṣā karoti
6.31.25	yūpāvaṭaṃ yajuṣā karoti
6.31.26	tad etad yūpāvaṭāntam
6.32.1	atha yūpasyāvṛtā yūpam ucchrayati
6.32.2	svarvantaṃ yūpam utsṛjyāgnīṣomīyaṃ paśum upākaroti
6.32.3	tasya prasiddhaṃ vapayā caritvā vapāśrapaṇī anuprahṛtya samutkramya cātvāle mārjayante
6.32.4	atha yo vīḍitaḥ kumbhas taṃ yācati
6.32.5	tam ādāyāntareṇa cātvālotkarāv udaṅṅ upaniṣkramya yatrāpas tad yanti
6.32.6	nāntamā vahantīr atyeti
6.32.7	na sthāvarāṇāṃ gṛhṇāti
6.32.8	pratīpaṃ tiṣṭhan gṛhṇāti
6.32.9	chāyāyai cātapataś ca saṃdhau gṛhṇāti haviṣmatīr imā āpo haviṣmān devo adhvaro haviṣmāṃ āvivāsati haviṣmāṃ astu sūrya iti
6.32.10	athainā ādāya pradakṣiṇam āvṛtya savye 'ṃse nidhāyaitenaiva yathetam etyottareṇāgnīdhrīyaṃ parītyottareṇa sadaḥ parītya pūrvayā dvārā śālāṃ prapādya jaghanena gārhapatyam aupasadāyāṃ vedyāṃ saṃspṛṣṭāḥ sādayaty agner vo 'pannagṛhasya sadasi sādayāmi sumnāya sumninīḥ sumne mā dhatteti
6.32.11	atha paśupuroḍāśaṃ nirvapati
6.32.12	iḍāntaḥ paśupuroḍāśaḥ saṃtiṣṭhate
6.32.13	patnīsaṃyājāntaḥ paśuḥ
6.32.14	hṛdayaśūlānta ity eke
6.33.1	atha vasatīvarīḥ parihariṣyann āha vyapakrāmata mā vo 'bhiparihāriṣam iti
6.33.2	yajamānāyatane yajamāna upaviśati
6.33.3	jaghanena gārhapatyaṃ patnī
6.33.4	athainā ādāya dakṣiṇayā dvāropanirhṛtya savye 'ṃse nidhāya dakṣiṇena sadaḥ parītya dakṣiṇena mārjālīyaṃ dhiṣṇiyaṃ paryāhṛtya dakṣiṇato yūpena saṃspṛṣṭāḥ sādayatīndrāgniyor bhāgadheyī stheti
6.33.5	athainā ādāyodaṅṅ āvṛtya dakṣiṇe 'ṃse nidhāyaitenaiva yathetam etya jaghanena gārhapatyam aupasadāyāṃ vedyāṃ saṃspṛṣṭāḥ sādayati mitrāvaruṇayor bhāgadheyī stheti
6.33.6	athainā ādāya pūrvayā dvāropanirhṛtya dakṣiṇa evāṃse nidhāyottareṇa sadaḥ parītyottareṇāgnīdhrīyaṃ dhiṣṇiyaṃ paryāhṛtyottarato yūpena saṃspṛṣṭāḥ sādayati viśveṣāṃ devānāṃ bhāgadheyī stheti
6.33.7	athainā ādāya pradakṣiṇam āvṛtya savye 'ṃse nidhāyaitenaiva yathetam etya jaghanenāgnīdhrīyaṃ dhiṣṇiyaṃ saṃspṛṣṭāḥ sādayati yajñe jāgṛteti
6.34.1	atha payāṃsi viśāsti yā samrāḍdhuk tasyai dadhigharmāya dadhi kuruta yā yajamānasya tasyā āmikṣāyai yā patnyai tasyā āśire payaś ca saktūṃś ca kuruta śṛtātaṅkyam ādityagrahāya dadhi kuruta puroḍāśīyāni piṣṭāni kuruta dhānā hāriyojanīḥ kuruta caturo 'mbhṛṇāṃs trīn udacanān ayuja ekadhanāṃs tryavamān ekādaśaparamāṃś catasro raśanāś catasro vapāśrapaṇīr dvayam idhmābarhir audumbarān mahāparidhīn kuruta subrahmaṇyaḥ subrahmaṇyām āhvayatv iti
6.34.2	yathāsaṃpraiṣaṃ te kurvanti
6.34.3	athaitān ambhṛṇān āyātayati
6.34.4	uttarasya havirdhānasya nīḍa ādhavanīyam
6.34.5	prauge pūtabhṛtam
6.34.6	tayoḥ samāna udacanaḥ
6.34.7	āgnīdhra ekaṃ sodacanam
6.34.8	mārjālīya ekaṃ sodacanam
6.34.9	āgnīdhra etāṃ rātriṃ yajamānaḥ saṃviśati
6.34.10	havirdhāne rājānaṃ gopāyanti
7.1.1	athāto mahārātra eva budhyante
7.1.2	saṃbodhayanty etān ṛtvijo 'dhvaryuṃ hotāraṃ brahmāṇam udgātāraṃ pratiprasthātāraṃ prastotāraṃ praśāstāraṃ brāhmaṇācchaṃsinam acchāvākaṃ neṣṭāraṃ potāraṃ sadasyam unnetāram āgnīdhraṃ grāvastutaṃ subrahmaṇyaṃ pratihartāraṃ ye cānye parikarmiṇo bhavanti
7.1.3	te hastapādān prakṣālyāgnīdhre yajamānam upasaṃgacchante
7.1.4	athādhvaryur hastau saṃmṛśate karmaṇe vāṃ devebhyaḥ śakeyam iti
7.1.5	athātraiva tiṣṭhan saṃpraiṣam āhonnetar grāvṇo vāyavyāni droṇakalaśe daśāpavitre samavadhāya dakṣiṇasya havirdhānasya puro 'kṣaṃ saṃsādayāgnīd ājyam adhiśraya pratiprasthātaḥ srucaḥ saṃmṛḍḍhy ājyenodehi pṛṣadājyāya dadhy āhareti
7.1.6	yathāsaṃpraiṣaṃ te kurvanti
7.1.7	athādhvaryur āgneyyarcāgnīdhram abhimṛśaty agnir mūrdhā diva iti
7.1.8	vaiṣṇavyā havirdhānaṃ viṣṇo tvaṃ no antama iti
7.1.9	āgneyyā sruco 'yam agniḥ sahasriṇa iti
7.1.10	vāyavyayā vāyavyāni vāyo śataṃ harīṇām iti
7.1.11	aindryā sada indraṃ viśvā avīvṛdhann iti
7.1.12	atha pṛṣadājyavanty ājyāni gṛhītvā prokṣaṇībhir upottiṣṭhati
7.1.13	idhmaṃ prokṣati
7.1.14	vediṃ prokṣati
7.1.15	barhiḥ prokṣati
7.1.16	barhir āsannaṃ prokṣyopaninīya purastāt prastaraṃ gṛhṇāti
7.1.17	ekavidhaṃ barhi stīrtvā prastarapāṇiḥ prāṅ abhisṛpyaudumbarān mahāparidhīn paridadhāti nityena paridhānena
7.1.18	athainān yogena yunakti
7.1.19	yunajmi te pṛthivīṃ jyotiṣā saheti madhyamam
7.1.20	yunajmi vāyum antarikṣeṇa te saheti dakṣiṇam
7.1.21	yunajmi vācaṃ saha sūryeṇa ta iti uttaram
7.1.22	atha srucaḥ sannā abhimṛśati yunajmi tisro vipṛcaḥ sūryasya ta iti
7.1.23	athāpa upaspṛśyāhaihi yajamāneti
7.1.24	pūrvayā dvārā havirdhānaṃ prapādyāthaitac carma phalakayoḥ prācīnagrīvam uttaralomopastṛṇāti yajña pratitiṣṭheti vā tūṣṇīṃ vā
7.1.25	tasmin saṃmukhān grāvṇaḥ kṛtvā dakṣiṇasya havirdhānasyāntareṇeṣe rājānam upāvaharati hṛde tvā manase tvā soma rājann ehy avaroheti dvābhyām
7.1.26	athainam udgātṛbhyaḥ prāhuḥ
7.1.27	tasmiṃs tac ceṣṭanti yat te viduḥ
7.1.28	athāpa upaspṛśyāhaihi yajamāneti
7.1.29	āgnīdhraṃ drutvā sruci caturgṛhītaṃ gṛhītvā pañcahotāraṃ manasānudrutyāgnīdhre juhoty anvārabdhe yajamāne svāheti
7.1.30	aparaṃ caturgṛhītaṃ gṛhītvāgnīdhra evāsanyāṃ juhoty āsanyān mā mantrāt pāhi kasyāś cid abhiśastyāḥ svāheti
7.1.31	athāhavanīye ghṛtānuṣiktaṃ śakalam abhyādadhāti tūṣṇīm
7.1.32	athātraiva tiṣṭhan saṃpraiṣam āha
7.2.1	prātaryāvabhyo devebhyo hotar anubrūhi brahman vācaṃ yaccha subrahmaṇya subrahmaṇyām āhvayāgnīt savanīyān nirvapa pratiprasthātaḥ khare pātrāṇi yuṅdhīti
7.2.2	yathāsaṃpraiṣaṃ te kurvanti
7.2.3	pratipadyata eṣa hotā prātaranuvākam
7.2.4	yacchati brahmā vācam
7.2.5	āhvayati subrahmaṇyaḥ subrahmaṇyām
7.2.6	tasyām āhutāyāṃ brahmā vācaṃ visṛjate
7.2.7	nirvapaty eṣa āgnīdhra aindrān ekādaśakapālān savanīyān
7.2.8	teṣāṃ vrīhiṣv eva haviṣkṛtam udvādayati
7.2.9	upodyacchante yavān
7.2.10	atha pratiprasthātā khare pātrāṇi yunakti
7.2.11	pūrvārdhe kharasya dakṣiṇāśirasam upāṃśusavanaṃ nidadhāti dakṣiṇata upāṃśupātram uttarato 'ntaryāmapātram upasaṃspṛṣṭe
7.2.12	asaṃspṛṣṭe abhicarataḥ
7.2.13	paścād dvidevatyapātrāṇy anvañcyaindravāyavapātraṃ maitrāvaruṇapātram āśvinapātram
7.2.14	paścāc chukrāmanthinoḥ prabāhug dakṣiṇaṃ śukrapātram uttaraṃ manthipātram
7.2.15	agreṇa manthipātram ṛtupātre
7.2.16	paścād āgrayaṇasthālīm
7.2.17	dakṣiṇasyāṃ kharaśroṇyām ādityasthālīṃ sopaśayām
7.2.18	uttarasyāṃ kharaśroṇyām ukthyasthālīṃ sopaśayām
7.2.19	uttarasya havirdhānasyāgreṇopastambhanam anupopte dhruvasthālīm
7.2.20	antareṇa pūtabhṛdādhavanīyau camasān
7.2.21	dakṣiṇasya havirdhānasya paścād akṣaṃ droṇakalaśaṃ daśāpavitre iti nidadhāti
7.2.22	athaināny abhimṛśaty agnir devatā gāyatrī chanda upāṃśoḥ pātram asīti daśabhir daśa
7.2.23	athādhvaryuḥ saṃ vā viśati karmāṇi vānuprekṣamāṇa āste
7.3.1	atha yatra hotur abhijānāty abhūd uṣā ruśatpaśur āgnir adhāyy ṛtviyaḥ / ayoji vāṃ vṛṣaṇvasū ratho dasrāv amartyo mādhvī mama śrutaṃ havam iti tat pracaraṇyāṃ sruci caturgṛhītaṃ gṛhītvāhavanīye juhoty anvārabdhe yajamāne śṛṇotv agniḥ samidhā havaṃ me śṛṇvantv āpo dhiṣaṇāś ca devīḥ / śṛṇota grāvāṇo viduṣo nu yajñaṃ śṛṇotu devaḥ savitā havaṃ me svāheti
7.3.2	aparaṃ caturgṛhītaṃ gṛhītvā barhir ādāya saṃpraiṣam āhāpa iṣya hotar maitrāvaruṇasya camasādhvaryav ādravaikadhanina eta neṣṭaḥ patnīm udānayāgnīd dhotṛcamasena ca mā vasatīvarībhiś ca cātvāle pratyupalambasveti
7.3.3	yathāsaṃpraiṣaṃ te kurvanti
7.3.4	ānayati neṣṭā patnīṃ pānnejanaṃ kalaśam ādāya prehy udehīty etena nigadena
7.3.5	athaināṃ pūrvayā dvāropaniṣkramayyottareṇa sadaḥ parītyottareṇāgnīdhrīyaṃ dhiṣṇiyaṃ paryāṇīyāntareṇa cātvālotkarāv udaṅṅ upaniṣkramya yatrāpas tad yanti
7.3.6	athāpsu barhiḥ prāsyābhijuhoti devīr āpo apāṃ napād ya ūrmir haviṣya indriyāvān madintamas taṃ devebhyo devatrā dhatta śukraṃ śukrapebhyo yeṣāṃ bhāga stha svāheti
7.3.7	maitrāvaruṇacamasenāhutim apaplāvayati kārṣir asy apāpāṃ mṛdhram iti
7.3.8	barhiṣī antardhāyonnayati samudrasya vo 'kṣityā unnaya iti
7.3.9	athaikadhanān gṛhṇātīndrāya vo juṣṭān gṛhṇāmīti vā tūṣṇīṃ vā
7.3.10	atha pannejanīr gṛhṇāti vasubhyo rudrebhya ādityebhyo viśvebhyo devebhyaḥ pannejanīr gṛhṇāmi yajñāya vaḥ pannejanīr gṛhṇāmīti
7.3.11	tāḥ patnyai saṃpradāyodāyanti
7.3.12	anvārabdhe yajamāna etenaiva yathetam etya cātvāle hotṛcamasaṃ ca maitrāvaruṇacamasaṃ ca saṃsparśya vasatīvarīr vyānayati
7.3.13	pūrayati hotṛcamasam
7.3.14	aptuṃ maitrāvaruṇacamase praskandayati
7.3.15	atha hotṛcamasaṃ vasatīvarīr maitrāvaruṇacamasam iti trayaṃ saṃnidhāya pratistomaṃ pracaraṇyā samanakti saṃ jyotiṣā jyotir aṅktāṃ saṃ śukrāḥ śukreṇa saṃ haviṣā haviḥ saṃ yajñapatir āśiṣeti
7.3.16	athaiṣā patny etenaiva yathetam etya jaghanena gārhapatyam aupasadāyāṃ vedyāṃ saṃspṛṣṭāḥ sādayati tūṣṇīm
7.4.1	athādhvaryur hotur utkāśam eti
7.4.2	hotādhvaryuṃ pṛcchaty adhvaryo 'ver apā3 iti
7.4.3	utem anaṃnamur utemāḥ paśyetītaraḥ pratyāha
7.4.4	atha yady agniṣṭomo juhoti yam agne pṛtsu martyam āvo vājeṣu yaṃ junāḥ / sa yantā śaśvatīr iṣaḥ svāheti
7.4.5	atha yady ukthya etenaiva yajuṣā madhyame paridhau nimārṣṭi
7.4.6	atha yady atirātra etad eva yajur vadan prapadyate
7.4.7	yajñakratūnāṃ vyāvṛttyā iti brāhmaṇam
7.4.8	athaitā hotṛcamasīyā dakṣiṇasya havirdhānasyāntareṇeṣe upātihṛtya nīḍa utsādayati
7.4.9	athodubjyādhavanīyaṃ sarvaśa eva maitrāvaruṇacamasīyāḥ paryasyati
7.4.10	tṛtīyaṃ vasatīvarīṇām avanayati
7.4.11	tṛtīyam ekadhanānām
7.4.12	puro 'kṣaṃ vasatīvarīḥ sādayati
7.4.13	paścād akṣam ekadhanān
7.4.14	athāntareṇa havirdhāne upaviśyaudumbaraṃ pātraṃ catuḥsrakti yācati
7.4.15	tasmin barhiṣī antardhāya prājāpatyaṃ dadhigrahaṃ gṛhṇāty upayāmagṛhīto 'si prajāpataye tvā jyotiṣmate jyotiṣmantaṃ gṛhṇāmi dakṣāya dakṣavṛdhe rātaṃ devebhyo 'gnijihvebhyas tvartāyubhya indrajyeṣṭhebhyo varuṇarājabhyo vātāpibhyaḥ parjanyātmabhya iti
7.4.16	apoddhṛtya barhiṣī athainam ādāyopottiṣṭhati dive tvāntarikṣāya tvā pṛthivyai tveti
7.4.17	pūrvayā dvāropaniṣkrāmaty apendra dviṣato mano 'pa jijyāsato jahy apa yo no 'rātīyati taṃ jahīti
7.4.18	etyāhavanīye juhoty anvārabdhe yajamāne prāṇāya tvāpānāya tvā vyānāya tvā sate tvāsate tvādbhyas tvauṣadhībhyo viśvebhyas tvā bhūtebhyo yataḥ prajā akhidrā ajāyanta tasmai tvā prajāpataye vibhūdāvne jyotiṣmate jyotiṣmantaṃ juhomi svāheti
7.4.19	athāsya saṃkṣālanam antaḥparidhi ninayati
7.4.20	dhenuvaraṃ vānaḍudvaraṃ vā dadyād iti ha smāha baudhāyanaḥ
7.4.21	dvādaśa paṣṭhauhīr ity āñjīgaviḥ
7.4.22	ṛṣabham iti kātyaḥ
7.4.23	maṇikuṇḍalam iti rāthītaraḥ
7.5.1	athaitā hotṛcamasīyā dakṣiṇasya havirdhānasyāntareṇeṣe upāvahṛtya carmaṇi nidadhāti
7.5.2	tāsu nigrābhyāsu yajamānaṃ vācayati nigrābhyā stha devaśruta āyur me tarpayateti pratipadya gaṇā me mā vitṛṣann ity ātaḥ
7.5.3	tā yajamānāya saṃpradāyāthaiteṣāṃ grāvṇāṃ yaḥ sujantur iva tam ādatte devasya tvā savituḥ prasave 'śvinor bāhubhyāṃ pūṣṇo hastābhyām ādada iti
7.5.4	ādāyābhimantrayate grāvāsy adhvarakṛd devebhyo gambhīram imam adhvaraṃ kṛdhy uttamena pavinendrāya somaṃ suṣutaṃ madhumantaṃ payasvantaṃ vṛṣṭivanim iti
7.5.5	athainaṃ prāñcaṃ praśritya visrasya rājānaṃ grāvāṇam upāṃśusavanam abhimimīta indrāya tvā vṛtraghna indrāya tvā vṛtratura indrāya tvābhimātighna indrāya tvādityavata indrāya tvā viśvadevyāvata iti
7.5.6	pañcakṛtvo yajuṣā
7.5.7	pañcakṛtvas tūṣṇīm
7.5.8	daśakṛtvo mimāno 'rdhavelāṃ rājño mimīte
7.5.9	athātiśiṣṭaṃ rājānam uṣṇīṣeṇa vigrathya dakṣiṇasya havirdhānasyāntareṇeṣe upātihṛtya nīḍa utsādayati
7.5.10	atha mitaṃ rājānaṃ hotṛcamasīyābhir upasṛjati śvātrā stha vṛtraturo rādhogūrtā amṛtasya patnīs tā devīr devatremaṃ yajñaṃ dhattopahūtāḥ somasya pibatopahūto yuṣmākaṃ somaḥ pibatv iti
7.5.11	athainaṃ saṃprayauti yat te soma divi jyotir yat pṛthivyāṃ yad urāv antarikṣe tenāsmai yajamānāyoru rāyā kṛdhy adhi dātre voca iti
7.5.12	tiraścarman phalake abhimṛśati dhiṣaṇe vīḍū satī vīḍayethām ūrjaṃ dadhāthām ūrjaṃ me dhattaṃ mā vāṃ hiṃsiṣaṃ mā mā hiṃsiṣṭam iti
7.5.13	atha vṛddhīr vācayaty avīvṛdhaṃ vo manasā sujātā ṛtaprajātā bhaga id vaḥ syāma / indreṇa devīr vīrudhaḥ saṃvidānā anu manyantāṃ savanāya somam iti
7.5.14	saṃtṛptasya rājñaḥ pratiprasthātā savye pāṇau ṣaḍ aṃśūn sacate
7.5.15	athaitenaiva pāṇinopāṃśupātram ādatte
7.5.16	athopasṛṣṭaṃ rājānam aṣṭau kṛtvo 'gre 'bhiṣuṇoti
7.5.17	so 'ṃśau skanne vācayaty ā māskānt saha prajayā saha rāyaspoṣeṇendriyaṃ me vīryaṃ mā nirvadhīr iti
7.5.18	athāñjalinopahanti tūṣṇīm
7.5.19	antardadhāti pratiprasthātā
7.5.20	prathamābhyām aṃśubhyām ānayaty adhvaryur vācaspataye pavasva vājinn iti
7.5.21	sacata etāv aṃśū
7.5.22	tathopasṛṣṭaṃ rājānam ekādaśakṛtvo dvitīyam abhiṣuṇoti
7.5.23	nātrāṃśau skanne vācayati
7.5.24	tathāñjalinopahanti tūṣṇīm eva
7.5.25	antardadhāti pratiprasthātā
7.5.26	madhyamābhyām aṃśubhyām ānayaty adhvaryur vṛṣā vṛṣṇo aṃśubhyāṃ gabhastipūta iti
7.5.27	sacata etāv aṃśū
7.5.28	tathaivopasṛṣṭaṃ rājānaṃ dvādaśakṛtvas tṛtīyam abhiṣuṇoti
7.5.29	naivātrāṃśau skanne vācayati
7.5.30	tathaivāñjalinopahanti tūṣṇīm eva
7.5.31	antardadhāti pratiprasthātā
7.5.32	uttamābhyām aṃśubhyām ānayaty adhvaryur devo devānāṃ pavitram asi yeṣāṃ bhāgo 'si tebhyas tveti
7.5.33	sacata etāv aṃśū
7.5.34	athainam upāṃśusavanaṃ daśāpavitreṇa parimṛjya pūrvārdhe kharasya dakṣiṇāśirasaṃ nidadhāti
7.5.35	atha pratiprasthātur graham ādatte svāṃkṛto 'sīti
7.5.36	graham apayacchati
7.5.37	athainam avekṣate madhumatīr na iṣas kṛdhīti
7.5.38	athainam ūrdhvam unmārṣṭi viśvebhyas tvendriyebhyo divyebhyaḥ pārthivebhya iti
7.5.39	athainam ādāyopottiṣṭhati manas tvāṣṭv iti
7.5.40	aity urv antarikṣam anvihīti
7.5.41	etyāhavanīye juhoty anvārabdhe yajamāne svāhā tvā subhavaḥ sūryāya svāheti
7.5.42	hutvānuprāṇiti
7.5.43	vācayati bhūr asi śreṣṭho raśmīnāṃ prāṇapāḥ prāṇaṃ me pāhīti
7.5.44	athainam avācīnam avamṛjya pratīcā nīcā pāṇinā madhyame paridhau nimārṣṭi devebhyas tvā marīcipebhya iti
7.5.45	atha pradakṣiṇam āvṛtyāgrayaṇasthālyāṃ grahasya saṃsrāvam avanayaty eṣa te yonir iti
7.5.46	athaitasminn upāṃśupātre 'ṃśuṃ prāsyati
7.5.47	athainaṃ dakṣiṇata upāṃśusavanena saṃspṛṣṭaṃ sādayati prāṇāya tveti
7.5.48	vyānāya tvety upāṃśusavanaṃ pratyabhimṛśate
7.6.1	yāvad evātrādhvaryuś ceṣṭati tāvad eṣa pratiprasthātā rājany evāṃśūnāṃ dvau dvāv apisṛjati yat te somādābhyaṃ nāma jāgṛvi tasmai te soma somāya svāheti yat te soma yat te someti
7.6.2	athābhiṣoṣyantaḥ sarvaśa eva rājānaṃ paryupaviśanti
7.6.3	paścāt prāṅmukho 'dhvaryur upaviśati
7.6.4	tasya dakṣiṇaṃ bāhum anu yajamānaḥ
7.6.5	dakṣiṇataḥ pratiprasthātā
7.6.6	uttarata āgnīdhraḥ
7.6.7	antareṇa pratiprasthātāraṃ cāgnīdhraṃ ca yaś caturtho 'bhiṣuṇoti
7.6.8	athonnetāram āhāharopasṛjeti
7.6.9	upasṛjaty unnetādhavanīyād udacanena
7.6.10	uparyardhe hotṛcamase 'ṃśūn pariplāvayanti prāg apāg udag adharāk tās tvā diśa ādhāvantv amba niṣvareti
7.6.11	eṣa nigrābhaḥ
7.6.12	āpyāyayanti
7.6.13	vyapohante
7.6.14	abhiṣuṇvanti
7.6.15	nigrābham upayanti
7.6.16	āpyāyayanti
7.6.17	vyapohante
7.6.18	abhiṣuṇvanti
7.6.19	nigrābham upayanti
7.6.20	āpyāyayanti
7.6.21	vyapohante
7.6.22	abhiṣuṇvanti
7.6.23	na caturthe nigrābham upayanti
7.6.24	athainaṃ susaṃbhṛtaṃ saṃbharaṇyāṃ saṃbhṛtyonnetra utprayacchati
7.6.25	tam unnetādhavanīye 'vanayati
7.6.26	evam eva dvitīyaḥ paryāyaḥ saṃtiṣṭhate
7.6.27	evaṃ tṛtīyaḥ
7.6.28	ṛjīṣamantato daśāpavitreṇa pariveṣṭyonnetra utprayacchati
7.6.29	tad unnetādhavanīye vikṣālya prapīḍya dakṣiṇasya havirdhānasyāntareṇeṣe upāvahṛtya carmaṇi nidadhāti
7.6.30	tasmin saṃmukhān grāvṇaḥ kṛtvā caturdhaitad ṛjīṣaṃ grāvamukhebhyo vyapohati
7.6.31	athodgātā vā prastotā vā dakṣiṇasya havirdhānasya paścād akṣam upasṛpya prāñcaṃ grāvasu droṇakalaśam adhyūhati
7.6.32	tasminn udīcīnadaśaṃ daśāpavitraṃ vitanvanti
7.6.33	tena tathā kṛtenādityasyodayam ākāṅkṣante
7.6.34	udita āditye 'ntaryāmaṃ gṛhṇāty atipavamānasya rājña upayāmagṛhīto 'sy antar yaccha maghavan pāhi somam uruṣya rāyaḥ sam iṣo yajasvāntas te dadhāmi dyāvāpṛthivī antar urv antarikṣaṃ sajoṣā devair avaraiḥ paraiś cāntaryāme maghavan mādayasveti
7.6.35	svāṃkṛto 'sīti graham apayacchati
7.6.36	athainam avekṣate madhumatīr na iṣas kṛdhīti
7.6.37	athainam ūrdhvam unmārṣṭi viśvebhyas tvendriyebhyo divyebhyaḥ pārthivebhya iti
7.6.38	athainam ādāyopottiṣṭhati manas tvāṣṭv iti
7.6.39	aity urv antarikṣam anvihīti
7.6.40	etyāhavanīye juhoty anvārabdhe yajamāne svāhā tvā subhavaḥ sūryāya svāheti
7.6.41	hutvānvapāniti
7.6.42	vācayati dhūr asi śreṣṭho raśmīnām apānapā apānaṃ me pāhīti
7.6.43	athainam ūrdhvam unmṛjya prācottānena pāṇinā madhyame paridhāv unmārṣṭi devebhyas tvā marīcipebhya iti
7.6.44	atha pradakṣiṇam āvṛtyāgrayaṇasthālyāṃ grahasya saṃsrāvam avanayaty eṣa te yonir iti
7.6.45	athainam uttarata upāṃśusavanena saṃspṛṣṭaṃ sādayaty apānāya tveti
7.6.46	vyānāya tvety upāṃśusavanaṃ pratyabhimṛśate
7.6.47	athonnetāram āhāpramattaḥ saṃtatam ānayopāṃśu grahān grahīṣyāmīti
7.6.48	athādatta aindravāyavapātram
7.6.49	tad etad rāsnāvat parigrīvi bhavati
7.6.50	tena gṛhṇāty atipavamānasya rājña ā vāyo bhūṣa śucipā ity anudrutyopayāmagṛhīto 'si vāyave tvā juṣṭaṃ gṛhṇāmīti
7.6.51	athainam apayatya punar evopayacchatīndravāyū ime sutā ity anudrutyopayāmagṛhīto 'sīndravāyubhyāṃ tvā juṣṭaṃ gṛhṇāmīti
7.6.52	parimṛjya sādayaty eṣa te yoniḥ sajoṣābhyāṃ tveti
7.6.53	athādatte maitrāvaruṇapātram
7.6.54	tad etat pilakāvad bhavati
7.6.55	tena gṛhṇāty atipavamānasya rājño 'yaṃ vāṃ mitrāvaruṇety anudrutyopayāmagṛhīto 'si mitrāvaruṇābhyāṃ tvā juṣṭaṃ gṛhṇāmīti
7.6.56	barhiṣī antardhāya payasā śrīṇāti
7.6.57	apoddhṛtya barhiṣī daśāpavitreṇa parimṛjya sādayaty eṣa te yonir ṛtāyubhyāṃ tveti
7.6.58	athopātītyāśvinapātraṃ śukrapātram ādatte
7.6.59	tad etad bailvaṃ vā pālāśaṃ vā ślakṣṇaṃ bhavati
7.6.60	tena gṛhṇāty atipavamānasya rājño 'yaṃ venaś codayad ity anudrutyopayāmagṛhīto 'si śaṇḍāya tvā juṣṭaṃ gṛhṇāmīti
7.6.61	parimṛjya sādayaty eṣa te yonir vīratāṃ pāhīti
7.6.62	athādatte manthipātram
7.6.63	tad etad vaikaṅkataṃ ślakṣṇaṃ bhavati
7.6.64	tena gṛhṇāty atipavamānasya rājñas taṃ pratnathety anudrutyopayāmagṛhīto 'si markāya tvā juṣṭaṃ gṛhṇāmīti
7.6.65	barhiṣī antardhāya saktubhiḥ śrīṇāti
7.6.66	apoddhṛtya barhiṣī daśāpavitreṇa parimṛjya sādayaty eṣa te yoniḥ prajāḥ pāhīti
7.6.67	athādatta āgrayaṇasthālīm
7.6.68	tayā gṛhṇāty atipavamānasya rājño ye devā divy ekādaśa sthety anudrutyopayāmagṛhīto 'si viśvebhyas tvā devebhyo juṣṭaṃ gṛhṇāmīti
7.6.69	athaināṃ trir abhihiṅkaroti
7.7.1	hiṃ hiṃ hiṃ somaḥ pavate somaḥ pavate somaḥ pavate 'smai brahmaṇe pavate 'smai kṣatrāya pavate 'syai viśe pavata iṣe pavata ūrje pavate 'dbhyaḥ pavata oṣadhībhyaḥ pavate vanaspatibhyaḥ pavate dyāvāpṛthivībhyāṃ pavate subhūtāya pavate brahmavarcasāya pavate 'smai sunvate yajamānāya pavate mahyam ity upāṃśūktvā jyaiṣṭhyāya pavata ity uccaiḥ
7.7.2	athainam adhivadata āgrayaṇo 'si svāgrayaṇo jinva yajñaṃ jinva yajñapatim abhi savanā pāhi viṣṇus tvāṃ pātu viśaṃ tvaṃ pāhīndriyeṇeti
7.7.3	parimṛjya sādayaty eṣa te yonir viśvebhyas tvā devebhya iti
7.7.4	upabdimato 'ta ūrdhvaṃ grahān gṛhṇāti triṃśat trayaś ca gaṇino rujanta iti
7.7.5	rugṇavatyarcā bhrātṛvyato gṛhṇīyād iti brāhmaṇam
7.7.6	athādatta ukthyasthālīm
7.7.7	tayā gṛhṇāty atipavamānasya rājña upayāmagṛhīto 'sīndrāya tvā bṛhadvate vayasvata ukthāyuve yat ta indra bṛhad vayas tasmai tvā juṣṭaṃ gṛhṇāmīti
7.7.8	parimṛjya sādayaty eṣa te yonir indrāya tvokthāyuva iti
7.7.9	athādatte dhruvasthālīm
7.7.10	sa āha ye pūrvayā dvārā prāpatsata prāñcas te niṣkrāmantu ye 'parayā pratyañcas te mā vo 'bhiparihāriṣam iti
7.7.11	jaghanenābhiṣotṝn sonnetṛkān abhiparihṛtyottarata upayacchati mūrdhānaṃ divo aratiṃ pṛthivyā ity anudrutyopayāmagṛhīto 'sy agnaye tvā vaiśvānarāya juṣṭaṃ gṛhṇāmīti
7.7.12	athainam adhivadate dhruvo 'si dhruvakṣitir dhruvāṇāṃ dhruvatamo 'cyutānām acyutakṣittama iti
7.7.13	athainad yathāhṛtaṃ pratiparyāhṛtyottarasya havirdhānasyāgreṇopastambhanam anupopte sādayaty eṣa te yonir agnaye tvā vaiśvānarāyeti
7.7.14	dhruveṇa rājānaṃ paridadhāti
7.7.15	athoparyardhe droṇakalaśe pariplu pātraṃ prāsya drapsān anumantrayate drapsaś caskanda yas te drapso yo drapso yas te drapsa iti
7.7.16	athonnetāram āhāriktaṃ pūtabhṛtaṃ kuru pavamānasya grahān grahīṣyāmīti
7.7.17	tac chrutvonnetā pūtabhṛto bile pavitraṃ vitatya dvau vā trīn vā rājña udacanān ānayati
7.7.18	athārikte pūtabhṛti pavamānasya grahān gṛhṇāty upayāmagṛhīto 'si prajāpataye tveti droṇakalaśam abhimṛśati
7.7.19	indrāya tvety ādhavanīyam
7.7.20	viśvebhyas tvā devebhya iti pūtabhṛtam
7.7.21	athonnetar ity āha prāñcaṃ rājānaṃ pūtabhṛtam abhi saṃpavayatād daśābhir ādhavanīyaṃ mṛṣṭvā nyubjatād iti
7.7.22	sa tathā karoti
7.7.23	athāpa upaspṛśya barhiṣī ādāyopaniḥsarpati
7.7.24	taṃ niḥsarpantam anvārabhata udgātā
7.7.25	udgātāraṃ prastotā
7.7.26	prastotāraṃ pratihartā
7.7.27	pratihartāraṃ yajamānaḥ
7.7.28	yajamānaṃ brahmā
7.7.29	pratiprasthātā saptamaḥ sarpati
7.7.30	teṣu samanvārabdheṣv āhavanīye sruvāhutiṃ juhoti
7.8.1	agniḥ prātaḥsavane pātv asmān vaiśvānaro mahinā viśvaśaṃbhūḥ / sa naḥ pāvako draviṇaṃ dadhātv āyuṣmantaḥ sahabhakṣāḥ syāma svāhety etayādhvaryū juhutaḥ
7.8.2	yathāvedam itare juhvati
7.8.3	athodañco 'bhi pavamānaṃ sarpanti
7.8.4	prahva evādhvaryuḥ prathamo barhiṣī dhuvānaḥ sarpati vāg agregā agra etv ṛjugā devebhyo yaśo mayi dadhatī prāṇān paśuṣu prajāṃ mayi ca yajamāne ceti
7.8.5	athāstāve yathāyatanam upaviśanti
7.8.6	athodgātre vā prastotre vā barhiṣī prayacchaty ṛksāmayor upastaraṇam asi mithunasya prajātyā iti vā tūṣṇīṃ vā
7.8.7	athopākaraṇaṃ japati vāyur hiṅkartāgniḥ prastotā prajāpatiḥ sāma bṛhaspatir udgātā viśve devā upagātāro marutaḥ pratihartāra indro nidhanaṃ te devāḥ prāṇabhṛtaḥ prāṇaṃ mayi dadhatv oṃ studhvam iti
7.8.8	sa eṣa trivṛd bahiṣpavamāno bhavati
7.8.9	tasya pañcamyāṃ prastutāyāṃ vācayati śyeno 'si gāyatracchandā anu tvārabhe svasti mā saṃpārayeti
7.8.10	atra daśahotāraṃ vyācaṣṭe
7.8.11	uddrute sāmni saṃpraiṣam āhāgnīd agnīn vihara barhi stṛṇāhi puroḍāśāṃ alaṃkuru pratiprasthātaḥ paśur antike 'stv iti
7.8.12	yathāsaṃpraiṣaṃ tau kurutaḥ
7.8.13	athāpa upaspṛśyāhaihi yajamāneti
7.8.14	pūrvayā dvārā havirdhānaṃ prapādya samastaṃ rājānam upatiṣṭhate viṣṇo tvaṃ no antama iti
7.8.15	athādatta āśvinapātram
7.8.16	tad etad dvyaśri bhavati
7.8.17	tasmin gṛhṇāti droṇakalaśāt pariplunā pātreṇa yā vāṃ kaśety anudrutyopayāmagṛhīto 'sy aśvibhyāṃ tvā juṣṭaṃ gṛhṇāmīti
7.8.18	parimṛjya sādayaty eṣa te yonir mādhvībhyāṃ tveti
7.8.19	athāpa upaspṛśyāhaihi yajamāneti
7.8.20	āhavanīyaṃ drutvā sruci caturgṛhītaṃ gṛhītvā saptahotāraṃ manasānudrutyāhavanīye juhoty anvārabdhe yajamāne svāheti
7.8.21	athāvakāśaiś carati paribhūr agniṃ paribhūr indram ity etenānuvākena
7.8.22	atha pracaraṇyāṃ navakṛtvo gṛhṇīte
7.8.23	athaiṣa āgnīdhra āgnīdhrīyād dhiṣṇiyād anupūrvaṃ dhiṣṇiyeṣv aṅgārān viharati
7.8.24	atha purastātpratyaṅṅ āsīno vihṛtān dhiṣṇiyān vyāghārayati yathānyuptair mantraiḥ
7.8.25	sa yady u ha yathānyuptam abhijuhoti sapta ta ity āgnīdhre 'ntato juhoti
7.8.26	yady u vai svāhā svāheti svāhety evāntata āgnīdhrīye juhoty udaksaṃsthatāyā iti
7.8.27	athottarasya havirdhānasya cubuke pracaraṇīṃ sādayati
7.8.28	atha sāṃkāśinena pathā pṛṣṭhyāṃ stṛṇāti saṃtatāṃ gārhapatyād āhavanīyāt
7.9.1	athādhvaryū raśanāhasto yūpam abhyaiti
7.9.2	udūhya pūrvāṃ raśanāṃ nābhidaghne parivyayann āha parivīyamāṇāyānubrūhīti
7.9.3	svarvantaṃ yūpam utsṛjyāgneyaṃ paśum upākaroti
7.9.4	samānaṃ karmā pravarāt
7.9.5	prasiddhaṃ hotāraṃ vṛṇīte
7.9.6	athāśrāvayaty o śrāvayāstu śrauṣaḍ aśvinādhvaryū ādhvaryavād ity ahaṃ cāsau ca mānuṣāv iti
7.9.7	pratiprasthātur nāma gṛhṇāti
7.9.8	athāśrāvayaty o śrāvayāstu śrauṣaṇ mitrāvaruṇau praśāstārau praśāstrād ity asau mānuṣa iti
7.9.9	maitrāvaruṇasya nāma gṛhṇāti
7.9.10	athāśrāvayaty o śrāvayāstu śrauṣaḍ indro brahmā brāhmaṇād ity asau mānuṣa iti
7.9.11	brāhmaṇācchaṃsino nāma gṛhṇāti
7.9.12	athāśrāvayaty o śrāvayāstu śrauṣaṇ marutaḥ potrād ity asau mānuṣa iti
7.9.13	potur nāma gṛhṇāti
7.9.14	athāśrāvayaty o śrāvayāstu śrauṣaḍ gnāvo neṣṭrād ity asau mānuṣa iti
7.9.15	neṣṭur nāma gṛhṇāti
7.9.16	athāśrāvayaty o śrāvayāstu śrauṣaḍ agnim āgnīdhrād ity asau mānuṣa iti
7.9.17	agnīdho nāma gṛhṇāti
7.9.18	teṣāṃ pravṛtaḥpravṛta eva pravṛtāhutīr juhoti
7.9.19	juṣṭo vāco bhūyāsam ṛcā stomaṃ samardhaya sūryo mā devo devebhyaḥ pātv ity etābhir adhvaryū juhutaḥ
7.9.20	yathāvedam itare juhvati
7.9.21	athāśrāvayaty o śrāvayāstu śrauṣaḍ agnir ha daivīnāṃ viśāṃ puraetāyaṃ sunvan yajamāno manuṣyāṇāṃ tayor asthūri gārhapatyaṃ dīdayac chataṃ himā dvā yū rādhāṃsīt saṃpṛñcānāv asaṃpṛñcānau tanva iti
7.9.22	samānaṃ karmā vapāyai
7.9.23	vapayā pracarya vapāśrapaṇī anuprahṛtya samutkramya cātvāle mārjayante
7.9.24	atha yajamānam utkare sphyavighanān upasthāpayati
7.10.1	sphyaḥ svastir vighanaḥ svastiḥ parśur vediḥ paraśur naḥ svastiḥ / yajñiyā yajñakṛta stha te māsmin yajña upahvayadhvam upa mā dyāvāpṛthivī hvayetām upāstāvaḥ kalaśaḥ somo agnir upa devā upa yajña upa mā hotrā upahave hvayantām iti
7.10.2	atha namo 'gnaye makhaghne makhasya mā yaśo 'ryād ity āhavanīyam upatiṣṭhate
7.10.3	namo rudrāya makhaghne namaskṛtyā mā pāhīty āgnīdhram
7.10.4	nama indrāya makhaghna indriyaṃ me vīryaṃ mā nirvadhīr iti hotrīyam
7.10.5	atha prāṅ āvṛtya japati dṛḍhe sthaḥ śithire samīcī māṃhasas pātaṃ sūryo mā devo divyād aṃhasas pātu vāyur antarikṣād agniḥ pṛthivyā yamaḥ pitṛbhyaḥ sarasvatī manuṣyebhya iti
7.10.6	atha pradakṣiṇam āvṛtya pūrve dvārau sadasaḥ saṃmṛśati devī dvārau mā mā saṃtāptam iti
7.10.7	atha sadaḥ prapadyate namaḥ sadase namaḥ sadasas pataye namaḥ sakhīnāṃ purogāṇāṃ cakṣuṣe namo dive namaḥ pṛthivyā iti
7.10.8	athāsanād bahiḥsadasaṃ tṛṇaṃ nirasyaty ahe daidhiṣavyod atas tiṣṭhānyasya sadane sīda yo 'smat pākatara iti
7.10.9	upaviśaty un nivata ud udvataś ca geṣam iti
7.10.10	atheme samīkṣate pātaṃ mā dyāvāpṛthivī adyāhna iti
7.10.11	atha dakṣiṇārdhaṃ parekṣata āganta pitaraḥ pitṛmān ahaṃ yuṣmābhir bhūyāsaṃ suprajaso mayā yūyaṃ bhūyāsteti
7.10.12	athottarārdhaṃ parekṣate
7.10.13	udaksaṃsthatāyā iti
7.11.1	athemāv adhvaryū āhavanīyaprabhṛty evam evāhavanīyam upatiṣṭhete
7.11.2	evam āgnīdhrīyam
7.11.3	evaṃ hotrīyam
7.11.4	evaṃ prāñcāv āvṛtya japataḥ
7.11.5	evaṃ pradakṣiṇam āvṛtya pūrve dvārau sadasaḥ saṃmṛśataḥ
7.11.6	evaṃ sadaḥ prapadyete
7.11.7	evam āsanābhyāṃ bahiḥsadasaṃ tṛṇe nirasyataḥ
7.11.8	dakṣiṇam evādhvaryur dvārbāhuṃ niśrayamāṇa upaviśati
7.11.9	uttaraṃ pratiprasthātā
7.11.10	evam ime samīkṣete
7.11.11	evaṃ dakṣiṇārdhaṃ cottarārdhaṃ ca prekṣete
7.11.12	udaksaṃsthatāyā iti
7.11.13	atheme vaṣaṭkartāra āhavanīyaprabhṛty evam evāhavanīyam upatiṣṭhante
7.11.14	evam āgnīdhrīyam
7.11.15	tam uttareṇa pariyanti
7.11.16	evaṃ hotrīyam
7.11.17	evaṃ prāñca āvṛtya japanti
7.11.18	evaṃ pradakṣiṇam āvṛtya pūrve dvārau sadasaḥ saṃmṛśanti
7.11.19	evaṃ sadaḥ prapadyante
7.11.20	agreṇa dhiṣṇiyān uttareṇācchāvākasya dhiṣṇiyaṃ parītyaivam āsanebhyo bahiḥsadasaṃ tṛṇāni nirasyanti
7.11.21	evaṃ svaṃ svam eva dhiṣṇiyam anūpaviśanti
7.11.22	evam ime samīkṣante
7.11.23	evaṃ dakṣiṇārdhaṃ cottarārdhaṃ ca prekṣante
7.11.24	udaksaṃsthatāyā iti
7.11.25	atheme sarva udgātāro brahmā sadasya ity avaṣaṭkartāra āhavanīyaprabhṛty evam evāhavanīyam upatiṣṭhante
7.11.26	evam āgnīdhrīyam
7.11.27	tam uttareṇa pariyanti
7.11.28	evaṃ hotrīyam
7.11.29	evaṃ prāñca āvṛtya japanti
7.11.30	evaṃ pradakṣiṇam āvṛtyottareṇa sadaḥ parītyaivam apare dvārau sadasaḥ saṃmṛśanti
7.11.31	evaṃ sadaḥ prapadyante
7.11.32	evam āsanebhyo bahiḥsadasaṃ tṛṇāni nirasyanti
7.11.33	audumbarīm evodgātāraḥ paryupaviśanti
7.11.34	dakṣiṇata udaṅmukhau brahmā sadasya ity upaviśataḥ
7.11.35	evam ime samīkṣante
7.11.36	evaṃ dakṣiṇārdhaṃ cottarārdhaṃ ca prekṣante
7.11.37	udaksaṃsthatāyā iti
7.11.38	athaiteṣāṃ visaṃsthitasaṃcaraḥ
7.11.39	antareṇa hotuś ca dhiṣṇiyaṃ brāhmaṇācchaṃsinaś ca ye 'dhiṣṇiyāḥ
7.11.40	atha dhiṣṇiyavantaḥ svaṃ svam eva dhiṣṇiyam uttareṇottareṇa pariyanti
7.11.41	te saṃsthite savane yathāprasṛptam eva viniḥsarpanti
7.12.1	saṃprasṛptān viditvādhvaryuḥ savanīyān puroḍāśān yācati
7.12.2	athaiṣa āgnīdhro jaghanena gārhapatyam upaviśya pātryāṃ pañcadhopastṛṇīte
7.12.3	madhyataḥ puroḍāśam upastīrṇābhighāritam udvāsayati
7.12.4	purastād dhānāḥ
7.12.5	dakṣiṇataḥ karambham
7.12.6	paścāt parivāpam
7.12.7	āmikṣām uttarataḥ
7.12.8	athaināni saṃparigṛhya pūrvayā dvāropanirhṛtyottareṇa sadaḥ parītyottareṇāgnīdhrīyaṃ dhiṣṇiyaṃ paryāhṛtyāntarvedy āsādayati
7.12.9	atha juhūpabhṛtor upastṛṇāna āha prātaḥ prātaḥsāvasyendrāya puroḍāśānām avadīyamānānām anubrūhīti
7.12.10	dviḥ puroḍāśasyāvadyati
7.12.11	dvir dhānānām
7.12.12	dviḥ karambhasya
7.12.13	dviḥ parivāpasya
7.12.14	dvir āmikṣāyāḥ
7.12.15	abhighārayati
7.12.16	pratyanakti
7.12.17	athopabhṛti sviṣṭakṛte sarveṣāṃ sakṛt sakṛd uttarārdhād avadyati
7.12.18	dvir abhighārayati
7.12.19	na pratyanakti
7.12.20	atyākramyāśrāvyāha prātaḥ prātaḥsāvasyendrāya puroḍāśān prasthitān preṣyeti
7.12.21	vaṣaṭkṛte juhoti
7.12.22	atha samāvapamāna āhāgnaye 'nubrūhīti
7.12.23	āśrāvyāhāgnaye preṣyeti
7.12.24	vaṣaṭkṛta uttarārdhapūrvārdhe 'tihāya pūrvā āhutīr juhoti
7.12.25	athodaṅṅ atyākramya yathāyatanaṃ srucau sādayitvā pātryām iḍāṃ samavadhāya pratīcaḥ puroḍāśān prahiṇoti
7.12.26	anu haike saṃyanti paśava iḍeti vadantaḥ
7.12.27	atha prāṅ āyann āha vāyava indravāyubhyām anubrūhīti
7.12.28	tac chrutvā pratiprasthātaindravāyavasya pratinirgrāhyaṃ gṛhṇāti droṇakalaśāt pariplunā pātreṇādityasthālyā aupaśaye pātra upayāmagṛhīto 'si vākṣasad asi vākpābhyāṃ tvā kratupābhyām asya yajñasya dhruvasyādhyakṣābhyāṃ gṛhṇāmīti
7.12.29	grahāv ādāyopaniṣkrāmati
7.12.30	upaniṣkrāntasyaivādhvaryur grahāv ādatte
7.12.31	uttaratas tiṣṭhate pratiprasthātre pratinirgrāhyaṃ prayacchati
7.12.32	atha vai bhavati
7.12.33	aindravāyavam ādāyāghāram āghārayed iti
7.12.34	sa ājyasthālyāḥ sruveṇopahatyaindravāyavam ādāyāghāram āghārayaty adhvaro yajño 'yam astu devā oṣadhībhyaḥ paśave no janāya viśvasmai bhūtāyādhvaro 'si sa pinvasva ghṛtavad deva soma svāheti
7.12.35	athāśrāvayaty o śrāvayāstu śrauṣaḍ vāyava indravāyubhyāṃ preṣyeti
7.12.36	vaṣaṭkṛte 'dhvaryuḥ pūrvo juhoti
7.12.37	dvitīyaṃ vaṣaṭkṛte sahobhau juhutaḥ
7.12.38	hutvā vācayati yo na indravāyū abhidāsati bhrātṛvya utpipīte śubhaspatī idam ahaṃ tam adharaṃ pādayāmi yathendrāham uttamaś cetayānīti
7.12.39	atha pratiprasthātādhvaryoḥ pātre grahasya saṃsrāvam avanayati
7.12.40	ubhayor ardham adhvaryuḥ pratiprasthātuḥ pātre 'vanayati
7.12.41	taṃ pratiprasthātādityasthālyām avanayati devebhyas tveti
7.12.42	athādhvaryuḥ pradakṣiṇam āvṛtya pratyaṅṅ ādrutya hotre pātraṃ pradāya prāṅ āyann āha mitrāvaruṇābhyām anubrūhīti
7.12.43	tac chrutvā pratiprasthātā maitrāvaruṇasya pratinirgrāhyaṃ gṛhṇāti droṇakalaśāt pariplunā pātreṇādityasthālyā aupaśaye pātra upayāmagṛhīto 'sy ṛtasad asi cakṣuṣpābhyāṃ tvā kratupābhyām asya yajñasya dhruvasyādhyakṣābhyāṃ gṛhṇāmīti
7.12.44	grahāv ādāyopaniṣkrāmati
7.12.45	upaniṣkrāntasyaivādhvaryur grahāv ādatte
7.12.46	uttaratas tiṣṭhate pratiprasthātre pratinirgrāhyaṃ prayacchati
7.12.47	athāśrāvayaty o śrāvayāstu śrauṣaṇ mitrāvaruṇābhyāṃ preṣyeti
7.12.48	vaṣaṭkṛte sahobhau juhutaḥ
7.12.49	hutvā vācayati yo no mitrāvaruṇāv abhidāsati bhrātṛvya utpipīte śubhaspatī idam ahaṃ tam adharaṃ pādayāmi yathendrāham uttamaś cetayānīti
7.12.50	atha pratiprasthātādhvaryoḥ pātre grahasya saṃsrāvam avanayati
7.12.51	ubhayor ardham adhvaryuḥ pratiprasthātuḥ pātre 'vanayati
7.12.52	taṃ pratiprasthātādityasthālyām avanayati viśvadevebhyas tveti
7.12.53	athādhvaryuḥ pradakṣiṇam āvṛtya pratyaṅṅ ādrutya hotre pātraṃ pradāya prāṅ āyann āhāśvibhyām anubrūhīti
7.12.54	tac chrutvā pratiprasthātāśvinasya pratinirgrāhyaṃ gṛhṇāti droṇakalaśāt pariplunā pātreṇādityasthālyā aupaśaye pātra upayāmagṛhīto 'si śrutasad asi śrotrapābhyāṃ tvā kratupābhyām asya yajñasya dhruvasyādhyakṣābhyāṃ gṛhṇāmīti
7.12.55	grahāv ādāyopaniṣkrāmati
7.12.56	upaniṣkrāntasyaivādhvaryur grahāv ādatte
7.12.57	uttaratas tiṣṭhate pratiprasthātre pratinirgrāhyaṃ prayacchati
7.12.58	athāśrāvayaty o śrāvayāstu śrauṣaḍ aśvibhyāṃ preṣyeti
7.12.59	vaṣaṭkṛte sahobhau juhutaḥ
7.12.60	hutvā vācayati yo no 'śvināv abhidāsati bhrātṛvya utpipīte śubhaspatī idam ahaṃ tam adharaṃ pādayāmi yathendrāham uttamaś cetayānīti
7.12.61	atha pratiprasthātādhvaryoḥ pātre grahasya saṃsrāvam avanayati
7.12.62	ubhayor ardham adhvaryuḥ pratiprasthātuḥ pātre 'vanayati
7.12.63	taṃ pratiprasthātādityasthālyām avanayati viśvebhyas tvā devebhya iti
7.13.1	sa yady u haitaiḥ saṃsrāvair uparyardhā sthālī bhavaty etenaināṃ pātreṇāpidadhāti
7.13.2	yady u vai noparyardhā bhavati droṇakalaśād enām uparyardhāṃ kṛtvaitenaiva pātreṇāpidadhāti viṣṇav urukramaiṣa te somas taṃ rakṣasva taṃ te duścakṣā māvakhyad iti
7.13.3	athādhvaryuḥ pradakṣiṇam āvṛtya pratyaṅṅ ādrutya hotre pātraṃ pradāya prāṅ āyann āhonnīyamānebhyo 'nubrūhi hotuś camasam anūnnayadhvam ubhayataḥśukrān kurudhvam acchāvākasya camasādhvaryo mā tu tvam unneṣṭhāḥ pratiprasthātaś caturbhir mā śakalaiḥ prokṣitāprokṣitaiḥ pratyupalambasveti
7.13.4	yathāsaṃpraiṣaṃ te kurvanti
7.13.5	droṇakalaśād eva prathamam unnayanti
7.13.6	atha pūtabhṛtaḥ
7.13.7	atha droṇakalaśāt
7.13.8	ta ubhayataḥśukrāḥ
7.13.9	hotṛcamasam eva prathamam unnayanti
7.13.10	yathopapādam itarān
7.13.11	samunnīyottaravedyāṃ saṃsādayanti
7.13.12	atha pratiprasthātā caturṇāṃ śakalānāṃ dvau prokṣati
7.13.13	dvāv aprokṣitau bhavataḥ
7.13.14	prokṣitābhyām apidhāyāprokṣitābhyām upayacchataḥ
7.13.15	śukram evādhvaryur ādatte
7.13.16	manthinaṃ pratiprasthātā
7.13.17	grahāv ādāyopaniṣkrāmataḥ
7.13.18	dakṣiṇam evādhvaryur dvārbāhuṃ niśrayamāṇa upaniṣkrāmati
7.13.19	uttaraṃ pratiprasthātā
7.13.20	tau jaghanenottaravediṃ grahau saṃdhatta āyuḥ saṃdhattaṃ tan me jinvataṃ prāṇaṃ saṃdhattaṃ taṃ me jinvatam apānaṃ saṃdhattaṃ taṃ me jinvataṃ vyānaṃ saṃdhattaṃ taṃ me jinvataṃ cakṣuḥ saṃdhattaṃ tan me jinvataṃ śrotraṃ saṃdhattaṃ tan me jinvatam iti
7.13.21	ṣaḍbhiḥ saṃdhābhiḥ saṃdhāya vyutkrāmataḥ
7.13.22	stuto 'si janadhā devās tvā śukrapāḥ praṇayantu suvīrāḥ prajāḥ prajanayan parīhi śukraḥ śukraśociṣety adhvaryur dakṣiṇenottaravediṃ parikrāmati
7.13.23	stuto 'si janadhā devās tvā manthipāḥ praṇayantu suprajāḥ prajāḥ prajanayan parīhi manthī manthiśociṣeti pratiprasthātottareṇottaravediṃ parikrāmati
7.13.24	tau purastātpratyañcāv uttaravedim adhidravata indreṇa sayujo vayaṃ sāsahyāma pṛtanyataḥ / ghnanto vṛtrāṇy aprati
7.13.25	yat te agne tejas tenāhaṃ tejasvī bhūyāsaṃ yat te agne varcas tenāhaṃ varcasvī bhūyāsaṃ yat te agne haras tenāhaṃ harasvī bhūyāsam iti
7.13.26	athāntareṇa yūpaṃ cāhavanīyaṃ ca grahau saṃdhatta āyu stha āyur me dhattam āyur yajñāya dhattam āyur yajñapataye dhattaṃ prāṇa sthaḥ prāṇaṃ me dhattaṃ prāṇaṃ yajñāya dhattaṃ prāṇaṃ yajñapataye dhattam apāna stho 'pānaṃ me dhattam apānaṃ yajñāya dhattam apānaṃ yajñapataye dhattaṃ vyāna stho vyānaṃ me dhattaṃ vyānaṃ yajñāya dhattaṃ vyānaṃ yajñapataye dhattaṃ cakṣu sthaś cakṣur me dhattaṃ cakṣur yajñāya dhattaṃ cakṣur yajñapataye dhattaṃ śrotraṃ sthaḥ śrotraṃ me dhattaṃ śrotraṃ yajñāya dhattaṃ śrotraṃ yajñapataye dhattam iti
7.13.27	ṣaḍbhiḥ saṃdhābhiḥ saṃdhāya vyutkrāmataḥ
7.14.1	tau devau śukrāmanthinau kalpayataṃ daivīr viśaḥ kalpayataṃ mānuṣīr iṣam ūrjam asmāsu dhattaṃ prāṇān paśuṣu prajāṃ mayi ca yajamāne ceti
7.14.2	athāprokṣitau śakalau bahirvedi nirasyataḥ
7.14.3	nirastaḥ śaṇḍaḥ sahāmunety adhvaryur yaṃ yajamāno dveṣṭi taṃ manasā dhyāyati
7.14.4	nirasto markaḥ sahāmuneti pratiprasthātā yaṃ yajamāno dveṣṭi taṃ manasā dhyāyati
7.14.5	athāpa upaspṛśya prokṣitāv abhyādhattaḥ
7.14.6	śukraiṣā te samit tayā samidhyasva svāhety adhvaryuḥ
7.14.7	manthinn eṣā te samit tayā samidhyasva svāheti pratiprasthātā
7.14.8	etasmin kāle camasādhvaryavaś camasān upodyacchante
7.14.9	athādhvaryuḥ purastāt pratyaṅ tiṣṭhann āśrāvayaty o śrāvayāstu śrauṣaṭ prātaḥ prātaḥsāvasya śukravato manthivato madhuścuta indrāya somān prasthitān preṣyeti
7.14.10	vaṣaṭkṛte sahobhau juhutaḥ sa prathamaḥ saṃkṛtir viśvakarmā sa prathamo mitro varuṇo agniḥ / sa prathamo bṛhaspatiś cikitvān tasmā indrāya sutam ājuhomi svāheti
7.14.11	vaṣaṭkṛtānuvaṣaṭkṛte dvir juhutaḥ
7.14.12	tathaiva dvir dviḥ sarvāṃś camasāñ juhvati
7.14.13	atha saṃpraiṣam āha praitu hotuś camasaḥ pra brahmaṇaḥ prodgātuḥ pra yajamānasya pra sadasyasya hotrakāṇāṃ camasādhvaryavaḥ sakṛtsakṛd droṇakalaśād abhyunnīyopāvartadhvaṃ hotuś camasādhvaryav uparamaihi pratiprasthātar uttarārdha āhavanīyasya manthinaḥ saṃsrāvaṃ juhudhīti
7.14.14	yathāsaṃpraiṣaṃ te kurvanti
7.14.15	atha pradakṣiṇam āvṛtya hotṛcamase grahasya saṃsrāvam avanayati hutaṃ tvā hute 'vanayāmy ūrjasvantaṃ devebhyo madhumantaṃ manuṣyebhya iti vā tūṣṇīṃ vā
7.14.16	atha pratiprasthātottarārdha āhavanīyasya manthinaḥ saṃsrāvaṃ juhoty eṣa te rudra bhāgo yaṃ nirayācathās taṃ juṣasva vider gaupatyaṃ rāyas poṣaṃ suvīryaṃ saṃvatsarīṇāṃ svastiṃ svāheti
7.14.17	athāpa upaspṛśya śukrapātraṃ ca manthipātraṃ ca khare yathāyatanaṃ sādayati
7.14.18	yanty ete mahartvijāṃ camasāḥ
7.14.19	athaite hotrakāṇāṃ camasādhvaryavaḥ sakṛt sakṛd droṇakalaśād abhyunnīyopāvartante
7.14.20	teṣāṃ maitrāvaruṇacamasam ādāyāśrāvyāha praśāstar yajeti
7.14.21	vaṣaṭkṛtānuvaṣaṭkṛte dvir juhoti
7.14.22	brahman yaja potar yaja neṣṭar yajāgnīd yajeti pañca hotrāḥ saṃyājya pradakṣiṇam āvṛtya pratyaṅṅ ādrutyāgreṇa hotāram upaviśaty ayāḍ agnīd iti
7.14.23	sa bhadram akar ity āha hotā yo naḥ somaṃ rājānaṃ pāyayiṣyatīti
7.14.24	atha hotādatta aindravāyavapātram
7.14.25	āttam evādhvaryur anvārabhate
7.14.26	anvārabdhe 'dhvaryau hotopahavam iṣṭvā bhakṣayati yathā sa veda
7.14.27	tathānvārabdhe hotary adhvaryur upahavam iṣṭvā bhakṣayati mayi vasuḥ purovasur vākpā vācaṃ me pāhīti
7.14.28	atha hotā bhakṣayati
7.14.29	athādhvaryuḥ
7.14.30	athainad dhotre 'nuṣajati
7.14.31	tad dhotā yathāyatanaṃ sādayati
7.14.32	atha hotādatte maitrāvaruṇapātram
7.14.33	āttam evādhvaryur anvārabhate
7.14.34	anvārabdhe 'dhvaryau hotopahavam iṣṭvā bhakṣayati yathā sa veda
7.14.35	tathānvārabdhe hotary adhvaryur upahavam iṣṭvā bhakṣayati mayi vasur vidadvasuś cakṣuṣpāś cakṣur me pāhīti
7.14.36	athainad dhotre 'nuṣajati
7.14.37	tad dhotā yathāyatanaṃ sādayati
7.14.38	atha hotādatta āśvinapātram
7.14.39	āttam evādhvaryur anvārabhate
7.14.40	anvārabdhe 'dhvaryau hotopahavam iṣṭvā bhakṣayati yathā sa veda
7.14.41	tathānvārabdhe hotary adhvaryur upahavam iṣṭvā bhakṣayati mayi vasuḥ saṃyadvasuḥ śrotrapāḥ śrotraṃ me pāhīti
7.14.42	sarvataḥ parihāram āśvinaṃ bhakṣayatīti brāhmaṇam
7.14.43	athainad dhotre 'nuṣajati
7.14.44	tad dhotā yathāyatanaṃ sādayati
7.14.45	athāpa upaspṛśya hotra iḍām upodyacchante
7.15.1	upahūyamānāyām iḍāyām upapragṛhṇanti camasān
7.15.2	upahūtāyām iḍāyām anāhitam agnīdhe bhavati
7.15.3	athaitāni dvidevatyapātrāṇy ariktāni karoti
7.15.4	puroḍāśaśakalam aindravāyavapātre prāsyati
7.15.5	āmikṣāṃ maitrāvaruṇapātre
7.15.6	dhānā āśvinapātre
7.15.7	athaināni saṃparigṛhya pūrvayā dvāropanirhṛtyāparayā dvārā havirdhānaṃ prapādya dakṣiṇasya havirdhānasyottarasyāṃ vartanyāṃ sādayati
7.15.8	tāny ā tṛtīyasavanāt pariśere
7.15.9	athāgnīdha ādadhāti ṣaḍavattam
7.15.10	prāśnanti
7.15.11	mārjayante
7.15.12	iḍopahūtāṃś camasān bhakṣayanti bhakṣehi māviśeti dīrghabhakṣam anudrutya vasumadgaṇasya soma deva te matividaḥ prātaḥsavanasya gāyatracchandasa indrapītasya madhumata upahūtasyopahūto bhakṣayāmīti
7.15.13	hotṛcamasam evaite trayaḥ samupahūya bhakṣayanti
7.15.14	yathācamasaṃ camasān
7.15.15	hinva ma ity ātmānaṃ pratyabhimṛśante
7.15.16	āpyāyayanti camasān āpyāyasva sametu ta iti
7.15.17	sīdanti nārāśaṃsā āpyāyitā dakṣiṇasya havirdhānasyāpālambam adho'dha aindrāgnāya
7.15.18	athaiṣo 'cchāvāko 'greṇa sada āste
7.15.19	tasmai mahatpuroḍāśaśakalam ādadhad āhācchāvāka vadasva yat te vādyam iti
7.15.20	sa yatrācchāvākasyābhijānāty upo asmān brāhmaṇān brāhmaṇā hvayadhvam iti tad āha hotar acchāvāko vā ayam upahavam icchate tam upahvayasveti
7.15.21	tam ṛcā hotopahvayate
7.15.22	atha prāṅ āyann āhonnīyamānāyānubrūhy acchāvākasya camasādhvaryav unnayasvobhayataḥśukraṃ kuruṣveti
7.15.23	sa tathā karoti
7.15.24	atha prāṅ etyācchāvākacamasam ādāyāśrāvyāhācchāvāka yajeti
7.15.25	vaṣaṭkṛtānuvaṣaṭkṛte hutvā harati bhakṣam
7.15.26	sa yady asminn acchāvāka upahavam icchata upaivainaṃ hvayate
7.15.27	no tveva saṃbhakṣayataḥ
7.15.28	sīdaty asya nārāśaṃsa āpyāyitaḥ
7.15.29	athāhācchāvāka sīda neṣṭaḥ patnīm udānayāgnīd acchāvākaṃ me sannaṃ prabrūtād iti
7.15.30	sīdaty eṣo 'cchāvāko jaghanena svaṃ dhiṣṇiyam
7.15.31	ānayati neṣṭā patnīṃ pannejanīr ādāya prehy udehīty etena nigadena
7.15.32	athaināṃ pūrvayā dvāropaniṣkramayyāparayā dvārā sadaḥ prapādya jaghanena neṣṭur dhiṣṇiyam asaṃcare sāmapathe pannejanīḥ sādayati vasubhyo rudrebhya ādityebhyo viśvebhyo devebhyaḥ pannejanīḥ sādayāmi yajñāya vaḥ pannejanīḥ sādayāmīti
7.15.33	athāhāgnīdhraḥ sanno 'cchāvāko 'cchāvākaṃ sannam upa pannejanīr asīṣadann iti
7.15.34	etasmin kāla āgnīdhre yajamānaḥ puroḍāśānāṃ prāśnāti
7.15.35	yadaśanā syāt patnī patnīśāle
7.16.1	athartupātre ādadāte dakṣiṇam evādhvaryur uttaraṃ pratiprasthātā
7.16.2	adhvaryuḥ pūrvo vāyavyena droṇakalaśād gṛhṇāty upayāmagṛhīto 'si madhave tvā juṣṭaṃ gṛhṇāmīti
7.16.3	atha pratiprasthātā gṛhṇāty upayāmagṛhīto 'si mādhavāya tvā juṣṭaṃ gṛhṇāmīti
7.16.4	grahāv ādāyopaniṣkrāmataḥ
7.16.5	dakṣiṇam evādhvaryur dvārbāhuṃ niśrayamāṇa upaniṣkrāmati
7.16.6	uttaraṃ pratiprasthātā dvārbāhuṃ niśrayamāṇa uparamati
7.16.7	athādhvaryur āśrāvayaty o śrāvayāstu śrauṣaḍ ṛtunā preṣyeti
7.16.8	vaṣaṭkṛte juhoti

7.16.10	prapadyate 'dhvaryuḥ

7.16.13	vaṣaṭkṛte juhoti

7.16.15	prapadyate pratiprasthātā
7.16.16	sa gṛhṇāty upayāmagṛhīto 'si śucaye tvā juṣṭaṃ gṛhṇāmīti
7.16.17	athādhvaryur āśrāvayaty o śrāvayāstu śrauṣaḍ ṛtunā preṣyeti
7.16.18	vaṣaṭkṛte juhoti
7.16.19	niṣkrāmaty eva pratiprasthātā
7.16.20	prapadyate 'dhvaryuḥ
7.16.21	sa gṛhṇāty upayāmagṛhīto 'si nabhāya tvā juṣṭaṃ gṛhṇāmīti
7.16.22	atha pratiprasthātāśrāvayaty o śrāvayāstu śrauṣaḍ ṛtunā preṣyeti
7.16.23	vaṣaṭkṛte juhoti
7.16.24	niṣkrāmaty evādhvaryuḥ
7.16.25	prapadyate pratiprasthātā
7.16.26	sa gṛhṇāty upayāmagṛhīto 'si nabhasyāya tvā juṣṭaṃ gṛhṇāmīti
7.16.27	athādhvaryur āśrāvayaty o śrāvayāstu śrauṣaḍ ṛtunā preṣyeti
7.16.28	vaṣaṭkṛte juhoti
7.16.29	niṣkrāmaty eva pratiprasthātā
7.16.30	prapadyate 'dhvaryur viparyasya pātram
7.16.31	sa gṛhṇāty upayāmagṛhīto 'sīṣāya tvā juṣṭaṃ gṛhṇāmīti
7.16.32	atha pratiprasthātāśrāvayaty o śrāvayāstu śrauṣaḍ ṛtunā preṣyeti
7.16.33	vaṣaṭkṛte juhoti
7.16.34	niṣkrāmaty evādhvaryuḥ
7.16.35	prapadyate pratiprasthātā viparyasya pātram
7.16.36	sa gṛhṇāty upayāmagṛhīto 'sy ūrjāya tvā juṣṭaṃ gṛhṇāmīti
7.16.37	athādhvaryur āśrāvayaty o śrāvayāstu śrauṣaḍ ṛtubhiḥ preṣyeti
7.16.38	vaṣaṭkṛte juhoti
7.16.39	niṣkrāmaty eva pratiprasthātā
7.16.40	prapadyate 'dhvaryuḥ
7.16.41	sa gṛhṇāty upayāmagṛhīto 'si sahāya tvā juṣṭaṃ gṛhṇāmīti
7.16.42	atha pratiprasthātāśrāvayaty o śrāvayāstu śrauṣaḍ ṛtubhiḥ preṣyeti
7.16.43	vaṣaṭkṛte juhoti
7.16.44	niṣkrāmaty evādhvaryuḥ
7.16.45	prapadyate pratiprasthātā
7.16.46	sa gṛhṇāty upayāmagṛhīto 'si sahasyāya tvā juṣṭaṃ gṛhṇāmīti
7.16.47	athādhvaryur āśrāvayaty o śrāvayāstu śrauṣaḍ ṛtubhiḥ preṣyeti
7.16.48	vaṣaṭkṛte juhoti
7.16.49	niṣkrāmaty eva pratiprasthātā
7.16.50	prapadyate 'dhvaryur viparyasya pātram
7.16.51	sa gṛhṇāty upayāmagṛhīto 'si tapāya tvā juṣṭaṃ gṛhṇāmīti
7.16.52	atha pratiprasthātāśrāvayaty o śrāvayāstu śrauṣaḍ ṛtubhiḥ preṣyeti
7.16.53	vaṣaṭkṛte juhoti
7.16.54	niṣkrāmaty evādhvaryuḥ
7.16.55	prapadyate pratiprasthātā viparyasya pātram
7.16.56	tam āha pratiprasthātar upaitena pātreṇa rameti
7.16.57	athādhvaryur āśrāvayaty o śrāvayāstu śrauṣaḍ ṛtunā preṣyeti
7.16.58	adhvaryū yajatam ity āha praśāstā
7.16.59	hotar etad yajety āhādhvaryuḥ
7.16.60	vaṣaṭkṛte juhoti
7.16.61	so 'traivāsīnaṃ pratiprasthātāram anuprapadyate
7.16.62	pratiprasthātātra pūrvo gṛhṇāty upayāmagṛhīto 'si tapasyāya tvā juṣṭaṃ gṛhṇāmīti
7.16.63	athādhvaryur gṛhṇāty upayāmagṛhīto 'si saṃsarpo 'sy aṃhaspatyāya tvā juṣṭaṃ gṛhṇāmīti
7.16.64	grahāv ādāyopaniṣkrāmataḥ
7.16.65	dakṣiṇam evādhvaryur dvārbāhuṃ niśrayamāṇa upaniṣkrāmati
7.16.66	uttaraṃ pratiprasthātā
7.16.67	pratiprasthātātra śrāvayaty o śrāvayāstu śrauṣaḍ ṛtunā preṣyeti
7.16.68	gṛhapate yajety āha praśāstā
7.16.69	hotar etad yajety āha gṛhapatiḥ
7.16.70	vaṣaṭkṛte sahobhau juhutaḥ
7.16.71	atha pratiprasthātādhvaryoḥ pātre grahasya saṃsrāvam avanayati
7.16.72	tam āha pratiprasthātar etena pātreṇaindrāgnaṃ grahaṃ gṛhāṇeti
7.16.73	tena pratiprasthātaindrāgnaṃ grahaṃ gṛhṇāti droṇakalaśāt pariplunā pātreṇaindrāgnī āgataṃ sutam ity anudrutyopayāmagṛhīto 'sīndrāgnibhyāṃ tvā juṣṭaṃ gṛhṇāmīti
7.16.74	parimṛjya sādayaty eṣa te yonir indrāgnibhyāṃ tveti
7.16.75	athādhvaryuḥ pradakṣiṇam āvṛtya pratyaṅṅ ādrutya hotraitat pātraṃ saṃbhakṣayaty ṛtunā pītasyeti hotrā potrā neṣṭrāgnīdhā brāhmaṇācchaṃsinā maitrāvaruṇeneti
7.16.76	atha viparyasya pātraṃ hotraiva catuḥ saṃbhakṣayaty ṛtubhiḥ pītasyeti hotrā potrā neṣṭrācchāvākeneti
7.16.77	atha viparyasyaiva pātraṃ hotraiva dviḥ saṃbhakṣayaty ṛtunā pītasyeti
7.17.1	atha hotāraṃ vipṛcchati praṇavam upāṃśuśaṃsaṃ śaṃsiṣyasī3 vigrāhā3m iti
7.17.2	sa yathainaṃ hotā pratyāha tac chrutvā nigṛhya pātraṃ parāṅ āvartate
7.17.3	iḍā devahūr iti yāvad etasya yajuṣaḥ paryāpnoti tāvaj japati
7.17.4	abhy enam āhvayate hotā
7.17.5	pratyāhvayate 'dhvaryuḥ
7.17.6	śaṃsati
7.17.7	pratigṛṇāti
7.17.8	yad upāṃśu śaṃsati tad upāṃśu pratigṛṇāti
7.17.9	yad uccaiḥ śaṃsati tad uccaiḥ pratigṛṇāti
7.17.10	saṃtataṃ vā vigrāhaṃ vā
7.17.11	prasiddham ukthaṃ pratigīrya prāṅ etyodyacchata etam aindrāgnaṃ graham
7.17.12	anūdyacchante nārāśaṃsān
7.17.13	athāśrāvayaty o śrāvayāstu śrauṣaḍ ukthaśā yaja somasyeti
7.17.14	vaṣaṭkṛtānuvaṣaṭkṛte dvir juhoti
7.17.15	tathaiva dvirdvir nārāśaṃsān anuprakampayanti
7.17.16	etat pātraṃ nārāśaṃsā anvāyanti
7.17.17	anusavanabhakṣa indrāgnibhyāṃ pītasyeti
7.17.18	hotā caivādhvaryuś caitat pātraṃ saṃbhakṣayato narāśaṃsapītena nārāśaṃsān narāśaṃsapītasya soma deva te matividaḥ prātaḥsavanasya gāyatracchandasaḥ pitṛpītasya madhumata upahūtasyopahūto bhakṣayāmīti
7.17.19	hotṛcamasam evaite trayaḥ samupahūya bhakṣayanti
7.17.20	yathācamasaṃ camasān
7.17.21	hinva ma ity ātmānaṃ pratyabhimṛśante
7.17.22	āpyāyayanti camasān āpyāyasva sametu ta iti
7.17.23	sīdanti nārāśaṃsā āpyāyitā dakṣiṇasya havirdhānasyāpālambam adho'dho vaiśvadevāya
7.17.24	atha prāṅ etya śukrapātram ādadāna āhonnetar yademaṃ vaiśvadevaṃ graham gṛhṇāmy athodañcaṃ rājānaṃ pūtabhṛtam abhi saṃpavayatād daśābhir droṇakalaśaṃ mṛṣṭvā nyubjatād iti
7.17.25	sa tathā karoti
7.17.26	sa śukrapātreṇa vaiśvadevaṃ kalaśād gṛhṇāty omāsaś carṣaṇīdhṛta ity anudrutyopayāmagṛhīto 'si viśvebhyas tvā devebhyo juṣṭaṃ gṛhṇāmīti
7.17.27	parimṛjya sādayaty eṣa te yonir viśvebhyas tvā devebhya iti
7.17.28	athāpa upaspṛśya barhiṣī ādāya vācaṃyamaḥ pratyaṅ drutvā stotram upākaroti
7.17.29	stuvate vaiśvadevāya
7.17.30	hotra eṣottameti prāhuḥ
7.17.31	hotuḥ kālāt parāṅ āvartate 'dhvaryuḥ
7.17.32	abhy enam āhvayate hotā
7.17.33	pratyāhvayate 'dhvaryuḥ
7.17.34	śaṃsati
7.17.35	pratigṛṇāti
7.17.36	prasiddham ukthaṃ pratigīrya prāṅ etyodyacchata etaṃ vaiśvadevaṃ graham
7.17.37	anūdyacchante nārāśaṃsān
7.17.38	athāśrāvayaty o śrāvayāstu śrauṣaḍ ukthaśā yaja somasyeti
7.17.39	vaṣaṭkṛtānuvaṣaṭkṛte dvir juhoti
7.17.40	tathaiva dvirdvir nārāśaṃsān anuprakampayanti
7.17.41	etat pātraṃ nārāśaṃsā anvāyanti
7.17.42	anusavanabhakṣo viśvair devaiḥ pītasyeti
7.17.43	hotā caivādhvaryuś caitat pātraṃ saṃbhakṣayato narāśaṃsapītena nārāśaṃsān narāśaṃsapītasya soma deva te matividaḥ prātaḥsavanasya gāyatracchandasaḥ pitṛpītasya madhumata upahūtasyopahūto bhakṣayāmīti
7.17.44	hotṛcamasam evaite trayaḥ samupahūya bhakṣayanti

7.17.47	nāpyāyayanti camasān

7.19.19	athāśrāvayaty o śrāvayāstu śrauṣaḍ ukthaśā yaja somānām iti
7.19.20	vaṣaṭkṛtānuvaṣaṭkṛte dvir juhoti
7.19.21	tathaiva dvirdviḥ sarvāṃś camasāñ juhvati
7.19.22	atha pradakṣiṇam āvṛtya brāhmaṇācchaṃsinaś camase grahasya saṃsrāvam avanayati hutaṃ tvā hute 'vanayāmy ūrjasvantaṃ devebhyo madhumantaṃ manuṣyebhya iti vā tūṣṇīṃ vā
7.19.23	atraivaitat pātram upanidhāya bhakṣaiḥ pratyañca ādravanti
7.19.24	anusavanabhakṣa indreṇa pītasyeti
7.19.25	brāhmaṇācchaṃsinaś camasam evaite trayaḥ samupahūya bhakṣayanti
7.19.26	yathācamasaṃ camasān
7.19.27	hinva ma ity ātmānaṃ pratyabhimṛśante
7.19.28	nāpyāyayanti camasān
7.19.29	sarvabhakṣā mārjayante
7.19.30	atha prāṅ āyann āha
7.20.1	acchāvākasya camasam anūnnayadhvam unnetaḥ sarvaśa eva rājānam unnaya mātirīricaḥ pratiprasthātar upaitena graheṇa ramaihi yajamāneti
7.20.2	pūrvayā dvārā havirdhānaṃ prapādyāthaitac carma phalakayoḥ prācīnagrīvam uttaralomopastṛṇāti yajña pratitiṣṭheti vā tūṣṇīṃ vā
7.20.3	tasmin saṃmukhān grāvṇaḥ kṛtvā dakṣiṇasya havirdhānasyāntareṇeṣe rājānam upāvaharati hṛde tvā manase tvā soma rājann ehy avaroheti dvābhyām
7.20.4	athainam udgātṛbhyaḥ prāhuḥ
7.20.5	tasmiṃs tac ceṣṭanti yat te viduḥ
7.20.6	athodubjyādhavanīyam ardhaṃ vasatīvarīṇām avanayati
7.20.7	ardham ekadhanānām
7.20.8	puro 'kṣaṃ vasatīvarīḥ sādayati
7.20.9	paścād akṣam ekadhanān
7.20.10	acchāvākacamasam eva prathamam unnayanti
7.20.11	yathopapādam itarān
7.20.12	sarvaśa eva rājānaṃ samunnīyottaravedyāṃ saṃsādayanti
7.20.13	athādatta ukthyasthālyā aupaśayaṃ pātram
7.20.14	tasminn etaṃ sarvaśa eva rājānaṃ gṛhṇāti ya ukthyasthālyāṃ bhavaty upayāmagṛhīto 'si devebhyas tvā devāyuvam ukthyebhya ukthāyuvaṃ yajñasyāyuṣa indrāgnibhyāṃ tvā juṣṭaṃ gṛhṇāmīti
7.20.15	nātra punarhavir asīty ukthyasthālīṃ pratyabhimṛśati
7.20.16	daśābhir evaināṃ mṛṣṭvā nyubjati
7.20.17	parimṛjya sādayaty eṣa te yonir indrāgnibhyāṃ tveti
7.20.18	athāpa upaspṛśya barhiṣī ādāya vācaṃyamaḥ pratyaṅ drutvā stotram upākaroti
7.20.19	stuvate
7.20.20	acchāvākāya eṣottameti prāhuḥ
7.20.21	acchāvākasya kālāt parāṅ āvartate pratiprasthātā
7.20.22	abhy enam āhvayate 'cchāvākaḥ
7.20.23	pratyāhvayate pratiprasthātā
7.20.24	śaṃsati
7.20.25	pratigṛṇāti
7.20.26	prasiddham ukthaṃ pratigīrya prāṅ etyodyacchata etaṃ graham
7.20.27	anūdyacchante camasān
7.20.28	athāśrāvayaty o śrāvayāstu śrauṣaḍ ukthaśā yaja somānām iti
7.20.29	vaṣaṭkṛtānuvaṣaṭkṛte dvir juhoti
7.20.30	tathaiva dvirdviḥ sarvāṃś camasāñ juhvati
7.20.31	atha pradakṣiṇam āvṛtyācchāvākasya camase grahasya saṃsrāvam avanayati hutaṃ tvā hute 'vanayāmy ūrjasvantaṃ devebhyo madhumantaṃ manuṣyebhya iti vā tūṣṇīṃ vā

7.20.42	saṃtiṣṭhate prātaḥsavanam
8.1.1	prasarpanti mādhyaṃdināya savanāya devī dvārāv ity ata evordhvena
8.1.2	saṃprasṛptān viditvādhvaryuḥ prāṅ āyann āhābhiṣotāra eta hvayata grāvastutam ehi yajamāneti
8.1.3	pūrvayā dvārā havirdhānaṃ prapādya hotṛcamase vasatīvarībhyo 'dhy apo niḥṣicya tāsu tathaiva nigrābhyāsu yajamānaṃ vācayati
8.1.4	tās tathaiva yajamānāya saṃpradāya grāvāṇam ādatte 'nyam upāṃśusavanāt
8.1.5	taṃ tathaiva prāñcaṃ praśritya visrasya rājānaṃ grāvāṇam abhimimīta indrāya tvendrāya tveti
8.1.6	pañcakṛtvo yajuṣā pañcakṛtvas tūṣṇīm
8.1.7	daśakṛtvo mimānaḥ sarvaśa eva rājānaṃ mimīte
8.1.8	adbhir abhyukṣya grāvastuta uṣṇīṣaṃ prayacchati
8.1.9	adbhir evābhyukṣyādhvaryor āvasathaṃ vāso haranti
8.1.10	tathā mitaṃ rājānaṃ hotṛcamasīyābhir upasṛjati
8.1.11	tathā saṃprayauti
8.1.12	tathā tiraścarman phalake abhimṛśati
8.1.13	tathā vṛddhīr vācayati
8.1.14	nātrāṃśūn sacate
8.1.15	ghoṣavanta evābhiṣuṇvantīhā3 ihā3 iheti
8.1.16	tad eva sad vinayantīhā3 iha ihā3 iha ihā3 iheti
8.1.17	atha saṃbharaṇīye niṣkrīḍayantīhā3 ihā3 iheti
8.1.18	athainaṃ susaṃbhṛtaṃ saṃbharaṇyāṃ saṃbhṛtyonnetra utprayacchati
8.1.19	tam unnetādhavanīye 'vanayati
8.1.20	evam eva dvitīyaḥ paryāyaḥ saṃtiṣṭhate
8.1.21	evaṃ tṛtīyaḥ
8.1.22	tṛtīyasya tṛtīye bṛhad upayanti bṛhad bṛhad bṛhad iti
8.1.23	ṛjīṣam antato daśāpavitreṇa pariveṣṭyonnetra utprayacchati
8.1.24	tad unnetādhavanīye vikṣālya prapīḍya dakṣiṇasya havirdhānasyāntareṇeṣe upāvahṛtya carmaṇi nidadhāti
8.1.25	tasmiṃs tathaiva saṃmukhān grāvṇaḥ kṛtvā caturdhaitad ṛjīṣaṃ grāvamukhebhyo vyapohati
8.1.26	tathodgātā vā prastotā vā dakṣiṇasya havirdhānasya paścād akṣam upasṛpya prāñcaṃ grāvasu droṇakalaśam adhyūhati
8.1.27	tasmiṃs tathaivodīcīnadaśaṃ daśāpavitraṃ vitatya prasiddhaṃ śukrāmanthinau grahau gṛhṇāti
8.1.28	athartupātrābhyāṃ dvau marutvatīyau grahau gṛhṇāti
8.2.1	marutvantaṃ vṛṣabhaṃ vāvṛdhānam indra marutva iha pāhi somam iti dvābhyām
8.2.2	athopariṣṭād āgrayaṇam ānīyādhastād upagṛhṇāti
8.2.3	taṃ tathaiva trir abhihiṅkṛtya parimṛjya sādayati
8.2.4	tathokthyaṃ gṛhṇāti
8.2.5	ukthyena rājānaṃ paridadhāti
8.2.6	tathoparyardhe droṇakalaśe pariplu pātraṃ prāsya drapsān anumantrayate drapsaś caskanda yas te drapso yo drapso yas te drapsa iti
8.2.7	tathonnetāram āhāriktaṃ pūtabhṛtaṃ kuru pavamānasya grahān grahīṣyāmīti
8.2.8	tathārikte pūtabhṛti pavamānasya grahān gṛhṇāty upayāmagṛhīto 'sīndrāya tveti droṇakalaśam abhimṛśati
8.2.9	indrāya tvety ādhavanīyam
8.2.10	indrāya tveti pūtabhṛtam
8.2.11	tathonnetar ity āha prāñcaṃ rājānaṃ pūtabhṛtam abhi saṃpavayatād daśābhir ādhavanīyaṃ mṛṣṭvā nyubjatād iti
8.2.12	sa tathā karoti
8.2.13	tathāpa upaspṛśya barhiṣī ādāyopaniḥsarpati
8.2.14	teṣu tathaiva samanvārabdheṣv āhavanīye sruvāhutiṃ juhoti
8.2.15	viśve devā maruta indro asmān asmin dvitīye savane na jahyuḥ / āyuṣmantaḥ priyam eṣāṃ vadanto vayaṃ devānāṃ sumatau syāma svāhety etayādhvaryū juhutaḥ
8.2.16	yathāvedam itare juhvati
8.2.17	atha pradakṣiṇam āvṛtya sado 'bhi pavamānaṃ sarpanti
8.2.18	tathā sadasi yathāyatanam upaviśanti
8.2.19	tathodgātre vā prastotre vā barhiṣī prayacchaty ṛksāmayor upastaraṇam asi mithunasya prajātyā iti vā tūṣṇīṃ vā
8.2.20	tathopākaraṇaṃ japati vāyur hiṅkarteti
8.2.21	sa eṣa pañcadaśo mādhyaṃdinaḥ pavamāno bhavati
8.2.22	tasyāṣṭamyāṃ prastutāyāṃ vācayati suparṇo 'si triṣṭupchandā anu tvārabhe svasti mā saṃpārayeti
8.2.23	atra caturhotāraṃ vyācaṣṭe
8.2.24	uddrute sāmni saṃpraiṣam āhāgnīd agnīn vihara barhi stṛṇāhi puroḍāśāṃ alaṃkuru pratiprasthātar dadhigharmāya dadhy āhareti
8.2.25	yathāsaṃpraiṣaṃ tau kurutaḥ
8.2.26	tathāpa upaspṛśyāhaihi yajamāneti
8.2.27	pūrvayā dvārā havirdhānaṃ prapādya tathā samastaṃ rājānam upatiṣṭhate
8.2.28	tathāvakāśaiś carati
8.2.29	tathā pracaraṇyāṃ navakṛtvo gṛhṇīte
8.2.30	tathaiṣa āgnīdhra āgnīdhrīyād dhiṣṇiyād anupūrvaṃ dhiṣṇiyeṣv aṅgārān viharati
8.2.31	tathā purastāt pratyaṅṅ āsīno vihṛtān dhiṣṇiyān vyāghārayati
8.2.32	tathottarasya havirdhānasya cubuke pracaraṇīṃ sādayati
8.2.33	tathā sāṃkāśinena pathā pṛṣṭhyāṃ stṛṇāti saṃtatāṃ gārhapatyād āhavanīyāt
8.3.1	athāntareṇa havirdhāne upaviśya dadhigharmāya dadhi yācati
8.3.2	tad āhṛtam avekṣate jyotir asi vaiśvānaraṃ pṛśniyai dugdham iti
8.3.3	barhiṣī antardhāya kaṃse vā camase vā gṛhṇāti yāvatī dyāvāpṛthivī mahitvā yāvac ca sapta sindhavo vitasthuḥ / tāvantam indra te grahaṃ sahorjā gṛhṇāmy astṛtam iti
8.3.4	apoddhṛtya barhiṣī athainaṃ śrīṇāti vāk ca tvā manaś ca śrīṇītāṃ prāṇaś ca tvāpānaś ca śrīṇītāṃ cakṣuś ca tvā śrotraṃ ca śrīṇītāṃ dakṣaś ca tvā balaṃ ca śrīṇītām ojaś ca tvā sahaś ca śrīṇītām āyuś ca tvā jarā ca śrīṇītām ātmā ca tvā tanūś ca śrīṇītāṃ śṛto 'si śṛtaṃkṛtaḥ śṛtāya tvā śṛtebhyas tvā śṛtaṃ kṛṇv iti
8.3.5	athāha hotar vadasva yat te vādyam iti
8.3.6	athainam ādāyopottiṣṭhann āha śrātaṃ havir iti
8.3.7	atyākramyāśrāvyāha dadhigharmasya yajeti
8.3.8	vaṣaṭkṛte juhoti yam indram āhur varuṇaṃ yam āhur yaṃ mitram āhur yam u satyam āhuḥ / yo devānāṃ devatamas tapojās tasmai tvā tebhyas tvā svāheti
8.3.9	anuvaṣaṭkṛte hutvā harati bhakṣam
8.3.10	sa yāvantaḥ pravargyasyartvijas teṣūpahavam iṣṭvā yajamāna eva pratyakṣaṃ bhakṣayati mayi tyad indriyaṃ mahan mayi dakṣo mayi kratuḥ / mayi dhāyi suvīryaṃ triśug gharmo vibhātu me
8.3.11	ākūtyā manasā saha virājā jyotiṣā saha / yajñena payasā saha brahmaṇā tejasā saha / kṣatreṇa yaśasā saha satyena tapasā saha / tasya doham aśīmahi tasya sumnam aśīmahi / tasya bhakṣam aśīmahi tasya ta indreṇa pītasya madhumata upahūtasyopahūto bhakṣayāmīti
8.3.12	nirṇijya pātraṃ prayacchati
8.3.13	tathā savanīyān puroḍāśān yācati
8.3.14	teṣāṃ tathaiva samavadyann āha mādhyaṃdinasya savanasyendrāya puroḍāśānām avadīyamānānām anubrūhīti
8.3.15	pūrvārdhād avadāyāparārdhād avadyati
8.3.16	abhighārayati
8.3.17	pratyanakti
8.3.18	tathopabhṛti sviṣṭakṛte sarveṣāṃ sakṛtsakṛd uttarārdhād avadyati
8.3.19	dvir abhighārayati
8.3.20	na pratyanakti
8.3.21	atyākramyāśrāvyāha mādhyaṃdinasya savanasyendrāya puroḍāśān prasthitān preṣyeti
8.3.22	vaṣaṭkṛte juhoti
8.3.23	tathā samāvapamāna āhāgnaye 'nubrūhīti
8.3.24	āśrāvyāhāgnaye preṣyeti
8.3.25	vaṣaṭkṛta uttarārdhapūrvārdhe 'tihāya pūrvā āhutīr juhoti
8.3.26	tathodaṅṅ atyākramya yathāyatanaṃ srucau sādayitvā tathaiva pātryām iḍāṃ samavadhāya pratīcaḥ puroḍāśān prahiṇoti
8.3.27	anu haike saṃyanti paśava iḍeti vadantaḥ

8.4.1	hotuś camasam anūnnayadhvam ubhayataḥśukrān kurudhvam acchāvākasya camasādhvaryo 'pi tvam unnayasva pratiprasthātaś caturbhir mā śakalaiḥ prokṣitāprokṣitaiḥ pratyupalambasveti
8.4.2	yathāsaṃpraiṣaṃ te kurvanti
8.4.3	samānaṃ karmāśrāvaṇāt
8.4.4	āśrāvaṇa eva vyeti
8.4.5	athādhvaryuḥ purastātpratyaṅ tiṣṭhann āśrāvayaty o śrāvayāstu śrauṣaṇ mādhyaṃdinasya savanasya niṣkevalyasya bhāgasya śukravato manthivato madhuścuta indrāya somān prasthitān preṣyeti

8.4.10	tathā pradakṣiṇam āvṛtya hotṛcamase grahasya saṃsrāvam avanayati hutaṃ tvā hute 'vanayāmy ūrjasvantaṃ devebhyo madhumantaṃ manuṣyebhya iti vā tūṣṇīṃ vā
8.4.11	tathā pratiprasthātottarārdha āhavanīyasya manthinaḥ saṃsrāvaṃ juhoti
8.4.12	tathāpa upaspṛśya śukrapātraṃ ca manthipātraṃ ca khare yathāyatanaṃ sādayati
8.4.13	yanty ete mahartvijāṃ camasāḥ
8.4.14	tathaite hotrakāṇāṃ camasādhvaryavaḥ sakṛtsakṛd droṇakalaśād abhyunnīyopāvartante

8.4.16	brahman yaja potar yaja neṣṭar yajācchāvāka yajāgnīd yajeti
8.4.17	ṣaḍḍhotrāḥ saṃyājya pradakṣiṇam āvṛtya pratyaṅṅ ādrutyāgreṇa hotāram upaviśaty ayāḍ agnīd iti
8.4.18	sa bhadram akar ity āha hotā yo naḥ somaṃ rājānaṃ pāyayiṣyatīti
8.4.19	tathāpa upaspṛśya hotra iḍām upodyacchante
8.4.20	upahūyamānāyām iḍāyām upapragṛhṇanti camasān
8.4.21	upahūtāyām iḍāyām agnīdha ādadhāti ṣaḍavattam
8.4.22	prāśnanti
8.4.23	mārjayante
8.4.24	iḍopahūtāṃś camasān bhakṣayanti bhakṣehi māviśeti dīrghabhakṣam anudrutya rudravadgaṇasya soma deva te mativido mādhyaṃdinasya savanasya triṣṭupchandasa indrapītasya madhumata upahūtasyopahūto bhakṣayāmīti
8.4.25	hotṛcamasam evaite trayaḥ samupahūya bhakṣayanti

8.4.27	hinva ma ity ātmānaṃ pratyabhimṛśante
8.4.28	āpyāyayanti camasān āpyāyasva sametu ta iti
