8.4.30	etasmin kāla āgnīdhre yajamānaḥ puroḍāśānāṃ prāśnāti
8.4.31	yadaśanā syāt patnī patnīśāle
8.5.1	atha dākṣiṇāni hoṣyan yācaty ājyasthālīṃ sasruvāṃ srucaṃ vāsaḥ
8.5.2	tasyaitasya vasanasyāntamāyāṃ daśāyāṃ hiraṇyaśalkaḥ pragrathito bhavati
8.5.3	etat samādāyāhaihi yajamāneti
8.5.4	uttareṇāgnīdhrīyaṃ parītyottareṇa sadaḥ parītya pūrvayā dvārā śālāṃ prapādya samanvārabdheṣv apivrateṣu saṃpracchanneṣu gārhapatya ājyaṃ vilāpyotpūya sruci caturgṛhītaṃ gṛhītvā vasanasyāntaṃ srugdaṇḍa upasaṃgṛhya saurībhyām ṛgbhyāṃ gārhapatye juhoty ud u tyaṃ jātavedasaṃ devaṃ vahanti ketavaḥ / dṛśe viśvāya sūryaṃ svāheti
8.5.5	aparaṃ caturgṛhītaṃ gṛhītvā gārhapatya eva juhoti citraṃ devānām ud agād anīkaṃ cakṣur mitrasya varuṇasyāgneḥ / āprā dyāvāpṛthivī antarikṣaṃ sūrya ātmā jagatas tasthuṣaś ca svāheti
8.5.6	athāgnīdhraṃ drutvā sruci caturgṛhītaṃ gṛhītvā vasanasyaivāntaṃ srugdaṇḍa upasaṃgṛhya nayavatyarcāgnīdhre juhoty agne naya supathā rāye asmān viśvāni deva vayunāni vidvān / yuyodhy asmaj juhurāṇam eno bhūyiṣṭhāṃ te namauktiṃ vidhema svāheti
8.5.7	atha divaṃ gaccha suvaḥ pateti hiraṇyaṃ hutvodgṛhṇāti
8.5.8	sṛjyante dakṣiṇā dakṣiṇāpathenāntareṇa sadaś ca gārhapatyaṃ cāntareṇa sadaś cāgnīdhraṃ cāntareṇa cātvālotkarau
8.5.9	evam udīcyaḥ pratipadyante
8.5.10	tāḥ pradakṣiṇaṃ kṛtvābhyaiti rūpeṇa vo rūpam abhyaimi vayasā vaya iti
8.5.11	athainā vibhajati tutho vo viśvavedā vibhajatu varṣiṣṭhe adhi nāka iti
8.5.12	atha sado 'bhyaity etat te agne rādha aiti somacyutaṃ tan mitrasya pathā nayartasya pathā preta candradakṣiṇā yajñasya pathā suvitā nayantīr iti
8.6.1	athaiṣa ātreyo 'greṇa sada āste
8.6.2	tam abhyaiti brāhmaṇam adya rādhyāsam ṛṣim ārṣeyaṃ pitṛmantaṃ paitṛmatyaṃ sudhātudakṣiṇam iti
8.6.3	athainam utkramya pṛcchati ka ātreya iti
8.6.4	ayam aham itītaraḥ pratyāha
8.6.5	taṃ tathaiva dvitīyam utkramya pṛcchati ka ātreya iti
8.6.6	ayam aham ity evetaraḥ pratyāha
8.6.7	taṃ tathaiva tṛtīyam utkramya pṛcchati ka ātreya iti
8.6.8	ayam aham ity evetaraḥ pratyāha
8.6.9	tasya pāṇau hiraṇyam ādadhāti candra maṃheti yad u cānyad upakalpate
8.6.10	athāgnīdhraṃ drutvā hiraṇyamukham agnīdhe dadāti
8.6.11	atha sada āgatya brahmaṇe dadāti hotra udgātre
8.6.12	atha havirdhānaṃ drutvādhvaryave dadāti ya u cainam anye 'bhito bhavanti
8.6.13	atha sada āgatya prastotre dadāti praśāstre brahmaṇācchaṃsine 'cchāvākasya sadasyasyāgnīdhaḥ potur neṣṭur grāvastuta unnetuḥ subrahmaṇyasya pratihartur antataḥ
8.6.14	yathāsamuditaṃ prasarpakebhyaḥ
8.6.15	athāhaihi yajamāneti
8.6.16	āgnīdhraṃ drutvā sruci caturgṛhītaṃ gṛhītvāgnīdhre pañca vaiśvakarmaṇāni juhoti yajñapatim ṛṣaya enasāhur iti
8.6.17	athātikrāmātīmokṣaiś caraty agninā devena ye devā yajñahana ity etābhyām anuvākābhyām
8.6.18	atha yajamānaṃ prāñcam īkṣayati vi suvaḥ paśya vy antarikṣam iti
8.6.19	athainaṃ sadasy upaveśayati yatasva sadasyair iti
8.6.20	atha dakṣiṇāḥ samanudiśaty asmaddātrā devatrā gacchata madhumatīḥ pradātāram āviśatānavahāyāsmān devayānena patheta sukṛtāṃ loke sīdata tan naḥ saṃskṛtam iti
8.7.1	atha prāṅ āyann āhendrāya marutvate 'nubrūhīti
8.7.2	tac chrutvā pratiprasthātā grahāv ādāyopaniṣkrāmati
8.7.3	upaniṣkrāntasyaivādhvaryur grahāv ādatte
8.7.4	uttaratas tiṣṭhate pratiprasthātre 'nyataraṃ prayacchati
8.7.5	athāśrāvayaty o śrāvayāstu śrauṣaḍ indrāya marutvate preṣyeti
8.7.6	vaṣaṭkṛte sahobhau juhutaḥ
8.7.7	atha pratiprasthātādhvaryoḥ pātre grahasya saṃsrāvam avanayati
8.7.8	tam āha pratiprasthātar etena pātreṇa tṛtīyaṃ marutvatīyaṃ grahaṃ gṛhāṇeti
8.7.9	tena pratiprasthātā tṛtīyaṃ marutvatīyaṃ grahaṃ gṛhṇāti droṇakalaśāt pariplunā pātreṇa marutvāṃ indra vṛṣabho raṇāyety anudrutyopayāmagṛhīto 'sīndrāya tvā marutvate juṣṭaṃ gṛhṇāmīti
8.7.10	parimṛjya sādayaty eṣa te yonir indrāya tvā marutvata iti
8.7.11	athādhvaryuḥ pradakṣiṇam āvṛtya pratyaṅṅ ādrutya hotraitat pātraṃ saṃbhakṣayatīndreṇa marutvatā pītasyeti
8.7.12	atha nigṛhya pātraṃ parāṅ āvartata iḍā devahūr iti
8.7.13	yāvad etasya yajuṣaḥ paryāpnoti tāvaj japati
8.7.14	abhy enam āhvayate hotā
8.7.15	pratyāhvayate 'dhvaryuḥ
8.7.16	śaṃsati
8.7.17	pratigṛṇāti
8.7.18	prasiddham ukthaṃ pratigīrya prāṅ etyodyacchata etaṃ tṛtīyaṃ marutvatīyaṃ graham
8.7.19	anūdyacchante nārāśaṃsān
8.7.20	athāśrāvayaty o śrāvayāstu śrauṣaḍ ukthaśā yaja somasyeti
8.7.21	vaṣaṭkṛtānuvaṣaṭkṛte dvir juhoti
8.7.22	tathaiva dvirdvir nārāśaṃsān anuprakampayanti
8.7.23	etat pātraṃ nārāśaṃsā anvāyanti
8.7.24	anusavanabhakṣa indreṇa marutvatā pītasyeti
8.7.25	hotā caivādhvaryuś caitat pātraṃ saṃbhakṣayato narāśaṃsapītena nārāśaṃsān narāśaṃsapītasya soma deva te mativido mādhyaṃdinasya savanasya triṣṭupchandasaḥ pitṛpītasya madhumata upahūtasyopahūto bhakṣayāmīti
8.7.26	hotṛcamasam evaite trayaḥ samupahūya bhakṣayanti
8.7.27	yathācamasaṃ camasān
8.7.28	hinva ma ity ātmānaṃ pratyabhimṛśante
8.7.29	āpyāyayanti camasān āpyāyasva sametu ta iti
8.7.30	sīdanti nārāśaṃsā āpyāyitā dakṣiṇasya havirdhānasyāpālambam adho'dho māhendrāya
8.8.1	atha prāṅ etya śukrapātram ādadāna āhonnetar yademaṃ māhendraṃ grahaṃ gṛhṇāmy athodañcaṃ rājānaṃ pūtabhṛtam abhi saṃpavayatād daśābhir droṇakalaśaṃ mṛṣṭvā nyubjatād iti
8.8.2	sa tathā karoti
8.8.3	sa śukrapātreṇa māhendraṃ droṇakalaśād gṛhṇāti mahāṃ indro ya ojasety anudrutyopayāmagṛhīto 'si mahendrāya tvā juṣṭaṃ gṛhṇāmīti
8.8.4	parimṛjya sādayaty eṣa te yonir mahendrāya tveti
8.8.5	athāpa upaspṛśya barhiṣī ādāya vācaṃyamaḥ pratyaṅ drutvā stotram upākaroti
8.8.6	stuvate māhendrāya
8.8.7	prastute sāmni saṃpraiṣam āhābhiṣotāro 'bhiṣuṇutāgnīd āśiraṃ vinayolūkhalam udvādaya pratiprasthātar vāruṇam ekakapālaṃ nirvapa saumyasya viddhīti
8.8.8	yathāsaṃpraiṣaṃ te kurvanti
8.8.9	hotra eṣottameti prāhuḥ
8.8.10	hotuḥ kālāt parāṅ āvartate 'dhvaryuḥ
8.8.11	abhy enam āhvayate hotā
8.8.12	pratyāhvayate 'dhvaryuḥ
8.8.13	śaṃsati
8.8.14	pratigṛṇāti
8.8.15	prasiddham ukthaṃ pratigīrya prāṅ etyodyacchata etaṃ māhendraṃ graham
8.8.16	anūdyacchante nārāśaṃsān
8.8.17	athāśrāvayaty o śrāvayāstu śrauṣaḍ ukthaśā yaja somasyeti
8.8.18	vaṣaṭkṛtānuvaṣaṭkṛte dvir juhoti
8.8.19	tathaiva dvirdvir nārāśaṃsān anuprakampayanti
8.8.20	etat pātraṃ nārāśaṃsā anvāyanti
8.8.21	anusavanabhakṣo mahendreṇa pītasyeti
8.8.22	hotā caivādhvaryuś caitat pātraṃ saṃbhakṣayato narāśaṃsapītena nārāśaṃsān narāśaṃsapītasya soma deva te mativido mādhyaṃdinasya savanasya triṣṭupchandasaḥ pitṛpītasya madhumata upahūtasyopahūto bhakṣayāmīti
8.8.23	hotṛcamasam evaite trayaḥ samupahūya bhakṣayanti
8.8.24	yathācamasaṃ camasān
8.8.25	hinva ma ity ātmānaṃ pratyabhimṛśante
8.8.26	nāpyāyayanti camasān
8.8.27	sarvabhakṣā mārjayante
8.8.28	athendrāya tvendrāya tvety evaṃ tribhir ukthyaparyāyaiś carati
8.8.29	taṃ tathaivottame 'tiśiṣṭa āhācchāvākasya camasam anūnnayadhvam unnetaḥ sarvaśa eva rājānam unnaya mātirīricaḥ pratiprasthātar upaitena graheṇa ramaihi yajamāneti
8.8.30	pūrvayā dvārā havirdhānaṃ prapādyāthodubjyādhavanīyaṃ sarvaśa eva vasatīvarīḥ paryasyati
8.8.31	sarvaśa evaikadhanān
8.8.32	puro'kṣam eva vasatīvarīkalaśaṃ mṛṣṭvā nyubjati
8.8.33	paścād akṣam ekadhanān
8.8.34	acchāvākacamasam eva prathamam unnayanti
8.8.35	yathopapādam itarān
8.8.36	sarvaśa eva rājānaṃ samunnīyottaravedyāṃ saṃsādayanti
8.8.37	athādatta ukthyasthālyā aupaśayaṃ pātram
8.8.38	tasminn etaṃ sarvaśa eva rājānaṃ gṛhṇāti ya ukthyasthālyāṃ bhavati
8.8.39	sa u vā aindra eva bhavati
8.8.40	athokthaṃ vācīty āha mādhyaṃdinaṃ savanaṃ pratigīrya praśāstaḥ prasuhīti
8.8.41	sarpatety āha praśāstā
8.8.42	saṃtiṣṭhate mādhyaṃdinaṃ savanam
8.9.1	prasarpanti tṛtīyasavanāya devī dvārāv ity ata evordhvena
8.9.2	saṃprasṛptān viditvādhvaryuḥ prāṅ āyann āhāgnīt pariśrayaṇam āhara pratiprasthātar āśiram ānaya śṛtātaṅkyam ādityagrahāya dadhy āharaihi yajamāneti
8.9.3	pūrvayā dvārā havirdhānaṃ prapādya ya eṣa upāṃśupātre 'ṃśuḥ prāsto bhavati taṃ mādhyaṃdinīya ṛjīṣe 'pisṛjya yam eva kaṃ ca grāvāṇam ādāyonnetāram āhāharopasṛjeti
8.9.4	upasṛjaty unnetādhavanīyād udacanena
8.9.5	aparimitam abhiṣutyāthainaṃ susaṃbhṛtaṃ saṃbharaṇyāṃ saṃbhṛtyonnetra utprayacchati
8.9.6	tam unnetādhavanīye 'vanayati
8.9.7	evam eva dvitīyaḥ paryāyaḥ saṃtiṣṭhate
8.9.8	evaṃ tṛtīyaḥ
8.9.9	ṛjīṣam antato daśāpavitreṇa pariveṣṭyonnetra utprayacchati
8.9.10	tad unnetādhavanīye vikṣālya prapīḍya dakṣiṇasya havirdhānasyāntareṇeṣe upātihṛtya nīḍa utsādayati
8.9.11	pariśrayanti pūrvāṃ dvāram aparāṃ ca
8.9.12	athādatta ādityasthālyā aupaśayaṃ pātram
8.9.13	tasminn etasya rājñas tṛtīyavelāṃ gṛhṇāti ya ādityasthālyāṃ bhavati kadā cana starīr asīty anudrutyopayāmagṛhīto 'sy ādityebhyas tvā juṣṭaṃ gṛhṇāmīti
8.9.14	barhiṣī antardhāya śṛtātaṅkyena śrīṇāti kadā cana prayucchasīty anudrutyopayāmagṛhīto 'sy ādityebhyas tvā juṣṭaṃ gṛhṇāmīti
8.9.15	apoddhṛtya barhiṣī ardhavelāṃ rājño gṛhṇāti yajño devānāṃ pratyeti sumnam ity anudrutyopayāmagṛhīto 'sy ādityebhyas tvā juṣṭaṃ gṛhṇāmīti
8.9.16	athainaṃ sthavimata upāṃśusavanena śrīṇāti vivasva ādityaiṣa te somapīthas tena mandasva tena tṛpya tṛpyāsma te vayaṃ tarpayitāro yā divyā vṛṣṭis tayā tvā śrīṇāmīti
8.9.17	athainam udgṛhṇāti
8.9.18	atra vijñānam upaiti yadi tājak praskanded varṣukaḥ parjanyo bhavati
8.9.19	yadi ciram avarṣukaḥ
8.9.20	na sādayatīti brāhmaṇam
8.9.21	athainam upāṃśusavanaṃ daśāpavitreṇa pariveṣṭya tenādhastāt pātram uddhanty ūrmikāram aviṣiñcan
8.10.1	ā samudrād āntarikṣāt prajāpatir udadhiṃ cyāvayātīndraḥ prasnautu maruto varṣayantūnnambhaya pṛthivīṃ bhinddhīdaṃ divyaṃ nabhaḥ / udno divyasya no dehīśāno visṛjā dṛtim iti
8.10.2	athainam upāṃśusavanaṃ daśāpavitreṇa parimṛjya grāvasv apisṛjati
8.10.3	vivṛṇvanti pūrvāṃ dvāram aparāṃ ca
8.10.4	athaitaṃ grahaṃ barhirhastenāpidhāyopottiṣṭhann āhādityebhyaḥ priyebhyaḥ priyadhāmabhyaḥ priyavratebhyo mahasvasarasya patibhya uror antarikṣasyādhyakṣebhyo 'nubrūhīti
8.10.5	atyākramyāśrāvyāhādityebhyaḥ priyebhyaḥ priyadhāmabhyaḥ priyavratebhyo mahasvasarasya patibhya uror antarikṣasyādhyakṣebhyaḥ preṣyeti
8.10.6	vaṣaṭkṛta oṣadhīḥ prāsyāgnāv ādityaṃ juhoti sakṛd eva
8.10.7	na hutvānvīkṣate
8.10.8	paryāvṛttasyaiva pratiprasthātā pātram ādatte
8.10.9	etasmin kāle pratihartā pūtabhṛto bile pavitraṃ vitatya dvau vā trīn vā rājña udacanān ānayati
8.10.10	āgrayaṇam evādhvaryur ādatte
8.10.11	ādityasthālīṃ pratiprasthātā sopaśayāṃ saṃpragṛhṇāti
8.10.12	tāsāṃ tisṛṇāṃ catasṛṇāṃ vā dhārāṇāṃ tathopariṣṭād āgrayaṇam ānīyādhastād upagṛhṇāti
8.10.13	taṃ tathaiva trir abhihiṅkṛtya parimṛjya sādayati
8.10.14	apoddhṛtya pavitraṃ barhiṣī antardhāyāśiram avanayaty anvārabdhāyāṃ patnyām asme devāso vapuṣe cikitsateti catasṛbhir anucchandasam
8.10.15	apoddhṛtya barhiṣī pūtabhṛto bile drapsān anumantrayate
8.10.16	dvau pavamānasya grahau gṛhṇāti
8.10.17	tathonnetar ity āha prāñcaṃ rājānaṃ pūtabhṛtam abhi saṃpavayatād daśābhir ādhavanīyaṃ mṛṣṭvā nyubjatād iti
8.10.18	sa tathā karoti
8.10.19	tathāpa upaspṛśya barhiṣī ādāyopaniḥsarpati
8.10.20	teṣu tathaiva samanvārabdheṣv āhavanīye sruvāhutiṃ juhoti
8.11.1	idaṃ tṛtīyaṃ savanaṃ kavīnām ṛtena ye camasam airayanta / te saudhanvanāḥ suvar ānaśānāḥ sviṣṭiṃ no abhi vasīyo nayantu svāhety etayādhvaryū juhutaḥ
8.11.2	yathāvedam itare juhvati
8.11.3	tathā pradakṣiṇam āvṛtya sado 'bhipavamānaṃ sarpanti
8.11.4	tathā sadasi yathāyatanam upaviśanti
8.11.5	tathodgātre vā prastotre vā barhiṣī prayacchaty ṛksāmayor upastaraṇam asi mithunasya prajātyā iti vā tūṣṇīṃ vā
8.11.6	tathopākaraṇaṃ japati vāyur hiṅkarteti
8.11.7	sa eṣa saptadaśa ārbhavaḥ pavamāno bhavati
8.11.8	tasya navamyāṃ prastutāyāṃ vācayati saghāsi jagatīcchandā anu tvārabhe svasti mā saṃpārayeti
8.11.9	atra pañcahotāraṃ vyācaṣṭe
8.11.10	uddrute sāmni saṃpraiṣam āhāgnīc chālākān vihara barhi stṛṇāhi puroḍāśāṃ alaṃkuru pratiprasthātaḥ paśau saṃvadasveti
8.11.11	yathāsaṃpraiṣaṃ tau kurutaḥ
8.11.12	tathāpa upaspṛśyāhaihi yajamāneti
8.11.13	pūrvayā dvārā havirdhānaṃ prapādya tathā samastaṃ rājānam upatiṣṭhate
8.11.14	nātrāvakāśaiś carati
8.11.15	tathā pracaraṇyāṃ navakṛtvo gṛhṇīte
8.11.16	tathaiṣa āgnīdhra āgnīdhrīyād dhiṣṇiyād anupūrvaṃ dhiṣṇiyeṣu śālākān viharati
8.11.17	tathā purastāt pratyaṅṅ āsīno vihṛtāñ chālākān vyāghārayati
8.11.18	tathottarasya havirdhānasya cubuke pracaraṇīṃ sādayati
8.11.19	tathā sāṃkāśinena pathā pṛṣṭhyāṃ stṛṇāti saṃtatāṃ gārhapatyād āhavanīyāt
8.12.1	atha paśunā carati manotāprabhṛtineḍāntena
8.12.2	tathā savanīyān puroḍāśān yācati
8.12.3	teṣāṃ tathaiva samavadyann āha tṛtīyasya savanasyendrāya puroḍāśānām avadīyamānānām anubrūhīti
8.12.4	pūrvārdhād avadāyāparārdhād avadyati
8.12.5	abhighārayati
8.12.6	pratyanakti
8.12.7	tathopabhṛti sviṣṭakṛte sarveṣāṃ sakṛtsakṛd uttarārdhād avadyati
8.12.8	dvir abhighārayati
8.12.9	na pratyanakti
8.12.10	atyākramyāśrāvyāha tṛtīyasya savanasyendrāya puroḍāśān prasthitān preṣyeti
8.12.11	vaṣaṭkṛte juhoti
8.12.12	tathā samāvapamāna āhāgnaye 'nubrūhīti
8.12.13	āśrāvyāhāgnaye preṣyeti
8.12.14	vaṣaṭkṛta uttarārdhapūrvārdhe 'tihāya pūrvā āhutīr juhoti
8.12.15	athodaṅṅ atyākramya yathāyatanaṃ srucau sādayitvā tathaiva pātryām iḍāṃ samavadhāya pratīcaḥ puroḍāśān prahiṇoti
8.12.16	anu haike saṃyanti paśava iḍeti vadantaḥ
8.12.17	atha prāṅ āyann āhonnīyamānebhyo 'nubrūhi hotuś camasam anūnnayadhvaṃ tīvrāṁ āśīrvataḥ kurudhvam unnetaḥ somaṃ prabhāvayeti
8.12.18	hotṛcamasam eva prathamam unnayanti
8.12.19	yathopapādam itarān
8.12.20	samunnīyottaravedyāṃ saṃsādayanti
8.12.21	atha prāṅ etya hotṛcamasam ādāyāśrāvyāha tṛtīyasya savanasyarbhumato vibhumataḥ prabhumato vājavataḥ savitṛvato bṛhaspativato viśvadevyāvatas tīvrāṁ āśīrvata indrāya somān prasthitān preṣyeti
8.12.22	vaṣaṭkṛte juhoti śyenāya patvane svāheti
8.12.23	anuvaṣaṭkṛte tṛmpantāṃ hotrā madhor ghṛtasya svāheti
8.12.24	vaṣaṭkṛtānuvaṣaṭkṛte dvir juhoti
8.12.25	tathaiva dvirdviḥ sarvāṃś camasāñ juhvati
8.12.26	tathā saṃpraiṣam āha praitu hotuś camasaḥ pra brahmaṇaḥ prodgātuḥ pra yajamānasya pra sadasyasya hotrakāṇāṃ camasādhvaryavaḥ sakṛtsakṛd āśīrvato 'bhyunnīyopāvartadhvam iti
8.12.27	yanty ete mahartvijāṃ camasāḥ
8.12.28	tathaite hotrakāṇāṃ camasādhvaryavaḥ sakṛtsakṛd āśīrvato 'bhyunnīyopāvartante
8.12.29	teṣāṃ tathaiva maitrāvaruṇacamasam ādāyāśrāvyāha praśāstar yajeti
8.12.30	vaṣaṭkṛte juhoti viṣṭambhāya dharmaṇe svāheti
8.12.31	paridhaye janaprathanāyeti brāhmaṇācchaṃsinaḥ
8.12.32	ūrje hotrāṇām iti potuḥ
8.12.33	payase hotrāṇām iti neṣṭuḥ
8.12.34	prajāpataye manava ity acchāvākasya
8.12.35	ṛtam ṛtapāḥ suvarvāḍ ity agnīdhaḥ
8.12.36	camasaṃ camasam evānuvaṣaṭkaroti tṛmpantāṃ hotrā madhor ghṛtasya svāheti
8.12.37	sapta hotrāḥ saṃyājya pradakṣiṇam āvṛtya pratyaṅṅ ādrutyāgreṇa hotāram upaviśaty ayāḍ agnīd iti
8.12.38	sa bhadram akar ity āha hotā yo naḥ somaṃ rājānaṃ pāyayiṣyatīti
8.12.39	tathāpa upaspṛśya hotra iḍām upodyacchante

8.12.45	hotṛcamasam evaite trayaḥ samupahūya bhakṣayanti

8.12.47	hinva ma ity ātmānaṃ pratyabhimṛśante
8.12.48	āpyāyayanti camasān āpyāyasva sametu ta iti

8.12.54	yadaśanā syāt patnī patnīśāle
8.13.1	atha prāṅ āyann āha devāya savitre 'nubrūhi pratiprasthātar antaryāmapātreṇa sāvitram āgrayaṇād grahaṃ gṛhītvopāsva mā sīṣada iti
8.13.2	tac chrutvā pratiprasthātāntaryāmapātreṇa sāvitram āgrayaṇād grahaṃ gṛhṇāti vāmam adya savitar ity anudrutyopayāmagṛhīto 'si devāya tvā savitre juṣṭaṃ gṛhṇāmīti
8.13.3	na sādayatīti brāhmaṇam
8.13.4	asādayitvaivopaniṣkramyāśrāvyāha devāya savitre preṣyeti
8.13.5	vaṣaṭkṛte juhoti
8.13.6	atha vai bhavati
8.13.7	savitṛpātreṇa vaiśvadevaṃ kalaśād gṛhṇāti some somam abhigṛhṇātīti
8.13.8	sa savitṛpātreṇa vaiśvadevaṃ kalaśād gṛhṇāti some somam abhigṛhṇāty upayāmagṛhīto 'si suśarmāsi supratiṣṭhāno bṛhadukṣe namo viśvebhyas tvā devebhyo juṣṭaṃ gṛhṇāmīti
8.13.9	parimṛjya sādayaty eṣa te yonir viśvebhyas tvā devebhya iti
8.13.10	athādhvaryuḥ pradakṣiṇam āvṛtya pratyaṅṅ ādrutya hotrā samīkṣya parāṅ āvartata iḍā devahūr iti
8.13.11	yāvad etasya yajuṣaḥ paryāpnoti tāvaj japati
8.13.12	abhy enam āhvayate hotā
8.13.13	pratyāhvayate 'dhvaryuḥ
8.13.14	śaṃsati
8.13.15	pratigṛṇāti
8.13.16	atha yatra hotur abhijānāty ekayā ca daśabhiś ca svabhūta iti tat pratiprasthātā dvidevatyapātrāṇi mārjālīye mārjayitvā pātreṣv apisṛjati
8.13.17	atha yatra hotur abhijānāti pra dyāvā yajñaiḥ pṛthivī ṛtāvṛdheti tad anyatomadaṃ pratigṛṇāty othā moda iva madā moda ivety ā vyāhāvāt
8.13.18	atha yatra hotur abhijānāti tad rādho adya savitur vareṇyam iti tad ubhayatomadam eva pratigṛṇāti madā moda iva madā moda ivety ā vyāhāvāt
8.13.19	prasiddham ukthaṃ pratigīrya prāṅ etyodyacchata etaṃ vaiśvadevaṃ graham
8.13.20	anūdyacchante nārāśaṃsān
8.13.21	athāśrāvayaty o śrāvayāstu śrauṣaḍ ukthaśā yaja somasyeti
8.13.22	vaṣaṭkṛtānuvaṣaṭkṛte dvir juhoti
8.13.23	tathaiva dvirdvir nārāśaṃsān anuprakampayanti
8.13.24	etat pātraṃ nārāśaṃsā anvāyanti
8.13.25	anusavanabhakṣo viśvair devaiḥ pītasyeti
8.13.26	hotā caivādhvaryuś caitat pātraṃ saṃbhakṣayato narāśaṃsapītena nārāśaṃsān narāśaṃsapītasya soma deva te matividas tṛtīyasya savanasya jagatīcchandasaḥ pitṛpītasya madhumata upahūtasyopahūto bhakṣayāmīti

8.14.1	atha hotāraṃ vipṛcchati pariyakṣyasi saumyā3ṃ na pariyakṣyasī3 iti
8.14.2	sa yathainaṃ hotā pratyāha tac chrutvāsannaṃ saumyam āgacchati
8.14.3	atha sruci caturgṛhītaṃ gṛhītvātyākramyāśrāvyāha ghṛtasya yajeti
8.14.4	vaṣaṭkṛte juhoti
8.14.5	athopastīrya dviś caror avadyati
8.14.6	pūrvārdhād avadāyāparārdhād avadyati
8.14.7	abhighārayati
8.14.8	na pratyanakti
8.14.9	atyākramyāśrāvyāha saumyasya yajeti
8.14.10	vaṣaṭkṛte dakṣiṇārdhapūrvārdhe prācīnāvītī saumyaṃ juhoti
8.14.11	athainaṃ vaiṣṇavyarcā sruvāhutyābhijuhoti viṣṇo tvaṃ no antama iti
8.14.12	yady u vai hotāgnāvaiṣṇavyarcā pariyajati saṃpannam iti nādriyeta
8.14.13	tasminn ājyam ānīyāvekṣate
8.14.14	pavitraṃ vai saumyaḥ
8.14.15	ātmānam eva pavayante
8.14.16	ya ātmānaṃ na paripaśyed itāsuḥ syāt
8.14.17	abhidadiṃ kṛtvāvekṣeteti
8.14.18	tasmin bhūya ājyam ānīyāvekṣate yan me manaḥ parāgataṃ yad vā me aparāgatam / rājñā somena tad vayam asmāsu dhārayāmasīti
8.14.19	mana evātman dādhāra na gatamanā bhavatīti brāhmaṇam
8.14.20	athainam udgātṛbhyo haranti
8.14.21	tasmiṃs tac ceṣṭanti yat te viduḥ
8.14.22	atha prāṅ āyann āha pratiprasthātar upāṃśupātreṇa pātnīvatam āgrayaṇād grahaṃ gṛhītvopāsva mā sīṣada iti
8.14.23	tac chrutvā pratiprasthātopāṃśupātreṇa pātnīvatam āgrayaṇād grahaṃ gṛhṇāty upayāmagṛhīto 'si bṛhaspatisutasya ta indo indriyāvataḥ patnīvantaṃ grahaṃ gṛhṇāmy agnā3i patnīvā3 iti
8.14.24	barhiṣī antardhāya ghṛtena śrīṇāty ahaṃ parastād aham avastād ahaṃ jyotiṣā vi tamo vavāra / yad antarikṣaṃ tad u me pitābhūd ahaṃ sūryam ubhayato dadarśāhaṃ bhūyāsam uttamaḥ samānānām iti
8.14.25	apoddhṛtya barhiṣī na sādayatīti brāhmaṇam
8.14.26	asādayitvopaniṣkramyāśrāvyāhāgnīt pātnīvatasya yajeti
8.14.27	vaṣaṭkṛte juhoti sajūr devena tvaṣṭrā somaṃ piba svāhety upāṃśv anuvaṣaṭkṛte hutvā harati bhakṣam
8.14.28	sa yady asminn āgnīdhra upahavam icchata upaivainaṃ hvayate
8.14.29	no tv eva saṃbhakṣayataḥ
8.14.30	athāhāgnīn neṣṭur upastham āsīda neṣṭaḥ patnīm udānayodgātrā saṃkhyāpyāpa upapravartayatād ūruṇopapravartayatān nagnaṃ kṛtvorum upapravartayatāddhotuś camasam anūnnayadhvam unnetaḥ sarvaśa eva rājānam unnaya mātirīricaḥ pratiprasthātar hotṛcamase dhruvāyāvakāśaṃ kurutād ehi yajamāneti
8.14.31	pūrvayā dvārā havirdhānaṃ prapādya yajamānaṃ dhruvam upasthāpayati bhūtam asi bhūte mā dhā mukham asi mukhaṃ bhūyāsam iti
8.14.32	hotṛcamasam eva prathamam unnayanti
8.14.33	yathopapādam itarān
8.14.34	sarvaśa eva rājānaṃ samunnīyottaravedyāṃ saṃsādayanti
8.14.35	athāpa upaspṛśya barhiṣī ādāya vācaṃyamaḥ pratyaṅ drutvā stotram upākaroti
8.14.36	stuvate yajñāyajñiyena
8.14.37	atra saptahotāraṃ vyācaṣṭe
8.14.38	prastute sāmni neṣṭā patnīm udgātrā saṃkhyāpya vācayati viśvasya te viśvāvato vṛṣṇiyāvatas tavāgne vāmīr anu saṃdṛśi viśvā retāṃsi dhiṣīyāgan devān yajño ni devīr devebhyo yajñam aśiṣann asmint sunvati yajamāna āśiṣaḥ svāhākṛtāḥ samudreṣṭhā gandharvam ātiṣṭhatānu vātasya patmann iḍa īḍitā iti

8.16.1	atha saṃpraiṣam āhāgnīd aupayajān aṅgārān āharopayaṣṭar upasīda brahman prasthāsyāmaḥ samidham ādhāyāgnīd agnīn sakṛtsakṛt saṃmṛḍḍhīti
8.16.2	āharanty etān āgnīdhrād aupayajān aṅgārān
8.16.3	tān agreṇa hotāraṃ nivapati

8.16.10	barhiṣī antardhāya dhānābhiḥ śrīṇāti harī stha haryor dhānā iti
8.16.11	apoddhṛtya barhiṣī athainam ādāyopottiṣṭhann āhendrāya harivate dhānāsomānām anubrūhīti

8.17.1	iṣṭayajuṣas te deva soma stutastomasya śastokthasya harivata indrapītasya madhumata upahūtasyopahūto bhakṣayāmīti
8.17.2	athainā nirṇijyottaravedyāṃ saṃnivapanty āpūryā sthā mā pūrayata prajayā ca dhanena ceti

8.17.6	jaghanena dakṣiṇena havirdhāne parītya dakṣiṇena mārjālīyaṃ dhiṣṇiyaṃ sphyenoddhatyāvokṣya dakṣiṇāgraṃ barhi stīrtvādbhir mārjayati mārjayantāṃ pitaro mārjayantāṃ pitāmahā mārjayantāṃ prapitāmahā iti

8.19.11	athāntareṇa cātvālotkarāv udaṅṅ upaniṣkrāmanty uruṃ hi rājā varuṇaś cakāra sūryāya panthām anvetavā u / apade pādā pratidhātave 'kar utāpavaktā hṛdayāvidhaś cid iti
8.19.12	viṣuvati dvitīyaṃ nidhanam upayanti
8.19.13	apaḥ parākhyāya vācayati śataṃ te rājan bhiṣajaḥ sahasram urvī gambhīrā sumatiṣ ṭe astu / bādhasva dveṣo nirṛtiṃ parācaiḥ kṛtaṃ cid enaḥ pramumugdhy asmad iti
8.19.14	udakānte tṛtīyaṃ nidhanam upayanti
8.19.15	athāpām antam abhitiṣṭhanty abhiṣṭhito varuṇasya pāśa iti
8.19.16	athāpsu barhiḥ prāsyaty agner anīkam apa āviveśa / apāṃ napāt pratirakṣann asuryaṃ dame dame samidhaṃ yakṣy agna iti

8.20.18	athāpa upaspṛśyātraitad ṛjīṣaṃ praplāvayanti saha kṛṣṇājinena devīr āpa eṣa vo garbhas taṃ vaḥ suprītaṃ subhṛtam akarma deveṣu naḥ sukṛto brūtād iti
8.20.19	bindūn upaiva spṛśati
8.20.20	na bhakṣayati

8.22.1	athāraṇyor agnīn samārohyodavasāya mathitvāgnīn vihṛtyāgneyam aṣṭākapālam udavasānīyām iṣṭiṃ nirvapati

8.22.13	atha tadānīm eva pṛṣṭhyāṃ stīrtvāpaḥ praṇīyottarāṇi devikāhavīṃṣi nirvapati sinīvālyai caruṃ kuhvai caruṃ dhātra eva puroḍāśaṃ dvādaśakapālam iti

9.1.1	pravargyaṃ saṃbhariṣyann upakalpayate khādirīm audumbarīṃ vaiṇavīṃ vaikaṅkatīṃ vābhriṃ vyāmamātrīṃ vāratnimātrīṃ vobhayataḥkṣṇūṃ mṛdaṃ ca bhāvitāṃ karaṇīyāṃ kṛṣṇājinaṃ varāhavihataṃ valmīkavapām ūtīkastambaṃ vādārastambaṃ vā chāgāpayo 'rmakapālāni śarkarā avāñjanapiṣṭā ajalomāni kṛṣṇājinalomāni sūnām adhikaraṇīṃ kartāraṃ kuśalaṃ veṇukāṇḍaṃ madantīr iti
9.1.2	athāmāvāsyena vā haviṣeṣṭvā nakṣatre vā pūrvāṃ śāntim upayanti namo vāca iti
9.1.3	athāgreṇa śālāṃ dhanurmātre vedyai gartaṃ khānayati
9.1.4	tad bhāvitāṃ mṛdam avalepayati
9.1.5	samāṃ bilena karoti
9.1.6	tad upasādayati varāhavihataṃ valmīkavapām ūtīkastambaṃ vādārastambaṃ vā sthāle chāgāpaya iti
9.1.7	athottarataḥ pārśvataḥ saṃbhārāṇāṃ prācīnāgrāṇi tṛṇāni saṃstīrya teṣūpari kṛṣṇājinaṃ prācīnagrīvam uttaralomopastṛṇāti
9.1.8	athottaraṃ śālākhaṇḍam agreṇa sphyenoddhatyāvokṣya sikatā nivapati
9.1.9	taṃ parimaṇḍalaṃ kharaṃ karoti
9.1.10	athainaṃ sikatābhir ābhrāśinaṃ karoti

9.1.12	tasyodīcīṃ dvāraṃ kurvanti
9.1.13	tad upasādayaty armakapālāni śarkarā avāñjanapiṣṭā ajalomāni kṛṣṇājinalomāni sūnām adhikaraṇīṃ kartāraṃ kuśalaṃ veṇukāṇḍam iti
