9.3.1	atha pravargyam ādadate 'vanāmya mukhāny anabhipraśvasantaḥ
9.3.2	na pravargyaṃ cādityaṃ cāntardadhati
9.3.3	bahavo harantīti vijñāyate
9.3.4	athainam ānayanty aitu brahmaṇaspatir ā devy etu sūnṛtā / acchā vīraṃ naryaṃ paṅktirādhasaṃ devā yajñaṃ nayantu na iti
9.3.5	athainaṃ khara upāvaharanty āyur dhehi prāṇaṃ dhehy apānaṃ dhehi vyānaṃ dhehi cakṣur dhehi śrotraṃ dhehi mano dhehi vācaṃ dhehy ātmānaṃ dhehi pratiṣṭhāṃ dhehi māṃ dhehi mayi dhehīti
9.3.6	athainam armakapālaiḥ śarkarābhir avāñjanapiṣṭābhir ajalomaiḥ kṛṣṇājinalomair iti saṃsṛjya madantībhir upasṛjati madhu tvā madhulā karotv iti
9.3.7	piṇḍaṃ karoti makhasya śiro 'sīti
9.3.8	yajñasya pade stha ity aṅguṣṭhābhyām upanigṛhṇāti
9.3.9	atha tṛtīyaṃ mṛdo 'pacchidya trīn piṇḍān karoti
9.3.10	teṣām ekaṃ kartre prayacchati gāyatro 'sīti
9.3.11	tenāsya budhnaṃ karoti gāyatreṇa tvā chandasā karomīti
9.3.12	atiśiṣṭāyai mṛdo 'rdhaṃ prayacchati traiṣṭubho 'sīti
9.3.13	tenāsya madhyaṃ karoti traiṣṭubhena tvā chandasā karomīti
9.3.14	sarvām antato mṛdaṃ prayacchati jāgato 'sīti
9.3.15	tenāsya bilaṃ karoti jāgatena tvā chandasā karomīti
9.3.16	taṃ prādeśamātraṃ pṛthubudhnaṃ madhye lagnaṃ karoti
9.3.17	athāsya veṇukāṇḍena dvibhāgam avavidhyati
9.3.18	tad asya pinvanaṃ bhavati
9.3.19	athāsya tryaṅgule vā caturaṅgule vā rāsnāṃ paryasyati makhasya rāsnāsīti
9.3.20	athāsya bilaṃ gṛhṇāty aditis te bilaṃ gṛhṇātu pāṅktena chandaseti
9.3.21	athainam ādityenābhitapati sūryasya harasā śrāyeti
9.3.22	athainaṃ khare nidadhāti
9.3.23	nihitam anumantrayate makho 'sīti
9.3.24	evam eva dvitīyaṃ mahāvīraṃ karoti
9.3.25	evaṃ tṛtīyam
9.3.26	tūṣṇīṃ pinvane rauhiṇakapāle cājyasthālīṃ ca
9.3.27	atha yā mṛd atiśiṣyate tayā pravāte pratilepam upavātayati
9.3.28	teṣūpavāteṣūpakalpayata ekaviṃśatiṃ vṛṣṇo aśvasya śakṛtpiṇḍān abhrim agniṃ pacanam iti
9.3.29	athāśvaśakam ādīpya mukhyaṃ mahāvīraṃ dhūpayati vṛṣṇo aśvasya niṣpad asi varuṇas tvā dhṛtavrata ādhūpayatu mitrāvaruṇayor dhruveṇa dharmaṇeti
9.3.30	antarataś ca bāhyataś ca sudhūpitaṃ kṛtvā nidadhāti
9.3.31	evam eva dvitīyaṃ mahāvīraṃ dhūpayati
9.3.32	evaṃ tṛtīyam
9.3.33	tūṣṇīṃ pinvane rauhiṇakapāle cājyasthālīṃ ca
9.3.34	athottareṇa śālām urubilam ivāvaṭaṃ khānayati
9.3.35	taṃ pacanenāvastīrya tasmin prāco vodīco vā mahāvīrān āyātayati
9.3.36	purastāt pinvane
9.3.37	paścād rauhiṇakapāle cājyasthālīṃ ca
9.3.38	athainān pacanenopariṣṭāt saṃpracchādya mṛdāvalimpati
9.3.39	caturaṅgulam anudiśam ādīpanāyātiśinaṣṭi
9.3.40	athopoṣati
9.4.1	arciṣe tveti purastāt
9.4.2	śociṣe tveti dakṣiṇataḥ
9.4.3	jyotiṣe tveti paścāt
9.4.4	tapase tvety uttarataḥ
9.4.5	te 'hnā vā rātryā vā pacyante
9.4.6	yadi prātar upoṣati sāyam upaiti
9.4.7	yadi sāyaṃ prātaḥ
9.4.8	teṣu pakveṣūpakalpayate gopayaś chāgāpayo dhṛṣṭim aśmasaṃdāvaṃ sataṃ saṃdaṃśaṃ khārīṃ śikyaṃ kṛṣṇājinam iti
9.4.9	etat samādāyābhyaity abhīmaṃ mahinā divaṃ mitro babhūva saprathāḥ / uta śravasā pṛthivīm
9.4.10	mitrasya carṣaṇīdhṛtaḥ śravo devasya sānasim / dyumnaṃ citraśravastamam iti
9.4.11	atha dhṛṣṭim ādatte siddhyai tveti
9.4.12	tayā mukhyān mahāvīrād aṅgārān udvapati devas tvā savitodvapatu supāṇiḥ svaṅguriḥ / subāhur uta śaktyeti
9.4.13	athainam ucchrayaty uttiṣṭha bṛhan bhavordhvas tiṣṭha dhruvas tvam iti
9.4.14	athainam āśaye pratiṣṭhāpayaty apadyamānaḥ pṛthivyām āśā diśa āpṛṇeti
9.4.15	athainam anvīkṣate sūryasya tvā cakṣuṣānvīkṣa ṛjave tvā sādhave tvā sukṣityai tvā bhūtyai tveti
9.4.16	athainaṃ pradakṣiṇaṃ purīṣeṇa paryūhatīdam aham amum āmuṣyāyaṇaṃ viśā paśubhir brahmavarcasena paryūhāmīti yathāvarṇam
9.4.17	athainaṃ saṃdaṃśena parigṛhya sate 'vadhāya chāgāpayasācchṛṇatti gāyatreṇa tvā chandasācchṛṇadmi traiṣṭubhena tvā chandasācchṛṇadmi jāgatena tvā chandasācchṛṇadmi chṛṇattu tvā vāk chṛṇattu tvork chṛṇattu tvā haviś chṛnddhi vācaṃ chṛnddhy ūrjaṃ chṛnddhi havir deva puraścara saghyāsaṃ tveti
9.4.18	antarataś ca bāhyataś ca svācchṛṇaṃ kṛtvā gopayasābhiviṣyandayati
9.4.19	evam eva dvitīyaṃ mahāvīram ācchṛṇatti
9.4.20	evaṃ tṛtīyam
9.4.21	tūṣṇīṃ pinvane rauhiṇakapāle cājyasthālīṃ ca
9.4.22	atha yadi vidhur vā pradaro vā jāyate 'śmacūrṇāni chāgāpayasi saṃprakīrya taiḥ pratyukṣyolmukenābhitapati vidhuṃ dadrāṇaṃ yad ṛte cid abhiśriṣa iti dvābhyām
9.4.23	saṃ haiva rohati
9.4.24	yady u vai sarvaśa eva bhidyata etāny eva kapālāny avāñjanaṃ piṣṭvā yaiṣā mṛt prāyaścittāya pariśete tayā saṃsṛjya kṛtvā paktvācchṛdya nidadhāti
9.4.25	teṣāṃ yadā śvasatha uparamaty athainān khāryāṃ samavadhāya kṛṣṇājinenopariṣṭāt saṃpracchādyottare śālākhaṇḍe śikya āsajati
9.4.26	yathā patnī na paśyati tathā
9.4.27	ta ā kālāt pariśere
9.4.28	athottarāṃ śāntim upayanti śaṃ no vātaḥ pavatāṃ mātariśveti
9.5.1	śvo rājñaḥ kraya ity upakalpayata audumbarīṃ samrāḍāsandīm audumbarīṃ sthūṇāṃ godohanīm audumbaraṃ chāgāyai śaṅkum audumbaraṃ śaphopayamanam audumbaraṃ sruvam audumbaryau srucāv aniṣkīrṇe rauhiṇahavaṇī dve audumbarī dhṛṣṭī trīṇi dhavitrāṇi kārṣṇājināny audumbaradaṇḍāni
9.5.2	vaiṇavadaṇḍānīty eke
9.5.3	ṣaḍ audumbarāñ chakalān vaikaṅkatīṃ ca samidhaṃ trayodaśa vaikaṅkatān paridhīn vaikaṅkatīṃ srucaṃ pracaraṇīṃ kārṣmaryamayān paridhīn suvarṇarajatau ca rukmau dve gharmadughe dhenuṃ ca chāgāṃ ca dvau kuśamayau vedāv ekaṃ mauñjaṃ vedam aparivāsitaṃ mauñjaṃ rajjudāma muñjapralavān rauhiṇapiṣṭāni kharebhyaḥ sikatā iti
9.5.4	atha prāyaṇīyena carati
9.5.5	prāyaṇīyena caritvā padena carati
9.5.6	padena caritvā rājānaṃ krītvohyātithyaṃ nirvapati
9.5.7	ātithyena pracarya pūrvāṃ śāntim upayanti namo vāca iti
9.5.8	athāgreṇa gārhapatyaṃ tṛṇāni saṃstīrya tad etat parigharmyaṃ sarvaṃ saṃsādayanti
9.5.9	atra samrāḍāsandīm atra sthūṇāṃ godohanīm atra chāgāyai śaṅkum iti
9.5.10	athottareṇa gārhapatyaṃ sphyenoddhatyāvokṣya sikatā nivapati
9.5.11	taṃ prādeśamātraṃ parimaṇḍalaṃ pravṛñjanīyaṃ kharaṃ karoti
9.5.12	athainaṃ sikatābhir ābhrāśinaṃ karoti
9.5.13	athottareṇāhavanīyaṃ sphyenoddhatyāvokṣya sikatā nivapati
9.5.14	taṃ prādeśamātraṃ parimaṇḍalam udvāsanīyaṃ kharaṃ karoti
9.5.15	athainaṃ sikatābhir ābhrāśinaṃ karoti
9.5.16	athottare śalākhaṇḍe sphyenoddhatyāvokṣya sikatā nivapati
9.5.17	taṃ caturaśraṃ niṣyandanavantam ucchiṣṭakharaṃ karoti
9.5.18	athainaṃ sikatābhir ābhrāśinaṃ karoti
9.5.19	athādhvaryuḥ pracaraṇīyaṃ mahāvīraṃ śaphābhyāṃ parigṛhya pravṛñjanīye khare sādayati
9.5.20	athainaṃ mauñjena vedenāpidadhāti
9.5.21	athaitām āsandīm agreṇāhavanīyaṃ paryāhṛtya dakṣiṇato nidadhāti
9.5.22	tasyāṃ kṛṣṇājinaṃ prācīnagrīvam uttaralomopastṛṇāti
9.5.23	athaitāv upaśayau mahāvīrau vedābhyāṃ parigṛhyāgreṇāhavanīyaṃ paryāhṛtya dakṣiṇataḥ samrāḍāsandyāṃ kṛṣṇājine prācīnabilau sādayati
9.5.24	athaitām abhrim agreṇāhavanīyaṃ paryāhṛtya dakṣiṇataḥ samrāḍāsandyāṃ kṛṣṇājine sādayati
9.5.25	athaitāṃ mṛdam atiśiṣṭām agreṇāhavanīyaṃ paryāhṛtya dakṣiṇataḥ samrāḍāsandyāṃ kṛṣṇājine sādayati
9.5.26	athaitāṃ sthūṇāṃ godohanīṃ chāgāyai śaṅkum ity ādāya jaghanena dakṣiṇena gārhapatyaṃ parikramya dakṣiṇayā dvāropanirhṛtya hotuḥ saṃdarśe sthūṇāṃ nihatya mauñjena dāmnā gharmadugho vatsaṃ badhnanti
9.5.27	tam uttareṇa chāgāyai śaṅkuṃ nihatya chāgāṃ nigrathnanti
9.5.28	pratyubjati chagalam
9.5.29	athaitenaiva yathetam etya niṣkramayanti vṛṣalān
9.5.30	hvayanti hotāram
9.5.31	hvayanti brahmāṇam
9.5.32	hvayanti pratiprasthātāram
9.5.33	hvayanti prastotāram
9.5.34	hvayanty āgnīdhram
9.5.35	pariśrayanti dvārāṇi
9.5.36	patnīśāle patnīṃ pariśrayanti
9.5.37	paristṛṇanti
9.5.38	dakṣiṇata upaviśato brahmā ca yajamānaś ca
9.5.39	atra pūrvāṃ śāntim upayanti yeṣām anupetā bhavati
9.6.1	athādhvaryuḥ sapavitrāḥ prokṣaṇīr ādadāna āha brahman pravargyeṇa pracariṣyāmo hotar gharmam abhiṣṭuhy agnīd rauhiṇau puroḍāśāv adhiśraya pratiprasthātaḥ pravargyaṃ vihara prastotaḥ sāmāni gāyeti
9.6.2	tad brahmā prasauti yajuryuktaṃ sāmabhir āktakhaṃ tvā viśvair devair anumataṃ marudbhiḥ / dakṣiṇābhiḥ pratataṃ pārayiṣṇuṃ stubho vahantu sumanasyamānaṃ sa no rucaṃ dhehy ahṛṇīyamāno bhūr bhuvaḥ suvar om indravantaḥ pracarateti
9.6.3	athādhvaryuḥ pracaraṇīyaṃ mahāvīraṃ prokṣati yamāya tvā makhāya tvā sūryasya harase tveti
9.6.4	abhiprāpnuvan parānparān saṃbhārān prokṣati
9.6.5	tam eva pratiprasthātā pravargyaṃ viharati
9.6.6	athāhavanīye kārṣmaryamayān paridhīn paridadhāti
9.6.7	tad upasādayati ṣaḍ audumbarāñ chakalān vaikaṅkatīṃ ca samidhaṃ gārhapatye trayodaśa vaikaṅkatān paridhīn suvarṇarajatau ca rukmau muñjapralavān rauhiṇapiṣṭānīti
9.6.8	athaiṣa āgnīdhro jaghanena gārhapatyam upaviśya dhṛṣṭībhyāṃ pratīco 'ṅgārān nirūhya teṣu rauhiṇakapāle upadadhāti
9.6.9	atha dāruṇasaṃyutāni piṣṭāni saṃyutya rauhiṇau puroḍāśāv adhiśrayati
9.6.10	athājyaṃ nirvapati
9.6.11	athājyam adhiśrayati
9.6.12	ubhayaṃ paryagnikṛtvā rauhiṇau puroḍāśau śrapayati
9.6.13	etasmin kāle pratiprasthātā mauñjena vedena homārthāni pātrāṇi saṃmṛśati mahāvīraṃ sruvaṃ pinvane rauhiṇahavanī upayamanam iti
9.6.14	atha pratiprasthātājyam utpūya rauhiṇau puroḍāśāv upastīrṇābhighāritāv udvāsya rauhiṇahavanībhyāṃ parigṛhyāntarvedy āsādayati
9.6.15	dakṣiṇaṃ paridhisandhim anv ekam
9.6.16	uttaraṃ paridhisandhim anv itaram
9.6.17	prāñcau pūrvāhṇike
9.6.18	pratyañcāv āparāhṇike
9.6.19	athādhvaryuḥ pracaraṇīyaṃ mahāvīraṃ śaphābhyāṃ parigṛhya savye pāṇau samāvṛtyājyasthālyāḥ sakṛdupahatenājyena gārhapatye 'navānaṃ saṃtatāḥ sapta prāṇāhutīr juhoti prāṇāya svāhā vyānāya svāhā apānāya svāhā cakṣuṣe svāhā śrotrāya svāhā manase svāhā vāce sarasvatyai svāheti
9.6.20	catasra uttarā yathopapādaṃ dakṣāya svāhā kratave svāhaujase svāhā balāya svāheti
9.6.21	athainam ājyenānakti devas tvā savitā madhvānaktv iti
9.6.22	etasmin kāle pratiprasthātā rājataṃ rukmaṃ pravṛñjanīye khara upagūhati pṛthivīṃ tapasas trāyasveti
9.6.23	atha muñjapralavān vyatiṣajyādīpayaty arcir asi śocir asi jyotir asi tapo 'sīti
9.6.24	tān pravṛñjanīye khare saṃprakīrya teṣu pracarṇīyaṃ mahāvīraṃ saṃsādayati
9.7.1	saṃsīdasva mahāṃ asi śocasva devavītamaḥ / vi dhūmam agne aruṣaṃ miyedhya sṛja praśasta darśatam iti
9.7.2	athainam ājyena pūrayaty añjanti yaṃ prathayanto na viprā vapāvantaṃ nāgninā tapantaḥ / pitur na putra upasi preṣṭha ā gharmo agnim ṛtayann asādīd iti
9.7.3	athāsya prādeśena diśo vyāsthāpayaty anādhṛṣyā purastād agner ādhipatya āyur me dā iti purastāt
9.7.4	putravatī dakṣiṇata indrasyādhipatye prajāṃ me dā iti dakṣiṇataḥ
9.7.5	suṣadā paścād devasya savitur ādhipatye prāṇaṃ me dā iti paścāt
9.7.6	āśrutir uttarato mitrāvaruṇayor ādhipatye śrotraṃ me dā ity uttarataḥ
9.7.7	vidhṛtir upariṣṭād bṛhaspater ādhipatye brahma me dāḥ kṣatraṃ me dās tejo me dhā varco me dhā yaśo me dhās tapo me dhā mano me dhā ity upariṣṭāt
9.7.8	athemām abhimṛśati manor aśvāsi bhūriputrā viśvābhyo mā nāṣṭrābhyaḥ pāhi sūpasadā me bhūyā mā mā hiṃsīr iti
9.7.9	atha dhṛṣṭībhyām udīco 'ṅgārān nirūhati tapo ṣv agne antarāṃ amitrān tapā śaṃsam araruṣaḥ parasya / tapo vaso cikitāno acittān vi te tiṣṭhantām ajarā ayāsa iti
9.7.10	tair enaṃ pradakṣiṇaṃ paricinoti cita stha paricitaḥ svāhā marudbhiḥ pariśrayasveti
9.7.11	athainaṃ trayodaśabhir vaikaṅkataiḥ paridhibhiḥ paricinuto 'dhvaryuś ca pratiprasthātā ca
9.7.12	mā asīti prāñcāv adhvaryuḥ
9.7.13	pramā asīty udañcau pratiprasthātā
9.7.14	tāv evam eva vyatiṣaṅgaṃ pratimā asi saṃmā asi vimā asy unmā asīti
9.7.15	athainaṃ trayodaśaṃ paridhiṃ dakṣiṇata ūrdhvāgraṃ niminoty antarikṣasyāntardhir asīti
9.7.16	athainaṃ sauvarṇena rukmenāpidadhāti divaṃ tapasas trāyasveti
9.7.17	athainam upatiṣṭhata ābhir gīrbhiḥ śukraṃ te anyad arhan bibharṣi sāyakāni dhanveti
9.7.18	prajvalite rukmam apakarṣati
9.8.1	atha dhavitrāṇy ādatte gāyatram asīty anyatarat traiṣṭubham asīty anyataraj jāgatam asīty anyatarat
9.8.2	tair enaṃ paścāt prāṅ jānvācyordhvaṃ dhūnoti madhu madhv iti
9.8.3	uttaratas tiṣṭhate pratiprasthātre dve dhavitre prayacchati
9.8.4	tayor anyatarad āgnīdhrāyotprayacchati
9.8.5	athainaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇaṃ pariyanti praṇavepraṇave dhūnvantaḥ
9.8.6	triḥ parītyottaratas tiṣṭhanti
9.8.7	atha dhavitrāṇy ādatte
9.8.8	apareṇa parikrāntāyottaratas tiṣṭhate pratiprasthātre dve dhavitre prayacchati
9.8.9	tayor anyatarad āgnīdhrāyotprayacchati
9.8.10	athainaṃ paryupaviśanti
9.8.11	paścāt prāṅmukho 'dhvaryur upaviśati
9.8.12	purastāt pratyaṅmukhaḥ pratiprasthātā
9.8.13	uttarato dakṣiṇāmukha āgnīdhraḥ
9.8.14	ta evam eva praṇavepraṇave dhūnvanta āsata upasamāsam ulmukāny āpyāyayanto mahāvīram
9.8.15	atha yatra hotur abhijānāti yābhir vartikāṃ grasitām amuñcatam iti tad enam upotthāya rocayato 'dhvaryuś ca yajamānaś ca daśa prācīr daśa bhāsi dakṣiṇety etetānuvākena
9.8.16	atha yatra hotur abhijānāty apnasvatīm aśvinā vācam asma iti tad dhavitrāṇy upodyacchante
9.8.17	atha yatra hotur abhijānāty arūrucad uṣasaḥ pṛśnir agriya iti tad rucito gharma ity uktvā yathetaṃ triḥ punaḥ pratipariyanti nidhāya dhavitrāṇi
9.8.18	avakāśair avekṣamāṇā upatiṣṭhante 'paśyaṃ gopām iti pratipadyāśīmahi tvā mā mā hiṃsīr ity ātaḥ
9.8.19	atha gārhapatyam upatiṣṭhate tvam agne gṛhapatir viśām asi viśvāsāṃ mānuṣīṇāṃ śataṃ pūrbhir yaviṣṭha pāhy aṃhasaḥ sameddhāraṃ śataṃ himās tandrāviṇaṃ hārdivānam ihaiva rātayaḥ santv iti
9.8.20	antarhite pratiprasthātā vede patnīṃ vācayati tvaṣṭīmatī te sapeyety āntād anuvākasya
9.8.21	etasmin kāle pratiprasthātā dakṣiṇaṃ rauhiṇaṃ juhoty ahar jyotiḥ ketunā juṣatāṃ sujyotir jyotiṣāṃ svāheti
9.9.1	atha raśanām ādatte devasya tvā savituḥ prasave 'śvinor bāhubhyāṃ pūṣṇo hastābhyām ādada iti
9.9.2	ādāyābhimantrayate 'dityai rāsnāsīti
9.9.3	dohanaṃ kaṃsaṃ pinvane iti pratiprasthātāpareṇa parikramya
9.9.4	athaitāṃ gharmadughaṃ trir upāṃśu devanāmabhir āhvayatīḍa ehy adita ehi sarasvaty ehīti
9.9.5	trir uccair dakṣiṇayā dvāropaniṣkramya yad asyai nāma bhavati tenāsāv ehy asāv ehīti
9.9.6	athaināṃ raśanayābhidadhāty adityā uṣṇīṣam asīti
9.9.7	vāyur asy aiḍa iti gharmadugho vatsam abhimṛśati
9.9.8	athainam upāvasṛjati pūṣā tvopāvasṛjatv aśvibhyāṃ pradāpayeti
9.9.9	dhayantam anumantrayate yas te stanaḥ śaśayo yo mayobhūr yena viśvā puṣyasi vāryāṇi / yo ratnadhā vasuvid yaḥ sudatraḥ sarasvati tam iha dhātave kar iti
9.9.10	prattāyām unnayaty usra gharmaṃ śiṃṣosra gharmaṃ pāhi gharmāya śiṃṣeti
9.9.11	niyujya saṃdhāyopasīdati bṛhaspatis tvopasīdatv iti
9.9.12	stanān saṃmṛśati dānava stha peravo viṣvagvṛto lohiteneti
9.9.13	atha yatra hotur abhijānāty ā daśabhir vivasvata iti tad enāṃ pinvane pinvayaty aśvibhyāṃ pinvasva sarasvatyai pinvasva pūṣṇe pinvasva bṛhaspataye pinvasvendrāya pinvasvendrāya pinvasveti
9.9.14	atiśiṣṭaṃ kaṃse dohayati
9.9.15	etasmin kāle pratiprasthātā pinvane chāgāṃ pinvayati tūṣṇīm
9.9.16	atha yatra hotur abhijānāty uttiṣṭha brahmaṇaspata iti tat pratiprasthātre payasī saṃpradāyaitenaiva yathetam etya śaphopayamān ādatte gāyatro 'sīty anyatarat traiṣṭubho 'sīty anyataraj jāgatam asīty upayamanam
9.9.17	atha yatra hotur abhijānāty upadrava payasā godhug oṣam iti tatpayasī āhriyamāṇe abhimantrayate sahorjo bhāgenopa mehīndrāśvinā madhunaḥ sāraghasya gharmaṃ pāta vasavo yajatā vaḍ iti
9.9.18	atha purastāt pratyañcāv upaviśya mahāvīre payasī avanayato 'dhvaryuś ca pratiprasthātā ca
9.9.19	adhvaryuḥ pūrvo gopayo 'vanayati svāhā tvā sūryasya raśmaye vṛṣṭivanaye juhomi svāheti
9.9.20	athāsyoṣmāṇam anvīkṣate madhu havir asi sūryasya tapas tapeti
9.9.21	etasmin kāle pratiprasthātā chāgāpayo 'vanayati tūṣṇīm
9.9.22	ubhayaṃ samānīyādhvaryus tṛtīyam avanayati
9.9.23	atra yat kaṃse payas tad upayamane samavanayati pratyūhyāṅgārān
9.9.24	athādhvaryuḥ pracaraṇīyaṃ mahāvīraṃ śaphābhyāṃ parigṛhṇāti
9.10.1	dyāvāpṛthivībhyāṃ tvā parigṛhṇāmīti
9.10.2	vedenādhastād upamṛjyopayamanenopayacchaty antarikṣeṇa tvopayacchāmīti
9.10.3	athainam ādāyopottiṣṭhati devānāṃ tvā pitṝṇām anumato bhartuṃ śakeyam iti
9.10.4	prāṅ harati tejo 'si tejo 'nu prehy agnir mā pṛthivyāḥ pātu vāyur antarikṣāt sūryo divo divispṛṅ mā mā hiṃsīr antarikṣaspṛṅ mā mā hiṃsīḥ pṛthivispṛṅ mā mā hiṃsīḥ suvar asi suvar me yaccha divaṃ yaccha divo mā pāhīti
9.10.5	atha vātanāmāni vyācaṣṭe samudrāya tvā vātāya svāheti pañcānavānam
9.10.6	evam eva dve uttare
9.10.7	ṣaḍ uttarāṇi yathopapādam agnaye tvā vasumate svāhā somāya tvā rudravate svāhā varuṇāya tvādityavate svāhā bṛhaspataye tvā viśvadevyāvate svāhā savitre tvarbhumate vibhumate prabhumate vājavate svāhā yamāya tvāṅgirasvate pitṛmate svāheti
9.10.8	viśvā āśā dakṣiṇasad iti dakṣiṇata āsīnaṃ brahmāṇam īkṣate
9.10.9	viśvān devān ayāḍ iheti paścād āsīnaṃ hotāram
9.10.10	savyenātyākrāmañ japati svāhākṛtasya gharmasya madhoḥ pibatam aśvinā svāhāgnaye yajñiyāya śaṃ yajurbhir iti
9.10.11	yajamānam ativācayaty aśvinā gharmaṃ pātaṃ hārdivānam ahar divābhir ūtibhir anu vāṃ dyāvāpṛthivī maṃsātām iti
9.10.12	uccair āśrāvyāha gharmasya yajeti
9.10.13	vaṣaṭkṛte juhoti svāhendrāyeti
9.10.14	svāhendrā vaḍ ity anuvaṣaṭkṛte hutvā vācayati gharmam apātam aśvinā hārdivānam ahar divābhir ūtibhir anu vāṃ dyāvāpṛthivī amaṃsātāṃ taṃ prāvyaṃ yathāvaṭ namo dive namaḥ pṛthivyai divi dhā imaṃ yajñaṃ yajñam imaṃ divi dhā divaṃ gacchāntarikṣaṃ gaccha pṛthivīṃ gaccha pañca pradiśo gaccha devān gharmapān gaccha pitṝn gharmapān gaccheti
9.10.15	etasmin kāle pratiprasthātā pinvanenopayamanād upahatya pracaraṇīyaṃ mahāvīraṃ pūrayati
9.10.16	athainam antaḥparidhy abhipīpayato 'dhvaryuś ca pratiprasthātā ca sahaiveṣe pīpihy ūrje pīpihi brahmaṇe pīpihi kṣatrāya pīpihy adbhyaḥ pīpihy oṣadhībhyaḥ pīpihi vanaspatibhyaḥ pīpihi dyāvāpṛthivībhyāṃ pīpihi subhūtāya pīpihi brahmavarcasāya pīpihi yajamānāya pīpihi mahyam ity upāṃśūktvā jyaiṣṭhyāya pīpihīty uccaiḥ
9.10.17	athainam anudiśam ātmānam abhipīpayati tviṣyai tvā dyumnāya tvendriyāya tvā bhūtyai tveti
9.10.18	atra yan mahāvīre payas tad upayamane samavanayati
9.10.19	athodaṅṅ atyākramyāthaitad upayamanam antarvedi prācīnabilaṃ sādayati
9.10.20	etasmin kāle pratiprasthātā rājataṃ rukmam udvāsanīye khara upagūhati
9.10.21	tasmin pracaraṇīyaṃ mahāvīraṃ sādayati
9.11.1	dharmāsi sudharmāmeny asme brahmāṇi dhāraya kṣatrāṇi dhāraya viśaṃ dhāraya net tvā vāta skandayād iti
9.11.2	atha yady abhicared amuṣya tvā prāṇe sādayāmy amunā saha nirarthaṃ gaccha yo 'smān dveṣṭi yaṃ ca vayaṃ dviṣma iti
9.11.3	athāpa upaspṛśya ṣaḍ audumbarāñ chakalān yācati
9.11.4	teṣām ekaikenopayamanād upahatya pūrvārdha āhavanīyasya praścotayati pūṣṇe śarase svāheti
9.11.5	athainam antarāñjanaṃ madhyame paridhau saṃspṛṣṭaṃ sādayati
9.11.6	evam eva dvitīyenopayamanād upahatya pūrvārdha evāhavanīyasya praścotayati grāvabhyaḥ svāheti
9.11.7	taṃ tathāntarāñjanaṃ madhyame paridhau saṃspṛṣṭaṃ sādayati
9.11.8	evam eva tṛtīyenopayamanād upahatya madhyata āhavanīyasya praścotayati pratirebhyaḥ svāheti
9.11.9	taṃ tathaivāntarāñjanaṃ madhyame paridhau saṃspṛṣṭaṃ sādayati
9.11.10	evam eva caturthenopayamanād upahatyāparārdha āhavanīyasya praścotayati dyāvāpṛthivībhyāṃ svāheti
9.11.11	athainam ūrdhvāñjanaṃ bhasmānta upagūhati
9.11.12	evam eva pañcamenopayamanād upahatya dakṣiṇārdha āhavanīyasya praścotayati pitṛbhyo gharmapebhyaḥ svāheti
9.11.13	athainaṃ bahirāñjanaṃ dakṣiṇe paridhau saṃspṛṣṭaṃ sādayati
9.11.14	athaitaṃ ṣaṣṭhaṃ śakalaṃ sarveṣu lepeṣu samajyopayamanād antata upahatyottarārdha āhavanīyasya praścotayati rudrāya rudrahotre svāheti
9.11.15	athainam uttareṇa śālāyā atīkāśenānanvīkṣamāṇo nirasyaty amunā saha nirarthaṃ gaccha yo 'smān dveṣṭi yaṃ ca vayaṃ dviṣma iti
9.11.16	athāpa upaspṛśyātiśiṣṭāñ chakalān adbhiḥ saṃsparśyāhavanīye 'nupraharati
9.11.17	etasmin kāle pratiprasthātottaraṃ rauhiṇaṃ juhoty ahar jyotiḥ ketunā juṣatāṃ sujyotir jyotiṣāṃ svāheti
9.11.18	atraitāṃ samidhaṃ madhyata āhavanīyasyābhyādadhāti tūṣṇīm
9.11.19	tasyām ādīptāyāṃ pratimukhaṃ dvir juhoti bhūḥ svāheti
9.11.20	athaitad upayamanam antarvedi prācīnabilaṃ sādayitvā tasminn agnihotravidhiṃ ceṣṭitvā
9.11.21	sa yāvantaḥ pravargyasyartvijas teṣūpahavam iṣṭvā yajamāna eva pratyakṣaṃ bhakṣayati hutaṃ havir madhu havir indratame 'gnau pitā no 'si mā mā hiṃsīr aśyāma te deva gharma madhumato vājavataḥ pitumato 'ṅgirasvataḥ svadhāvino 'śīmahi tvā mā mā hiṃsīr iti
9.11.22	athaitad upayamanaṃ parikarmī vāgnīdhro vocchiṣṭakhare mārjāyitvāntarvedi prācīnabilaṃ sādayitvā tasmin suvarṇarajatau ca rukmau prāsya madantīr apa ānīya hiraṇyavatībhir mārjayante
9.12.1	hiraṇyavarṇāḥ śucayaḥ pāvakā iti catasṛbhiḥ
9.12.2	atraiva madantīr apo ninīyājyasthālyāḥ sruveṇopaghātaṃ gharmaprāyaścittāni juhoti prāṇāya svāhā pūṣṇe svāhety etābhyām anuvākābhyām
9.12.3	athaitad upayamanam antarvedi prācīnabilaṃ sādayitvā tad etat parigharmyaṃ sarvaṃ samavaśamayann āha gharmāyotsādyamānāyānubrūhīti
9.12.4	athaitad upayamanam agreṇāhavanīyaṃ paryāhṛtya dakṣiṇataḥ samrāḍāsandyāṃ kṛṣṇājine prācīnabilaṃ sādayati svāhā tvā sūryasya raśmibhya iti
9.12.5	athottarāṃ śāntim upayanti śaṃ no vātaḥ pavatāṃ mātariśveti
9.12.6	athāparāhṇa āparāhṇikena pravargyeṇa pracarati
9.12.7	tasya yad vihitaṃ vihitam evāsya tat
9.12.8	samānaṃ karmā dakṣiṇasya rauhiṇasya homāt
9.12.9	atha dakṣiṇaṃ rauhiṇaṃ juhoti rātrir jyotiḥ ketunā juṣatāṃ sujyotir jyotiṣāṃ svāheti
9.12.10	evam evottaraṃ rauhiṇaṃ juhoti
9.12.11	samānaṃ karmā samidādhānāt
9.12.12	atraitāṃ samidhaṃ madhyata āhavanīyasyābhyādadhāty apīparo māhno rātriyai mā pāhy eṣā te agne samit tayā samidhyasvāyur me dā varcasā māñjīr iti sāyam apīparo mā rātriyā ahno mā pāhīti prātaḥ
9.12.13	prātarmantreṇāta ūrdhvaṃ pūrvāhṇike 'bhyādadhāti
9.12.14	sāyaṃmantreṇāparāhṇike
9.12.15	tasyām ādīptāyāṃ pratimukhaṃ dvir juhoty agnir jyotir jyotir agniḥ svāheti sāyam
9.12.16	sūryo jyotir jyotiḥ sūryaḥ svāheti prātaḥ
9.12.17	samānaṃ karmā saṃpraiṣāt
9.12.18	athaitad upayamanam agreṇāhavanīyaṃ paryāhṛtya dakṣiṇataḥ samrāḍāsandyāṃ kṛṣṇājine pratīcīnabilaṃ sādayati svāhā tvā nakṣatrebhya iti
9.12.19	athottarāṃ śāntim upayanti śaṃ no vātaḥ pavatāṃ mātariśveti
9.12.20	sa evam eva pravargyeṇa pracarati tryahaṃ ṣaḍahaṃ dvādaśāhaṃ saṃvatsaram
9.12.21	caturo vā māsāṃs tāpaścite 'gnau
9.12.22	pravargyaṃ bhakṣayitvā saṃvatsaraṃ na māṃsam aśnīyāt
9.12.23	na rāmām upeyāt
9.12.24	na mṛnmayena pibet
9.12.25	nāsya rāma ucchiṣṭaṃ pibet
9.12.26	teja eva tat saṃśyatīti brāhmaṇam
9.13.1	pravargyam udvāsayiṣyann upakalpayate trīñ chālākān idhmāṃs trīṇi satāny udakumbhau dadhi madhumiśraṃ grumuṣṭim avakābhāraṃ viṃśatim audumbarīḥ samidho muñjapralavān rauhiṇapiṣṭāni kharebhyaḥ sikatā iti
9.13.2	atra pūrvāṃ śāntim upayanti namo vāca iti
9.13.3	athāgreṇāhavanīyaṃ tṛṇāni saṃstīrya tad etat parigharmyaṃ sarvaṃ saha saṃsādayanti
9.13.4	atra samrāḍāsandīm atra sthūṇāṃ godohanīm atra chāgāyai śaṅkum iti
9.13.5	athaitau kharau nānaiva satayoḥ samupyātraiva saha saṃsādayanti
9.13.6	athaitam ucchiṣṭakharaṃ parikarmī vāgnīdhro vā sate samupya dakṣiṇayā dvāropanirhṛtya mārjālīyadeśe nivapati
9.13.7	athaitenaiva yathetam etya niṣkramayanti vṛṣalān
9.13.8	hvayanti patnīm
9.13.9	hvayanti hotāram
9.13.10	hvayanti brahmāṇam
9.13.11	hvayanti pratiprasthātāram
9.13.12	hvayanti prastotāram
9.13.13	hvayanty āgnīdhram
9.13.14	pariśrayanti dvārāṇi
9.13.15	athaitāṃ patnīm udagdaśena vāsasāntardadhati
9.13.16	paristṛṇanti
9.13.17	dakṣiṇata upaviśato brahmā ca yajamānaś ca
9.13.18	atra pūrvāṃ śāntim upayanti yeṣām anupetā bhavati
9.13.19	atha gārhapatya ājyaṃ vilāpyotpunāti
9.13.20	etasmin kāle pratiprasthātāhavanīye śālākam idhmam ādīpya mukhadaghne dhārayan purastāt pratyaṅmukhas tiṣṭhati
9.13.21	tam adhvaryuḥ paścāt prāṅmukhas tiṣṭhan sruvāhutyābhijuhoti gharma yā te divi śug yā gāyatre chandasi yā brāhmaṇe yā havirdhāne tāṃ ta etenāvayaje svāheti
9.13.22	tam atraiva prāsyāparam ādīpya nābhidaghne dhārayan purastāt pratyaṅmukhas tiṣṭhati
9.13.23	tam adhvaryuḥ paścāt prāṅmukhas tiṣṭhan sruvāhutyābhijuhoti gharma yā te 'ntarikṣe śug yā traiṣṭubhe chandasi yā rājanye yāgnīdhre tāṃ ta etenāvayaje svāheti
9.13.24	tam atraiva prāsyāparam ādīpya jānudaghne dhārayan purastāt pratyaṅmukhas tiṣṭhati
9.13.25	tam adhvaryuḥ paścāt prāṅmukhas tiṣṭhan sruvāhutyābhijuhoti gharma yā te pṛthivyāṃ śug yā jāgate chandasi yā vaiśye yā sadasi tāṃ ta etenāvayaje svāheti
9.13.26	tam atraiva prāsya vivṛtya dvārāṇy atha pravargyam ādāya pūrvayā dvāropaniṣkrāmanty anu no 'dyānumatir anv id anumate tvam iti dvābhyām
9.13.27	atha mahāvedim avakramya prastotāram āha prastotaḥ sāma gāyeti
9.13.28	sāmnā prastotānvavaiti
9.13.29	trir nidhanam upaiti
9.13.30	puruṣaḥpuruṣo nidhanam upaitīti brāhmaṇam
9.13.31	athābhikrāmanti
9.14.1	divas tvā paraspāyā antarikṣasya tanuvaḥ pāhi pṛthivyās tvā dharmaṇā vayam anukrāmāma suvitāya navyasa iti
9.14.2	viṣuvati dvitīyaṃ nidhanam upayanti
9.14.3	athābhikrāmanti brahmaṇas tvā paraspāyāḥ kṣatrasya tanuvaḥ pāhi viśas tvā dharmaṇā vayam anukrāmāma suvitāya navyasa iti
9.14.4	uparavakāle tṛtīyaṃ nidhanam upayanti
9.14.5	athābhikrāmanti prāṇasya tvā paraspāyai cakṣuṣas tanuvaḥ pāhi śrotrasya tvā dharmaṇā vayam anukrāmāma suvitāya navyasa iti
9.14.6	athottareṇottaravedim uparamanti
9.14.7	sa yo balavāṃs tam āhānenodakumbhena saṃtatayā dhārayā triḥ pradakṣiṇaṃ pariṣiñcan parīhīti
9.14.8	sa tathā karoti
9.14.9	pariṣicyamāne yajamānaṃ vācayati valgur asi śaṃyudhāyāḥ śiśur janadhāyāḥ śaṃ ca vakṣi pari ca vakṣīti
9.14.10	nidhāya kumbhaṃ yathetaṃ triḥ punaḥ pratiparyeti
9.14.11	athottaranābhim abhimṛśati catuḥsraktir nābhir ṛtasya sado viśvāyuḥ śarma saprathā apa dveṣo apa hvaro 'nyadvratasya saścimeti
9.14.12	athaitau kharāv uttareṇottaranābhim avakirati
9.14.13	taṃ dhṛṣṭībhyāṃ prāgdīrghaṃ kharaṃ karoti
9.14.14	tasmin suvarṇaṃ hiraṇyaṃ nidhāya kṛṣṇājinaṃ prācīnagrīvam uttaralomopastṛṇāti
9.14.15	athainaṃ rauhiṇapiṣṭair anuprakīrya muñjapralavair anuviśādya sikatābhir anuprakirati
9.14.16	athādhvaryuḥ pracaraṇīyaṃ mahāvīraṃ śaphābhyāṃ parigṛhya dadhnā madhumiśreṇa pūrayati gharmaitat te 'nnam etat purīṣaṃ tena vardhasva cā ca pyāyasva vardhiṣīmahi ca vayam ā ca pyāsiṣīmahīti
9.14.17	athainam abhipūrayati mahīnāṃ payo 'si vihitaṃ devatrā jyotirbhā asi vanaspatīnām oṣadhīnāṃ raso vājinaṃ tvā vājino 'vanayāma iti
9.14.18	athainaṃ pūrvārdhe kharasya sādayaty ūrdhvaṃ manaḥ suvargam iti
9.15.1	athaitāv upaśayau mahāvīrau vedābhyāṃ parigṛhya dadhnā madhumiśreṇa pūrayitvāgreṇa pracaraṇīyaṃ mahāvīraṃ saṃspṛṣṭau sādayati
9.15.2	athaitāṃ pracaraṇīṃ dadhnā madhumiśreṇa pūrayitvopariṣṭān mahāvīreṣu pratīcīnabilāṃ sādayati
9.15.3	athaitau rukmau dadhnā madhumiśreṇa samajyābhitaḥ pracaraṇīyaṃ mahāvīraṃ saṃspṛṣṭau sādayati
9.15.4	athaite pinvane dadhnā madhumiśreṇa pūrayitvābhitaḥ pracaraṇīyaṃ mahāvīraṃ pratīcīnabile saṃspṛṣṭe sādayati
9.15.5	athaitaṃ mauñjaṃ vedaṃ visrasya dadhnā madhumiśreṇa samajyāgreṇa mahāvīrān pratīcīnāgraṃ saṃspṛṣṭaṃ vistṛṇāti
9.15.6	athaitau śaphau dadhnā madhumiśreṇa samajya jaghanena pracaraṇīyaṃ mahāvīraṃ tiraścīnāgrau vyatiṣaktau saṃspṛṣṭau sādayati
9.15.7	athaite rauhiṇahavanī dadhnā madhumiśreṇa samajya śaphāgrābhyāṃ pratīcīnāgre saṃspṛṣṭe sādayati
9.15.8	athaitā daśaudumbarīḥ samidho dadhnā madhumiśreṇa samajya jaghanena rauhiṇahavanī pratīcīnāgrāḥ saṃspṛṣṭā vistṛṇāti
9.15.9	athaitaṃ kuśamayaṃ vedaṃ visrasya dadhnā madhumiśreṇa samajya jaghanena pracaraṇīyaṃ mahāvīraṃ pratīcīnāgraṃ saṃspṛṣṭaṃ vistṛṇāti
9.15.10	athaite sthūṇe dadhnā madhumiśreṇa samajya jaghanena śaphau pratīcīnāgre saṃspṛṣṭe sādayati
9.15.11	athaitad upayamanaṃ dadhnā madhumiśreṇa pūrayitvopariṣṭāt sthūṇayoḥ pratīcīnabilaṃ sādayati
9.15.12	athaitad rajjudravyaṃ visrasya dadhnā madhumiśreṇa samajyātraivopayamane samavaśamayati
9.15.13	athaitān kārṣmaryamayān paridhīn dhavitradaṇḍān iti visrasya dadhnā madhumiśreṇa samajyopariṣṭād upayamanaṃ tiraścīnāgrān vyatiṣaktān saṃspṛṣṭān vistṛṇāti
9.15.14	athaitām abhriṃ dadhnā madhumiśreṇa samajya jaghanena sthūṇe tiraścīnāgrāṃ saṃspṛṣṭāṃ sādayati
9.15.15	athaite dhṛṣṭī dadhnā madhumiśreṇa samajyābhryagrābhyāṃ pratīcīnāgre saṃspṛṣṭe sādayati
9.15.16	athaite dhavitre dadhnā madhumiśreṇa samajya jaghanena dhṛṣṭī saṃspṛṣṭe sādayati
9.15.17	athaitā daśaudumbarīḥ samidho dadhnā madhumiśreṇa samajya jaghanena dhavitre pratīcīnāgrāḥ saṃspṛṣṭā vistṛṇāti
9.15.18	athaitām ājyasthālīṃ dadhnā madhumiśreṇa pūrayitvā jaghanenābhriṃ saṃspṛṣṭāṃ sādayati
9.15.19	athaitad dhavitraṃ dadhnā madhumiśreṇa samajya tenājyasthālīm apidadhāti
9.15.20	athaite rauhiṇakapāle dadhnā madhumiśreṇa samajya jaghanenājyasthālīṃ saṃspṛṣṭe sādayati
9.15.21	athaitaṃ sruvaṃ dadhnā madhumiśreṇa pūrayitvā jaghanenājyasthālīm antareṇa rauhiṇakapāle pratīcīnabilaṃ saṃspṛṣṭaṃ sādayati
9.15.22	athaitaṃ kuśamayaṃ vedaṃ visrasya dadhnā madhumiśreṇa samajya jaghanenājyasthālīṃ pratīcīnāgraṃ saṃspṛṣṭaṃ vistṛṇāti
9.15.23	athaitām āsandīṃ visrasya dadhnā madhumiśreṇa samajyātraivottarataḥ saṃspṛṣṭāṃ sādayati
9.15.24	athaitāṃ mṛdam atiśiṣṭāṃ dadhnā madhumiśreṇa samajyāntareṇa sakthinī nivapati
9.16.1	gharmaitat te 'nnam etat purīṣaṃ tena vardhasva cā ca pyāyasva vardhiṣīmahi ca vayam ā ca pyāsiṣīmahīti
9.16.2	athainaṃ sikatābhir anuprakīrya muñjapralavair anuviśādya rauhiṇapiṣṭair anuprakīrya kṛṣṇājinena prācīnagrīveṇottaralomnā prorṇoti
9.16.3	api vābhitaḥ pracaraṇīyaṃ mahāvīraṃ paricinoty ādityamaṇḍalavat
9.16.4	athainam upatiṣṭhate 'yaṃ yaḥ puruṣarūpo 'si sa na āsye na tiṣṭhasi / nordhvo na tiryak vidhāṃ te 'nuvihito 'smi vidhāṃ me 'nuvihito 'si yas tvam asi so 'ham asmi yo 'ham asmi sa tvaṃ nākam āroha saha yajamānena sākam iti
9.16.5	atha grumuṣṭim ādāya dadhnā madhumiśreṇāvokṣaty askān dyauḥ pṛthivīm askān ṛṣabho yuvā gāḥ / skannemā viśvā bhuvanā skanno yajñaḥ prajanayatu / askān ajani prājani / ā skannāj jāyate vṛṣā / skannāt prajaniṣīmahīti
9.16.6	atha prastotāram āha prastotar vārṣāharaṃ sāma gāyeṣṭāhotrīyaṃ ceti
9.16.7	sa yo balavāṃs tam āhānenodakumbhena saṃtatayā dhārayā triḥ pradakṣiṇaṃ pariṣiñcan parīhīti
9.16.8	pariṣicyamāne yajamānaṃ gandharvayajūṃṣi vācayati rantir nāmāsi divyo gandharva iti pratipadyendro dakṣaṃ parijānād ahīnam ity ātaḥ
9.16.9	nidhāya kumbhaṃ yathetaṃ triḥ punaḥ pratiparyeti
9.16.10	athainam upatiṣṭhata etat tvaṃ deva gharma devo devān upāgā idam ahaṃ manuṣyo manuṣyān somapīthānu mehi saha prajayā saha rāyaspoṣeṇeti
9.16.11	athāñjalināpa upahanti sumitrā na āpa oṣadhayaḥ santv iti
9.16.12	tāṃ diśaṃ nirukṣati yasyām asya diśi dveṣyo bhavati durmitrās tasmai bhūyāsur yo 'smān dveṣṭi yaṃ ca vayaṃ dviṣma iti
9.16.13	athāpa upaspṛśya jyotiṣmatyādityam upatiṣṭhata ud vayaṃ tamasas parīti
9.16.14	athainam avakābhāreṇa praticchādya goptāraṃ samādiśati vayobhyo mahāvīraṃ gopāya
9.16.15	prastotaḥ śyaitenānvehīti prastotāram āha
9.16.16	athaitenaiva yathetam etya gārhapatye dve sruvāhutī juhoty ud u tyaṃ citram iti
9.16.17	athāhavanīyam upatiṣṭhanta imam ū ṣu tyam asmabhyaṃ saniṃ gāyatraṃ navīyāṃsam agne deveṣu pravoca iti
9.16.18	athāgnīdhradeśaṃ drutvāgnīdhradeśa uttarāṃ śāntim upayanti śaṃ no vātaḥ pavatāṃ mātariśveti
9.17.1	athāto gharmaprāyaścittāni vyākhyāsyāmaḥ
9.17.2	atha yadi pravargyam apravṛttam ādityo 'bhyastamiyād gārhapatye tisraḥ sruvāhutīr juhuyād bhūr bhuvaḥ suvar iti
9.17.3	upasadā pracarya śvo bhūte pravargyeṇa pracaret
9.17.4	atha yadi pravargyaṃ pravṛttam ādityo 'bhyastamiyād gārhapatye tisraḥ sruvāhutīr juhuyād bhūr bhuvaḥ suvar iti
9.17.5	athāparasyāṃ dvāri sūtreṇa hiraṇyaṃ pragrathya pracaret
9.17.6	atha yadi pravṛttaḥ prapated gārhapatye tisraḥ sruvāhutīr juhuyād bhūr bhuvaḥ suvar iti
9.17.7	athainam ucchrayaty ūrdhva ū ṣu ṇa ūtaya ūrdhvo naḥ pāhy aṃhasa iti dvābhyām
9.17.8	athainam ājyena pūrayaty añjanti yaṃ prathayanto na viprā iti
9.17.9	atha yadi vidhur vā pradaro vā jāyate 'śmacūrṇāni chāgāpayasi saṃprakīrya taiḥ pratyukṣyolmukenābhitapati vidhuṃ dadrāṇaṃ yad ṛte cid abhiśriṣa iti dvābhyām
9.17.10	saṃ haiva rohati
9.17.11	yady u vai sarvaśa eva bhidyata etāny eva kapālāny avāñjanaṃ piṣṭvā yaiṣā mṛtprāyaścittāya pariśete tayā saṃsṛjya kṛtvā paktvācchṛdya nidadhāti
9.17.12	athānyaṃ pracaraṇīyaṃ mahāvīraṃ pravṛṇakti
9.17.13	atha yadi pramattā atipariyanti gārhapatye tisraḥ sruvāhutīr juhuyād bhūr bhuvaḥ suvar iti
9.17.14	atha punar ūrjā saha rayyeti punaḥ pratipariyanti
9.17.15	atha yady udyataḥ prapated gārhapatye tisraḥ sruvāhutīr juhuyād bhūr bhuvaḥ suvar iti
9.17.16	athainam abhimṛśati mā no gharma vyathito vivyatho no mā naḥ kratubhir hīḍitebhir asmān iti dvābhyām
9.17.17	atha yadi gharmadughaṃ vā mahāvīraṃ vā vayo 'bhiprasrāvayet tāv uṣṇodakena prakṣālayed upa no mitrāvaruṇāv ihāvatam iti
9.17.18	atha gārhapatye nava sruvāhutīr juhuyād imaṃ me varuṇa tat tvā yāmi tvaṃ no agne sa tvaṃ no agne tvam agne ayāsy ud vayaṃ tamasas pary ud u tyaṃ citraṃ vayaḥ suparṇā iti
9.17.19	atha yadi gharmadughaṃ na vindetānyāṃ dohayet
9.17.20	atha yady anyāṃ na vindetājāṃ dohayet
9.17.21	atha yady ajāṃ na vindetārkakṣīraiḥ pracaret
9.17.22	atha yady arkakṣīraṃ na vindeta yavapiṣṭāni vrīhipiṣṭāni śyāmākapiṣṭāni vādbhiḥ saṃsṛjya taiḥ pracaret
9.17.23	apy adbhiḥ pracaret
9.17.24	na tv eva na pracaret
9.17.25	mahīnāṃ payo 'sīty uktaṃ mahāvīre 'vanayanam
9.17.26	askān dyauḥ pṛthivīm iti skannānumantraṇam
9.17.27	atha yadi vidyud āpated gārhapatye sruvāhutiṃ juhuyād yā purastād vidyud āpatad ity etair yathārūpam
9.17.28	prāṇāya svāhā pūṣṇe svāhety uktāni gharmaprāyaścittāni
9.17.29	yat kiṃcid gharmakāryaviparyāse caitā āhutīr juhuyān namas te gharma bhūpataye svāhā namas te gharma bhuvanapataye svāhā namas te gharma bhūtānāṃ pataye svāhā gharmāya svāhāśvibhyāṃ svāhendrāya svāhā bṛhaspataye svāhā prajāpataye svāhā brahmaṇe svāheti
9.17.30	athāṣāḍhāṃ tryālikhitām uttaralakṣmāṇam upadhāyātra gharmeṣṭakāṃ kulāyinīṃ copadadhāti
9.17.31	ud asya śuṣmād bhānur iti gharmeṣṭakām
9.17.32	yās te agna ārdrā yonayo yā iti kulāyinīm
9.17.33	saṃcitam agniṃ sāmabhir upasthāyokthenānuśastam uttare śroṇyante tiṣṭhann agnim abhimṛśaty agnir asi vaiśvānaro 'sīty etenānuvākena
9.17.34	atrādhvaryave 'gnidakṣiṇāṃ dadāti śataṃ sahasram anviṣṭakaṃ vā
9.18.1	pravargyavati some dadhigharmaṃ bhakṣayanti bhūr bhuvaḥ suvar mayi tyad indriyaṃ mahad ity etenānuvākena
9.18.2	atha ghorās tanūr anudiśati
9.18.3	yās te agne ghorās tanuva snik ca snīhītiś ca snīhitiś ceti ghorās tanuvaḥ
9.18.4	dhuniś ca dhvāntaś ceti rājasūyiko gaṇaḥ
9.18.5	ugraś ca dhuniś cety āgnicityaḥ
9.18.6	atha yadi gharmadughaṃ vā mahāvīraṃ vā steno 'pahared gārhapatye sruvāhutiṃ juhuyād ahorātre tvodīrayatām iti
9.18.7	khaḍ iti vācaḥ krūrāṇīti
9.18.8	atha yady ekasṛko vāśyeta tam anumantrayate vi gā indra vicaran spāśayasveti
9.18.9	athāsmā ubhayatāadīptam ulmukaṃ kṣiped agne agninā saṃvadasva mṛtyo mṛtyunā saṃvadasveti
9.18.10	athainam upatiṣṭhate sakṛt te agne namo dvis te namas tris te nama iti
9.18.11	atha yadi gṛdhro vāśyeta tam anumantrayate 'sṛṅmukho rudhireṇāvyakta iti
9.18.12	atha yady ārtā vāg udiyāt tām anumantrayate yad etad vṛkaso bhūtveti
9.18.13	atha yadi bhayeḍakaḥ kākapiñjako vāśyeta tam anumantrayate yadīṣito yadi vā svakāmīti
9.18.14	atha yadi sālāvṛkī vāśyeta tām anumantrayate dīrghamukhi durhaṇv iti
9.18.15	atha yady ulūkolūkī vāśyeta tam anumantrayata itthād ulūka āpaptad iti
9.18.16	atha yady unmattā vāg udiyāt tām anumantrayate yad etad bhūtāny anvāviśyeti
9.18.17	atha yadi gharmadughaṃ vā mahāvīraṃ vā vayo 'bhiprapatet tam anumantrayate prasārya sakthyau patasīti
9.18.18	atha yadi gharmadughaṃ vā mahāvīraṃ vā krimaya upādhigaccheyus tān adbhiḥ prakṣālayed atriṇā tvā krime hanmīti
9.18.19	atha yadi pravṛttaṃ pravargyaṃ bhrātṛvyo 'bhiprapadyeta gārhapatye sruvāhutiṃ juhuyād āharāvadyeti
9.18.20	athainam anuvyāhariṣyan bhavati
9.18.21	tam anuvyāhared brahmaṇā tvā śapāmīti
9.18.22	atha yaṃ dveṣṭi tasya dakṣiṇaṃ dvārbāhum anupracālayed uttuda śimijāvarīti
9.18.23	sa yo 'nya etebhyo vāśyeta tasmā ubhayatāadīptam ulmukaṃ kṣiped uttuda śimijāvarīti
9.18.24	atha yady uddhūnvann iva vāto vāyāt tam anumantrayate bhūr bhuvaḥ suvar bhūr bhuvaḥ suvar bhūr bhuvaḥ suvar bhuvo 'dhāyi bhuvo 'dhāyi bhuvo 'dhāyīti
9.18.25	atha yady avṛtaḥ śālāṃ prapadyetābhir gīrbhir yad ato na ūnam ity etayā prapadyeta
9.18.26	yady u vai pravṛta etayaiva
9.19.1	athāto 'vāntaradīkṣāṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ
9.19.2	udagayana āpūryamāṇapakṣe puṇye nakṣatre keśaśmaśru vāpayitvā pūrvavad upākṛtya grāmāt prācīṃ vodīcīṃ vā diśam upaniṣkramya khile 'cchadirdarśe 'gnim upasamādhāya saṃparistīrya madantīr adhiśritya prathamenānuvākena śāntiṃ kṛtvā darbhaiḥ pravargyadevatābhya āsanāni kalpayati
9.19.3	agreṇāgniṃ pravargyāya kalpayāmi gharmāya kalpayāmi mahāvīrāya kalpayāmi samrājñe kalpayāmīti
9.19.4	dakṣiṇenāgniṃ brahmaṇe kalpayāmi prajāpataye kalpayāmīti
9.19.5	uttareṇāgnim ṛṣibhyo mantrakṛdbhyo mantrapatibhyaḥ kalpayāmi devebhyo gharmapebhyaḥ kalpayāmīti
9.19.6	atha dakṣiṇataḥ prācīnāvītī pitṛbhyo gharmapebhyaḥ kalpayāmi yamāyāṅgirasvate pitṛmate kalpayāmīti
9.19.7	athāpa upaspṛśyottarato yajñopavītī rudrāya rudrahotre kalpayāmīti
9.19.8	athāpa upaspṛśya sarvābhyaḥ pravargyadevatābhyaḥ kalpayāmīti
9.19.9	pradakṣiṇam agniṃ pariṣicya vyāhṛtībhir vaikaṅkatīḥ samidho 'bhyādhāya madantībhiḥ pravargyadevatās tarpayati
9.19.10	agreṇāgniṃ pravargyaṃ tarpayāmi gharmaṃ tarpayāmi mahāvīraṃ tarpayāmi samrājaṃ tarpayāmīti
9.19.11	dakṣiṇenāgniṃ brahmāṇaṃ tarpayāmi prajāpatiṃ tarpayāmīti
9.19.12	uttareṇāgnim ṛṣīn mantrakṛto mantrapatīṃs tarpayāmi devān gharmapāṃs tarpayāmīti
9.19.13	atha dakṣiṇataḥ prācīnāvītī pitṝn gharmapāṃs tarpayāmi yamam aṅgirasvantaṃ pitṛmantaṃ tarpayāmīti
9.19.14	athāpa upaspṛśyottarato yajñopavītī rudraṃ rudrahotāraṃ tarpayāmīti
9.19.15	athāpa upaspṛśya sarvāḥ pravargyadevatās tarpayāmīti
9.19.16	catasra audumbarīḥ samidho 'pratiśuṣkāgrā ghṛtānvaktā abhyādhāpayan vācayati pṛthivī samid ity etaiḥ pratimantram
9.19.17	atha devatā upatiṣṭhate 'gne vratapate śukriyaṃ vrataṃ cariṣyāmi tac chakeyaṃ tan me rādhyatāṃ vāyo vratapata āditya vratapate vratānāṃ vratapate śukriyaṃ vrataṃ cariṣyāmi tac chakeyaṃ tan me rādhyatām iti
9.19.18	athaiteṣām anuvākānāṃ prabhṛtīr vācayati prathamottamayor vā
9.19.19	athainaṃ saṃśāsti saṃmīlya vācaṃ yaccheti
9.19.20	athāsyāhatena vāsasā triḥ pradakṣiṇaṃ saṃmukhaṃ śiro veṣṭayati cita stha paricitaḥ svāhā marudbhiḥ pariśrayasveti
9.19.21	pradakṣiṇam agniṃ pariṣicya vyāhṛtībhir vaikaṅkatīḥ samidho 'bhyādhāya madantībhiḥ pravargyadevatās tarpayitvottamenānuvākena śāntiṃ kṛtvā
9.19.22	athāstamita āditye grāmam āyanti
9.19.23	vāgyatas tiṣṭhed etāṃ rātrim upaviśet saṃviśed vā
9.19.24	atha prātar udita āditye grāmāt prācīṃ vodīcīṃ vā diśam upaniṣkramya khile 'cchadirdarśe 'gnim upasamādhāya saṃparistīrya madantīr adhiśritya prathamenānuvākena śāntiṃ kṛtvā darbhaiḥ pravargyadevatābhya āsanāni kalpayitvā vayaḥ suparṇā iti vāso vimucya
9.19.25	athāsya ṣaṭtayam abhividarśayaty agnim apa ādityaṃ gāṃ brāhmaṇaṃ hiraṇyam iti
9.19.26	trīn ādito 'nudarśayitvā yathopapādam itarāṇi darśayitvā pradakṣiṇam agniṃ pariṣicya vyāhṛtībhir vaikaṅkatīḥ samidho 'bhyādhāya madantībhiḥ pravargyadevatās tarpayitvottamenānuvākena śāntiṃ kṛtvā
9.19.27	athāsya vratacaryām upadiśet
9.19.28	na yānam ārohet
9.19.29	na vṛkṣam adhirohet
9.19.30	na kūpam avarohet
9.19.31	na chattraṃ dhārayīta
9.19.32	nopānahau dhārayīta
9.19.33	nāsandyāṃ śayīta
9.19.34	na striyā na śūdreṇa saṃbhāṣeta
9.19.35	yadi saṃbhāṣeta brāhmaṇena saṃbhāṣeta
9.19.36	na sāyaṃ bhuñjīta
9.19.37	yadi sāyaṃ bhuñjītāvajvalitaṃ bhuñjīta
9.19.38	na snāyāt
9.19.39	aṣṭamyāṃ parvaṇi copavaset tadahaś ca snāyāt
9.19.40	vāgyatas tiṣṭhed etāṃ rātrim upaviśet saṃviśed vā
9.19.41	amedhyalohitaśavāpapātradarśane jyotiṣāṃ saṃdarśanam
9.19.42	amedhyaṃ dṛṣṭvā japaty abaddhaṃ mano daridraṃ cakṣuḥ sūryo jyotiṣāṃ śreṣṭho dīkṣe mā mā hāsīr iti
9.19.43	atha yady enam abhivarṣaty undatīr balaṃ dhattaujo dhatta balaṃ dhatta mā me dīkṣāṃ mā tapo nirvadhiṣṭeti japati
9.20.1	saṃvatsaram etad vrataṃ caret
9.20.2	saṃvatsaraṃ hi vrataṃ nātyeti
9.20.3	etasmiṃs tv evaitat saṃvatsare 'dhīyīta
9.20.4	yady u vā etasmin saṃvatsare nādhīyīta yāvad adhyayanam etad vrataṃ caret
9.20.5	atha saṃvatsare paryavete 'dhyāpayate śrāvayate vā
9.20.6	pūrvavad upākṛtya grāmāt prācīṃ vodīcīṃ vā diśam upaniṣkramya khile 'cchadirdarśe 'gnim upasamādhāya saṃparistīrya madantīr adhiśritya prathamenānuvākena śāntiṃ kṛtvā darbhaiḥ pravargyadevatābhya āsanāni kalpayitvā
9.20.7	athāvratyaprāyaścitte juhoti yan ma ātmano mindābhūt punar agniś cakṣur adād iti dvābhyām
9.20.8	pradakṣiṇam agniṃ pariṣicya vyāhṛtībhir vaikaṅkatīḥ samidho 'bhyādhāya madantībhiḥ pravargyadevatās tarpayitvā
9.20.9	catasra audumbarīḥ samidho 'pratiśuṣkāgrā ghṛtānvaktā abhyādhāpayan vācayati dyauḥ samid ity etaiḥ pratimantram
9.20.10	atha devatā upatiṣṭhata āditya vratapate śukriyaṃ vratam acāriṣaṃ tad aśakaṃ tan me 'rādhi vāyo vratapate 'gne vratapate vratānāṃ vratapate śukriyaṃ vratam acāriṣaṃ tad aśakaṃ tan me 'rādhīti
9.20.11	pradakṣiṇam agniṃ pariṣicya vyāhṛtībhir vaikaṅkatīḥ samidho 'bhyādhāya madantībhiḥ pravargyadevatās tarpayitvottamenānuvākena śāntiṃ kṛtvā
9.20.12	tasyānadhyāyān upadiśet
9.20.13	nādhīyītāstamita āditye
9.20.14	nānudite
9.20.15	na vipruṣite
9.20.16	na paryāvṛtte
9.20.17	nābhracchāyāyām
9.20.18	na grāmyasya paśor ante
9.20.19	nāraṇyasya
9.20.20	nāpām ante
9.20.21	na haritayavān prekṣamāṇaḥ
9.20.22	na harmyāṇi
9.20.23	na śarīrāṇi
9.20.24	na lohitam utpatitaṃ dṛṣṭvā
9.20.25	na māṃsam aśitvā
9.20.26	na śrāddhaṃ bhuktvā
9.20.27	na keśaśmaśru vāpayitvā
9.20.28	na keśān prasārya
9.20.29	na dato dhāvate
9.20.30	nāṅkte
9.20.31	nābhyaṅkte
9.20.32	nārdraḥ
9.20.33	nārdreṇa vāsasā
9.20.34	nārdra iti
9.20.35	atha svādhyāyam adhīyīta
9.20.36	apareṇāgniṃ darbheṣv āsīno darbhān dhārayamāṇaḥ parācīnaṃ svādhyāyam adhīyīta
9.20.37	yatra kvacāśāntikṛtaṃ paśyet punar eva śāntiṃ kṛtvādhīyīta
9.20.38	adhītya cottamena pravargyāyopaniṣkramya nāpraviśya grāmam anyad adhīyītānyad adhīyīta
10.1.1	ukhāḥ saṃbhariṣyann upakalpayate 'śvaṃ ca gardabhaṃ ca tayor eva raśane mauñjyau vā kuśamayyau vābhriṃ ca brāhmaṇasaṃpannāṃ mṛdaṃ ca bhāvitāṃ karaṇīyāṃ valmīkavapāṃ kṛṣṇājinaṃ ca puṣkaraparṇaṃ ca yoktram udakumbhaṃ hiraṇyam armakapālāni śarkarā avāñjanapiṣṭā ajalomāni kṛṣṇājinalomāni vaiśyaṃ saptadaśaṃ sūnām adhikaraṇīm ukhākṛtaṃ kuśalam iti
10.1.2	athāmāvāsyena vā haviṣeṣṭvā nakṣatre vāgreṇa śālāṃ śamyānyāse gartaṃ khānayati
10.1.3	tad bhāvitāṃ mṛdam avalepayati
10.1.4	samāṃ bilena karoti
10.1.5	tad upasādayati kṛṣṇājinaṃ ca puṣkaraparṇaṃ ca yoktram udakumbhaṃ hiraṇyam iti
10.1.6	atha viṣuvati sphyenoddhatyāvokṣya valmīkavapāṃ nidadhāti
10.1.7	tāṃ dakṣiṇato vaiśyo gopāyann āste
10.1.8	athottaraṃ śālākhaṇḍam agreṇa sphyenoddhatyāvokṣya sikatā nivapati
10.1.9	taṃ parimaṇḍalaṃ kharaṃ karoti
10.1.10	athainaṃ sikatābhir ābhrāśinaṃ karoti
10.1.11	taṃ kuśataruṇakair dūrvāgranthibhir iti saṃpracchādyāthainaṃ pariśrayanti
10.1.12	tasyodīcīṃ dvāraṃ kurvanti
10.1.13	tad upasādayaty armakapālāni śarkarā avāñjanapiṣṭā ajalomāni kṛṣṇājinalomāni sūnām adhikaraṇīm ukhākṛtaṃ kuśalam iti
10.1.14	athaitāv aśvagardabhāv agreṇa śālāṃ palpūlitau tiṣṭhataḥ
10.1.15	antarvedy abhriṃ nidadhāty uttare vedyante raśane
10.1.16	paristṛṇanti
10.1.17	dakṣiṇata upaviśato brahmā ca yajamānaś ca
10.1.18	atha gārhapatya ājyaṃ vilāpyotpūya sruci caturgṛhītaṃ gṛhītvāhavanīye sāvitrāṇi juhoty anvārabdhe yajamāne
10.2.1	yuñjānaḥ prathamaṃ mana iti ṣaḍ ṛco 'nantarhitā deva savitar ity ṛg eṣemaṃ no deva savitar iti yajur etat
10.2.2	ṛcā vā yajuṣā vāvasyati
10.2.3	āhutiṃ navamīṃ hutvopatiṣṭhati ṛcā stomaṃ samardhayeti
10.2.4	athābhrim ādatte devasya tvā savituḥ prasava iti caturbhir paryāyaiḥ
10.2.5	tām agreṇāhavanīyaṃ paryāhṛtya dakṣiṇata āsīnāya brahmaṇe prayacchati
10.2.6	atha raśanām ādatta imām agṛbhṇan raśanām ṛtasyeti
10.2.7	tayāśvam abhidadhāti pratūrtaṃ vājinn ādraveti
10.2.8	evam eva dvitīyāṃ raśanām ādatte
10.2.9	tayā gardabham abhidadhāti yuñjāthāṃ rāsabhaṃ yuvaṃ yogeyoge tavastaram iti dvābhyām
10.2.10	aśvaṃ pūrvaṃ nayanti
10.2.11	tam anumantrayate pratūrvann ehy avakrāmann aśastīr iti
10.2.12	anvañcaṃ gardabhaṃ pūṣṇā sayujā saha pṛthivyāḥ sadhasthād agniṃ purīṣyam aṅgirasvad acchehīti
10.2.13	pradakṣiṇī vaiśyaṃ kurvate
10.2.14	vaiśyaḥ pṛcchati puruṣāḥ kim acchetheti
10.2.15	agniṃ purīṣyam aṅgirasvad acchema itītare pratyāhuḥ
10.2.16	atha valmīkavapām upatiṣṭhate 'gniṃ purīṣyam aṅgirasvad bhariṣyāma iti
10.2.17	athopātiyanty anv agnir uṣasām agram akhyad anv ahāni prathamo jātavedāḥ / anu sūryasya purutrā ca raśmīn anu dyāvāpṛthivī ātatāneti
10.2.18	athaitenāśvena prācā mṛdam ākramayaty āgatya vājy adhvana ākramya vājin pṛthivīm iti dvābhyām
10.2.19	athāsya pṛṣṭhaṃ marmṛjyate dyaus te pṛṣṭhaṃ pṛthivī sadhastham ātmāntarikṣaṃ samudras te yoniḥ / vikhyāya cakṣuṣā tvam abhitiṣṭha pṛtanyata iti
10.2.20	atra yaṃ yajamāno dveṣṭi tam aśvasyādhaspadaṃ dhyāyati
10.2.21	athainaṃ prāñcam utkramayaty utkrāmodakramīd iti dvābhyām
10.2.22	athaitaṃ padāśayam adbhir upasṛjati
10.3.1	apo devīr upasṛja madhumatīr ayakṣmāya prajābhyaḥ / tāsāṃ sthānād ujjihatām oṣadhayaḥ supippalā iti
10.3.2	atha sruci caturgṛhītaṃ gṛhītvā dakṣiṇe 'vāntaraśaphe hiraṇyaṃ nidhāya saṃparistīryābhijuhoti jigharmy agniṃ manasā ghṛteneti
10.3.3	aparaṃ caturgṛhītaṃ gṛhītvottare 'vāntaraśaphe hiraṇyaṃ nidhāya saṃparistīryaivābhijuhoty ā tvā jigharmi vacasā ghṛteneti
10.3.4	apoddhṛtya hiraṇyam abhrim ādāya padaṃ parilikhati pari vājapatiḥ kaviḥ pari tvāgne puraṃ vayaṃ tvam agne dyubhir iti tisṛbhiḥ
10.3.5	khanati devasya tvā savituḥ prasave jyotiṣmantaṃ tvāgne supratīkam iti dvābhyām
10.3.6	athottarataḥ pārśvataḥ saṃbhārāṇāṃ pracīnāgrāṇi tṛṇāni saṃstīrya teṣūpari kṛṣṇājinaṃ prācīnagrīvam uttaralomopastṛṇāti
10.3.7	athāpāṃ pṛṣṭham asīti puṣkaraparṇam āharati
10.3.8	tad upariṣṭāt kṛṣṇājine nidhāyāthaine saṃmṛśati śarma ca sthaḥ saṃ vasāthām iti dvābhyām
10.3.9	apoddhṛtya puṣkaraparṇam aṣṭābhir mṛdaṃ harati
10.4.1	purīṣyo 'si viśvabharā iti
10.4.2	tāsāṃ catasro gāyatryaś catasras triṣṭubhaḥ
10.4.3	sa piṇḍaṃpiṇḍaṃ vaivarcā harati
10.4.4	api vāṣṭābhir ekam eva piṇḍaṃ harati
10.4.5	athaitam avaṭaṃ viśvalopena pūrayitvādbhir upasṛjati saṃ te vāyur mātariśvā dadhātūttānāyai hṛdayaṃ yad viliṣṭam / devānāṃ yaś carati prāṇathena tasmai ca devi vaṣaḍ astu tubhyam iti
10.4.6	athopariṣṭāt puṣkaraparṇaṃ mṛdi nidhāya samuccitya kṛṣṇājinasyāntān yoktreṇopanahyati sujāto jyotiṣā saha śarma varūtham āsadaḥ suvaḥ / vāso agne viśvarūpaṃ saṃvyayasva vibhāvasa iti
10.4.7	athainam ādāyopottiṣṭhaty ud u tiṣṭha svadhvarordhva ū ṣu ṇa ūtaya iti dvābhyām
10.4.8	athainam āharati sa jāto garbho asi rodasyor agne cārur vibhṛta oṣadhīṣu / citraḥ śiśuḥ pari tamāṃsy aktaḥ pra mātṛbhyo adhi kanikradad gā iti
10.4.9	athainaṃ gardabha āsādayati sthiro bhava vīḍvaṅga āśur bhava vājy arvan / pṛthur bhava suṣadas tvam agneḥ purīṣavāhana iti
10.4.10	athainam upatiṣṭhate śivo bhava prajābhyo mānuṣībhyas tvam aṅgiraḥ / mā dyāvāpṛthivī abhiśūśuco māntarikṣaṃ mā vanaspatīn iti
10.4.11	aśvaṃ pūrvaṃ nayanti
10.4.12	tam anumantrayate praitu vājī kanikradad iti
10.4.13	anvañcaṃ gardabhaṃ nānadad rāsabhaḥ patvā / bharann agniṃ purīṣyaṃ mā pādy āyuṣaḥ purā
10.4.14	rāsabho vāṃ kanikradat suyukto vṛṣaṇā rathe / sa vām agniṃ purīṣyam āśur dūto vahād itaḥ
10.4.15	vṛṣāgniṃ vṛṣaṇaṃ bharann apāṃ garbhaṃ samudriyam / agna āyāhi vītaya iti
10.4.16	atheme samīkṣata ṛtaṃ satyam ṛtaṃ satyam iti
10.4.17	pradakṣiṇī vaiśyaṃ kurvate
10.4.18	vaiśyaḥ pṛcchati puruṣāḥ kiṃ bharatheti
10.4.19	agniṃ purīṣyam aṅgirasvad bharāma itītare pratyāhuḥ
10.4.20	athainaṃ khara upāvaharanty oṣadhayaḥ pratigṛhṇītāgnim etam oṣadhayaḥ pratimodadhvam enam iti dvābhyām
10.4.21	adbhir abhyukṣyāśvagardabhāv utsṛjanti
10.4.22	apo raśane abhyavaharanty api vādbhir abhyukṣya bhuñjate
10.5.1	athainaṃ visraṃsayati vi pājasā pṛthunā śośucāna iti
10.5.2	athainam adbhir upasṛjaty āpo hi ṣṭhā mayobhuva iti tisṛbhir anucchandasam
10.5.3	athainam armakapālaiḥ śarkarābhir avāñjanapiṣṭābhir ajalomaiḥ kṛṣṇājinalomair iti saṃsṛjati mitraḥ saṃsṛjya pṛthivīm ayakṣmāya tvā saṃsṛjāmīti dvābhyām
10.5.4	athainaṃ saṃbharati rudrāḥ saṃbhṛtya pṛthivīm iti
10.5.5	piṇḍaṃ karoti makhasya śiro 'sīti
10.5.6	yajñasya pade stha ity aṅguṣṭhābhyām upanigṛhṇāti
10.5.7	atha tṛtīyaṃ mṛdo 'pacchidya trīn piṇḍān karoti
10.5.8	teṣām ekam ukhākṛte prayacchati saṃsṛṣṭāṃ vasubhī rudrair iti
10.5.9	anumantrayate vasavas tvā kṛṇvantu gāyatreṇa chandaseti
10.5.10	atiśiṣṭāyai mṛdo 'rdhaṃ prayacchati sinīvālī sukapardeti
10.5.11	anumantrayate rudrās tvā kṛṇvantu traiṣṭubhena chandaseti
10.5.12	sarvām antato mṛdaṃ prayacchaty ukhāṃ karotu śaktyeti
10.5.13	anumantrayata ādityās tvā kṛṇvantu jāgatena chandasā viśve tvā devā vaiśvānarāḥ kṛṇvantv ānuṣṭubhena chandaseti
10.5.14	atha vai bhavati
10.5.15	prānyābhir yacchaty anv anyair mantrayate mithunatvāya
10.5.16	tryuddhiṃ karotīti
10.5.17	sa yad eva trir harati trir anulimpati tena tryuddhiḥ
10.5.18	tāṃ prādeśamātrīm ūrdhvām aparimitāṃ tiraścīṃ karoti
10.5.19	athāsyai tryaṅgule vā caturaṅgule vā rāsnāṃ paryasyaty adityai rāsnāsīti
10.5.20	athāsyā anudiśam aṣṭāv aśrīr unnayati
10.5.21	rāsnāsandhiṣu cāśrisandhiṣu cāṣṭau stanān karoti
10.5.22	navāśrim abhicarataḥ kuryād iti brāhmaṇam
10.5.23	astanāṃ navamīṃ karoti
10.5.24	athāsyai bilaṃ gṛhṇāty aditis te bilaṃ gṛhṇātu pāṅktena chandaseti
10.5.25	athaināṃ khare nidadhāti kṛtvāya sā mahīm ukhām ity āntād anuvākasya
10.5.26	evam eva dvitīyāṃ karoty evaṃ tṛtīyāṃ tūṣṇīṃ pañca carṣabhāṃs tisraś ca maṇḍaleṣṭakāḥ
10.6.1	atha yā mṛd atiśiṣyate tayā pravāte pratilepam upavātayati
10.6.2	tāsūpavātāsūpakalpayata ekaviṃśatiṃ vṛṣṇo aśvasya śakṛtpiṇḍān abhrim agniṃ pacanam iti
10.6.3	athāśvaśakam ādīpya mukhyām ukhāṃ dhūpayati vasavas tvā dhūpayantu gāyatreṇa chandaseti pratipadya varuṇas tvā dhūpayatv ity āto 'ntarataś ca bāhyataś ca
10.6.4	sudhūpitāṃ kṛtvā nidadhāti
10.6.5	evam eva dvitīyāṃ dhūpayaty evaṃ tṛtīyāṃ tūṣṇīṃ pañca carṣabhāṃs tisraś ca maṇḍaleṣṭakāḥ
10.6.6	athottareṇa śālām urubilam ivāvaṭaṃ khānayaty aditis tvā devī viśvadevyāvatī pṛthivyāḥ sadhasthe 'ṅgirasvat khanatv avaṭeti
10.6.7	taṃ pacanenāvastīrya tasmin mukhyām ukhāṃ pravṛṇakti devānāṃ tvā patnīr devīr viśvadevyāvatīḥ pṛthivyāḥ sadhasthe 'ṅgirasvad dadhatūkha iti
10.6.8	evam eva dvitīyāṃ pravṛṇakty evaṃ tṛtīyāṃ tūṣṇīṃ pañca carṣabhāṃs tisraś ca maṇḍaleṣṭakāḥ
10.6.9	tāḥ prācīr vodīcīr vāyātayati
10.6.10	athaināḥ pacanenopariṣṭāt saṃpracchādya mṛdāvalimpati
10.6.11	caturaṅgulam anudiśam ādīpanāyātiśinaṣṭi
10.6.12	athopoṣati
10.7.1	dhiṣaṇās tveti purastād gnās tveti dakṣiṇato varūtrayas tveti paścāj janayas tvety uttarataḥ
10.7.2	athaināḥ paridadāti mitraitām ukhāṃ pacaiṣā mā bhedy etāṃ te paridadāmy abhittyā iti
10.7.3	tā ahnā vā rātryā vā pacyante
10.7.4	yadi prātar upoṣati sāyam upaiti yadi sāyaṃ prātar
10.7.5	tāsu pakvāsūpakalpayate gopayaś chāgāpayo dhṛṣṭim aśmasaṃdāvaṃ sataṃ saṃdaṃśaṃ khārīṃ śikyaṃ kṛṣṇājinam iti
10.7.6	etat samādāyābhyaity abhīmāṃ mahinā divaṃ mitro babhūva saprathāḥ / uta śravasā pṛthivīm
10.7.7	mitrasya carṣaṇīdhṛtaḥ śravo devasya sānasim / dyumnaṃ citraśravastamam iti
10.7.8	atha dhṛṣṭim ādāya mukhyāyā ukhāyā aṅgārān udvapati devas tvā savitodvapatu supāṇiḥ svaṅguriḥ / subāhur uta śaktyeti
10.7.9	athainām ucchrayaty uttiṣṭha bṛhatī bhavordhvā tiṣṭha dhruvā tvam iti
10.7.10	athainām āśaye pratiṣṭhāpayaty apadyamānā pṛthivy āśā diśa āpṛṇeti
10.7.11	athaināṃ saṃdaṃśena parigṛhya sate 'vadhāya chāgāpayasācchṛṇatti
10.8.1	vasavas tvācchṛndantu gāyatreṇa chandaseti pratipadya viśve tvā devā vaiśvānarā ācchṛndantv ānuṣṭubhena chandasety āto 'ntarataś ca bāhyataś ca
10.8.2	svācchṛṇāṃ kṛtvā gopayasābhiviṣyandayati
10.8.3	evam eva dvitīyām ācchṛṇatty evaṃ tṛtīyāṃ tūṣṇīṃ pañca carṣabhāṃs tisraś ca maṇḍaleṣṭakāḥ
10.8.4	atha yadi vidhur vā pradaro vā jāyate 'śmacūrṇāni chāgāpayasi saṃprakīrya taiḥ pratyukṣyolmukenābhitapati
10.8.5	saṃ haiva rohati
10.8.6	yady u vai sarvaśa eva bhidyata etāny eva kapālāny avāñcanaṃ piṣṭvā yaiṣāṃ mṛt prāyaścittāya pariśete tayā saṃsṛjya kṛtvā paktvācchṛdya nidadhāti
10.8.7	tāsāṃ yadā śvasatha uparamaty athaināḥ khāryāṃ samavadhāya kṛṣṇājinenopariṣṭāt saṃpracchādyottare śālākhaṇḍe śikya āsajati
10.8.8	tā ā kālāt pariśere
10.9.1	athaitasminn eva pūrvapakṣe vāyavyena paśunā yajate
10.9.2	tasya tad upak.lptaṃ bhavati yat paśunā yakṣyamāṇasya saṃgrāme hatayor aśvasya ca vaiśyasya ca śirasī
10.9.3	dīvyanta ṛṣabhaṃ pacante vṛṣṇiṃ ca bastaṃ ca
10.9.4	āharanty etat sarpaśiraḥ
10.9.5	athāsyaiṣā pūrvedyur eva pāśubandhikī vedir vimitā bhavati
10.9.6	tāṃ paristīrya stambayajur harati
10.9.7	idam eva prasiddhaṃ pauroḍāśikam
10.9.8	trir yajuṣā tūṣṇīṃ caturtham
10.9.9	pūrvaṃ parigrāhaṃ parigṛhṇāti
10.9.10	karaṇaṃ japati
10.9.11	uddhanti
10.9.12	uddhatād āgnīdhras trir harati
10.9.13	yad āgnīdhras trir haraty atha cātvālasyāvṛtā cātvālaṃ parilikhati
10.9.14	uttaraveder āvṛtottaravediṃ nivapati
10.9.15	uttaranābhim utsādyāgner āvṛtāgniṃ praṇayati
10.9.16	agnivaty uttaraṃ parigrāhaṃ parigṛhya yoyupitvā tiryañcaṃ sphyaṃ stabdhvā saṃpraiṣam āha prokṣaṇīr āsādayedhmābarhir upasādaya sruvaṃ svadhitiṃ srucaś ca saṃmṛḍḍhi tūṣṇīṃ pṛṣadājyagrahaṇīṃ patnīṃ saṃnahyājyena ca dadhnā codehi pratiprasthātaḥ paśuśīrṣāṇi viddhīti
10.9.17	adhvaryur eva prasiddhaṃ pāśubandhikaṃ karma ceṣṭati
10.9.18	atha pratiprasthātā yācaty ekaviṃśatiṃ māṣān parṇaśākhāṃ mṛtpiṇḍam udapātram utkuṣīṃ saptadhā vitṛṇṇāṃ valmīkavapāṃ saṃdaṃśam iti
10.9.19	etat samādāya paśuṣīrṣāṇy abhyaiti
10.9.20	dakṣiṇata etat puruṣaśira upaśete 'greṇetarāṇi
10.9.21	atha prācīnāvītaṃ kṛtvā saptabhir māṣaiḥ puruṣaśiraḥ parikīrya trir apasalaiḥ parṇaśākhayā parikarṣati
10.10.1	aharahar nayamāno gām aśvaṃ puruṣaṃ jagat / vaivasvato na tṛpyati pañcabhir mānavair yama iti
10.10.2	aparaiḥ saptabhiḥ parikīryaiva parikarṣati vaivasvate vivicyante yame rājani te janāḥ / ye ceha satyenecchante ya u cānṛtavādina iti
10.10.3	aparaiḥ saptabhiḥ parikīryaiva parikarṣati te rājann iha vivicyante 'thā yanti tvām upa / devāṃś ca ye namasyanti brāhmaṇāṃś cāpacityatīti
10.10.4	athādatte dakṣiṇena valmīkavapāṃ savyena saṃdaṃśena puruṣaśiraḥ
10.10.5	prāṇaiḥ prāṇān saṃnidhāyāśaye valmīkavapāṃ nidadhāti
10.10.6	athaitat puruṣaśiro 'bhyukṣyotkuṣya prakṣālya mṛdābhilimpaty anabhilimpan prāṇān
10.10.7	athetarāṇi trayeṇaiva nistiṣṭhanty abhyutkuṣyaiva prakṣālya mṛdābhilimpanty anabhilimpantaḥ prāṇān
10.10.8	athaināny adbhiḥ prokṣaṇato nidadhāti
10.10.9	tāny ā kālāt pariśere
10.11.1	atha paśoḥ sāmidhenīkalpaḥ
10.11.2	pra vo vājā abhidyava ity ekādaśa
10.11.3	samās tvāgna ṛtavo vardhayantv iti daśa
10.11.4	tāsāṃ jyotiṣmatīm apoddhṛtya nava dhāyyāloke dadhāti
10.11.5	atha pṛthupājavatyau dhāyye dadhāti
10.11.6	atha yukṣvā hi devahūtamān ity etāṃ dadhāti
10.11.7	tāḥ parācīr anūcyamānāś caturviṃśatiḥ saṃpadyante
10.11.8	jyotiṣmatīṃ tv evottamām anvāhātha hiraṇyagarbhaḥ samavartatāgra ity āghāram āghārayati
10.11.9	athāta āprīṇām eva mīmāṃsā
10.11.10	ūrdhvā asya samidho bhavantīti dvādaśa
10.11.11	tāsāṃ tānūnapātīm apoddhṛtya nārāśaṃsīṃ vasiṣṭhānāṃ dadhāti
10.11.12	apoddhṛtya nārāśaṃsīṃ tānūnapātīm anyeṣāṃ gotrāṇām
10.11.13	atha pīvo 'nnān rāye 'nu yam iti vapāyai yaḥ prāṇato ya ātmadā iti paśupuroḍāśasya pra vāyum acchā no niyudbhir iti haviṣaḥ
10.11.14	iti nu yadi miśro bhavati
10.11.15	yady u vai sarvavāyavya eva bhavati pīvo 'nnān rāye 'nu yam ity etāsāṃ dve vapāyai dve paśupuroḍāśasya dve haviṣaḥ
10.11.16	atha yadi sarvaprājāpatya eva bhavati yaḥ prāṇato ya ātmadā ity etāsāṃ dve vapāyai dve paśupuroḍāśasya dve haviṣaḥ
10.11.17	sarvasaṃsthāṃ paśoḥ kurvanti
10.11.18	athaitāni paśuśīrṣāṇy abhiparyagnikṛtāny uttare śālākhaṇḍe śikyeṣv āsajati
10.11.19	athaitat sarpaśira spandyayā vigrathya śikyapāśe pragrathnāti
10.11.20	tāny ā kālāt pariśere
10.12.1	athāparapakṣaḥ pratidhīyate
10.12.2	sa upakalpayata iṣṭakāś cāgnidakṣiṇāś ca yadi rātribhṛtaṃ ceṣyamāṇo bhavati
10.12.3	yady u vai saṃvatsarabhṛtaṃ dīrgho 'dhvājir iti nādriyeta
10.12.4	sa upakalpayata audumbarīmukhyāsandīṃ tasyāḥ prādeśamātrāḥ pādā bhavanty aratnimātrāṇi śīrṣāṇy anūcyāni sā mauñjībhī rajjubhir vyūtā bhavaty ekasarābhiḥ phalakābhistīrṇā mṛdāvaliptā ṣaḍudyāmaṃ dvādaśodyāmaṃ vā mauñjaṃ śikyaṃ muñjakulāyaṃ krumukam ājyasaṃyutaṃ vaikaṅkatīṃ ca śamīmayīṃ ca samidhau saptaudumbarīḥ samidhas tisro nānāvṛkṣyā ekaviṃśatinirbādhaṃ rukmam
10.12.5	prajñātā āgniṣṭomikāḥ saṃbhārāḥ
10.12.6	juṣṭe devayajane śālā kāritā bhavati
10.12.7	athainaṃ tīrthād ānīya pavayitvā trihaviṣam agnidīkṣaṇīyām iṣṭiṃ nirvapaty āgnāvaiṣṇavam ekādaśakapālam adityai ghṛte caruṃ vaiśvānaraṃ dvādaśakapālam iti
10.12.8	tasyai tāvanty utsīdanti yāvanti dīkṣaṇīyāyai
10.12.9	athādhvaryuḥ pradakṣiṇam āvṛtya pratyaṅṅ ādrutya patnīḥ saṃyājya prāṅ etya dhruvām āpyāyyājyasthālyāṃ pratyavanīyājyasthālyāḥ sruveṇopaghātam agnidīkṣāhutīr juhoti
10.13.1	ākūtim agniṃ prayujaṃ svāhā mano medhām agniṃ prayujaṃ svāhā cittaṃ vijñātam agniṃ prayujaṃ svāhā vāco vidhṛtim agniṃ prayujaṃ svāhā prajāpataye manave svāhāgnaye vaiśvānarāya svāheti
10.13.2	atha sruci caturgṛhītaṃ gṛhītvājyasya pūrṇāṃ srucam audgrahaṇaṃ juhoti viśve devasya netur marto vṛṇīta sakhyaṃ viśve rāya iṣudhyasi dyumnaṃ vṛṇīta puṣyase svāheti
10.13.3	atraitat pūrṇapātram antarvedi ninayati
10.13.4	athāgreṇāhavanīyaṃ paryāhṛtya yajamānāya prayacchati
10.13.5	atha mukhyām ukhāṃ yācati
10.13.6	tasyāṃ śakṛtpiṇḍān pūtitṛṇānīti saṃprakīryājyasruvaṃ pratyasyāhavanīyasyāntameṣv aṅgāreṣu pravṛṇakti mā su bhitthā dṛṃhasveti dvābhyām
10.13.7	athaināṃ paridadāti mitraitām ukhāṃ tapaiṣā mā bhedy etāṃ te paridadāmy abhittyā iti
10.13.8	atha vai bhavati
10.13.9	yadi bhidyeta tair eva kapālaiḥ saṃsṛjed iti
10.13.10	sā yadi bhidyata etāny eva kapālāny avāñcanaṃ piṣṭvā yaiṣā mṛtprāyaścittāya pariśete tayā saṃsṛjya kṛtvā paktvācchṛdya nidadhāti
10.13.11	athānyāṃ pravṛṇakti
10.13.12	atha vai bhavati
10.13.13	ambarīṣād annakāmasyāvadadhyād iti
10.13.14	atha vai bhavati
10.13.15	yaṃ kāmayeta yajamānaṃ bhrātṛvyam asmai janayeyam ity anyatas tasyāhṛtyāvadadhyād iti
10.13.16	atha vai bhavati
10.13.17	yo gataśrīḥ syān mathitvā tasyāvadadhyād iti
10.13.18	atha vai bhavati
10.13.19	yo bhūtikāmaḥ syād ya ukhāyai saṃbhavet sa eva tasya syād iti
10.13.20	sa ya evaiṣa ukhāyai saṃtāpāj jāyate tasmin muñjakulāyam avadadhāti yā te agna ojasvinī tanūr oṣadhīṣu praviṣṭā tāṃ ta etenāvayaje svāheti
10.13.21	atha krumukam ājyasaṃyutam avadadhāti drvannaḥ sarpirāsutir iti
10.13.22	atha vaikaṅkatīṃ ca śamīmayīṃ ca samidhāv ādadhāti parasyā adhi saṃvata iti vaikaṅkatīṃ paramasyāḥ parāvata iti śamīmayīm
10.13.23	atha sīda tvaṃ mātur asyā upastha iti tisṛbhir jātam upatiṣṭhate
10.13.24	atha pañcaudumbarīḥ samidha ādadhāti
10.14.1	yad agne yāni kāni ca yad atty upajihvikā rātriṃrātrim aprayāvaṃ nābhā pṛthivyā yāḥ senā abhītvarīr iti
10.14.2	athainaṃ pañcarcena rākṣoghnenopatiṣṭhate kṛṇuṣva pājaḥ prasitiṃ na pṛthvīm iti
10.14.3	atha tisro nānāvṛkṣyāḥ samidho 'bhyajyādadhāti daṃṣṭrābhyāṃ malimlūn ity āśvatthīṃ ye janeṣu malimlava iti vaikaṅkatīṃ yo asmabhyam arātīyād iti śamīmayīm
10.14.4	atha saṃśitaṃ me brahmod eṣāṃ bāhū atiram ity uttame audumbarī vācayann evābhyādadhāti
10.14.5	atra kṛṣṇājine yajamānaṃ vācayati
10.14.6	muṣṭī caiva na karoti vācaṃ ca na yacchati
10.14.7	athaitām āsandīṃ vyastaśikyapāśāṃ jaghanenāhavanīyaṃ nidadhāti
10.14.8	tasyām iṇḍvābhyāṃ parigṛhyokhyam āsādayati
10.15.1	māteva putraṃ pṛthivī purīṣyam agniṃ sve yonau bibharty ukhā / tāṃ viśvair devair ṛtubhiḥ saṃvidānaḥ prajāpatir viśvakarmā yunaktv iti
10.15.2	athāsīna uttaranirbādhaṃ rukmaṃ pratimuñcate dṛśāno rukma iti
10.15.3	atha śikyapāśaṃ pratimuñcate viśvā rūpāṇi pratimuñcate kavir naktoṣāseti dvābhyām
10.15.4	tūṣṇīṃ kṛṣṇājinam uttaram
10.15.5	athainam avekṣate suparṇo 'si garutmān trivṛt te śiro gāyatraṃ cakṣu stoma ātmā sāma te tanūr vāmadevyaṃ bṛhadrathantare pakṣau yajñāyajñiyaṃ pucchaṃ chandāṃsy aṅgāni dhiṣṇiyāḥ śaphā yajūṃṣi nāmeti
10.15.6	athainam udgṛhṇāti suparṇo 'si garutmān divaṃ gaccha suvaḥ pateti
10.15.7	purastād evāsyaite dīrghāḥ śikyapāśāḥ kāritā bhavanti
10.15.8	so 'tra vaiva sati kramate 'pi vainam upodyacchate
10.16.1	viṣṇoḥ kramo 'sy abhimātihā gāyatraṃ chanda āroha pṛthivīm anuvikramasva nirbhaktaḥ sa yaṃ dviṣma iti caturbhir anucchandasam
10.16.2	tṛtīye caturtham anuvartayati
10.16.3	na caturthāya prakrāmati
10.16.4	nāhavanīyam upātyeti
10.16.5	athākrandad ity etām anvāhātha dakṣiṇam aṃsam abhiparyāvartate 'gne 'bhyāvartinn agne aṅgiraḥ punar ūrjā saha rayyeti catasṛbhiḥ
10.16.6	athodaṅ paryāvṛtya kṛṣṇājinam unmucya śikyapāśam unmuñcata ud uttamaṃ varuṇa pāśam asmad iti
10.16.7	athainam āharaty ā tvāhārṣam agre bṛhann uṣasām ūrdhvo asthād iti dvābhyām
10.16.8	atra yaṃ kāmayeta rājanyaṃ rāṣṭraṃ syād iti taṃ manasā dhyāyet
10.16.9	rāṣṭram eva bhavatīti brāhmaṇam
10.16.10	athainaṃ yathāhṛtaṃ pratiparyāhṛtyāntarvedy āsādayati sīda tvaṃ mātur asyā upastha iti catasṛbhiḥ sahaṃsābhiḥ
10.16.11	atra muṣṭī ca karoti vācaṃ ca yacchati
10.16.12	athāsmai vrataṃ pradāsyann annapatīyāṃ samidham abhyādadhāti vā japati vānnapate 'nnasya no dehīti
10.16.13	athokhyam upasaminddhe yena devā jyotiṣordhvā udāyann iti
10.16.14	sa yāvatkṛtvo 'smai vrataṃ pradāsyan bhavaty evam evānnapatīyāṃ samidham abhyādadhāti vā japati vaivam ukhyam upasaminddhe
10.16.15	atha prātar udita āditye visṛṣṭāyāṃ vāci vātsapreṇopatiṣṭhate divas pari prathamaṃ jajñe agnir ity etenaikādaśarcena
10.16.16	sa evam eva pūrvedyuḥ prakrāmaty uttaredyur upatiṣṭhate
10.16.17	athāsyopavasathīye 'han vātsapraṃ saṃpadyate
10.17.1	athātaḥ prayāṇasyaiva mīmāṃsā
10.17.2	dīkṣitaṃ vāyogakṣemo vindaty anyatra vā devayajanād dīkṣate saṃsṛjanti vrate
10.17.3	saṃbadhnanti vratadughayor vatsau
10.17.4	ādadhati yad ādheyaṃ bhavati nīḍe gārhapatyaṃ prauga āhavanīyam iti
10.17.5	athokhyam udyacchata ud u tvā viśve devā iti
10.17.6	athainam anasaḥ prauga āsādayati sīda tvaṃ mātur asyā upastha iti catasṛbhiḥ sahaṃsābhiḥ
10.17.7	athaitān āsandīpādān phalakeṣu yathāsuṣṭhu vinibadhnanti
10.17.8	madhyame vaṃśe śikyapāśaṃ pragrathnanti
10.17.9	api vāraṇyor agnīn samārohya prayāti bhadrād abhi śreyaḥ prehi pred agne jyotiṣmān yāhīti dvābhyām
10.17.10	atha yady akṣa utsarjaty akrandad ity etām anvāha
10.17.11	athāvasite ghṛtānuṣiktāṃ samidham abhyādadhāti samidhāgniṃ duvasyata ghṛtair bodhayatātithim / āsmin havyā juhotana svāheti gāyatryā brāhmaṇasya praprāyam agnir bharatasya śṛṇva iti triṣṭubhā rājanyasya
10.17.12	sa yāvat kṛtvaḥ prayāsyan bhavaty evam evaitat sarvaṃ karoti
10.18.1	athāto bhasmana evātivṛddhasya mīmāṃsā
10.18.2	bhasma ced ativardhate sa upakalpayate satam ayodarvīṃ saṃdaṃśam iti
10.18.3	etat samādāya yatrāpas tad yanti sokhyāḥ
10.18.4	athaitam agniṃ saṃdaṃśena parigṛhya sate 'vadhāyāyodarvyāpsu bhasma praveśayaty āpo devīḥ pratigṛhṇīta bhasmaitad apsv agne sadhiṣ ṭava garbho asy oṣadhīnām iti tisṛbhir anucchandasam
10.18.5	athainaṃ jyotiṣmatībhyāṃ pratyavadadhāti prasadya bhasmanā yoniṃ punar āsadya sadanam apaś ceti dvābhyām
10.18.6	atha punar ūrjā saha rayyeti dvābhyāṃ punar udaiti
10.18.7	athokhyam upasaminddhe punas tvādityā rudrā vasavaḥ samindhatām iti
10.18.8	athainaṃ yathāhṛtaṃ pratiparyāhṛtya yajamānāyatane tiṣṭhann upatiṣṭhate bodhā sa bodhīty āntād anuvākasya
10.18.9	sa yāvat kṛtvo bhasmātivardhata evam evaitat sarvaṃ karoti
10.18.10	athātaḥ kālāyaivopaśete saṃbhārebhyaḥ
10.19.1	athātaḥ krayasyaivopavasathaḥ paryāplavate
10.19.2	sa upakalpayate pañcaśatam iṣṭakā aparimitā apasyā nairṛtīḥ kṛṣṇās tisras tuṣapakvā bhasma purīṣam ūṣān sikatā iti
10.19.3	athopavasathīye 'han devayajanam adhyavasyaty edam aganmāpeteti dvābhyām
10.19.4	atha mahāvediṃ vimimīta etān eva jyāyasaḥ prakramān prakramyākṣṇayā mānena pramāya samantaṃ spandyayā paritanoti
10.19.5	pṛṣṭhyām ātanoti
10.19.6	athaitam agniṃ pratyañcaṃ yūpāvaṭīyāc chaṅkor vimimīte puruṣamātreṇa veṇunā samapakṣapuccham
10.19.7	aratninā pakṣau drāghīyāṃsau bhavataḥ
10.19.8	ṣaḍvidhaṃ vā saptavidhaṃ vā dvādaśavidhaṃ vā yāvadvidhaṃ vā ceṣyamāṇo bhavati
10.19.9	athainam akṣṇayā mānena pramāya samantaṃ spandyayā paritanoti
10.19.10	anuspandyaṃ lekhāṃ likhati
10.19.11	apoddhṛtya spandyāṃ karṣūḥ khānayanti
10.19.12	ucchrayanty apasyāḥ
10.19.13	dakṣiṇataś ca paścāc ca varṣīyasīḥ kurvanti
10.19.14	etāvad evaitad ahaḥ karma kriyate
10.19.15	vasanty etāṃ rātrim
10.19.16	athādhvaryur apararātra ādrutya saṃśāsti tristanavrataṃ dohayateti
10.19.17	athaitam agniṃ sate samupya dakṣiṇato jvalayanta āsate
10.19.18	athaitad agnyāyatanaṃ śakṛtpiṇḍena parilepayati
10.19.19	tasmiṃś catasraḥ prācīr iṣṭakā āyātayati dve purastātsamīcī dve paścātsamīcī
10.19.20	athainaṃ pradakṣiṇaṃ trayodaśabhir iṣṭakābhiḥ paricinoti
10.19.21	anviṣṭakaṃ lekhāṃ likhati
10.19.22	apoddhṛtyeṣṭakāḥ karṣūḥ khānayanti
10.19.23	ucchrayanty apasyāḥ
10.19.24	dakṣiṇataś ca paścāc ca varṣīyasīḥ kurvanti
10.20.1	atha dvābhyām ātmany agniṃ gṛhṇīte mayi gṛhṇāmy agre agniṃ yo no agnir iti
10.20.2	svayaṃcitiṃ japati yās te agne samidho yāni dhāmeti
10.20.3	śvetam aśvam abhimṛśyāntaḥśarkaram imām upadadhāti prajāpatis tvā sādayatu tayā devatayāṅgirasvad dhruvā sīdeti
10.20.4	atra saṃbhārān nivapaty agner bhasmāsīti bhasmāgneḥ purīṣam asīti purīṣaṃ saṃjñānam asi kāmadharaṇam ity ūṣān mayi te kāmadharaṇaṃ bhūyād iti sikatāḥ
10.20.5	athainān saṃprayauti saṃ yā vaḥ priyās tanuvaḥ saṃ priyā hṛdayāni vaḥ / ātmā vo astu saṃpriyaḥ saṃpriyās tanuvo mameti
10.20.6	athainān kalpayati kalpetāṃ dyāvāpṛthivī kalpantām āpa oṣadhīḥ / kalpantām agnayaḥ pṛthaṅ mama jyaiṣṭhyāya savratā iti
10.20.7	athordhvacita upadadhāti cita stha paricita ūrdhvacitaḥ śrayadhvaṃ tayā devatayāṅgirasvad dhruvāḥ sīdateti
10.20.8	athānuvyūhaty āpyāyasveti gāyatryā brāhmaṇasya saṃ te payāṃsīti triṣṭubhā rājanyasya
10.20.9	yathāsuṣṭhu yathāśarkaram anuvyūhati
10.20.10	tasmiṃś catasraḥ prācīr yājuṣīr upadadhāti
10.21.1	ayaṃ so agnir agne divo arṇam acchā jigāsy agne yat te divi varcaḥ pṛthivyāṃ purīṣyāso agnaya iti
10.21.2	dve purastātsamīcī iḍām agna iti dakṣiṇām ayaṃ te yonir ṛtviya ity uttarām
10.21.3	dve paścātsamīcī cid asīti dakṣiṇāṃ paricid asīty uttarām
10.21.4	athainaṃ pradakṣiṇaṃ trayodaśabhir lokaṃpṛṇābhiḥ paricinoti lokaṃ pṛṇa chidraṃ pṛṇātho sīda śivā tvam / indrāgnī tvā bṛhaspatir asmin yonāv asīṣadann iti
10.21.5	tayādevataṃ karoti tayā devatayāṅgirasvad dhruvā sīdeti
10.21.6	atha sūdadohasaṃ karoti tā asya sūdadohasaḥ somaṃ śrīṇanti pṛśnayaḥ / janman devānāṃ viśas triṣv ā rocane diva iti
10.21.7	athāvadrutya kṛṣṇam aśvam abhimṛśya tanupurīṣam upadadhāti pṛṣṭo divīti
10.21.8	tayādevataṃ kṛtvā sūdadohasaṃ karotīti nvā iyaṃ prathamā citir niṣṭhīyate
10.21.9	evam eva dvitīyā niṣṭhīyata evaṃ tṛtīyaivaṃ caturthy evaṃ pañcamī
10.21.10	tān yadi ceṣyata ādityo 'bhyudiyād vācaṃyamo 'dhvaryuṃ yajamāno 'nvārabhate
10.21.11	ukhyam evādhvaryur ādatte pratisamedhanīyaṃ pratiprasthātā
10.21.12	tau purastātpratyañcau sam itam iti catasṛbhiḥ saṃnivapataḥ
10.21.13	atha śikyād ukhāṃ nirūhati
10.22.1	māteva putraṃ pṛthivī purīṣyam agniṃ sve yonāv abhār ukhā / tāṃ viśvair devair ṛtubhiḥ saṃvidānaḥ prajāpatir viśvakarmā vimuñcatv iti
10.22.2	tāṃ nāvekṣetety āhuḥ śugvaty eva hi bhavatīti
10.22.3	tasyām anyatrāvekṣamāṇo dadhidrapsān prāsyaty amuṃ te śuci dadhāmīti vā tūṣṇīṃ vāthaināṃ sikatābhiḥ pūrayitvā dadhnopariṣṭāt saṃpracchādyottare śālākhaṇḍe nidadhāti
10.22.4	evam eva dvitīyāṃ pūrayaty evaṃ tṛtīyām
10.22.5	tā ā kālāt pariśere
10.22.6	atha vaiśvānaryā śikyam ādatte yad asya pāre rajasaḥ śukraṃ jyotir ajāyata / tan naḥ parṣad ati dviṣa iti
10.22.7	atha yācati nairṛtīḥ kṛṣṇās tisras tuṣapakvā āsandīṃ rukmasya prabandhanam udapātram iti
10.22.8	etat samādāya dakṣiṇayā dvāropaniṣkramya tāṃ diśaṃ yanti yatrāsya svakṛtam iriṇaṃ spaṣṭaṃ bhavati pradaro vā
10.22.9	tad etat parācīnapāśaṃ śikyaṃ nyasyaty agne vaiśvānara svāheti
10.22.10	śikyapāśam anu parācīr nairṛtīr upadadhāti namaḥ su te nirṛte viśvarūpe yat te devī nirṛtir ābabandha yasyās te asyāḥ krūra āsañ juhomīti
10.22.11	upāsyaty āsandīṃ rukmasya prabandhanam
10.22.12	athopatiṣṭhate 'sunvantam ayajamānam iccha devīm ahaṃ nirṛtiṃ vandamāna iti dvābhyām
10.22.13	athāpo vyatiṣicya parāsya pātram anavekṣamāṇā āyanti
10.22.14	hastapādān prakṣālyaitenaiva yathetam etya gārhapatyam upatiṣṭhante niveśanaḥ saṃgamano vasūnām iti
10.22.15	āhavanīyam u haika upatiṣṭhante 'yam ito 'dhi gārhapatyo bhaviṣyatīti
10.23.1	atha prāyaṇīyena carati
10.23.2	prāyaṇīyena caritvā padena carati
10.23.3	padena caritvā rājānaṃ krītvohyātithyaṃ nirvapati
10.23.4	ātithyena pracarya prathamābhyāṃ pravargyopasadbhyāṃ pracarati
10.23.5	athopaniṣkramya saṃpraiṣam āha subrahmaṇya subrahmaṇyām āhvaya tristanavrataṃ prayacchateti
10.23.6	āhvayati subrahmaṇyaḥ subrahmaṇyām
10.23.7	tristanavrataṃ prayacchati
10.23.8	sa pucchād evāgre caturaḥ pratīcaḥ prakramān prakrāmati dakṣiṇā pañcamam
10.23.9	tat sphyaṃ nidadhāti
10.23.10	sa uparavāṇāṃ kālaḥ
10.23.11	atha mahāvedyā uttarādaṃsīyāc chaṅkor vedyantena dvādaśa pratīcaḥ prakramān prakrāmaty udañcaṃ trayodaśam
10.23.12	tad āgnīdhra upasīdati
10.23.13	sa utkarasya kālaḥ
10.23.14	athoparavāṇāṃ kālāt stambayajur harati
10.23.15	idam eva prasiddham
10.23.16	pauroḍāśikaṃ trir yajuṣā tūṣṇīṃ caturtham
10.23.17	pūrvaṃ parigrāhaṃ parigṛhṇāti
10.23.18	karaṇaṃ japati
10.23.19	uddhatād āgnīdhras trir harati
10.23.20	yad āgnīdhras trir haraty athāgreṇa śālāṃ tiṣṭhan saṃpraiṣam āha vedikārā vediṃ kalpayateti
10.23.21	yathāsaṃpraiṣaṃ te kurvanti
10.23.22	atha kārṣṇājinīr upānaha upamuñcante cite tvety adhvaryur ācite tveti pratiprasthātā manaścite tveti brahmā tapaścite tveti yajamānaś cite tvā cite tvety eva vā sarve
10.23.23	api vā tūṣṇīm evātha yācati dhanur bāṇavac caturo 'śmana aindrīm iṣṭakāṃ vibhaktim udapātraṃ darbhastambaṃ dūrvām ājyasthālīṃ sasruvām iti
10.23.24	etat samādāyottare śroṇyante saṃsādayanti
10.23.25	atha dvābhyām ātmany agniṃ gṛhṇīte mayi gṛhṇāmy agre agniṃ yo no agnir iti
10.23.26	svayaṃcitiṃ japati yās te agne samidho yāni dhāmeti
10.23.27	śvetam aśvam abhimṛśyāntaḥśarkaram imām upadadhāti prajāpatis tvā sādayatu tayā devatayāṅgirasvad dhruvā sīdeti
10.23.28	athādatte dhanur bāṇavac caturo 'śmana iti
10.23.29	etat samādāya jaghanena dakṣiṇenāgniṃ parītyāgreṇa yūpāvaṭīyaṃ śaṅkuṃ tiṣṭhan dhanur adhijyaṃ kṛtvāyatyāntaḥśarkaram iṣuṃ nihanti
10.24.1	indrasya vajro 'si vārtraghnas tanūpā naḥ pratispaśa iti
10.24.2	āvṛhyāśmānam upadadhāti yo naḥ purastād aghāyur abhidāsaty etaṃ so 'śmānam ṛcchatv iti
10.24.3	atha dakṣiṇasya pakṣasya dakṣiṇe pakṣopaplava āyatyāntaḥśarkaram iṣuṃ nihanti
10.24.4	āvṛhyāśmānam upadadhāti yo no dakṣiṇata iti
10.24.5	atha pucchasyāpare pucchopaplava āyatyāntaḥśarkaram iṣuṃ nihanti
10.24.6	āvṛhyāśmānam upadadhāti yo naḥ paścād iti
10.24.7	athottarasya pakṣasyottare pakṣopaplava āyatyāntaḥśarkaram iṣuṃ nihanti
10.24.8	āvṛhyāśmānam upadadhāti yo na uttarata iti
10.24.9	dikṣūpadadhātīti brāhmaṇam
10.24.10	tayādevataṃ kṛtvā sūdadohasaḥ karoti
10.24.11	athaitām aindrīm iṣṭakām ākramaṇaṃ pratyupadadhāti sa īṃ pāhi ya ṛjīṣī tarutro yaḥ śipravān vṛṣabho yo matīnām / yo gotrabhid vajrabhṛd yo hariṣṭhāḥ sa indra citrāṃ abhitṛndhi vājān iti
10.24.12	tayādevataṃ kṛtvā sūdadohasaṃ karoti

10.24.14	tayādevataṃ kṛtvā sūdadohasaṃ karoti
10.24.15	athādhidrutya svayamātṛṇṇīyaṃ śaṅkum udvṛhyodapātram upaninīya darbhastambam upadadhāti vāk tvā samudra upadadhātv iti vā tūṣṇīṃ vā
10.24.16	athainaṃ sruvāhutibhir abhijuhoti sajūr abdo 'yāvabhir iti pañcabhiḥ
10.24.17	atha dūrvām upadadhāty āyane te parāyaṇe dūrvā rohantu puṣpiṇīḥ / utso vā tatra jāyātai hrado vā puṇḍarīkavān iti
10.24.18	tayādevataṃ kṛtvā sūdadohasau karoti

10.25.1	ṣaḍgavaṃ vā dvādaśagavaṃ vā
10.25.2	tasya varatrāḥ saṃmṛśati saṃ varatrā dadhātana niṣkṛtāhāvam avaṭam iti dvābhyām
10.25.3	yunakti sīrā yuñjanti kavayo yugā yunakta sīreti dvābhyām

10.25.5	sītāṃ pratyavekṣate kāmaṃ kāmadughe dhukṣva ghṛtena sīteti dvābhyām

10.25.15	sa pucchād evāgre tisraḥ prācīḥ sītā vapati yā jātā oṣadhaya iti tisṛbhir anucchandasam
10.25.16	uttarāyai śroṇer dakṣiṇam aṃsam abhi tisṛbhiḥ
10.25.17	dakṣiṇāyai śroṇer uttaram aṃsam abhi tisṛbhiḥ
10.25.18	dakṣiṇāt pakṣād uttaraṃ pakṣam abhi pañcabhiḥ

10.25.22	tam antaḥśarkaraṃ nyasyati
10.26.1	mā no hiṃsīj janitā yaḥ pṛthivyā iti
10.26.2	atha dakṣiṇaṃ pakṣam anudrutya bahiḥśarkarāl loṣṭam ādatte
10.26.3	tam antaḥśarkaraṃ nyasyaty abhyāvartasva pṛthivīti
10.26.4	atha puccham anudrutya bahiḥśarkarāl loṣṭam ādatte
10.26.5	tam antaḥśarkaraṃ nyasyaty agne yat te śukraṃ yac candram iti
10.26.6	athottaraṃ pakṣam anudrutya bahiḥśarkarād dvau loṣṭāv ādatta iṣam ūrjam aham ita ādada iti
10.26.7	tayor anyataram antaḥśarkaraṃ nyasyaty ā no goṣu viśatv auṣadhīṣv iti
10.26.8	tāṃ diśam itaraṃ nirasyati yasyām asya diśi dveṣyo bhavati jahāmi sedim anirām amīvām iti

10.26.10	yajuṣā yajur viparihared ity etad aparam

10.26.12	tac cātvālasyāvṛtā cātvālaṃ parilikhati
10.26.13	uttaraveder āvṛtottaravediṃ nivapati
10.26.14	uttaranābhim utsādya sikatā nivapaty agne tava śravo vaya iti ṣaḍbhir anucchandasam
10.26.15	athordhvacita upadadhāti cita stha paricita ūrdhvacitaḥ śrayadhvaṃ tayā devatayāṅgirasvad dhruvāḥ sīdateti
10.26.16	athānuvyūhaty āpyāyasveti gāyatryā brāhmaṇasya saṃ te payāṃsīti triṣṭubhā rājanyasya
10.26.17	yathāsuṣṭhu yathāśarkaram anuvyūhati
10.27.1	athaitāṃ mahācitiṃ saṃsādayanty agreṇa śālām ucchrāyyāṃ vā carmaṇi vā dvāviṃśatiṃ ca darbhapuñjīlāni payaḥprokṣaṃ cājyaprokṣaṃ cāśvaṃ cauttaravedikāṃś ca saṃbhārān bārhaspatyatrayodaśāś ca kumbheṣṭakās tāvata eva hiraṇyaśalkān sataṃ codakumbhaṃ ca puṣkaraparṇaṃ ca rukmaṃ ca hiraṇmayaṃ ca puruṣaṃ srucau ca sarpaśiraś ca sarvaṃ ca svayamātṛṇṇānikotaṃ daśa ca skandhyā avakāś ca yā u cānyā upadhāsyan bhavati tā dadhi ca madhumiśraṃ kūrmaṃ caudumbaraṃ colūkhalamusalaṃ sarvauṣadhaṃ cokhāś ca paśuśīrṣāṇi ceti

10.27.6	athaitenāśvena prācādhidravati
10.28.1	abhyasthād viśvāḥ pṛtanā arātīr iti

10.28.9	ādatte dakṣiṇena kumbhaṃ savyena kumbhīṃ satāt pūrayitvā hiraṇyaśalkau pratyasya yā etā dakṣiṇād aṃsāt svayamātṛṇṇām abhyādravanti tāsu viṣuvatyanusītam upadadhāti
10.29.1	hiraṇyavarṇāḥ śucayaḥ pāvakā yāsāṃ rājā varuṇo yāti madhya iti dvābhyām
10.29.2	evam eva pūrayitvaivaṃ pratyasya yā etā uttarāyai śroṇeḥ svayamātṛṇṇām abhyādravanti tāsu viṣuvatyanusītam upadadhāti tṛtīyayā ca caturthyā ca
10.29.3	evam eva pūrayitvaivaṃ pratyasya yā etā dakṣiṇāyai śroṇeḥ svayamātṛṇṇām abhyādravanti tāsu viṣuvatyanusītam upadadhāti pañcamyā ca ṣaṣṭhyā ca
10.29.4	evam eva pūrayitvaivaṃ pratyasya yā etā uttarād aṃsāt svayamātṛṇṇām abhyādravanti tāsu viṣuvatyanusītam upadadhāti saptamyā cāṣṭamyā ca
10.29.5	evam eva pūrayitvaivaṃ pratyasya yā etā dakṣiṇāt pakṣāt svayamātṛṇṇām abhyādravanti tāsu viṣuvatyanusītam upadadhāti navamyā ca daśamyā ca
10.29.6	evam eva pūrayitvaivaṃ pratyasya yā etā uttarāt pakṣāt svayamātṛṇṇām abhyādravanti tāsu viṣuvatyanusītam upadadhāty ekādaśyā ca dvādaśyā ca

10.31.1	atha svayamātṛṇṇāṃ yajuṣā karoti dhruvāsi dharuṇāstṛtā viśvakarmaṇā sukṛtā / mā tvā samudra ud vadhīn mā suparṇo 'vyathamānā pṛthivīṃ dṛṃheti
10.31.2	athainām aśvam avaghrāpyāviduṣā brāhmaṇena sahādhidrutyopadadhāti yathaitasya puruṣasya prāṇaiḥ prāṇāḥ saṃnidhīyeran nāpidhīyeran bhūḥ prajāpatis tvā sādayatv ity anudrutyāgnis tvābhipātu mahyā svastyā chardiṣā śaṃtamena tayā devatayāṅgirasvad dhruvā sīdeti

10.32.1	athaitā daśa skandhyāḥ prācīr āyātayati dve ṛtavye dve dviyajuṣī virājaṃ ca viśvajyotiṣaṃ ca sayujaṃ cāṣāḍhāṃ ca dve saṃyānyau
10.32.2	ṛtavye upadadhāti madhuś ca mādhavaś ceti
10.32.3	avakām anūpadadhāty agner yonir asīti
10.32.4	atha dviyajuṣī upadadhāti kāṇḍātkāṇḍāt prarohantī yā śatena pratanoṣīti dvābhyāṃ dūrveṣṭakām

10.34.1	ādityaṃ garbhaṃ payasā samañjann ity anudrutyemaṃ mā hiṃsīr dvipādaṃ paśūnām iti
10.34.2	mayum āraṇyam anu te diśāmīti śucam anūtsṛjati
10.34.3	lalāṭe hiraṇyeṣṭakām upadadhāti viśvakarmā diśāṃ patir iti
10.34.4	atha purastāt pratyaṅmukha upaviśyāntar ātmann aśvasya śira upadadhāti vātasya dhrājiṃ varuṇasya nābhim ity anudrutyemaṃ mā hiṃsīr ekaśaphaṃ paśūnām iti
10.34.5	gauram āraṇyam anu te diśāmīti śucam anūtsṛjati
10.34.6	lalāṭe hiraṇyeṣṭakām upadadhāti prajāpatir diśāṃ patir iti
10.34.7	atha paścāt prāṅmukha upaviśyāntar ātmann ṛṣabhasya śira upadadhāty ajasram indum aruṣaṃ bhuraṇyum ity anudrutyemaṃ samudraṃ śatadhāram utsam iti
10.34.8	gavayam āraṇyam anu te diśāmīti śucam anūtsṛjati
10.34.9	lalāṭe hiraṇyeṣṭakām upadadhāti rudro diśāṃ patir iti
10.34.10	atha dakṣiṇata udaṅmukha upaviśyāntar ātman vṛṣṇeḥ śira upadadhāti varūtriṃ tvaṣṭur varuṇasya nābhim ity anudrutyemām ūrṇāyuṃ varuṇasya māyām iti
10.34.11	uṣṭram āraṇyam anu te diśāmīti śucam anūtsṛjati
10.34.12	lalāṭe hiraṇyeṣṭakām upadadhāti varuṇo diśāṃ patir iti
10.34.13	athottarato dakṣiṇāmukha upaviśyāntar ātman bastasya śira upadadhāti yo agnir agnes tapaso 'dhi jāta ity anudrutyājā hy agner ajaniṣṭa garbhād iti
10.34.14	śarabham āraṇyam anu te diśāmīti śucam anūtsṛjati
10.34.15	lalāṭe hiraṇyeṣṭakām upadadhāty agnir diśāṃ patir iti
10.34.16	anteṣu tasya vyudūhyopadadhyād iti brāhmaṇam
10.34.17	tayādevataṃ kṛtvā sūdadohasaḥ karoti
10.35.1	athāpasyā upadadhāti
10.35.2	apāṃ tvemant sādayāmīti pañca purastāt pratīcīr upadadhāti pañca dakṣiṇataḥ pañca paścāt prācīḥ pañcottarataś chandasyāḥ
10.35.3	tayādevataṃ kṛtvā sūdadohasaḥ karoti
10.35.4	atha prāṇabhṛta upadadhāty ayaṃ puro bhuvas tasya prāṇo bhauvāyano vasantaḥ prāṇāyano gāyatrī vāsantī gāyatryai gāyatraṃ gāyatrād upāṃśur upāṃśos trivṛt trivṛto rathaṃtaraṃ rathaṃtarād vasiṣṭha ṛṣiḥ prajāpatigṛhītayā tvayā prāṇaṃ gṛhṇāmi prajābhya iti
10.35.5	daśa prācīr āyātayati svayamātṛṇṇāyā ayaṃ dakṣiṇā viśvakarmeti
10.35.6	daśa dakṣiṇā āyātayati svayamātṛṇṇāyā ayaṃ paścād viśvavyacā iti
10.35.7	daśa pratīcīr āyātayati svayamātṛṇṇāyā idam uttarāt suvar iti
10.35.8	daśodīcīr āyātayati svayamātṛṇṇāyā iyam upari matir iti
10.35.9	daśabhir upariṣṭāt pradakṣiṇaṃ paricinoti
10.35.10	akṣṇayopadadhātīti brāhmaṇam
10.35.11	tayādevataṃ kṛtvā sūdadohasaḥ karoti
10.35.12	atha saṃyata upadadhāty āyuṣaḥ prāṇaṃ saṃtanv iti dvādaśa tisrastisro dikṣu na madhye
10.35.13	tayādevataṃ kṛtvā sūdadohasaḥ karoti
10.35.14	athāpānabhṛta upadadhāti prācī diśāṃ vasanta ṛtūnām agnir devatā brahma draviṇaṃ trivṛt stomaḥ sa u pañcadaśavartanis tryavir vayaḥ kṛtam ayānāṃ purovāto vātaḥ sānaga ṛṣir iti
10.35.15	vācayati pitaraḥ pitāmahā iti
10.35.16	dakṣiṇena prāṇabhṛto daśa pratīcīr āyātayati svayamātṛṇṇām abhi dakṣiṇā diśām iti
10.35.17	jaghanena prāṇabhṛto daśodīcīr āyātayati svayamātṛṇṇām abhi pratīcī diśām iti
10.35.18	uttareṇa prāṇabhṛto daśa prācīr āyātayati svayamātṛṇṇām abhy udīcī diśām iti
10.35.19	agreṇa prāṇabhṛto daśa dakṣiṇā āyātayati svayamātṛṇṇām abhy ūrdhvā diśām iti
10.35.20	bāhyena prāṇabhṛto daśabhir upariṣṭād apasalaiḥ paricinoti

10.36.2	tayādevataṃ kṛtvā sūdadohasaḥ karoti

10.36.6	tāṃ jaghanena prakramavelāyāṃ prāñcam ṛṣabham upadadhāti tvām agne vṛṣabhaṃ cekitānam iti

10.36.10	atha sūdadohasaṃ karoti tā asya sūdadohasaḥ somaṃ śrīṇanti pṛśnayaḥ / janman devānāṃ viśas triṣv ā rocane diva iti

10.42.2	āśus trivṛd iti purastād upadadhāti vyoma saptadaśa iti dakṣiṇato dharuṇa ekaviṃśa iti paścād bhāntaḥ pañcadaśa ity uttartaḥ
10.42.3	pratūrtir aṣṭādaśa iti purastād upadadhāty abhivartaḥ saviṃśa iti dakṣiṇato varco dvāviṃśa iti paścāt tapo navadaśa ity uttarato
10.42.4	yoniś caturviṃśa iti purastād upadadhāti garbhāḥ pañcaviṃśa iti dakṣiṇata ojas triṇava iti paścāt saṃbharaṇas trayoviṃśa ity uttarataḥ
10.42.5	kratur ekatriṃśa iti purastād upadadhāti bradhnasya viṣṭapaṃ catustriṃśa iti dakṣiṇataḥ pratiṣṭhā trayastriṃśa iti paścān nākaḥ ṣaṭtriṃśa ity uttarataḥ
10.42.6	agner bhāgo 'sīti purastād upadadhāti nṛcakṣasāṃ bhāgo 'sīti dakṣiṇato mitrasya bhāgo 'sīti paścād indrasya bhāgo 'sīty uttarato
10.42.7	vasūnāṃ bhāgo 'sīti purastād upadadhāty ādityānāṃ bhāgo 'sīti dakṣiṇato 'dityai bhāgo 'sīti paścād devasya savitur bhāgo 'sīty uttarato
10.42.8	dhartraś catuṣṭoma iti purastād upadadhāti yāvānāṃ bhāgo 'sīti dakṣiṇata ṛbhūṇāṃ bhāgo 'sīti paścād vivarto 'ṣṭācatvāriṃśa ity uttarataḥ
10.42.9	anyathānūcyāny athopadadhātīti brāhmaṇam
10.42.10	tayādevataṃ kṛtvā sūdadohasaḥ karoti
10.42.11	atha sṛṣṭīr upadadhāty ekayāstuvata prajā adhīyanteti saptadaśa
