10.43.1	athāgniṃ sarvatomukhaṃ cinute 'gner aṅgāni prājāpatyām ṛṣabhaṃ lokaṃpṛṇāḥ
10.43.2	udīcyātra lokaṃpṛṇayā prasauti
10.43.3	agnim udīcībhiḥ saṃpracchādayanti
10.43.4	saṃpracchannaṃ palāśaśākhayā parikarṣati lokaṃ pṛṇa chidraṃ pṛṇeti
10.43.5	atha citik.lptyābhimṛśati cittim acittiṃ cinavad vi vidvān iti
10.43.6	āgneyyānuṣṭubhaitāṃ citim abhimṛśya dvābhyām avadravati vāṅ ma āsan prāṇadā iti
10.43.7	athāparāhṇikībhyāṃ pravargyopasadbhyāṃ pracarati
10.43.8	etāvad evaitad ahaḥ karma kriyate
10.43.9	vasanty etāṃ rātrim
10.44.1	athāṣṭame 'hny udita āditye pravargyopasadbhyāṃ pracarati
10.44.2	samānaṃ purīṣasyopadhānam
10.44.3	atha navame 'hny udita āditye pravargyopasadbhyāṃ pracarati
10.44.4	sarva eva kārṣṇājinīr upānaha upamuñcante
10.44.5	atha yācaty ājyasthālīṃ sasruvāṃ vibhaktim udapātraṃ sarvaṃ ca svayamātṛṇṇānikotaṃ sapta ca skandhyā avakāś ca yā u cānyā upadhāsyan bhavati tāḥ
10.44.6	etat samādāyottare śroṇyante saṃsādayanti
10.44.7	atha dvābhyām ātmany agniṃ gṛhṇīte mayi gṛhṇāmy agre agniṃ yo no agnir iti
10.44.8	svayaṃcitiṃ japati yās te agne samidho yāni dhāmeti
10.44.9	śvetam aśvam abhimṛśyādhidravaty apām idaṃ nyayanaṃ namas ta iti dvābhyām
10.44.10	athādhidrutya caturthe saṃcitāhutī juhoty agne kiṃśila tat tvā yāmīti
10.44.11	dakṣiṇato vibhaktim upadadhāty agne stomaṃ manāmaha iti
10.44.12	tayādevataṃ kṛtvā sūdadohasaṃ karoti
10.44.13	athaitāḥ sapta skandhyāḥ prācīr āyātayati dve ṛtavye svarājaṃ ca viśvajyotiṣaṃ caikāṃ sayujaṃ dve saṃyānyau
10.44.14	ṛtavye upadadhāti tapaś ca tapasyaś ceti
10.44.15	avakām anūpadadhāty agner yonir asīti svarājaṃ ca viśvajyotiṣaṃ ca svarāṭ jyotir adhārayat prajāpatis tvā sādayatv ity uttarām
10.44.16	atha sayujam upadadhāti rayyai poṣāya sajātānāṃ madhyamastheyāya mayā tvā sayujā yujā yunajmīti
10.44.17	atha saṃyānyāv upadadhāty antarikṣam asy antarikṣāya tveti
10.44.18	tayādevataṃ kṛtvā sūdadohasaḥ karoti
10.45.1	athāsapatnā upadadhāti
10.45.2	agne jātān praṇudā naḥ sapatnān iti purastād upadadhāti sahasā jātān iti paścāc catuścatvāriṃśa stoma iti dakṣiṇataḥ ṣoḍaśa stoma ity uttarataḥ
10.45.3	tāsāṃ purīṣavatīṃ madhya upadadhāti pṛthivyāḥ purīṣam asy apso nāmeti
10.45.4	tayādevataṃ kṛtvā sūdadohasaḥ karoti
10.45.5	atha virāja upadadhāty evaś chando varivaś chanda iti catvāriṃśataṃ daśadaśa dikṣu na madhye
10.45.6	akṣṇayopadadhātīti brāhmaṇam
10.45.7	tayādevataṃ kṛtvā sūdadohasaḥ karoti
10.45.8	atha stomabhāgā upadadhāti raśmir asi kṣayāya tvā kṣayaṃ jinvety ekatriṃśataṃ saptasapta dikṣu tisro madhye
10.45.9	tayādevataṃ kṛtvā sūdadohasaḥ karoti
10.45.10	atha nākasada upadadhāti rājñy asi prācī dig vasavas te devā adhipataya iti pañcaikaikāṃ dikṣv ekāṃ madhye
10.45.11	tayādevataṃ kṛtvā sūdadohasaḥ karoti
10.45.12	atha pañcacoḍā upariṣṭān nākasadām upadadhāty ayaṃ puro harikeśaḥ sūryaraśmir iti pañcaikaikāṃ dikṣv ekāṃ madhye
10.45.13	tāsāṃ paścāt prācīm uttamām upadadhāti
10.45.14	atra yaṃ yajamāno dveṣṭi taṃ manasā dhyāyati
10.45.15	tayādevataṃ kṛtvā sūdadohasaḥ karoti
10.45.16	atha chandāṃsy upadadhāty agnir mūrdhā diva ity etasyānuvākasya tisrastisro yathāmnātam
10.45.17	gāyatrīḥ purastād upadadhāti triṣṭubho dakṣiṇato jagatīḥ paścād anuṣṭubha uttarato bṛhatīr madhye
10.45.18	uṣṇihaḥ purastād upadadhāti paṅktīr dakṣiṇato 'kṣarapaṅktīḥ paścād aticchandasam uttarato dvipadā madhye
10.45.19	api vāticchandasaṃ madhye dvipadā uttarataḥ
10.45.20	tayādevataṃ kṛtvā sūdadohasaḥ karoti
10.45.21	atha dakṣiṇe 'ṃse kṛttikā upadadhāty ambā nāmāsi dulā nāmāsīti sapta gulmakṛtāḥ
10.45.22	tayādevataṃ kṛtvā sūdadohasaḥ karoti
10.45.23	atha vṛṣṭisanīr upadadhāti purovātasanir asy abhrasanir asīti pañcaikaikāṃ dikṣv ekāṃ madhye
10.45.24	anuparihāraṃ sādayatīti brāhmaṇam
10.45.25	tayādevataṃ kṛtvā sūdadohasaḥ karoti
10.45.26	athādityeṣṭakā upadadhāti salilāya tvā sarṇīkāya tvety aṣṭau dvedve dikṣu na madhye
10.45.27	tayādevataṃ kṛtvā sūdadohasaḥ karoti
10.45.28	atha ghṛteṣṭakā upadadhāty ṛce tvā ruce tveti pañcaikaikāṃ dikṣv ekām madhye
10.45.29	anuparihāraṃ sādayatīti brāhmaṇam
10.45.30	tayādevataṃ kṛtvā sūdadohasaḥ karoti
10.45.31	atha yaśodā upadadhāti yaśodāṃ tvā yaśasi sādayāmīti pañcaikaikāṃ dikṣv ekāṃ madhye
10.45.32	tayādevataṃ kṛtvā sūdadohasaḥ karoti
10.45.33	atha bhūyaskṛta upadadhāti bhūyaskṛd asi varivaskṛd asīti pañcaikaikāṃ dikṣv ekāṃ madhye
10.45.34	tayādevataṃ kṛtvā sūdadohasaḥ karoti
10.45.35	athāpsuṣada upadadhāty apsuṣad asi śyenasad asīti pañcaikaikāṃ dikṣv ekāṃ madhye
10.45.36	tayādevataṃ kṛtvā sūdadohasaḥ karoti
10.45.37	atha draviṇodā upadadhāti pṛthivyās tvā draviṇe sādayāmīti paṇcaikaikāṃ dikṣv ekāṃ madhye
10.45.38	tayādevataṃ kṛtvā sūdadohasaḥ karoti
10.45.39	athāyuṣyā upadadhāti prāṇaṃ me pāhy apānaṃ me pāhīti saptaikaikāṃ dikṣu tisro madhye
10.45.40	tayādevataṃ kṛtvā sūdadohasaḥ karoti
10.45.41	athartunāmāny upadadhāti yāvā ayāvā iti saptaikaikāṃ dikṣu tisro madhye
10.45.42	tayādevataṃ kṛtvā sūdadohasaḥ karoti
10.46.1	athendratanūr upadadhāty agninā viśvāṣāḍ iti dvāviṃśatiṃ pañcapañca dikṣu dve madhye
10.46.2	tayādevataṃ kṛtvā sūdadohasaḥ karoti
10.46.3	atha yajñatanūr upadadhāti prajāpatir manasāndho 'ccheta iti trayastriṃśatam aṣṭāvaṣṭau dikṣv ekāṃ madhye
10.46.4	tayādevataṃ kṛtvā sūdadohasaḥ karoti
10.46.5	atha jyotiṣmatīr upadadhāti jyotiṣmatīṃ tvā sādayāmīti dvādaśa tisrastisro dikṣu na madhye
10.46.6	tayādevataṃ kṛtvā sūdadohasaḥ karoti
10.46.7	atha bhūteṣṭakā upadadhāti pṛthivyai svāhāntarikṣāya svāheti dvādaśa tisrastisro dikṣu na madhye
10.46.8	tayādevataṃ kṛtvā sūdadohasaḥ karoti
10.46.9	athājyānīr upadadhāti śatāyudhāya śatavīryāyeti pañcaikaikāṃ dikṣvekāṃ madhye
10.46.10	tayādevataṃ kṛtvā sūdadohasaḥ karoti
10.46.11	atha rāṣṭrabhṛta upadadhāty agne yaśasvin yaśasemam arpayeti catasra ekaikāṃ dikṣu na madhye
10.46.12	tayādevataṃ kṛtvā sūdadohasaḥ karoti
10.46.13	atha dakṣiṇe 'ṃse paurṇamāsīm upadadhāti pūrṇā paścād iti
10.46.14	tayādevataṃ kṛtvā sūdadohasaṃ karoti
10.46.15	atha dakṣiṇa evāṃse nakṣatreṣṭakā upadadhāti kṛttikā nakṣatram agnir devateti
10.46.16	athainā rocayaty agne ruca stha prajāpater dhātuḥ somasya ṛce tvā ruce tvā dyute tvā bhāse tvā jyotiṣe tveti
10.46.17	athaitaṃ nakṣatrapathaṃ rohiṇīprabhṛtyā viśākhābhyām āyātayati
10.46.18	dakṣiṇād aṃsād dakṣiṇāṃ śroṇim abhyāyātayati
10.46.19	atha pucchasandhau cātmasandhau cāmāvāsyām upadadhāti yat te devā adadhur bhāgadheyam iti
10.46.20	athaitaṃ nakṣatrapatham anūrādhāprabhṛtyāpabharaṇībhya āyātayati
10.46.21	uttarāyai śroṇer uttaram aṃsam abhyāyātayati
10.46.22	athottara evāṃse paurṇamāsīm upadadhāti pūrṇā paścād iti
10.46.23	asaṃspṛṣṭā upadadhātīti brāhmaṇam
10.46.24	nakṣatreṣṭakābhiś citir āpyate
10.46.25	tayādevataṃ kṛtvā sūdadohasaḥ karoti
10.46.26	athāvadrutya kṛṣṇam aśvam abhimṛśya tanupurīṣam upadadhāti pṛṣṭo divīti
10.46.27	tayādevataṃ kṛtvā sūdadohasaṃ karoti
10.46.28	atra ṣaṣṭhīṃ citiṃ cinute saṃyac ca pracetāś ceti pañcaikaikāṃ dikṣv ekāṃ madhye
10.46.29	tayādevataṃ kṛtvā sūdadohasaḥ karoti
10.46.30	athāgniṃ sarvatomukhaṃ cinute 'gner aṅgāni prājāpatyām ṛṣabhaṃ lokaṃpṛṇāḥ
10.46.31	prācyātra lokaṃpṛṇayā prasauti
10.46.32	agniṃ prācībhiḥ saṃpracchādayanti
10.46.33	athodīcībhiḥ
10.46.34	prācībhis tv eva nistiṣṭhanti
10.46.35	yāvad daghnaṃ ceṣyamāṇo bhavati tāvad daghnaṃ cinute
10.46.36	athānabhimṛṣṭaṃ citik.lptyā bhavati
10.46.37	tad etāś catasraḥ svayamātṛṇṇā yācati
10.46.38	tā dikṣūpadadhāti prāṇāya tvā cakṣuṣe tvā tayā devatayāṅgirasvad dhruvā sīda vyānāya tvā cakṣuṣe tvā tayā devatayāṅgirasvad dhruvā sīdāpānāya tvā cakṣuṣe tvā tayā devatayāṅgirasvad dhruvā sīda vāce tvā cakṣuṣe tvā tayā devatayāṅgirasvad dhruvā sīdeti
10.46.39	atha svayamātṛṇṇām aśvam avaghrāpyāviduṣā brāhmaṇena sahādhidrutyopadadhāti suvar āyos tvā sadane sādayāmīty anudrutya sūryas tvābhipātu mahyā svastyā chardiṣā śaṃtamena tayā devatayāṅgirasvad dhruvā sīdeti
10.46.40	apānyāt tṛtīyām upadhāyeti
10.46.41	apāniti
10.46.42	athaiṣa brāhmaṇo varaṃ dadāti
10.46.43	atha sruci caturgṛhītaṃ gṛhītvā svayamātṛṇṇāvakāśe juhoti cittiṃ juhomi manasā ghṛteneti
10.46.44	aṅguṣṭhābhyām anvārabhyānvārohaṃ vācayati divam ākramiṣaṃ suvar aganmeti
10.46.45	apare bile hiraṇyeṣṭakām upadadhāti suvar asi suvar me yaccha divaṃ yaccha divo mā pāhīti
10.46.46	tāṃ jaghanena prakramavelāyāṃ maṇḍaleṣṭakām upadadhāti dyaur aparājitāmṛtena viṣṭeti
10.46.47	dakṣiṇato retaḥsicam upadadhāti dyau retaḥsik sā me reto dadhātu sā me retaḥ prajanayatv iti
10.46.48	tayādevataṃ kṛtvā sūdadohasaḥ karoti
10.46.49	athottarataḥ prakramavelāyāṃ vikarṇīm upadadhāti prothad aśvo na yavase aviṣyann iti
10.46.50	tayādevataṃ kṛtvā sūdadohasaṃ karoti
10.46.51	atha lokaṃpṛṇā upadadhāti lokaṃ pṛṇa chidraṃ pṛṇeti
10.46.52	atha citik.lptyābhimṛśati cittim acittiṃ cinavad vi vidvān iti
10.46.53	āgneyyā paṅktyaitāṃ citim abhimṛśya dvābhyām avadravati vāṅ ma āsan prāṇadā iti
10.46.54	athāparāhṇikībhyāṃ pravargyopasadbhyāṃ pracarati
10.46.55	etāvad evaitad ahaḥ karma kriyate
10.46.56	vasanty etāṃ rātrīm
10.47.1	athaitasminn eva navame 'hni daśamāyāhna upakalpayate sahasraṃ hiraṇyaśalkān
10.47.2	ūrdhvaṃ tribhyo 'parimitān ity eka āhuḥ
10.47.3	te yadi sahasraṃ bhavanti dvedve śate pattranāḍīṣv ete bhavataḥ
10.47.4	atha daśame 'hny udita āditye pravargyopasadbhyāṃ pracarati
10.47.5	samānaṃ purīṣasyopadhānam
10.47.6	atha pātryām apa ānīya hiraṇyaśalkān saṃprakīrya dvābhyāṃdvābhyāṃ śatābhyāṃ prokṣati sahasrasya pramā asīti yat prāk svayamātṛṇṇāyai bhavati sahasrasya pratimā asīti yad dakṣiṇā svayamātṛṇṇāyai bhavati sahasrasya vimā asīti yat pratyak svayamātṛṇṇāyai bhavati sahasrasyonmā asīti yad udak svayamātṛṇṇāyai bhavati
10.47.7	atha madhyaṃ dvābhyāṃ śatābhyāṃ prokṣati sāhasro 'si sahasrāya tveti
10.47.8	athottare śroṇyante tiṣṭhann iṣṭakā dhenūḥ kuruta imā me agna iṣṭakā dhenavaḥ santv ity āntād anuvākasyāthāparāhṇikībhyāṃ pravargyopasadbhyāṃ pracarati
10.47.9	etāvad evaitad ahaḥ karma kriyate
10.47.10	vasanty etāṃ rātrim
10.47.11	athaitasminn eva daśame 'hny ekādaśāyāhna upakalpayate 'rkaparṇam ajakṣīraṃ gāvīdhukaṃ caruṃ tisṛdhanvam aśmānam udakumbhaṃ maṇḍūkam avakāṃ vetasaśākhāṃ darbhastambam ājyasthālīṃ sasruvāṃ dīrghavaṃśaṃ dvādaśam iti
10.47.12	athaikādaśe 'hny udita āditye pravargyopasadbhyāṃ pracarati
10.47.13	sa dīrghavaṃśe sruvaṃ pragrathyottame saṃcitāhutī juhoty agne vanya tat tvā yāmīti
10.48.1	yāvad evātrādhvaryuś ceṣṭati tāvad eṣa pratiprasthātottarasya pakṣasya caramayeṣṭakayā pratyūḍhapurīṣayoparamati
10.48.2	athaitasyārkaparṇasya puṭam antaravastrāviṇaṃ kṛtvodaṅ tiṣṭhan mukhadaghne dhārayann āhāharānayeti
10.48.3	sa yatra dhareṣṭakāṃ prāpnoti tat pratipadyate namas te rudra manyava ity āntam etam anuvākaṃ nigadya dvitīyaṃ tṛtīyam
10.48.4	caturthasya yatrābhijānāti namaḥ kṣattṛbhya iti tat svāhākaroti
10.48.5	so 'ta eva prāṅ āvṛtya nābhidaghne dhārayan saṃgrahītṛbhya iti pratipadyātiśiṣṭam anuvākasya nigadya pañcamaṃ ṣaṣṭham
10.48.6	saptamasya yatrābhijānāti namo varṣyāya ceti tat svāhākaroti
10.48.7	so 'ta eva dakṣiṇāvṛtya jānudaghne dhārayann avarṣyāya ceti pratipadyātiśiṣṭam anuvākasya nigadyāṣṭamaṃ navamaṃ daśamam
10.48.8	ekādaśasya yatrābhijānāti ya etāvantaś ca bhūyāṃsaś ceti tat svāhākaroti
10.48.9	so 'ta eva pratyaṅ āvṛtya gulphadaghne dhārayan namo rudrebhyo ye pṛthivyām ity etad yajamānaṃ vācayati
10.48.10	nābhidaghne dhārayan namo rudrebhyo ye 'ntarikṣa ity etad yajamānaṃ vācayati
10.48.11	grīvadaghne dhārayan namo rudrebhyo ye divīty etad yajamānaṃ vācayati
10.48.12	atraitad arkaparṇaṃ yaṃ dveṣṭi tasya saṃcare paśūnāṃ nyasyati
10.48.13	yady u vai na dveṣṭy ākhvavaṭe nyasyati
10.48.14	atraitaṃ gāvīdhukaṃ caruṃ caramāyām iṣṭakāyāṃ nidadhāti yo rudro agnau yo apsu ya oṣadhīṣu yo rudro viśvā bhuvanāviveśa tasmai rudrāya namo astv iti
10.48.15	athaitat tisṛdhanvaṃ yācati
10.48.16	tenottare śroṇyante tiṣṭhann upatiṣṭhate
10.48.17	api vānuparikrāmaṃ yat te rudra puro dhanus tad vāto anu vātu te tasmai te rudra saṃvatsareṇa namaskaromi yat te rudra dakṣiṇā dhanur yat te rudra paścād dhanur yat te rudrottarād dhanur yat te rudropari dhanur iti
10.48.18	athainad ayācitaṃ brāhmaṇāya dadāti
10.48.19	athāsyaiṣa udakumbha uttare śroṇyante 'śmanā saṃspṛṣṭaḥ śete
10.48.20	sa yo balavāṃs tam āhānenodakumbhena saṃtatayā dhārayā triḥ pradakṣiṇaṃ pariṣiñcan parīhīti
10.48.21	sa tathā karoti
10.48.22	pariṣicyamāne yajamānaṃ vācayaty aśmann ūrjaṃ parvate śiśriyāṇāṃ vāte parjanye varuṇasya śuṣme / adbhya oṣadhībhyo vanaspatibhyo 'dhi saṃbhṛtāṃ tāṃ na iṣam ūrjaṃ dhatta marutaḥ saṃrarāṇā iti
10.48.23	athaitaṃ kumbham aśmanā saṃspṛṣṭaṃ sādayaty aśmaṃs te kṣud amuṃ te śug ṛcchatu yaṃ dviṣma iti
10.48.24	nidhāya kumbhaṃ yathetaṃ triḥ punaḥ pratiparyeti
10.48.25	athaitasminn eva dīrghavaṃśe pragrathnāti maṇḍūkam avakāṃ vetasaśākhāṃ darbhastambam iti
10.48.26	tena yat prāk svayamātṛṇṇāyai bhavati tad vikarṣati samudrasya tvāvakayā himasya tvā jarāyuṇeti
10.49.1	dvābhyāṃ purastād dvābhyāṃ dakṣiṇato dvābhyāṃ paścād dvābhyām uttarataḥ
10.49.2	aṣṭābhir vikarṣatīti brāhmaṇam
10.49.3	athaitāś caiva kārṣṇājinīr upānaha etaṃ ca dīrghavaṃśaṃ saṃchidya cātvāle saṃprakiranti
10.49.4	atha śānto 'gnir iti
10.49.5	ājyasthālīṃ sasruvām ādāyādhidrutyājyasthālyāḥ sruveṇopaghātaṃ sarpāhutīr juhoti
10.49.6	samīcī nāmāsi prācī dig iti paścād āsīnaḥ pūrve bile juhoti
10.49.7	ojasvinī nāmāsi dakṣiṇā dig ity uttarata āsīno dakṣiṇe bile juhoti
10.49.8	prācī nāmāsi pratīcī dig iti purastād āsīno 'pare bile juhoti
10.49.9	avasthāvā nāmāsy udīcī dig iti dakṣiṇata āsīna uttare bile juhoti
10.49.10	athaitenaiva yathetam etya yatraiva prathamam ahauṣīt tad dve juhoty adhipatnī nāmāsi vaśinī nāmāsīti
10.49.11	athāvadrutyāgniṃ sāmabhir upasthāpayati
10.49.12	gāyatreṇa purastād upatiṣṭhate 'gnerhṛdayena dakṣiṇam upapakṣaṃ rathaṃtareṇa dakṣiṇaṃ pakṣaṃ vāravantīyena dakṣiṇāṃ śroṇim ṛtusthāyajñāyajñiyena pucchaṃ śyaitenottarāṃ śroṇiṃ bṛhatottaraṃ pakṣaṃ prajāpater gṛhayenottaram upapakṣaṃ vāmadevyena madhyam
10.49.13	athāha hotar agner ukthenāgnim anuśaṃseti
10.49.14	yadi hotā na kāmayate yajamāna eva jaghanena pucchaṃ tṛṇāni saṃstīrya teṣūpaviśyāgner ukthenāgnim anuśaṃsati pitā mātariśvācchidrā padā dhā acchidrā uśijaḥ padānu takṣuḥ somo viśvavin netā neṣad bṛhaspatir ukthāmadāni śaṃsiṣad om iti sakṛd vā trir vāthainaṃ stutaśastrayor dohaṃ vācayatīṣṭo yajño bhṛgubhir āśīrdā vasubhis tasya ta iṣṭasya vītasya draviṇeha bhakṣīyeti
10.49.15	athāparāhṇikībhyāṃ pravargyopasadbhyāṃ pracarati
10.49.16	etāvad evaitad ahaḥ karma kriyate
10.49.17	vasanty etāṃ rātrim
10.50.1	athaitasminn evaikādaśe 'hni dvādaśāyāhna upakalpayata audumbaraṃ sruvam audumbaraṃ droṇam audumbaraṃ prasekam audumbarīṃ vitaṣṭiṃ tasyāṃ pañcagṛhītam ājyaṃ bhavati dadhnaḥ pūrṇām audumbarīṃ tisra audumbarīḥ samidhas tisro nānāvṛkṣyā nānāvṛkṣyam idhmaṃ dadhi madhumiśraṃ grumuṣṭim avakābhāraṃ pṛśnim aśmānam ājyaprokṣaṃ dvitīyaṃ hotāram apratirathasyānuvaktāraṃ vilīnotpūtasyājyasya dvau vā trīn vā kumbhān brāhmaudanikān vrīhīn sarvauṣadhaṃ rohitaṃ carmānaḍuhaṃ kṛṣṇāyai śvetavatsāyai payo rathaṃ caṣālahomīyaṃ śākalān paridhīn iti
10.50.2	atha dvādaśe 'hny udita āditye pravargyopasadbhyāṃ pracarati
10.50.3	athopaniṣkramya saṃpraiṣam āha subrahmaṇya subrahmaṇyām āhvayārdhastanavrataṃ prayacchateti
10.50.4	āhvayati subrahmaṇyaḥ subrahmaṇyām
10.50.5	ardhastanavrataṃ prayacchati
10.50.6	athādatte pañcagṛhītam ājyaṃ dadhi madhumiśraṃ grumuṣṭim avakābhāram iti
10.50.7	etat samādāyādhidrutyākṣṇayā pañcagṛhītena svayamātṛṇṇāṃ vyāghārayati nṛṣade vaḍ apsuṣade vaḍ vanasade vaḍ barhiṣade vaṭ suvarvide vaḍ iti
10.50.8	etayaiva srucopaghātaṃ dadhnā madhumiśreṇa gandharvāhutīr juhoti
10.50.9	hetayo nāma stha teṣāṃ vaḥ puro gṛhā iti paścād āsīnaḥ pūrve bile juhoti
10.50.10	nilimpā nāma stha teṣāṃ vo dakṣiṇā gṛhā ity uttarata āsīno dakṣiṇe bile juhoti
10.50.11	vajriṇo nāma stha teṣāṃ vaḥ paścād gṛhā iti purastād āsīno 'pare bile juhoti
10.50.12	avasthāvāno nāma stha teṣāṃ va uttarād gṛhā iti dakṣiṇata āsīna uttare bile juhoti
10.50.13	athaitenaiva yathetam etya yatraiva prathamam ahauṣīt tad dve juhoty adhipatayo nāma stha kravyā nāma stheti
10.50.14	athāha pratiprasthātar imam agniṃ kūrmapṛṣantaṃ kurv iti
10.50.15	taṃ sa kūrmapṛṣantaṃ karoti
10.50.16	nāprokṣitam adhitiṣṭhati
10.50.17	atha grumuṣṭim ādāya dadhnā madhumiśreṇāvokṣati ye devā devānāṃ ye devā deveṣv adhi devatvam āyann iti
10.51.1	dvābhyāṃ purastāt tābhyāṃ dakṣiṇatas tābhyāṃ paścāt tābhyām uttarataḥ
10.51.2	anuparicāram avokṣatīti brāhmaṇam
10.51.3	athainam avakābhāreṇa praticchādya goptāraṃ samādiśyāvadrutyāparāhṇikībhyāṃ pravargyopasadbhyāṃ pracarati
10.51.4	athopaniṣkramya saṃpraiṣam āha subrahmaṇya subrahmaṇyām āhvayāgnīd vaiśvānaramārutān nirvapa pratiprasthātaḥ pravargyasyāvṛtā pravargyaṃ saṃsādayodvāsanāyeti
10.51.5	tredhaitat padaṃ kurvanti
10.51.6	gārhapatye tṛtīyam upayamanīṣu tṛtīyaṃ ni tṛtīyaṃ dadhāti
10.51.7	atha pravargyasyāvṛtā pravargyam udvāsyādhiśrayati vaiśvānaraṃ dvādaśakapālaṃ mārutāṃś ca saptakapālān
10.51.8	atha gārhapatya ājyaṃ vilāpyotpūya sruci caturgṛhītaṃ gṛhītvāhavanīye 'nīkavantaṃ juhoti
10.51.9	agnis tigmena śociṣety anudrutya sainānīkena suvidatro asma iti juhoti
10.51.10	aparaṃ caturgṛhītaṃ gṛhītvāhavanīya eva vaiśvakarmaṇāni juhoti
10.51.11	ya imā viśvā bhuvanāni juhvad ity anudrutya viśvakarmā hy ajaniṣṭa deva iti juhoti
10.51.12	aparaṃ caturgṛhītaṃ gṛhītvā cakṣuṣaḥ pitety anudrutya viśvakarman haviṣā vardhaneneti juhoti
10.51.13	nānaiva sūktābhyāṃ juhoti nānaiva sūktayor vīryaṃ dadhātīti brāhmaṇam
10.51.14	atha tisra audumbarīḥ samidha ādadhāty ud enam uttarāṃ nayendremaṃ pratarāṃ kṛdhi yasya kurmo havir gṛha iti
10.51.15	athābhyādadhātīdhmaṃ praṇayanīyam
10.51.16	upopayamanīḥ kalpayanti cātvālāt
10.51.17	atha saṃpraiṣam āhāgnaye praṇīyamānāyānubrūhy agnīd ekasphyayānusaṃdhehi dvitīyo hotāpratiratham anubravītv iti
10.51.18	pratipadyata eṣa dvitīyo hotāpratiratham āśuḥ śiśāna iti
10.51.19	daśarcaṃ bhavatīti brāhmaṇam
10.51.20	athaitenaiva sahāgninādadate pṛśnim aśmānam ājyaprokṣaṃ dadhnaḥ pūrṇām audumbarīṃ tisro nānāvṛkṣyā nānāvṛkṣyam idhmaṃ śākalān paridhīn iti
10.51.21	athainam udyacchata ud u tvā viśve devā iti
10.51.22	ṣaḍbhir haratīti brāhmaṇam
10.51.23	tāsāṃ dve parigṛhyavatī bhavataḥ
10.51.24	atha viṣuvatyāgnīdhrasya kāle pṛśnim aśmānaṃ nidadhāti vimāna eṣa diva ukṣā samudra iti dvābhyām
10.51.25	atha catasṛbhir ā pucchād etīndraṃ viśvā avīvṛdhann iti
10.51.26	dhārayanty etam agnim
10.51.27	athainaṃ saṃcitam ājyaprokṣeṇa prokṣati
10.52.1	vasavas tvā rudraiḥ purastāt pāntv iti purastāt pitaras tvā yamarājānaḥ pitṛbhir dakṣiṇataḥ pāntv iti dakṣiṇata ādityās tvā viśvair devaiḥ paścāt pāntv iti paścād dyutānas tvā māruto marudbhir uttarataḥ pātv ity uttarato devās tvendrajyeṣṭhā varuṇarājāno 'dhastāc copariṣṭāc ca pāntv ity upariṣṭāt
10.52.2	athaitenaiva sahāgninādhidravati prācīm anu pradiśaṃ prehi vidvān kramadhvam agninā nākam ukhyaṃ pṛthivyā aham ud antarikṣam āruhaṃ suvar yanto nāpekṣante 'gne prehi prathamo devayatām iti pañcabhiḥ
10.52.3	dhārayanty etam agnim
10.52.4	atha dadhnaḥ pūrṇām audumbarīṃ svayamātṛṇṇāyāṃ juhoti
10.52.5	naktoṣāseti puro'nuvākyām anūcyāgne sahasrākṣeti juhoti
10.52.6	atha pradakṣiṇam āvṛtyedhmaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati suparṇo 'si garutmān iti
10.52.7	tisṛbhiḥ sādayatīti brāhmaṇam
10.52.8	athainaṃ visrasyāhutiṣāhaṃ kṛtvādhvarāhutibhir abhijuhoty agnir yajñaṃ nayatu prajānan mainaṃ yajñahano vidan devebhyaḥ prabrūtād yajñaṃ prapra yajñapatiṃ tira svāhā vāyur yajñaṃ nayatu prajānan sūryo yajñaṃ nayatu prajānan yajño yajñaṃ nayatu prajānan mainaṃ yajñahano vidan devebhyaḥ prabrūtād yajñaṃ prapra yajñapatiṃ tira svāheti
10.52.9	athāvadrutyāgnivatyuttaraṃ parigrāhaṃ parigṛhya yoyupitvā tiryañcaṃ sphyaṃ stabdhvā saṃpraiṣam āha prokṣaṇīr āsādayedhmābarhir upasādayeti
10.52.10	athādhidrutya śākalān paridhīn paridhāya nānāvṛkṣyam idhmam abhyajya svāhākāreṇābhyādhāya tisro nānāvṛkṣyāḥ samidha ādadhāti preddho agne dīdihi puro na ity audumbarīṃ vidhema te parame janmann agna iti vaikaṅkatīṃ tāṃ savitur vareṇyasya citrām iti śamīmayīm
10.52.11	atha dve suvāhutī juhoti cittiṃ juhomy agne tam adyeti
10.52.12	atha sruci caturgṛhītaṃ gṛhītvājyasya pūrṇāṃ svucaṃ juhoti sapta te agne samidhaḥ sapta jihvā iti
10.52.13	atra juhvan manasā diśo dhyāyet
10.52.14	digbhya evainam avarunddhe
10.52.15	dadhnā purastāj juhoty ājyenopariṣṭāt
10.52.16	tejaś caivāsmā indriyaṃ ca samīcī dadhād iti brāhmaṇam
10.52.17	athātraiva tiṣṭhan yācati vaiśvānaraṃ dvādaśakapālaṃ mārutāṃś ca saptakapālān
10.52.18	athopastīrya sarvaśa eva vaiśvānaram avadadhad āhāgnaye vaiśvānarāyānubrūhīti
10.52.19	dvir abhighārayati
10.52.20	atyākramyāśrāvyāhāgniṃ vaiśvānaraṃ yajeti
10.52.21	vaṣatkṛte madhye juhoti
10.52.22	athainaṃ sruvāhutibhir abhijuhoti suvar na gharmaḥ svāheti pañcabhiḥ
10.52.23	atha mārutaiḥ pracarati
10.53.1	paryupastāraṃ darvihomākāram īdṛṅ cānyādṛṅ cety anudrutya śukrajyotiś ca citrajyotiś ceti juhoti
10.53.2	śukrajyotiś ca citrajyotiś cety anudrutya ṛtajic ca satyajic ceti juhoti
10.53.3	ṛtajic ca satyajic cety anudrutyartaś ca satyaś ceti juhoti
10.53.4	ṛtaś ca satyaś cety anudrutya yo 'raṇye 'nuvākyo gaṇas tam anudrutya juhoti
10.53.5	yo 'raṇye 'nuvākyo gaṇas tam anudrutyedṛkṣāsa etādṛkṣāsa iti juhoti
10.53.6	īdṛkṣāsa etādṛkṣāsa ity anudrutya mitāsaś ca saṃmitāsaś ca na iti juhoti
10.53.7	mitāsaś ca saṃmitāsaś ca na ity anudrutyedṛṅ cānyādṛṅ ceti juhoti
10.53.8	tān abhito vaiśvānaraṃ paricinoti
10.53.9	gaṇena gaṇam anudrutya juhoti
10.53.10	uccair vaiśvānarasyāśrāvayaty upāṃśu mārutāñ juhotīti brāhmaṇam
10.54.1	athaitaṃ prasekam agnāv āyātayati dakṣiṇato vodañcaṃ paścād vā prāñcam
10.54.2	tasya srug iva pūrvārdho bhavati
10.54.3	evam eva madhyam
10.54.4	camasa iva budhnaḥ
10.54.5	tasmiṃś catura upastṛṇāna āhāpramattaḥ saṃtatam ānaya vasordhārāṃ nigadiṣyāmīti
10.54.6	sa yatra dhārāgniṃ prāpnoti tat pratipadyate 'gnāviṣṇū sajoṣaseti sarvāmāntaṃ vasordhārām
10.54.7	atraitaṃ prasekam agnāv anupraharati
10.54.8	athainaṃ saṃsrāveṇābhijuhoti
10.54.9	atha yad ājyam ucchiṣyate tasmin brahmaudanaṃ pacati
10.54.10	taṃ brāhmaṇāś catvāraḥ prāśnanti
10.54.11	tebhyaś catasro dhenūr dadyād iti brāhmaṇam
10.54.12	athāsyaitat purastād evaudumbare droṇe sarvauṣadhaṃ dadhnājyena samudāyutaṃ bhavati
10.54.13	tasyaudumbareṇa sruveṇopadhātaṃ vājaprasavīyaṃ juhoti vājasyemaṃ prasavaḥ suṣuve agre vājo naḥ sapta pradiśa iti caturdaśa sruvāhutīḥ
10.54.14	abhiṣekāya prarekaṃ pariśinaṣṭi
10.54.15	athainam apidhāya prajñātaṃ nidadhāti
10.54.16	atha naktoṣāseti kṛṣṇāyai śvetavatsāyai payo juhoti
10.54.17	atha ṣaḍrāṣṭrabhṛto juhoty ṛtāṣāḍ ṛtadhāmeti
10.54.18	bhuvanasya pata iti rathamukhe pañcāhutīr juhoti
10.54.19	atha tisro ruco juhoti yās te agne sūrye ruco yā vo devāḥ sūrye ruco rucaṃ no dhehi brāhmaṇeṣv iti
10.54.20	atha pātryām ājyam ānīyāñjalinopaghātaṃ vātanāmāni juhoti samudro 'si nabhasvān ārdradānuḥ śaṃbhūr mayobhūr abhi mā vāhi svāhā māruto 'si marutāṃ gaṇaḥ śaṃbhūr mayobhūr abhi mā vāhi svāhāvasyur asi duvasvān śaṃbhūr mayobhūr abhi mā vāhi svāheti
10.54.21	vātam u haike juhvato manyante
10.54.22	atraitāñ chākalān paridhīn agnāv anupraharati
10.54.23	tad etac chākalāntam
10.55.1	atha sadohavirdhāne saṃminoti
10.55.2	sadohavirdhāne saṃmityādhvaradhiṣṇiyān nivapati
10.55.3	teṣūpary agnidhiṣṇiyān upadadhāti mamāgne varco vihaveṣv astv ity āgnīdhīya ekāṃ ca yājuṣīṃ sapta ca lokaṃpṛṇāḥ
10.55.4	atha hotur dhiṣṇiya ekāṃ caiva yājuṣīm ekādaśa ca lokaṃpṛṇāḥ
10.55.5	athetareṣv ekaikāṃ caiva yājuṣīṃ saptasapta ca lokaṃpṛṇāḥ
10.55.6	atha mārjālīya ekāṃ ca yājuṣīṃ pañca ca lokaṃpṛṇāḥ
10.55.7	athāgnīṣomau praṇayati
10.55.8	agnīṣomau praṇīya yūpasyāvṛtā yūpam ucchrayati
10.55.9	svarvantaṃ yūpam utsṛjyāgnīṣomīyaṃ paśum upākaroti
10.55.10	tasya prasiddhaṃ vapayā caritvā vapāśrapaṇī anuprahṛtya vasatīvarīr gṛhṇāti
10.55.11	atha paśupuroḍāśaṃ nirvapati
10.55.12	tam anuvartante 'ṣṭau devasuvāṃ havīṃṣy agnaye gṛhapataya ity etāni
10.55.13	tāni nānāvaghnanti
10.55.14	nānā śrapayanti
10.55.15	nānādhānyāni bhavanti
10.55.16	praiṣavāg paśupuroḍāśo 'nubrūhi yajetītareṣāṃ haviṣām
10.55.17	sa yatra vāruṇasyāvadyann āha varuṇāya dharmapataye 'nubrūhīti tad upabhṛti sviṣṭakṛte sarveṣāṃ sakṛtsakṛd uttarārdhād avadyati
10.55.18	dvir abhighārayati
10.55.19	na pratyanakti
10.55.20	atyākramyāśrāvyāha varuṇaṃ dharmapatiṃ yajeti
10.55.21	vaṣaṭkṛte juhoti
10.55.22	atha vai bhavati
10.55.23	iṣṭo varuṇo bhavaty aniṣṭaḥ sviṣṭakṛd athāsya brahmā hastaṃ gṛhṇātīti
10.55.24	sa yatreṣṭo varuṇo bhavaty aniṣṭaḥ sviṣṭakṛd athāsya brahmā hastaṃ gṛhṇāti
10.56.1	savitā tvā prasavānāṃ suvatām agnir gṛhapatīnāṃ somo vanaspatīnāṃ rudraḥ paśūnāṃ bṛhaspatir vācām indro jyeṣṭhānāṃ mitraḥ satyānāṃ varuṇo dharmapatīnām iti
10.56.2	etad eva sarvaṃ bhavati ye devā devasuva stha ta imam āmuṣyāyaṇam anamitrāya suvadhvaṃ mahate kṣatrāya mahata ādhipatyāya mahate jānarājyāyeti
10.56.3	athainaṃ yajamānāyatane tiṣṭhantaṃ prāhaiṣa vo 'mī rājeti yeṣāṃ śreṣṭhī bhavati
10.56.4	somo 'smākaṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ rājetītare pratyāhuḥ
10.56.5	atha bhūr bhuvaḥ suvar iti vācaṃ visṛjate
10.56.6	dvābhyāṃ mukhaṃ vimṛṣṭe prati tyan nāma rājyam adhāyi sarve vrātā varuṇasyābhūvann iti
10.56.7	gāyatrān viṣṇukramān kramate viṣṇoḥ kramo 'si viṣṇoḥ krāntam asi viṣṇor vikrāntam asīti
10.56.8	atha sviṣṭakṛtā carati
10.56.9	na raudrasyeḍām avadyati
10.56.10	apām enam abhyavaharanti gambhiṣṭham
10.56.11	iḍāntāḥ puroḍāśāḥ saṃtiṣṭhante
10.56.12	patnīsaṃyājāntaḥ paśuḥ
10.56.13	hṛdayaśūlānta ity eke
10.56.14	atha vasatīvarīḥ parihṛtya payāṃsi viśiṣyopavasanti
10.57.1	athāto mahārātra eva budhyante
10.57.2	samānaṃ karmā srucāṃ sādanāt
10.57.3	sādayitvā sruco 'gniṃ yogena yunakty agniṃ yunajmīmau te pakṣau cid asi samudrayonir iti tisṛbhiḥ
10.57.4	atha rājānam upāvahṛtya prātaranuvākam upākaroti
10.57.5	parihite prātaranuvāke 'po 'cchaiti
10.57.6	adbhir udaiti
10.57.7	yaḥ kratus tam upaiti
10.57.8	prasiddho 'bhiṣavaḥ
10.57.9	prasiddhaṃ grahā gṛhyante
10.57.10	samānaṃ karmāśvinād grahāt
10.57.11	āśvinaṃ grahaṃ gṛhītvaikādaśa raśanā ādāya yūpam abhyaiti
10.57.12	svarvantaṃ yūpam utsṛjyaikādaśinān paśūn upākaroty āgneyaṃ kṛṣṇagrīvaṃ sārasvatīṃ meṣīṃ babhruṃ saumyaṃ pauṣṇaṃ śyāmaṃ śitipṛṣṭhaṃ bārhaspatyaṃ śilpaṃ vaiśvadevam aindram aruṇaṃ mārutaṃ kalmāṣam aindrāgnaṃ saṃhitam adhorāmaṃ sāvitraṃ vāruṇaṃ petvam iti
10.57.13	teṣāṃ prasiddhaṃ vapābhiś caritvā prasarpanti prātaḥsavanāya
10.57.14	tad ṛjudhā saṃtiṣṭhate
10.57.15	prasarpanti mādhyaṃdināya savanāya
10.57.16	sa yatra kva ca madhyaṃdino bhavati tad etad dhiraṇyapātraṃ madhoḥ pūrayitvā sauryā citravatyāvekṣyāśvam avaghrāpya brahmaṇe dadāti
10.57.17	prasiddho 'bhiṣavaḥ
10.57.18	prasiddhaṃ grahā gṛhyante
10.57.19	samānaṃ karmā dākṣiṇebhyaḥ
10.57.20	dākṣiṇāni hutvā tribhir marutvatīyaiś carati
10.57.21	sīdanti nārāśaṃsā āpyāyitā dakṣiṇasya havirdhānasyāpālambam adho'dho māhendrāya
10.57.22	atha purastād abhiṣekasya ṣaṭ pārthāni juhoty agnaye svāhā somāya svāheti
10.57.23	atha yajamānāyatane kṛṣṇājinaṃ prācīnagrīvam uttaralomopastṛṇāti
10.57.24	tad yajamānaṃ prāñcam upaveśya suvarṇarajatābhyāṃ rukmābhyāṃ paryupāsya sarvauṣadhena purastāt pratyañcam abhiṣiñcati
10.57.25	śīrṣato 'bhiṣiñcaty ā mukhād anvavasrāvayati
10.58.1	devasya tvā savituḥ prasave 'śvinor bāhubhyāṃ pūṣṇo hastābhyāṃ sarasvatyai vāco yantur yantreṇāgnes tvā sāmrājyenābhiṣiñcāmīndrasya tvā sāmrājyenābhiṣiñcāmi bṛhaspates tvā sāmrājyenābhiṣiñcāmīti
10.58.2	samunmṛṣṭe samutkrośanty abhyaṣecy ayam asāv āmuṣyāyaṇo 'muṣya putro 'muṣya pautro 'muṣya naptāgnisaveneti
10.58.3	atha bhūr bhuvaḥ suvar iti vācaṃ visṛjate
10.58.4	dvābhyāṃ mukhaṃ vimṛṣṭe
10.58.5	gāyatrān viṣṇukramān kramate
10.58.6	athopariṣṭād abhiṣekasya ṣaṭ pārthāni juhoti
10.59.1	indrāya svāhā ghoṣāya svāheti
10.59.2	dvādaśa bhūtānām aveṣṭīr juhoti pṛthivyai svāhāntarikṣāya svāheti
10.59.3	ṛjudhā mādhyaṃdinaṃ savanaṃ saṃtiṣṭhate
10.59.4	prasarpanti tṛtīyasavanāya
10.59.5	prasiddham ādityagraheṇa caritvāgrayaṇaṃ gṛhṇāti
10.59.6	samānaṃ karmā pavamānāt
10.59.7	pavamānena caritvā sve dhāman paśubhiś carati
10.59.8	teṣāṃ nānā manotā nānā devatā nānā pratyabhimarśanā nānā vasāhomāḥ samāno vanaspatiḥ samānaḥ sviṣṭakṛt praiṣavān samānīḍā samānyo diśaḥ
10.59.9	nānā diśa ity eke
10.59.10	samānaṃ karmā yajñāyajñiyasya stotrāt
10.59.11	yajñāyajñiyasya stotra ekayāprastutaṃ bhavaty athāgnim abhimṛśati namas te astu mā mā hiṃsīr udno dattodadhiṃ bhintteti dvābhyām
10.59.12	samānaṃ karmā patnīsaṃyājebhyaḥ
10.59.13	patnīḥ saṃyājya prāṅ etya dhruvām āpyāyyādhvarikāṇi samiṣṭayajūṃṣi hutvā daśāgnikāny upajuhoti yad ākūtāt samasusrod iti
10.59.14	samānaṃ karmāvabhṛthāt
10.59.15	athaitasminn avabhṛthe dvitīyām avabhṛthāhutiṃ juhoti samudrāya vayunāya sindhūnāṃ pataye nama iti
10.59.16	prasiddho 'vabhṛthaḥ
10.59.17	udayanīyeṣṭyeṣṭvā maitrāvaruṇīṃ vaśām upākaroti
10.59.18	tasyai maitrāvaruṇyāmikṣādhyavadānīyā bhavati
10.59.19	sarvasaṃsthāṃ paśoḥ kurvanti
10.59.20	atha gārhapatya ājyaṃ vilāpyotpūya sruci caturgṛhītaṃ gṛhītvājyasya pūrṇāṃ srucam agner vimokaṃ juhotīmaṃ stanam ūrjasvantaṃ dhayāpām iti
10.59.21	athainam upatiṣṭhate ye 'gnayaḥ purīṣyā iti
10.59.22	athainam āptibhir upatiṣṭhata āpaṃ tvāgne manaseti navabhir anucchandasam
10.59.23	athodavasānīyayā yajate
10.59.24	atha devikāhavirbhir yajate
10.59.25	atha traidhātavīyayā yajate
10.59.26	atha sautrāmaṇyā yajate
10.59.27	saṃvatsaraṃ na kaṃcana pratyavarohati
10.59.28	na śīrṣamāṃsaṃ khādati na vayasāṃ māṃsam
10.59.29	nāgniṃ citvā rāmām upeyān nāgnicid varṣati dhāvet
10.59.30	yadi dhāved upāvarteta
10.59.31	annādyam evābhyupāvartata iti brāhmaṇam
11.1.1	vājapeyena yakṣyamāṇo bhavati
11.1.2	sa upakalpayate kṛṣṇājinaṃ suvarṇarajatau ca rukmau bastājinaṃ śatamānaṃ hiraṇyaṃ saptadaśa suvarṇāni kṛṣṇalāni hiraṇyapātraṃ madhoḥ pūrṇam audumbaraṃ rathacakraṃ saptadaśāraṃ saptadaśaphalakāṃ ca śritiṃ yūpaṃ ca tūparaṃ caturaśriṃ saptadaśāratniṃ godhūmakalāpīm uṣṇīṣaṃ naivāraṃ saptadaśaśarāvaṃ saptadaśoṣapuṭān saptadaśa vāyavyāni saptadaśa pṛthubudhnān upayāmān sataṃ ca vālaṃ ca saptadaśa niṣkān saptadaśa vasanāni saptadaśa vāsobhārān saptadaśa rathān saptadaśa dundubhīn saptadaśa hastinaḥ saptadaśa dāsyaḥ saptadaśānāṃsi yuktāni saptadaśa gavāṃ śatāni vayasovayaso vā saptadaśa sahasraṃ vā
11.1.3	tasmin hi sarvāṇi vayāṃsi bhavanti
11.1.4	caturviṃśatiṃ paśūn ekapañcāśatam aśvān khādirīṃ vitṛṇṇīṃ vadhrair vyūtām
11.1.5	prajñātā āgniṣṭomikāḥ sambhārāḥ
11.1.6	sa grīṣmasya jaghanyāhaḥsu purastād āṣāḍhyai paurṇamāsyai dīkṣate
11.1.7	tasya trayodaśa dīkṣās tisra upasadaḥ saptadaśyāṃ prasutaḥ
11.1.8	api vā saptadaśa dīkṣās tisra upasada ekaviṃśatyāṃ prasutaḥ
11.1.9	api vā tisra eva dīkṣās tisra upasadaḥ saptamyāṃ prasutaḥ
11.2.1	atha vai bhavati
11.2.2	sāvitraṃ juhoti karmaṇaḥkarmaṇaḥ purastād iti
11.2.3	dīkṣaṇīyāṃ nirvapsyan sāvitraṃ juhoti deva savitaḥ prasuva yajñaṃ prasuva yajñapatiṃ bhagāya divyo gandharvaḥ ketapūḥ ketaṃ naḥ punātu vācaspatir vācam adya svadāti naḥ svāheti
11.2.4	dīkṣāhutīr hoṣyan sāvitraṃ juhoti
11.2.5	prāyaṇīyāṃ nirvapsyan sāvitraṃ juhoti
11.2.6	antarhiraṇyāṃ hoṣyan sāvitraṃ juhoti
11.2.7	padena carati
11.2.8	padena caritvā rājānaṃ krītvohyātithyaṃ nirvapsyan sāvitraṃ juhoti
11.2.9	prathamābhyāṃ pravargyopasadbhyāṃ pracariṣyan sāvitraṃ juhoti
11.2.10	etasmin kāle pratiprasthātā dakṣiṇe śālākhaṇḍe 'vaṭaṃ khānayitvā vājapeyasurāṃ saṃdhāpayati
11.2.11	mahāvedyai pūrvaṃ parigrāhaṃ parigrahīṣyan sāvitraṃ juhoti
11.2.12	āhavanīyaṃ praṇeṣyan sāvitraṃ juhoti
11.2.13	rathavāhane sadohavirdhāne saṃmeṣyan sāvitraṃ juhoti
11.2.14	agnīṣomau praṇeṣyan sāvitraṃ juhoti
11.2.15	iti daśāntaḥśālam ahauṣīt
11.2.16	athāta āgnīdhra eva hoṣyati
11.2.17	yūpam ucchrayiṣyan sāvitraṃ juhoti
11.2.18	yadādhvaryuś ca yajamānaś ca purastāt pratyañcāv añjantāv abhisarpato 'tha pratiprasthātā paścāt prāṅ vāsobhir veṣṭayann abhisarpaty udīcīnadaśair vā vigrathnāti dhanurveṣṭīr vā praveṣṭayati
11.2.19	etasmin kāle pratiprasthātā godhūmakalāpīm ubhayataḥ samāṃ kṛtvoṣṇīṣeṇa vigrathnāti
11.2.20	tasyāṃ tac ceṣṭanti yac caṣāle
11.2.21	svarvantaṃ yūpam utsṛjyāgnīṣomīyaṃ paśum upākariṣyam sāvitraṃ juhoti
11.2.22	tasya prasiddhaṃ vapayā caritvā vasatīvarīr grahīṣyan sāvitraṃ juhoti
11.2.23	paśupuroḍāśaṃ nirvapsyan sāvitram juhoti
11.2.24	anusavanaṃ trīṇi
11.2.25	tāni saptadaśa
11.2.26	api vā savanesavana eva juhuyād ity etad aparam
11.2.27	atha paśupuroḍāśaṃ nirvapati
11.2.28	tam anuvartante 'ṣṭau devasuvāṃ havīṃṣy agnaye gṛhapataya ity etāni
11.2.29	teṣām uktaṃ caraṇaṃ yathāgner vidhāyām
11.2.30	iḍāntāḥ puroḍāśāḥ saṃtiṣṭhante
11.2.31	patnīsaṃyājāntaḥ paśuḥ
11.2.32	hṛdayaśūlānta ity eke
11.2.33	atraitān dundubhīn anudiśam āsañjayati pañca dakṣiṇāyāṃ śroṇyāṃ pañcottarasyāṃ caturo dakṣiṇe 'ṃse trīn uttare 'ṃse tathā hāsmai digbhayo vācam avarundhata iti ha smāha baudhāyanaḥ
11.2.34	agreṇāgnīdhraṃ gulmakṛtā āsaktāḥ syur ity āñjīgaviḥ
11.2.35	abhitaḥ sada iti kātyaḥ
11.2.36	atha vasatīvarīḥ parihṛtya payāṃsi viśiṣyopavasanti
11.3.1	athāto mahārātra eva budhyante
11.3.2	prātar ājyāni gṛhītvā rājānam upāvahṛtya prātaranuvākam upākaroti
11.3.3	parihite prātaranuvāke 'po 'cchaiti
11.3.4	apo hādhvaryur abhidravati
11.3.5	etasmin kāle pratiprasthātā vājapeyasurāṃ saṃpavayya saśastrām ādāya dakṣiṇayā dvāropanirhṛtya dakṣiṇena sadaḥ parītya dakṣiṇena mārjālīyaṃ dhiṣṇiyaṃ paryāhṛtyāparayā dvārayā havirdhānaṃ prapādya dakṣiṇasya havirdhānasya paścād akṣam upasādayati
11.3.6	athādhvaryur adbhir udaiti
11.3.7	sarvān kratūn upaiti
11.3.8	prasiddho 'bhiṣavaḥ
11.3.9	prasiddhaṃ grahā gṛhyante
11.3.10	samānaṃ karmāgrayaṇād grahāt
11.3.11	āgrayaṇaṃ gṛhītvā pañcaindrān atigrāhyān gṛhṇāti
11.3.12	upayāmagṛhīto 'si nṛṣadaṃ tvā druṣadam ity etābhiḥ pañcabhiḥ
11.3.13	athainān dakṣiṇārdhapūrvārdhe kharasya gulmakṛtān sādayati
11.3.14	yāvad evātrādhvaryuś ceṣṭati tāvad eṣa pratiprasthātā sata udīcīnadaśena vālena surāṃ punāti punātu te parisrutaṃ somaṃ sūryasya duhitā / vāreṇa śaśvatā taneti
11.3.15	vāyavyam evādhvaryur ādatta upayāmaṃ pratiprasthātā
11.3.16	adhvaryuḥ pūrvo vāyavyena droṇakalaśāt somagrahān gṛhṇāty ayā viṣṭhā janayan karvarāṇīty anudrutyopayāmagṛhīto 'si prajāpataye tvā juṣṭaṃ gṛhṇāmīti
11.3.17	parimṛjya sādayaty eṣa te yoniḥ prajāpataye tveti
11.3.18	atha pratiprasthātopayāmena satāt surāgrahān gṛhṇāti kuvid aṅga yavamanta ity anudrutyopayāmagṛhīto 'si prajāpataye tveti gṛhṇāti
11.3.19	prajāpataye tveti sādayati
11.3.20	naiva juṣṭaṃ karoti na yonim
11.3.21	tāv evam eva vyatiṣaṅgaṃ grahān gṛhṇītaḥ saptadaśetaraḥ saptadaśetaraḥ
11.3.22	puro 'kṣam evādhvaryuḥ somagrahān dviśreṇi vā triśreṇi vodīca āyātayati
11.3.23	paścād akṣaṃ pratiprasthātā surāgrahān dviśreṇi vā traśreṇi vodīca āyātayati
11.3.24	atha ṣoḍaśinaṃ gṛhṇāty ātiṣṭha vṛtrahan ratham ity anudrutyopayāmagṛhīto 'sīndrāya tvā ṣoḍaśine juṣṭaṃ gṛhṇāmīti
11.3.25	parimṛjya sādayaty eṣa te yonir indrāya tvā ṣoḍaśina iti
11.3.26	athokthyaṃ gṛhṇāti
11.3.27	samānaṃ karmāśvinād grahāt
11.3.28	āśvinaṃ grahaṃ gṛhītvā ṣaḍ raśanā ādāya yūpam abhyaiti
11.3.29	svarvantaṃ yūpam utsṛjyāthaitān paśūn upākaroty āgneyam aindrāgnam aindraṃ mārutīṃ govaśāṃ saptadaśa prājāpatyān chyāmān ekarūpān sārasvatīm antataḥ
11.3.30	atha nirmanthyasyāvṛtā nirmanthyena carati
11.3.31	prahatyābhihutyāthaitān nānādevatyān paśūn pṛthag dviguṇābhir abhidhāya pṛthak triguṇāsu niyunakti
11.3.32	athaitān samānadevatyān paśūn pṛthag dviguṇābhir abhidhāyaikasyāṃ yūpyāyām niyunakty api vā paśau paśuṃ prasajati
11.3.33	sārasvatīm antato niyujyāthainān prokṣya nipāyyopokṣyodūhya prokṣaṇīdhānam
11.4.1	athedhmāt samidham ādadāna āhāgnaye samidhyamānāyānubrūhīti
11.4.2	abhyādadhātīdhmam
11.4.3	pari samidhaṃ śinaṣṭi
11.4.4	vedenopavājayati
11.4.5	anūktāsu sāmidhenīṣu sruveṇāghāram āghārayati
11.4.6	saṃmṛṣṭe srugbhyām uttaram
11.4.7	athāsaṃsparśayan srucāv udaṅṅ atyākramya juhvā paśūn samajya sādayitvā srucau pravaraṃ pravṛṇīte
11.4.8	prasiddham ṛtvijo vṛṇīte
11.4.9	sīdati hotā
11.4.10	prasavam ākāṅkṣati
11.4.11	prasūtaḥ srucāv ādāyātyākramyāśrāvyāha samidbhyaḥ preṣyeti
11.4.12	vaṣaṭkṛte juhoti preṣya preṣyeti
11.4.13	catruthāṣṭamayoḥ samānayamāno 'ṣṭame sarvaṃ samānayate
11.4.14	pari svāhākṛtībhyaḥ saṃsrāvaṃ śinaṣṭi
11.4.15	daśa prayājān iṣṭvodaṅṅ atyākramya svaruśāsaiḥ paśūn samanakti
11.4.16	ta ete nānādevatyāḥ paśavo nānāsvaravo nānāśāsāḥ
11.4.17	athaite samānadevatyāḥ paśavaḥ samānasvaravo nānāśāsāḥ
11.4.18	samānaṃ karmā paryagnikaraṇāt
11.4.19	atha paryagnikṛtaiḥ paśubhir udañcaḥ pratipadyante
11.4.20	teṣāṃ sārasvaty uttarārdhyā bhavati
11.4.21	āgneya upacārataḥ
11.4.22	āgneyam evādhvaryur vapāśrapaṇībhyām anvārabhate
11.4.23	pṛthag itarān parikarmiṇa udañco nayanty anupūrvam avyatiṣajantaḥ
11.4.24	āgneyāyaivādhvaryuḥ paśave nihanyamānāya barhir upāsyati pṛthag itarebhyaḥ
11.4.25	tata itarān prāco vodīco vā nighnanty akṛṇvato māyūn saṃjñapayatety uktvaitenaiva yathetam etya pṛṣadājyāvakāśa āsata iha prajā viśvarūpā ramantām asmin yajñe viśvavido ghṛtācīḥ / agniṃ kulāyam abhisaṃvasānā asmāṃ avantu payasā ghṛteneti
11.4.26	saṃjñaptān prāhur
11.4.27	juhoti saṃjñaptāhutiṃ yat paśavo māyūn akṛṣateti
11.4.28	athābhyaiti śamitāra upetaneti
11.4.29	pāśebhyaḥ paśūn pramucyamānān anumantrayate 'ditiḥ pāśān pramumoktv etān iti
11.4.30	pṛthag aviśākhābhir upasajyemāṃ diśaṃ nirasyaty arātīyantam adharaṃ kṛṇomi yaṃ dviṣmas tasmin pratimuñcāmi pāśān iti
11.5.1	atha pratiprasthātā patnīm udānayaty udakamaṇḍalum utthāpya
11.5.2	sānupūrvaṃ paśūnāṃ prāṇān āpyāyayati
11.5.3	anvag adhvaryur vapā utkhidann eti
11.5.4	āgneyasyaivādhvaryur vapayā prathamayā pratipadyate 'nūcīr itarā āharanti
11.5.5	āgneyasyaiva vapāyai pratitapyamānāyai barhiṣo 'gram upāsyaty upetarā yacchanti
11.5.6	āgneyasyaiva vapāṃ sruvāhutyābhijuhoty upetarā yacchanti
11.5.7	atha svāhākṛtipraiṣeṇa caritvā saṃsrāveṇa pṛṣadājyam abhighāryāgneyasyaiva vapām abhighārayaty upetarā yacchanti
11.5.8	atha purastātsvāhākṛtiṃ sruvāhutiṃ hutvāthaiteṣāṃ nānādevatyānāṃ paśūnām anubrūhi preṣyeti vapābhiś carati
11.5.9	athaiteṣāṃ samānadevatyānāṃ paśūnāṃ mukhyasya vapāṃ samavalumpann āha prajāpataya ity upāṃśu chāgānāṃ vapānāṃ medaso 'vadīyamānasyānubrūhīty uccair yāvatīḥ sruk saṃbhavati
11.5.10	athetarāḥ pātryā veḍasūnena vopodyacchante
11.5.11	dvir abhighārayati
11.5.12	atyākramyāśrāvyāha prajāpataya ity upāṃśu chāgānāṃ vapā medaḥ prasthitaṃ preṣyety uccaiḥ
11.5.13	vaṣaṭkṛte vapā juhoty upāṃśu sārasvatyai vapayā carati
11.5.14	athopariṣṭātsvāhākṛtiṃ sruvāhutiṃ hutvā vapāśrapaṇīr anuprahṛtya samutkramya cātvāle mārjayante
11.5.15	atha paśūn viśāsti śamitar ity āha yan mārutyā anavadānīyaṃ tad abhyardhāc chrapayatād iti
11.5.16	atha sāvitraṃ hutvā prasarpanti prātaḥsavanāya
11.5.17	tad ṛjudhā saṃtiṣṭhate
11.6.1	atha sāvitraṃ hutvā prasarpanti mādhyaṃdināya savanāya devī dvārāv iti
11.6.2	ata evordhvena saṃprasṛptān viditvādhvaryuḥ prāṅ āyann āha cātvāle rathacakraṃ niminuta rathavāhane ratham ādhattāśvān palpūlayata yad dāsyann asi tad dakṣiṇata upasthāpayābhiṣotāra eta hvayata grāvastutam ehi yajamāneti
11.6.3	prasiddho 'bhiṣavaḥ
11.6.4	prasiddhaṃ grahā gṛhyante
11.6.5	samānaṃ karmāgrayaṇād grahāt
11.6.6	āgrayaṇaṃ gṛhītvā ṣoḍaśinam abhigṛhṇātīndram id dharī vahata ity anudrutyopayāmagṛhīto 'sīndrāya tvā ṣoḍaśine juṣṭaṃ gṛhṇāmīti
11.6.7	parimṛjya sādayaty eṣa te yonir indrāya tvā ṣoḍaśina iti
11.6.8	athokthyaṃ gṛhṇāti
11.6.9	samānaṃ karmā dākṣiṇebhyaḥ
11.6.10	dākṣiṇāni hoṣyan yācaty ājyasthālīṃ sasruvāṃ srucaṃ vāsaḥ
11.6.11	tasyaitasya vasanasyāntamāyāṃ daśāyāṃ niṣkarajjuḥ pragrathitā bhavati
11.6.12	etat samādāyāhaihi yajamāneti
11.6.13	uttareṇāgnīdhrīyaṃ parītyottareṇa sadaḥ parītyāgreṇa śālāṃ tiṣṭhate pratiprasthātra etāni śastrāṇi prayacchati
11.6.14	athāhaihi yajamāneti
11.6.15	ratha eṣa dakṣiṇe śroṇyante rathavāhana āhito bhavati
11.6.16	tam upāvaharatīndrasya vajro 'si vārtraghnas tvayāyaṃ vṛtraṃ vadhyād iti
11.6.17	athainaṃ dhūrgṛhītam antarvedy abhyavavartayanti vājasya nu prasave mātaraṃ mahīm aditiṃ nāma vacasā karāmahe yasyām idaṃ viśvaṃ bhuvanam āviveśa tasyāṃ no devaḥ savitā dharma sāviṣad iti
11.6.18	athāpsv aśvān palpūlayaty apsv antar amṛtam apsu bheṣajam apām uta praśastiṣv aśvā bhavatha vājina iti
11.6.19	atha dakṣiṇaṃ yogyaṃ yunakti vāyur vā tvā manur vā tvā gandharvāḥ saptaviṃśatiḥ / te agre aśvam āyuñjan te asmiñ javam ādadhur iti
11.6.20	athāsya pṛṣṭhaṃ marmṛjyate 'pāṃ napād āśuheman ya ūrmiḥ kakudmān pratūrtir vājasātamas tenāyaṃ vājaṃ sed iti
11.6.21	evam evottaraṃ yogyaṃ yunakti tasyaivam evottarataḥ praṣṭim upaniyunakti tayor evam eva pṛṣṭhe marmṛjyate
11.6.22	etasya yogam anu sarvam āṇivad yujyate
11.6.23	adhikakṣyān hastinaḥ kurvanti
11.6.24	praveṣṭayanti vāsobhārān
11.6.25	vasanānāṃ daśāsu niṣkarajjūḥ pragrathnanti
11.6.26	pūgaśo dakṣiṇā āyātayati
11.6.27	atha saurībhyām ṛgbhyāṃ gārhapatye juhoti
11.6.28	nayavatyarcāgnīdhre juhoti
11.6.29	sṛjyante dakṣiṇā dakṣiṇāpathena
11.6.30	sa yat kiṃcid dadāti hiraṇyamukham eva dadāti
11.6.31	atha vāsāṃsy anāṃsi yuktāni goaśvaṃ hastipuruṣam antataḥ
11.6.32	adattā evaite rathā ativartante
11.6.33	naite 'nyasya santa ājiṃ dhāvanti
11.6.34	manasaiva svaratham adhvaryave dadāti manasā samanudiśya dakṣiṇāḥ
11.6.35	tribhir marutvatīyaiś carati
11.6.36	sīdanti nārāśaṃsā āpyāyitā dakṣiṇasya havirdhānasyāpālambam adho'dho māhendrāya
11.7.1	atha yācati naivāraṃ saptadaśaśarāvam
11.7.2	sa eṣa kṣīre śṛto bhavati
11.7.3	tena carati bṛhaspataye 'nubrūhi bṛhaspatiṃ yajeti
11.7.4	tam aniṣṭasviṣṭakṛtam apidhāya prajñātaṃ nidadhāti
11.7.5	athāsyaitat purastād evaudumbare droṇe sarvauṣadhaṃ dadhnājyena samudāyutaṃ bhavati
11.7.6	tasyaudumbareṇa sruveṇopaghātaṃ saptānnahomāñ juhoti vājasyemaṃ prasavaḥ suṣuve agra iti
11.7.7	abhiṣekāya prarekaṃ pariśinaṣṭi
11.7.8	athainam apidhāya prajñātaṃ nidadhāti
11.7.9	atha purastād abhiṣekasya ṣaṭ pārthāni juhoty agnaye svāhā somāya svāheti
11.7.10	atha yajamānāyatane kṛṣṇājinaṃ prācīnagrīvam uttaralomopastṛṇāti
11.7.11	tad yajamānaṃ prāñcam upaveśya suvarṇarajatābhyāṃ rukmābhyāṃ paryupāsya sarvauṣadhena purastāt pratyañcam abhiṣiñcati
11.7.12	śīrṣato 'bhiṣiñcaty ā mukhād anvavasrāvayati devasya tvā savituḥ prasave 'śvinor bāhubhyāṃ pūṣṇo hastābhyāṃ sarasvatyai vāco yantur yantreṇāgnes tvā sāmrājyenābhiṣiñcāmīndrasya tvā sāmrājyenābhiṣiñcāmi bṛhaspates tvā sāmrājyenābhiṣiñcāmīti
11.7.13	samunmṛṣṭe samutkrośanty abhyaṣecy ayam asāv āmuṣyāyaṇo 'muṣya putro 'muṣya pautro 'muṣya naptā vājapeyeneti
11.7.14	atha bhūr bhuvaḥ suvar iti vācaṃ visṛjate
11.7.15	dvābhyāṃ mukhaṃ vimṛṣṭe
11.7.16	gāyatrān viṣṇukramān kramate
11.7.17	athopariṣṭād abhiṣekasya ṣaṭ pārthāni juhotīndrāya svāhā ghoṣāya svāheti
11.7.18	dvādaśa bhūtānām aveṣṭīr juhoti pṛthivyai svāhāntarikṣāya svāheti
11.7.19	atraitasya bārhaspatyasya sviṣṭakṛtā carati
11.7.20	athainam ādāyāntareṇa cātvālotkarāv undaṅṅ upaniṣkrāmati
11.7.21	uttarata ete rathā yuktās tiṣṭhanti
11.7.22	tad etān yajuryujo 'śvān avaghrāpayati vājino vājajito vājaṃ sariṣyanto vājaṃ jeṣyanto bṛhaspater bhāgam avajighrateti
11.7.23	athainam apidhāya prajñātaṃ nidadhāti
11.7.24	atha ratham abhipraiti viṣṇoḥ kramo 'si viṣṇoḥ krāntam asi viṣṇor vikrāntam asīti
11.7.25	atha rathasya pakṣasī saṃmṛśaty aṅkau nyaṅkāv abhito rathaṃ yāv iti
11.7.26	ratham ātiṣṭhati devasyāhaṃ savituḥ prasave bṛhaspatinā vājajitā vājaṃ jeṣam iti
11.7.27	etasmin kāle rathacakraṃ nimitaṃ brahmārohati
11.7.28	tam ata evānumantrayate devasyāhaṃ savituḥ prasave bṛhaspatinā vājajitā varṣiṣṭhaṃ nākaṃ ruheyam iti
11.7.29	atha yajamānam anvāsthāyojjitīr vācayaty agnir ekākṣareṇa vācam udajayad iti saptadaśa
11.7.30	athāsmā aśvājanīṃ prayacchaty aśvājani vājini vājeṣu vājinīvaty aśvānt samatsu vājayeti
11.7.31	tayā yathāyuktam aśvān kṣipati
11.7.32	arvāsīti dakṣiṇam
11.7.33	saptir asīti madhyamam
11.7.34	vājy asīty uttaram
11.7.35	athaitān ājisṛto 'vakhyāpayati vājino vājaṃ dhāvata marutāṃ prasave jayata vi yojanā mimīdhvam adhvana skabhnīta kāṣṭhāṃ gacchateti
11.7.36	audumbary eṣā sthūṇā saptadaśasu śamyāpravyādheṣu nimitā
11.7.37	tāṃ kāṣṭhety ācakṣate tām ājisṛto 'tītya mā gacchata mo enām aprāpya nivṛtatāntaḥpakṣasam enāṃ kṛtvā savyān avagṛhya dakṣiṇair anuparivartayādhvai mo aprasūtāḥ sarpateti
11.8.1	athāhābhisarpa yajamāna māhendraṃ grahaṃ grahīṣyāmīti
11.8.2	anvārabdhe yajamāne māhendraṃ grahaṃ gṛhṇāti mahāṃ indro ya ojasety anudrutyopayāmagṛhīto 'si mahendrāya tvā juṣṭaṃ gṛhṇāmīti
11.8.3	parimṛjya sādayaty eṣa te yonir mahendrāya tveti
11.8.4	tad etān pañcaindrān atigrāhyān saha saṃsādayati
11.8.5	athāpa upaspṛśya barhiṣī ādāya vācaṃyamaḥ pratyaṅ drutvā stotram upākaroti
11.8.6	stuvate māhendrāya
11.8.7	prastute sāmni saṃpraiṣam āha brahman vājināṃ sāma gāyājisṛta ājiṃ dhāvata dundubhīn samāghnatābhiṣotāro 'bhiṣuṇutāgnīd āśiraṃ vinayolūkhalam udvādaya pratiprasthātar vāruṇam ekakapālaṃ nirvapa saumyasya viddhīti
11.8.8	yathāsaṃpraiṣaṃ te kurvanti
11.8.9	gāyati brahmā vājināṃ sāma
11.8.10	taṃ ya eva kaśca parikarmy āveṣṭayati
11.8.11	dhāvanty ājisṛtaḥ
11.8.12	āghnanti dundubhīn
11.8.13	saṃpravadanti vācaḥ
11.8.14	saṃproditā vāco 'numantrayata indrāya vācaṃ vadatendraṃ vājaṃ jāpayatendro vājam ajayid iti
11.8.15	atha rathān dhāvato 'numantrayate vājevāje 'vata vājino na iti catasṛbhir anucchandasam
11.8.16	śāmyanti ghoṣāḥ śastrāya
11.8.17	hotra eṣottameti prāhuḥ
11.8.18	hotuḥ kālāt parāṅ āvartate 'dhvaryuḥ
11.8.19	abhy enam āhvayate hotā
11.8.20	pratyāhvayate 'dhvaryuḥ
11.8.21	śaṃsati
11.8.22	pratigṛṇāti
11.8.23	prasiddham ukthaṃ pratigīrya prāṅ etyodyacchata etaṃ māhendraṃ graham
11.8.24	anūdyacchanta itarān
11.8.25	upodyacchante nārāśaṃsān
11.8.26	athāśrāvayaty o śrāvayāstu śrauṣaḍ ukthaśā yaja somasyeti
11.8.27	vaṣaṭkṛte juhoti
11.8.28	tad etān pañcaindrān atigrāhyān saha juhvati
11.8.29	vaṣaṭkṛtānuvāṣaṭkṛte dvir juhoti
11.8.30	tathaiva dvirdvir nārāśaṃsān anuprakampayanti
11.8.31	dvirhuto māhendraḥ pariśete
11.8.32	āyanti rathāḥ
11.8.33	āgatān rathān dṛṣṭvā yācaty ājyasthālīṃ sasruvām
11.8.34	sa yady asmai rathabhreṣam ācakṣata āgnīdhra etāṃ juhoty uta smāsya dravatas turaṇyata ity ubhayenaiva
11.8.35	rathavimocanīyaṃ juhoty ā mā vājasya prasavo jagamyād iti
11.9.1	atha yācati naivāraṃ saptadaśaśarāvaṃ saptadaśa suvarṇāni kṛṣṇalāni hiraṇyapātraṃ madhoḥ pūrṇam iti
11.9.2	etat samādāyāntareṇa cātvālotkarāv udaṅṅ upaniṣkrāmati
11.9.3	uttarata ete rathā yuktās tiṣṭhanti
11.9.4	tad etān yajuryujo 'śvān avaghrāpayati vājino vājajito vājaṃ sasṛvāṃso vājaṃ jigivāṃso bṛhaspater bhāge nimṛḍḍhvam iti
11.9.5	athainam apidhāya prajñātaṃ nidadhāti
11.9.6	atha rathān vimucyamānān anumantrayata iyaṃ vaḥ sā satyā saṃdhābhūd yām indreṇa samadhaddhvam iti
11.9.7	dundubhīn avasyato 'numantrayate 'jījipata vanaspataya indraṃ vājaṃ vimucyadhvam iti
11.9.8	tad etaṃ yajuryujaṃ rathaṃ vimuñcati yathādattam itarān vyāvartayanti
11.9.9	upasaṃgacchanta enam eta ājisṛtaḥ
11.9.10	tebhya ekaikaṃ kṛṣṇalaṃ vyutprayacchati
11.9.11	tāni sārdhaṃ samādāya hiraṇyapātraṃ madhoḥ pūrṇam ity ekadhā brahmaṇa upaharati
11.10.1	tad brahmā pratigṛhyopāvarohati
11.10.2	athāhājisṛto dakṣiṇāpathenopātītya dakṣiṇāṃ śroṇim abhiniśrayadhvaṃ mārutā agreṇāhavanīyaṃ parītya dakṣiṇam aṃsam upasaṃśrayadhvam iti
11.10.3	tad enān vimitābhyām abhivighnanti
11.10.4	athāhaihi yajamāneti
11.10.5	pūrvayā dvārā havirdhānaṃ prapādya yajamānaṃ somagrahān upasthāpayati
11.11.1	saṃpṛca stha saṃ mā bhadreṇa pṛṅkteti
11.11.2	vipṛca stha vi mā pāpmanā pṛṅkteti surāgrahān
11.11.3	athaitāṃ surāṃ saprarekām ādāyaitāṃś ca surāgrahān ājisṛdbhya upaharanti
11.11.4	tāṃ te pibanto ramamāṇā mahīyamānā āsate
11.11.5	atra yan mārutyā anavadānīyaṃ tad ubhayān antareṇa parṇaśākhāsu nyasyati
11.11.6	tat samutkruśya vimāthīkurvate
11.11.7	atha yācaty ājyasthālīṃ sasruvāṃ tārpyaṃ darbhamayam iti
11.11.8	etat samādāyāhaihi yajamāneti
11.11.9	anvag yajamāno 'nūcī patnī
11.11.10	āhavanīye juhoty anvārabdhe yajamāne vājaś ca prasavaś ceti dvādaśa sruvāhutīḥ
11.11.11	atha yajamānaṃ tārpyaṃ paridhāpayati kṣatrasyolbam asīti
11.11.12	kṣatrasya yonir asīti darbhamayaṃ patnīm
11.11.13	athaitāṃ śritiṃ yajamānāyatanāt prācīṃ vodīcīṃ vā yūpam abhyāyātayati
11.11.14	atha jāyām āmantrayate jāya ehi suvo rohāveti
11.11.15	rohāva hi suvar itītarā pratyāha
11.11.16	ahaṃ nāv ubhayoḥ suvo rokṣyāmīti yajamānaḥ
11.11.17	tvaṃ nāv ubhayoḥ suvo roheti patnī
11.11.18	tāṃ daśabhiḥ kalpai rohaty āyur yajñena kalpatām iti
11.11.19	āntaṃ gatvā bāhū udgṛhṇāti suvar devāṃ aganmāmṛtā abhūma prajāpateḥ prajā abhūmeti
11.11.20	athemaṃ lokaṃ pratyavekṣate sam ahaṃ prajayā saṃ mayā prajā sam ahaṃ rāyaspoṣeṇa saṃ mayā rāyaspoṣa iti
11.11.21	athainām upāvarohati sa yāvati manyata etāvati modāpsyantīti
11.11.22	tad enam āsapuṭair ghnanti
11.12.1	annāya tveti purastād adhvaryur annādyāya tveti dakṣiṇato brahmā vājāya tveti paścād dhotā vājajityāyai tvety udgātottarataḥ
11.12.2	yady u vā ete na kāmayante 'dhvaryur eva purastād dhanti dakṣiṇataḥ pratiprasthātā paścād āgnīdhra unnetottarataḥ
11.12.3	teṣāṃ tathā vibhāgo yathā dundubhīnām
11.12.4	atrāsmai pratyavarohaṇata āsandīṃ nidadhāti
11.12.5	tasyāṃ bastājinam āstṛṇāti bastājine śatamānaṃ hiraṇyam
11.12.6	atha dakṣiṇaṃ pādaṃ hiraṇya upāvarohaty amṛtam asīti
11.12.7	puṣṭir asi prajananam asīti savyaṃ bastājine
11.12.8	athainam etayāsandyā sada āvahanti
11.12.9	ā vā vrajati
11.12.10	anvāyanty enam ete camasāḥ
11.12.11	atraitasya bārhaspatyasyeḍām upahvayate
11.12.12	iḍopahūtaṃ māhendraṃ hotā caivādhvaryuś ca saṃbhakṣayato narāśaṃsapītena nārāśaṃsān
11.12.13	atraiteṣām atigrāhyāṇāṃ mukhye pātre saṃsrāvān samavanīya yajamāna eva pratyakṣaṃ bhakṣayati
11.12.14	api vainān sarvaśa eva camaseṣu vyavanīya bhakṣayeyur ity etad aparam
11.12.15	hotṛcamasam evaite trayaḥ samupahūya bhakṣayanti
11.12.16	yathācamasaṃ camasān

11.12.21	saṃtiṣṭhate mādhyaṃdinaṃ savanam
11.13.1	atha sāvitraṃ hutvā prasarpanti tṛtīyasavanāya
11.13.2	prasiddham ādityagraheṇa caritvāgrayaṇaṃ gṛhṇāti
11.13.3	atha ṣoḍaśinam abhigṛhṇāty asāvi soma indra ta ity anudrutyopayāmagṛhīto 'sīndrāya tvā ṣoḍaśine juṣṭaṃ gṛhṇāmīti
11.13.4	parimṛjya sādayaty eṣa te yonir indrāya tvā ṣoḍaśina iti
11.13.5	athokthyaṃ gṛhṇāti
11.13.6	samānaṃ karmā pavamānāt
11.13.7	pavamānena caritvā sve dhāman paśubhiś carati
11.13.8	teṣāṃ nānā manotā nānā devatā nānā pratyabhimarśanā nānā vasāhomāḥ samāno vanaspatiḥ samānaḥ sviṣṭakṛtpraiṣavān samānīḍā samānyo diśaḥ
11.13.9	nānā diśa ity eke
11.13.10	samānaṃ karmā dhruvavadbhyaś camasebhyaḥ
11.13.11	dhruvavadbhiś camasaiś caritvā tribhir ukthyaparyāyaiś caratīndrāvaruṇābhyām indrābṛhaspatibhyām indrāviṣṇubhyām iti
11.13.12	atha ṣoḍaśinā carati
11.13.13	atha prāṅ āyann āha hotuś camasam anūnnayadhvam unnetaḥ sarvaśa eva rājānam unnaya mātirīrica iti
11.13.14	hotṛcamasam eva prathamam unnayanti yathopapādam itarān
11.13.15	sarvaśa eva rājānaṃ samunnīyottaravedyāṃ saṃsādayanti
11.13.16	tad etān prājāpatyān saha saṃsādayanti
11.13.17	athāpa upaspṛśya barhiṣī ādāya vācaṃyamaḥ pratyaṅ drutvā stotram upākaroti

11.13.22	abhy enam āhvayate hotā
11.13.23	pratyāhvayate 'dhvaryuḥ
11.13.24	śaṃsati
11.13.25	pratigṛṇāti
11.13.26	prasiddham ukthaṃ pratigīrya prāṅ etyodyacchata etaṃ hotṛcamasam
11.13.27	anūdyacchanta itarān
11.13.28	upodyacchante camasān
11.13.29	athāśrāvayaty o śrāvayāstu śrauṣaḍ ukthaśā yaja somānām iti
11.13.30	vaṣaṭkṛte juhoti
11.13.31	tad etān prājāpatyān saha juhvati
11.13.32	vaṣaṭkṛtānuvaṣaṭkṛte dvir juhoti
11.13.33	tathaiva dvirdviḥ sarvāṃś camasāñ juhvati
11.13.34	atha bhakṣaiḥ pratyañca ādravanty anusavanabhakṣaḥ prajāpatinā pītasyeti
11.13.35	atraiteṣāṃ prājāpatyānāṃ mukhye pātre saṃsrāvān samavanīya yajamāna eva pratyakṣaṃ bhakṣayati
11.13.36	api vainān sarvaśa eva camaseṣu vyavanīya bhakṣayeyur ity etad aparam
11.13.37	atra yan mārutyā anavadānīyaṃ tad ṛtvigbhya upaharati
11.13.38	tad etat samāvaccho vibhajya prāśnanti
11.13.39	hotṛcamasam evaite trayaḥ samupahūya bhakṣayanti
11.13.40	yathācamasaṃ camasān
11.13.41	hinva ma ity ātmānaṃ pratyabhimṛśante
11.13.42	nāpyāyayanti camasān
11.13.43	sarvabhakṣā mārjayante
11.13.44	atha saṃpraiṣam āhāgnīd aupayajān aṅgārān āharopayaṣṭar upasīda brahman prasthāsyāmaḥ samidham ādhāyāgnīd agnīn sakṛtsakṛt saṃmṛḍḍhīti
11.13.45	āharanty etān āgnīdhrād aupayajān aṅgārān
11.13.46	tān agreṇa hotāraṃ nivapati
11.13.47	upasīdaty upayaṣṭā gudatṛtīyaiḥ
11.13.48	atraitāni gudatṛtīyāny ekādaśadhā kṛtvopayaṣṭopayajati
11.13.49	samānam ata ūrdhvam
11.13.50	saṃtiṣṭhate vājapeyaḥ
11.13.51	vājapeyeneṣṭvā pratyavarohaṇīyenāgniṣṭomena yajeta
11.13.52	saṃtiṣṭhate vājapeyaḥ saṃtiṣṭhate vājapeyaḥ
12.1.1	rājasūyena yakṣyamāṇo bhavati
12.1.2	sa purastāt phālgunyai vā caitryai vā paurṇamāsyā āmāvāsyena haviṣeṣṭvā dīkṣate
12.1.3	tasya tisro dīkṣās tisra upasadaḥ saptamyāṃ prasutaḥ
12.1.4	saṃtiṣṭhata eṣa prāyaṇīyo 'gniṣṭomaś catuṣṭomaḥ sahasradakṣiṇa udavasānīyāntaḥ
12.1.5	athāṣṭame 'hny ānumataṃ nirvapati
12.1.6	haviṣkṛtā vācaṃ visṛjate
12.1.7	samānaṃ karmādhivapanāt
12.1.8	adhyupya dakṣiṇārdhe gārhapatyasyāṣṭau kapālāny upadadhāty ekaṃ pratiprasthātottarato nairṛtāya
12.1.9	haviḥpeṣyai prayacchann āha prācaś ca pratīcaś ca vyavaśātayantī piṇḍḍhīti
12.1.10	sa ye prāñcaḥ śamyāyā avaśīyante tān adhvaryuḥ samupya saṃyutyānumataṃ śrapayati
12.1.11	atha ye pratyañcaḥ śamyāyā avaśīyante tān pratiprasthātā samupya saṃyutya nairṛtaṃ śrapayati
12.1.12	ādadata etaṃ nairṛtam upastīrṇābhighāritaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ vāsaḥ kṛṣṇatūṣam antam āgārād ekolmukam udapātram iti
12.1.13	etat samādāya gārhapatye sruvāhutiṃ juhoti vīhi svāhāhutiṃ juṣāṇa iti
12.1.14	atha dakṣiṇayā dvāropaniṣkramya tāṃ diśaṃ yanti yatrāsya svakṛtam iriṇaṃ spaṣṭaṃ bhavati pradaro vā
12.1.15	tad etad ekolmukam upasamādhāya saṃparistīryāṅguṣṭhābhyāṃ parigṛhya nairṛtaṃ juhoty eṣa te nirṛte bhāgo bhūte haviṣmaty asi muñcemam aṃhasaḥ svāheti
12.1.16	atra kṛṣṇaṃ vāsaḥ kṛṣṇatūṣaṃ dadāti
12.1.17	athāpo vyatiṣicya parāsya pātram anavekṣamāṇā āyanti hastapādān prakṣālyaitenaiva yathetam etya gārhapatye sruvāhutiṃ juhoti svāhā namo ya idaṃ cakāreti
12.1.18	athānumatena saṃsthāṃ karoti
12.1.19	dhenuṃ dadāti
12.2.1	atha navame 'hny ādityaṃ caruṃ nirvapati
12.2.2	varaṃ dadāti
12.2.3	atha daśame 'hny āgnāvaiṣṇavam ekādaśakapālam
12.2.4	vāmanaṃ vahinaṃ dadāti
12.2.5	athaikādaśe 'hny agnīṣomīyam ekādaśakapālam
12.2.6	hiraṇyaṃ dadāti
12.2.7	atha dvādaśe 'hny aindram ekādaśakapālam
12.2.8	ṛṣabhaṃ vahinaṃ dadāti
12.2.9	atha trayodaśe 'hny āgneyam aṣṭākapālam aindraṃ dadhi
12.2.10	ṛṣabhaṃ vahinaṃ dadāti
12.2.11	athopātītyāgrayaṇahavīṃṣi caturdaśe 'hni sarasvatyai carum
12.2.12	vatsatarīṃ dadāti
12.2.13	atha pañcadaśe 'hni sarasvate carum
12.2.14	vatsataraṃ dadāti
12.2.15	yady u vai caturdaśyām evopavasathaḥ saṃpadyata evam evaitad ahar etābhyām iṣṭibhyāṃ nānābarhirbhyāṃ yajeta
12.2.16	athāsyaitad ahar viśvebhyo devebhyo vatsā apākṛtā bhavanti
12.2.17	vaiśvadevaṃ payo dohayitvopavasati sāṃnāyyasya vāvṛtā tūṣṇīṃ vā
12.2.18	atha śvo bhūte vaiśvadevahavirbhir iṣṭvā paurṇamāsavaimṛdhābhyām iṣṭvā prasiddhaṃ nivartayate
12.2.19	atha śvo bhūta indrāya sutrāmṇe puroḍāśam ekādaśakapālaṃ nirvapati
12.2.20	abhihito ratha ubhākāṃsyakavaco garbhiṇībhir vā vaḍabābhir yuktaḥ sāṇḍair vāśvair āveṣṭyo niṣkas tad dadāti
12.2.21	atha śvo bhūta indrāyāṃhomuce puroḍāśam ekādaśakapālaṃ nirvapati
12.2.22	anabhihito ratho 'kāṃsyakavaco 'garbhābhir vā vaḍabābhir yukto niraṣṭair vāśvaiḥ ślakṣṇako niṣkas tad dadāti
12.3.1	ete saṃtanī ity ācakṣate
12.3.2	atha śvo bhūte saṃtanībhyām eva pratipadyate
12.3.3	sa evam eva saṃtanībhyām aharahar viparyāsaṃ yajamānaś caturo māsa eti kāmam iṣṭyā kāmaṃ paśubandhena kāmaṃ yavāgrayaṇena
12.3.4	atha caturṣu māseṣu paryaveteṣu saṃtanyeṣṭyeṣṭvā varuṇapraghātahavirbhir iṣṭvā paurṇamāsavaimṛdhābhyām iṣṭvā prasiddhaṃ nivartayate
12.3.5	atha śvo bhūte saṃtanībhyām eva pratipadyate
12.3.6	sa evam eva saṃtanībhyām aharahar viparyāsaṃ yajamāno 'parāṃś caturo māsa eti kāmam iṣṭvā kāmaṃ paśubandhena kāmaṃ śyāmākāgrayaṇena
12.3.7	atha caturṣu māseṣu paryaveteṣu saṃtanyeṣṭyeṣṭvā sākamedhahavirbhir iṣṭvā paurṇamāsavaimṛdhābhyām iṣṭvā prasiddhaṃ nivartayate
12.3.8	atha śvo bhūte saṃtanībhyām eva pratipadyate
12.3.9	sa evam eva saṃtanībhyām aharahar viparyāsaṃ yajamāno 'parāṃś caturo māsa eti kāmam iṣṭyā kāmaṃ paśubandhena kāmaṃ vrīhyāgrayaṇena
12.3.10	atha caturṣu māseṣu paryaveteṣu saṃtanyeṣṭyeṣṭvā śunāsīrīyahavirbhir iṣṭvā paurṇamāsavaimṛdhābhyām iṣṭvā prasiddhaṃ nivartayate
12.3.11	atha śvo bhūte saṃtanībhyām eva pratipadyate
12.3.12	sa evam eva saṃtanībhyām aharahar viparyāsaṃ yajamānaḥ saptāhānyeti kāmam iṣṭyā kāmaṃ paśubandhena
12.3.13	athāṣṭame 'hnīndraturīyam āgneyam aṣṭākapālaṃ nirvapati raudraṃ gāvīdhukaṃ carum aindraṃ dadhi vāruṇaṃ yavamayaṃ carum
12.3.14	anvāhāryam āsādya vahinīṃ dhenuṃ dadāti
12.4.1	atha tadānīm eva pañcedhmīyena pratipadyate
12.4.2	pañcadhāṅgārān nirūhya pañcedhmān abhyādadhāti parṇamayaṃ purastān naiyagrodhaṃ dakṣiṇata āśvatthaṃ paścād audumbaram uttarāt plākṣaṃ madhye
12.4.3	athainān ājyena vyāghārayati ye devāḥ puraḥsado 'gninetrā rakṣohaṇas te naḥ pāntu te no 'vantu tebhyo namas tebhyaḥ svāhā ye devā dakṣiṇasado ye devāḥ paścātsado ye devā uttarasado ye devā upariṣada iti
12.4.4	athopaveṣeṇāṅgārān samūhati samūḍhaṃ rakṣaḥ saṃdagdhaṃ rakṣa idam ahaṃ rakṣo 'bhisaṃdahāmīti
12.4.5	athainān sruvāhutibhir abhijuhoty agnaye rakṣoghne svāheti pañcabhiḥ
12.4.6	atra praṣṭivāhinaṃ rathaṃ dadāti
12.4.7	atha yācati parṇamayaṃ sruvam apāmārgasaktūn prativasanīyaṃ vāso 'ntam āgārād ekolmukam udapātram iti
12.4.8	etat samādāyodañco niṣkramya tāṃ diśaṃ yanti yatrāsya svakṛtam iriṇaṃ spaṣṭaṃ bhavati pradaro vā
12.4.9	tad etad ekolmukam upasamādhāya saṃparistīrya parṇamayena sruveṇāpāmārgasaktūñ juhoti devasya tvā savituḥ prasave 'śvinor bāhubhyāṃ pūṣṇo hastābhyāṃ rakṣaso vadhaṃ juhomi svāheti
12.4.10	hataṃ rakṣa iti sruvam anupraharati
12.4.11	avadhiṣma rakṣa ity upatiṣṭhate
12.4.12	atra yad vaste tad dadāti
12.4.13	athāpo vyatiṣicya parāsya pātram anavekṣmāṇā āyanti hastapādān prakṣālya
12.4.14	etena yathetam etyendraturīyeṇa saṃsthāṃ karoti
12.4.15	atha navame 'hni pūrvāṇi devikāhavīṃṣi nirvapaty anumatyai caruṃ rākāyai caruṃ dhātre puroḍāśaṃ dvādaśakapālam iti
12.4.16	anvāhāryam āsādya vatsatarīṃ dadāti
12.4.17	atha daśame 'hny uttarāṇi devikāhavīṃṣi nirvapati sinīvālyai caruṃ kuhvai caruṃ dhātra eva puroḍāśaṃ dvādaśakapālam iti
12.4.18	anvāharyam āsādya vatsataraṃ dadāti
12.4.19	athaikādaśe 'hni triṣaṃyuktaiḥ pratipadyata āgnāvaiṣṇavaṃ nirvapaty aindrāvaiṣṇavam ekādaśakapālaṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ trikapālam
12.4.20	vāmanam ṛṣabhaṃ vahinaṃ dadāti
12.4.21	atha dvādaśe 'hny agnīṣomīyam ekādaśakapālaṃ nirvapatīndrāsomīyam ekādaśakapālaṃ saumyaṃ carum
12.4.22	babhruṃ dadāti
12.4.23	atha trayodaśe 'hni somāpauṣṇaṃ caruṃ nirvapaty aindrāpauṣṇaṃ caruṃ pauṣṇaṃ carum
12.4.24	śyāmaṃ dadāti
12.4.25	atha caturdaśe 'hni vaiśvānaraṃ dvādaśakapālaṃ nirvapati
12.4.26	hiraṇyaṃ dadāti
12.4.27	atha pañcadaśe 'hni vāruṇaṃ yavamayaṃ carum
12.4.28	aśvaṃ dadāti
12.5.1	athainam āmāvāsyena haviṣejānaṃ ratninaḥ paryavasyanti dakṣiṇato vodañco paścād vā prāñcaḥ
12.5.2	teṣām avasitānāṃ brahmaiva dakṣiṇārdhyo vāparārdhyo vā bhavati
12.5.3	sa yat kiṃca yajñaparibhojanaṃ brahmaṇa eva tad gṛhe bhavati
12.5.4	athāraṇyor agnīn samārohya brahmaṇo gṛhān adhyavasāya mathitvāgnīn vihṛtya bārhaspatyaṃ caruṃ nirvapati brahmaṇo gṛhe
12.5.5	śitipṛṣṭhaṃ dadāti
12.5.6	athāraṇyor agnīn samārohya svāny agnyāyatanāny abhipravrajati
12.5.7	taṃ yantam anumantrayate 'yaṃ no rājā vṛtrahā rājā bhūtvā vṛtraṃ vadhyād iti
12.5.8	atha svāny agnyāyatanāny adhyavasāya mathitvāgnīn vihṛtyendrāya sutrāmṇe puroḍāśam ekādaśakapālaṃ pratinirvapati
12.5.9	athāsyaitad ahaḥ śvetāyai śvetavatsāyai payo dohayitvā samātacya nidadhāti
12.5.10	atha śvo bhūte 'raṇyor agnīn samārohya rājanyasya gṛhān adhyavasāya mathitvāgnīn vihṛtyaindram ekādaśakapālaṃ rājanyasya gṛhe
12.5.11	ṛṣabhaṃ dadāti
12.5.12	tathāraṇyor agnīn samārohya svāny evāgnyāyatanāny abhipravrajati
12.5.13	taṃ tathaiva yantam anumantrayate
12.5.14	yasyayasya gṛhe yajate saso 'numantrayate 'yaṃ no rājā vṛtrahā rājā bhūtvā vṛtraṃ vadhyād iti
12.5.15	atha svāny evāgnyāyatanāny adhyavasāya mathitvāgnīn vihṛtyendrāyāṃhomuce puroḍāśam ekādaśakapālaṃ pratinirvapati
12.5.16	prajñātam evāsyaitad ahaḥ śvetāyai śvetavatsāyai payo dohayitvā samātacyaiva nidadhāti
12.5.17	atha tṛtīye 'hny ādityaṃ caruṃ mahiṣyai gṛhe
12.5.18	dhenuṃ dadāti
12.5.19	atha caturthe 'hni bhagāya caruṃ vāvātāyai gṛhe
12.5.20	vicittagarbhāṃ paṣṭhaihīṃ dadāti
12.5.21	atha pañcame 'hni nairṛtaṃ caruṃ parivṛktyai gṛhe kṛṣṇānāṃ vrīhīṇāṃ nakhanirbhinnam
12.5.22	kṛṣṇāṃ kūṭāṃ dadāti
12.5.23	atha ṣaṣṭhe 'hny āgneyam aṣṭākapālaṃ senānyo gṛhe
12.5.24	hiraṇyaṃ dadāti
12.5.25	atha saptame 'hni vāruṇaṃ daśakapālaṃ sūtasya gṛhe
12.5.26	mahāniraṣṭaṃ dadāti
12.5.27	athāṣṭame 'hni mārutaṃ saptakapālaṃ grāmaṇyo gṛhe
12.5.28	pṛśniṃ dadāti
12.5.29	atha navame 'hni sāvitraṃ dvādaśakapālaṃ kṣattur gṛhe
12.5.30	upadhvastaṃ dadāti
12.5.31	atha daśame 'hny āśvinaṃ dvikapālaṃ saṃgrahītur gṛhe
12.5.32	savātyau dadāti
12.5.33	athaikādaśe 'hni pauṣṇaṃ caruṃ bhāgadughasya gṛhe
12.5.34	śyāmaṃ dadāti
12.5.35	atha dvādaśe 'hni raudraṃ gāvīdhukaṃ carum akṣāvāpasya gṛhe
12.5.36	śabalamudvāraṃ dadāti
12.5.37	prasiddham evāsyaitad ahaḥ śvetāyai śvetavatsāyai payo dohayitvā samātacyaiva nidadhāti
12.5.38	atha trayodaśe 'hni maitrābārhaspatyaṃ bhavati
12.6.1	atha vai bhavati
12.6.2	śvetāyai śvetavatsāyai dugdhe svayaṃmūrte svayaṃmathita ājya āśvatthe pātre catuḥsraktau svayamavapannāyai śākhāyai karṇāṃś cākarṇāṃś ca taṇḍulān vicinuyād iti
12.6.3	atha vai bhavati
12.6.4	svayaṃkṛtā vedir bhavati svayaṃdinaṃ barhiḥ svayaṃkṛta idhma iti
12.6.5	rājaivāyaṃ svayaṃ karmabhiḥ pūjito bhavati
12.6.6	sa svayam eva vediṃ karoti svayam idhmābarhiḥ saṃnahyati svayam āśvatthaṃ pātraṃ catuḥsraktiṃ karoti svayam avapannāyai śākhāyai karṇāṃś cākarṇāṃś ca taṇḍulān vicinoti
12.6.7	atha vai bhavati
12.6.8	ye karṇāḥ sa payasi bārhaspatyo ye 'karṇāḥ sa ājye maitra iti
12.6.9	athottarato bhasmamiśrān aṅgārān nirūhya teṣu navaṃ pātram adhiśritya tiraḥ pavitram ājyam ānīya tiraḥ pavitram akarṇān opya tena bārhaspatyam apidadhāti
12.6.10	taṃ tathāpihitam antarvedy āsādayati
12.6.11	samānaṃ karmā prayājebhyaḥ
12.6.12	pañca prayājān iṣṭvodaṅṅ atyākramya saṃsrāveṇa bārhaspatyam abhighārya maitram abhighārayati
12.6.13	bārhaspatyena pūrveṇa pracaraty atha maitreṇa
12.6.14	bārhaspatyasya pūrvasya sviṣṭakṛte 'vadyaty atha maitrasya
12.6.15	bārhaspatyasya pūrvasyeḍām avadyaty atha maitrasya
12.6.16	anvāhāryam āsādyaitām eva śvetāṃ śvetavatsāṃ dadāti
12.6.17	saṃtiṣṭhate maitrābārhaspatyaṃ haviḥ
12.7.1	athaitasminn eva pūrvapakṣa ukthyāyābhiṣecanīyāya dīkṣate
12.7.2	tasyāparimitā dīkṣāḥ ṣaḍ upasadaḥ
12.7.3	sa tathā rājānaṃ krīṇāti yathā manyate 'māvāsyāyai me yajñiye 'han sutyā saṃpatsyata iti
12.7.4	tasya tayā saṃpadyate
12.7.5	atha prāyaṇīyena carati
12.7.6	prāyaṇīyena caritvā padena carati
12.7.7	padena caritvā rohite carmaṇi rājānaṃ krītvohyātithyaṃ nirvapati
12.7.8	ātithyena pracaryāthānvaham upasadbhiś carati
12.7.9	athāhavanīyaṃ praṇayati
12.7.10	āhavanīyaṃ praṇīya rathavāhane sadohavirdhāne saṃminoti
12.7.11	rathavāhane sadohavirdhāne saṃmityāgnīṣomau praṇayati
12.7.12	agnīṣomau praṇīya yūpasyāvṛtā yūpam ucchrayati
12.7.13	svarvantaṃ yūpam utsṛjyāgnīṣomīyaṃ paśum upākaroti
12.7.14	tasya prasiddhaṃ vapayā caritvā vasatīvarīr gṛhṇāti
12.7.15	atha paśupuroḍāśaṃ nirvapati
12.7.16	tam anuvartante 'ṣṭau devasuvāṃ havīṃṣy agnaye gṛhapataya ity etāni
12.7.17	teṣām uktaṃ caraṇaṃ yathāgner vidhāyām
12.7.18	iḍāntāḥ puroḍāśāḥ saṃtiṣṭhante
12.7.19	patnīsaṃyājāntaḥ paśuḥ
12.7.20	hṛdayaśūlānta ity eke
12.7.21	atraitān dundubhīn anudiśam āsañjayati
12.7.22	atha vasatīvarīḥ parihṛtya payāṃsi viśiṣyopavasanti
12.7.23	athāto mahārātra eva budhyante
12.7.24	prātar ājyāni gṛhītvā rājānam upāvahṛtya prātaranuvākam upākaroti
12.7.25	parihite prātaranuvāke 'po 'cchaiti
12.7.26	adbhir udaiti
12.7.27	ukthyaṃ kratum upaiti
12.7.28	prasiddho 'bhiṣavaḥ
12.7.29	prasiddhaṃ grahā gṛhyante
12.7.30	samānaṃ karmāśvinād grahāt
12.7.31	āśvinaṃ grahaṃ gṛhītvā dve raśane ādāya yūpam abhyaiti
12.7.32	svarvantaṃ yūpam utsṛjyāgneyaṃ paśum upākaroti
12.7.33	tasyaidnrāgna upālambhyo bhavati
12.7.34	tayoḥ prasiddhaṃ vapābhyāṃ caritvā prasarpanti prātaḥsavanāya
12.7.35	tad ṛjudhā saṃtiṣṭhate
12.7.36	prasarpanti mādhyaṃdināya savanāya
12.7.37	prasiddho 'bhiṣavaḥ
12.7.38	prasiddhaṃ grahā gṛhyante
12.7.39	samānaṃ karmā dākṣiṇebhyaḥ
12.7.40	dākṣiṇāni hoṣyan yācaty ājyasthālīṃ sasruvāṃ srucaṃ vāsaḥ
12.7.41	tasyaitasya vasanasyāntamāyāṃ daśāyāṃ niṣkarajjuḥ pragrathitā bhavati
12.7.42	etat samādāyāhaihi yajamāneti
12.7.43	uttareṇāgnīdhrīyaṃ parītyottareṇa sadaḥ parītyāgreṇa śālāṃ tiṣṭhate pratiprasthātra etāni śastrāṇi prayacchati
12.7.44	athāhaihi yajamāneti
12.7.45	ratha eṣa dakṣiṇe śroṇyante rathavāhana āhito bhavati
12.7.46	tam upāvaharatīndrasya vajro 'si vārtraghnas tvayāyaṃ vṛtraṃ vadhyād iti
12.7.47	athainaṃ dhūrgṛhītam antarvedy abhyavavartayanti tūṣṇīm
12.7.48	athāpsv aśvān palpūlayati tūṣṇīm
12.7.49	atha dakṣiṇaṃ yogyaṃ yunakti mitrāvaruṇayos tvā praśāstroḥ praśiṣā yunajmi yajñasya yogeneti
12.7.50	athāsya pṛṣṭhaṃ marmṛjyate tūṣṇīm
12.7.51	evam evottaraṃ yogyaṃ yunakti
12.7.52	tasyaivam evottarataḥ praṣṭim upaniyunakti
12.7.53	tayor evam eva pṛṣṭhe marmṛjyate
12.7.54	etasya yogam anu sarvam āṇivad yujyate
12.7.55	adhikakṣyān hastinaḥ kurvanti
12.7.56	praveṣṭayanti vāsobhārān
12.7.57	vasanānāṃ daśāsu niṣkarajjūḥ pragrathnanti
12.7.58	pūgaśo dakṣiṇā āyātayati
12.7.59	atha saurībhyām ṛgbhyāṃ gārhapatye juhoti
12.7.60	nayavatyarcāgnīdhre juhoti
12.7.61	sṛjyante dakṣiṇā dakṣiṇāpathena
12.7.62	sa yat kiṃcid dadāti hiraṇyamukham eva dadāti
12.7.63	atha vāsāṃsy atha yuktāni goaśvaṃ hastipuruṣam antataḥ
12.7.64	adattā evaite rathā ativartane
12.7.65	naite 'nyasya santa ājiṃ dhāvanti
12.7.66	manasaiva svaratham adhvaryave dadāti
12.7.67	manasā catuṣpātkṣetraṃ brahmaṇa ādiśati
12.7.68	manasā samanudiśya dakṣiṇās tribhir marutvatīyaiś carati
12.7.69	sīdanti nārāśaṃsā āpyāyitā dakṣiṇasya havirdhānasyāpālambam adho'dho mahendrāya
12.8.1	atha yācati vaitasaṃ droṇakalaśaṃ ṣoḍaśa vāyavyāni
12.8.2	athāsyaitat purastād eva ṣoḍaśatayya āpo digbhyaḥ saṃbhṛtā dakṣiṇasya havirdhānasya prācyo 'kṣāt pratīcya upastambhanān nihitāḥ śerate
12.8.3	tāsāṃ vahantyaḥ pūrvārdhyā bhavanti sārasvatyo 'parārdhyāḥ
12.8.4	sa vahantīr abhijuhoty artheta sthāpo devīr madhumatīr agṛhṇann ūrjasvatī rājasūyāya citānāḥ / yābhir mitrāvaruṇāv abhyaṣiñcan yābhir indram anayann aty arātīḥ
12.8.5	rāṣṭradā stha rāṣṭraṃ datta svāheti
12.8.6	gṛhṇāti parṇamayena rāṣṭradā stha rāṣṭram amuṣmā āmuṣyāyaṇāyāmuṣya putrāyāmuṣya pautrāya datteti
12.8.7	apāṃ patir asīty apāṃpatīyāḥ puṃnāmno votsasya samudriyā vā
12.8.8	vṛṣāsy ūrmir ity aurmyāḥ
12.8.9	vṛṣaseno 'sīti palvalyāḥ
12.8.10	vrajakṣita stheti kūpyāḥ
12.8.11	marutām oja stheti niveṣṭyāḥ
12.8.12	sūryavarcasa sthety atidṛśyāḥ
12.8.13	sūryatvacasa sthety ātapati varṣyāḥ
12.8.14	māndā stheti hrādunyaḥ
12.8.15	vāśā stheti pṛṣvāḥ
12.8.16	śakvarī stheti gorulbyāḥ
12.8.17	viśvabhṛta stheti payaḥ
12.8.18	janabhṛta stheti dadhi
12.8.19	agnes tejasyā sthety ājyam
12.8.20	apām oṣadhīnāṃ rasa stheti madhu
12.8.21	atha sārasvatīr abhijuhoty apo devīr madhumatīr agṛhṇann ūrjasvatī rājasūyāya citānāḥ / yābhir mitrāvaruṇāv abhyaṣiñcan yābhir indram anayann aty arātīḥ
12.8.22	rāṣṭradā stha rāṣṭraṃ datta svāheti
12.8.23	gṛhṇāti parṇamayena rāṣṭradā stha rāṣṭram amuṣmā āmuṣyāyaṇāyāmuṣya putrāyāmuṣya pautrāya datteti
12.8.24	athainā vaitase droṇakalaśe samavanayati devīr āpaḥ saṃ madhumatīr madhumatībhiḥ sṛjyadhvaṃ mahi varcaḥ kṣatriyāya vanvānā iti
12.8.25	athainā antareṇa hotuś ca dhiṣṇiyaṃ brāhmaṇācchaṃsinaś ca sādayaty anādhṛṣṭāḥ sīdatorjasvatīr mahi varcaḥ kṣatriyāya dadhatīr iti
12.8.26	atra ye 'rthyāḥ prarekā adhvaryos tān āvasathaṃ haranti
12.8.27	atha ye 'narthyā apas tān abhyavaharanti
12.8.28	anabhihutānāṃ sārasvatīnāṃ vasatīvarīr daśapeyāya pariśāyayanti
12.9.1	athātraiva tiṣṭhan yācati darbhanāḍīṃ śatamānaṃ hiraṇyaṃ catvāri nānāvṛkṣyāṇi pātrāṇi tārpyaṃ coṣṇīṣaṃ caikaśataṃ ca darbhapuñjīlāni dadhy udumbaraṃ śaṣpāṇi dhanuś ceṣūṃś ceti
12.9.2	sa darbhanāḍyāṃ śatamānaṃ hiraṇyaṃ pragrathnāty anibhṛṣṭam asi vāco bandhus tapojā iti
12.9.3	athainad vaitase droṇakalaśe 'vadadhāti somasya dātram asīti
12.9.4	hiraṇyenotpunāti śukrā vaḥ śukreṇot punāmi candrāś candreṇāmṛtā amṛtena svāhā rājasūyāya citānā iti
12.9.5	gṛhṇāti parṇamayena sadhamādo dyumninīr ūrja etā etāḥ anibhṛṣṭā apasyuvo vasānaḥ / pastyāsu cakre varuṇaḥ sadhastham apāṃ śiśur mātṛtamāsv antar iti
12.9.6	purastād āsīnāya brahmaṇe prayacchaty etayaiva gṛhītvā dakṣiṇata āsīnāyaudumbareṇa rājanyāya prayacchati
12.9.7	etayaiva gṛhītvā paścād āsīnāyāśvatthena vaiśyāya prayacchati
12.9.8	etayaiva gṛhītvottarata āsīnāya naiyagrodhena janyāya prayacchati
12.9.9	athaitaṃ prarekam āgnīdhraṃ hṛtvāpidhāya prajñātaṃ nidadhāti
12.9.10	atha yajamānaṃ tārpyaṃ paridhāpayati kṣatrasyolbam asīti
12.9.11	kṣatrasya yonir asīty āsajate tārpyam
12.9.12	abhīva nābhim uṣṇīṣaṃ paryasyati
12.9.13	athainam ekaśatena darbhapuñjīlaiḥ pavayati nityena pavanena
12.9.14	athainam unmṛjann āśayati dadhy udumbaraṃ śaṣpāṇīti
12.9.15	athainam āvidbhiḥ prāñcam ānayaty āvinno agnir gṛhapatir iti saptabhir anucchandasam
12.9.16	athainaṃ yajamānāyatane tiṣṭhantaṃ prāhaiṣa vo bharatā rājeti yeṣāṃ śreṣṭhī bhavati
12.9.17	somo 'smākaṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ rājetītare pratyāhuḥ
12.9.18	athāsmai dhanuḥ prayacchatīndrasya vajro 'si vārtraghnas tvayāyaṃ vṛtraṃ vadhyād iti śatrubādhanā sthetīṣūn
12.9.19	śatrūn me bādhadhvam itītaraḥ pratigṛhṇāti pāta mā pratyañcaṃ pāta mā tiryañcam anvañcaṃ mā pāta digbhyo mā pāta viśvābhyo mā nāṣṭrābhyaḥ pāteti
12.9.20	atha hiraṇyavarṇāv uṣasāṃ viroka iti triṣṭubhā bāhū udgṛhṇāti
12.9.21	athainaṃ saṃśāsti manasaiva diśo 'nuprakrāma manasordhvām anūjjihīṣveti
12.9.22	athainaṃ vācayati
12.10.1	samidham ā tiṣṭhogrām ātiṣṭha virājam ā tiṣṭhodīcīm ā tiṣṭhordhvām ā tiṣṭheti
12.10.2	athātraiva tiṣṭhan yācati mārutaṃ caikavimśatikapālaṃ vaiśvadevīṃ cāmikṣām
12.10.3	tasya yo 'raṇye 'nuvākyo gaṇas tena madhyamāni kapālāny upahitāni bhavanti rājasūyagaṇābhyām itarāṇi
12.10.4	tābhyāṃ carati marudbhyo 'nubrūhi maruto yajeti viśvebhyo devebhyo 'nubrūhi viśvān devān yajeti
12.10.5	aniṣṭasviṣṭakṛte evaite haviṣī apidhāya prajñāte nidadhāti
12.10.6	atha yācati śārdūlacarma suvarṇarajatau ca rukmau vārāhī upānahau sīsaṃ ca lohitāyasaṃ ca
12.10.7	dakṣiṇataḥ klība āste
12.10.8	atha purastād abhiṣekasya ṣaṭ pārthāni juhoty agnaye svāhā somāya svāheti
12.10.9	atha yajamānāyatane śārdūlacarma prācīnagrīvam uttaralomopastṛṇāti somasya tviṣir asi taveva me tviṣir bhūyād iti
12.10.10	tad yajamānaṃ prāñcam upaveśya suvarṇarajatābhyāṃ rukmābhyāṃ paryupāsyati
12.10.11	amṛtam asi mṛtyor mā pāhīty adhastād rajatam upāsyati didyon mā pāhīty upariṣṭāt suvarṇaṃ śatātṛṇṇam
12.10.12	athāveṣṭā dandaśūkā iti dakṣiṇata āsīnaṃ klībaṃ sīsena vidhyati
12.10.13	savyena pādena lohitāyasaṃ nirasyati nirastaṃ namuceḥ śira iti
12.10.14	atrāsmā abhiṣekān saṃpragṛhṇanti
12.10.15	tān so 'vekṣate
12.11.1	somo rājā varuṇo devā dharmasuvaś ca ye / te te vācaṃ suvantāṃ te te prāṇaṃ suvantāṃ te te cakṣuḥ suvantāṃ te te śrotraṃ suvantām iti
12.11.2	atha brahmaṇaḥ pātram ādāya tenābhiṣiñcati
12.11.3	adhvaryur eva yajur japaty abhiṣiñcantītare somasya tvā dyumnenābhiṣiñcāmy agnes tejasā sūryasya varcasendrasyendriyeṇa mitrāvaruṇayor vīryeṇa marutām ojasā kṣatrāṇāṃ kṣatrapatir asy ati divas pāhy asāv iti
12.11.4	athordhvā dhārāḥ samunmṛṣṭe samāvavṛtrann adharāg udīcīr ahiṃ budhniyam anu saṃcarantīs tāḥ parvatasya vṛṣabhasya pṛṣṭhe nāvaś caranti svasica iyānā iti
12.11.5	atraiteṣām abhiṣekāṇāṃ mukhye pātre saṃsrāvān samavanīya pratihitasya gṛhān eti
12.11.6	athānvārabdhayoḥ pratihite ca mahiṣyāṃ ca juhoti prajāpate na tvad etāny anya iti
12.11.7	atrāsmā eṣa pratihito varaṃ dadāti
12.11.8	atha pratihitāya pātraṃ prayacchann āhedaṃ te pātraṃ dāyād yam asad yadā tvābhiṣiñcāmīdaṃ te 'sad iti
12.11.9	athaitenaiva yathetam etyāgnīdhre prarekaṃ juhoti rudra yat te krayī paraṃ nāma tasmai hutam asi yameṣṭam asi svāheti
12.11.10	atrāsmai dhanuḥ prayacchati yadi purastād aprattaṃ bhavati
12.11.11	samunmṛṣṭe samutkrośanty abhyaṣecy ayam asāv āmuṣyāyaṇo 'muṣya putro 'muṣya pautro 'muṣya naptā rājasūyeneti
12.11.12	atha bhūr bhuvaḥ suvar iti vācaṃ visṛjate
12.11.13	dvābhyāṃ mukhaṃ vimṛṣṭe
12.11.14	gāyatrān viṣṇukramān kramate
12.11.15	athopariṣṭād abhiṣekasya ṣaṭ pārthāni juhotīndrāya svāhā ghoṣāya svāheti
12.11.16	dvādaśa bhūtānām aveṣṭīr juhoti pṛthivyai svāhāntarikṣāya svāheti
12.11.17	atraitayor haviṣoḥ sviṣṭakṛtā carati
12.11.18	athaine apidhāya prajñāte nidadhāti
12.12.1	atha vārāhī upānahāv upamuñcate paśūnāṃ manyur asīti dakṣiṇe pāde taveva me manyur bhūyād iti savye
12.12.2	athemām abhimṛśati namo mātre pṛthivyā iti
12.12.3	tasyāṃ dakṣiṇaṃ pādam upāvaharati māhaṃ mātaraṃ pṛthivīṃ hiṃsiṣam iti mā māṃ mātā pṛthivī hiṃsīd iti savyam
12.12.4	athāntareṇa cātvālotkarāv udaṅṅ upaniṣkrāmati viṣṇoḥ kramo 'si viṣṇoḥ krāntam asi viṣṇor vikrāntam asīti
12.12.5	uttarata ete rathā yuktās tiṣṭhanti
12.12.6	tān dṛṣṭvaiva pratihito 'vatiṣṭhati
12.12.7	atha pratihitasya dhanur ādāyādhijyaṃ kṛtvā ratham ātiṣṭhati marutāṃ prasave jeṣam iti
12.12.8	āptaṃ mana iti kūbaram abhiniśrayate
12.12.9	taṃ tadānīm eva pratihito 'nvātiṣṭhati prasasāhiṣe puruhūta śatrūn iti
12.12.10	triṣṭubhānvārabhata iti brāhmaṇam
12.12.11	atha pratihitāya dhanuḥ prayacchann āha rājanya eṣa ṣaṭtriṃśatsu śamyāpravyādheṣu nirjayena sahasreṇāvasitas tasmā iṣum asyatād apainaṃ rādhnutāj jitvainaṃ dakṣiṇāpathenātyākurutād iti
12.12.12	rājanya eva saṃśiṣṭo bhavati rājaputras ta iṣum asiṣyati sa tvāparātsyati tasmā uttaravargyeṇa saṃmṛjyeṣu prayacchatād iti
12.12.13	sa tathā karoti
12.13.1	athāhābhisarpa yajamāna māhendraṃ grahaṃ grahīṣyāmīti
12.13.2	anvārabdhe yajamāne māhendraṃ grahaṃ gṛhṇāti mahāṃ indro ya ojasety anudrutyopayāmagṛhīto 'si mahendrāya tvā juṣṭaṃ gṛhṇāmīti
12.13.3	parimṛjya sādayaty eṣa te yonir mahendrāya tveti
12.13.4	athaitān maṇīn yācati rājatam audumbaraṃ sauvarṇam iti
12.13.5	ta ete nānāsūtreṣv otā bhavanti
12.13.6	tān uttarasya havirdhānasya madhyame vaṃśe pragrathyāpa upaspṛśya barhiṣī ādāya vācaṃyamaḥ pratyaṅ drutvā stotram upākaroti
12.13.7	stuvate māhendrāya
12.13.8	prastute sāmni saṃpraiṣam āhājisṛta ājiṃ dhāvata dundubhīn samāghnatābhiṣotāro 'bhiṣuṇutāgnīd āśiraṃ vinayolūkhalam udvādaya pratiprasthātar vāruṇam ekakapālaṃ nirvapa saumyasya viddhīti
12.13.9	yathāsaṃpraiṣaṃ te kurvanti
12.13.10	dhāvanty ājisṛtaḥ
12.13.11	āghnanti dundubhīn
12.13.12	saṃpravadanti vācaḥ
12.13.13	saṃproditā vāco 'numantrayate
12.13.14	śāmyanti ghoṣāḥ śastrāya
12.13.15	hotra eṣottameti prāhuḥ
12.13.16	hotuḥ kālāt parāṅ āvartate 'dhvaryuḥ
12.13.17	abhy enam āhvayate hotā
12.13.18	pratyāhvayate 'dhvaryuḥ
12.13.19	śaṃsati
12.13.20	pratigṛṇāti
12.13.21	prasiddham ukthaṃ pratigīrya prāṅ etyodyacchata etaṃ māhendraṃ graham
12.13.22	anūdyacchanta itarān
12.13.23	upodyacchante nārāśaṃsān
12.13.24	athāśrāvayaty o śrāvayāstu śrauṣaḍ ukthaśā yaja somasyeti
12.13.25	vaṣaṭkṛtānuvaṣaṭkṛte dvir juhoti
12.13.26	tathaiva dvirdvir nārāśaṃsānam upakampayanti
12.13.27	dvirhuto māhendraḥ pariśete
12.13.28	āyanti rathāḥ
12.13.29	āgatān rathān dṛṣṭvā japati sam aham indriyeṇa vīryeṇa saṃ mayendriyaṃ vīryam iti
12.13.30	athāntareṇa cātvālotkarāv udaṅṅ upaniṣkrāmati
12.13.31	uttarata ete rathā yuktās tiṣṭhanti
12.13.32	tān dṛṣṭvaiva pratihito 'vatiṣṭhati
12.13.33	atha pratihitasya dhanur ādāyādhijyaṃ kṛtvā ratham ātiṣṭhati marutāṃ prasave jeṣam iti
12.13.34	āptaṃ mana iti kūbaram abhiniśrayate
12.13.35	taṃ tadānīm eva pratihito 'nvātiṣṭhati prasasāhiṣe puruhūta śatrūn iti
12.13.36	triṣṭubhānvārabhata iti brāhmaṇam
12.13.37	atha pratihitāya dhanuḥ prayacchann āhedaṃ te dhanur dāyād yam asad yadā tvābhiṣiñcāmīdaṃ te 'sad iti
12.13.38	athaitenaiva yathetam etyāntareṇa cātvālotkarāv upātītya pūrvayā dvārā havirdhānaṃ prapādya prāñcaṃ ratham āvartya tiṣṭhati
12.14.1	tad etān maṇīn yācati rājatam audumbaraṃ sauvarṇam iti
12.14.2	savye haste rājataṃ pratimuñcata iyad asy āyur asy āyur me dhehīti dakṣiṇa audumbaram ūrg asy ūrjaṃ me dhehīti dakṣiṇa eva sauvarṇaṃ yuṅṅ asi varco 'si varco mayi dhehīti
12.14.3	atrāsmā āmikṣām upodyacchate
12.14.4	tasyāṃ dakṣiṇaṃ hastam upāvaharati mitro 'sīti varuṇo 'sīti savyam
12.14.5	athainām abhimṛśati sam ahaṃ viśvair devair iti
12.14.6	athainām apidhāya prajñātāṃ nidadhāti
12.14.7	tad etān maṇīn ekasmin sūtra āvayati madhyata audumbaraṃ karoti
12.14.8	tān grīvāsu pratiṣajyaitenaiva yathetam etyāgreṇāgnīdhraṃ prāñcaṃ ratham āvartyāvatiṣṭhati
12.14.9	athāgnīdhre rathavimocanīyā juhoty agnaye gṛhapataye svāheti catasraḥ sruvāhutīḥ
12.14.10	athāsyaitat purastād evāgreṇāgnīdhraṃ rathavāhanaṃ prāgīṣaṃ yogyakṛtam upasthitaṃ bhavati
12.14.11	tasmin saha saṃgrahītrā rathavāhane ratham ādadhāti
12.14.12	suvargād evainaṃ lokād antardadhāti
12.14.13	haṃsaḥ śuciṣad ity ādadhāti
12.14.14	brahmaṇaivainam upāvaharati brahmaṇādadhāti
12.14.15	aticchandasādadhātīti brāhmaṇam
12.14.16	athāsyaitat purastād eva jaghanenāgnīdhraṃ caturapasrāvaṃ vāṣṭāpasrāvaṃ vā vimitaṃ kāritaṃ bhavati
12.14.17	tasya madhyata audumbarīm āsandīṃ niminoti kṣatrasya nābhir asīti
12.14.18	tasyām uttaramaṣṭanam adhīvāsam āstṛṇāti kṣatrasya yonir asīti
12.14.19	athainām āsīdati
12.14.20	āsīdantam anumantrayate syonām āsīda suṣadām āsīda mā tvā hiṃsīd iti
12.14.21	mā mā hiṃsīd itītaraḥ pratyāha
12.14.22	āsannam abhimantrayate niṣasāda dhṛtavrato varuṇaḥ pastyāsv ā sāmrājyāya sukratur iti
12.14.23	athainam ṛtvijaḥ paryupaviśanti
12.14.24	purastād adhvaryur upaviśati dakṣiṇato brahmā paścād dhotodgātottarataḥ
12.14.25	tataḥ prāñco vodañco vā ratninaḥ
12.14.26	so 'dhvaryum abhivadati

12.15.10	tvaṃ rājan suśloko 'sīty āha kṣattā
