12.15.12	tvaṃ rājan sumaṅgalo 'sīty āha saṃgrahītā
12.15.13	satyarājā3n iti bhāgadugham
12.15.14	tvaṃ rājan satyarājāsīty āha bhāgadhuk
12.15.15	sapta puṇyanāmno 'bhyudyāthāsmai sphyaṃ prayacchatīndrasya vajro 'si vārtraghnas tena me radhyeti
12.15.16	tena te radhyāsam itītaraḥ pratigṛhṇāti
12.15.17	taṃ saṃprayacchati sūtāya sūtagrāmaṇine sajātāya sajātagrāmaṇine saṃgrahītre 'kṣāvāpagovyacchābhyām antataḥ
12.15.18	tena tau madhyato 'dhidevanam uddhatya tisraḥ pañcāśataḥ sauvarṇān akṣān nivapataḥ
12.15.19	athāsmai pañcākṣān apacchidya prayacchati diśo 'bhy ayaṃ rājābhūd iti
12.15.20	tāṃs tadānīm evākṣeṣv apisṛjati
12.15.21	athaitam odanam udbruvate
12.15.22	nānāṃśinau brahmā ca yajamānaś ca samānāṃśinau sūtagrāmaṇinau samānāṃśinau kṣattasaṃgrahītārau
12.15.23	sa yo nu matākṣa iva sa rājña āsana upaviśya catuḥśatam akṣān apacchidyāhodbhinnaṃ rājña iti
12.15.24	tān eva manāksamantān iva kṛtvāha kṛtaṃ brāhmaṇasyeti
12.15.25	athaitam odanam udbruvate
12.15.26	samānāṃśinau brahmā ca yajamānaś ca nānāṃśinau sūtagrāmaṇinau nānāṃśinau kṣattasaṃgrahītārau
12.15.27	sa yaḥ parājayate tasyainaṃ kule kṣattā pācayati
12.15.28	yāvad eṣa odanaḥ pacyate tāvad eṣa hotā śaunaḥśepam ākhyāpayate hiraṇmaye kaśipāv āsīnaḥ
12.15.29	tasmā adhvaryuḥ pratigṛṇāti hiraṇmaye kūrca āsīnaḥ
12.16.1	oṃ hotas tathā hotaḥ satyaṃ hotar arātsma hotar iti
12.16.2	yady u vai hotā nādhyety anya u hotrāśaṃsī śaṃsati
12.16.3	tasmā u pratiprasthātā pratigṛṇāti
12.16.4	paraḥśataṃ bhavatīti brāhmaṇam
12.16.5	yadaiṣa odanaḥ pakvo bhavaty athainam ekadhoddhṛtya brahmaṇa upaharati
12.16.6	tasmā etāṃś caiva maṇīn dadāti śataṃ vipathaṃ catuṣpātkṣetram
12.16.7	atha hotre dadāti śataṃ vipathaṃ hiraṇmayaṃ kaśipu
12.16.8	athodgātre dadāti śataṃ vipatham
12.16.9	athādhvaryave dadāti śataṃ vipathaṃ svarathaṃ tisraḥ pañcāśataḥ sauvarṇān akṣān hiraṇmayaṃ kūrcam iti
12.16.10	atraibhya etan nirjayaṃ sahasraṃ caturdhā kṛtvā dadati
12.16.11	athainam etayāsandyā sada āvahanty ā vā vrajati
12.16.12	anvāyanty enam ete camasāḥ
12.16.13	atraitayor haviṣor iḍām upahvayate
12.16.14	iḍopahūtaṃ māhendraṃ hotā caivādhvaryuś ca saṃbhakṣayataḥ
12.16.15	narāśaṃsapītena nārāśaṃsān
12.16.16	hotṛcamasam evaite trayaḥ samupahūya bhakṣayanti
12.16.17	yathācamasaṃ camasān
12.16.18	hinva ma ity ātmānaṃ pratyabhimṛśante
12.16.19	nāpyāyayanti camasān
12.16.20	sarvabhakṣā mārjayante
12.16.21	athendrāya tvendrāya tvety evaṃ tribhir ukthyaparyāyaiś carati
12.16.22	saṃtiṣṭhate mādhyaṃdinaṃ savanam
12.16.23	prasarpanti tṛtīyasavanāya
12.16.24	prasiddham ādityagraheṇa caritvāgrayaṇaṃ gṛhṇāti
12.16.25	athokthyaṃ gṛhṇāti
12.16.26	samānaṃ karmā pavamānāt
12.16.27	pavamānena caritvā sve dhāman paśubhyāṃ carati
12.16.28	tayor nānā manote nānā devate nānā pratyabhimarśanau nānā vasāhomau samāno vanaspatiḥ samānaḥ sviṣṭakṛt praiṣavān samānīḍā samānyo diśaḥ
12.16.29	nānā diśa ity eke
12.16.30	samānaṃ karmāvabhṛthāt
12.16.31	athaitasminn avabhṛtha upādadate cārmapakṣyāv upānahau
12.16.32	praplāvya vārāhī cārmapakṣībhyām udeti
12.16.33	so 'pām ante juhoty apāṃ naptre svāheti
12.16.34	viṣuvati darbhastambe juhoty ūrjo naptre svāheti
12.16.35	punaretya gārhapatye juhoty agnaye gṛhapataye svāheti
12.16.36	prasiddho 'vabhṛthaḥ
12.16.37	udayanīyeṣṭyeṣṭvā maitrāvaruṇīṃ vaśām upākaroti
12.16.38	tasyai prasiddhaṃ vapayā caritvā naiva śmaśrūṇi vapate na keśān
12.16.39	saṃtiṣṭhata eṣa ukthyo 'bhiṣecanīyaś catustriṃśapavamānaḥ sahasradakṣiṇa udavānīyāntaḥ
12.17.1	athāsyaiṣā purastād eva juṣṭe devayajane saptasu śamyāpravyādheṣu śālā kāritā bhavati
12.17.2	so 'traivāgneyam aṣṭākapālaṃ nirvapati
12.17.3	hiraṇyaṃ dadāti
12.17.4	śamyānyāsa udavasāya vasati
12.17.5	sārasvataṃ carum
12.17.6	vatsatarīṃ dadāti
12.17.7	dvitīye śamyānyāsa udavasāya vasati
12.17.8	sāvitraṃ dvādaśakapālam
12.17.9	upadhvastaṃ dadāti
12.17.10	tṛtīye śamyānyāsa udavasāya vasati
12.17.11	pauṣṇaṃ carum
12.17.12	śyāmaṃ dadāti
12.17.13	caturthe śamyānyāsa udavasāya vasati
12.17.14	bārhaspatyaṃ carum
12.17.15	śitipṛṣṭhaṃ dadāti
12.17.16	pañcame śamyānyāsa udavasāya vasati
12.17.17	aindram ekādaśakapālam
12.17.18	ṛṣabhaṃ dadāti
12.17.19	ṣaṣṭhe śamyānyāsa udavasāya vasati
12.17.20	vāruṇaṃ daśakapālam
12.17.21	mahāniraṣṭaṃ dadāti
12.17.22	atha saptame 'hañ chālām adhyavasyati
12.17.23	etad evāhar dīkṣate
12.17.24	atha vai bhavati
12.17.25	sadyo dīkṣayanti sadyaḥ somaṃ krīṇanti puṇḍarisrajāṃ prayacchatīti
12.17.26	athainaṃ tīrthād ānīya pavayitvā puṇḍarisrajinam udānīya dīkṣaṇīyām iṣṭiṃ nirvapati
12.17.27	tasyāṃ saṃsthitāyāṃ muṣṭī caiva na karoti vācaṃ ca na yacchati
12.17.28	nidadhaty asmā etad dhavirucchiṣṭaṃ vratabhājanam
12.17.29	atha prāyaṇīyām iṣṭiṃ nirvapati
12.17.30	haviṣkṛtā vācaṃ visṛjate
12.17.31	atrāsmā etad dhavirucchiṣṭaṃ prayacchanti vratabhājanam
12.17.32	atha prāyaṇīyena carati
12.17.33	prāyaṇīyena caritvā padena carati
12.17.34	padena caritvā daśabhiḥ sāṇḍair vatsatarai rājānaṃ krītvohyātithyaṃ nirvapati
12.17.35	ātithyena pracarya purastād upasadāṃ saumyaṃ carum
12.17.36	babhruṃ dadāti
12.17.37	atha madhyame upasadāv antareṇa tvāṣṭram aṣṭākapālam
12.17.38	śuṇṭhaṃ dadāti
12.17.39	athopariṣṭād upasadāṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ trikapālam
12.17.40	vāmanaṃ dadāti
12.17.41	athāhavanīyaṃ praṇayati
12.17.42	āhavanīyaṃ praṇīya sadohavirdhāne saṃminoti
12.17.43	sadohavirdhāne saṃmityāgnīṣomau praṇayati
12.17.44	agnīṣomau praṇīya yūpasyāvṛtā yūpam ucchrayati
12.17.45	svarvantaṃ yūpam utsṛjyāgnīṣomīyaṃ paśum upākaroti
12.17.46	tasya prasiddhaṃ vapayā caritvā sārasvatīr vasatīvarīr gṛhṇāti
12.17.47	atha paśupuroḍāśaṃ nirvapati
12.17.48	iḍāntaḥ paśupuroḍāśaḥ saṃtiṣṭhate
12.17.49	patnīsaṃyājāntaḥ paśuḥ
12.17.50	hṛdayaśūlānta ity eke
12.17.51	atha vasatīvarīḥ parihṛtya payāṃsi viśiṣyopavasanti
12.17.52	athāto mahārātra eva budhyante
12.17.53	prātar ājyāni gṛhītvā rājānam upāvahṛtya prātaranuvākam upākaroti
12.17.54	parihite prātaranuvāke 'po 'cchaiti
12.17.55	adbhir udaiti
12.18.1	agniṣṭomaṃ kratum upaiti

12.18.6	svarvantaṃ yūpam utsṛjyāgneyaṃ paśum upākaroti
12.18.7	tasya prājāpatyas tūpara upālambhyo bhavati
12.18.8	tayoḥ prasiddhaṃ vapābhyāṃ caritvā prasarpanti prātaḥsavanāya
12.18.9	pūrvasyāṃ dvāri sūtagrāmaṇyāv upatiṣṭhato 'parasyāṃ kṣattasaṃgrahītārau
12.18.10	prasarpataḥ pṛcchataḥ kā te mātā kā te mātāmahīti

12.18.21	bhārgavo hotā bhavati

12.19.1	atha pañcahaviṣā diśām aveṣṭyā yajate
12.19.2	āgneyam aṣṭākapālaṃ nirvapaty aindram ekādaśakapālaṃ vaiśvadevaṃ caruṃ maitrāvaruṇīm āmikṣāṃ bārhaspatyaṃ carum iti
12.19.3	atha vai bhavati
12.19.4	haviṣohaviṣa iṣṭvā bārhaspatyam abhighārayati
12.19.5	sa haviṣohaviṣa iṣṭvā bārhaspatyam abhighārayati
12.19.6	anvāharyam āsādyaitā ādiṣṭadakṣiṇā dadāti
12.19.7	atha dvipaśunā paśubandhena yajate
12.19.8	ādityāṃ malhāṃ garbhiṇīm ālabhate mārutīṃ pṛśniṃ paṣṭhauhīm
12.19.9	garbhiṇy ādityā bhavaty agarbhā mārutī
12.19.10	ādityayā pūrvayā pracarati mārutyottarayā
12.19.11	uccair ādityāyā āśrāvayaty upāṃśu mārutyai
12.19.12	saṃtiṣṭhate yathā dvipaśuḥ paśubandhas tathā
12.19.13	atha sātyadūtānāṃ havirbhir yajate
12.19.14	aśvibhyāṃ pūṣṇe puroḍāśaṃ dvādaśakapālaṃ nirvapati sarasvate satyavāce caruṃ savitre satyaprasavāya puroḍāśaṃ dvādaśakapālam
12.19.15	anvāhāryam āsādya tisṛdhanvaṃ śuṣkadṛtiṃ dadāti
12.19.16	taṃ pratirājabhyaḥ prahiṇīti
12.19.17	sa yaḥ pratigṛhṇāti mitro ma iti taṃ veda
12.19.18	atha yo na pratigṛhṇāty amitro ma iti taṃ veda
12.19.19	atha pūrvaiḥ prayujāṃ havirbhir yajate
12.19.20	āgneyam aṣṭākapālaṃ nirvapati saumyaṃ caruṃ sāvitraṃ dvādaśakapālaṃ bārhaspatyaṃ caruṃ tvāṣṭram aṣṭākapālaṃ vaiśvānaraṃ dvādaśakapālam
12.19.21	anvāhāryam āsādya dakṣiṇaṃ rathavāhanavāhaṃ dadāti
12.19.22	atha paurṇamāsavaimṛdhābhyām iṣṭvottaraiḥ prayujāṃ havirbhir yajate
12.19.23	sārasvataṃ caruṃ nirvapati pauṣṇaṃ caruṃ maitraṃ caruṃ vāruṇaṃ caruṃ kṣaitrapatyaṃ carum ādityaṃ carum
12.19.24	anvāhāryam āsādyottaraṃ rathavāhanavāhaṃ dadāti

12.20.28	tasyāparimitā dīkṣā dvādaśopasadaḥ

12.20.30	saṃtiṣṭhate vyuṣṭidvirātraḥ

13.1.1	athāta iṣṭīr vyākhyāsyāmaḥ
13.1.2	tāsāṃ sakṛtpradiṣṭam eva dārśapaurṇamāsikaṃ tantram
13.1.3	dārśapaurṇamāsikaḥ saṃskāraḥ
13.1.4	sarvāḥ prathamāḥ sarvā madhyamāḥ sarvā uttamāḥ
13.1.5	yathākālaṃ parvatithyā nirvaped yā ādiṣṭasthānāḥ
13.1.6	atha yā anādiṣṭasthānā yāni pūrvapakṣasya puṇyāhāny etat tīrthāni bhavanti yā anārteṣṭayaḥ
13.1.7	atha yā ārteṣṭaya upādhigamakālās tā bhavanti
13.1.8	yathaitad abhyuddhṛtābhyuditābhinimruktāvijāteti
13.1.9	vyuditam agnyanvādhānam
13.1.10	nityaṃ vratopāyanam
13.1.11	yāvatsiddhi yājamānam anusaṃhared anyatrāvāpadevatābhyaḥ
13.1.12	tāsāṃ yāḥ sopanāmās tā upāṃśu
13.1.13	athetarā uccair ādeśād eva
13.1.14	saptadaśa sāmidhenyo jānīyād yathaitan mānavī ṛcau dhāyye kuryād uṣṇihakakubhau dhāyye triṣṭubhau saṃyājye
13.1.15	vārtraghnāv ājyabhāgau pūrvapakṣe
13.1.16	vṛdhanvantāv aparapakṣa ity aupamanyavaḥ
13.1.17	yāni havīṃṣi kāmena vā dakṣiṇayā vā vyapetāni syur nānābarhīṃṣy eva tāni jānīyāt
13.1.18	ādeśād eva dakṣiṇāvyapetaṃ samānabarhir bhavati yathā diśām aveṣṭir neṣṭīr upāṃśuyājo 'nusameti
13.1.19	yaddevatyaṃ havis taddevatye yājyāpuro'nuvākye
13.1.20	purastātsviṣṭakṛta upahomā yāsām uktā upahomāḥ
13.1.21	vāsodakṣiṇāḥ kāmyā iṣṭayo yā anādiṣṭadakṣiṇāḥ
13.1.22	godakṣiṇaḥ paśubandhaḥ
13.1.23	nityo 'nvāhārya iti nvā imā iṣṭayo vyākhyātāḥ
13.2.1	atha vai bhavati
13.2.2	aindrāgnam ekādaśakapālaṃ nirvapet prajākāma iti
13.2.3	tasyā ete bhavata ubhā vām indrāgnī aśravaṃ hīti
13.2.4	aindrāgnam ekādaśakapālaṃ nirvapet spardhamānaḥ kṣetre vā sajāteṣu veti
13.2.5	tasyā ete bhavata indrāgnī rocanā divaḥ śnathad vṛtram iti
13.2.6	aindrāgnam ekādaśakapālaṃ nirvapet saṃgrāmam upaprayāsyann iti
13.2.7	tasyā ete bhavata indrāgnī navatiṃ puraḥ śuciṃ nu stomam iti
13.2.8	aindrāgnam ekādaśakapālaṃ nirvapet saṃgrāmaṃ jitveti
13.2.9	tasyā ete bhavata ubhā vām indrāgnī aśravaṃ hīti
13.2.10	aindrāgnam ekādaśakapālaṃ nirvapej janatām eṣyann iti
13.2.11	tasyā ete bhavata indrāgnī rocanā divaḥ śnathad vṛtram iti
13.2.12	pauṣṇaṃ carum anunirvaped iti
13.2.13	tasyā ete bhavato vayam u tvā pathaspate pathaspatha iti
13.2.14	kṣaitrapatyaṃ caruṃ nirvapej janatām āgatyeti
13.2.15	tasyā ete bhavataḥ kṣetrasya patinā vayaṃ kṣetrasya pata iti
13.2.16	aindrāgnam ekādaśakapālam upariṣṭān nirvaped iti
13.2.17	tasyā ete bhavato ye saṃgrāmaṃ jigyuṣaḥ
13.3.1	agnaye pathikṛte puroḍāśam aṣṭākapālaṃ nirvaped yo darśapūrṇamāsayājī sann amāvāsyāṃ vā paurṇamāsīṃ vātipādayed iti
13.3.2	etayeṣṭyā yakṣyamāṇa upakalpayate patho 'ntikād barhir anaḍvāham
13.3.3	tasyā ete bhavato 'gne nayā devānām iti
13.3.4	anvāhāryam āsādyānaḍvāhaṃ dadāti
13.3.5	agnaye vratapataye puroḍāśam aṣṭākapālaṃ nirvaped ya āhitāgniḥ sann avratyam iva cared iti
13.3.6	tasyā ete bhavatas tvam agne vratapā asi yad vo vayaṃ pramināma vratānīti
13.3.7	agnaye rakṣoghne puroḍāśam aṣṭākapālaṃ nirvaped yaṃ rakṣāṃsi sacerann iti
13.3.8	atha vai bhavati
13.3.9	niśitāyāṃ nirvapet pariśrite yājayed iti
13.3.10	sa niśāyāṃ mahārātra utthāyāgnaye rakṣoghne puroḍāśam aṣṭākapālaṃ nirvapati
13.3.11	pariśrite yājayati
13.3.12	kṛṇuṣva pājaḥ prasitiṃ na pṛthvīm ity etasyānuvākasya pañcadaśa sāmidhenīḥ parācīr anvāha
13.3.13	tasyā ete bhavato rakṣohaṇaṃ vi jyotiṣeti
13.3.14	atha purastāt sviṣṭakṛtaḥ sruvāhutim upajuhoty uta svānāso divi ṣantv agner iti
13.4.1	agnaye rudravate puroḍāśam aṣṭākapālaṃ nirvaped abhicarann iti
13.4.2	tasyā ete bhavatas tvam agne rudra ā vo rājānam iti
13.4.3	agnaye surabhimate puroḍāśam aṣṭākapālaṃ nirvaped yasya gāvo vā puruṣā vā pramīyeran yo vā bibhīyād iti
13.4.4	tasyā ete bhavato 'gnir hotā sādhvīm akar iti
13.4.5	agnaye kṣāmavate puroḍāśam aṣṭākapālaṃ nirvapet saṃgrāme saṃyatta iti
13.4.6	tasyā ete bhavato 'krandad agnis tve vasūnīti
13.4.7	atha vai bhavati
13.4.8	abhi vā eṣa etān ucyati yeṣāṃ pūrvāparā anvañcaḥ pramīyante
13.4.9	puruṣāhutir hy asya priyatamā
13.4.10	agnaye kṣāmavate puroḍāśam aṣṭākapālaṃ nirvaped iti
13.4.11	tasyā ete bhavataḥ
13.4.12	atha vai bhavati
13.4.13	abhi vā eṣa etasya gṛhān ucyati yasya gṛhān dadhati
13.4.14	agnaye kṣāmavate puroḍāśam aṣṭākapālaṃ nirvaped iti
13.4.15	tasyā ete bhavataḥ
13.5.1	atha vai bhavati
13.5.2	agnaye kāmāya puroḍāśam aṣṭākapālaṃ nirvaped yaṃ kāmo nopanamed iti
13.5.3	tasyā ete bhavatas tubhyaṃ tā aṅgirastamāśyāma taṃ kāmam agna iti
13.5.4	agnaye yaviṣṭhāya puroḍāśam aṣṭākapālaṃ nirvapet spardhamānaḥ kṣetre vā sajāteṣu veti
13.5.5	tasyā ete bhavataḥ śreṣṭhaṃ yaviṣṭha bhārata sa śvitāna iti
13.5.6	agnaye yaviṣṭhāya puroḍāśam aṣṭākapālaṃ nirvaped abhicaryamāṇa iti
13.5.7	tasyā ete bhavataḥ
13.5.8	agnaya āyuṣmate puroḍāśam aṣṭākapālaṃ nirvaped yaḥ kāmayeta sarvam āyur iyām iti
13.5.9	tasyā ete bhavata āyuṣ ṭa āyurdā agna iti
13.5.10	agnaye jātavedase puroḍāśam aṣṭāpakālaṃ nirvaped bhūtikāma iti
13.5.11	tasyā ete bhavatas tasmai te divas parīti
13.5.12	agnaye rukmate puroḍāśam aṣṭākapālaṃ nirvaped rukkāma iti
13.5.13	tasyā ete bhavataḥ śuciḥ pāvaka dṛśāno rukma iti
13.5.14	agnaye tejasvate puroḍāśam aṣṭākapālaṃ nirvapet tejaskāma iti
13.5.15	tasyā ete bhavata ā yad iṣe nṛpatiṃ sa tejīyaseti
13.5.16	agnaye sāhantyāya puroḍāśam aṣṭākapālaṃ nirvapet sīkṣamāṇa iti
13.5.17	tasyā ete bhavato 'gne sahantam ābhara tam agne pṛtanāsahaṃ rayim iti
13.6.1	agnaye 'nnavate puroḍāśam aṣṭākapālaṃ nirvaped yaḥ kāmayetānnavānt syām iti
13.6.2	tasyā ete bhavata ukṣānnāya vaśānnāya vadmā hi sūna iti
13.6.3	agnaye 'nnādāya puroḍāśam aṣṭākapālaṃ nirvaped yaḥ kāmayetānnādaḥ syām iti
13.6.4	tasyā ete bhavataḥ
13.6.5	agnaye 'nnapataye puroḍāśam aṣṭākapālaṃ nirvaped yaḥ kāmayetānnapatiḥ syām iti
13.6.6	tasyā ete bhavataḥ
13.6.7	agnaye pavamānāya puroḍāśam aṣṭākapālaṃ nirvaped agnaye pāvakāyāgnaye śucaye jyogāmayāvīti
13.6.8	etayeṣṭyā yakṣyamāṇa upakalpayate hiraṇyam
13.6.9	tasyā etā bhavanty agna āyūṃṣi pavase 'gne pavasvāgne pāvaka sa naḥ pāvakāgniḥ śucivratatama ud agne śucayas taveti
13.6.10	anvāhāryam āsādya hiraṇyaṃ dadāti
13.6.11	etām eva nirvapec cakṣuṣkāma iti
13.6.12	tasyā etā bhavanti
13.7.1	agnaye putravate puroḍāśam aṣṭākapālaṃ nirvaped indrāya putriṇe puroḍāśam ekādaśakapālaṃ prajākāma iti
13.7.2	tasyā etā bhavanti yas tvā hṛdā kīriṇā manyamāno yasmai tvaṃ sukṛte jātavedas tve su putra śavasa ukthaukthe soma indraṃ mamādeti
13.7.3	agnaye rasavate 'jakṣīre caruṃ nirvaped yaḥ kāmayeta rasavānt syām iti
13.7.4	tasyā ete bhavato 'gne rasenāpo anvacāriṣam iti
13.7.5	agnaye vasumate puroḍāśam aṣṭākapālaṃ nirvaped yaḥ kāmayeta vasumānt syām iti
13.7.6	tasyā ete bhavato vasur vasupatis tvām agne vasupatiṃ vasūnām iti
13.7.7	agnaye vājasṛte puroḍāśam aṣṭākapālaṃ nirvapet saṃgrāme saṃyatta iti
13.7.8	tasyā ete bhavatas tvām agne vājasātamam ayaṃ no agnir iti
13.7.9	agnaye 'gnivate puroḍāśam aṣṭākapālaṃ nirvaped yasyāgnāv agnim abhyuddhareyur iti
13.7.10	tasyā ete bhavato 'gnināgniḥ samidhyate tvaṃ hy agne agnineti
13.7.11	agnaye jyotiṣmate puroḍāśam aṣṭākapālaṃ nirvaped yasyāgnir uddhṛto 'hute 'gnihotra udvāyet
13.7.12	apara ādīpyānūddhṛtya ity āhuḥ
13.7.13	tat tathā na kāryam
13.7.14	yad bhāgadheyam abhi pūrva uddhriyate kim aparo 'bhyuddhriyeteti
13.7.15	tāny evāvakṣāṇāni saṃnidhāya manthed iti
13.7.16	sa tāny evāvakṣāṇāni saṃnidhāya manthati
13.7.17	itaḥ prathamaṃ jajñe agniḥ svād yoner adhi jātavedāḥ / sa gāyatriyā triṣṭubhā jagatyā devebhyo havyaṃ vahatu prajānann iti
13.7.18	chandobhir evainaṃ svād yoneḥ prajanayatīti brāhmaṇam
13.7.19	agnaye jyotiṣmate puroḍāśam aṣṭākapālaṃ nirvaped iti
13.7.20	tasyā ete bhavata ud agne śucayas tava vi jyotiṣeti
13.8.1	atha vai bhavati
13.8.2	vaiśvānaraṃ dvādaśakapālaṃ nirvaped vāruṇaṃ caruṃ dadhikrāvṇe carum abhiśasyamāna iti
13.8.3	etayeṣṭyā yakṣyamāṇa upakalpayate hiraṇyam
13.8.4	tasyā etā bhavanti vaiśvānaro na ūtyā tvam agne śociṣā śośucāno 'va te heḍa ud uttamaṃ dadhikrāvṇo akāriṣam ā dadhikrā iti
13.8.5	anvāhāryam āsādya hiraṇyaṃ dadāti
13.8.6	etām eva nirvapet prajākāma iti
13.8.7	tasyā ete bhavanti
13.8.8	vaiśvānaraṃ dvādaśakapālaṃ nirvapet putre jāta iti
13.8.9	tasyā ete bhavato vaiśvānarasya daṃsanābhyo bṛhaj jāto yad agna iti
13.8.10	vaiśvānaraṃ dvādaśakapālaṃ nirvaped amāvāsyāṃ vā paurṇamāsīṃ vātipādyeti
13.8.11	tasyā ete bhavato vaiśvānaro na ūtyā pṛṣṭo divīti
13.8.12	āgneyam aṣṭākapālaṃ nirvaped vaiśvānaraṃ dvādaśakapālam agnim udvāsayiṣyann iti
13.8.13	tasyā etā bhavanty agnir mūrdhā bhuvo vaiśvānaro na ūtyā tvam agne śociṣā śośucāna iti
13.8.14	vaiśvānaraṃ dvādaśakapālaṃ nirvapen mārutaṃ saptakapālaṃ grāmakāma iti
13.8.15	atha vai bhavati
13.8.16	āhavanīye vaiśvānaram adhiśrayati gārhapatye mārutam
13.8.17	anūcyamāna āsādayatīti
13.8.18	kāle pratyañcaṃ vaiśvānaram āsādayati
13.8.19	anūcyamānāsu sāmidhenīṣu mārutam
13.8.20	tasya etā bhavanti vaiśvānaro na ūtyā pṛṣṭo divi maruto yad dha vo divo yā vaḥ śarmeti
13.9.1	ādityaṃ caruṃ nirvapet saṃgrāmam upaprayāsyann iti
13.9.2	tasyā ete bhavato 'ditir na uruṣyatu mahīm ū ṣu mātaram iti
13.9.3	vaiśvānaraṃ dvādaśakapālaṃ nirvaped āyatanaṃ gatveti
13.9.4	tasyā ete bhavato vaiśvānaro na ūtyāsmākam agne maghavatsu dhārayeti
13.9.5	vaiśvānaraṃ dvādaśakapālaṃ nirvaped vidviṣāṇayor annaṃ jagdhveti
13.9.6	tasyā ete bhavato vaiśvānaro na ūtyartāvānam iti
13.9.7	vaiśvānaraṃ dvādaśakapālaṃ nirvapet samamānayoḥ pūrvo 'bhidruhyeti
13.9.8	tasyā ete eva bhavataḥ
13.9.9	vaiśvānaraṃ dvādaśakapālaṃ nirvaped aviṃ pratigṛhyeti
13.9.10	tasyā ete bhavato vaiśvānaro na ūtyā tvam agne śociṣā śośucāna iti
13.9.11	vaiśvānaraṃ dvādaśakapālaṃ nirvaped ubhayādat pratigṛhyāśvaṃ vā puruṣaṃ veti
13.9.12	tasyā ete eva bhavataḥ
13.9.13	vaiśvānaraṃ dvādaśakapālaṃ nirvapet sanim eṣyann iti
13.9.14	tasyā ete bhavato vaiśvānaro na ūtyā vaiśvānarasya sumatau syāmeti
13.10.1	atha vai bhavati
13.10.2	yo vai saṃvatsaraṃ prayujya na vimuñcaty apratiṣṭhāno vai sa bhavati
13.10.3	etam eva vaiśvānaraṃ punar āgatya nirvaped iti
13.10.4	sa etam eva vaiśvānaraṃ punar āgatya nirvapati
13.10.5	yam eva prayuṅkte taṃ bhāgadheyena vimuñcati pratiṣṭhityā iti brāhmaṇam
13.10.6	atha vai bhavati
13.10.7	yayā rajjvottamāṃ gām ājet tāṃ bhrātṛvyāya prahiṇuyād iti
13.10.8	sa yayā rajjvottamāṃ gām ājati tāṃ bhrātṛvyāya prahitya bhrātṛvyasya goṣṭhe nyasyati
13.10.9	nirṛtim evāsmai prahiṇotīti brāhmaṇam
13.10.10	tasyā ete bhavataḥ
13.11.1	atha vai bhavati
13.11.2	aindraṃ caruṃ nirvapet paśukāma iti
13.11.3	tasyā ete bhavata indraṃ vo viśvatas parīndraṃ nara iti
13.11.4	indrāyendriyāvate puroḍāśam ekādaśakapālaṃ nirvapet paśukāma iti
13.11.5	tasyā ete bhavata indriyāṇi śatakrato 'nu te dāyīti
13.11.6	indrāya gharmavate puroḍāśam ekādaśakapālaṃ nirvaped brahmavarcasakāma iti
13.11.7	tasyā ete bhavata ā yasmint sapta vāsavā āmāsu pakvam airaya iti
13.11.8	indrāyārkavate puroḍāśam ekādaśakapālaṃ nirvaped annakāma iti
13.11.9	tasyā ete bhavata indram id gāthino bṛhad gāyanti tvā gāyatriṇa iti
13.11.10	indrāya gharmavate puroḍāśam ekādaśakapālaṃ nirvaped indrāyendriyāvata indrāyārkavate bhūtikāma iti
13.11.11	tasyā etā bhavanty ā yasmint sapta vāsavā āmāsu pakvam airaya indriyāṇi śatakrata anu te dāyīndram id gāthino bṛhad gāyanti tvā gāyatriṇa iti
13.12.1	indrāyāṃhomuce puroḍāśam ekādaśakapālaṃ nirvaped yaḥ pāpmanā gṛhītaḥ syād iti
13.12.2	tasyā ete bhavato 'ṃhomuce viveṣa yan meti
13.12.3	indrāya vaimṛdhāya puroḍāśam ekādaśakapālaṃ nirvaped yaṃ mṛdho 'bhi praveperan rāṣṭrāṇi vābhi samiyur iti
13.12.4	tasyā ete bhavato vi na indra mṛdho jahi mṛgo na bhīma iti
13.12.5	indrāya trātre puroḍāśam ekādaśakapālaṃ nirvaped baddho vā pariyatto veti
13.12.6	tasyā ete bhavatas trātāram indraṃ mā te asyāṃ sahasāvann iti
13.12.7	indrāyārkāśvamedhavate puroḍāśam ekādaśakapālaṃ nirvaped yaṃ mahāyajño nopanamed iti
13.12.8	tasyā ete bhavato 'navas te rathaṃ vṛṣṇe yat ta iti
13.13.1	indrāyānvṛjave puroḍāśam ekādaśakapālaṃ nirvaped grāmakāma iti
13.13.2	tasyā ete bhavato 'nv aha māsā anu te dāyīti
13.13.3	indrāṇyai caruṃ nirvaped yasya senāsaṃśiteva syād iti
13.13.4	atha vai bhavati
13.13.5	balbajān apīdhme saṃnahyet
13.13.6	tān sahedhmenābhyādadhyād iti
13.13.7	tān sahaivedhmenābhyādadhāti
13.13.8	tasyā ete bhavata indrāṇīm āsu nāriṣu nāham indrāṇi rāraṇeti
13.13.9	indrāya manyumate manasvate puroḍāśam ekādaśakapālaṃ nirvapet saṃgrāme saṃyatta iti
13.13.10	tasyā ete bhavato yo jāta evā te maha indroty ugreti
13.13.11	etām eva nirvaped yo hatamanā iva syād iti
13.13.12	tasyā ete bhavataḥ
13.13.13	etām eva nirvaped yaḥ svayaṃpāpa iva syād iti
13.13.14	tasyā ete eva bhavataḥ
13.14.1	indrāya dātre puroḍāśam ekādaśakapālaṃ nirvaped yaḥ kāmayeta dānakāmā me prajāḥ syur iti
13.14.2	tasyā ete bhavato mā no mardhīr ā tū bhareti
13.14.3	indrāya pradātre puroḍāśam ekādaśakapālaṃ nirvaped yasmai prattam iva san na pradīyeteti
13.14.4	tasyā ete bhavataḥ pradātāraṃ havāmahe pradātā vajrīti
13.14.5	indrāya sutrāmṇe puroḍāśam ekādaśakapālaṃ nirvaped aparuddho vāparudhyamāno veti
13.14.6	tasyā ete bhavata indraḥ sutrāmā tasya vayaṃ sumatau yajñiyasyeti
13.14.7	yo 'laṃ śriyai san sadṛṅ samānaiḥ syāt tasmā etam aindram ekādaśakapālaṃ nirvaped iti
13.14.8	atha vai bhavati
13.14.9	revatī puro'nuvākyā bhavati śāntyā apradāhāya śakvarī yājyeti
13.14.10	tasyā ete bhavato revatīr naḥ pro ṣv asmai puroratham iti
13.15.1	atha vai bhavati
13.15.2	āgnāvaiṣṇavam ekādaśakapālaṃ nirvaped abhicaran
13.15.3	sarasvaty ājyabhāgā syāt
13.15.4	bārhaspatyaś carur iti
13.15.5	atha vai bhavati
13.15.6	prati vai parastād abhicarantam abhicaranti
13.15.7	dvedve puro'nuvākye kuryād atiprayuktyā iti
13.15.8	sa dvirdviḥ puro'nuvākyām anvāha
13.15.9	tristrir haviṣām avadyati
13.15.10	tasyā etā bhavanty agnāviṣṇū agnāviṣṇū pra ṇo devy ā no divo bṛhaspata evā pitra iti
13.15.11	etayaiva yajetābhicaryamāṇa iti
13.15.12	tasyā etā eva bhavanti
13.15.13	āgnāvaiṣṇavam ekādaśakapālaṃ nirvaped yaṃ yajño nopanamed iti
13.15.14	tasyā ete bhavato 'gnāviṣṇū agnāviṣṇū iti
13.15.15	āgnāvaiṣṇavaṃ ghṛte caruṃ nirvapec cakṣuṣkāma iti
13.15.16	tasyā ete eva bhavataḥ
13.16.1	atha vai bhavati
13.16.2	indriyaṃ vai vīryaṃ vṛṅkte bhrātṛvyo yajamāno 'yajamānasya
13.16.3	adhvarakalpāṃ pratinirvaped bhrātṛvye yajamāne
13.16.4	nāsyendriyaṃ vīryaṃ vṛṅkte
13.16.5	purā vācaḥ pravaditor nirvaped iti
13.16.6	sa purā vācaḥ pravaditor mahārātra utthāya
13.16.7	āgnāvaiṣṇavam aṣṭākapālaṃ nirvapet prātaḥsavanasyākāle
13.16.8	sarasvaty ājyabhāgā syāt
13.16.9	bārhaspatyaś carur iti

13.16.11	āgnāvaiṣṇavam ekādaśakapālaṃ nirvapen mādhyaṃdinasya savanasyākāle
13.16.12	sarasvaty ājyabhāgā syāt
13.16.13	bārhaspatyaś carur iti
13.16.14	tasyā etā eva bhavanti
13.16.15	āgnāvaiṣṇavaṃ dvādaśakapālaṃ nirvapet tṛtīyasavanasyākāle
13.16.16	sarasvaty ājyabhāgā syāt

13.16.18	tasyā etā eva bhavanti

13.19.7	anūcyamānāsu sāmidhenīṣu mārutam

13.19.10	aindrasyāvadyan brūyād indrāyānubrūhīti
13.19.11	indraṃ vo viśvatas parīty anvāha

13.21.1	ādityebhyo bhuvadvadbhyaś caruṃ nirvaped bhūtikāma iti

13.21.3	ādityebhyo dhārayadvadbhyaś caruṃ nirvaped aparuddho vāparudhyamāno veti
13.21.4	athādite 'numanyasvety aparudhyamāno 'paroddhuḥ padapāṃsūn ādatte
13.21.5	athainān ādāyāharaty upapreta marutaḥ sudānava enā viśpatinābhy amuṃ rājānam iti
13.21.6	athainān yajamānasyāñjalāv āvapati satyāśīr iti

13.22.3	nirupyoparamati

13.23.3	etayeṣṭyā yakṣyamāṇa upakalpayate śataṃ suvarṇāni kṛṣṇalāni navaṃ pātraṃ prabhūtam ājyam iti
13.23.4	atha devasya tvā savituḥ prasava iti pratipadaṃ kṛtvā prajāpataye juṣṭaṃ nirvapāmīti caturo muṣṭīn kṛṣṇalānāṃ nirvapati

13.26.1	yo yajñavibhraṣṭaḥ syāt tasmā etām iṣṭiṃ nirvaped āgneyam aṣṭākapālam aindram ekādaśakapālaṃ saumyaṃ carum iti
