13.28.24	vyatyāsam anvāhānirdāhāyeti brāhmaṇam
13.29.1	ya indriyakāmo vīryakāmaḥ syāt tam etayā sarvapṛṣṭhayā yājayed iti
13.29.2	etayeṣṭyā yakṣyamāṇa upakalpayate 'śvam ṛṣabhaṃ vṛṣṇiṃ bastam iti
13.29.3	atha devasya tvā savituḥ prasava iti pratipadaṃ kṛtvendrāya rāthaṃtarāya juṣṭaṃ nirvapāmīti caturo muṣṭīn vrīhīṇāṃ nirvapati
13.29.4	etām eva pratipadaṃ kṛtvendrāya bārhatāyendrāya vairūpāyendrāya vairājāyendrāya śākvarāyendrāya raivatāyeti caturaś caturo muṣṭīn ekaikasyai devatāyai
13.29.5	haviṣkṛtā vācaṃ visṛjate
13.29.6	samānaṃ karmādhivapanāt
13.29.7	adhyupya gārhapatye dvādaśottānāni kapālāny upadadhāti
13.29.8	atha vai bhavati
13.29.9	uttāneṣu kapāleṣv adhiśrayaty ayātayāmatvāya
13.29.10	dvādaśakapālaḥ puroḍāśo bhavati vaiśvadevatvāya
13.29.11	samantaṃ paryavadyatīti
13.29.12	so 'vadyann āhendrāya rāthaṃtarāyānubrūhīti
13.29.13	abhi tvā śūra nonuma ity anūcya tvām id dhi havāmaha iti yajati
13.29.14	so 'vadyann āhendrāya bārhatāyānubrūhīti
13.29.15	tvām id dhi havāmaha ity anūcya yad dyāva indra ta iti yajati
13.29.16	so 'vadyann āhendrāya vairūpāyānubrūhīti
13.29.17	yad dyāva indra ta ity anūcya pibā somam indra mandatu tveti yajati
13.29.18	so 'vadyann āhendrāya vairājāyānubrūhīti
13.29.19	pibā somam indra mandatu tvety anūcya kadā cana starīr asīti yajati
13.29.20	so 'vadyann āhendrāya śākvarāyānubrūhīti
13.29.21	kadā cana starīr asīty anūcya revatīr naḥ sadhamāda iti yajati
13.29.22	so 'vadyann āhendrāya raivatāyānubrūhīti
13.29.23	revatīr naḥ sadhamāda ity anūcyābhi tvā śūra nonuma iti yajati
13.29.24	vyatyāsam anvāhānirdāhāyeti brāhmaṇam
13.30.1	anvāhāryam āsādyāśvam ṛṣabhaṃ vṛṣṇiṃ bastam iti dadāti
13.30.2	etayaiva yajetābhiśasyamāna iti
13.30.3	yaiva pūrvā seyam
13.30.4	yaś cakṣuṣkāmaḥ syāt tasmā etām iṣṭiṃ nirvaped agnaye bhrājasvate puroḍāśam aṣṭākapālaṃ sauryaṃ carum agnaye bhrājasvate puroḍāśam aṣṭākapālam iti
13.30.5	tasyā ete bhavanty ud agne śucayas tava vi jyotiṣod u tyaṃ citram ud agne śucayas tava vi jyotiṣeti
13.30.6	upahūtāyām iḍāyām anāhitam agnīdhe bhavati
13.30.7	atha yajamānāya trīn piṇḍān prayacchati
13.30.8	ud u tyaṃ jātavedasaṃ sapta tvā harito rathe citraṃ devānām ud agād anīkam iti piṇḍān prayacchati
13.30.9	cakṣur evāsmai prayacchati
13.30.10	yad eva tasya tad iti brāhmaṇam
13.30.11	vaiśvadevīṃ sāṃgrahaṇīṃ nirvaped grāmakāma iti
13.30.12	vaiśvadevaṃ caruṃ saṃgṛhṇanta iva śrapayanti
13.30.13	atha dhruvo 'si dhruvo 'haṃ sajāteṣu bhūyāsam iti paridhīn paridadhāti
13.30.14	tasyā ete bhavato viśve devā viśve devā iti
13.30.15	atha purastāt sviṣṭakṛtaḥ sruvāhutīr upajuhoty āmanam asy āmanasya devā iti tisraḥ
13.31.1	atha vai bhavati
13.31.2	agniṃ vā etasya śarīraṃ gacchati somaṃ rasaḥ
13.31.3	varuṇa enaṃ varuṇapāśena gṛhṇāti sarasvatīṃ vāg agnāviṣṇū ātmā yasya jyog āmayati
13.31.4	yo jyogāmayāvī syād yo vā kāmayeta sarvam āyur iyām iti tasmā etām iṣṭiṃ nirvaped iti
13.31.5	etayeṣṭyā yakṣyamāṇa upakalpayate khādiraṃ navaṃ pātraṃ navanītam ājyaṃ yāvatīḥ samā eṣyan manyeta tāvanmānaṃ ca pravartam
13.31.6	atha devasya tvā savituḥ prasava iti pratipadaṃ kṛtvāgneyam aṣṭākapālaṃ nirvapati saumyaṃ caruṃ vāruṇaṃ daśakapālaṃ sārasvataṃ carum āgnāvaiṣṇavam ekādaśakapālam iti
13.31.7	samānaṃ karmājyāvekṣaṇāt
13.31.8	sa ājyāvekṣaṇe 'nuvartayati yan navam ait tan navanītam abhavad iti
13.31.9	samānaṃ karmā srucāṃ sādanāt
13.31.10	sādayitvā sruco 'thaitaṃ pravartaṃ khādire nave pātra upastīrṇābhighāritaṃ saha havirbhir antarvedy āsādayati
13.31.11	samānaṃ karmā prayājebhyaḥ
13.31.12	prayājaiś caritvā havirbhiś carati
13.31.13	tasyā etā bhavanty āyuṣ ṭa āyurdā agna āpyāyasva saṃ te 'va te heḍa ud uttamaṃ pra ṇo devy ā no divo 'gnāviṣṇū agnāviṣṇū iti
13.31.14	atha purastāt sviṣṭakṛtaḥ sruvāhutīr upajuhoti
13.32.1	aśvinoḥ prāṇo 'si tasya te dattāṃ yayoḥ prāṇo 'si svāhendrasya prāṇo 'si tasya te dadātu yasya prāṇo 'si svāhā mitrāvaruṇayoḥ prāṇo 'si tasya te dattāṃ yasya prāṇo 'si svāhā viśveṣāṃ devānāṃ prāṇo 'si tasya te dadatu yeṣāṃ prāṇo 'si svāheti
13.32.2	hutvāhutvaiva saṃsrāvaiḥ pravartam abhighārayati rāḍ asi virāḍ asi samrāḍ asi svarāḍ asīti
13.32.3	athaitaṃ pravartam agreṇāhavanīyaṃ paryāhṛtya dakṣiṇato nidadhāti
13.32.4	atha yajamānam ājyam avekṣayati ghṛtasya dhārām amṛtasya panthām indreṇa dattāṃ prayatāṃ marudbhiḥ / tat tvā viṣṇuḥ paryapaśyat tat tveḍā gavy airayad iti
13.32.5	atha brahmaṇo hastam anvārabhyartvijaḥ paryāhuḥ pāvamānena tvā stomena gāyatrasya vartanyopāṃśor vīryeṇa devas tvā savitotsṛjatu jīvātave jīvanasyāyai bṛhadrathaṃtarayos tvā stomena triṣṭubho vartanyā śukrasya vīryeṇa devas tvā savitotsṛjatu jīvātave jīvanasyāyā agnes tvā mātrayā jagatyai vartanyāgrayaṇasya vīryeṇa devas tvā savitotsṛjatu jīvātave jīvanasyāyā iti
13.32.6	atha hiraṇyād ghṛtaṃ niṣpibati
13.32.7	niṣpibantam anumantrayata imam agna āyuṣe varcase kṛdhi priyaṃ reto varuṇa soma rājan / mātevāsmā adite śarma yaccha viśve devā jaradaṣṭir yathāsad iti
13.32.8	athaitaṃ pravartamadbhiḥ prakṣālya dakṣiṇe karṇa ābadhnīta āyuṣ ṭe viśvato dadhad iti
13.32.9	athainam anuparivartayata āyur asi viśvāyur asi sarvāyur asi sarvam āyur asīti
13.32.10	athāsya brahmā hastaṃ gṛhṇāty agnir āyuṣmān ity āntād anuvākasya
13.33.1	yāvato 'śvān pratigṛhṇīyāt tāvato vāruṇāñ catuṣkapālān nirvaped ekātiriktān iti
13.33.2	tasyā ete bhavata imaṃ me varuṇa tat tvā yāmīti
13.33.3	yady aparaṃ pratigrāhī syāt sauryam ekakapālam anunirvaped iti
13.33.4	tasyā ete bhavata ud u tyaṃ citram iti
13.33.5	athāpo 'vabhṛtham avaiti
13.33.6	atha vai bhavati
13.33.7	aponaptrīyaṃ caruṃ punar etya nirvaped iti
13.33.8	tasyā ete bhavato 'pāṃ napāt sam anyā yantīti
13.33.9	yaḥ pāpmanā gṛhītaḥ syāt tasmā etām aindrāvaruṇīṃ payasyāṃ nirvaped iti
13.33.10	etayeṣṭyā yakṣyamāṇa upakalpayate dadhi paya āmikṣāyā iti
13.33.11	atha devasya tvā savituḥ prasava iti pratipadaṃ kṛtvendrāvaruṇābhyāṃ juṣṭaṃ nirvapāmīti caturo muṣṭīn vrīhīṇāṃ nirvapati
13.33.12	haviṣkṛtā vācaṃ visṛjate
13.33.13	samānaṃ karmādhivapanāt
13.33.14	adhyupya dakṣiṇārdhe gārhapatyasyaikādaśa kapālāny upadadhāti
13.33.15	yadaitaṃ puroḍāśam adhipṛṇakti tadaitām āmikṣāṃ gārhapatye śrapayati
13.33.16	athaitaṃ puroḍāśam upastīrṇābhighāritam udvāsyāmikṣayā saṃpracchādyāntarvedy āsādayati
13.34.1	atha vai bhavati
13.34.2	payasyāyāṃ puroḍāśam avadadhāti
13.34.3	ātmanvantam evainaṃ karoti
13.34.4	atho āyatanavantam eva
13.34.5	caturdhā vyūhati
13.34.6	dikṣv eva pratitiṣṭhati
13.34.7	punaḥ samūhatīti
13.34.8	sa āmikṣāṃ puroḍāśāc caturdhā kṛtvā vyūhati yā vām indrāvaruṇā yatavyā tanūs tayemam aṃhaso muñcataṃ yā vām indrāvaruṇā sahasyā rakṣasyā tejasyā tanūs tayemam aṃhaso muñcatam iti
13.34.9	punaḥ samūhati samūhyāvadyatīti
13.34.10	tasyā ete bhavata indrāvaruṇayor aham indrāvaruṇā yuvam adhvarāya na iti
13.34.11	atha purastāt sviṣṭakṛtaḥ sruvāhutīr upajuhoti yo vām indrāvaruṇāv agnau srāmas taṃ vām etenāvayaja ity aṣṭau
13.35.1	atha vai bhavati
13.35.2	yo bhrātṛvyavānt syāt sa spardhamāna etayeṣṭyā yajetāgnaye pravate puroḍāśam aṣṭākapālaṃ nirvaped agnaye vibādhavate 'gnaye pratīkavata iti
13.35.3	tasyā etā bhavanti praprāyam agniḥ pra te yakṣi pra ta iyarmi manma bhuvo vi pājasā vi jyotiṣā sa tvam agne pratīkena taṃ supratīkaṃ sudṛśaṃ svañcam iti
13.35.4	yo bhrātṛvyavānt syāt sa spardhamāna etayeṣṭyā yajetendrāyāṃhomuce puroḍāśam ekādaśakapālaṃ nirvaped indrāya vaimṛdhāyendrāyendriyāvata iti
13.35.5	atha vai bhavati
13.35.6	trayastriṃśatkapālaṃ puroḍāśaṃ nirvapatīti
13.35.7	ya evaite traya ekādaśakapālās ta evaita uktā bhavanti
13.35.8	tasyā etā bhavanty aṃhomuce viveṣa yan mā vi na indrendra kṣatram indriyāṇi śatakrata anu te dāyīti
13.35.9	yo bhrātṛvyavānt syāt sa spardhamāna etayeṣṭyā yajetāgnaye saṃvargāya puroḍāśam aṣṭākapālaṃ nirvapet
13.35.10	taṃ śṛtam āsannam etena yajuṣābhimṛśed iti
13.35.11	taṃ śṛtam āsannam etena yajuṣābhimṛśaty ojo 'si saho 'si balam asi bhrājo 'si devānāṃ dhāma nāmāsi viśvam asi viśvāyuḥ sarvam asi sarvāyur abhibhūr aham anena haviṣāmuṃ bhrātṛvyam abhibhūyāsam iti
13.35.12	yukṣvā hi devahūtamān ity etasyānuvākasya saptadaśa sāmidhenīḥ parācīr anvāha
13.35.13	tasyā ete bhavataḥ sakhāyaḥ saṃ vaḥ samyañcaṃ saṃsam id yuvase vṛṣann iti
13.36.1	yaḥ prajākāmaḥ syāt tasmā etaṃ prajāpatyaṃ gārmutaṃ caruṃ nirvaped iti
13.36.2	tasyā ete bhavataḥ prajāpate sa vedeti
13.36.3	yaḥ paśukāmaḥ syāt tasmā etaṃ somāpauṣṇaṃ gārmutaṃ caruṃ nirvaped iti
13.36.4	tasyā ete bhavataḥ somāpūṣaṇā imau devāv iti
13.36.5	citrayā yajeta paśukāma iti
13.36.6	śvaś citrayety upavasati
13.36.7	atha prātar āgneyam aṣṭākapālaṃ nirvapati saumyaṃ caruṃ tvāṣṭram aṣṭākapālaṃ sarasvatyai caruṃ sarasvate caruṃ sinīvālyai carum aindram ekādaśakapālam iti
13.36.8	tasyā ete bhavanty agninā rayim aśnavad gomāṃ agna āpyāyasva saṃ ta iha tvaṣṭāram agriyaṃ tan nas turīpaṃ pra ṇo devy ā no divaḥ pīpivāṃsaṃ sarasvato ye te sarasva ūrmayaḥ sinīvāli yā supāṇir indraṃ vo viśvatas parīndraṃ nara iti
13.36.9	atha purastāt sviṣṭakṛtaḥ sruvāhutīr upajuhoty agne gobhir na āgahīti pañcarco dve yajuṣī
13.37.1	kārīryā yakṣyamāṇo bhavati
13.37.2	sa upakalpayate kṛṣṇaṃ vāsaḥ kṛṣṇatūṣaṃ kṛṣṇam aśvaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ saṃdānaṃ kṛṣṇājinaṃ kṛṣṇamadhu karīrasaktūn kṛṣṇāṃ kumbhīm āmapakvāṃ kṛṣṇam anas trigadhaṃ kṛṣṇām aviṃ kṛṣṇaṃ varṣāhūstambaṃ vaitasam idhmābarhir iti
13.37.3	atha yajamānāyatane kṛṣṇaṃ vāsaḥ kṛṣṇatūṣaṃ nidadhāti
13.37.4	athāgreṇāhavanīyaṃ kṛṣṇam aśvaṃ kṛṣṇena saṃdānena saṃdityāntarvedi kṛṣṇājine kṛṣṇamadhu karīrasaktūn nivapati
13.37.5	utkare kumbhīṃ niminoti
13.37.6	athāgreṇotkaraṃ prāgīṣam ana sthāpayitvā tasyāgreṇopastambhanaṃ kṛṣṇām aviṃ nigrathnāti
13.37.7	uttareṇāhavanīyaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ varṣāhūstambaṃ vaitasam idhmābarhir iti nidadhāti
13.37.8	atha yajamānaḥ kṛṣṇaṃ vāsaḥ kṛṣṇatūṣaṃ paridhatte
13.38.1	mārutam asi marutām ojo 'pāṃ dhārāṃ bhinddhīti
13.38.2	ramayata marutaḥ śyenam āyinam iti paścādvātaṃ pratimīvati
13.38.3	purovātam eva janayati varṣasyāvaruddhyā iti brāhmaṇam
13.38.4	athaitam aśvaṃ saṃdānāt pramucyottaravargyeṇābhivikṣipaty abhikranda stanaya garbham ādhā iti
13.38.5	sa yadi vidhūnute yadi mehati yadi śakṛtkaroti varṣiṣyatīty eva veda
13.38.6	atha vātanāmāni juhoti purovāto varṣañ jinvar āvṛt svāhety aṣṭau
13.38.7	athāntarvedi kṛṣṇājine madhuṣā karīrasaktūn saṃyauti māndā vāśāḥ śundhyūr ajirāḥ / jyotiṣmatīs tamasvarīr undatīḥ suphenāḥ / mitrabhṛtaḥ kṣatrabhṛtaḥ surāṣṭrā iha māvateti
13.38.8	tisraḥ piṇḍīḥ kṛtvā samuccitya kṛṣṇājinasyāntān saṃdānenopanahyati vṛṣṇo aśvasya saṃdānam asi vṛṣṭyai tvopanahyāmīti
13.38.9	athainā anasaḥ prathamāyāṃ gadhāyām ābadhnāti
13.39.1	devā vasavyā agne soma sūryeti
13.39.2	ahorātre uparamati
13.39.3	dvitīyasyām ābadhnāti devāḥ śarmaṇyā mitrāvaruṇāryamann iti
13.39.4	ahorātre evoparamati
13.39.5	tṛtīyasyām ābadhnāti devāḥ sapītayo 'pāṃ napād āśuhemann iti
13.39.6	ahorātre evoparamati
13.39.7	atha vai bhavati
13.39.8	yadi varṣet tāvaty eva hotavyam iti
13.39.9	yadi caiva varṣati yadi nobhayenaiva piṇḍīr juhoti sruvopastīrṇābhighāritā divā cit tamaḥ kṛṇvanty ā yaṃ nara udīrayathā marutaḥ samudrata iti
13.39.10	athāsāṃ dhūmam anvīkṣate 'sitavarṇā harayaḥ suparṇā iti
13.39.11	yadi na varṣec chvo bhūte havir nirvapet
13.39.12	agnaye dhāmacchade puroḍāśam aṣṭākapālaṃ nirvapen mārutaṃ saptakapālaṃ sauryam ekakapālam iti
13.39.13	tasyā etā bhavanti tvaṃ tyā cid acyutāgne bhūrīṇi tava jātavedo divo no vṛṣṭiṃ maruto rarīdhvaṃ pinvanty apo marutaḥ sudānava ud u tyaṃ citram iti
13.39.14	atha purastāt sviṣṭakṛtaḥ sruvāhutīr upajuhoty aurvabhṛguvac chucim apnavānavad āhuva iti tisraḥ
13.39.15	athaitāṃ kumbhīm adbhiḥ pūrayati sṛjā vṛṣṭiṃ diva ādbhiḥ samudraṃ pṛṇeti
13.39.16	sā yadi dīryate yadi bhidyate varṣiṣyatīty eva veda
13.39.17	athāvim abhijuhoty abjā asi prathamajā balam asi samudriyam iti
13.39.18	sā yadi vidhūnute yadi mehati yadi śakṛtkaroti varṣiṣyatīty eva veda
13.39.19	atha varṣāhūstambam abhijuhoti
13.40.1	unnambhaya pṛthivīṃ bhinddhīdaṃ divyaṃ nabhaḥ / udno divyasya no dehīśāno visṛjā dṛtim iti
13.40.2	athainam āhavanīye 'nupraharati hiraṇyakeśo rajaso visāra iti
13.40.3	athāsya dhūmam anvīkṣata ā te suparṇā aminanta evair iti
13.40.4	athāntarvedi tiṣṭhan kṛṣṇājinam avadhūnoti ye devā divibhāgā ity āntād anuvākasya
13.40.5	saṃtiṣṭhate kārīrī
13.40.6	athāto 'ñjaḥsavakārīrī
13.40.7	āgneyam aṣṭākapālaṃ nirvapati śrapayitvāsādayati
13.40.8	tasyāḥ pañcadaśa sāmidhenyaḥ pañca prayājā vārtraghnāv ājyabhāgau
13.40.9	atha haviṣo 'gnir mūrdhā bhuva iti
13.40.10	triṣṭubhau saṃyājye
13.40.11	yābhiś caiva piṇḍīr ābadhnāti yābhiś ca juhoti yābhyāṃ ca dhūmam anvīkṣate tāḥ saṃsidhyanti
13.40.12	saṃtiṣṭhate 'ñjaḥsavakārīrī
13.41.1	atha vai bhavati
13.41.2	traidhātavīyena yajetābhicaran vābhicaryamāṇo vā sahasreṇa vā yakṣyamāṇaḥ sahasreṇa vejāno yo vā yakṣya ity uktvā na yajata iti
13.41.3	etayeṣṭyā yakṣyamāṇa upakalpayate sahasraṃ hiraṇyaṃ tārpyaṃ dhenum iti
13.41.4	atha devasya tvā savituḥ prasava iti pratipadaṃ kṛtvendrāviṣṇubhyāṃ juṣṭaṃ nirvapāmīti caturo muṣṭīn vrīhīṇāṃ nirvapati
13.41.5	etām eva pratipadaṃ kṛtvendrāviṣṇubhyāṃ juṣṭaṃ nirvapāmīti caturo yavānām
13.41.6	etām eva pratipadaṃ kṛtvendrāviṣṇubhyāṃ juṣṭaṃ nirvapāmīti catura eva vrīhīṇām
13.41.7	teṣāṃ vrīhiṣv eva haviṣkṛtam udvādayati
13.41.8	upodyacchante yavān
13.41.9	haviṣkṛtā vācaṃ visṛjate
13.41.10	samānaṃ karmādhivapanāt
13.41.11	adhyupya gārhapatye dvādaśa kapālāny upadadhāti
13.41.12	atha vai bhavati
13.41.13	dvādaśakapālaḥ puroḍāśo bhavati
13.41.14	te trayaś catuṣkapālāḥ
13.41.15	triṣṣamṛddhatvāya
13.41.16	trayaḥ puroḍāśā bhavanti
13.41.17	traya ime lokāḥ
13.41.18	eṣāṃ lokānām āptyai
13.41.19	uttarauttaro jyāyān bhavatīti
13.41.20	sa uttaramuttaram eva jyāyāṃsaṃ karoti yavamayaṃ madhye
13.41.21	atha vai bhavati
13.42.1	sarvāṇi chandāṃsy etasyām iṣṭyām anūcyānīty āhuḥ
13.42.2	triṣṭubho vā etad vīryaṃ yat kakut
13.42.3	uṣṇihā jagatyai
13.42.4	yad uṣṇihakakubhāv anvāha tenaiva sarvāṇi chandāṃsy avarunddha iti
13.42.5	pra so agne tavotibhir ity etāsāṃ dve dhāyyāloke dadhāti
13.42.6	athāgne trī te vājinā trī ṣadhastheti trivatyā paridadhāti sarūpatvāyeti brāhmaṇam
13.42.7	sarveṣām abhigamayann avadyatīti
13.42.8	tasyā ete bhavataḥ saṃ vāṃ karmaṇobhā jigyathur iti
13.42.9	anvāhāryam āsādya sahasraṃ hiraṇyaṃ tārpyaṃ dhenum iti dadāti
13.42.10	yaṃ kāmayeta rājanyam anapobdho jāyeta vṛtrān ghnaṃś cared iti tasmā etam aindrābārhaspatyaṃ caruṃ nirvaped iti
13.42.11	etayeṣṭyā yakṣyamāṇa upakalpayate hiraṇmayaṃ dāma
13.42.12	tasyā ete bhavato 'sme indrābṛhaspatī bṛhaspatir naḥ paripātu paścād iti
13.42.13	anvāhāryam āsādya hiraṇmayaṃ dāma dadāti
13.43.1	vaiśvānaraṃ dvādaśakapālaṃ nirvaped aniṣṭvāgrayaṇena navānnaṃ jagdhvā yo vānyasyāgniṣu yajeta yasya vānyo 'gniṣu yajeta
13.43.2	so 'raṇyor agnīn samārohyodavasāya mathitvāgnīn vihṛtya vaiśvānaraṃ dvādaśakapālaṃ nirvapati
13.43.3	tasyā ete bhavato vaiśvānaro na ūtyā pṛṣṭo divīti
13.43.4	agnaye tantumate puroḍāśam aṣṭākapālaṃ nirvaped vicchinnāgnihotro yo ā kāmayeta prajāyai me tantur na vicchidyeteti
13.43.5	so 'raṇyor agnīn samārohyodavasāya mathitvāgnīn vihṛtyāgnaye tantumate puroḍāśam aṣṭākapālaṃ nirvaped iti
13.43.6	tasyā ete bhavatas tvaṃ nas tantur uta setur agne tvaṃ panthā bhavasi devayānaḥ / tvayāgne pṛṣṭhaṃ vayam āruhema athā devaiḥ sadhamādaṃ madema svayaṃ kṛṇvānaḥ sugam aprayāvaṃ tigmaśṛṅgo vṛṣabhaḥ śośucānaḥ / pratnaṃ sadhastham anupaśyamāna ā tantum agnir divyaṃ tatāneti
13.43.7	sviṣṭavatyau saṃyājye havyavāham abhimātiṣāhaṃ rakṣohaṇaṃ pṛtanāsu jiṣṇum / jyotiṣmantaṃ dīdyataṃ purandhim agniṃ sviṣṭakṛtam āhuvema sviṣṭam agne abhi tat pṛṇāhi viśvā deva pṛtanā abhiṣya / uruṃ naḥ panthāṃ pradiśan vibhāhi jyotiṣmad dhehy ajaraṃ na āyur āyur iti
13.43.8	agnaye vratabhṛte puroḍāśam aṣṭākapālaṃ nirvaped ya āhitāgnir aśru kuryād iti
13.43.9	tasyā ete bhavatas tvam agne vratabhṛc chucir devāṃ āsādayā iha / agne havyāya voḍhave
13.43.10	vratā nu bibhrad vratapā adābhyo yajāno devāṃ ajaraḥ suvīraḥ / dadhad ratnāni suvidāno agne gopāya no jīvase jātaveda iti
13.43.11	atha yasyāgnayo vṛthāgnibhiḥ saṃsṛjyeran mitho vānyasya vāgnibhiḥ so 'raṇyor agnīn samārohyodavasāya mathitvāgnīn vihṛtyāgnaye vivicaye puroḍāśam aṣṭākapālaṃ nirvapaty agnaye vratapataya iti
13.43.12	tasyā etā bhavanti vi te viṣvag vātajūtāso agne tvām agne mānuṣīr īḍate viśas tvam agne vratapā asi yad vo vayaṃ pramināma vratānīti
13.43.13	saṃtiṣṭhanta iṣṭayaḥ saṃtiṣṭhanta iṣṭayaḥ
14.1.1	atha vai bhavati
14.1.2	prajāpatir akāmayata prajāḥ sṛjeyeti
14.1.3	sa tapo 'tapyata
14.1.4	sa sarpān asṛjata
14.1.5	so 'kāmayata prajāḥ sṛjeyeti
14.1.6	sa dvitīyam atapyata
14.1.7	sa vayāṃsy asṛjata
14.1.8	so 'kāmayata prajāḥ sṛjeyeti
14.1.9	sa tṛtīyam atapyata
14.1.10	sa etaṃ dīkṣitavādam apaśyat
14.1.11	tam avadat tato vai sa prajā asṛjateti
14.1.12	tat pṛcchanti katamat tat tapo yat tapas taptvā dīkṣitavādaṃ vadatīti
14.1.13	atha vai bhavati
14.1.14	aṅgirasaḥ suvargaṃ lokaṃ yanto 'psu dīkṣātapasī prāveśayan
14.1.15	apsu snāti
14.1.16	sākṣād eva dīkṣātapasī avarunddha ity etad iti brūyād iti
14.1.17	atha vai bhavati
14.1.18	yad vai dīkṣito 'medhyaṃ paśyaty apāsmād dīkṣā krāmati
14.1.19	nīlam asya haro vyetīti
14.1.20	so 'medhyaṃ dṛṣṭvā japaty abaddhaṃ mano daridraṃ cakṣuḥ sūryo jyotiṣāṃ śreṣṭho dīkṣe mā mā hāsīr ity āha
14.1.21	nāsmād dīkṣāpakrāmati
14.1.22	nāsya nīlaṃ na haro vyetīti brāhmaṇam
14.1.23	atha vai bhavati
14.1.24	yad vai dīkṣitam abhivarṣati divyā āpo 'śāntā ojo balaṃ dīkṣāṃ tapo 'sya nirghnantīti
14.1.25	so 'bhivṛṣyamāṇo japaty undatīr balaṃ dhattaujo dhatta balaṃ dhatta mā me dīkṣāṃ mā tapo nirvadhiṣṭety āha
14.1.26	etad eva sarvam ātman dhatte
14.1.27	nāsyaujo balaṃ na dīkṣāṃ na tapo nirghnantīti brāhmaṇam
14.1.28	atha vai bhavati
14.1.29	agnir vai dīkṣitasya devatā
14.1.30	so 'smād etarhi tira iva yarhi yātīti
14.1.31	so 'smāt samārūḍhas tira iva bhavati
14.1.32	so 'raṇyor agnīnt samārohya bṛhaspativatyarcā prayāti
14.1.33	bhadrād abhi śreyaḥ prehi bṛhaspatiḥ puraetā te astv ity āha
14.1.34	brahma vai devānāṃ bṛhaspatiḥ
14.1.35	tam evānvārabhate
14.1.36	sa enaṃ saṃpārayatīti brāhmaṇam
14.1.37	prajñātam apāṃ saṃyānasya
14.1.38	uktam adhyavasānasya
14.1.39	atha vai bhavati
14.1.40	yo vai somaṃ rājānaṃ sāmrājyaṃ lokaṃ gamayitvā krīṇāti gacchati svānāṃ sāmrājyam
14.1.41	chandāṃsi khalu vai somasya rājñaḥ sāmrājyo lokaḥ
14.1.42	purastāt somasya krayād evam abhimantrayeteti
14.1.43	sa purastāt somasya krayād evam abhimantrayate
14.2.1	eṣa te gāyatro bhāga iti me somāya brūtād eṣa te traiṣṭubho bhāga iti me somāya brūtād eṣa te jāgato bhāga iti me somāya brūtāc chandomānāṃ sāmrājyaṃ gaccheti me somāya brūtād iti
14.2.2	sāmrājyam evainaṃ lokaṃ gamayitvā krīṇāti
14.2.3	gacchati svānāṃ sāmrājyam iti brāhmaṇam
14.2.4	atha vai bhavati
14.2.5	yo vai tānūnaptrasya pratiṣṭhāṃ veda praty eva tiṣṭhati
14.2.6	brahmavādino vadanti na prāśnanti na juhvaty atha kva tānūnaptraṃ pratitiṣṭhatīti
14.2.7	prajāpatau manasīti brūyāt
14.2.8	trir avajighred iti
14.2.9	sa trir avajighrati prajāpatau tvā manasi juhomīti
14.2.10	eṣā vai tānūnaptrasya pratiṣṭhā
14.2.11	ya evaṃ veda praty eva tiṣṭhatīti brāhmaṇam
14.2.12	atha vai bhavati
14.2.13	yo vā adhvaryoḥ pratiṣṭhāṃ veda praty eva tiṣṭhati
14.2.14	yato manyetānabhikramya hoṣyāmīti tat tiṣṭhann āśrāvayed iti
14.2.15	sa yato manyetānabhikramya hoṣyāmīti tat tiṣṭhann āśrāvayati
14.2.16	eṣā vā adhvaryoḥ pratiṣṭhā
14.2.17	ya evaṃ veda praty eva tiṣṭhatīti brāhmaṇam
14.2.18	atha vai bhavati
14.2.19	yad abhikramya juhuyāt pratiṣṭhāyā iyāt
14.2.20	tasmāt samānatra tiṣṭhatā hotavyaṃ pratiṣṭhityā iti
14.2.21	tad etad anyatra haviryajñebhyaḥ
14.2.22	abhikrāmaṃ juhotīti haviryajñeṣu bhavati
14.2.23	atha vai bhavati
14.2.24	yo vā adhvaryoḥ svaṃ veda svavān eva bhavati
14.2.25	srug vā asya svaṃ vāyavyam asya svaṃ camaso 'sya svam
14.2.26	yad vāyavyaṃ vā camasaṃ vānanvārabhyāśrāvayet svād iyād iti
14.2.27	sa vāyavyaṃ caiva camasaṃ cānvārabhyāśrāvayati
14.2.28	svād eva naitīti brāhmaṇam
14.2.29	atha vai bhavati
14.2.30	yo vai somam apratiṣṭhāpya stotram upākaroty apratiṣṭhitaḥ somo bhavaty apratiṣṭhita stomo 'pratiṣṭhitāny ukthāny apratiṣṭhito yajamāno 'pratiṣṭhito 'dhvaryuḥ
14.2.31	vāyavyaṃ vai somasya pratiṣṭhā camaso 'sya pratiṣṭhā soma stomasya stoma ukthānām
14.2.32	grahaṃ vā gṛhītvā camasaṃ vonnīya stotram upākuryād iti
14.2.33	unnayanaṃ hy eva camasasya grahaṇam
14.2.34	sa grahaṃ vaiva gṛhītvā camasaṃ vonnīya stotram upākaroti
14.2.35	praty eva somaṃ sthāpayati prati stomaṃ praty ukthāni
14.2.36	prati yajamānas tiṣṭhati praty adhvaryur iti brāhmaṇam
14.3.1	atha vai bhavati
14.3.2	yajñaṃ vā etat saṃbharanti yat somakrayaṇyai padam
14.3.3	yajñamukhaṃ havirdhāne
14.3.4	yarhi havirdhāne prācī pravartayeyus tarhi tenākṣam upāñjyād iti
14.3.5	sa yarhi havirdhāne prācī pravartayati tarhi tena padatṛtīyena patnyakṣadhuram upānakti
14.3.6	yajñamukha eva yajñam anusaṃtanotīti brāhmaṇam
14.3.7	atha vai bhavati
14.3.8	prāñcam agniṃ praharanty ut patnīm ānayanty anv anāṃsi pravartayanty atha vā asyaiṣa dhiṣṇiyo hīyate so 'nudhyāyati sa īśvaro rudro bhūtvā prajāṃ paśūn yajamānasya śamayitoḥ
14.3.9	yarhi paśum āprītam udañcaṃ nayanti tarhi tasya paśuśrapaṇaṃ hared iti
14.3.10	sa yarhi paśum āprītam udañcaṃ nayanti tarhi tasya paśuśrapaṇaṃ harati
14.3.11	tenaivainaṃ bhāginaṃ karotīti brāhmaṇam
14.3.12	atha vai bhavati
14.3.13	yajamāno vā āhavanīyaḥ
14.3.14	yajamānaṃ vā etad vikarṣante yad āhavanīyāt paśuśrapaṇaṃ haranti
14.3.15	sa vaiva syān nirmanthyaṃ vā kuryād iti
14.3.16	sa yady u hainam kariṣyan bhavati nainam anvānayate
14.3.17	ajasra evāpy eṣa dīpyamānaḥ śete
14.3.18	yady u vā enam anvānayate tasya paśuvelāyām ulmukam ādāyāraṇī upasaṃgṛhya pūrvaḥ paśoḥ pratipadyate
14.3.19	nirmanthyenātra paśuṃ śrapayanti
14.3.20	vapayā tat saholmukam āharanti yajamānasya sātmatvāyeti brāhmaṇam
14.3.21	atha vai bhavati
14.3.22	yadi paśor avadānaṃ naśyed ājyasya pratyākhyāyam avadyed iti
14.3.23	sa yāvanti paśor avadānāni naśyanti tāvat kṛtva ājyasya pratyākhyāyam avadyati
14.3.24	saiva tataḥ prāyaścittir iti brāhmaṇam
14.3.25	atha vai bhavati
14.3.26	ye paśuṃ vimathnīran yas tān kāmayetārtim ārccheyur iti kuvid aṅgeti namovṛktivatyarcāgnīdhre juhuyād iti
14.3.27	sa kuvid aṅgeti namovṛktivatyarcāgnīdhre juhoti
14.3.28	namovṛktim evaiṣāṃ vṛṅkte
14.3.29	tājag ārtim ārcchantīti brāhmaṇam
14.3.30	yady u vā ekacaraṃ vimathnīte śāmitra etāṃ juhoti
14.3.31	prajñātam upākaraṇasya
14.3.32	uktam apāvyānāṃ caraṇam
14.3.33	brāhmaṇam uttaram
14.4.1	atha vai bhavati
14.4.2	yo vā ayathādevataṃ yajñam upacaraty ā devatābhyo vṛścyate pāpīyān bhavati
14.4.3	yo yathādevataṃ na devatābhya āvṛścyate vasīyān bhavati
14.4.4	āgneyyarcāgnīdhram abhimṛśed vaiṣṇavyā havirdhānam āgneyyā sruco vāyavyayā vāyavyāny aindriyā sada iti
14.4.5	sa āgneyyarcāgnīdhram abhimṛśati vaiṣṇavyā havirdhānam āgneyyā sruco vāyavyayā vāyavyāny aindriyā sadaḥ
14.4.6	yathādevatam eva yajñam upacarati
14.4.7	na devatābhya āvṛścyate vasīyān bhavatīti brāhmaṇam
14.4.8	uktam audumbarāṇāṃ mahāparidhīnāṃ paridhānam
14.4.9	uktaṃ srucāṃ sādanam
14.4.10	uktaṃ pātrāṇām abhimarśanam
14.4.11	atha vai bhavati
14.4.12	iṣṭargo vā adhvaryur yajamānasya
14.4.13	iṣṭargaḥ khalu vai pūrvo 'rṣṭuḥ kṣīyate
14.4.14	āsanyān mā mantrāt pāhi kasyāś cid abhiśastyā iti purā prātaranuvākāj juhuyād iti
14.4.15	purā prātaranuvākān mahārātra utthāyāgnīdhra āsanyāṃ juhoty āsanyān mā mantrāt pāhi kasyāś cid abhiśastyāḥ svāheti
14.4.16	ātmana eva tad adhvaryuḥ purastāc charma nahyate 'nārtyā iti brāhmaṇam
14.4.17	atha vai bhavati
14.4.18	yo vai chandobhir abhibhavati sa saṃsunvator abhibhavatīti
14.4.19	sa saṃsunvator mahārātra utthāyāgnīdhre tisro 'bhibhūtīr juhoti saṃveśāya tvopaveśāya tvā gāyatriyā abhibhūtyai svāhā saṃveśāya tvopaveśāya tvā triṣṭubho 'bhibhūtyai svāhā saṃveśāya tvopaveśāya tvā jagatyā abhibhūtyai svāheti
14.4.20	atha dve prāṇāhutī juhoti prāṇāpānau mṛtyor mā pātaṃ prāṇāpānau mā mā hāsiṣṭam iti
14.4.21	atha vai bhavati
14.4.22	devatāsu vā ete prāṇāpānayor vyāyacchante yeṣāṃ somaḥ samṛcchate
14.4.23	saṃveśāya tvopaveśāya tvety āha
14.4.24	chandāṃsi vai saṃveśa upaveśaḥ
14.4.25	chandobhir evāsya chandāṃsi vṛṅkta iti brāhmaṇam
14.4.26	atha vai bhavati
14.4.27	yasya bhūyāṃso yajñakratava ity āhuḥ sa devatā vṛṅkta iti
14.4.28	yady agniṣṭomaḥ somaḥ parastāt syād ukthyaṃ kurvīteti
14.4.29	ukthyaṃ kratum upaiti
14.4.30	yady ukthyaḥ syād atirātraṃ kurvīteti
14.4.31	atirātraṃ kratum upaiti
14.4.32	yajñakratubhir evāsya devatā vṛṅkte vasīyān bhavatīti brāhmaṇam
14.4.33	iti nvā adhvaryutaḥ
14.4.34	atha chandogataḥ
14.4.35	pretivanti caitivanti cājyāni bhavanty abhijityai
14.4.36	marutvatīḥ pratipado vijityai
14.4.37	ubhe bṛhadrathaṃtare bhavataḥ
14.4.38	iti nvai chandogataḥ
14.4.39	atha hotṛtaḥ
14.4.40	sajanīyaṃ śasyaṃ vihavyaṃ śasyam agastyasya kayāśubhīyaṃ śasyam iti nvā ekāhayājinaḥ
14.4.41	atha sattriṇāṃ mahārātra utthānaṃ caiva samānaṃ pañcābhibhūtīr dve prāṇāhutī
14.4.42	te yathākratv eva yanti
14.4.43	ādiṣṭāny evāhāny upayanti
14.4.44	uktaṃ nigrābhyāsu vācanam
14.4.45	atha vai bhavati
14.4.46	oṣadhayo vai somasya viśaḥ
14.4.47	viśaḥ khalu vai rājñaḥ pradātor īśvarāḥ
14.4.48	aindraḥ soma iti
14.4.49	so 'bhiṣoṣyann oṣadhībhyo 'dhi rājānaṃ niryācate
14.4.50	avīvṛdhaṃ vo manasā sujātā ṛtaprajātā bhaga id vaḥ syāma / indreṇa devīr vīrudhaḥ saṃvidānā anu manyantāṃ savanāya somam ity āha
14.4.51	oṣadhībhya evainaṃ svāyai viśaḥ svāyai devatāyai niryācyābhiṣuṇotīti brāhmaṇam
14.4.52	atha vai bhavati
14.4.53	yo vai somasyābhiṣūyamāṇasya prathamo 'ṃśu skandati sa īśvara indriyaṃ vīryaṃ prajāṃ paśūn yajamānasya nirhantoḥ
14.4.54	tam abhimantrayeteti
14.4.55	sa yaḥ somasyābhiṣūyamāṇasya prathamo 'ṃśu skandati tam abhimantrayetā māskānt saha prajayā saha rāyas poṣeṇendriyaṃ me vīryaṃ mā nirvadhīr iti
14.4.56	āśiṣam evaitām āśāsta indriyasya vīryasya prajāyai paśūnām anirghātāyeti brāhmaṇam
14.4.57	atraiṣā drapsānumantraṇīyā
14.4.58	tām itarābhiḥ saha vakṣyāmaḥ
14.4.59	atha vai bhavati
14.5.1	yo vai devān devayaśasenārpayati manuṣyān manuṣyayaśasena devayaśasy eva deveṣu bhavati manuṣyayaśasī manuṣyeṣu
14.5.2	yān prācīnam āgrayaṇād grahān gṛhṇīyāt tān upāṃśu gṛhṇīyāt
14.5.3	yān ūrdhvāṃs tān upabdimata iti
14.5.4	sa yān prācīnam āgrayaṇād grahān gṛhṇāti tān upāṃśu gṛhṇāti
14.5.5	yān ūrdhvāṃs tān upabdimataḥ
14.5.6	devān eva tad devayaśasenārpayati manuṣyān manuṣyayaśasena
14.5.7	devayaśasy eva deveṣu bhavati manuṣyayaśasī manuṣyeṣv iti brāhmaṇam
14.5.8	te yatra bahiṣpavamānaṃ srapsyanto bhavanti teṣu samanvārabdheṣv āhavanīye sruvāhutiṃ juhoty agniḥ prātaḥsavane pātv asmān vaiśvānaro mahinā viśvaśambhūḥ / sa naḥ pāvako draviṇaṃ dadhātv āyuṣmantaḥ sahabhakṣāḥ syāma svāheti
14.5.9	mādhyaṃdine pavamāne tathaiva samanvārabdheṣv āhavanīye sruvāhutiṃ juhoti viśve devā maruta indro asmān asmin dvitīye savane na jahyuḥ / āyuṣmantaḥ priyam eṣāṃ vadanto vayaṃ devānāṃ sumatau syāma svāheti
14.5.10	ārbhave pavamāne tathaiva samanvārabdheṣv āhavanīye sruvāhutiṃ juhotīdaṃ tṛtīyaṃ savanaṃ kavīnām ṛtena ye camasam airayanta / te saudhanvanāḥ suvar ānaśānāḥ sviṣṭiṃ no abhi vasīyo nayantu svāheti
14.5.11	atha vai bhavati
14.5.12	āyatanavatīr vā anyā āhutayo hūyante 'nāyatanā anyāḥ
14.5.13	yā āghāravatīs tā āyatanavatīr yāḥ saumyās tā anāyatanāḥ
14.5.14	aindravāyavam ādāyāghāram āghārayed iti
14.5.15	sa aindravāyavam ādāyāghāram āghārayaty adhvaro yajño 'yam astu devā oṣadhībhyaḥ paśave no janāya / viśvasmai bhūtāyādhvaro 'si sa pinvasva ghṛtavad deva soma svāheti
14.5.16	saumyā eva tad āhutīr āyatanavatīḥ karoti
14.5.17	āyatanavān bhavati ya evaṃ veda
14.5.18	atho dyāvāpṛthivī eva ghṛtena vyunatti
14.5.19	te vyutte upajīvanīye bhavataḥ
14.5.20	upajīvanīyo bhavati ya evaṃ vedeti brāhmaṇam
14.5.21	atha pratiprasthātottarārdha āhavanīyasya manthinaḥ saṃsrāvaṃ juhoty eṣa te rudra bhāgo yaṃ nirayācathās taṃ juṣasva vider gaupatyaṃ rāyaspoṣaṃ suvīryaṃ saṃvatsarīṇāṃ svāheti
14.5.22	atha vai bhavati
14.5.23	manuḥ putrebhyo dāyaṃ vyabhajat
14.5.24	sa nābhānediṣṭhaṃ brahmacaryaṃ vasantaṃ nirabhajat
14.5.25	sa āgacchat
14.5.26	so 'bravīt kathā mā nirabhāg iti
14.5.27	na tvā nirabhākṣam ity abravīt
14.5.28	aṅgirasa ime sattram āsate
14.5.29	te suvargaṃ lokaṃ na prajānanti
14.5.30	tebhya idaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ brūhi
14.5.31	te suvargaṃ lokaṃ yanto ya eṣāṃ paśavas tāṃs te dāsyantīti
14.5.32	tad ebhyo 'bravīd iti
14.5.33	tat pṛcchanti kim ebhyas tad uvācety apāvyāni santanīr drapsānumantraṇīyā acchāvākīyā stotrīyāḥ śastrīyāḥ satyaṃ vadata śraddhā vo mā vigād ity etad ebhyas tad uvāceti
14.5.34	taṃ paśubhiś carantaṃ yajñavāstau rudra āgacchad ity uktasyaiṣa karmaṇo 'nuvādaḥ
14.5.35	atha dve pravṛtāhutī juhoti
14.5.36	juṣṭo vāco bhūyāsam ṛcā stomaṃ samardhayety upariṣṭāt tṛtīyā
14.5.37	tām u tatraiva vakṣyāmaḥ
14.5.38	atha drapsān anumantrayate drapsaś caskanda yas te drapso yo drapso yas te drapsa iti
14.5.39	atha vai bhavati
14.5.40	adhvaryur vā ṛtvijāṃ prathamo yujyate tena stomo yoktavya iti
14.5.41	te yatra bahiṣpavamānaṃ sarpanti tatprahva evādhvaryuḥ prathamo barhiṣī dhuvānaḥ sarpati
14.5.42	vāg agregā agra etv ṛjugā devebhyo yaśo mayi dadhatī prāṇān paśuṣu prajāṃ mayi ca yajamāne cety āha
14.5.43	vācam eva tad yajñamukhe yunaktīti brāhmaṇam
14.5.44	atha vai bhavati
14.5.45	vāstu vā etad yajñasya kriyate yad grahān gṛhītvā bahiṣpavamānaṃ sarpanti
14.5.46	parāñco hi yanti
14.5.47	parācībhi stuvate
14.5.48	vaiṣṇavyarcā punar etyopatiṣṭhata iti
14.5.49	sa vaiṣṇavyarcā punar etyopatiṣṭhate
14.5.50	yajño vai viṣṇuḥ
14.5.51	yajñam evākar
14.5.52	viṣṇo tvaṃ no antamaḥ śarma yaccha sahantya / pra te dhārā madhuścuta utsaṃ duhrate akṣitam ity āha
14.5.53	yad evāsya śayānasyopaśuṣyati tad evāsyaitenāpyāyayatīti brāhmaṇam
14.6.1	atha vai bhavati
14.6.2	yo vai pavamānānām anvārohān vidvān yajate 'nu pavamānān ārohati
14.6.3	na pavamānebhyo 'vacchidyata iti
14.6.4	bahiṣpavamāne pañcamyāṃ prastutāyāṃ vācayati śyeno 'si gāyatracchandā anu tvārabhe svasti mā saṃpārayeti
14.6.5	mādhyaṃdine pavamāne 'ṣṭamyāṃ prastutāyāṃ vācayati suparṇo 'si triṣṭupchandā anu tvārabhe svasti mā saṃpārayeti
14.6.6	ārbhave pavamāne navamyāṃ prastutāyāṃ vācayati saghāsi jagatīcchandā anu tvārabhe svasti mā saṃpārayety āha
14.6.7	ete vai pavamānānām anvārohāḥ
14.6.8	tān ya evaṃ vidvān yajate 'nu pavamānān ārohati
14.6.9	na pavamānebhyo 'vacchidyata iti brāhmaṇam
14.6.10	atha vai bhavati
14.6.11	yo vai pavamānasya saṃtatiṃ veda sarvam āyur eti
14.6.12	na purāyuṣaḥ pramīyate
14.6.13	paśumān bhavati
14.6.14	vindate prajām
14.6.15	pavamānasya grahā gṛhyante 'tha vā asyaite 'gṛhītāḥ
14.6.16	droṇakalaśa ādhavanīyaḥ pūtabhṛt tān yad agṛhītvopākuryāt pavamānaṃ vicchindyāt
14.6.17	taṃ vicchidyamānam adhvaryoḥ prāṇo 'nu vicchidyeta
14.6.18	upayāmagṛhīto 'si prajāpataye tveti droṇakalaśam abhimṛśed iti
14.6.19	sa prajāpataye tveti droṇakalaśam abhimṛśati
14.6.20	indrāya tvety ādhavanīyam
14.6.21	viśvebhyas tvā devebhya iti pūtabhṛtam
14.6.22	pavamānam eva tat saṃtanoti
14.6.23	sarvam āyur eti
14.6.24	na purāyuṣaḥ pramīyate
14.6.25	paśumān bhavati
14.6.26	vindate prajām iti brāhmaṇam
14.6.27	atha vai bhavati
14.6.28	trīṇi vāva savanāni
14.6.29	atha tṛtīyaṃ savanam avalumpanty anaṃśu kurvante
14.6.30	upāṃśuṃ hutvopāṃśupātre 'ṃśum avāsya taṃ tṛtīyasavane 'pisṛjyābhiṣuṇuyād iti
14.6.31	sa ya evaiṣa upāṃśupātre 'ṃśuḥ prāsto bhavati taṃ mādhyaṃdinīya ṛjīṣe 'pisṛjyābhiṣuṇoti
14.6.32	yad āpyāyayati tenāṃśumat
14.6.33	yad abhiṣuṇoti tenarjīṣi
14.6.34	sarvāṇy eva tat savanāny aṃśumanti śukravanti samāvadvīryāṇi karotīti brāhmaṇam
14.7.1	athāto dīrṇapravṛttānām eva mīmāṃsā
14.7.2	droṇakalaśe dīrṇe vā pravṛtte vā pātryāṃ caturgṛhītaṃ gṛhītvāhavanīye juhoty anvārabdhe yajamāne vidhuṃ dadrāṇaṃ samane bahūnāṃ yuvānaṃ santaṃ palito jagāra / devasya paśya kāvyaṃ mahitvādyā mamāra sa hyaḥ samāna svāheti
14.7.3	atha hotṛcamase vasatīvarībhyo 'dhy apo niḥṣicya tasya svadhāṃ saṃbharati bhūtiḥ somena vardhatāṃ tasya meṣṭasya vītasya draviṇam āgamyād iti
14.7.4	skannam anumantrayate bhūpataye svāhā bhuvanapataye svāhā bhūtānāṃ pataye svāheti
14.7.5	sa yady u ha dīrṇo bhavati pratilimpaty enam
14.7.6	yady u vai pravṛtta ucchrityainaṃ barhiṣī antardhāya svadhām ānayaty apoddhṛtya barhiṣī āgrayaṇād evāptuṃ praskandayati
14.7.7	ādhavanīye dīrṇe vā pravṛtte vā tathaiva pātryāṃ caturgṛhītaṃ gṛhītvāhavanīye juhoty anvārabdhe yajamāne dvau samudrau vitatāv ajūryau paryāvartete jaṭhareva pādāḥ / tayoḥ paśyanto atiyanty anyam apaśyantaḥ setunātiyanty anyaṃ svāheti
14.7.8	atha hotṛcamase vasatīvarībhyo 'dhy apo niḥṣicya tasya tathaiva svadāṃ saṃbharati bhūtiḥ somena vardhatāṃ tasya meṣṭasya vītasya draviṇam āgamyād iti
14.7.9	skannam anumantrayate bhūpataye svāhā bhuvanapataye svāhā bhūtānāṃ pataye svāheti
14.7.10	sa yady u ha dīrṇo bhavati pratilimpaty enam
14.7.11	yady u vai pravṛtta ucchrityainaṃ barhiṣī antardhāya svadhām ānayaty apoddhṛtya barhiṣī āgrayaṇād evāptuṃ praskandayati
14.7.12	pūtabhṛti dīrṇe vā pravṛtte vā tathaiva pātryāṃ caturgṛhītaṃ gṛhītvāhavanīye juhoty anvārabdhe yajamāne dve dradhasī satatī vasta ekaḥ keśī viśvā bhuvanāni vidvān / tirodhāyaity asitaṃ vasānaḥ śukram ādatte anuhāya jāryai svāheti
14.7.13	atha hotṛcamase vasatīvarībhyo 'dhy apo niḥṣicya tasya tathaiva svadhāṃ saṃbharati bhūtiḥ somena vardhatāṃ tasya meṣṭasya vītasya draviṇam āgamyād iti
14.7.14	skannam anumantrayate bhūpataye svāhā bhuvanapataye svāhā bhūtānāṃ pataye svāheti
14.7.15	sa yady u ha dīrṇo bhavati pratilimpaty enam
14.7.16	yady u vai pravṛtta ucchrityainaṃ barhiṣī antardhāya svadhām ānayaty apoddhṛtya barhiṣī āgrayaṇād evāptuṃ praskandayati
14.7.17	āgrayaṇe dīrṇe vā pravṛtte vā tasya purorucā hutvocchrityainaṃ barhiṣī antardhāya svadhām ānayaty apoddhṛtya barhiṣī droṇakalaśād evāptuṃ praskandayati
14.7.18	athānyasmin grahe dīrṇe vā pravṛtte vā tasyaiva purorucā hutvocchrityainaṃ barhiṣī antardhāya svadhām ānayaty apoddhṛtya barhiṣī āgrayaṇād evāptuṃ praskandayati
14.8.1	atha vai bhavati
14.8.2	devā vai yad yajñe 'kurvata tad asurā akurvata
14.8.3	te devā etaṃ mahāyajñam apaśyan
14.8.4	tam atanvata
14.8.5	agnihotraṃ vratam akurvata
14.8.6	tasmād dvivrataḥ syāt
14.8.7	dvir hy agnihotraṃ juhvati
14.8.8	paurṇamāsaṃ yajñam agnīṣomīyaṃ paśum akurvata
14.8.9	dārśyaṃ yajñam āgneyaṃ paśum akurvata
14.8.10	vaiśvadevaṃ prātaḥsavanam akurvata
14.8.11	varuṇapraghāsān mādhyaṃdinaṃ savanaṃ sākamedhān pitṛyajñaṃ tryambakāṃs tṛtīyasavanam akurvateti
14.8.12	tat pṛcchanti katamaḥ sa mahāyajña iti
14.8.13	ayam eva cāturmāsyaḥ soma ukto bhavati
14.8.14	atho khalu ya eva kaś ca saumyo 'dhvaraḥ sa mahāyajñaḥ
14.8.15	tam eṣām asurā yajñam anvavājigāṃsan
14.8.16	taṃ nānvavāyan
14.8.17	te 'bruvann adhvartavyā vā ime devā abhūvann iti
14.8.18	tad adhvarasyādhvaratvam
14.8.19	tato devā abhavan parāsurāḥ
14.8.20	ya evaṃ vidvānt somena yajate bhavaty ātmanā parāsya bhrātṛvyo bhavatīti brāhmaṇam
14.8.21	atha samastaṃ rājānam upatiṣṭhate paribhūr agniṃ paribhūr indraṃ paribhūr viśvān devān paribhūr māṃ saha brahmavarcasena sa naḥ pavasva śaṃ gave śaṃ janāya śam arvate śaṃ rājann oṣadhībhyo 'cchinnasya te rayipate suvīryasya rāyas poṣasya daditāraḥ syāma / tasya me rāsva tasya te bhakṣīya tasya ta idam unmṛja iti
14.8.22	catvāro brāhmaṇasaṃpannāḥ kāmās teṣāṃ yaṃ kāmaṃ kāmayate tam ādiśyonmṛṣṭe
14.8.23	athāvakāśaiś carati
14.8.24	prāṇāya me varcodā varcase pavasvety upāṃśupātram avekṣate
14.8.25	apānāyety antaryāmapātram
14.8.26	vyānāyety upāṃśusavanam
14.8.27	vāca ity aindravāyavam
14.8.28	dakṣakratubhyām iti maitrāvaruṇam
14.8.29	śrotrāyety āśvinam
14.8.30	cakṣurbhyām iti śukrāmanthinau
14.8.31	ātmana ity āgrayaṇam
14.8.32	aṅgebhya ity ukthyam
14.8.33	āyuṣa iti dhruvam
14.8.34	pratiṣṭhāyā ity ṛtupātre mādhyaṃdine savane
14.8.35	na prātaḥsavane
14.8.36	vīryāyety atigrāhyaṃ vā ṣoḍaśinaṃ vāvekṣate
14.8.37	viṣṇor jaṭharam asīti droṇakalaśam avekṣate
14.8.38	indrasya jaṭharam asīty ādhavanīyam
14.8.39	viśveṣāṃ devānāṃ jaṭharam asīti pūtabhṛtam
14.8.40	atha samastam eva rājānam upatiṣṭhate ko 'si ko nāma kasmai tvā kāya tvā yaṃ tvā somenātītṛpaṃ yaṃ tvā somenāmīmadaṃ suprajāḥ prajayā bhūyāsaṃ suvīro vīraiḥ suvarcā varcasā supoṣaḥ poṣair viśvebhyo me rūpebhyo varcodā varcase pavasva tasya me rāsva tasya te bhakṣīya tasya ta idam unmṛja iti
14.8.41	catvāro brāhmaṇasaṃpannāḥ kāmās teṣāṃ yaṃ kāmaṃ kāmayate tam ādiśyonmṛṣṭa āyur unmṛje bhūtim unmṛje brahmavarcasam unmṛje 'muṣya prāṇam unmṛja idam unmṛja iti
14.8.42	yam eva tarpayati
14.8.43	sa enaṃ tṛptaḥ prāṇāpānābhyāṃ vāco dakṣakratubhyāṃ cakṣurbhyāṃ śrotrābhyām ātmano 'ṅgebhya āyuṣo 'ntar eti
14.8.44	tājak pradhanvatīti brāhmaṇam
14.8.45	uktaṃ sphyavighanānām upasthānam
14.8.46	uktaṃ saṃprasarpaṇasya
14.8.47	ukto bhakṣānuvākaḥ
14.9.1	uktaṃ pṛṣadājyasyāvikṛtasya grahaṇam
14.9.2	ukto dadhigharmaḥ
14.9.3	atha vai bhavati
14.9.4	yat kṛṣṇaśakunaḥ pṛṣadājyam avamṛśec chūdrā asya pramāyukāḥ syuḥ
14.9.5	yac chvāvamṛśec catuṣpādo 'sya paśavaḥ pramāyukāḥ syuḥ
14.9.6	yat skanded yajamānaḥ pramāyukaḥ syād iti
14.9.7	atha vai bhavati
14.9.8	paśavo vai pṛṣadājyam
14.9.9	paśavo vā etasya skandanti yasya pṛṣadājyaṃ skandati
14.9.10	yat pṛṣadājyaṃ punar gṛhṇāti paśūn evāsmai punar gṛhṇād iti brāhmaṇam
14.9.11	atha vai bhavati
14.9.12	prāṇo vai pṛṣadājyam
14.9.13	prāṇo vā etasya skandati yasya pṛṣadājyaṃ skandati
14.9.14	yat pṛṣadājyaṃ punar gṛhṇāti prāṇam evāsmai punar gṛhṇāti
14.9.15	hiraṇyam avadhāya gṛhṇātīti
14.9.16	skanne pṛṣadājye kaṃsaṃ vā camasaṃ vā yācati
14.9.17	tam antarvedi nidhāya tasya svadhāṃ saṃbharati bhūtir dadhnā ghṛtena vardhatāṃ tasya meṣṭasya vītasya draviṇam āgamyād iti
14.9.18	skannam anumantrayate bhūpataye svāhā bhuvanapataye svāhā bhūtānāṃ pataye svāheti
14.9.19	athaitasyāṃ srucy avadadhāti śatamānaṃ hiraṇyam
14.9.20	nitye grahaṇe vaiṣṇavīm ṛcam anuvartayati viṣṇo tvaṃ no antama iti
14.9.21	apoddhṛtya hiraṇyam aśvam avaghrāpya sādayati
14.9.22	athāto 'medhyabhūtasyaiva śvāvaghrātasya dhvāṅkṣāvamṛṣṭasya kīṭāvapannasyeti yad u cānyad amedhyaṃ manyate
14.9.23	sarvaśa evaitāṃ srucam apsu praveśyāthānyasyāṃ srucy avadadhāti śatamānaṃ hiraṇyam
14.9.24	nitye grahaṇe vaiṣṇavīm ṛcam anuvartayati viṣṇo tvaṃ no antama iti
14.9.25	apoddhṛtya hiraṇyam aśvam avaghrāpyaiva sādayati
14.9.26	atha vai bhavati
14.9.27	vi vā etasya yajñaś chidyate yasya pṛṣadājyaṃ skandati
14.9.28	vaiṣṇavyarcā punar gṛhṇātīti
14.9.29	sa vaiṣṇavyarcā punar gṛhṇāti
14.9.30	yajño vai viṣṇuḥ
14.9.31	yajñenaiva yajñaṃ saṃtanotīti brāmaṇam
14.9.32	te yatrāntaḥśālaṃ pracariṣyanto bhavanti tad āha brahman pracariṣyāmo hotar gharmam abhiṣṭuhīti
14.9.33	tad brahmā prasauti deva savitar etat te prāha tat pra ca suva pra ca yaja bṛhaspatir brahmā sa yajñaṃ pāhi sa yajñapatiṃ pāhi sa māṃ pāhy oṃ pracarateti pratiṣṭhetīha haviryajñeṣu bhavati
14.9.34	yatrāha brahman stoṣyāmaḥ praśāstar iti tad brahmā prasauti deva savitar etat te prāha tat pra ca suva pra ca yaja bṛhaspatir brahmāyuṣmatyā ṛco mā gāta tanūpāt sāmnaḥ satyā va āśiṣaḥ santu satyā ākūtaya ṛtaṃ ca satyaṃ ca vadata stuta devasya savituḥ prasave bhūr indravanta stuteti prātaḥsavane
14.9.35	bhuva indravanta stuteti mādhyaṃdine
14.9.36	suvar indravanta stuteti tṛtīyasavane
14.9.37	stute stutasya dohaṃ vācayati stutasya stutam asy ūrjaṃ mahyaṃ stutaṃ duhām ā mā stutasya stutaṃ gamyād iti
14.9.38	śastre śastrasya dohaṃ vācayati śastrasya śastram asy ūrjaṃ mahyaṃ śastraṃ duhām ā mā śastrasya śastraṃ gamyād iti
14.9.39	tayor ubhayor abhyāsaṃ vācayatīndriyāvanto vanāmahe dhukṣīmahi prajām iṣaṃ sā me satyāśīr deveṣu bhūyād brahmavarcasaṃ māgamyād iti
14.9.40	atha yajñasya punarālambhaṃ japati yajño babhūva sa ā babhūva sa prajajñe sa vāvṛdhe / sa devānām adhipatir babhūva so asmāṃ adhipatīn karotu vayaṃ syāma patayo rayīṇām iti
14.9.41	atha vai bhavati
14.9.42	yajño vā vai yajñapatiṃ duhe yajñapatir vā yajñaṃ duhe
14.9.43	sa ya stutaśastrayor doham avidvān yajate taṃ yajño duhe
14.9.44	sa iṣṭvā pāpīyān bhavati
14.9.45	ya enayor dohaṃ vidvān yajate sa yajñaṃ duhe
14.9.46	sa iṣṭvā vasīyān bhavati
14.9.47	stutasya stutam asy ūrjaṃ mahyaṃ stutaṃ duhām ā mā stutasya stutaṃ gamyācchastrasya śastram asy ūrjaṃ mahyaṃ śastraṃ duhām ā mā śastrasya śastraṃ gamyād ity āha
14.9.48	eṣa vai stutaśastrayor dohaḥ
14.9.49	taṃ ya evaṃ vidvān yajate duha eva yajñam
14.9.50	iṣṭvā vasīyān bhavatīti brāhmaṇam
14.9.51	uktaṃ hotrakāṇāṃ saṃtarpaṇam
14.9.52	uktāni vaiśvakarmaṇāni
14.9.53	uktam āśiro 'vanayanam
14.9.54	uktā dhruvasya caryā
14.9.55	atha vai bhavati
14.10.1	yad vai hotādhvaryum abhyāhvayate vajram enam abhi pravartayati
14.10.2	ukthaśā ity āha prātaḥsavanaṃ pratigīryeti
14.10.3	sa ukthamukthaṃ vaiva pratigīryokthaśā ity āha savanaṃsavanaṃ vā
14.10.4	ukthaṃ vācīty āha mādhyaṃdinaṃ savanaṃ pratigīrya
14.10.5	ukthaṃ vācīndrāyety āha tṛtīyasavanaṃ pratigīrya
14.10.6	saptaitāny akṣarāṇi
14.10.7	saptapadā śakvarī
14.10.8	śākvaro vajraḥ
14.10.9	vajreṇaiva tṛtīyasavane vajram antar dhatta iti brāhmaṇam
14.10.10	atha vai bhavati
14.10.11	brahmavādino vadanti sa tvā adhvaryuḥ syād yo yathāsavanaṃ pratigare chandāṃsi saṃpādayet
14.10.12	tejaḥ prātaḥsavana ātman dadhītendriyaṃ mādhyaṃdine savane paśūṃs tṛtīyasavana iti
14.10.13	ukthaśā ity āha prātaḥsavanaṃ pratigīrya
14.10.14	ukthaṃ vācīty āha mādhyaṃdinaṃ savanaṃ pratigīrya
14.10.15	ukthaṃ vācīndrāyety āha tṛtīyasavanaṃ pratigīrya
14.10.16	saptaitāny akṣarāṇi
14.10.17	saptapadā śakvarī
14.10.18	śākvarāḥ paśavaḥ
14.10.19	jāgataṃ tṛtīyasavanam
14.10.20	tṛtīyasavana eva pratigare chandāṃsi saṃpādayati
14.10.21	atho paśavo vai jagatī
14.10.22	paśavas tṛtīyasavanam
14.10.23	paśūn eva tṛtīyasavana ātman dhatta iti brāhmaṇam
14.10.24	atha vai bhavati
14.10.25	yad vai hotādhvaryum abhyāhvayata āvyam asmin dadhāti
14.10.26	tad yan nāpahanīta purāsya saṃvatsarād gṛha āvevīran
14.10.27	śoṃsā moda iveti pratyāhvayata iti
14.10.28	so 'bhyāhūtaḥ śoṃsā moda iveti pratyāhvayate
14.10.29	tenaiva tad apahata iti brāhmaṇam
14.10.30	atha vai bhavati
14.10.31	yathā vā āyatāṃ pratīkṣata evam adhvaryuḥ pratigaraṃ pratīkṣate
14.10.32	yad abhipratigṛṇīyād yathāyatayā samṛcchate tādṛg eva tat
14.10.33	yad ardharcāl lupyeta yathā dhāvadbhyo hīyate tādṛg eva tat
14.10.34	tad āhur nāśāpratigarī syāt
14.10.35	āśāpratigarī ha vā abhi vā pratigṛṇāty ardharcād vā lupyate
14.10.36	praṇautīty eva praṇauyād apānitīty evāpānyāt
14.10.37	ya evaṃ vidvān pratigṛṇāty annāda eva bhavati
14.10.38	āsya prajāyāṃ vājī jāyata iti brāhmaṇam
14.10.39	atha vai bhavati
14.10.40	iyaṃ vai hotāsāv adhvaryuḥ
14.10.41	yad āsīnaḥ śaṃsaty asyā eva tad dhotā naiti
14.10.42	āsta iva hīyam
14.10.43	atho imām eva tena yajamāno duhe
14.10.44	yat tiṣṭhan pratigṛṇāty amuṣyā eva tad adhvaryur naiti
14.10.45	tiṣṭhatīva hy asau
14.10.46	atho amum eva tena yajamāno duhe
14.10.47	yad āsīnaḥ śaṃsati tasmād itaḥpradānaṃ devā upajīvanti
14.10.48	yat tiṣṭhan pratigṛṇāti tasmād amutaḥpradānaṃ manuṣyā upajīvanti
14.10.49	yat prāṅ āsīnaḥ śaṃsati
14.10.50	pratyaṅ tiṣṭhan pratigṛṇāti tasmāt prācīnaṃ reto dhīyate pratīcīḥ prajā jāyanta iti brāhmaṇam
14.10.51	atha vai bhavati
14.10.52	yad vai hotādhvaryum abhyāhvayate vajram enam abhi pravartayati
14.10.53	parāṅ āvartata iti
14.10.54	so 'bhyāhūtaḥ parāṅ āvartate
14.10.55	vajram eva tan nikarotīti brāhmaṇam
14.10.56	uktaṃ pratinirgrāhyāṇāṃ grahaṇam
14.10.57	uktaṃ saṃsrāvasyāpidhānam
14.10.58	uktam upāṃśvantaryāmayor anumantraṇam
14.10.59	uktā dvidevatyānāṃ caryā
14.11.1	athāto 'tigrāhyāṇām eva grahaṇam
14.11.2	sa yady eko yadi vā bahava āgrayaṇam evainān gṛhītvā gṛhṇāti
14.11.3	māhendrasyaiva homam anu hūyante
14.11.4	sa āgneyaṃ gṛhṇāty agna āyūṃṣi pavasa ity anudrutyopayāmagṛhīto 'sy agnaye tvā tejasvate juṣṭaṃ gṛhṇāmīti
14.11.5	parimṛjya sādayaty eṣa te yonir agnaye tvā tejasvata iti
14.11.6	athainaṃ hoṣyann avekṣate 'gne tejasvin tejasvī tvaṃ deveṣu bhūyās tejasvantaṃ mām āyuṣmantaṃ varcasvantaṃ manuṣyeṣu kurv iti
14.11.7	juhoti dīkṣāyai ca tvā tapasaś ca tejase juhomīti
14.11.8	hutvā vācayati tejovid asi tejo mā mā hāsīn māhaṃ tejo hāsiṣaṃ mā māṃ tejo hāsīd iti
14.11.9	bhakṣayati mayi medhāṃ mayi prajāṃ mayy agnis tejo dadhātv iti
14.11.10	athaindraṃ gṛhṇāty uttiṣṭhann ojasā sahety anudrutyopayāmagṛhīto 'sīndrāya tvaujasvate juṣṭaṃ gṛhṇāmīti
14.11.11	parimṛjya sādayaty eṣa te yonir indrāya tvaujasvata iti
14.11.12	athainaṃ hoṣyann avekṣata indraujasvinn ojasvī tvaṃ deveṣu bhūyā ojasvantaṃ mām āyuṣmantaṃ varcasvantaṃ manuṣyeṣu kurv iti
14.11.13	juhoti brahmaṇaś ca tvā kṣatrasya caujase juhomīti
14.11.14	hutvā vācayaty ojovid asy ojo mā mā hāsīn māham ojo hāsiṣaṃ mā mām ojo hāsīd iti
14.11.15	bhakṣayati mayi medhāṃ mayi prajāṃ mayīndra indriyaṃ dadhātv iti
14.11.16	atha sauryarcā sauryaṃ gṛhṇāti taraṇir viśvadarśata ity anudrutyopayāmagṛhīto 'si sūryāya tvā bhrājasvate juṣṭaṃ gṛhṇāmīti
14.11.17	parimṛjya sādayaty eṣa te yoniḥ sūryāya tvā bhrājasvata iti
14.11.18	athainaṃ hoṣyann avekṣate sūrya bhrājasvin bhrājasvī tvaṃ deveṣu bhūyā bhrājasvantaṃ mām āyuṣmantaṃ varcasvantaṃ manuṣyeṣu kurv iti
14.11.19	juhoti vāyoś ca tvāpāṃ ca bhrājase juhomīti
14.11.20	hutvā vācayati suvarvid asi suvar mā mā hāsīn māhaṃ suvar hāsiṣaṃ mā māṃ suvar hāsīd iti
14.11.21	bhakṣayati mayi medhāṃ mayi prajāṃ mayi sūryo bhrājo dadhātv iti
14.11.22	te vā ete pṛṣṭhyasya ṣaḍahasyottareṣv ahaḥsu gṛhyanta ekaviṃśe triṇave trayastriṃśe
14.11.23	viśvajiti sarvapṛṣṭhe grahītavyā yajñasya savīryatvāya
14.11.24	apy agniṣṭome grahītavyā yajñasya satanutvāyeti brāhmaṇam
14.11.25	athopākaraṇaṃ japati vāyur hiṃkarteti
14.11.26	ārtvijyaṃ vā kariṣyañ chastraṃ vā pratigariṣyann etad yajur japatīḍā devahūr iti
14.11.27	priyo haivārtvijyasya bhavati
14.11.28	praśnaṃ saṃvyākhyāsyann etad yajur japan sabhāṃ prapadyate
14.11.29	abhi haiva taṃ praśnaṃ jayati
14.12.1	athāto 'ṃśvadābhyayor eva grahaṇam
14.12.2	aṃśvadābhyau grahīṣyann upakalpayate dve audumbare nave pātre tayoś catuḥsrakty aṃśupātraṃ bhavati ślakṣṇam adābhyapātraṃ te suvarṇarajatābhyāṃ rukmābhyāṃ paryaste bhavataḥ śatamānaṃ ca hiraṇyam
14.12.3	athopanaddhasya rājñas trīn aṃśūn prabṛhati vasavas tvā prabṛhantu gāyatreṇa chandasāgneḥ priyaṃ pātha upehi rudrās tvā prabṛhantu traiṣṭubhena chandasendrasya priyaṃ pātha upehy ādityās tvā prabṛhantu jāgatena chandasā viśveṣāṃ devānāṃ priyaṃ pātha upehīti
14.12.4	atha hotṛcamase vasatīvarībhyo 'dhy apo niḥṣicya dvādaśabhir ādhāvair ādhūnoti māndāsu te śukra śukram ādhūnomīti pratipadya śukrāsu te śukra śukram ādhūnomīty ātaḥ
14.12.5	athaitasminn adābhyapātre 'ṃśūn upasaṃgṛhya gṛhṇāti śukraṃ te śukreṇa gṛhṇāmy ahno rūpeṇa sūryasya raśmibhiḥ / āsminn ugrā acucyavur divo dhārā asaścateti
14.12.6	athainam ādāyopottiṣṭhati kakuhaṃ rūpaṃ vṛṣabhasya rocate bṛhad iti
14.12.7	aiti somaḥ somasya purogāḥ śukraḥ śukrasya purogā iti
14.12.8	etyāhavanīye juhoty anvārabdhe yajamāne yat te somādābhyaṃ nāma jāgṛvi tasmai te soma somāya svāheti
14.12.9	atha pradakṣiṇam āvṛtya rājany evāṃśūn apisṛjaty uśik tvaṃ deva soma gāyatreṇa chandasāgneḥ priyaṃ pātho apīhi vaśī tvaṃ deva soma traiṣṭubhena chandasendrasya priyaṃ pātho apīhy asmatsakhā tvaṃ deva soma jāgatena chandasā viśveṣāṃ devānāṃ priyaṃ pātho apīhīti
14.12.10	athāha pratiprasthātar udakaṃsena vā modacamasena vā jaghanenāhavanīyaṃ pratyupalambasveti
14.12.11	sa tathā karoti
14.12.12	athaitad dhiraṇyam adbhiḥ prakṣālya madhyamāyām aṅgulau badhnīte nāsikāyāṃ vā pragrathnāti
14.12.13	atha sakṛdabhiṣutasya rājño 'ṃśuṃ gṛhṇāti vāmadevyam iti sāma manasā gāyamāno 'navānaṃ prajāpataye tveti gṛhṇāti prajāpataye tveti juhoti
14.12.14	atha hiraṇyam abhivyanity ā naḥ prāṇa etu parāvata āntarikṣād divas pari / āyuḥ pṛthivyā adhy amṛtam asi prāṇāya tveti
14.12.15	athāntarvedy adbhir mārjayata indrāgnī me varcaḥ kṛṇutāṃ varcaḥ somo bṛhaspatiḥ / varco me viśve devā varco me dhattam aśvinā
14.12.16	dadhanve vā yad īm anu vocad brahmāṇi ver u tat / pari viśvāni kāvyā nemiś cakram ivābhavad iti
14.12.17	adhvaryor etad dhiraṇyaṃ bhavati
14.12.18	brāhmaṇam uttaram
14.13.1	athātaḥ pṛśnīnām eva grahaṇam
14.13.2	saṃtṛptaṃ rājānaṃ daśadhā vyūhyābhimṛśati vāyur asi prāṇo nāmeti daśabhir daśa
14.13.3	te vā ete saṃvatsarasyākṣīyeṣv ahaḥsu gṛhyante
14.13.4	yatra kva caivainān gṛhṇīyād ity etad aparam
14.13.5	athātaḥ paraḥsāmnām eva grahaṇam
14.13.6	te vā ete paraḥsāmānaḥ purastād vaiṣuvatāt tryaham anvaham itaḥ parāñco gṛhyante
14.13.7	atha vaiṣuvate 'hni parāñcaś cārvāñcaś ca gṛhyante
14.13.8	athordhvaṃ vaiṣuvatāt tryaham anvaham āvṛttān eva gṛhṇāti
14.13.9	prajāpatir devāsurān asṛjateti brāhmaṇam eva
14.13.10	atha vai bhavati
14.13.11	āvṛścyate vā etad yajamāno 'gnibhyāṃ yad enayoḥ śṛtaṃkṛtyāthānyatrāvabhṛtham avaiti
14.13.12	āyurdā agne haviṣo juṣāṇa ity avabhṛtham avaiṣyañ juhuyād iti
14.13.13	so 'vabhṛtham avaiṣyann āyurdāṃ daśamīṃ juhoty āyurdā agne haviṣo juṣāṇo ghṛtapratīko ghṛtayonir edhi / ghṛtaṃ pītvā madhu cāru gavyaṃ piteva putram abhirakṣatād imāṃ svāheti
14.13.14	āhutyaivainau śamayati nārtim ārcchati yajamāna iti brāhmaṇam
14.13.15	uktaṃ barhiṣaḥ paryupoṣaṇam
14.13.16	uktaṃ saktuhomasya
14.13.17	atha vai bhavati
14.13.18	yadi miśram iva cared añjalinā saktūn pradāvye juhuyād iti
14.13.19	snātakaḥ purūṣamāno 'raṇye pradāvyaṃ dahantam upādhigamyāñjalinopastīrṇābhighāritān saktūn pradāvye juhoti viśvalopa viśvadāvasya tvāsañ juhomi svāheti
14.13.20	hastau pradhvaṃsayate 'gdhād eko 'hutād ekaḥ samasanād ekaḥ / te naḥ kṛṇvantu bheṣajaṃ sadaḥ saho vareṇyam iti
14.13.21	athainaṃ tribhir darbhapuñjīlaiḥ pavayati pavamānaḥ suvarjana ity etenāṣṭarcena
14.13.22	śuddho haiva śuciḥ pūto medhyo bhavati
14.13.23	atha vai bhavati
14.13.24	ahnāṃ vidhānyām ekāṣṭakāyām apūpaṃ catuḥśarāvaṃ paktvā prātar etena kakṣam upoṣed iti
14.13.25	samāṃ vijijñāsamāno mahārātra utthāyāhnāṃ vidhānyām ekāṣṭakāyām apūpaṃ catuḥśarāvaṃ paktvā prātar udita āditye vipruṣita ādadata etam apūpam upastīrṇābhighāritaṃ parṇasevābhyāṃ parigṛhya
14.13.26	tat saha pūtitṛṇāni bhavanty antam āgārād ekolmukam udapātram iti
14.13.27	etat samādāya tāṃ diśaṃ yanti yatrāsya kakṣa spaṣṭo bhavati
14.13.28	tad etad ekolmukam upasamādhāyāpūpam ādīpayati parṇasevābhyāṃ parigṛhya
14.13.29	tat saha pūtitṛṇāni bhavanti
14.13.30	tena kakṣam upoṣati
14.13.31	athainam udgṛhṇāti
14.13.32	atra vijñānam upaiti
14.13.33	yadi dahati puṇyasamaṃ bhavati yadi na dahati pāpasamam
14.13.34	etena ha sma vā ṛṣayaḥ purā vijñānena dīrghasattram upayantīti brāhmaṇam
14.13.35	atraitam apūpaṃ prāśyāpa upaspṛśya gṛhān eti
14.13.36	ṛṣabho goṣu jīryati tena yakṣyamāṇo bhavati
14.13.37	tasya tad upak.lptaṃ bhavati yat paśunā yakṣyamāṇasya
14.13.38	atha yady utsrakṣyan bhavati tasya nihatya dakṣiṇaṃ karṇam ājapati śivas tvaṣṭaḥ piśaṅgarūpa iti dvābhyām
14.13.39	athainaṃ goṣv apisṛjate
14.14.1	etaṃ yuvānaṃ pari vo dadāmīti
14.14.2	apiyantam anumantrayate tvāṃ gāvo 'vṛṇata rājyāya tvāṃ havanta marutaḥ svarkāḥ / varṣman kṣatrasya kakubhi śiśriyāṇas tato na ugro vibhajā vasūnīti
14.14.3	athetaraṃ tvāṣṭraṃ vaindraṃ vā prājāpatyaṃ vā paśum ālabhate
14.14.4	etā hi sāṇḍasya devatāḥ
14.14.5	tasyopākaraṇīyayor anuvartayati namo mahimna uta cakṣuṣe ta iti
14.14.6	athāsya vapāṃ juhoti devānām eṣa upanāha āsīd iti
14.14.7	athāsya havir juhoti pitā vatsānāṃ patir aghniyānām iti
14.14.8	samānam uttaraṃ paśukarma
14.14.9	vaśayā yakṣyamāṇa āha garbham īkṣadhvam iti
14.14.10	te ced garbhaṃ paśyanti saṃpracchādya vaśāṃ vapayādravanti
14.14.11	athāsyai vapāṃ juhoti sūryo devo diviṣadbhyo dhātā kṣatrāya vāyuḥ prajābhyaḥ / bṛhaspatis tvā prajāpataye jyotiṣmatīṃ juhotu svāheti
14.14.12	vaśām anumantrayate yasyās te harito garbho 'tho yonir hiraṇyayī / aṅgāny ahrutā yasyai tāṃ devaiḥ samajīgamam iti
14.14.13	atha yācaty aṣṭāprūḍḍhiraṇyaṃ kośaṃ cāntarakośaṃ ca vāsaś coṣṇīṣaṃ ca
14.14.14	athaitad dhiraṇyam adbhiḥ prakṣālya vāsasopanahyoṣṇīṣeṇa vigrathya dahre kośe 'vadhāya mahati kośe 'vadadhāti
14.14.15	sa āha pratyañcaṃ garbham antareṇa sakthinī pratinivartayateti
14.14.16	taṃ nivartyamānam anumantrayata ā vartana vartaya ni nivartana vartayendra nardabuda / bhūmyāś catasraḥ pradiśas tābhir āvartayā punar iti
14.14.17	ulbād garbhaṃ visrasyamānam anumantrayate vi te bhinadmi takarīṃ vi yoniṃ vi gavīnyau / vi mātaraṃ ca putraṃ ca vi garbhaṃ ca jarāyu ca / bahis te astu bāl itīti
14.14.18	athaitaṃ garbhaṃ saṃdaṃśena parigṛhyādbhir abhyukṣya śāmitre pratitapati
14.14.19	tasyābhyardhād vasāhomaṃ praścotayati
14.14.20	athaitaṃ garbham antareṇa cātvālotkarāv antareṇa yūpaṃ cāhavanīyaṃ copātihṛtya taṃ dakṣiṇataḥ prāñcam āyātayan pañcahotrā sādayati
14.14.21	atha vaśāyai haviṣā carati
14.14.22	atha purastāt sviṣṭakṛto garbhasyāvadyann āha viṣṇave śipiviṣṭāyānubrūhīti
14.14.23	atha vai bhavati
14.14.24	purastān nābhyā anyad avadyed upariṣṭād anyad iti
14.14.25	sa purastān nābhyā anyad avadyaty upariṣṭād anyat
14.14.26	dvir abhighārayati
14.14.27	āśrāvyāha viṣṇuṃ śipiviṣṭaṃ yajeti
14.14.28	vaṣaṭkṛte juhoty urudrapso viśvarūpa induḥ pavamāno dhīra ānañja garbham / ekapadī dvipadī tripadī catuṣpadī pañcapadī ṣaṭpadī saptapady aṣṭāpadī bhuvanānu prathatāṃ svāheti
14.14.29	atha sviṣṭakṛtā carati
14.14.30	athaitaṃ garbhaṃ yathāhṛtaṃ pratiparyāhṛtyottarārdha āhavanīyasya pratyañcam āyātya bhasmanābhisamūhati mahī dyauḥ pṛthivī ca na imaṃ yajñaṃ mimikṣatāṃ pipṛtāṃ no bharīmabhir iti
14.14.31	adhvaryor etat kośamiśraṃ bhavati
14.14.32	brāhmaṇam uttaram
14.15.1	ajavaśayā yakṣyamāṇo bhavati
14.15.2	sa yāny ahāny ameghasaṃpannāni manyate teṣv āgneyam aṣṭākapālaṃ nirvapati
14.15.3	yā etā brāhmaṇābhivihitā devatās tāsām enām ekasyai devatāyā ālabhate
14.15.4	tasyā upākaraṇīyayor anuvartayaty ā vāyo bhūṣa śucipā iti
14.15.5	niyojane 'nuvartayaty ākūtyai tvā kāmāya tvā samṛdhe tveti
14.15.6	paryagnau kriyamāṇe pañca kikkiṭākāraṃ juhoti kikkiṭā te manaḥ prajāpataye svāhā kikkiṭā te prāṇaṃ vāyave svāhā kikkiṭā te cakṣuḥ sūryāya svāhā kikkiṭā te śrotraṃ dyāvāpṛthivībhyāṃ svāhā kikkiṭā te vācaṃ sarasvatyai svāheti
14.15.7	athainām antareṇa cātvālotkarāv udīcīṃ nīyamānām anumantrayate tvaṃ turīyā vaśinī vaśāsi sakṛd yat tvā manasā garbha āśayat / vaśā tvaṃ vaśinī gaccha devān satyāḥ santu yajamānasya kāmā iti
14.15.8	upāsane 'nuvartayaty ajāsi rayiṣṭhā pṛthivyāṃ sīdordhvāntarikṣam upatiṣṭhasva divi te bṛhad bhā iti
14.15.9	athāsyai vapāṃ juhoti tantuṃ tanvan rajaso bhānum anvihīti
14.15.10	athāsyai havir juhoti manaso havir asi prajāpater varṇa iti
14.15.11	athāsyā avadānānāṃ prāśnāti gātrāṇāṃ te gātrabhājo bhūyāsmeti
14.15.12	atha vai bhavati
14.15.13	tasyai vā etasyā ekam evādevayajanaṃ yad ālabdhāyām abhro bhavati
14.15.14	yad ālabdhāyām abhraḥ syād apsu vā praveśayet sarvaṃ vā prāśnīyād iti
14.15.15	utsannam etasyā apsu praveśanam
14.15.16	etenaivāsyai mantreṇāvadānānāṃ prāśyāthetarad agnāv anuprahared iti baudhāyanaḥ
14.15.17	anunidhāyam enām adyād ity āñjīgavir iti
14.15.18	atha vai bhavati
14.15.19	sā vā eṣā trayāṇām evāvaruddhā saṃvatsarasadaḥ sahasrayājino gṛhamedhinaḥ
14.15.20	ta evaitayā yajeran
14.15.21	teṣām evaiṣāpteti
14.15.22	teṣām u haivainayaiko yajate
14.16.1	athāto jayānām eva homaḥ
14.16.2	jayān hoṣyan upakalpayate bādhakaṃ sruvaṃ ca srucaṃ ca bādhakān paridhīñ charamayaṃ barhir vaibhīdakam idhmam iti
14.16.3	atha vṛthāgnim upasamādhāya śaramayaṃ barhi stīrtvā bādhakān paridhīn paridhāya vaibhīdakam idhmam abhyajya svāhākāreṇābhyādhāya bādhakena sruveṇopaghātaṃ juhoti cittaṃ ca svāhā cittiś ca svāheti trayodaśa sruvāhutīḥ
14.16.4	api vā bādhakena sruveṇa bādhakyāṃ sruci caturgṛhītaṃ gṛhītvā sarvān mantrān samanudrutya juhoti cittaṃ ca cittiś cākūtaṃ cākūtiś ca vijñātaṃ ca vijñānaṃ ca manaś ca śakvarīś ca darśaś ca pūrṇamāsaś ca bṛhac ca rathaṃtaraṃ ca prajāpatir jayān indrāya vṛṣṇe prāyacchad ugraḥ pṛtanājyeṣu tasmai viśaḥ samanamanta sarvāḥ sa ugraḥ sa hi havyo babhūva svāheti
14.16.5	atha vai bhavati
14.16.6	devāsurāḥ saṃyattā āsan
14.16.7	sa indraḥ prajāpatim upādhāvat
14.16.8	tasmā etāñ jayān prāyacchat
14.16.9	tān ajuhot
14.16.10	tato vai devā asurān ajayan
14.16.11	yad ajayan taj jayānāṃ jayatvam
14.16.12	spardhamānenaite hotavyāḥ
14.16.13	jayaty eva tāṃ pṛtanām iti brāhmaṇam
14.16.14	atha vai bhavati
14.16.15	yena karmaṇertset tatra hotavyā iti
14.16.16	sa yat karmertsed idaṃ me samṛdhyeteti tasminn abhyātānāñ juhuyād iti
14.16.17	abhyātānān hoṣyann upakalpayate parṇamayaṃ sruvaṃ ca srucaṃ ca parṇamayān paridhīn kuśamayaṃ barhiḥ parṇamayam idhmam iti
14.16.18	atha vṛthāgnim upasamādhāya kuśamayaṃ barhi stīrtvā parṇamayān paridhīn paridhāya parṇamayam idhmam abhyajya svāhākāreṇābhyādhāya parṇamayena sruveṇopaghātaṃ juhoty agnir bhūtānām adhipatiḥ sa māvatv iti saptadaśa sruvāhutīḥ
14.16.19	hutvā vācayati pitaraḥ pitāmahā iti
14.16.20	api vā parṇamayena sruveṇa parṇamayyāṃ sruci caturgṛhītaṃ gṛhītvā sarvān mantrān samanudrutya hutvāntato vācayati pitaraḥ pitāmahā iti
14.16.21	atha samastānām eva homaḥ
14.16.22	abhyātānān evāgre juhuyād atha jayān atha rāṣṭrabhṛtaḥ
14.16.23	brāhmaṇam uttaram
14.17.1	atha vai bhavati
14.17.2	rāṣṭrakāmāya hotavyā iti
14.17.3	rāṣṭrakāmāya hoṣyann upakalpayate śamyāparidhīn iti
14.17.4	atha vṛthāgnim upasamādhāya śamyāparidhīn paridhāya niśāyāṃ śamyāparidhau dviḥ svāhākāraṃ rāṣṭrabhṛto juhoti ṛtāṣāḍ ṛtadhāmeti
14.17.5	rāṣṭraṃ vai rāṣṭrabhṛtaḥ
14.17.6	rāṣṭreṇaivāsmai rāṣṭram avarunddhe
14.17.7	rāṣṭram eva bhavatīti brāhmaṇam
14.17.8	atha vai bhavati
14.17.9	ātmane hotavyā iti
14.17.10	ātmane hoṣyan vṛthāgnim upasamādhāya niśāyāṃ śamyāparidhau dviḥ svāhākāraṃ rāṣṭrabhṛto juhoti
14.17.11	rāṣṭraṃ vai rāṣṭrabhṛtaḥ
14.17.12	rāṣṭraṃ prajāḥ
14.17.13	rāṣṭraṃ paśavaḥ
14.17.14	rāṣṭraṃ yac chreṣṭho bhavati rāṣṭreṇaiva rāṣṭram avarunddhe
14.17.15	vasiṣṭhaḥ samānānāṃ bhavatīti brāhmaṇam
14.17.16	atha vai bhavati
14.17.17	grāmakāmāya hotavyā iti
14.17.18	grāmakāmāya hoṣyann adhidevane vṛthāgnim upasamādhāya niśāyāṃ śamyāparidhau dviḥ svāhākāraṃ rāṣṭrabhṛto juhoti
14.17.19	rāṣṭraṃ vai rāṣṭrabhṛtaḥ
14.17.20	rāṣṭraṃ sajātāḥ
14.17.21	rāṣṭreṇaivāsmai rāṣṭraṃ sajātān avarunddhe
14.17.22	grāmy eva bhavatīti brāhmaṇam
14.17.23	atha vai bhavati
14.17.24	adhidevane juhoti
14.17.25	adhidevana evāsmai sajātān avarunddhe
14.17.26	ta enam avaruddhā upatiṣṭhanta iti brāhmaṇam
14.17.27	atha vai bhavati
14.17.28	rathamukha ojaskāmasya hotavyā iti
14.17.29	ojaskāmasya hoṣyann upary agnau rathamukhaṃ pragṛhya niśāyāṃ śamyāparidhau dviḥ svāhākāraṃ rāṣṭrabhṛto juhoti
14.17.30	ojo vai rāṣṭrabhṛtaḥ
14.17.31	ojo rathaḥ
14.17.32	ojasaivāsmā ojo 'varunddhe
14.17.33	ojasvy eva bhavatīti brāhmaṇam
14.17.34	atha vai bhavati
14.17.35	yo rāṣṭrād apabhūtaḥ syāt tasmai hotavyāḥ
14.17.36	yāvanto 'sya rathāḥ syus tān brūyād yuṅdhvam iti
14.17.37	rāṣṭram evāsmai yunaktīti brāhmaṇam
14.17.38	atha vai bhavati
14.17.39	āhutayo vā etasyāk.lptā yasya rāṣṭraṃ na kalpate
14.17.40	svarathasya dakṣiṇaṃ cakraṃ pravṛhya nāḍīm abhijuhuyād iti
14.17.41	sa svarathasyaiva dakṣiṇaṃ cakraṃ pravṛhyoparyagnau rathanāḍīṃ pragṛhya niśāyāṃ śamyāparidhau dviḥ svāhākāraṃ rāṣṭrabhṛto juhoti
14.17.42	āhutīr evāsya kalpayati
14.17.43	tā asya kalpamānā rāṣṭram anukalpata iti brāhmaṇam
14.18.1	atha vai bhavati
14.18.2	saṃgrāme saṃyatte hotavyā iti
14.18.3	saṃgrāme saṃyatte hoṣyann upakalpayate māndhukam idhmam iti
14.18.4	atha praty amitram agnim upasamādhāya māndhukam idhmam abhyajya svāhākāreṇābhyādhāya niśāyāṃ śamyāparidhau dviḥ svāhākāraṃ rāṣṭrabhṛto juhoti
14.18.5	aṅgārā eva prativeṣṭamānā amitrāṇām asya senāṃ prativeṣṭayantīti brāhmaṇam
14.18.6	atha vai bhavati
14.18.7	ya unmādyet tasmai hotavyā iti
14.18.8	unmattāya hoṣyann upakalpayate naiyagrodham audumbaram āśvatthaṃ plākṣam iti
14.18.9	atha vṛthāgnim upasamādhāyaitam idhmam abhyajya svāhākāreṇābhyādhāya niśāyāṃ śamyāparidhau dviḥ svāhākāraṃ rāṣṭrabhṛto juhoti
14.18.10	ete vai gandharvāpsarasāṃ gṛhāḥ
14.18.11	sva evainān āyatane śamayatīti brāhmaṇam
14.18.12	atha vai bhavati
14.18.13	abhicaratā pratilomaṃ hotavyā iti
14.18.14	abhicaran hoṣyan svakṛta iriṇe pradare vāmuto 'rvāco vṛthāgnim upasamādhāya niśāyāṃ śamyāparidhau dviḥ svāhākāraṃ rāṣṭrabhṛto juhoti
14.18.15	yad vācaḥ krūraṃ tena vaṣaṭkaroti
14.18.16	vāca evainaṃ krūreṇa pravṛścati
14.18.17	tājag ārtim ārcchatīti brāhmaṇam
14.18.18	atha vai bhavati
14.18.19	yasya kāmayetānnādyam ādadīyeti tasya sabhāyām uttāno nipadya bhuvanasya pata iti tṛṇāni saṃgṛhṇīyād iti
14.18.20	sa yasya kāmayetānnādyam ādadīyeti tasya sabhāyām uttāno nipadya bhuvanasya pata iti tṛṇāni saṃgṛhṇāti
14.18.21	athaināny ādāya harati
14.18.22	idam aham amuṣyāmuṣyāyaṇasyānnādyaṃ harāmīty āha
14.18.23	annādyam evāsya harati
14.18.24	ṣaḍbhir haratīti brāhmaṇam
14.18.25	athaināni svasyāṃ vā sabhāyāṃ sveṣu vāmātyeṣv apisṛjati
14.18.26	prajāpatinaivāsyānnādyam ādāyartavo 'smā anuprayacchantīti brāhmaṇam
14.18.27	atha vai bhavati
14.18.28	yo jyeṣṭhabandhur apabhūtaḥ syāt taṃ sthale 'vasāyya brahmaudanaṃ catuḥśarāvaṃ paktvā tasmai hotavyā iti
14.18.29	sa yo jyeṣṭhabandhur apabhūtaḥ syāt taṃ sthale 'vasāyya brahmaudanaṃ catuḥśarāvaṃ paktvā niśāyāṃ śamyāparidhau dviḥ svāhākāraṃ rāṣṭrabhṛto juhoti
14.18.30	varṣma vai rāṣṭrabhṛtaḥ
14.18.31	varṣma sthalam
14.18.32	varṣmaṇaivainaṃ varṣma samānānāṃ gamayatīti brāhmaṇam
14.18.33	atha vai bhavati
14.18.34	catuḥśarāvo bhavati
14.18.35	dikṣv eva pratitiṣṭhati
14.18.36	kṣīre bhavati
14.18.37	rucam evāsmin dadhāti
14.18.38	uddharati śṛtatvāya
14.18.39	sarpiṣvān bhavati medhyatvāya
14.18.40	catvāra ārṣeyāḥ prāśnanti
14.18.41	diśām eva jyotiṣi juhotīti brāhmaṇam
14.19.1	atha vai bhavati
14.19.2	devikā nirvapet prajākāma iti
14.19.3	prathamaṃ dhātāraṃ prajākāmasya karoti
14.19.4	prathamaṃ paśukāmasya
14.19.5	madhyato grāmakāmasya
14.19.6	madhyato jyogāmayāvinaḥ
14.19.7	prathamaṃ yakṣyamāṇasya
14.19.8	uttamam ījānasya
14.19.9	prathamaṃ medhākāmasya
14.19.10	madhyato rukkāmasya
14.19.11	tā vā etāḥ kṣīre śṛtā bhavanti
14.19.12	tā yat saha sarvā nirvaped īśvarā enaṃ pradahaḥ
14.19.13	dve prathame nirupya dhātus tṛtīyaṃ nirvapet
14.19.14	tatho evottare nirvapet
14.19.15	tathainaṃ na pradahanti
14.19.16	atho yasmai kāmāya nirupyate tam evābhir upāpnotīti brāhmaṇam
14.19.17	atha vai bhavati
14.19.18	yat sāyaṃprātar agnihotraṃ juhoty āhutīṣṭakā eva tā upadhatte yajamānaḥ
14.19.19	ahorātrāṇi vā etasyeṣṭakā ya āhitāgniḥ
14.19.20	yat sāyaṃprātar juhoty ahorātrāṇy evāptveṣṭakāḥ kṛtvopadhatte
14.19.21	daśa samānatra juhoti
14.19.22	daśākṣarā virāḍ
14.19.23	virājam evāptveṣṭakāṃ kṛtvopadhatte
14.19.24	atho virājy eva yajñam āpnoti
14.19.25	cityaś cityo 'sya bhavati
14.19.26	tasmād yatra daśoṣitvā prayāti tad yajñavāstu
14.19.27	avāstv eva tad yat tato 'rvācīnam iti
14.19.28	sa yatra daśoṣitvā prayāsyan bhavati tad agniṣṭhe 'nasi samavaśamayante yad asya samavaśamayitavyaṃ bhavati
14.19.29	avāstv eva tad yat tato 'rvācīnam
14.19.30	rudraḥ khalu vai vāstoṣpatiḥ
14.19.31	yad ahutvā vāstoṣpatīyaṃ prayāyād rudra enaṃ bhūtvāgnir anūtthāya hanyāt
14.19.32	vāstoṣpatīyaṃ juhoti
14.19.33	bhāgadheyenaivainaṃ śamayati
14.19.34	nārtim ārcchati yajamāna iti brāhmaṇam
14.19.35	atha vai bhavati
14.19.36	yad yukte juhuyād yathā prayāte vāstāv āhutiṃ juhoti tādṛg eva tat
14.19.37	yad ayukte juhuyād yathā kṣema āhutiṃ juhoti tādṛg eva tat
14.19.38	ahutam asya vāstoṣpatīyaṃ syād dakṣiṇo yukto bhavati savyo 'yuktaḥ
14.19.39	atha vāstoṣpatīyaṃ juhotīti
14.19.40	sa yatra dakṣiṇo yukto bhavati savyo 'yuktas tat pratyācchedyāṃ parṇamayyāṃ sruci caturgṛhītaṃ gṛhītvāhavanīye vāstoṣpatīyaṃ juhoti
14.19.41	vāstoṣ pate pratijānīhy asmān ity anudrutya vāstoṣ pate śagmayā saṃsadā ta iti juhoti
14.19.42	atraitāṃ srucam upanidhāya savyaṃ yuktvā prayāti
14.19.43	ubhayam evākar
14.19.44	aparivargam evainaṃ śamayatīti brāhmaṇam
14.19.45	atha vai bhavati
14.19.46	yad ekayā juhuyād darvihomaṃ kuryāt
14.19.47	puro'nuvākyām anūcya yājyayā juhoti sadevatvāyeti brāhmaṇam
14.19.48	atha vai bhavati
14.19.49	yad dhuta ādadhyād rudraṃ gṛhān anvārohayet
14.19.50	yad avakṣāṇāny asaṃprakṣāpya prayāyād yathā yajñaveśasaṃ vādahanaṃ vā tādṛg eva tat
14.19.51	ayaṃ te yonir ṛtviya ity araṇyoḥ samārohayati
14.19.52	eṣa vā agner yoniḥ
14.19.53	sva evainaṃ yonau samārohayati
14.19.54	atho khalv āhur yad araṇyoḥ samārūḍho naśyed ud asyāgniḥ sīdet punarādheyaḥ syād iti
14.19.55	yā te agne yajñiyā tanūs tayehy ārohety ātmant samārohayata iti
14.19.56	sa ātmant samārohayate yā te agne yajñiyā tanūs tayehy ārohātmātmānam acchā vasūni kṛṇvann asme naryā purūṇi / yajño bhūtvā yajñam āsīda svāṃ yoniṃ jātavedo bhuva ājāyamānaḥ sakṣaya ehīti
14.19.57	athainam upāvarohayata upāvaroha jātavedaḥ punas tvaṃ devebhyo havyaṃ vaha naḥ prajānan / āyuḥ prajāṃ rayim asmāsu dhehy ajasro dīdihi no duroṇa iti
14.19.58	yajamāno vā agner yoniḥ
14.19.59	svāyām evainaṃ yonyāṃ samārohayata iti brāhmaṇam
14.20.1	ukto 'nvārambhaḥ
14.20.2	atha vai bhavati
14.20.3	ṛṣayo vā indraṃ pratyakṣaṃ nāpaśyan
14.20.4	taṃ vasiṣṭhaḥ pratyakṣam apaśyat
14.20.5	so 'bravīd brāhmaṇaṃ te vakṣyāmi yathā tvatpurohitāḥ prajāḥ prajaniṣyante 'tha metarebhya ṛṣibhyo mā pravoca iti
14.20.6	tasmā etānt stomabhāgān abravīt
14.20.7	tato vasiṣṭhapurohitāḥ prajāḥ prājāyanteti
14.20.8	tasmād āhur vāsiṣṭhaṃ brahmatvam iti
14.20.9	sa yatrāha brahman stoṣyāmaḥ praśāstar iti tad brahmā prasauti deva savitar ity etāṃ pratipadaṃ kṛtvā raśmir asi kṣayāya tvā kṣayaṃ jinvety etasyānuvākasyaikaikam upādāya prasauti
14.20.10	sa evam eva prasuvan dvādaśabhir agniṣṭomaṃ prasauti trayodaśabhir atyagniṣṭomaṃ pañcadaśabhir ukthyaṃ ṣoḍaśabhiḥ ṣoḍaśinaṃ saptadaśabhir vājapeyam ekānnatriṃśatātirātraṃ sarvair aptoryāmam
14.20.11	sa yatra rāthaṃtarāya sandhaye prasarpanti tad āha vasuko 'si veṣaśrir asi vasyaṣṭir asīti
14.20.12	sa evam eva prasauty āptoryāmāt
14.20.13	athāto 'tikrāmāṇām eva
14.20.14	abhicaran bhrātṛvyavān spardhamāno 'bhicaraṇīyaśilpāny āyātya saṃvatsaram etaiḥ kramaiḥ krameta
14.20.15	agninā devena pṛtanā jayāmi gāyatreṇa chandasā trivṛtā stomena rathaṃtareṇa sāmnā vaṣaṭkāreṇa vajreṇa pūrvajān bhrātṛvyān adharān pādayāmy avainān bādhe praty enān nude 'smin kṣaye 'smin bhūmiloke yo 'smān dveṣṭi yaṃ ca vayaṃ dviṣmo viṣṇoḥ krameṇāty enān krāmāmi
14.20.16	indreṇa devena pṛtanā jayāmi traiṣṭubhena chandasā pañcadaśena stomena bṛhatā sāmnā vaṣaṭkāreṇa vajreṇa sahajān bhrātṛvyān adharān pādayāmy avainān bādhe praty enān nude 'smin kṣaye 'smin bhūmiloke yo 'smān dveṣṭi yaṃ ca vayaṃ dviṣmo viṣṇoḥ krameṇāty enān krāmāmi
14.20.17	viśvebhir devebhiḥ pṛtanā jayāmi jāgatena chandasā saptadaśena stomena vāmadevyena sāmnā vaṣaṭkāreṇa vajreṇāparajān bhrātṛvyān adharān pādayāmy avainān bādhe praty enān nude 'smin kṣaye 'smin bhūmiloke yo 'smān dveṣṭi yaṃ ca vayaṃ dviṣmo viṣṇoḥ krameṇāty enān krāmāmīti
14.20.18	api vābhicaraṇīyāsv iṣṭiṣv anuvarteta
14.20.19	api vāpoddhatyetarān kramān saṃvatsaram etaiḥ kramaiḥ krameta
14.20.20	uktaṃ śukrāmanthinor adhidravaṇam
14.20.21	athāto 'tīmokṣāṇām eva
14.20.22	vaiśvakarmaṇāni hutvā gārhapatya ājyaṃ vilāpyotpūya sruci caturgṛhītaṃ gṛhītvā gārhapatye juhoty anvārabdhe yajamāne
14.21.1	ye devā yajñahanaḥ pṛthivyām adhyāsate / agnir mā tebhyo rakṣatu gacchema sukṛto vayaṃ svāheti
14.21.2	aparaṃ caturgṛhītaṃ gṛhītvā gārhapatya eva juhoti ye devā yajñamuṣaḥ pṛthivyām adhyāsate / agnir mā tebhyo rakṣatu gacchema sukṛto vayaṃ svāheti
14.21.3	athāgnīdhram abhipraity āganma mitrāvaruṇā vareṇyā rātrīṇāṃ bhāgo yuvayor yo asti / nākaṃ gṛhṇānāḥ sukṛtasya loke tṛtīye pṛṣṭhe adhi rocane diva iti
14.21.4	athāgnīdhraṃ drutvā sruci caturgṛhītaṃ gṛhītvāgnīdhre juhoty anvārabdhe yajamāne ye devā yajñahano 'ntarikṣe 'dhyāsate / vāyur mā tebhyo rakṣatu gacchema sukṛto vayaṃ svāheti
14.21.5	aparaṃ caturgṛhītaṃ gṛhītvāgnīdhra eva juhoti ye devā yajñamuṣo 'ntarikṣe 'dhyāsate / vāyur mā tebhyo rakṣatu gacchema sukṛto vayaṃ svāheti
14.21.6	athāhavanīyam abhipraiti yās te rātrīḥ savitar devayānīr antarā dyāvāpṛthivī viyanti / gṛhaiś ca sarvaiḥ prajayā nv agre suvo ruhāṇās taratā rajāṃsīti
14.21.7	athāhavanīyaṃ drutvā sruci caturgṛhītaṃ gṛhītvāhavanīye juhoty anvārabdhe yajamāne ye devā yajñahano divy adhyāsate / sūryo mā tebhyo rakṣatu gacchema sukṛto vayaṃ svāheti
14.21.8	aparaṃ caturgṛhītaṃ gṛhītvāhavanīya eva juhoti ye devā yajñamuṣo divy adhyāsate / sūryo mā tebhyo rakṣatu gacchema sukṛto vayaṃ svāheti
14.21.9	athāhavanīyam upatiṣṭhate yenendrāya samabharaḥ payāṃsy uttamena haviṣā jātavedaḥ / tenāgne tvam uta vardhayemaṃ sajātānāṃ śraiṣṭhya ādhehy enam iti
14.21.10	yajñahano vai devā yajñamuṣaḥ santi
14.21.11	ta eṣu lokeṣv āsata ādadānā vimathnānā yo dadāti yo yajate tasya
14.21.12	ye devā yajñahanaḥ pṛthivyām adhyāsate ye antarikṣe ye divīty āha
14.21.13	imān eva lokāṃs tīrtvā sagṛhaḥ sapaśuḥ suvargaṃ lokam etīti brāhmaṇam
14.21.14	api vā tisra eva gārhapatye juhoti tisra āgnīdhre tisra āhavanīye
14.21.15	api vā gārhapatyāj japann anudraved āhavanīyāt
14.21.16	uktodavasānīyeṣṭiḥ
14.21.17	atraitāṃ tṛtīyāṃ pravṛtāhutiṃ juhoti sūryo mā devo devebhyaḥ pātu vāyur antarikṣād yajamāno 'gnir mā pātu cakṣuṣaḥ svāheti
14.21.18	athābhicaran babhruve babhruvatsāyai kārṣmaryamayena pātreṇa payo juhoti sakṣa śūṣa savitar viśvacarṣaṇa etebhiḥ soma nāmabhir vidhema te tebhiḥ soma nāmabhir vidhema te svāheti
14.21.19	sākṣād asya hṛdayaṃ bhittvāntrāṇi parikāsayātai
14.21.20	stṛṇute haiva taṃ bhrātṛvyam
14.21.21	atha yenāsyartvijāṃ spardhā syāt tam āha māsya camasam anuprasṛpatād abhimarśanaṃ kariṣyāmīti
14.21.22	tasyaitenaiva mantreṇa camasaṃ juhuyāt
14.21.23	tam ūrdhvo 'vāṅ vā rājātipavate
14.21.24	uktaṃ pātnīvatasya śrayaṇam
14.21.25	uktam ādityagrahasyoddhananam
14.21.26	uktā prāyaṇīyasya sruvāhutiḥ
14.21.27	uktodayanīyasya
14.21.28	uktaṃ yūpasyopasthānam
14.22.1	uktāni patnīyajūṃṣi
14.22.2	evam evaitāḥ sruco yathaitad brāhmaṇam
14.22.3	ukto dadhigrahaḥ
14.22.4	atha vai bhavati
14.22.5	ājyagrahaṃ gṛhṇīyāt tejaskāmasyeti
14.22.6	barhiṣī antardhāyājyagrahaṃ gṛhṇāti
14.22.7	somagrahaṃ gṛhṇīyād brahmavarcasakāmasyeti
14.22.8	aṃśūn upasaṃgṛhya somagrahaṃ gṛhṇāti
14.22.9	athaitaṃ mahāvratīye 'hni prājāpatyam atigrāhyaṃ gṛhṇāti tve kratum apivṛñjanti viśva ity anudrutyopayāmagṛhīto 'si prajāpataye tvā juṣṭaṃ gṛhṇāmīti
14.22.10	parimṛjya sādayaty eṣa te yoniḥ prajāpataye tveti
14.22.11	athātaḥ prāṇagrahāṇām eva grahaṇam
14.22.12	saṃtṛptaṃ rājānaṃ puñjīkṛtvā navāṃśūn prāca āyātayaty ayaṃ puro bhuvas tasya prāṇo bhauvāyano vasantaḥ prāṇāyano gāyatrī vāsantī gāyatryai gāyatraṃ gāyatrād upāṃśur upāṃśos trivṛt trivṛto rathaṃtaraṃ rathaṃtarād vasiṣṭha ṛṣiḥ prajāpatigṛhītayā tvayā prāṇaṃ gṛhṇāmi prajābhya iti
14.22.13	ayaṃ dakṣiṇā viśvakarmeti nava dakṣiṇā āyātayati
14.22.14	ayaṃ paścād viśvavyacā iti nava pratīca āyātayati
14.22.15	idam uttarāt suvar iti navodīca āyātayati
14.22.16	iyam upari matir iti navopariṣṭāt
14.22.17	pradakṣiṇaṃ paryāyātayati
14.22.18	tān apānabhṛdbhiḥ pratyūhati prācī diśāṃ vasanta ṛtūnām agnir devatā brahma draviṇaṃ trivṛt stomaḥ sa u pañcadaśavartanis tryavir vayaḥ kṛtam ayānāṃ purovāto vātaḥ sānaga ṛṣir iti
14.22.19	vācayati pitaraḥ pitāmahāḥ pare 'vara iti ye purastād bhavanti
14.22.20	dakṣiṇā diśām iti ye dakṣiṇato bhavanti
14.22.21	pratīcī diśām iti ye paścād bhavanti
14.22.22	udīcī diśām iti ya uttarato bhavanti
14.22.23	ūrdhvā diśām iti ya upariṣṭāt
14.22.24	pradakṣiṇaṃ paryāyātitā bhavanti
14.22.25	te vā ete prāyaṇīyodayanīyayor eva niyuktā daśame 'han
14.22.26	tad u rātrisattreṣv apy agniṣṭoma āmayāvina upasṛto vā gṛhṇīyāt
14.22.27	agado haiva bhavati
14.23.1	atha vai bhavati
14.23.2	ubhaye vā ete prajāpater adhyasṛjyanteti brāhmaṇam eva
14.23.3	yuvaṃ surāmam aśvineti sautrāmaṇyām eva bhavati
14.23.4	atha vai bhavati
14.23.5	iyaṃ vā agnihotrī
14.23.6	iyaṃ vā etasya niṣīdati yasyāgnihotrī niṣīdati
14.23.7	tām utthāpayed iti
14.23.8	sa yasyāgnihotrī niṣīdati tām utthāpayaty ud asthād devy aditir viśvarūpy āyur yajñapatāv adhāt / indrāya kṛṇvatī bhāgaṃ mitrāya varuṇāya ceti
14.23.9	atha vai bhavati
14.23.10	avartiṃ vā eṣaitasya pāpmānaṃ pratikhyāya niṣīdati yasyāgnihotry upasṛṣṭā niṣīdati
14.23.11	tāṃ dugdhvā brāhmaṇāya dadyād yasyānnaṃ nādyād iti
14.23.12	sa yasyāgnihotry upasṛṣṭā niṣīdati tām etad eva dugdhvā brāhmaṇāya dadāti
14.23.13	na cāsyāta ūrdhvam annam atti
14.23.14	atha vai bhavati
14.23.15	pṛthivīṃ vā etasya payaḥ praviśati yasyāgnihotraṃ duhyamānaṃ skandati
14.23.16	tad abhimantrayeteti
14.23.17	sa yasyāgnihotraṃ duhyamānaṃ skandati tad abhimantrayate
14.23.18	yad adya dugdhaṃ pṛthivīm asakta yad oṣadhīr apyasarad yad āpaḥ / payo gṛheṣu payo aghniyāsu payo vatseṣu payo astu tan mayīty āha
14.23.19	paya evātman gṛheṣu paśuṣu dhatte
14.23.20	apa upasṛjati
14.23.21	adbhir evainad āpnotīti brāhmaṇam
14.23.22	atha vai bhavati
14.23.23	yo vai yajñasyārtenānārtaṃ saṃsṛjaty ubhe vai te tarhy ārcchataḥ
14.23.24	ārcchati khalu vā etad agnihotraṃ yad duhyamānaṃ skandati yad abhiduhyād iti
14.23.25	sa yasyāgnihotraṃ duhyamānaṃ skandati nainad abhidogdhi
14.23.26	tad eva yādṛk kīdṛk ca hotavyam
14.23.27	athānyāṃ dugdhvā punar hotavyam
14.23.28	anārtenaivārtaṃ yajñasya niṣkarotīti brāhmaṇam
14.23.29	atha vai bhavati
14.23.30	yady uddrutasya skanded yat tato 'hutvā punar eyād yajñaṃ vicchindyāt
14.23.31	yatra skandet tan niṣadya punar gṛhṇīyād iti
14.23.32	sa yatraiva skandati tad eva sthālīṃ nidhāyātiśiṣṭam ānīya punarabhyunnīya tad eva yādṛk kīdṛk ca hotavyam
14.23.33	athānyāṃ dugdhvā punar hotavyam
14.23.34	anārtenaivārtaṃ yajñasya niṣkarotīti brāhmaṇam
14.23.35	atha vai bhavati
14.23.36	vi vā etasya yajñaś chidyate yasyāgnihotre 'dhiśrite śvāntarā dhāvati
14.23.37	rudraḥ khalu vā eṣa yad agniḥ
14.23.38	yad gām anvatyāvartayed rudrāya paśūn apidadhyāt
14.23.39	apaśur yajamānaḥ syāt
14.23.40	yad apo 'nvatiṣiñced anādyam agner āpo 'nādyam ābhyām apidadhyāt
14.23.41	gārhapatyād bhasmādāyedaṃ viṣṇur vicakrama iti vaiṣṇavyarcāhavanīyād dhvaṃsayann uddraved iti
14.23.42	sa vaiṣṇavyarcāhavanīyād dhvaṃsayann uddravati
14.23.43	yajño vai viṣṇur yajñenaiva yajñaṃ saṃtanotīti brāhmaṇam
14.23.44	atha bhasmanā śunaḥ padam api vapati śāntyā iti brāhmaṇam
14.24.1	atha vai bhavati
14.24.2	ni vā etasyāhavanīyo gārhapatyaṃ kāmayate ni gārhapatya āhavanīyaṃ yasyāgnim anuddhṛtaṃ sūryo 'bhinimrocati
14.24.3	darbheṇa hiraṇyaṃ prabadhya purastād dhared athāgnim athāgnihotram iti
14.24.4	sa yasyāgnim anuddhṛtaṃ sūryo 'bhinimrocati darbheṇa hiraṇyaṃ prabadhya parikarmī pūrvaḥ pratipadyate 'nvagbrāhmaṇa ārṣeya idhmenānvagātmanāgnihotreṇa
14.24.5	athaitad dhiraṇyam āhavanīyasyāyatane sādayitvāpoddhṛtya hiraṇyaṃ pradakṣiṇam āvṛtyedhmaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati
14.24.6	atha vai bhavati
14.24.7	agnihotram upasādyātamitor āsīta
14.24.8	vratam eva hatam anumriyate
14.24.9	antaṃ vā eṣa ātmano gacchati yas tāmyati
14.24.10	antam eṣa yajñasya gacchati yasyāgnim anuddhṛtaṃ sūryo 'bhinimrocati
14.24.11	punaḥ samanya juhoti
14.24.12	antenaivāntaṃ yajñasya niṣkarotīti brāhmaṇam
14.24.13	atha vai bhavati
14.24.14	varuṇo vā etasya yajñaṃ gṛhṇāti yasyāgnim anuddhṛtaṃ sūryo 'bhinimrocati
14.24.15	vāruṇaṃ caruṃ nirvapet
14.24.16	tenaiva yajñaṃ niṣkrīṇīta iti brāhmaṇam
14.24.17	atha vai bhavati
14.24.18	ni vā etasyāhavanīyo gārhapatyaṃ kāmayate ni gārhapatya āhavanīyaṃ yasyāgnim anuddhṛtaṃ sūryo 'bhyudeti
14.24.19	caturgṛhītam ājyaṃ purastād dhared athāgnim athāgnihotram iti
14.24.20	sa yasyāgnim anuddhṛtaṃ sūryo 'bhy udeti caturgṛhītenājyena parikarmī pūrvaḥ pratipadyate 'nvagbrāhmaṇa ārṣeya idhmenānvagātmanāgnihotreṇa
14.24.21	athaitad ājyam āhavanīyasyāyatane sādayitvāpoddhṛtyājyam athedhmaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati
14.24.22	atha vai bhavati
14.24.23	parācī vā etasmai vyucchantī vyucchati yasyāgnim anuddhṛtaṃ sūryo 'bhyudeti
14.24.24	uṣāḥ ketunā juṣatāṃ yajñaṃ devebhir anvitam / devebhyo madhumattamaṃ svāheti pratyaṅ niṣadyājyena juhuyāt pratīcīm evāsmai vivāsayatīti brāhmaṇam
14.24.25	atha vai bhavati
14.24.26	agnihotram upasādyātamitor āsīta
14.24.27	vratam eva hatam anumriyate
14.24.28	antaṃ vā eṣa ātmano gacchati yas tāmyati
14.24.29	antam eṣa yajñasya gacchati yasyāgnim anuddhṛtaṃ sūryo 'bhyudeti
14.24.30	punaḥ samanya juhoti
14.24.31	antenaivāntaṃ yajñasya niṣkarotīti brāhmaṇam
14.24.32	atha vai bhavati
14.24.33	mitro vā etasya yajñaṃ gṛhṇāti yasyāgnim anuddhṛtaṃ sūryo 'bhyudeti
14.24.34	maitraṃ caruṃ nirvapet
14.24.35	tenaiva yajñaṃ niṣkrīṇīta iti brāhmaṇam
14.24.36	atha vai bhavati
14.24.37	yasyāhavanīye 'nudvāte gārhapatya udvāyed yad āhavanīyam anudvāpya gārhapatyaṃ manthed vicchindyāt
14.24.38	bhrātṛvyam asmai janayet
14.24.39	yad vai yajñasya vāstavyaṃ kriyate tad anu rudro 'vacarati
14.24.40	yat pūrvam anvavasyed vāstavyam agnim upāsīta
14.24.41	rudro 'sya paśūn ghātukaḥ syāt
14.24.42	āhavanīyam udvāpya gārhapatyaṃ manthed iti
14.24.43	sa āhavanīyam udvāpya gārhapatyaṃ manthati
14.24.44	itaḥ prathamaṃ jajñe agniḥ svād yoner adhi jātavedāḥ / sa gāyatriyā triṣṭubhā jagatyā devebhyo havyaṃ vahatu prajānann iti
14.24.45	chandobhir evainaṃ svād yoneḥ prajanayatīti brāhmaṇam
14.24.46	atha vai bhavati
14.24.47	gārhapatyaṃ manthati

14.25.5	sa āhavanīyam udvāpya gārhapatyād idhmam uddharati yad agne pūrvaṃ prabhṛtaṃ padaṃ hi te sūryasya raśmīn anvātatāna / tatra rayiṣṭhām anusaṃbharaitaṃ saṃ naḥ sṛja sumatyā vājavatyeti
14.25.6	pūrveṇaivāsya yajñena yajñam anusaṃtanotīti brāhmaṇam

14.25.13	yasya prātaḥsavane somo 'tiricyate mādhyaṃdinaṃ savanaṃ kāmayamāno 'bhyatiricyata iti

14.25.15	hotṛcamasam eva prathamam unnayanti yathopapādam itarān

14.25.23	yasya mādhyaṃdine savane somo 'tiricyata ādityaṃ tṛtīyasavanaṃ kāmayamāno 'bhyatiricyata iti
14.25.24	sa mādhyaṃdine savane some 'tirikte prāṅ āyann āha hotuś camasam anūnnayadhvam unnetaḥ sarvaśa eva rājānam unnaya mātirīrica iti
14.25.25	hotṛcamasam eva prathamam unnayanti yathopapādam itarān
14.25.26	sarvaśa eva rājānaṃ samunnīyottaravedyāṃ saṃsādayanti

14.25.36	atirātre 'tirikte prāṅ āyann āha hotuś camasam anūnnayadhvam unnetaḥ sarvaśa eva rājānam unnaya mātirīrica iti
14.25.37	hotṛcamasam eva prathamam unnayanti yathopapādam itarān

14.26.1	iti nu chandogabahvṛceṣu kāmayamāneṣu
14.26.2	te cen na kāmayeran prātaḥsavane 'tirikte yāṃ sthālīm alaṃ rājñe 'tiśiṣṭāya manyate tasyā upariṣṭād āgrayaṇam ānīyādhastād upagṛhṇāti
14.26.3	trir abhiviṣyandayati
14.26.4	so 'bhiviṣyan damānaḥ sarva āgrayaṇaḥ saṃpadyate
14.26.5	taṃ trir abhihiṃkṛtya parimṛjya sādayati
14.26.6	mādhyaṃdine savane 'tirikte tathaiva yāṃ sthālīm alaṃ rājñe 'tiśiṣṭāya manyate tasyā upariṣṭād āgrayaṇam ānīyādhastād upagṛhṇāti
14.26.7	trir abhiviṣyandayati
14.26.8	so 'bhiviṣyandamānaḥ sarva evāgrayaṇaḥ saṃpadyate
14.26.9	taṃ tathaiva trir abhihiṃkṛtya parimṛjya sādayati
14.26.10	tṛtīyasavane 'tirikte hāriyojanam evātrābhiviṣyandayati
14.26.11	na hi punargrahaṇaṃ vidyate
14.26.12	athāto dhruvasyaiva parihīṇasya mīmāṃsā
14.26.13	aindrāgnibhyām enam ṛgbhyāṃ parigṛhya juhuyāt
14.26.14	indrāgnī vai devānāṃ punaḥpunar abhyupākāraṃ yajāmaha ity etad ekam
14.26.15	āśvinībhyām enam ṛgbhyāṃ parigṛhya juhuyāt
14.26.16	aśvinau vai devānāṃ bhiṣajau tābhyām evāsmai bheṣajaṃ karotīty etad ekam
14.26.17	vaiṣṇavībhyām enam ṛgbhyāṃ parigṛhya juhuyāt
14.26.18	yad vai yajñasyātiricyate viṣṇuṃ tac chipiviṣṭam abhyatiricyata ity etad ekam
14.26.19	avabhṛthenainaṃ sahābhyavaharet
14.26.20	yathā me 'nyāni somaliptāni pātrāṇy evaṃ ma eva bhaviṣyatīty etad ekam
14.26.21	barhiṣainaṃ sahābhyupoṣet
14.26.22	eṣa vā agnir vaiśvānaro yat pradāvyaḥ
14.26.23	agnaya eṣa vaiśvānarāya gṛhyate
14.26.24	dhruva evam agnau vaiśvānare huto bhaviṣyatīty etad aparam
14.26.25	atha punar dīkṣate
14.26.26	yajño ha vai yajñasya prāyaścittiḥ
14.26.27	iti nv ekāhayājinaḥ
