14.27.1	uktaḥ saṃsavaḥ
14.27.2	atha vai bhavati
14.27.3	ārtiṃ vā ete niyanti yeṣāṃ dīkṣitānāṃ pramīyate
14.27.4	taṃ yad avavarjeyuḥ krūrakṛtām ivaiṣāṃ lokaḥ syāt
14.27.5	āhara daheti brūyād iti
14.27.6	dīkṣitaṃ ced upatapad vinded āgnīdhrīyaśayano ha bhavati
14.27.7	tad asmai bhakṣān āharanti yāvad alaṃ bhakṣāya manyate
14.27.8	sa yady ahāgado bhavati punar aiti
14.27.9	yady u vai praiti sarvebhyo 'gnibhyo 'ṅgārān nirvartyāraṇyor agnīn samārohyāntareṇa cātvālotkarāv udaṅṅ upanirhṛtya tenainaṃ daheyuḥ
14.27.10	taṃ trirātreṇa śītīkṛtvā saṃcinuyuḥ
14.27.11	te tathākṛtena ṣaḍahasaṃsthāṃ kāṅkṣeyuḥ
14.27.12	atha saṃsthite ṣaḍahe 'sthikumbhaṃ yācati
14.27.13	tasmin saṃcitam avadhāya taṃ dakṣiṇato vedyai nidhāya sarparājñiyā ṛgbhi stuyuḥ
14.27.14	iyaṃ vai sarpato rājñī
14.27.15	asyā evainaṃ paridadati
14.27.16	vyṛddhaṃ tad ity āhur yat stutam ananuśastam iti
14.27.17	hotā prathamaḥ prācīnāvītī mārjālīyaṃ parīyād yāmīr anubruvan sarparājñīnāṃ kīrtayed iti
14.27.18	teṣāṃ tathā parītānām adhvaryur jaghanyaḥ paryeti
14.27.19	atha yajñopavītaṃ kṛtvā yathetaṃ triḥ punaḥ pratipariyanti
14.27.20	teṣāṃ tathā parītānām adhvaryuḥ pūrvaḥ paryeti
14.27.21	athainam ādāyāntareṇa cātvālotkarāv aśmānaṃ cāsthikumbhaṃ ca nidhāyādbhir avokṣaty apa naḥ śośucad agham iti
14.27.22	tasmin maitrāvaruṇāgrān grahān gṛhṇanti
14.27.23	athātiśiṣṭaṃ sattrasyāsate
14.27.24	tasyāvabhṛthavelāyām asthikumbhaṃ nidhāyādbhir avokṣati
14.27.25	etad avabhṛtha u vaivaiṣa bhavaty api vā yo 'sya svo nediṣṭhī syāt tasya sthāne taṃ dīkṣayet
14.27.26	saṃvatsare 'sthīni yājayanti
14.27.27	atha vai bhavati
14.28.1	asuryaṃ vā etasmād varṇaṃ kṛtvā paśavo vīryam apakrāmanti yasya yūpo virohati
14.28.2	tvāṣṭraṃ bahurūpam ālabheteti
14.28.3	sattriṇāṃ ced yūpo virohet saṃpracchidyāsya caṣālaṃ savanīyasya tvāṣṭram upālambhyaṃ kuryuḥ
14.28.4	api vā tvāṣṭraṃ brahmaudanaṃ śrapayitvaitāḥ śākhāḥ pravṛśceyuḥ pra vā takṣṇuyuḥ
14.28.5	api vā tvāṣṭrīḥ sruvāhutīr hutvaitāḥ śākhāḥ pravṛśceyuḥ pra vā takṣṇuyuḥ
14.28.6	api vā tvāṣṭre tvaṣṭra ity eva brūyād iti
14.28.7	atha vai bhavati
14.28.8	ārtim ete niyanti yeṣāṃ dīkṣitānām agnir udvāyati

14.28.10	bhrātṛvyam asmai janayet
14.28.11	yad āhavanīya udvāyed āgnīdhrād uddharet

14.28.13	yad gārhapatya udvāyed ata eva punar manthet
14.28.14	atra vāva sa nilayate
14.28.15	yatra khalu vai nilīnam uttamaṃ paśyanti tad enam icchanti
14.28.16	yasmād dāror udvāyet tasyāraṇī kuryāt
14.28.17	krumukam api kuryād iti
14.28.18	sa yasmād dāror udvāyati tasyāraṇī kṛtvā krumukaśakalam anvavadhāya tāny evāvakṣāṇāni saṃnidhāya manthed iti
14.28.19	sa tāny evāvakṣāṇāni saṃnidhāya manthatītaḥ prathamaṃ jajñe agniḥ svād yoner adhi jātavedāḥ / sa gāyatriyā triṣṭubhā jagatyā devebhyo havyaṃ vahatu prajānann iti
14.28.20	chandobhir evainaṃ svād yoneḥ prajanayatīti brāhmaṇam
14.29.1	atha yady āhavanīyagārhapatyāv udvāyeyātāṃ gārhapatyaṃ mathitvāgnīdhrīyād āhavanīyam uddharet
14.29.2	yady āgnīdhrīyagārhapatyāv udvāyeyātāṃ gārhapatyaṃ mathitvāgnīdhrīyam uddharet
14.29.3	atha yady āgnīdhrīyāhavanīyāv udvāyeyātāṃ gārhapatyād āgnīdhrīyam uddhṛtya tata āhavanīyam uddharet
14.29.4	atha yadi sarva evodvāyeyur gārhapatyaṃ mathitvāgnīdhrīyam uddhṛtya tata āhavanīyam uddhared iti
14.29.5	atha vai bhavati
14.29.6	gārhapatyaṃ manthati
14.29.7	gārhapatyo vā agner yoniḥ
14.29.8	svād evainaṃ yoner janayati
14.29.9	nāsmai bhrātṛvyaṃ janayatīti brāhmaṇam
14.29.10	atha vai bhavati
14.29.11	yasya soma upadasyet suvarṇaṃ hiraṇyaṃ dvedhā vicchidyarjīṣe 'nyad ādhūnuyāj juhuyād anyad iti
14.29.12	sa yasya soma upadasyati tat suvarṇaṃ hiraṇyaṃ dvedhā vicchidyarjīṣe 'nyad ādhūnoti mukhye camase 'nyad avadhāya juhoti
14.29.13	somam evābhiṣuṇoti somaṃ juhotīti brāhmaṇam
14.29.14	atha vai bhavati
14.29.15	somasya vā abhiṣūyamāṇasya priyā tanūr udakrāmat
14.29.16	tat suvarṇaṃ hiraṇyam abhavat
14.29.17	yat suvarṇaṃ hiraṇyaṃ kurvanti priyayaivainaṃ tanuvā samardhayantīti brāhmaṇam
14.29.18	atha vai bhavati
14.29.19	yasyākrītaṃ somam apahareyuḥ krīṇīyād eva
14.29.20	saiva tataḥ prāyaścittir iti brāhmaṇam
14.29.21	atha vai bhavati
14.29.22	yasya krītam apahareyur ādārāṃś ca phālgunāni cābhiṣuṇuyād iti
14.29.23	ādārāḥ kṣudratṛṇāni
14.29.24	phālgunāni haimavatāni
14.29.25	teṣām alābhe śvetakānāṃ pratinidhiḥ
14.29.26	vijñāyate
14.29.27	tṛtīyasyām ito divi soma āsīt
14.29.28	taṃ gāyatry āharat
14.29.29	tasya parṇam acchidyata
14.29.30	tat parṇo 'bhavat
14.29.31	tat parṇasya parṇatvam iti

14.29.33	śṛtena prātaḥsavane śrīṇīyād iti
14.29.34	śṛtam etad bhavati
14.29.35	dadhnā madhyaṃdina iti
14.29.36	dadhy etad bhavati
14.29.37	nītamiśreṇa tṛtīyasavana iti
14.29.38	vimathitaṃ sapilakam uddhṛtaṃ prāṅ navanītabhāvād ity etad ācakṣate
14.29.39	agniṣṭomaḥ somaḥ syād rathaṃtarasāmā
14.29.40	ya evartvijo vṛtāḥ syus ta enaṃ yājayeyur iti
14.29.41	ta evainaṃ yājayanti
14.29.42	ekāṃ gāṃ dakṣiṇāṃ dadyād iti
14.29.43	ekāṃ gām atra dakṣiṇāṃ dadāti
14.29.44	yad iha dāsyan bhavati tad amutra dadāti
14.29.45	punaḥ somaṃ krīṇīyāt
14.29.46	yajñenaiva tad yajñam icchati
14.29.47	saiva tataḥ prāyaścittir iti brāhmaṇam
14.29.48	atha vai bhavati
14.29.49	sarvābhyo vā eṣa devatābhyaḥ sarvebhyaḥ kāmebhyaḥ sarvebhya stomebhyaḥ sarvebhyaś chandobhyaḥ sarvebhyaḥ pṛṣṭhebhya ātmānam āgurate yaḥ sattrāyāgurate
14.29.50	etāvān khalu vai puruṣo yāvad asya vittaṃ sarvavedasena yajeteti
14.29.51	atirātraṃ viśvajitam upayanti
14.29.52	athātra sarvavedasaṃ dadāti
14.29.53	sarvapṛṣṭho 'sya somaḥ syāt
14.29.54	sarvābhya eva devatābhyaḥ sarvebhyaḥ kāmebhyaḥ sarvebhya stomebhyaḥ sarvebhyaś chandobhyaḥ sarvebhyaḥ pṛṣṭhebhya ātmānaṃ niṣkrīṇīta iti brāhmaṇam
14.30.1	pavamānaḥ suvarjana iti sautrāmaṇyām eṣa bhavati
14.30.2	brāhmaṇam uttaram
14.30.3	atha vai bhavati
14.30.4	tasmād vaiśvadevena yajamānaḥ saṃvatsarīṇāṃ svastim āśāsta ity āśāsīta
14.30.5	tasmād varuṇapraghāsair yajamānaḥ parivatsarīṇāṃ svastim āśāsta ity āśāsīta

15.1.1	aśvamedhena yakṣyamāṇo bhavati rājā vijitī sārvabhaumaḥ
15.1.2	sa etad devayajanaṃ joṣayata āśvinaṃ prāg āśvinaṃ dakṣiṇāśvinaṃ pratyag āśvinam udak
15.1.3	chindanti vṛkṣān pra sthalāni bhindanti prati nimnān pūrayanti kiṃśārūṇi nirasyanti
15.1.4	nadīnāṃ tīrthāni sarvataḥprasravaṇāni palvalāni kurvanti
15.1.5	athaitau hradau madhyato devayajanasya joṣayate saṃsrāviṇāv anupadāsinau puṇyanāmānau yady evaṃ vindanti
15.1.6	yady u vā evaṃ na vindanti khātvaināvabhivāhyābhir vābhihāryābhir vādbhiḥ pūrayanti
15.1.7	yathā tveva saṃsrāviṇāv anupadāsinau puṇyanāmānau bhavatas tathā
15.1.8	tāv apareṇa madhyato devayajanaṃ joṣayate dvis tāvad yathāgner vidhāyām
15.1.9	tac chālāṃ kurvanti prācīnavaṃśāṃ dikṣvatīkāśāṃ dakṣiṇato varṣīyasīm
15.1.10	tasyai dakṣiṇato 'śvaśālāṃ kurvanti
15.1.11	tad aśvatthānāṃ ślīṣāṇām avācīnāgrāṇām aśvavrajaṃ kurvanti
15.1.12	athāsyaite saṃbhārā upak.lptā bhavanty aśvo rūpīyo yo 'sya sadaśvānāṃ sattamas tasyānye 'parimitā niramaṇā niraṣṭāḥ kṛṣṇaś ca caturakṣo dvau dāsāv anujāyai ca putro 'nvādheyāyai ca jaratpūrvā caiṣīkaś cābhyūhaḥ saidhrakaṃ ca musalaṃ pauṃścaleyaś ca catvāri śatāni goptṝṇāṃ śataṃ talpyānāṃ rājaputrāṇāṃ śatam arājñām ugrāṇāṃ śataṃ sūtagrāmaṇīnāṃ śataṃ kṣattasaṃgrahītṝṇāṃ catvāro mahānta ṛtvijaḥ
15.1.13	tān anv itare
15.1.14	tān kāle 'padātīn samāvahanti
15.2.1	ā subrahmaṇyāyāḥ
15.2.2	catuṣṭayīr āpo digbhyaḥ saṃbhṛtāś caturaḥ sāhasrān niṣkān suvarṇarajatau ca rukmau dve anye hiraṇye dvau vīṇāgāthinau brāhmaṇaṃ ca rājanyaṃ ca dve raśane mauñjīṃ ca kuśamayīṃ cobhe trayodaśāratnyau
15.2.3	etenopak.lptena citrām āyatīm uparamati
15.2.4	atha citrayety araṇyor agnīn samārohya śālām abhipraiti ye te panthānaḥ savitaḥ pūrvyāso 'reṇavo vitatā antarikṣe / tebhir no adya pathibhiḥ sugebhī rakṣā ca no adhi ca deva brūhīti
15.2.5	uttareṇa śālāṃ parītya pūrvayā dvārā śālāṃ prapādya gārhapatyasyāyatane mathitvāgnīn vihṛtya gārhapatyam upatiṣṭhate namo 'gnaye pṛthivikṣite lokaspṛte lokam asmai yajamānāya dehīti
15.2.6	namo vāyave 'ntarikṣakṣite lokaspṛte lokam asmai yajamānāya dehīty anvāhāryapacanam
15.2.7	namaḥ sūryāya divikṣite lokaspṛte lokam asmai yajamānāya dehīty āhavanīyam
15.2.8	athāsyaitat purastād eva jaghanenāśvaśālām ekāpasrāvaṃ vimitaṃ kāritaṃ bhavati
15.2.9	tad vṛthāgnim upasamādhāya mṛtyave svāhā mṛtyave svāheti navatim āhutīr juhoti prayāsāya svāhety ekādaśa
15.2.10	śatāyur vai puruṣaḥ śatavīrya ātmaikaśato yāvān eva puruṣas tasmān mṛtyum avayajata iti brāhmaṇam
15.2.11	atha keśaśmaśru vāpayitvā lomāni saṃhṛtya nakhāni nikṛtya dato dhāvya snātāvahate vāsasī paridadhāte
15.2.12	ubhau mānuṣeṇālaṅkāreṇālaṅkṛtau bhavato 'hatavāsasau
15.2.13	athābhyāṃ vratopāyanīyaṃ pācayati
15.2.14	tasyāśitau bhavataḥ sarpirmiśrasya payomiśrasya
15.2.15	athāparāhṇe mukhayor hiraṇye anvasyete
15.3.1	suvarṇaṃ yajamāno rajataṃ patnī rajatāni vā yadi bahvyo bhavanti
15.3.2	athāsya vācaṃyamasya sāyamagnihotraṃ juhoti
15.3.3	upasaṃgacchanta enam ete rājagṛhāḥ sūtagrāmṇyaḥ kṣattasaṃgrahītāraḥ kāruviśā iti
15.3.4	tebhyaḥ paṣṭhauhīṃ vehataṃ dadāti
15.3.5	tāṃ te pacamānā ramayanto jāgarayanta āsate

15.3.8	athādityam udyantam upatiṣṭhante draṣṭre nama upadraṣṭre namo 'nudraṣṭre namaḥ khyātre nama upakhyātre namo 'nukhyātre namaḥ śṛṇvate nama upaśṛṇvate namo 'nuśṛṇvate namaḥ sate namo 'sate namo jātāya namo janiṣyamāṇāya namo bhūtāya namo bhaviṣyate nama iti

15.3.11	yāvad evātrādhvaryuś ceṣṭati tāvad eṣa pratiprasthātā catuṣṭayīṣv apsu brahmaudanaṃ śrapayitvābhighāryodañcam udvāsayati
15.3.12	athaitāṃ pātrīṃ nirṇijyopastīrya tasyām etaṃ rajataṃ rukmaṃ prakṣālitam avadadhāti
15.3.13	tasyām enam asaṃghnann ivoddharati sarpirāsecanaṃ kṛtvā prabhūtam ājyam ānīya

15.3.15	athaitān mahata ṛtvija uttarato 'nudiśam upaveśya tān anupūrvam ācamayya tebhya enaṃ bhūmiṃ spṛśann anucchindann ivopohati
15.4.1	sa āha brāhmaṇāś ca rājānaś cānena māśvena medhyena svasti samāpayātā brahmajyatāyā iti
15.4.2	taṃ tathetītare pratyāhur anena tvām aśvena medhyena svasti samāpayiṣyāmo brahmajyatāyā iti
15.4.3	atha brahmajyatām asmai saṃjānate
15.4.4	athainān saṃśāsti sakṛtsakṛt prāśyāpratyavamṛśanto dhārayādhvā iti
15.4.5	athaitasmin sarpirāsecane raśane saṃtarpya parikarmiṇe prayacchati
15.4.6	dvir aparaṃ prāśya praśaṃsanti rāddhas te brahmaudana iti
15.4.7	tebhyaś caturaḥ sāhasrān niṣkān dadāti suvarṇarajatau ca rukmau
15.4.8	atra ye kṣatrasyābhiṣektāras te 'dhvaryum abhiṣiñcanti
15.4.9	sa āha brāhmaṇāś ca rājānaś cādhvaryur etau dvau saṃvatsarau rājā bhaviṣyati tasya śuśrūṣadhvaṃ yo hāsya na śuśrūṣiṣyate sarvasvaṃ taṃ jyāsyantīti
15.4.10	athādhvaryur etau dvau saṃvatsarau rājā bhavati
15.4.11	yajamāna itītaram ācakṣate
15.4.12	sa āha brahmann aśvaṃ medhyaṃ bhantsyāmi devebhyaḥ prajāpataye tena rādhyāsam iti
15.4.13	badhānetītaraḥ pratyāha devebhyaḥ prajāpataye tena rādhnuhīti
15.5.1	atha raśanām ādatte devasya tvā savituḥ prasave 'śvinor bāhubhyāṃ pūṣṇo hastābhyām ādada iti
15.5.2	ādāyābhimantrayata imām agṛbhṇan raśanām ṛtasyeti
15.5.3	tayāśvam abhidadhāty abhidhā asi bhuvanam asi yantāsi dhartāsi so 'gniṃ vaiśvānaraṃ saprathasaṃ gaccha svāhākṛtaḥ pṛthivyāṃ yantā rāḍ yantāsi yamano dhartāsi dharuṇa iti
15.5.4	evam eva dvitīyāṃ raśanām ādatte
15.5.5	tayaivam evāśvam abhidadhāti
15.5.6	te aśvasyānupṛṣṭham anupṛṇakti
15.5.7	etasmin kāle 'nujāyai ca putro 'nvādheyāyai ca śvabandhābhyāṃ śvānam abhidhattaḥ
15.5.8	athaiṣa pauṃścaleyo jaratpūrvayā savyaṃ jānu veṣṭayitvā saidhrakeṇa musalena śvānam anūpatiṣṭhate
15.5.9	athādhvaryuḥ purastāt pratipadyate saha śatena talpyānāṃ rājaputrāṇām
15.5.10	brahmā dakṣiṇataḥ saha śatenārājñām ugrāṇām
15.5.11	hotā paścāt saha śatena sūtagrāmaṇīnām
15.5.12	udgātottarataḥ saha śatena kṣattasaṃgrahītṝṇām
15.5.13	madhye 'śvaḥ śvā ca
15.5.14	atha dakṣiṇaṃ hradam abhiprayānti
15.5.15	dyaus te pṛṣṭhaṃ kramair atyakramīd vājy ākrān vājīti tribhir anuvākair ā kroḍād aśvam abhidhāvayanti
15.5.16	tam adhvaryuḥ purastāt pratyaṅmukhas tiṣṭhan prokṣaty anenāśvena medhyeneṣṭvāyaṃ rājā vṛtraṃ vadhyād iti
15.5.17	tasyānu prokṣaṇaṃ śataṃ talpyā rājaputrāḥ prokṣanti
15.5.18	brahmā dakṣiṇata udaṅmukhas tiṣṭhan prokṣaty anenāśvena medhyeneṣṭvāyaṃ rājāpratidhṛṣyo 'stv iti
15.5.19	tasyānu prokṣaṇaṃ śatam arājāna ugrāḥ prokṣanti
15.5.20	hotā paścāt prāṅmukhas tiṣṭhan prokṣaty anenāśvena medhyeneṣṭvāyaṃ rājāsyai viśo bahugvai bahvaśvāyai bahvajāvikāyai bahuvrīhiyavāyai bahumāṣatilāyai bahuhiraṇyāyai bahuhastikāyai bahudāsapuruṣāyai rayimatyai puṣṭimatyai bahurāyaspoṣāyai bahusarvadhanāyai rājāstv iti
15.5.21	tasyānu prokṣaṇaṃ śataṃ sūtagrāmaṇyaḥ prokṣanti
15.5.22	udgātottarato dakṣiṇāmukhas tiṣṭhan prokṣaty anenāśvena medhyeneṣṭvāyaṃ rājā sarvam āyur etv iti
15.5.23	tasyānu prokṣaṇaṃ śataṃ kṣattasaṃgrahītāraḥ prokṣanti
15.5.24	digbhyo 'śvaṃ samukṣantīti brāhmaṇam
15.5.25	athāsyaiṣa pauṃścaleyaḥ saṃśiṣṭo bhavati yadā tvopamīvāmy atha śunaḥ praharāsīti
15.5.26	upamīvita eṣa pauṃścaleyaḥ saidhrakeṇa musalena śunaḥ prahanti
15.5.27	tam ata evānumantrayate
15.6.1	yo arvantaṃ jighāṃsati tam abhyamīti varuṇa iti
15.6.2	tam aśvasyādhaspadam upāsya dakṣiṇāpaplāvayati paro martaḥ paraḥ śveti
15.6.3	athāsya brahmā hastaṃ gṛhṇāti brahmaṇo vā yajamāno 'haṃ ca tvaṃ ca vṛtrahant saṃbabhūva sanibhya ā / arātīvā cid adrivo 'nu nau śūra maṃsatai bhadrā indrasya rātaya iti
15.6.4	atraitam aiṣīkam abhyūhaṃ mauñjībhyāṃ rajjubhyām antayor abhidadhāti
15.6.5	tat saha vetasaśākhopasaṃbaddhā bhavati
15.6.6	tad etena śataṃ talpyā rājaputrā vivicyante
15.6.7	teṣām anu vivekam itare
15.6.8	dve anyataram antaṃ śate gṛhṇīto dve anyataram antaṃ śate
15.6.9	athainān saṃśāsty anenaiṣīkeṇābhyūhenābhyudūhanta iva purastāt pratyañcam ūrmiṇāśvam abhidhāvayātā iti
15.6.10	abhidhāvyamāne 'dhvaryur yajamānaṃ vācayaty abhi kratvendra bhūr adha jman na te vivyaṅ mahimānaṃ rajāṃsi / svenā hi vṛtraṃ śavasā jaghantha na śatrur antaṃ vividad yudhā ta iti
15.6.11	athainaṃ saṃveṣṭya dakṣiṇāpaplāvayati
15.6.12	athaitam aśvaṃ pradakṣiṇam āvartya śālām ānayati yad vāto apo agamad indrasya tanuvaṃ priyām / etaṃ stotar etena pathā punar aśvam āvartayāsi na iti
15.6.13	tam adhvaryuḥ pūrvābhi stokīyābhir anvaity agnaye svāhā somāya svāhety etenānuvākena punaḥpunar abhyupākāraṃ yāvad asya stokā uparamanti
15.6.14	athaitam aśvam agreṇa śālāṃ prāñcaṃ sthāpayitvā prapadyāśvasya sāvitrāṇi juhoty agnaye svāhā vāyave svāheti sapta
15.6.15	atha sāvitram aṣṭākapālaṃ prātar nirvapati
15.6.16	āsādya purastād bhāgāñ juhoty agnaye svāhā svāhendrāgnibhyām iti pañca
15.6.17	purastāt sviṣṭakṛtas trayo 'śītim aśvacaritāny upajuhotīṃkārāya svāheṃkṛtāya svāheti
15.6.18	asamudite trayodaśa pradrāvāñ juhoty āyanāya svāhā prāyaṇāya svāheti
15.6.19	sā prasiddheṣṭiḥ saṃtiṣṭhate
15.6.20	athaitam aśvaṃ pradakṣiṇam āvartya pūrvayā dvārā śālām prapādyāntarvedi prāñcaṃ sthāpayitvāha
15.7.1	yad vā idam āhuḥ padepade ha vā aśvasya medhyasyādhvaryur juhotīhaiva vayaṃ tad dhoṣyāmo yathā naḥ padepade hutaṃ bhaviṣyatīti
15.7.2	tasya patsu dhṛtīr juhoty akṣṇayā vā paryāriṇīr veha dhṛtiḥ svāheha vidhṛtiḥ svāheha rantiḥ svāheha ramatiḥ svāheti
15.7.3	athainaṃ prāñcam utkrāmayya prokṣati prajāpataye tveti purastād indrāgnibhyāṃ tveti dakṣiṇato vāyave tveti paścād viśvebhyas tvā devebhya ity uttarato devebhyas tvety adhastāt sarvebhyas tvā devebhya ity upariṣṭāt
15.7.4	athainam atiprokṣeṇa prokṣati kṛṣyai tvā kṣemāya tvā rayyai tvā poṣāya tvā pṛthivyai tvāntarikṣāya tvā dive tvā sate tvāsate tvādbhyas tvauṣadhībhyas tvā viśvebhyas tvā bhūtebhya iti
15.7.5	athāsya rūpāṇi juhoty añjyetāya svāhāñjisakthāya svāhā kṛṣṇāya svāhā śvetāya svāhety etābhyām anuvākābhyām
15.7.6	athāsyopotthāyāśvanāmabhir dakṣiṇaṃ karṇam ājapati vibhūr mātrā prabhūḥ pitrāśvo 'si hayo 'sy atyo 'si naro 'sy arvāsi saptir asi vājy asi vṛṣāsi nṛmaṇā asi yayur nāmāsīti
15.7.7	athainam upatiṣṭhata ādityānāṃ patvānvihīti
15.7.8	athainaṃ raśanābhyām utsṛjati bhūr asi bhuve tvā bhavyāya tvā bhaviṣyate tvā viśvebhyas tvā bhūtebhya iti
15.7.9	athainaṃ devatābhyaḥ paridadāti devā āśāpālā etaṃ devebhyo 'śvaṃ medhāya prokṣitaṃ gopāyateti
15.7.10	atrāsmā etān aparimitān niramaṇān niraṣṭān upāvasṛjanti
15.7.11	atrainam etāni catvāri śatāni goptṝṇām anuyuñjate prāstakavacā vitatavarūthā yathā yuddhāya tathā
15.7.12	tebhyaḥ pakvāśanaṃ prasauti
15.8.1	sa āha brāhmaṇāś ca rājānaś ca yasyeme pakvāśanam upāvahariṣyante mayāprasūtā mopavādiṣṭeti
15.8.2	sa āha brāhmaṇāś ca rājānaś ca bahir devayajanād vāhanaṃ vyudacadhvaṃ yasyāyaṃ vaḍabābhiḥ saṃsṛjyate sarvasvaṃ taṃ jyāsyantīti
15.8.3	te bahir devayajanād vāhanaṃ vyudacante
15.8.4	aśvaiś caiva sāṇḍaiś caranty aśvataraiś ca
15.8.5	na vaḍabābhir nāśvatarībhiḥ
15.8.6	athaitau vīṇāgāthināv atipragṛhṇītaḥ
15.8.7	athaiṣa brāhmaṇo vīṇāgāthī gāyatīty adadā ity ayajathā ity apacathā apacathā ity evaṃ miśrās tisro gāthāḥ
15.8.8	kāmacāro 'śvasya
15.8.9	snānāc caivainaṃ gopāyanti vāhanāc ca
15.8.10	atha yady aśvam upatapad vindaty āgneyo 'ṣṭākapālaḥ saumyaś caruḥ sāvitro 'ṣṭākapālaḥ pauṣṇaś carū raudraś carur iti
15.8.11	atha yadi nāvagacchaty agnaye vaiśvānarāya dvādaśakapālo mṛgākhara iti
15.8.12	atha yadi vaḍabābhiḥ saṃsṛjyate 'gnaye 'ṃhomuce 'ṣṭākapālaḥ sauryaṃ payo vāyavya ājyabhāgaḥ
15.8.13	yady abhivāti raudraḥ
15.8.14	yadi srāvaḥ pauṣṇaḥ
15.8.15	yady apsu vāruṇaḥ
15.8.16	yadi kāṇaḥ sauryaḥ
15.8.17	etāsām ārtīnāṃ yāṃ kāṃ ca nyeti
15.8.18	sakṛt tv eva prāyaścittiḥ
15.8.19	atha yo 'sya sadaśvānāṃ sattamas tam utsṛjati
15.8.20	athāto raśanābhyām eva pratipadyate
15.8.21	samānaṃ karmā paridānāt
15.9.1	utsṛjyāśvaṃ vaiśvadevān paśūn ālabhante
15.9.2	teṣāṃ paśupuroḍāśān anuvartante vaiśvadevahavīṃṣi
15.9.3	vaiśvadevahavīṃṣi vaivaiṣāṃ paśupuroḍāśā bhavanti
15.9.4	tān anuvartate madhyamā sāvitrī
15.9.5	prasiddhāḥ paśavaḥ saṃtiṣṭhante
15.9.6	athāparāhṇe savitra āsavitre puroḍāśaṃ dvādaśakapālaṃ nirvapati
15.9.7	sā prasiddheṣṭiḥ saṃtiṣṭhate
15.9.8	atha paurṇamāsavaimṛdhābhyām iṣṭvā prasiddhaṃ nivartayate
15.9.9	athaitau vīṇāgāthināv atipragṛhṇītaḥ
15.9.10	athaiṣa rājanyo vīṇāgāthī gāyatīty ajinā ity ayudhyathā ity amuṃ saṃgrāmam ahann ity evaṃ miśrās tisro gāthāḥ
15.9.11	prātaragnihotre hute brāhmaṇo vīṇāgāthī gāyati sāyamagnihotre hute rājanyaḥ
15.9.12	tāv evam eva saṃvatsaraṃ gāyataḥ
15.9.13	atha sāvitram aṣṭākapālaṃ prātar nirvapati
15.9.14	āsādya purastād bhāgāñ juhoti
15.9.15	asamudite dhṛtīś ca juhoti pradrāvāṃś ca juhoti
15.9.16	sā prasiddheṣṭiḥ saṃtiṣṭhate
15.9.17	atha madhyaṃdine savitre prasavitre puroḍāśam ekādaśakapālaṃ nirvapati
15.9.18	sā prasiddheṣṭiḥ saṃtiṣṭhate
15.9.19	athāparāhṇe savitra āsavitre dvādaśakapālaṃ nirvapati
15.9.20	sā prasiddheṣṭiḥ saṃtiṣṭhate
15.9.21	atha śvo bhūte sāvitrībhir eva pratipadyate
15.9.22	sa evam eva sāvitrībhir aharahar yajamānaś caturo māsa eti kāmam iṣṭyā kāmaṃ paśubandhena kāmaṃ yavāgrayaṇena
15.9.23	atha caturṣu māseṣu paryaveteṣu sāvitryeṣṭyeṣṭvā varuṇapraghāsān paśūn ālabhante
15.10.1	teṣāṃ paśupuroḍāśān anuvartante varuṇapraghāsahavīṃṣi
15.10.2	varuṇapraghāsahavīṃṣi vaivaiṣāṃ paśupuroḍāśā bhavanti
15.10.3	tān anuvartate madhyamā sāvitrī
15.10.4	prasiddhāḥ paśavaḥ saṃtiṣṭhante
15.10.5	athāparāhṇe savitra āsavitre puroḍāśaṃ dvādaśakapālaṃ nirvapati
15.10.6	sā prasiddheṣṭiḥ saṃtiṣṭhate
15.10.7	atha paurṇamāsavaimṛdhābhyām iṣṭvā prasiddhaṃ nivartayate
15.10.8	atha śvo bhūte sāvitrībhir eva pratipadyate
15.10.9	sa evam eva sāvitrībhir aharahar yajamāno 'parāṃś caturo māsa eti kāmam iṣṭyā kāmaṃ paśubandhena kāmaṃ śyāmākāgrayaṇena
15.10.10	atha caturṣu māseṣu paryaveteṣu paurṇamāsyā upavasatha ānīkavataṃ paśum ālabhate
15.10.11	tasya paśupuroḍāśam anuvartata ānīkavataṃ haviḥ
15.10.12	ānīkavato vaivāsya paśupuroḍāśo bhavati
15.10.13	tam anuvartate prathamā sāvitrī
15.10.14	prasiddhaḥ paśuḥ saṃtiṣṭhate
15.10.15	atha madhyaṃdine sāṃtapanaṃ paśum ālabhate
15.10.16	tasya paśupuroḍāśam anuvartate sāṃtapanaṃ haviḥ
15.10.17	sāṃtapano vaivāsya paśupuroḍāśo bhavati
15.10.18	tam anuvartate madhyamā sāvitrī
15.10.19	prasiddhaḥ paśuḥ saṃtiṣṭhate
15.10.20	athāparāhṇe savitra āsavitre puroḍāśaṃ dvādaśakapālaṃ nirvapati
15.10.21	sā prasiddheṣṭiḥ saṃtiṣṭhate
15.10.22	atha sāyaṃ gṛhamedhīyena carati
15.10.23	athāpararātre pūrṇadarvyeṇa carati
15.10.24	atha prātaḥ kraiḍinaṃ paśum ālabhate
15.10.25	tasya paśupuroḍāśam anuvartate kraiḍinaṃ haviḥ
15.10.26	kraiḍino vaivāsya paśupuroḍāśo bhavati
15.10.27	tam anuvartate prathamā sāvitrī
15.10.28	prasiddhaḥ paśuḥ saṃtiṣṭhate
15.10.29	atha madhyaṃdine sākamedhān paśūn ālabhante
15.11.1	teṣāṃ paśupuroḍāśān anuvartante mahāhavīṃṣi
15.11.2	mahāhavīṃṣi vaivaiṣāṃ paśupuroḍāśā bhavanti
15.11.3	tān anuvartate madhyamā sāvitrī
15.11.4	prasiddhāḥ paśavaḥ saṃtiṣṭhante
15.11.5	athāparāhṇe pitṛyajñena carati
15.11.6	pitṛyajñena caritvā traiyambakaiś carati
15.11.7	traiyambakaiś caritvādityaṃ paśum ālabhate
15.11.8	tasya paśupuroḍāśam anuvartata ādityaṃ haviḥ
15.11.9	ādityo vaivāsya paśupuroḍāśo bhavati
15.11.10	tam anuvartata uttamā sāvitrī
15.11.11	prasiddhaḥ paśuḥ saṃtiṣṭhate
15.11.12	atha paurṇamāsavaimṛdhābhyām iṣṭvā prasiddhaṃ nivartayate
15.11.13	atha śvo bhūte sāvitrībhir eva pratipadyate
15.11.14	sa evam eva sāvitrībhir aharahar yajamāno 'rdhacaturthān māsa eti kāmam iṣṭyā kāmaṃ paśubandhena kāmaṃ vrīhyāgrayaṇena
15.11.15	athāmāvāsyāyā upavasathīye 'han sāvitryeṣṭyeṣṭvāgnikāni sāvitrāṇi hutvokhāḥ saṃbhṛtya paśuśīrṣāṇi ca vāyavyaṃ paśum ālabhate
15.11.16	tasya prājāpatyas tūpara upālambhyo bhavati
15.11.17	tayoḥ prasiddhaṃ vapābhyāṃ caritvā paśupuroḍāśau nirvapati
15.11.18	tāv anuvartate madhyamā sāvitrī
15.11.19	prasiddhau paśū saṃtiṣṭhete
15.11.20	athāparāhṇe savitra āsavitre puroḍāśaṃ dvādaśakapālaṃ nirvapati
15.11.21	sā prasiddheṣṭiḥ saṃtiṣṭhate
15.11.22	atha śvo bhūte sāvitrībhir eva pratipadyate
15.11.23	sa evam eva sāvitrībhir aharahar yajamāna etam ardhamāsam eti kāmam iṣṭyā kāmaṃ paśubandhena
15.11.24	atha caturṣu māseṣu paryaveteṣu sāvitryeṣṭyeṣṭvā
15.12.1	śunāsīrīyān paśūn ālabhante
15.12.2	teṣāṃ paśupuroḍāśān anuvartante śunāsīrīyahavīṃṣi
15.12.3	śunāsīrīyahavīṃṣi vaivaiṣāṃ paśupuroḍāśā bhavanti
15.12.4	tān anuvartate madhyamā sāvitrī
15.12.5	prasiddhāḥ paśavaḥ saṃtiṣṭhante
15.12.6	athāparāhṇe savitra āsavitre puroḍāśaṃ dvādaśakapālaṃ nirvapati
15.12.7	sā prasiddheṣṭiḥ saṃtiṣṭhate
15.12.8	atha paurṇamāsavaimṛdhābhyām iṣṭvā yajamānāyatana upaviśya treṇyā śalalyā lohitāyasasya ca kṣureṇa śīrṣan ni ca vartayate pari ca vapate purastād evāgre 'tha dakṣiṇato 'tha paścād athottarato 'thopariṣṭāt
15.12.9	saṃtiṣṭhante cāturmāsyāḥ paśavaḥ saṃtiṣṭhante sāvitryaḥ
15.13.1	athāśvaśālāyām aśvaṃ nigrathnanti
15.13.2	athainaṃ tīrthād ānīya pavayitvā trihaviṣam agnidīkṣaṇīyām iṣṭiṃ nirvapati
15.13.3	tasyai tāvanty utsīdanti yāvanti dīkṣaṇīyāyāḥ
15.13.4	athādhvaryuḥ pradakṣiṇam āvṛtya pratyaṅṅ ādrutya patnīḥ saṃyājya prāṅ etya dhruvām āpyāyya trīṇi pūrvāṇi vaiśvadevāni juhoti svāhādhim ādhītāya svāheti
15.13.5	atha sapta prāṇāhutīr juhoti prāṇāya svāhā vyānāya svāheti
15.13.6	ekaviṃśinīṃ dīkṣāṃ juhoti pṛthivyai svāhāntarikṣāya svāheti
15.13.7	pañcādhvaradīkṣāhutīr juhoti ṣaḍ agnidīkṣā ekām ṛtudīkṣāṃ bhuvo devānāṃ karmaṇeti
15.13.8	saptāhāny etayeṣṭyā yajata iti
15.13.9	sa trīṇitrīṇy eva pūrvāṇi vaiśvadevāni juhoty uttarāmuttarām ṛtudīkṣām
15.13.10	dve antata ṛtudīkṣe juhoti mahīm ū ṣu sutrāmāṇam iti
15.13.11	etad evāhar dīkṣate
15.13.12	saṃvatsaram ukhyaṃ bibharti
15.13.13	dvādaśopasadaḥ
15.13.14	atrainam etā yathāmnātaṃ viśaḥ paryavasyanti
15.13.15	nedīya enam ete karmakṛta upasaṃgacchante takṣāṇaś ca rathakṛtaś ca mayaskṛtaś ca kulālāś ca dvayāḥ karmārā nakhakṛtaḥ saptame
15.13.16	athaitāṃs takṣṇaḥ saṃśāsti
15.14.1	ekaśataṃ bailvāni dārvācitāni chindata tāni pravakalāni kṛtvācāyaṃ cinutaikaviṃśatiṃ yūpāñ chindataikaviṃśaty aratnīn rājjudālam agniṣṭhaṃ pautudravāv upasthāvānau ṣaḍ bailvān ṣaṭ khādirān ṣaṭ pālāśān pālāśam upaśayaṃ pālāśaṃ pātnīvataṃ pālāśaṃ viśālayūpam ekatayāni dārumayāṇi pātrāṇi kuruta ṣaṭtriṃśataṃ sruvān dīrghadaṇḍān ṣaṭtriṃśatam anuveṣān dīrghadaṇḍāṃś catvāri vāṣṭau vendrāṇasāni catuś cakrāṇi bṛhaccakrāṇi yathā samāni yūpāgraiḥ syur aparimitāny ārohaṇamahānasāni kurutaikaṃ vaitasaṃ kaṭaṃ kurutāśvasyopastaraṇāyeti
15.14.2	athaitān rathakṛtaḥ saṃśāsti svarathaṃ kurutāparimitān rathān kuruteti
15.14.3	athaitān mayaskṛtaḥ saṃśāsty aparimitaṃ carmaṇyaṃ kuruteti
15.14.4	athaitān kulālān saṃśāsti yathaikaviṃśatividhāyāgnaya evam iṣṭakāḥ kuruta tisro mahatīḥ kumbhīḥ kuruta yathāśvaṃ tūparaṃ gomṛgam ity etān sāṅgāñ chrapayeyur aparimitā sthālīḥ kuruteti
15.15.1	athaitān kālāyasakṛtaḥ saṃśāsti sāyakaṃ kuruta sittimaṃkalpodakaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ kṛṣṇatsaruṃ suvarṇaṃ suvarṇatsaruṃ caturaḥ kālāyasān lohāyasatsarūṃś caturo lohāyasān kālāyasatsarūn ṣaṭtriṃśataṃ suvarṇān rajatatsarūn ṣaṭtriṃśataṃ rajatān suvarṇatsarūṃs trīṇi ca śatāni trayastriṃśtaṃ ca sauvarṇānāṃ sūcīnāṃ trīṇi ca śatāni trayastriṃśataṃ ca rājatānāṃ trīṇi ca śatāni trayastriṃśataṃ ca sīsānām ekaṃ kālāyasasya kamaṇḍaluṃ kurutāśvatejanyai śrapaṇāyeti
15.15.2	athaitān suvarṇakṛtaḥ saṃśāsti paraḥśataṃ śatapalān niṣkān kuruta suvarṇarajate mahimnoḥ pātre kurutaikatayāni sauvarṇāni pātrāṇi kuruta yāvatyaḥ patnayas tāvataḥ sauvarṇān upaśayān kuruta rajatagranthīn rājatān vā suvarṇagranthīn yāvatyaḥ patnayas tāvanti sauvarṇāni kumbakurīrāṇi kuruta rajataśaṅkūni rājatāni vā suvarṇaśaṅkūni yāvatyaḥ patnayas tāvataḥ sauvarṇān kamaṇḍalūn kuruta rajatarāsnān rājatān vā suvarṇarāsnān ekaṃ sauvarṇaṃ vidhavanaṃ kuruta trīṇi sauvarṇāni dhavitrāṇi kuruta rajatadaṇḍāni rājatāni vā suvarṇadaṇḍāni sahasraṃ sauvarṇān kācān kuruta sahasraṃ rājatān sahasraṃ sāmudrān hiraṇmayaṃ kaśipu hiraṇmayaṃ ṣaḍbīśaṃ hiraṇmayaṃ saṃdānam iti
15.16.1	athaitān nakhakṛtaḥ saṃśāsty aparimitāny aṣṭamāni kuruteti
15.16.2	athāsyaitāny anyāny upak.lptāni bhavanti śataṃ ghṛtacarmāṇi śataṃ madhucarmāṇi śataṃ taṇḍulacarmāṇi śataṃ pṛthukacarmāṇi śataṃ lājācarmāṇi śataṃ karambhacarmāṇi śataṃ dhānācarmāṇi śataṃ saktucarmāṇi śataṃ masūsyacarmāṇi śataṃ priyaṅgutaṇḍulacarmāṇīti
15.16.3	athāsyaita ekaviṃśatiḥ pratiprasthātāraḥ saṃśiṣṭā bhavanty ātmanā dvāviṃśaḥ
15.16.4	tejanapadebhyaḥ paśūn samacanti tathārūpāny athārūpāṃs te vidur
15.16.5	grāmeṣu grāmyān rakṣanty araṇya āraṇyān giriṣu gaireyān nadīṣu nādeyān pañjareṣu vayāṃsi kumbhīṣu sarīsṛpān iti
15.17.1	prasiddhaḥ saṃnivāpaḥ
15.17.2	atha prāyaṇīyena carati
15.17.3	prāyaṇīyena caritvā padena carati
15.17.4	padena caritvārṣabhe carman sahasreṇa rājānaṃ krītvohyātithyaṃ nirvapati
15.17.5	ātithyena pracaryāthānvahaṃ pravargyopasadbhyāṃ pracarati
15.17.6	dvādaśāha evaiṣaḥ
15.17.7	ekaviṃśatividho 'gnir niṣṭhīyate
15.17.8	tasyaikaviṃśaticchadiḥ sado bhavati
15.17.9	athāhavanīyaṃ praṇayati
15.17.10	āhavanīyaṃ praṇīya sadohavirdhāne saṃminoti
15.17.11	sadohavirdhāne saṃmityāgnīṣomau praṇayati
15.17.12	agnīṣomau praṇīya yūpasyāvṛtā yūpam ucchrayati
15.17.13	svarvantaṃ rājjudālam agniṣṭham utsṛjyāgnīṣomīyaṃ paśum upākaroti
15.17.14	tasya prasiddhaṃ vapayā caritvā vasatīvarīr gṛhṇāti
15.17.15	atha paśupuroḍāśaṃ nirvapati
15.17.16	tam anuvartante 'ṣṭau devasuvāṃ havīṃṣy agnaye gṛhapataya ity etāny agnaye gāyatrāyety eṣā ca daśahavir iṣṭiḥ
15.17.17	tasyā etā yājyāpuro'nuvākyā bhavanti samid diśām āśayā naḥ suvarvid iti
15.17.18	iḍāntāḥ paśupuroḍāśāḥ saṃtiṣṭhante
15.17.19	patnīsaṃyājāntaḥ paśuḥ
15.17.20	hṛdayaśūlānta ity eke
15.17.21	atha vasatīvarīḥ parihṛtya payāṃsi viśiṣyopavasanti
15.17.22	athāto mahārātra eva budhyante
15.17.23	samānaṃ karmā paridhīnāṃ paridhānāt
15.17.24	paridhiṣv anuvartayati kas tvā yunakti sa tvā yunaktv iti ṣaṇ madhyame ṣaḍ dakṣiṇārdhye pañcottarārdhye
15.17.25	atha rājānam upāvahṛtya prātaranuvākam upākaroti
15.17.26	parihite prātaranuvāke 'po 'cchaiti
15.17.27	adbhir udaiti
15.17.28	agniṣṭomaṃ kratum upaiti
15.17.29	prasiddho 'bhiṣavaḥ
15.17.30	prasiddhaṃ grahā gṛhyante
15.17.31	samānaṃ karmā pavamānāt
15.17.32	pavamānaṃ srapsyan yācati barhiś ca śatapalaṃ ca
15.17.33	athāhodgātar barhiś ca te śatapalaṃ cāśvo ma udgāyatv iti
15.17.34	te 'śvasya vāladhiṃ samanvārabhante 'gnis te vājin yuṅṅ anu tvārabhe svasti mā saṃpāraya vāyus te vājin yuṅ anu tvārabhe svasti mā saṃpārayādityas te vājin yuṅṅ anu tvārabhe svasti mā saṃpārayeti
15.17.35	athodañco 'bhi pavamānaṃ sarpanti
15.17.36	uttarata eṣa vaḍabāvraja ucchrāyyā pariśrito bhavati
15.17.37	taṃ vivṛṇvanti
15.17.38	abhy aśvaṃ vaḍabāḥ krandanti
15.17.39	abhy aśvo vaḍabāḥ krandati
15.17.40	so 'śvasyodgīthaḥ
15.17.41	tatpuṇyā vācaḥ saṃpravadanti
15.18.1	udagāsīd vā ayam aśvo medhya āyur udagāsīt subhūtam udagāsīd brahmavarcasam udagāsīd idam udagāsīd idam udagāsīd iti puṇyā vācaḥ saṃpravadanti
15.18.2	utsṛjanti vaḍabāḥ
15.18.3	aśvaśālāyām aśvaṃ nigrathnanti
15.18.4	atrāsmā āmukuṣmikam annam upakiranti
15.18.5	athāhodgātar dhenuśataṃ ca te śatapalaṃ ca tvaṃ ma udgāyeti
15.18.6	tasya catasṛṣu bahiṣpavamānaḥ
15.18.7	aṣṭāsvaṣṭāsv ājyāni
15.18.8	dvādaśo mādhyaṃdinaḥ pavamānaḥ
15.18.9	ṣoḍaśāni pṛṣṭhāni
15.18.10	saviṃśa ārbhavaḥ pavamānaḥ
15.18.11	caturviṃśam agniṣṭomasāma
15.18.12	taṃ catuṣṭoma ity ācakṣate
15.18.13	samānaṃ karmāśvinād grahāt
15.18.14	āśvinaṃ grahaṃ gṛhītvaikādaśa raśanā ādāya yūpam abhyaiti
15.18.15	svarvantaṃ rājjudālam agniṣṭham utsṛjyaikādaśinān paśūn upākaroti
15.18.16	teṣāṃ prasiddhaṃ vapābhiś caritvā prasarpanti prātaḥsavanāya
15.18.17	tad ṛjudhā saṃtiṣṭhate
15.18.18	prasarpanti mādhyaṃdināya savanāya
15.18.19	prasiddho 'bhiṣavaḥ
15.18.20	prasiddhaṃ grahā gṛhyante
15.18.21	samānaṃ karmā dākṣiṇebhyaḥ
15.18.22	dākṣiṇāni hutvāṣṭau saṃvargāhutīr juhoty arvāṅ yajñaḥ saṃkrāmatv iti
15.18.23	tṛtīyaṃ dakṣiṇānāṃ dadāti
15.18.24	vaiśvakarmaṇāni hutvā nava paryāptīr juhoti bhūtaṃ bhavyaṃ bhaviṣyad iti
15.18.25	nātrāgnyabhiṣekaḥ
15.18.26	ahīnasaṃtatiṃ karoti
15.18.27	ṛjudhā mādhyaṃdinaṃ savanaṃ saṃtiṣṭhate
15.18.28	prasarpanti tṛtīyasavanāya
15.18.29	prasiddham ādityagraheṇa caritvāgrayaṇaṃ gṛhṇāti
15.18.30	samānaṃ karmā pavamānāt
15.18.31	pavamānena caritvā sve dhāman paśubhiś carati
15.18.32	teṣāṃ nānā manotā nānā devatā nānā pratyabhimarśanā nānā vasāhomāḥ samāno vanaspatiḥ samānaḥ sviṣṭakṛt praiṣavān samānīḍā samānyo diśaḥ
15.18.33	nānā diśa ity eke
15.18.34	samānaṃ karmā patnīsaṃyājebhyaḥ
15.18.35	upakāśa evaiṣo 'gniṣṭomaś catuṣṭomaḥ saṃtiṣṭhate patnīsaṃyājāntaḥ
15.19.1	athāsyaitāni śatamaukṣāṇi carmāṇy upastīrṇāni bhavanty uttarāṃ śroṇim uttareṇa pakṣasaṃhitāni
15.19.2	athaiteṣāṃ ghṛtacarmaṇāṃ viṃśatiṃ vā caturviṃśatiṃ vāpoddhṛtyāthetarair annāni saṃprayuvanti
15.19.3	athaiteṣāṃ dārvācitānāṃ viṃśatiṃ vā caturviṃśatiṃ vā madhye 'gner acāyaṃ citvāthetarāṇi saṃchidyasaṃchidyaiva saṃprakiranti
15.19.4	tad etāṃ caturaśrāṃ devapuram adhyātman āyātayati
15.19.5	api vā pakṣapucchān abhinirūhati yathā samāvatī yūpāgraiḥ syād athaināṃ samucchritya pariśrayanti
15.19.6	tasyodīcīṃ dvāraṃ kurvanti
15.19.7	tad etānīndrāṇasāny upavartayanti catvāry anudiśam avāntaradiśāsv itarāṇi yady aṣṭau bhavanti
15.19.8	teṣāṃ catvāraścatvāra ekaikam adhirohanti daśānye rātrikarmiṇaḥ
15.19.9	athaibhya sthālībhir ājyāny abhiharanty aṣṭamair annāni
15.19.10	athādhvaryur ādatte sruvaṃ ca dīrghadaṇḍaṃ darviṃ ca dīrghadaṇḍām
15.19.11	ādadata ekaviṃśatiṃ pratiprasthātāro daśānye rātrikarmiṇaḥ
15.19.12	athādhvaryuḥ sruveṇājyasyopahatya trīṇi pūrvāṇi vaiśvadevāni juhoti
15.19.13	svāhādhim ādhītāya svāheti sruvair evājyānāṃ juhvati datvate svāheti darvair annānām adantakāya svāheti
15.19.14	ta evam evaitam anuvākam
15.19.15	yadaitasyānuvākasya pāraṃ yanty athaitenānuvākena vyavadadhāti
15.20.1	pūrvā stokīyā athaitam anuvākaṃ diśyāḥ
15.20.2	athaitam anuvākam uttarā stokīyā athaitam anuvākam ekaviṃśinīṃ dīkṣām athaitam anuvākam ṛtudīkṣā athaitam anuvākam aśvasya sāvitrāṇy athaitam anuvākam
15.20.3	ta evam evaitān anuvākān etenaivānuvākena
15.20.4	yadaiteṣām anuvākānāṃ pāraṃ yanty athaitān anuvākān upasaṃkrāmanti vaiśvadevāni cāśvāṅgāni ca dvāv aśvarūpāṇām oṣadhīnāṃ ca vanaspatīnāṃ ca dvāv apāṃ saṃdhānānāṃ cābhidhānānāṃ ca saṃplavasyaikaḥ
15.20.5	uktaḥ khārīhomaḥ
15.20.6	ta evam evaitān anuvākān etenaivānuvākena
15.20.7	yadaiteṣām anuvākānāṃ pāraṃ yanty athaitān anuvākān abhinivartante
15.21.1	ekasmai svāhā dvābhyāṃ svāheti
15.21.2	ta evam evaitān anuvākān etenaivānuvākena punaḥpunar abhyupākāraṃ juhvati
15.21.3	atha vasatīvarīṇāṃ pariharaṇakāle 'dhidravanti
15.21.4	parihṛtāsu vasatīvarīṣv āhūtāyāṃ subrahmaṇyāyāṃ punar evādhidravanti
15.21.5	ta evam evaitān anuvākān etenaivānuvākena punaḥpunar abhyupākāraṃ juhvataḥ samāpnuvanti
15.21.6	tāni vā etāny aśvasya sarvāyuṣāṇīty ācakṣate
15.22.1	samāptaya iti haika āhuḥ
15.22.2	etair hi sarvāṃ rātrim juhvati
15.22.3	atha prātaranuvākam upākariṣyantāv avadravato 'dhvaryuś ca pratiprasthātā ca dvāv anyāv adhidravato rātrikarmiṇau
15.22.4	atha rājānam upāvahṛtya prātaranuvākam upākaroti
15.22.5	parihite prātaranuvāke 'po 'cchaiti
15.22.6	adbhir udaiti
15.22.7	ukthyaṃ kratum upaiti
15.22.8	samānam karmopāṃśoḥ
15.22.9	upāṃśuṃ hoṣyann indrāṇasam adhidrutya catasraḥ sruvāhutīr juhoty uṣase svāhā vyuṣṭyai svāhodeṣyate svāhodyate svāheti
15.22.10	prasiddho 'bhiṣavaḥ
15.22.11	samānaṃ karmāntaryāmāt
15.22.12	antaryāmaṃ hoṣyann indrāṇasam adhidrutya catasraḥ sruvāhutīr juhoty uditāya svāhā suvargāya svāhā lokāya svāhā sarvasmai svāheti
15.22.13	atraitad udita āditya uparamanti rātrikarmiṇaḥ
15.22.14	vyavacchindanti pariśrayaṇāni
15.22.15	nivartayantīndrāṇasāni
15.22.16	prasiddhaṃ suvarṇamayair grahā gṛhyante
15.22.17	samānaṃ karmāgrayaṇād grahāt
15.22.18	āgrayaṇaṃ gṛhītvā suvarṇarajatābhyāṃ dvau mahimānau grahau gṛhṇāti yaḥ prāṇato ya ātmadā iti
15.22.19	athokthyaṃ gṛhṇāti
15.22.20	samānaṃ karmāśvinād grahāt
15.22.21	āśvinaṃ grahaṃ gṛhītvā caturviṃśatiṃ raśanā ādāya yūpān abhyāyanti catasraścatasra itare parikarmiṇaḥ
15.22.22	svarvantaṃ rājjudālam agniṣṭham utsṛjya tasmād dakṣiṇam eva pūrvaṃ pautudravam upasthāvānam ucchrayati
15.23.1	athottaram
15.23.2	trīn dakṣiṇato bailvāṃs trīn uttaratas trīn dakṣiṇataḥ khādirāṃs trīn uttaratas trīn dakṣiṇataḥ pālāśāṃs trīn uttarataḥ
15.23.3	atraitaṃ pālāśam upaśayaṃ dakṣiṇato nyasyati tūṣṇīm
15.23.4	svarvantān yūpān utsṛjyāthādhvaryur agniṣṭha upākaroty aśvaṃ tūparaṃ gomṛgam ity etāṃs trīn prājāpatyān
15.23.5	atha paryaṅgyān upākaroty āgnendraṃ kṛṣṇalalāmam aindrāpauṣṇaṃ pauṣṇam āgneyau kṛṣṇagrīvau tvāṣṭrau lomaśasaktyau śitipṛṣthau bārhaspatyau dhātre pṛṣodaraṃ sauryaṃ balakṣaṃ petvam iti
15.23.6	athādhvaryur agniṣṭha evopākaroty agnaye 'nīkavate rohitāñjir anaḍvān ity ekādaśa
15.23.7	athādhvaryur agniṣṭha evopākaroti somāya svarājñe 'novāhāv anaḍvāhāv iti dvandvinaḥ
15.23.8	athādhvaryur agniṣṭha evopākarotīndrāya rājñe sūkara ity ekādaśāraṇyān
15.23.9	saiṣāgniṣṭhe paśuṣaṣṭir bhavati
15.23.10	atha rohito dhūmrarohita iti daśāṣṭādaśino 'nuvākāḥ
15.23.11	teṣāṃ pūrvā eva navato dakṣiṇeṣu yūpeṣūpasthāpayanty uttarā navata uttareṣu
15.23.12	āgnendrā dakṣiṇeṣāṃ mukhyā bhavanty aindrāsūrā uttareṣām
15.23.13	atha mayuḥ prājāpatya iti daśa daśino 'nuvākāḥ
15.23.14	teṣāṃ pūrvā eva pañcato dakṣiṇeṣu yūpeṣūpasthāpayanty uttarāḥ pañcata uttareṣu
15.23.15	somāpauṣṇā dakṣiṇeṣāṃ mukhyā bhavanty aindrāpauṣṇā uttareṣām
15.23.16	athaitasminn upaśaye manasaiva yaṃ dveṣṭi tam upākaroti
15.23.17	yady u vai na dveṣṭy ākhus te paśur ity anudiśati
15.23.18	etamsin kāla āhavanīye sruvāhutiṃ juhoty upākṛtāya svāheti
15.24.1	athaitam aśvam agreṇa yūpān svarathe yunakti yuñjanti bradhnam aruṣaṃ carantaṃ pari tasthuṣa iti
15.24.2	athāsya pṛṣṭhaṃ marmṛjyate rocante rocanā divīti
15.24.3	evam evottaraṃ yogyaṃ yunakti
15.24.4	tasyaivam evottarataḥ praṣṭim upaniyunakti
15.24.5	tayoḥ pṛṣṭhaṃ marmṛjyate yuñjanty asya kāmyā harī vipakṣasā rathe / śoṇā dhṛṣṇū nṛvāhaseti
15.24.6	atha ketuṃ kṛṇvann aketava iti dhvajaṃ pratimuñcati
15.24.7	atha yajamānaṃ varmasaṃnahanīyābhiḥ saṃnahyati jīmūtasyeva bhavati pratīkam iti caturdaśabhir yathārūpam
15.24.8	atha ratham upatiṣṭhate vanaspate vīḍvaṅgo hi bhūyā iti tisṛbhir anucchandasam
15.24.9	atha dundubhim upaśvāsayaty upaśvāsaya pṛthivīm uta dyām iti tisṛbhir anucchandasam
15.24.10	atha dakṣiṇaṃ hradam abhiprayāti dyaus te pṛṣṭhaṃ kramair atyakramīd vājy ākrān vājīti tribhir anuvākaiḥ
15.24.11	ā kroḍebhyo 'śvān abhidhāvayanti
15.24.12	athaitaṃ rathaṃ pradakṣiṇam āvartya śālām ānayati yad vāto apo agamad indrasya tanuvaṃ priyām / etaṃ stotar etena pathā punar aśvam āvartayāsi na iti
15.24.13	tān adhvaryur uttarābhi stokīyābhir anvaity agnaye svāhā somāya svāhety etenānuvākena punaḥpunar abhyupākāraṃ yāvad eṣāṃ stokā uparamanti
15.24.14	athaitam aśvam agreṇa yūpān svarathāt pramucya sauvarṇena saṃdānena saṃdityādhvaryor āvasathaṃ dviyogaṃ vartayanti
15.24.15	atha mahiṣī vāvātā parivṛktīty etā asmai gandhān gaṇān maṇīṃś cādāyābhyāyanty aśvam
15.24.16	tasya yat prāk kroḍāt tan mahiṣy abhyanakti vasavas tvāñjantu gāyatreṇa chandaseti pautudraveṇa pratihitānāṃ jāyābhiḥ saha
15.24.17	atha yat pratīcīnaṃ kroḍād ā nābhes tad vāvātābhyanakti rudrās tvāñjantu traiṣṭubhena chandaseti
15.25.1	gaulgulavenārājñāṃ jāyābhiḥ saha
15.25.2	atha yat pratīcīnaṃ nābher ā pucchāt tat parivṛkty abhyanakty ādityās tvāñjantu jāgatena chandaseti maustena sūtagrāmaṇīnāṃ ca kṣattasaṃgrahītṝṇāṃ ca jāyābhiḥ saha
15.25.3	tasya ye prācīnaṃ vahasaḥ keśās teṣu mahiṣī sahasraṃ sauvarṇān kācān āvayati bhūr iti pratihitānāṃ jāyābhiḥ saha
15.25.4	atha ye pratīcīnaṃ vahasaḥ keśās teṣu vāvātā sahasraṃ rājatān kācān āvayati bhuva ity arājñāṃ jāyābhiḥ saha
15.25.5	athaiṣā parivṛktī vāleṣu sahasraṃ sāmudrān kācān āvayati suvar iti sūtagrāmaṇīnāṃ ca kṣattasaṃgrahītṝṇāṃ ca jāyābhiḥ saha
15.25.6	yathetaṃ patnayo yanti
15.25.7	atha mahiṣī vāvātā parivṛktī māhānasī dāsīty etā asmai madhumiśrān lājān upakiranti
15.26.1	lājī3ñ chācī3n yaśo mamā3ṃ yavyāyai gavyāyā etad devā annam attaitad annam addhi prajāpata iti
15.26.2	yasyai hānnam atti tasyai hārdhukā prajā bhavatīti vijñāyate

15.26.13	athādhvaryur agniṣṭha eva niyunaktīndrāya rājñe sūkara iti
15.26.14	sarvān evāraṇyān niyojanenaivānuvartayate yāṃś ca grāmyāṇāṃ paśūnām utsrakṣyan bhavaty āraṇyāṃs ca

15.27.1	agniḥ paśur āsīt tenāyajanta sa etaṃ lokam ajayad yasminn agniḥ sa te lokas taṃ jeṣyasy athāvajighra / vāyuḥ paśur āsīd āsīt ādityaḥ paśur āsīd iti
15.27.2	yadi nāvajighrati punar evāvaghrāpayaty agniḥ paśur āsīt tenāyajanta sa etaṃ lokam ajayad yasminn agniḥ sa te lokas tasmāt tvāntar eṣyāmi yadi nāvajighrasi / vāyuḥ paśur āsīd ādityaḥ paśur āsīd iti
15.27.3	yadi nāvajighrati punar evāvaghrāpayaty agniḥ paśur āsīt tenāyajanta sa etaṃ lokam ajayad yasminn agniḥ sa te lokas taṃ jeṣyasi yady avajighrasi / vāyuḥ paśur āsīd ādityaḥ paśur āsīd āsīd iti

15.28.21	tau juhvām aktvā tābhyām aśvaṃ tūparaṃ gomṛgam ity etān samanakti
15.28.22	kālāyasaiḥ paryaṅgyān lohāyasair itarān suvarṇair dakṣiṇān rajatair uttarān
15.28.23	atha yathāyatanaṃ srucau sādayitvāha paryagnaye kriyamāṇāyānubrūhīti
15.28.24	nitye paryagnikaraṇe 'nuvartayati meṣas tvā pacatair avatu lohitagrīvaś chāgaiḥ śalmalir iti
15.28.25	paryagnikṛtānām eteṣāṃ paśūnām utsṛjanty avī dve dhenū bhaumī digbhyo vaḍabe dve dhenū bhaumī vairājī puruṣī dve dhenū bhaumī indrāya rājñe sūkara iti sarvān evātrāraṇyān
15.28.26	atha paryagnikṛtaiḥ paśubhir udañcaḥ pratipadyante
15.28.27	teṣām aindrāsūrā uttarārdhyā bhavanti
15.28.28	aśva upacārataḥ
15.28.29	aśvam evādhvaryur vapāśrapaṇībhyām anvārabhate
15.28.30	pṛthag itarān parikarmiṇa udañco nayanty anupūrvam avyatiṣajantaḥ
15.28.31	atha yācati barhiś ca śatapalaṃ ca kṛttiṃ cādhīvāsaṃ ca kaśipu tārpyaṃ ceti
15.28.32	uttarata etad bahulaṃ saṃstīrṇaṃ bhavati
15.28.33	tad aśvāya nihanyamānāyopāsyati barhiś ca śatapalaṃ ca kṛttiṃ cādhīvāsaṃ ca kaśipu cety etat pañcatayam
15.28.34	tārpyeṇa saṃjñapyamānaṃ yāmena sāmnā prastotānūpatiṣṭhate

15.28.41	hotā brāhmaṇaṃ pṛcchati
15.29.1	kiṃ svid āsīt pūrvacittiḥ kiṃ svid āsīd bṛhad vayaḥ / kiṃ svid āsīt piśaṃgilā kiṃ svid āsīt pilippileti
15.29.2	tam itaraḥ pratyāha dyaur āsīt pūrvacittir aśva āsīt bṛhad vayaḥ / rātrir āsīt piśaṃgilā avir āsīt pilippileti
15.29.3	tam itaraḥ pṛcchati kaḥ svid ekākī carati ka u svij jāyate punaḥ / kiṃ svid dhimasya bheṣajaṃ kiṃ svid āvapanaṃ mahad iti
15.29.4	tam itaraḥ pratyāha sūrya ekākī carati candramā jāyate punaḥ / agnir himasya bheṣajaṃ bhūmir āvapanaṃ mahad iti
15.29.5	tam itaraḥ pṛcchati pṛcchāmi tvā param antaṃ pṛthivyāḥ pṛcchāmi tvā bhuvanasya nābhim / pṛcchāmi tvā vṛṣṇo aśvasya retaḥ pṛcchāmi vācaḥ paramaṃ vyometi
15.29.6	tam itaraḥ pratyāha vedim āhuḥ param antaṃ pṛthivyā yajñam āhur bhuvanasya nābhim / somam āhur vṛṣṇo aśvasya reto brahmaiva vācaḥ paramaṃ vyometi
15.29.7	saṃjñaptān prāhuḥ
15.29.8	juhoti saṃjñaptāhutiṃ yat paśavo māyūn akṛṣateti
15.29.9	atha sapta prāṇāhutīr juhoti prāṇāya svāhā vyānāya svāheti
15.29.10	ṣaṭtriṃśatam aśvastomīyāñ juhoti yad akrandaḥ prathamaṃ jāyamāno mā no mitro varuṇo aryamā ye vājinaṃ paripaśyanti pakvam uta smāsya dravatas turaṇyata iti
15.29.11	athābhyāyanti śamitāra upetaneti
15.29.12	pāśebhyaḥ paśūn pramucyamānān anumantrayate 'ditiḥ pāśān pramumoktv etān iti
15.29.13	pṛthag aviśākhābhir upasajyemāṃ diśaṃ nirasyanty arātīyantam adharaṃ kṛṇomi yaṃ dviṣmas tasmin pratimuñcāmi pāśān iti
15.29.14	athaitāḥ patnayaḥ sauvarṇair udakamaṇḍalubhir udāyanti
15.29.15	tā aśvasyānupṛṣṭhaṃ prāṇān āpyāyayantyo yanty anupūrvam itareṣāṃ paśūnām
15.29.16	athaiṣā mahiṣī prāsya keśān vāsaḥ paridhāya sauvarṇena vidhavanena vidhuvānā trir apasalair aśvaṃ paryety avantī sthāvantīs tvāvantu priyaṃ tvā priyāṇāṃ varṣiṣṭham āpyānāṃ nidhīnāṃ tvā nidhipatiṃ havāmahe vaso mameti
15.29.17	triḥ parītyottaratas tiṣṭhati pratihitānāṃ jāyābhiḥ saha

15.29.19	evaṃ parivṛktī sūtagrāmaṇīnāṃ ca kṣattasaṃgrahītṝṇāṃ ca jāyābhiḥ saha
15.29.20	yathetaṃ patnayo yanti

15.29.23	athaitāṃ mahiṣīṃ sarvair alaṅkārair alaṅkṛtya tāṃ nihnuvānāṃ garhamāṇām adhvaryur udānayaty ambe ambāly ambike na mā nayati kaś cana / sasasty aśvaka iti
15.29.24	sāśvam uttarata upasaṃviśya śirasto vāsa upadhatte

15.32.15	pavamānena caritvāthaitān paśūn yācaty aśvaṃ tūparaṃ gomṛgam iti
15.32.16	atha paryaṅgyān athetarān atha dakṣiṇān athottarān
15.32.17	uttarato 'śvasya tūparasya gomṛgasyeti havir upasādayanti dakṣiṇata itareṣāṃ paśūnām
15.32.18	atha vaitase kaṭe 'śvasya hṛdayaṃ nidhāya suvarṇena ca sāyakena ca tasyāgre 'vadyann āha
15.33.1	manotāyai haviṣo 'vadīyamānasyānubrūhīty ekādaśāvadānāny avadyati
15.33.2	evaṃ tūparasyaivaṃ gomṛgasya
15.33.3	kālāyasaiḥ paryaṅgyāṇāṃ lohāyasair itareṣāṃ suvarṇair dakṣiṇeṣāṃ rajatair uttareṣām
15.33.4	nāśvasya tūparasya gomṛgasyeti sviṣṭakṛte 'vadyati
15.33.5	avadyantītareṣāṃ paśūnām
15.33.6	nāśvasya tūparasya gomṛgasyetīḍām avadyati
15.33.7	avadyantītareṣāṃ paśūnām
15.33.8	athaitam aśvaṃ vaitase kaṭe yathāṅgaṃ cinoti
15.33.9	purastāt pratyañcaṃ tūparam āyātayati
15.33.10	paścāt prācīnaṃ gomṛgam
15.33.11	atha juhūpabhṛtāv ādadāna āha prajāpataya ity upāṃśu hayasya chāgasyosrasya haviṣo 'nubrūhīty uccaiḥ
15.33.12	atyākramyāśrāvyāha prajāpataya ity upāṃśu hayasya chāgasyosrasya haviḥ prasthitaṃ preṣyety uccaiḥ
15.33.13	vaṣaṭkṛte tān sahaiva kaṭenāgnāv anupraharati
15.34.1	dyaus te pṛṣṭhaṃ kramair atyakramīd vājy ākrān vājīti tribhir anuvākaiḥ
15.34.2	atha paryaṅgyāṇāṃ havirbhiś caraty athetareṣām
15.34.3	atha dakṣiṇeṣāṃ pratiprasthātāro havirbhiś caranty athottareṣām
15.34.4	yāṃś ca grāmyāṇāṃ paśūnām udasrākṣīd āraṇyāṃś ca sruvāhutyas teṣāṃ havirbhyaḥ pratijuhoti
15.34.5	upāṃśv eteṣāṃ paśujātānāṃ havirbhiś carantīty uktam etat
15.34.6	atha purastād vanaspateḥ samānyo diśaḥ pratiyajati

15.35.1	athaitaṃ prasekam agnāv āyātayati dakṣiṇato vodañcaṃ paścād vā prāñcam
15.35.2	tasya srug iva pūrvārdho bhavati
15.35.3	evam eva madhyam
15.35.4	camasa iva budhnaḥ
15.35.5	tasmiṃś catura upastṛṇāna āhāpramattaḥ saṃtatam ānaya stegān nigadiṣyāmīti
15.35.6	sa yatra dhārāgniṃ prāpnoti tat pratipadyate stegān daṃṣṭrābhyāṃ maṇḍūkāñ jambhyebhir iti caturdaśānuvākān prayāsāya svāheti pañcadaśam
15.35.7	atha dve āhutī juhotīluvardāya svāhā balivardāya svāheti ṣaṭtriṃśatam aśvastomīyāṃs tisro dvipadā imā nu kaṃ bhuvanā sīṣadhemāpo hi ṣṭhā mayobhuva iti ca
15.35.8	atraitaṃ prasekam agnāv anupraharati

15.35.11	atha purastād uttamasyānūyājasyāśvaśaphenāśvatejanīm upajuhoti
15.35.12	samānaṃ karmā patnīsaṃyājebhyaḥ
15.35.13	atha purastād uttamasya patnīsaṃyājasyāyasmayena kamaṇḍalunāśvatejanīm upajuhoti
15.35.14	ṛjudhaikaviṃśa ukthyaḥ saṃtiṣṭhate patnīsaṃyājāntaḥ
15.35.15	atha vasatīvarīḥ parihṛtya payāṃsi viśiṣyopavasanti
15.36.1	athāto mahārātra eva budhyante
15.36.2	prātar ājyāni gṛhītvā rājānam upāvahṛtya prātaranuvākam upākaroti
15.36.3	parihite prātaranuvāke 'po 'cchaiti
15.36.4	adbhir udaiti
15.36.5	atirātraṃ kratum upaiti
15.36.6	prasiddho 'bhiṣavaḥ
15.36.7	prasiddhaṃ grahā gṛhyante
15.36.8	samānaṃ karmāśvinād grahāt
15.36.9	āśvinaṃ grahaṃ gṛhītvaikādaśa raśanā ādāya yūpam abhyaiti
15.36.10	svarvantaṃ rājjudālam agniṣṭham utsṛjyaikādaśa prātargavyān prajāpatyān paśūn upākaroti
15.36.11	teṣāṃ prasiddhaṃ vapābhiś caritvā prasarpanti prātaḥsavanāya
15.36.12	tad ṛjudhā saṃtiṣṭhate
15.36.13	prasarpanti mādhyaṃdināya savanāya
15.36.14	prasiddho 'bhiṣavaḥ
15.36.15	prasiddhaṃ grahā gṛhyante
15.36.16	samānaṃ karmā dākṣiṇebhyaḥ
15.36.17	dākṣiṇāni hutvāṣṭau saṃvargāhutīr juhoty arvāṅ yajñaḥ saṃkrāmatv iti
15.36.18	avaśiṣṭaṃ dakṣiṇānāṃ dadāti
15.36.19	vaiśvakarmaṇāni hutvā nava paryāptīr juhoti bhūtaṃ bhavyaṃ bhaviṣyad iti
15.36.20	utsanno 'gnyabhiṣekaḥ
15.36.21	nātrāhīnasaṃtatiṃ karoti
15.36.22	ṛjudhā mādhyaṃdinaṃ savanaṃ saṃtiṣṭhate
15.36.23	prasarpanti tṛtīyasavanāya
15.36.24	prasiddham ādityagraheṇa caritvāgrayaṇaṃ gṛhṇāti
15.36.25	athokthyaṃ gṛhṇāti
15.36.26	samānaṃ karmā pavamānāt
15.36.27	pavamānena caritvā sve dhāman paśubhiś carati
15.36.28	teṣāṃ samānī manotā samānī devatā samānaḥ pratyabhimarśanaḥ samāno vasāhomaḥ samāno vanaspatiḥ samānaḥ sviṣṭakṛtpraiṣavān samānīḍā samānyo diśaḥ
15.36.29	samānaṃ karmā patnīsaṃyājebhyaḥ
15.36.30	patnīḥ saṃyājya prāṅ etya dhruvām āpyāyyābhūtīś cānubhūtīś ca juhoty ā me gṛhā bhavantv agninā tapo 'nvabhavad ity etābhyām anuvākābhyām
15.36.31	atha bhūtābhavyau homau juhoti bhūtāya svāhā bhaviṣyate svāheti
15.36.32	athādhvarikāṇi samiṣṭayajūṃṣi hutvā daśāgnikāny upajuhoti
15.36.33	samānaṃ karmāvabhṛthāt
15.36.34	athaitasminn avabhṛthe dvitīyām avabhṛthāhutiṃ hutvā daśa vāruṇāny upajuhoti namo rājñe namo varuṇāyeti
15.36.35	atha mṛtyave svāhā mṛtyave svāheti navatim āhutīr juhoti prayāsāya svāhāyāsāya svāhety ekādaśa
15.36.36	śatāyur vai puruṣaḥ śatavīrya ātmaikaśato yāvān eva puruṣas tasmān mṛtyum avayajata iti brāhmaṇam
15.37.1	athaiṣa ātreyo vihṛtaḥ śuklo viklidhas tilakavān piṅgākṣaḥ khalatir vikaṭaḥ kunakhī kubjaḥ śipiviṣṭo nagna upamajjati
15.37.2	tasya mūrdhni juhoti jumbakāya svāheti
15.37.3	atrāsmā etac chataṃ vipathaṃ dadāti
15.37.4	athainam iṣujitāt pradhamanti mā me rāṣṭre vātsīr iti
15.37.5	prasiddho 'vabhṛthaḥ
15.37.6	udayanīyayeṣṭyeṣṭvā maitrāvaruṇīṃ vaśām upākaroti
15.37.7	tasyai saurīr nava śvetā vaśā ity upālambhyā bhavanti
15.37.8	tāsāṃ prasiddhaṃ vapābhiś caritvāgreṇa gārhapatyaṃ pātnīvatam ucchritya tasmiñ chagalaṃ kalmāṣaṃ kikidīviṃ vidīgayam iti tvāṣṭrān paśūn upākaroti
15.37.9	tān paryagnikṛtān utsṛjyājyena saṃsthāṃ karoti
15.37.10	atha paśupuroḍāśān nirvapati paśupuroḍāśau vā
15.37.11	atha purastāt paśupuroḍāśasviṣṭakṛto daśa yavyāny upajuhoti namo rājñe namo varuṇāyeti
15.37.12	atha purastāt paśusviṣṭakṛto daśa gavyāny upajuhoti mayobhūr vāto abhivātūsrā iti
15.37.13	prasiddhaṃ paśavaḥ saṃtiṣṭhante
15.37.14	athodavasānīyayeṣṭyeṣṭvāgreṇāhavanīyaṃ viśālayūpam ucchritya tasminn etān paśūn upākaroty āgneyam aindrāgnam āśvinam iti
15.37.15	teṣāṃ prasiddhaṃ vapābhiś caritvā paśupuroḍāśān nirvapati
15.37.16	tān anuvartante 'ṣṭau devasuvāṃ havīṃṣy agnaye 'ṃhomuce 'ṣṭākapāla ity eṣā ca daśahavir iṣṭiḥ
15.37.17	tasyā etā yājyāpuro'nuvākyā bhavanti
15.38.1	agner manve prathamasya pracetasa iti
15.38.2	atha purastāt paśupuroḍāśasviṣṭakṛto daśa brahmavarcasāny upajuhoty ā brahman brāhmaṇo brahmavarcasī jāyatām iti
15.38.3	atha purastāt paśusviṣṭakṛto daśa saṃnatihomān upajuhoty agnaye samanamat pṛthivyai samanamad iti
15.38.4	prasiddhaṃ paśavaḥ saṃtiṣṭhante

15.38.8	suvarṇarajate mahimnoḥ pātre dadāti
15.38.9	ekatayāni sauvarṇāni pātrāṇi dadāti hiraṇmayaṃ kaśipu hiraṇmayaṃ paḍbīśaṃ hiraṇmayaṃ saṃdānam iti
15.38.10	atha vīṇāgāthibhyāṃ śataṃ vipathau dadāti

15.38.12	atha devikāhavirbhir yajate

16.1.1	dvādaśāhena yakṣyamāṇo bhavaty eko vā bahavo vā
16.1.2	uto hy eko dakṣiṇāvatā yajate
16.1.3	sa yady eko yadi bahavo 'māvāsyāyā eva ṣaḍahenopariṣṭād dīkṣante
16.1.4	te gṛhapater araṇyoḥ saṃjānate pṛthag vā
16.1.5	te yadi gṛhapater araṇyoḥ saṃjānate mathitvā gārhapatyam āhavanīyam uddharanti
16.1.6	grāmād vrataśrapaṇam āharanti
16.1.7	yady u vai pṛthak saṃjānate gṛhapatir eva prathamo manthate
16.1.8	tad evetare paryupaviśya mathitvāmathitvaiva gārhapatyaṃ saṃnivapanti
16.1.9	tasmād ekavadbhūtād āhavanīyam uddharanti
16.1.10	grāmād vrataśrapaṇān āhṛtya saṃnivapanti
16.1.11	atha yadi paścād apara āgacchati mathitvaiva gārhapatye 'rdhaṃ nivapaty āhavanīye 'rdhaṃ grāmād vrataśrapaṇam āhṛtyāpyarjati
16.1.12	upo enaṃ pūrveṣu karmasu hvayante
16.1.13	athātaḥ pavanasyaiva mīmāṃsā
16.1.14	gṛhapatim evādhvaryuḥ prathamaṃ pavayaty atha hotāram atha brahmāṇam athodgātāraṃ pratiprasthātādhvaryuṃ pavayati prastotāraṃ praśāstāraṃ brāhmaṇācchaṃsinam āgnīdhraḥ pratiprasthātāraṃ pavayaty acchāvākaṃ neṣṭāraṃ potāraṃ sadasyam unnetāgnīdhraṃ pavayati grāvastutaṃ subrahmaṇyaṃ pratihartāram ātmānam antataḥ
16.1.15	te ced brūyur adhvaryur vāva sarvasya pavayitā sa naḥ sarvān pavayatv iti sa evainān sarvān pavayati
16.1.16	api vānyo'nyaṃ pavayanti yady adhīyanto bhavanti
16.2.1	teṣāṃ prasiddhā dīkṣaṇīyeṣṭis tāyate
16.2.2	sakṛdāśrāvite sa yatrāha bharatavad iti tad gṛhapater evārṣeyaṃ prathamaṃ vṛṇīte 'tha hotur athātmano 'tha brahmaṇo 'thodgātur atha pratiprasthātur atha prastotur atha praśāstur atha brāhmaṇācchaṃsino 'cchāvākasya sadasyasyāgnīdhaḥ potur neṣṭur grāvastuta unnetuḥ subrahmaṇyasya pratihartur antataḥ
16.2.3	brahmaṇvad iti samānam
16.2.4	te sarva eva dīkṣāhutiṣu samanvārabhante

16.2.6	tad evetare 'nunikrāmanti

16.3.1	teṣāṃ dvādaśa dīkṣā dvādaśopasado dvādaśāhaṃ prasutāḥ

16.3.22	dundubhinaitad ahar adhvaryur māhendrasya stotram upākaroti
16.3.23	etāvad evaitad ahaḥ śilpaṃ kriyate

16.3.25	atha śvo bhūte tāyate saptadaśa ukthyo vairūpasāmā
16.3.26	ādhāvenaitad ahar adhvaryur māhendrasya stotram upākaroti
16.3.27	etāvad evaitad ahaḥ śilpaṃ kriyate
16.3.28	ahīnasaṃtatiṃ karoti
16.3.29	atha śvo bhūte tāyata ekaviṃśa ukthyo vairājasāmāgneyaś ca ṣoḍaśī cātigrāhyau
16.3.30	anatigrāhyaḥ ṣoḍaśīty eka āhuḥ
16.3.31	ekaviṃśam etad ahar nyūṅkhyaṃ bhavati
16.3.32	virājāṃ vā pratipatsu nyūṅkhayanti śastre vety etad ekam
16.3.33	athāparaṃ prātaranuvāke nyūṅkhayanti haviṣkṛty ubhayeṣu prasthiteṣu māhendrasyāśrāvaṇe

16.28.19	tasya trivṛt saptadaśau viparyāsaṃ stomau bhavataḥ
16.28.20	prāṇo vai trivṛd annam
16.28.21	saptadaśaḥ prajāpatiḥ
16.28.22	prāṇāc ca khalu vā idam annādyāc ca parigṛhya prajāpatiḥ prājāyata
16.28.23	prāṇāc caivaitad annādyāc ca parigṛhya yajamānaḥ prajāyate

16.28.26	chandogānu sāmavikalpaṃ pṛccheyur ity etad aparam
16.29.1	prajātikāmo vā vyāvṛtkāmo vā paśukāmo vā vāco vāntaṃ parijigāṃsan pañcarātrāya dīkṣate
16.29.2	tasyāparimitā dīkṣā dvādaśopasadaḥ
16.29.3	tasyāhāni trivṛd agniṣṭomaḥ pañcadaśa ukthyaḥ saptadaśa ukthyaḥ pañcaviṃśo 'gniṣṭomo mahāvratavān viśvajit sarvapṛṣṭho 'tirātraḥ
16.29.4	sārasvatenāyanenaiṣyanto dvayīr gā upakalpayanta ṛṣabhaikādaśā anyā ṛṣabhaikaśatā anyāḥ

16.29.11	tasmin saṃsthite 'bhi yūpaṃ vahanty abhi dhiṣṇiyān haranty agniṣṭhe 'nasi samavaśamayante yad eṣāṃ samavaśamayitavyaṃ bhavati
16.29.12	te 'nenaiva pṛṣṭhyena ṣaḍahena pratipadyante
16.29.13	aharahaḥ śamyānyāseśamyānyāse yajamānā ākrośanto 'jyānim icchamānā yadā daśa śataṃ kurvanty athaikam utthānam
16.29.14	yadā śataṃ sahasraṃ kurvanty athaikam utthānam

17.1.1	atirātraṃ kariṣyann upakalpayate caturo 'tirātrapaśūn aruṇapiśaṅgam aśvam audumbaraṃ ṣoḍaśipātraṃ catusrakti jyāyaso 'mbhṛṇāñjyāyasa ekadhanān
17.1.2	dīkṣate
17.1.3	rohiṇyā piṅgalayaikahāyanyā somaṃ krīṇāti
17.1.4	dvādaśopasadaḥ
17.1.5	prasiddhena karmaṇopavasathād eti
17.1.6	atha vasatīvarīḥ parihṛtya payāṃsi viśiṣyopavasanti
17.1.7	athāto mahārātra eva budhyante
17.1.8	prātarājyāni gṛhītvā rājānam upāvahṛtya prātaranuvākam upākaroti
17.1.9	parihite prātaranuvāke 'po 'cchaiti
17.1.10	adbhir udaiti
17.1.11	atirātraṃ kratum upaiti
17.1.12	prasiddho 'bhiṣavaḥ
17.1.13	prasiddhaṃ grahā gṛhyante
17.1.14	samānaṃ karmāgrayaṇād grahāt
17.1.15	āgrayaṇaṃ gṛhītvā ṣoḍaśinaṃ gṛhṇāty ātiṣṭha vṛtrahan ratham ity anudrutyopayāmagṛhīto 'sīndrāya tvā ṣoḍaśine juṣṭaṃ gṛhṇāmīti
17.1.16	parimṛjya sādayaty eṣa te yonir indrāya tvā ṣoḍaśina iti
17.1.17	athokthyaṃ gṛhṇāti
17.1.18	samānaṃ karmāśvinād grahāt
17.1.19	āśvinaṃ grahaṃ gṛhītvā catasro raśanā ādāya yūpam abhyaiti
17.1.20	svarvantaṃ yūpam utsṛjya caturo 'tirātrapaśūn upākaroty āgneyam aindrāgnam aindraṃ sārasvatīṃ meṣīm iti
17.1.21	teṣāṃ prasiddhaṃ vapābhiś caritvā prasarpanti prātaḥsavanāya
17.1.22	tad ṛjudhā saṃtiṣṭhate
17.1.23	prasarpanti mādhyaṃdināya savanāya
17.1.24	prasiddho 'bhiṣavaḥ
17.1.25	prasiddhaṃ grahā gṛhyante
17.1.26	samānaṃ karmāgrayaṇād grahāt
17.1.27	āgrayaṇaṃ gṛhītvā ṣoḍaśinam abhigṛhṇātīndram id dharī vahata ity anudrutyopayāmagṛhīto 'sīndrāya tvā ṣoḍaśine juṣṭaṃ gṛhṇāmīti
17.1.28	parimṛjya sādayaty eṣa te yonir indrāya tvā ṣoḍaśina iti
17.1.29	athokthyaṃ gṛhṇāti
17.1.30	ṛjudhā mādhyaṃdinaṃ savanaṃ saṃtiṣṭhate
17.1.31	prasarpanti tṛtīyasavanāya
17.1.32	prasiddham ādityagraheṇa caritvāgrayaṇaṃ gṛhṇāti
17.1.33	atha ṣoḍaśinam abhigṛhṇāty asāvi soma indra ta ity anudrutyopayāmagṛhīto 'sīndrāya tvā ṣoḍaśine juṣṭaṃ gṛhṇāmīti
17.1.34	parimṛjya sādayaty eṣa te yonir indrāya tvā ṣoḍaśina iti
17.1.35	athokthyaṃ gṛhṇāti
17.2.1	samānaṃ karmā pavamānāt
17.2.2	pavamānena caritvā sve dhāman paśubhiś carati
17.2.3	teṣāṃ nānā manotā nānā devatā nānā pratyabhimarśanā nānā vasāhomāḥ samāno vanaspatiḥ samānaḥ sviṣṭakṛtpraiṣavān samānīḍā samānyo diśaḥ
17.2.4	nānā diśa ity eke

17.11.10	tad dhaitad eka upavasathīya evāhany etān yūpān ucchrayanti yajamāno vā agniṣṭho 'ṅgānām itare rūpam iti vadantaḥ
17.11.11	sa yad enaṃ tatrānucchrayantaṃ brūyād vyaṅgo nvā ayaṃ yajamāno bhaviṣyatīti tathā haiva syāt
17.11.12	tad u vā āhur yad ime yūpā apaśavaḥ śūlībhūtās tiṣṭheyur yajñavāsturūpam iva syād yajñaveśasam iva

17.13.1	atha vai bhavati
17.13.2	yaṃ kāmayeta pramāyukaḥ syād iti gartamitaṃ tasya minuyād uttarārdhyaṃ varṣiṣṭham atha hrasīyāṃsam iti
17.13.3	uttarārdhyam atra varṣiṣṭhaṃ minoti dakṣiṇārdhyaṃ hrasīyāṃsam
17.13.4	eṣā vai gartamid yasyaivaṃ minoti tājak pramīyata iti brāhmaṇam
17.13.5	dakṣiṇārdhyaṃ varṣiṣṭhaṃ minuyāt suvargakāmasyātha hrasīyāṃsam iti
17.13.6	dakṣiṇārdhyam atra varṣiṣṭhaṃ minoty uttarārdhyaṃ hrasīyāṃsam
17.13.7	ākramaṇam eva tat setuṃ yajamānaḥ kurute suvargasya lokasya samaṣṭyā iti brāhmaṇam
17.13.8	atha vai bhavati
17.13.9	yad ekasmin yūpe dve raśane parivyayati tasmād eko dve jāye vindate
17.13.10	yan naikāṃ raśanāṃ dvayor yūpayoḥ parivyayati tasmān naikā dvau patī vindata iti brāhmaṇam
17.13.11	atha vai bhavati
17.13.12	yaṃ kāmayeta stry asya jāyetety upānte tasya vyatiṣajed iti
17.13.13	upānte tasya vyatiṣajati
17.13.14	stry evāsya jāyata iti brāhmaṇam
17.13.15	atha vai bhavati
17.13.16	yaṃ kāmayeta pumān asya jāyetety āntaṃ tasya praveṣṭayed iti
17.13.17	āntaṃ tasya praveṣṭayati
17.13.18	pumān evāsya jāyata iti brāhmaṇam
17.13.19	atraitam upaśayaṃ dakṣiṇato vyasyati tūṣṇīm
17.13.20	svarvantān yūpān utsṛjyāgneyam evāgniṣṭha upākaroti
17.14.1	sārasvatīm uttare saumyaṃ dakṣiṇe pauṣṇam uttare bārhaspatyaṃ dakṣiṇe vaiśvadevam uttara aindraṃ dakṣiṇe mārutam uttara aindrāgnaṃ dakṣiṇe sāvitram uttare vāruṇaṃ dakṣiṇe
17.14.2	atha vai bhavati
17.14.3	yadi kāmayeta yo 'vagataḥ so 'parudhyatāṃ yo 'paruddhaḥ so 'vagacchatv ity aindrasya loke vāruṇam ālabheta vāruṇasya loka aindram
17.14.4	ya evāvagataḥ so 'parudhyate yo 'paruddhaḥ so 'vagacchatīti brāhmaṇam
17.14.5	atha vai bhavati
17.14.6	yadi kāmayeta prajā muhyeyur iti paśūn vyatiṣajed iti
17.14.7	paśūn evātra vyatiṣajati
17.14.8	prajā eva mohayatīti brāhmaṇam
17.14.9	atha vai bhavati
17.14.10	yad abhivāhato 'pāṃ vāruṇam ālabheta prajā varuṇo gṛhṇīyāt
17.14.11	dakṣiṇata udañcam ālabhate 'pavāhato 'pāṃ prajānām avaruṇagrahāyeti brāhmaṇam
17.14.12	athaitasminn upaśaye manasaiva yaṃ dveṣṭi tam upākaroti
17.14.13	yady u vai na dveṣṭy ākhus te paśur ity anudiśati
17.14.14	samānaṃ karmā paryagnikaraṇāt
17.14.15	paryagnikṛtānām eteṣāṃ paśūnāṃ pañca dakṣiṇārdhyān paśūn upakramyaiva sthāpayitvā dvāv upātinīyāthetarair vyatiṣajati
17.14.16	atha paryagnikṛtaiḥ paśubhir udañcaḥ pratipadyante
17.14.17	teṣāṃ vāruṇa uttarārdhyo bhavati
17.14.18	āgneya upacārataḥ
17.14.19	āgneyam evādhvaryur vapāśrapaṇībhyām anvārabhate pṛthag itarān parikarmiṇa udañco nayanty anupūrvam avyatiṣajantaḥ
17.14.20	teṣāṃ prasiddhaṃ vapābhiś caritvā prasarpanti prātaḥsavanāya
17.14.21	tad ṛjudhā saṃtiṣṭhate
17.15.1	atha vai bhavati
17.15.2	iṣṭaṃ vapayā bhavaty aniṣṭaṃ vaśayātha pātnīvatena pracaratīti
17.15.3	sa yatraikādaśinyā anubandhyasyeṣṭaṃ vapayā bhavaty aniṣṭaṃ vaśayā tajjaghanena gārhapatyam aupasadāyāṃ vedyāṃ stambayajur harati
17.15.4	idam eva prasiddhaṃ pauroḍāśikam
17.15.5	trir yajuṣā tūṣṇīṃ caturtham
17.15.6	pūrvaṃ parigrāhaṃ parigṛhṇāti
17.15.7	karaṇaṃ japati
17.15.8	uddhanti
17.15.9	uddhatād āgnīdhras trir harati
17.15.10	yad āgnīdhras trir haraty athāgreṇa gārhapatyaṃ pātnīvatasya yūpāvaṭaṃ parilikhati
17.15.11	samānaṃ karmā srucāṃ sādanāt
17.15.12	sādayitvā sruco 'greṇa gārhapatyaṃ pātnīvatam ucchritya tasmiṃs tvāṣṭraṃ sāṇḍam ajaṃ paśum upākaroti
17.15.13	taṃ paryagnikṛtam utsṛjyājyena saṃsthāṃ karoti
17.15.14	atha catura ājyasya gṛhṇāna āha tvaṣṭra ity upāṃśv anubrūhīty uccaiḥ
17.15.15	atyākramyāśrāvyāha tvaṣṭāram ity upāṃśu yajety uccaiḥ
17.15.16	vaṣaṭkṛte juhoti
17.15.17	iti nu vapāyāḥ praticarati
17.15.18	catura evājyasya gṛhṇāna āha tvaṣṭra ity upāṃśv anubrūhīty uccaiḥ
17.16.1	atyākramyāśrāvyāha tvaṣṭāram ity upāṃśu yajety uccaiḥ
17.16.2	vaṣaṭkṛte juhoti
17.16.3	iti nu paśupuroḍāśasya praticarati
17.16.4	catura evājyasya gṛhṇāna āhāgnaya ity upāṃśv anubrūhīty uccaiḥ
17.16.5	atyākramyāśrāvyāhāgnim ity upāṃśu yajety uccaiḥ
17.16.6	vaṣaṭkṛta uttarārdhapūrvārdhe 'tihāya pūrvā āhutīr juhoti
17.16.7	iti nu paśupuroḍāśasya sviṣṭakṛtaḥ praticarati
17.16.8	catura evājyasya gṛhṇāna āha tvaṣṭra ity upāṃśv anubrūhīty uccaiḥ
17.16.9	atyākramyāśrāvyāha tvaṣṭāram ity upāṃśu yajety uccaiḥ
17.16.10	vaṣaṭkṛte juhoti
17.16.11	iti nu haviṣaḥ praticarati
17.16.12	ājyena diśo juhoti
17.16.13	pṛṣadājyena vanaspatim
17.16.14	ājyasya sviṣṭakṛtam
17.16.15	ājyasyeḍām avadyati
17.16.16	pṛṣadājyenānūyājān yajati
17.16.17	so 'traiva patnīḥ saṃyājyātraiva samiṣṭayajūṃṣi juhoti
17.16.18	saṃtiṣṭhate pātnīvataḥ
17.17.1	atha vai bhavati
17.17.2	yo 'gnyādheyena nardhnoti sa punarādheyam ādhatte yo 'gniṃ citvā nardhnoti sa punaścitiṃ cinuta iti
17.17.3	agniṃ citvā jyānāno dvādaśeṣṭakā upakalpayate 'ṣṭau yājuṣīś catasro lokaṃpṛṇāḥ
17.17.4	sa yatra hottaravedir vyāghāritopanyuptasaṃbhārā bhavati tad dvābhyām ātmany agniṃ gṛhṇīte mayi gṛhṇāmy agre agniṃ yo no agnir iti
17.17.5	svayaṃcitiṃ japati yās te agne samidho yāni dhāmeti
17.17.6	śvetam aśvam abhimṛśyāṣṭau yājuṣīr upadadhāti yenarṣayas tapasā sattram āsateti
17.17.7	catasro lokaṃpṛṇā lokaṃ pṛṇa chidraṃ pṛṇeti
17.17.8	atha citik.lptyābhimṛśati cittim acittiṃ cinavad vi vidvān iti
17.17.9	āgneyyā gāyatriyaitāṃ citim abhimṛśya dvābhyām avadravati vāṅ ma āsan prāṇadā iti
17.17.10	tāyate paśubandho vāgniṣṭomo vā
17.17.11	sa prajñātaḥ saṃtiṣṭhate
17.18.1	jarvaro gṛhapatir dhṛtarāṣṭra airāvato brahmā dattas tāpaso hotā pṛthuśravā dūreśravā udgātā glāvaś cājagāvaś ca prastotṛpratihartārau śitipṛṣṭho maitrāvaruṇas takṣako vaiśāleyo brāhmaṇācchaṃsy uparītis tārkṣyaḥ sadasyaḥ śikhātiśikhau neṣṭāpotārāvaruṇo 'hyo 'cchāvākaś cakrapiśaṅgāvāgnīdhrāvajiro māheyaḥ subrahmaṇyo 'rbudo grāvastut sāṇḍa unnetā paśukro dhruvagopaḥ kautustāv adhvaryū arimejayaś ca janamejayaś ca
17.18.2	ete vai sarpāṇāṃ rājānaś ca rājaputrāś ca khāṇḍave prasthe sattram āsata puruṣarūpeṇa viṣakāmāḥ
17.18.3	teṣāṃ daśastomāny anyāny ahāny āsan dvādaśastomāny anyāny ākṣīyanti ca
17.18.4	sa yad daśadaśeti tasmāt sarpā daṃśukā daṃśavīryāḥ
17.18.5	tad etal laukyaṃ pautrīyaṃ paśavyaṃ sattram
17.18.6	ya etad upayanti naitān sarpā hiṃsanti
17.19.1	tapo gṛhapatir irā patnī brahmaiva brahmā satyaṃ hotāmṛtam udgātā bhūtaṃ bhaviṣyac ca prastotṛpratihartārāv ṛtaṃ maitrāvaruṇa ṛtavaḥ sadasyā ārtavā upagātāras tejo brāhmaṇācchaṃsī yaśo 'cchāvākas tviṣiś cāpacitiś ca neṣṭāpotārāv agnir evāgnīdhro vāk subrahmaṇyo bhago grāvastud ūrg unnetā balaṃ dhruvagopo mano 'dhvaryuś cakṣuḥ pratiprasthātā sediścāśanayā cedhmavāhau diṣṭir viśāstā mṛtyuḥ śamitā
17.19.2	ete vai viśvasṛjaḥ prathamāḥ sattram āsāṃ cakrire
17.19.3	teṣāṃ śataṃ samā dīkṣā āsañ chatam upasadaḥ sahasraṃ prasutāḥ
17.19.4	tad eṣābhivadati viśvasṛjaḥ prathamāḥ sattram āsata sahasrasamaṃ prasutena yantaḥ / tato miṣad amiṣat saṃbabhūva tato ha jajñe bhuvanasya gopā iti
17.19.5	agniṣṭomair vāva te tadīyuḥ
17.19.6	tad etad ṛddham ayanaṃ prajananaṃ yad agniṣṭomāḥ >//
17.20.1	kuṇḍapāyinām ayanenaiṣyanto dīkṣante
17.20.2	pañca sarvato dhurāḥ
17.20.3	teṣām iyam eva prajñātā saṃvatsaradīkṣā
17.20.4	samānaṃ karmārambhaṇīyāt
17.20.5	ārambhaṇīyeneṣṭvaindraṃ payo dohayati sāṃnāyyasya vāvṛtā tūṣṇīṃ vā
17.20.6	atha vasatīvarīḥ parihṛtyāviśiṣya payāṃsy upavasanti
17.20.7	atha śvo bhūta āmāvāsyena haviṣā yajante
17.20.8	tena yanty aṣṭāviṃśatir ahāni
17.20.9	prāyaṇīyārambhaṇīyau
17.20.10	sa māsaḥ
17.20.11	paurṇamāsahavirbhir yanti māsam
17.20.12	vaiśvadevahavirbhir yanti māsam
17.20.13	varuṇapraghāsahavirbhir yanti māsam
17.20.14	sākamedhahavirbhir yanti māsam
17.20.15	śunāsīrīyahavirbhir yanti ṣaḍviṃśatir ahāni
17.20.16	abhijittrayaḥ paraḥsāmānaḥ
17.20.17	sa māsaḥ
17.20.18	vaiṣuvatam
17.20.19	trayo 'rvāksāmānaḥ
17.20.20	atha viśvajit
17.20.21	trayastriṃśena yanti māsam
17.20.22	triṇavena yanti māsam
17.20.23	ekaviṃśena yanti māsam
17.20.24	saptadaśena yanti māsam
17.20.25	pañcadaśena yanti māsam
17.20.26	trivṛtā yanti dvādaśāhāni
17.20.27	goāyuṣī
17.20.28	tāni caturdaśa
17.20.29	catvāry ūrdhvaṃ vaiṣuvatāt
17.20.30	tāny aṣṭādaśa
17.20.31	daśarātro mahāvrataṃ cātirātraś ca
17.20.32	sa māsaḥ
17.21.1	athaiṣāṃ kuṇḍāni
17.21.2	te yat sarva eva trivedaso bhavanti tad eṣāṃ kuṇḍam
17.21.3	atha yad anyo'nyam anuparisarpaṃ yājayanti tad eṣāṃ kuṇḍam
17.21.4	atha yad atsarukaiś camasair bhakṣayanti tad eṣāṃ kuṇḍam
17.21.5	teṣāṃ ya eva brahmā sa eva brāhmaṇācchaṃsī sa potā
17.21.6	atha yo hotā sa eva maitrāvaruṇaḥ so 'cchāvākaḥ
17.21.7	atha ya udgātā sa eva prastotā sa pratihartā
17.21.8	atha yo 'dhvaryuḥ sa eva pratiprasthātā sa neṣṭā
17.21.9	atha ya āgnīdhraḥ sa eva grāvastut sa subrahmaṇyaḥ sa unnetā
17.21.10	athopaniṣadaḥ
17.21.11	agniś caturhotā vāyuḥ pañcahotā candramāḥ ṣaḍḍhotā prajāpatiḥ saptahotāsāv ādityo navahotā
17.21.12	etā vai devatā etenāyanenāyan
17.21.13	tato vai tā ārdhnuvan
17.21.14	suvargaṃ lokam āyan

17.22.1	utsargiṇām ayanenaiṣyanto dīkṣante
17.22.2	teṣām iyam eva prajñātā saṃvatsaradīkṣā
17.22.3	samānaṃ karmā pṛṣṭhyāt ṣaḍahāt
17.22.4	pṛṣṭhyena ṣaḍaheneṣṭvaindraṃ payo dohayati sāṃnāyyasya vāvṛtā tūṣṇīṃ vā
17.22.5	atha vasatīvarīḥ parihṛtyāviśiṣya payāṃsy upavasanti
17.22.6	atha prātarahar utsṛjya jyotiṣa āyatane prājāpatyaṃ paśum ālabhante
17.22.7	tasya paśupuroḍāśam anuvartate 'gnaye vasumate puroḍāśo 'ṣṭākapālaḥ
17.22.8	mādhyaṃdina indrāya marutvate puroḍāśam ekādaśakapālaṃ nirvapanty aindraṃ sāṃnāyyam
17.22.9	sā dvihavir iṣṭiḥ saṃtiṣṭhate
17.22.10	atraitad aindraṃ sāṃnāyyaṃ samupahūya bhakṣayanti
17.22.11	athāparāhṇe vaiśvadevaṃ dvādaśakapālaṃ nirvapanti vaiśvadevaṃ carum
17.22.12	tābhyāṃ caranti devatāprabhṛtībhyām iḍāntābhyām
17.22.13	atha paśunā carati manotāprabhṛtineḍāntena
17.22.14	athānūyājaiś caritvā pradakṣiṇam āvṛtya pratyaṅṅ ādrutya patnīḥ saṃyājya prāṅ etya dhruvām āpyāyya vasatīvarīḥ parihṛtya payāṃsi viśiṣyopavasanti
17.22.15	atha śvo bhūte gavā pratipadyante
17.22.16	ta evam evaitena yanto māsimāsy utsṛjantaḥ pañca jyotīṃṣy utsṛjanti
17.22.17	athāmuta āvṛttāṃś caturaś ca trayastriṃśastomān utsṛjanty ekaṃ ca jyotiḥ
17.22.18	atha śvo bhūta āyuṣaiva pratipadyante

17.23.5	atha prāyaṇīyena carati

17.27.3	api vābhijiteṣṭvāthaitāṃ savaneṣṭiṃ nirvapanty āgneyam aṣṭākapālam aindram ekādaśakapālaṃ vaiśvadevaṃ dvādaśakapālam iti

17.27.5	vasatīvarīṣu mṛtpiṇḍam anvavadhāyāharahar vasatīvarīḥ pariharamāṇā yanti
17.27.6	atha saṃvatsarasaṃpannaṃ brahmaṇo 'yanam ity ācakṣate
17.27.7	caturo māso dīkṣābhir yanti catura upasadbhiś caturo māsaḥ prasutāḥ
17.27.8	tad āhuḥ ka etāvat tapas taptvānyasādhāraṇaṃ kurvīta
17.27.9	antevāsiṣu vopahavam iccheta dakṣiṇāvatā vainaṃ yājayeyur iti
17.27.10	so 'ntevāsiṣu vaivopahavam icchate dakṣiṇāvatā vainaṃ yājayanti
17.28.1	atha vai bhavati
17.28.2	chandaścitaṃ cinvīta paśukāma iti
17.28.3	sa chandaścit
17.28.4	yatra kva cāhutir āgacchati juhoty eva tatra
17.28.5	atha yad anyad āhutibhyaḥ śarīravad yajur eva tatra japati yajur eva raśanayor yajur aśvagardabhayor yajur ukhāyai pravṛñjane
17.28.6	yajate vāyavyena paśunā
17.28.7	dīkṣate
17.28.8	vimāyāgniṃ parikhāyāpasyāyatane yajur eva tatra japati yajuḥ sarvāsām iṣṭakānām upadhāne
17.28.9	juhoti śatarudrīyam
17.28.10	kurute vasordhārām
17.28.11	śyenacitaṃ cinvīta suvargakāma iti
17.28.12	ayam evaiṣa śyenacit
17.28.13	kaṅkacitaṃ cinvīta yaḥ kāmayeta śīrṣaṇvān amuṣmin loke syām iti
17.28.14	etasyaiva sato 'ratnimātreṇa prāk śira iva nirūhati
17.28.15	sa tathā vimito bhavati yathā na bahirvedi yūpaḥ syāt
17.28.16	alajacitaṃ cinvīta catuḥsītaṃ pratiṣṭhākāma iti
17.28.17	etasyaiva sato 'ratnimātreṇa pakṣāgrāv aṇīyāṃsau bhavataḥ
17.28.18	tāvanmātreṇāpipakṣau varīyāṃsau
17.28.19	tau manāgapanatau paro'ṇīyāṃsau bhavataḥ
17.28.20	ekaikām ṛcā sītāṃ kṛṣati
17.28.21	praugacitaṃ cinvīta bhrātṛvyavān iti
17.28.22	etasyaiva sataḥ samudgṛhyāṃsau prāg āyātayati
17.28.23	sa tathā vimito bhavati yathā na bahirvedi yūpaḥ syāt
17.28.24	ubhayataḥpraugaṃ cinvīta yaḥ kāmayeta prajātān bhrātṛvyān nudeya pratijaniṣyamāṇān iti
17.28.25	etasyaiva sataḥ samudgṛhyaiva śroṇī pratyag āyātayati
17.28.26	sa tathā vimito bhavati yathā na bahirvedi yūpaḥ syāt
17.29.1	rathacakracitaṃ cinvīta bhrātṛvyavān iti vijñāyate
17.29.2	ākṛtivikāraḥ śabdasaṃyogāt
17.29.3	yāvān agniḥ sāratniprādeśas tāvatīṃ bhūmiṃ parimaṇḍalāṃ kṛtvānuśarkaram antaḥśarkaram iṣṭakāḥ paricinoti
17.29.4	athāntato 'thāntarataḥ
17.29.5	evam evā svayamātṛṇṇāyai
17.29.6	athābhitaḥ svayamātṛṇṇām
17.29.7	madhye nābhim iva karoti
17.29.8	tasyā anudiśam avāntaradiśam arān iva nemim iveṣṭakā āyātayati
17.29.9	sa eṣa rathacakracid bhrātṛvyavataḥ parikṛṣyaḥ
17.29.10	droṇacitaṃ cinvītānnakāma iti
17.29.11	etasyaiva sato 'ratnimātreṇa prāgoṣṭham iva nirūhati
17.29.12	atha madhye nimnam iva karoti
17.29.13	sa eṣa droṇacid annakāmasya parikṛṣyaḥ
17.29.14	samūhyaṃ cinvīta paśukāma iti vijñāyate
17.29.15	puṣkaraparṇaṃ rukmaṃ hiraṇmayaṃ puruṣaṃ srucāv ity etallakṣaṇyam ity ācakṣate
17.29.16	kuruta eva tat
17.29.17	atho purīṣasyaiveṣṭakā āyātayati
17.29.18	sa eṣa samūhyaḥ paśukāmasya parikṛṣyaḥ

17.29.20	anuśarkaram antaḥśarkaram iṣṭakāḥ paricinoti
17.29.21	athāntato 'thāntarataḥ
17.29.22	evam evā svayamātṛṇṇāyai
17.29.23	athābhitaḥ svayamātṛṇṇām iṣṭakāḥ paricinoti
17.29.24	sa eṣa paricāyyo grāmakāmasya parikṛṣyaḥ
17.30.1	śmaśānacitaṃ cinvīta yaḥ kāmayeta pitṛloka ṛdhnuyām iti
17.30.2	ṣaṭ prāñcaḥ puruṣās trayaḥ purastāttiryañcau dvau paścāttiryañcau sa ātmā
17.30.3	tasya mātrāḥ
17.30.4	yadi grīvadaghnaṃ purastān nābhidaghnaṃ paścāt
17.30.5	yadi nābhidaghnam purastāj jānudaghnaṃ paścāt
17.30.6	yadi jānudaghnaṃ purastād gulphadaghnaṃ paścāt
17.30.7	yadi gulphadaghnaṃ purastāt samaṃ bhūmeḥ paścāt
17.30.8	sa eṣa śmaśānacit pitṛlokakāmasya

17.30.13	sa eṣa kūrmacid abrāhmaṇo madhya utpṛṣṭhaḥ parikṛṣyaḥ
17.31.1	sautrāmaṇyā yakṣyamāṇo bhavati
17.31.2	sa upakalpayate rohitaṃ carmānaḍuhaṃ sīsaṃ ca klībaṃ ca śaṣpāṇi ca tokmāṇi ca vrīhīn nagnahuṃ cūrṇakṛtaṃ trīṇi nānāvṛkṣyāṇi pātrāṇi trayān saktūṃs trayāṇi lomāni yūpaṃ ca śyenapattraṃ ca garbhiṇīṃ vaḍabām āsandīm iṇḍvaṃ kumbhaṃ kārotaraṃ viśākhyau dīrghavaṃśaṃ śikyaṃ śatātṛṇṇāṃ śatamānaṃ hiraṇyaṃ sataṃ ca vālaṃ ca brāhmaṇam āhutyā uccheṣaṇasya pātāraṃ yadi brāhmaṇaṃ na vindati valmīkavapām
17.31.3	athāmāvāsyena vā haviṣeṣṭvā nakṣatre vāgreṇa śālāṃ rohite carmaṇi surāsomaḥ saṃsannaḥ śete
17.31.4	taṃ dakṣiṇataḥ klība upāste
17.31.5	sīsena klībāc chaṣpāṇi krīṇātīdaṃ tavedaṃ mameti
17.31.6	krītaḥ surāsoma iti
17.31.7	athainam ādāya pūrvayā dvārā śālāṃ prapādya jaghanena gārhapatyam upasādayati
17.31.8	athaiteṣāṃ vrīhīṇām ardhān avaghnanti
17.31.9	athetarān gārhapatya ekakapālam adhiśritya bharjanti
17.31.10	teṣāṃ ye phalanti lājās te bhavanti
17.31.11	atha ya u na phalanti tās taryaḥ
17.31.12	gārhapatye navāṃ kumbhīm adhiśritya prodakam ivaudanaṃ śrapayanti
17.31.13	athainaṃ visrāvya kaṭhine vā pājake vā viṣajanti
17.31.14	athainān bhṛgṇān avaghnanti
17.31.15	teṣāṃ yāni ca kṣudrāṇi yāś ca taryas tā utseke saṃprakiranti
17.31.16	taṃ māsara ity ācakṣate
17.31.17	atha mānam ādāya vimimīta ekaṃ śaṣpāṇāṃ dve tokmāṇāṃ trīṇi lājānāṃ catvāri nagnahoḥ
17.31.18	athaitam odanaṃ cūrṇair anuprakiran māsareṇāvokṣan saṃpādayati
17.32.1	svādvīṃ tvā svādunā tīvrāṃ tīvreṇāmṛtām amṛtena sṛjāmi saṃ someneti
17.32.2	athaitām āsandīm agreṇāhavanīyaṃ paryāhṛtya dakṣiṇato nidadhāti
17.32.3	āsandyām iṇḍvam iṇḍve kumbhaṃ kumbhe kārotaram avadadhāti
17.32.4	athaitam odanam abhitaḥ kārotaraṃ paricinoti
17.32.5	athainam apidhāyābhimṛśati somo 'sy aśvibhyāṃ pacyasva sarasvatyai pacyasvendrāya sutrāmṇe pacyasveti
17.32.6	tisraḥ saṃsṛṣṭā vasati
17.32.7	tisro rātrīḥ krītaḥ somo vasatīti brāhmaṇam
17.32.8	atha tisṛṣu vyuṣṭāsu tāyate tripaśur vā catuṣpaśur vā paśubandhaḥ

17.33.1	idam eva prasiddhaṃ pauroḍāśikam
17.33.2	trir yajuṣā tūṣṇīṃ caturtham
17.33.3	pūrvaṃ parigrāhaṃ parigṛhṇāti
17.33.4	karaṇaṃ japati
17.33.5	uddhanti
17.33.6	uddhatād āgnīdhras trir harati
17.33.7	yad āgnīdhras trir haraty atha cātvālasyāvṛtā cātvālaṃ parilikhati
17.33.8	uttaraveder āvṛtottaravediṃ nivapati
17.33.9	uttaranābhim utsādya yūpāvaṭaṃ khātvāgner āvṛtā dvāv agnī praṇayata āhavanīyād evādhvaryur anvāhāryapacanāt pratiprasthātā
17.33.10	agnivaty uttaraṃ parigrāhaṃ parigṛhya yoyupitvā tiryañcaṃ sphyaṃ stabdhvā saṃpraiṣam āha prokṣaṇīr āsādayedhmābarhir upasādaya sruvaṃ svadhitiṃ srucaś ca saṃmṛḍḍhi tūṣṇīṃ pṛṣadājyagrahaṇīṃ patnīṃ saṃnahyājyena ca dadhnā codehi pratiprasthātaḥ surāsomasya viddhīti
17.33.11	adhvaryur eva prasiddhaṃ pāśubandhikaṃ karma ceṣṭati
17.33.12	atha pratiprasthātā surāṃ saṃpavayya saśastrām ādāya pūrvayā dvāropanirhṛtyāntarvedy āsādayati
17.34.1	yāvad evātrādhvaryuś ceṣṭati tāvad eṣa pratiprasthātā sata udīcīnadaśena vālena surāṃ punāti punātu te parisrutaṃ somaṃ sūryasya duhitā / vāreṇa śaśvatā taneti
17.34.2	vāyuḥ pūtaḥ pavitreṇeti yadi somātipavito bhavati
17.34.3	athādatte parṇamayaṃ pātram
17.34.4	tena gṛhṇāti kuvid aṅga yavamanta ity anudrutyopayāmagṛhīto 'sy aśvibhyāṃ tvā juṣṭaṃ gṛhṇāmīti
17.34.5	barhiṣī antardhāya kvalasaktubhiś ca siṃhalomabhiś ca śrīṇāti
17.34.6	apoddhṛtya barhiṣī śyenapattreṇa parimṛjya sādayaty eṣa te yonir aśvibhyāṃ tveti
17.34.7	athādatte naiyagrodhaṃ pātram
17.34.8	tena gṛhṇāti kuvid aṅga yavamanta ity anudrutyopayāmagṛhīto 'si sarasvatyai tvā juṣṭaṃ gṛhṇāmīti
17.34.9	barhiṣī antardhāya badarasaktubhiś ca vyāghralomabhiś ca śrīṇāti
17.34.10	apoddhṛtya barhiṣī śyenapattreṇa parimṛjya sādayaty eṣa te yoniḥ sarasvatyai tveti
17.34.11	athādatta āśvatthaṃ pātram
17.34.12	tena gṛhṇāti kuvid aṅga yavamanta ity anudrutyopayāmagṛhīto 'sīndrāya tvā sutrāmṇe juṣṭaṃ gṛhṇāmīti
17.34.13	barhiṣī antardhāya karkandhusaktubhiś ca vṛkalomabhiś ca śrīṇāti
17.34.14	apoddhṛtya barhiṣī śyenapattreṇa parimṛjya sādayaty eṣa te yonir indrāya tvā sutrāmṇa iti
17.35.1	tāñ jaghanena srugdaṇḍān prāco vodīco vāyātayati
17.35.2	athaitāṃ surāṃ saprarekām ādāya dakṣiṇam agnim upasaṃsarpati
17.35.3	tam abhito gartau khānayati
17.35.4	tad upasādayati viśākhyau dīrghavaṃśaṃ śikyaṃ śatātṛṇṇāṃ śatamānaṃ hiraṇyaṃ sataṃ ca vālaṃ ca
17.35.5	atha dakṣiṇam agnim agreṇa purāṇabhasmanaḥ kharaṃ karoti
17.35.6	tad upasādayati brāhmaṇam āhutyā uccheṣaṇasya pātāram
17.35.7	yadi brāhmaṇaṃ na vindati valmīkavapām
17.35.8	athāpa upaspṛśya yūpasyāvṛtā yūpam ucchrayati
17.35.9	svarvantaṃ yūpam utsṛjyāthaitān paśūn upākaroty āśvinaṃ dhūmraṃ sārasvataṃ meṣam aindram ṛṣabham
17.35.10	bārhaspatyaṃ paśuṃ caturthaṃ yadi somātipavito bhavati
17.35.11	teṣāṃ prasiddhaṃ vapābhiś caritvāśvinasārasvatāv adhvaryur ādatte
17.35.12	aindraṃ pratiprasthātā
17.35.13	grahāv ādāyopottiṣṭhann āhāśvibhyāṃ sarasvatyā indrāya sutrāmṇe surāmṇāṃ somānām anubrūhīti
17.35.14	yuvaṃ surāmam aśvinety etām anvāha
17.35.15	atyākramyāśrāvyāhāśvibhyāṃ sarasvatyā indrāya sutrāmṇe surāmṇaḥ somān prasthitān preṣyeti

17.36.1	yasminn aśvāsa ṛṣabhāsa ukṣaṇa ity anuvaṣaṭkṛte hutvāśvinasya saṃsrāvaṃ sārasvate 'vanayati
17.36.2	sārasvatasya saṃsrāvam aindre
17.36.3	taṃ brāhmaṇo bhakṣayati nānā hi vāṃ devahitaṃ yad atreti dvābhyām
17.36.4	yadi brāhmaṇaṃ na vindati valmīkavapāyām avanayaty etenaiva mantreṇa
17.36.5	athaitāni pātrāṇi balkaśasya pūrayitvā parṇamaye śyenapattram avagūhati
17.36.6	tad viśākhyāv ucchritya dakṣiṇāgraṃ vaṃśaṃ prohati vaṃśe śikyaṃ sajati śikye śatātṛṇṇāṃ śatātṛṇṇāyāṃ vālaṃ vāle śatamānaṃ hiraṇyam

17.37.1	pitṛbhyaḥ svadhāvibhyaḥ svadhā namaḥ pitāmahebhyaḥ svadhāvibhyaḥ svadhā namaḥ prapitāmahebhyaḥ svadhāvibhyaḥ svadhā nama iti
17.37.2	atra garbhiṇīṃ vaḍabāṃ dadāti
17.37.3	athāpa upaspṛśya bārhaspatyasya paśupuroḍāśaṃ yācati
17.37.4	tena pracarati devatāprabhṛtineḍāntena

17.37.7	taiś carati devatāprabhṛtibhir iḍāntaiḥ
17.37.8	anūyājaiś caritvā pradakṣiṇam āvṛtya pratyaṅṅ ādrutya patnīḥ saṃyājya prāṅ etya dhruvām āpyāyya trīṇi pāśubandhikāni samiṣṭayajūṃṣi juhoti yajña yajñaṃ gacchaiṣa te yajño yajñapate devā gātuvida iti

17.38.1	dve srutī aśṛṇavaṃ pitṝṇām ahaṃ devānām uta martyānām / tābhyām idaṃ viśvaṃ bhuvanaṃ samety antarā pūrvam aparaṃ ca ketum iti
17.38.2	prasiddhaṃ hṛdayaśūlaiś caritvāthaitāni pātrāṇy udakānte parāñci sādayati yas te deva varuṇa gāyatracchandāḥ pāśo brahman pratiṣṭhitaḥ / taṃ ta etenāvayaja iti parṇamayam
17.38.3	yas te deva varuṇa triṣṭupchandāḥ pāśaḥ kṣatre pratiṣṭhitaḥ / taṃ ta etenāvayaja iti naiyagrodham
17.38.4	yas te deva varuṇa jagatīchandāḥ pāśo vikṣu pratiṣṭhitaḥ / taṃ ta etenāvayaja ity āśvattham
17.38.5	yas te deva varuṇānuṣṭupchandāḥ pāśaḥ paśuṣu pratiṣṭhitaḥ / taṃ ta etenāvayaja iti śatātṛṇṇām
17.38.6	tūṣṇīṃ sataṃ vālaṃ ca

17.38.10	prapathe samidhaḥ kurvata edho 'sy edhiṣīmahīti
