17.39.7	atho sarvān rohān rohāṇīti
17.39.8	tiṣye snāyād ity ekam
17.39.9	bārhaspatyaṃ vā etan nakṣatram
17.39.10	tad asya bārhaspatya eva nakṣatre snātaṃ bhavati
17.39.11	atho bṛhaspatiprasūto 'sānīti
17.39.12	uttarayoḥ phalgunyoḥ snāyād ity ekam
17.39.13	bhāgyaṃ vā etan nakṣatram
17.39.14	tad asya bhāgya eva nakṣatre snātaṃ bhavati
17.39.15	atho bhāgyo 'sānīti
17.39.16	haste snāyād ity ekam
17.39.17	sāvitraṃ vā etan nakṣatram
17.39.18	tad asya sāvitra eva nakṣatre snātaṃ bhavati
17.39.19	atho savitṛprasūto 'sānīti
17.39.20	citrāyāṃ snāyād ity ekam
17.39.21	aindraṃ vā etan nakṣatram
17.39.22	tad asyaindra eva nakṣatre snātaṃ bhavati
17.39.23	atho citro 'sānīti
17.39.24	viśākhayoḥ snāyād ity ekam
17.39.25	aindrāgnaṃ vā etan nakṣatram
17.39.26	tad asyaindrāgna eva nakṣatre snātaṃ bhavati
17.39.27	atho viśākho 'sāni prajayā paśubhir iti
17.39.28	eteṣām ekasminn āpūryamāṇapakṣe purād ity asyodayād vrajam abhi prapadyate
17.39.29	nainam etad ahar ādityo 'bhitapet tad aha snātānām u ha vā eṣa etat tejasā yaśasā tapati
17.39.30	antarlomnā carmaṇā vrajam abhivighnanti
17.39.31	pūrvārdhamadhye vrajasyāgnim upasamādhāya saṃparistīryāharanty etān saṃbhārān sakṛd eva sarvān
17.39.32	yat saha sarvāṇi mānuṣāṇīty etasmād brāhmaṇāt
17.39.33	dakṣiṇato brāhmaṇa upaviśati
17.39.34	uttarata udapātraṃ pālāśīṃ ca samidhaṃ nidadhāti
17.39.35	apareṇāgnim udīcīnapratiṣevaṇām erakāṃ sādhīvāsām āstīrya tasyāṃ prāṅmukha upaviśati
17.39.36	uttarato nāpitaḥ
17.39.37	uttarata upabarhaṇam
17.39.38	āmadhyaṃdinaṃ bhikṣāṃ dadyāt
17.39.39	apīha gāṃ paced vaśaś ced asya syāt
17.39.40	atraitāṃ pālāśīṃ samidham ājyenāktvā madhyaṃdine 'bhyādadhāti
17.40.1	imaṃ stomam arhate jātavedase ratham iva saṃ mahemā manīṣayā / bhadrā hi naḥ pramatir asya saṃsady agne sakhye mā riṣāmā vayaṃ tava svāheti
17.40.2	athairakāyām udīcīnaśirā nipadyate tryāyuṣaṃ jamadagneḥ kaśyapasya tryāyuṣam agastyasya tryāyuṣam ṛṣīṇāṃ tryāyuṣaṃ yad devānāṃ tryāyuṣaṃ tan me astu tryāyuṣam iti
17.40.3	udyamānam anumantrayate śivā me bhavatha saṃspṛśa iti
17.40.4	kṣuram abhimantrayate kṣuro nāmāsi svadhitis te pitā namas te astu mā mā hiṃsīr iti
17.40.5	upyamānam anumantrayate yat kṣureṇa varcayasi vaptrā vapasi keśaśmaśru varcaya me mukhaṃ mā ma āyuḥ pramoṣīr iti
17.40.6	śmaśrūṇy evāgre vapate 'thopapakṣāv atha keśāny athopapādam itarāṇy aṅgāni
17.40.7	etasmād dhy eṣā jarasā pūrva āyuṣi prayānti pūrva āyuṣy annādā bhavanti ya evaṃ vidvāṃso lomāni vāpayante
17.40.8	sa yadi lomāni vāpayiṣyamāṇaḥ syāt keśaśmaśru vāpayitvā lomāni saṃhṛtya nakhāni nikṛntayīta
17.40.9	athaitāni samuccitya brahmacāriṇe prayacchann āhemāni hṛtvā darbhastambe vodumbaramūle vā nidhattād iti
17.40.10	tāni sa tatra nidadhāti
17.40.11	apareṇāgniṃ prāṅmukha upaviśya mekhalāṃ visraṃsayata imāṃ viṣyāmi varuṇapāśam iti
17.40.12	yo 'sya tatra rāteḥ putro vāntevāsī vā bhavati tasmai prayacchann āhemāṃ hṛtvā nyagrodhe vodumbaramūle vā nidhattād iti
17.40.13	tām u sa tatra nidadhātīdam aham amuṣyāmuṣyāyaṇasya śucā pāpmānam avagūhāmy uttarasya dviṣadbhya iti
17.40.14	vṛkalaiḥ pradhāvya dantān vidhāvayate 'nnādyāya vyapohadhvaṃ bhago rājāyam āgamat / sa me mukhaṃ prasarpatu varcase ca bhagāya ceti
17.40.15	ubhayīr apaḥ saṃniṣiñcati
17.40.16	uṣṇāsu śītā ānayati daivamānuṣasya vyāvṛttyā iti
17.40.17	tāsām añjalinopahatyābhiṣiñcaty āpo hi ṣṭhā mayobhuva iti tisṛbhir hiraṇyavarṇāḥ śucayaḥ pāvakā iti tisṛbhiḥ
17.40.18	ṣoḍhāvihito vai puruṣa ity etasmād brāhmaṇāt
17.40.19	athaitasya sarvasurabhipiṣṭaṃ samudāyutya triḥ prasiñcati
17.41.1	namaḥ śākajañjabhābhyāṃ namas tābhyo devatābhyo yā abhigrāhiṇīr iti
17.41.2	anulimpate 'psarāsu ca yo gandho gandharveṣu ca yad yaśaḥ / divyo yo mānuṣo gandhaḥ sa mām āviśatv iheti
17.41.3	athāhataṃ paridhatte svā mā tanūr āviśa śivā mā tanūr āviśeti
17.41.4	evam evottarāsaṅgyam
17.41.5	evam evāta ūrdhvam
17.41.6	athaitaṃ bādaraṃ maṇiṃ suvarṇopadhānaṃ sūtre protya darvyām ādhāya darvidaṇḍe sūtreṇa paryasya juhotīyam oṣadhe trāyamāṇā sahamānā sahasvatī / sā mā karotu somavarcasaṃ sūryavarcasaṃ brahmavarcasvinam annādaṃ karotu svāheti
17.41.7	athainam udapātre 'nupariplāvayati viśvā uta tvayā vayaṃ dhārā udanyā iva / atigāhemahi dviṣa iti
17.41.8	apāśo 'sīty uktvākṣṇayā pariharati vadhyaṃ hi pratyañcaṃ pratimuñcanti vyāvṛttyā ity etasmād brāhmaṇāt
17.41.9	athaitau pravartau sūtre protya darvyām ādhāya darvidaṇḍe sūtreṇa paryasya juhoty āyuṣyaṃ varcasyaṃ suvīryaṃ rāyaspoṣam audbhidyam / idaṃ hiraṇyaṃ varcase jaitryāyāviśatād imaṃ rayiṃ svāheti
17.41.10	dvitīyāṃ juhoti śunim ivāhaṃ hiraṇyasya pitur iva nāmāgrabhaiṣam / tan mā karotu somavarcasaṃ sūryavarcasaṃ brahmavarcasvinam annādaṃ karotu svāheti
17.41.11	tṛtīyāṃ juhoty uccairvāji pṛtanāsahaṃ sabhāsāhaṃ dhanaṃjayam / sarvāḥ samṛddhīr ṛddhayo hiraṇye yāḥ samāhitāḥ svāheti
17.41.12	caturthīṃ juhoti virājaṃ ca svarājaṃ cābhiṣṭir yā ca no gṛhe / lakṣmī rāṣṭrasya yā mukhe tayā mā saṃsṛjāmasi svāheti
17.41.13	pañcamīṃ juhoti yaśo mā kuru brāhmaṇeṣu yaśo rājasu mā kuru / yaśo viśyeṣu śūdreṣv aham asmi yaśas tava svāheti
17.41.14	athaināv udapātre 'nupariplāvayati viśvā uta tvayā vayam ity etayā
17.41.15	tayor anyataram ādāya dakṣiṇe karṇa ābadhnīta āyuṣyaṃ varcasyam ity etābhiḥ pañcabhiḥ
17.41.16	athainam anuparivartayata ṛtubhis tvārtavaiḥ saṃvatsarasya dhāyasā tais tvā sahānukaromīti
17.41.17	evam evottaraṃ pravartam ābadhnīte
17.41.18	atha srajaṃ pratimuñcate
17.42.1	śubhike śira āroha śobhayantī mukhaṃ mama / mukhaṃ hi mama śobhaya bhūyāṃsaṃ ca bhagaṃ kuru
17.42.2	yāṃ tvā jahāra jamadagniḥ śraddhāyai kāmāyanyai / tāṃ tvemāṃ pratimuñce 'haṃ varcase ca bhagāya ceti
17.42.3	traikakudenāñjanenāṅkte yad āñjanaṃ traikakudaṃ jātaṃ himavata upari / tena vām āñje mayi parvatavarcasam astv iti
17.42.4	ādarśe paripaśyate yan me manaḥ parāgatam ādarśe paripaśyataḥ / idaṃ tan mayi paśyāmy āyuṣyaṃ varcasyaṃ me astv iti
17.42.5	athopānahāv upamuñcate dyaur asīti dakṣiṇe pāde pṛthivy asīty uttare
17.42.6	atha daṇḍam ādatte sakhā mā gopāyeti
17.42.7	chattram ādatte divyo 'si suparṇo 'ntarikṣān mā pāhīti
17.42.8	so 'traivāsta ā nakṣatrāṇām udayāt
17.42.9	athoditeṣu nakṣatreṣūpaniṣkramya diśa upatiṣṭhate devīḥ ṣaḍurvīr uru naḥ kṛṇota viśve devāsa iha vīrayadhvam iti
17.42.10	mā hāsmahi prajayā mā tanūbhir iti nakṣatrāṇi
17.42.11	mā radhāma dviṣate soma rājann iti candramasam
17.42.12	samupasthāya yatrayatra kāmayate tad etīti
17.42.13	etat samāvartanam
17.43.1	athetarat
17.43.2	tūṣṇīm eva tīrthe snātvodeti
17.43.3	atha yadi rathaṃ labhate rathaṃtaram asīti dakṣiṇaṃ cakram abhimṛśati bṛhad asīty uttaraṃ vāmadevyam asīti madhyam
17.43.4	atha rathaṃ pravartamānam anumantrayate 'yaṃ vām aśvinā ratho mā duḥkhe mā sukhe riṣad iti
17.43.5	atha yadi śamarathaṃ kariṣyan bhavaty apa upaspṛśyemām abhimṛśatīha dhṛtir iha vidhṛtir iha rantir iha ramatir iha ramatām iti
17.43.6	athāsmā ācāryaḥ kūrcam āhārayati
17.43.7	taṃ pradakṣiṇaṃ paryasyodagāvṛtta upaviśati purastād vainaṃ pratyañcam upohate rāṣṭrabhṛd asy ācāryāsandī mā tvad yoṣam iti
17.43.8	athāsmā udakam āhārayati
17.43.9	tenāsya pādau prakṣālayati
17.43.10	avanektuḥ pāṇī saṃmṛśati mayi maho mayi bhago mayi bhargo mayi yaśa iti
17.43.11	apa upaspṛśya mayīndriyaṃ vīryam ity uraḥ praty ātmānaṃ pratyabhimṛśate
17.43.12	athāsmā anyad āhārayati
17.43.13	tat pratigṛhṇāty ā ma agād varcasā yaśasā saṃsṛja payasā tejasā ca taṃ mā priyaṃ prajānāṃ kurv adhipatiṃ paśūnām iti brāhmaṇaḥ
17.43.14	priyaṃ paśūnāṃ kurv adhipatiṃ prajānām iti rājanyaḥ
17.43.15	tad upaspṛśya prāk sektavā ity āha
17.43.16	madhuparkaṃ proktam abhimantrayate sa māvatu sa mā pātu sa mā juṣatām iti
17.43.17	ubhābhyāṃ hastābhyāṃ pratigṛhṇāti
17.44.1	ā ma agād varcasā yaśasā saṃsṛja payasā tejasā ca taṃ mā priyaṃ prajānāṃ kurv adhipatiṃ paśūnām iti brāhmaṇaḥ
17.44.2	priyaṃ paśūnāṃ kurv adhipatiṃ prajānām iti rājanyaḥ
17.44.3	tasmiṃś cet kiṃcid āpatitaṃ syāt tad aṅguṣṭhena ca mahānāmnyā copasaṃgṛhyemāṃ diśaṃ nirasyati neṣṭāviddhaṃ kṛntāmi yā te ghorā tanūs tayā tam āviśa yo 'smān dveṣṭi yaṃ ca vayaṃ dviṣma iti
17.44.4	athāpa upaspṛśya samudāyutya triḥ prāśnāti prāṇa idaṃ te baliṃ harāmi śreṣṭhaṃ mādhipatiṃ kurv iti
17.44.5	somo 'si somapaṃ mā kurv iti dvitīyam
17.44.6	annam asy annādaṃ mā kurv iti tṛtīyam
17.44.7	triḥ pītvocchiṣṭaṃ dadāti
17.44.8	yam ātmanaḥ śreyāṃsam icchet tasmai śeṣaṃ dadyāt
17.44.9	upanītāṃ gām anumantrayate jahi me pāpmānam upanetuś ceti
17.44.10	tāṃ kurvanti votsṛjanti vā
17.44.11	sa yadi kariṣyan bhavati kurutety āha
17.44.12	atha yady utsrakṣyan bhavati tām anumantrayate gaur dhenubhavyā mātā rudrāṇāṃ duhitā vasūnāṃ svasādityānām amṛtasya nābhiḥ / pra ṇu vocaṃ cikituṣe janāya mā gām anāgām aditiṃ vadhiṣṭa
17.44.13	pibatūdakaṃ tṛṇāny attv om utsṛjateti
17.44.14	athāsmā odanam āhārayati
17.44.15	tam aśnāti brahma tvāśnātu brahma tvāśnātv iti
17.44.16	tac catuṣṭayo 'rghyo dadhi madhu ghṛtam āpa iti
17.44.17	pañcataya ity eke dadhi payo madhu ghṛtam āpa iti
17.45.1	brāhmaṇo ha somārthaḥ śuklena piṅgākṣeṇa mūrdhabhinnena visravatā pathi samājagāma
17.45.2	taṃ hovāca kathā vidyāṃ bhagavantam iti
17.45.3	somo rājāsmīti hainaṃ pratyuvāca
17.45.4	taṃ mā kadadhvaryur anaiṣṭyayanavid abhyasauṣīt
17.45.5	yatro mā kadadhvaryur anaiṣṭyayanavid abhiṣuṇotīttham ahaṃ tatra visrāvāṇi
17.45.6	asāvasau brāhmaṇo naiṣṭyayanāni veda
17.45.7	taṃ gamiṣyāmi
17.45.8	sa ma imān varṇān saṃropayiṣyatīti
17.45.9	te yatrāvabhṛtham avayanti tad audumbaryā śākhayā palāśaśākhayā vā sruveṇa vānājyaliptena dadhnā payasā vā madhumiśreṇa naiṣṭyayanair ṛjīṣam abhijuhvati
17.45.10	yat te grāvṇā cicchiduḥ soma rājann ity etenānuvākenābhir gīrbhir yad ato na ūnam ity etayā ca caturdaśabhir ṛjīṣam abhijuhvati
17.45.11	te yatrāvabhṛthaṃ saṃsidhyeyus tān brūyād ye nu rājñas tvacaṃ bhittvā krūraṃ kṛtveha grāvabhiḥ
17.46.1	aśamayitvā naiṣṭyayanair yanty evaivaṃ kṛtāgasaḥ
17.46.2	ye somam asaṃsthāpyāpaḥ saṃsādya sominaḥ / saṃsthito na ity āyanty amutrainān hinasti saḥ
17.46.3	asiśūlair uttudanti yam asya pratiṣādane / yo 'śamayitvā naiṣṭyayanair atha nākam adhirohati
17.46.4	vāyur bhūtvā pavate tridivaṃ nākam uttamam / yaḥ śamayitvā naiṣṭyayanair atha nākam adhirohati
17.46.5	adhvaryor yajamānasya pratiprasthātur agnīdhaḥ / brahmaṇo hotur udgātū rājaiṣāṃ lokam ādatte na cāhauṣuś caturdaśa
17.46.6	ye caturdaśa juhvati dadhna etāḥ sruvāhutīḥ / naiṣāṃ rājā lokam ādatte na prajāṃ nota vājinam
17.46.7	āpyāyayanto rājānaṃ grāvabhiḥ krūram ṛtvijaḥ / payasā śamayanto 'sya juhutaiva caturdaśeti
17.47.1	atha vai bhavati
17.47.2	brahmavādino vadanti sa tvai darśapūrṇamāsau yajeta ya enau sendrau yajeteti

17.47.13	tāṃ paurṇamāsaṃ saṃsthāpyānuniravapan

17.47.16	paurṇamāsenaiva vajraṃ bhrātṛvyāya prahṛtyāgnāvaiṣṇavena devatāś ca yajñaṃ ca bhrātṛvyasya vṛṅkta iti brāhmaṇam
17.47.17	sa eṣa bhrātṛvyavato yathākāmaprayogaḥ

17.48.1	paurṇamāsīm eva yajeta bhrātṛvyavān nāmāvāsyām iti
17.48.2	sa paurṇamāsīm
17.48.3	paurṇamāsīm eva yajeta bhrātṛvyavān nāmāvāsyām
17.48.4	hatvā bhrātṛvyaṃ nāpyāyayatīti brāhmaṇam
17.48.5	tad etat staraṇāvagadhaṃ vāparodhyāvagadhaṃ veti
17.48.6	atha vai bhavati
17.48.7	sākaṃprasthāyīyena yajeta paśukāma iti
17.48.8	etayeṣṭyā yakṣyamāṇa upakalpayata audumbaraṃ mahatpātraṃ prabhūtam ājyam iti
17.48.9	atha devasya tvā savituḥ prasava iti pratipadaṃ kṛtvāgneyam aṣṭākapālaṃ nirvapaty aindram ekādaśakapālam aindraṃ sāṃnāyyam
17.48.10	prasiddham āgneyena caritvāthetarayor haviṣor audumbare mahati pātre samavadyann āhendrāyānubrūhīti mahendrāyeti vā yadi mahendrayājī bhavati

17.48.15	atha vai bhavati
17.48.16	dārupātreṇa juhoti

17.48.18	audumbaraṃ bhavati

17.49.1	nāgataśrīr mahendraṃ yajeta
17.49.2	trayo vai gataśriyaḥ śuśruvān grāmaṇī rājanyas teṣāṃ mahendro devateti
17.49.3	sa yo 'nya etebhyo mahendram iyakṣyeta sa saṃvatsaram indram iṣṭvāgnaye vratapataye puroḍāśam aṣṭākapālaṃ nirvapati
17.49.4	sā prasiddheṣṭiḥ saṃtiṣṭhate

17.49.8	saṃvatsaram indraṃ yajeta

17.49.15	atha vai bhavati
17.50.1	nāsomāyājī saṃnayet
17.50.2	anāgataṃ vā etasya payo yo 'somayājī
17.50.3	yad asomayājī saṃnayet parimoṣa eva so 'nṛtaṃ karoti
17.50.4	atho paraiva sicyate
17.50.5	somayājy eva saṃnayet
17.50.6	payo vai somaḥ payaḥ sāṃnāyyam
17.50.7	payasaiva paya ātman dhatta iti brāhmaṇam
17.50.8	atha vai bhavati
17.50.9	vi vā etaṃ prajayā paśubhir ardhayati vardhayaty asya bhrātṛvyaṃ yasya havir niruptaṃ purastāc candramā abhyudeti
17.50.10	tredhā taṇḍulān vibhajet
17.50.11	ye madhyamāḥ syus tān agnaye dātre puroḍāśam aṣṭākapālaṃ kuryāt
17.50.12	ye sthaviṣṭhās tān indrāya pradātre dadhaṃś carum
17.50.13	ye 'niṣṭhās tān viṣṇave śipiviṣṭāya śṛte carum iti
17.50.14	tasyā etā bhavanty agne dā dāśuṣe rayiṃ dā no agne pradātāraṃ havāmahe pradātā vajrī pra tat te adya kim it te viṣṇo paricakṣyaṃ bhūd itīn nv ījānasya
17.50.15	vyāpannayaiva pūrvayā yajate 'vyāpannayottarayā
17.50.16	na dve yajeta
17.50.17	yat pūrvayā saṃprati yajetottarayā chambaṭ kuryāt
17.50.18	yad uttarayā saṃprati yajeta pūrvayā chambaṭ kuryāt
17.50.19	neṣṭir bhavati na yajñaḥ
17.50.20	tad anu hrītamukhy apagalbho jāyate
17.50.21	ekām eva yajeta pragalbho 'sya jāyate
17.50.22	anādṛtya tad dve eva yajeta
17.50.23	yajñamukham eva pūrvayālabhate
17.50.24	yajata uttarayā
17.50.25	devatā eva pūrvayāvarunddha indriyam uttarayā
17.50.26	devalokam eva pūrvayābhijayati manuṣyalokam uttarayā
17.50.27	bhūyaso yajñakratūn upaitīti brāhmaṇam
17.50.28	atha vai bhavati
17.50.29	eṣā vai sumanā nāmeṣṭiḥ
17.50.30	yam adyejānaṃ paścāc candramā abhy udety asminn evāsmai loke 'rdhukaṃ bhavatīti brāhmaṇam
17.50.31	atha vai bhavati
17.51.1	dākṣāyaṇayajñena suvargakāmo yajeta
17.51.2	pūrṇamāse saṃnayen maitrāvaruṇyāmikṣayāmāvāsyāyāṃ yajeteti
17.51.3	etayeṣṭyā yakṣyamāṇa upakalpayate 'hataṃ vāsaḥ
17.51.4	atha paurṇamāsyā upavasathe 'gnaye vratapataye puroḍāśam aṣṭākapālaṃ nirvapati
17.51.5	sā prasiddheṣṭiḥ saṃtiṣṭhate
17.51.6	athāsyaitad ahar indrāya vatsā apākṛtā bhavanti
17.51.7	aindraṃ payo dohayitvopavasati sāṃnāyyasya vāvṛtā tūṣṇīṃ vā
17.51.8	atha prātar āgneyam aṣṭākapālaṃ nirvapaty aindraṃ sāṃnāyyam
17.51.9	sā dvihavir iṣṭiḥ saṃtiṣṭhate
17.51.10	atraitad aindraṃ sāṃnāyyaṃ samupahūya bhakṣayanti
17.51.11	athāhataṃ vāsaḥ paridhāyāparapakṣaṃ vrataṃ carati
17.51.12	tasyaitad vrataṃ nānṛtaṃ vadati na māṃsam aśnāti na striyam upaiti nāsya palpūlanena vāsaḥ palpūlayanti
17.51.13	atha yāmāvāsyāgacchati tasyā upavasathe 'gnaye vratapataye puroḍāśam aṣṭākapālaṃ nirvapati
17.51.14	sā prasiddheṣṭiḥ saṃtiṣṭhate
17.51.15	athāsyaitad ahar mitrāvaruṇābhyāṃ vatsā apākṛtā bhavanti
17.51.16	maitrāvaruṇaṃ payo dohayitvopavasati sāṃnāyyasya vāvṛtā tūṣṇīṃ vā
17.51.17	atha prātar āgneyam aṣṭākapālaṃ nirvapati maitrāvaruṇīm āmikṣām
17.51.18	sā dvihavir iṣṭiḥ saṃtiṣṭhate
17.51.19	vājinasya kāle vājinena carati
17.51.20	nidhatte vāsaḥ
17.51.21	visṛjate vratam
17.51.22	visṛṣṭavrata etaṃ pūrvapakṣaṃ bhavati
17.51.23	atha paurṇamāsy āgacchati
17.51.24	utsīdati vratapatiḥ
17.51.25	yad evordhvaṃ vratapates tena pratipadyate
17.51.26	tad etat saṃvatsarāvagadhaṃ somasaṃstham
17.52.1	atheḍādadha ity ācakṣate
17.52.2	samānaṃ vāsasaś ca vratapateś ca
17.52.3	tathaindraṃ payo dohayitvopavasati sāṃnāyyasya vāvṛtā tūṣṇīṃ vā
17.52.4	atha prātar āgneyam aṣṭākapālaṃ nirvapaty agnīṣomīyam ekādaśakapālam aindraṃ sāṃnāyyam
17.52.5	sā trihavir iṣṭiḥ saṃtiṣṭhate
17.52.6	atraitad aindraṃ sāṃnāyyaṃ samupahūya bhakṣayanti
17.52.7	tathāhataṃ vāsaḥ paridhāyāparapakṣaṃ vrataṃ carati
17.52.8	āgacchaty amāvāsyā
17.52.9	tasyā upavasathe yajate
17.52.10	tathā maitrāvaruṇaṃ payo dohayitvopavasati sāṃnāyyasya vāvṛtā tūṣṇīṃ vā
17.52.11	atha prātar āgneyam aṣṭākapālaṃ nirvapaty aindram ekādaśakapālaṃ maitrāvaruṇīm āmikṣām
17.52.12	sā trihavir iṣṭiḥ saṃtiṣṭhate
17.52.13	vājinasya kāle vājinena carati
17.52.14	nidhatte vāsaḥ
17.52.15	visṛjate vratam
17.52.16	visṛṣṭavrata etaṃ pūrvapakṣaṃ bhavati
17.52.17	atha paurṇamāsy āgacchati
17.52.18	utsīdati vratapatiḥ
17.52.19	yad evordhvaṃ vratapates tena pratipadyate
17.52.20	tad etat saṃvatsarāvagadhaṃ somasaṃstham
17.53.1	atha catuścakro bhrātṛvyavato yajñaḥ
17.53.2	samānaṃ vāsasaś caiva vratapateś ca
17.53.3	tathaivaindraṃ payo dohayitvopavasati sāṃnāyyasya vāvṛtā tūṣṇīṃ vā
17.53.4	atha prātar āgneyam aṣṭākapālaṃ nirvapati sarasvata upāṃśuyājam agnīṣomīyam ekādaśakapālam aindraṃ sāṃnāyyam
17.53.5	sā caturhavir iṣṭiḥ saṃtiṣṭhate
17.53.6	atraitad aindraṃ sāṃnāyyaṃ samupahūya bhakṣayanti
17.53.7	tathaivāhataṃ vāsaḥ paridhāyāparapakṣaṃ vrataṃ carati
17.53.8	āgacchaty amāvāsyā
17.53.9	naivopavasathe yajate
17.53.10	tathaiva maitrāvaruṇaṃ payo dohayitvopavasati sāṃnāyyasya vāvṛtā tūṣṇīṃ vā
17.53.11	atha prātar āgneyam aṣṭāklapālaṃ nirvapati sarasvatyā upāṃśuyājam aindram ekādaśakapālaṃ maitrāvaruṇīm āmikṣām
17.53.12	sā caturhavir iṣṭiḥ saṃtiṣṭhate
17.53.13	vājinasya kāle vājinena carati
17.53.14	nidhatte vāsaḥ
17.53.15	visṛjate vratam
17.53.16	visṛṣṭavrata etaṃ pūrvapakṣaṃ bhavati
17.53.17	atha paurṇamāsy āgacchati
17.53.18	utsīdati vratapatiḥ
17.53.19	yad evordhvaṃ vratapates tena pratipadyate
17.53.20	tad etat saṃvatsarāvagadhaṃ somasaṃstham
17.54.1	sa eṣa catuścakro bhrātṛvyavato yajñaḥ
17.54.2	sa yathā ha vā idam anaś catuścakraṃ vyavaghnānam ety evaṃ ha vā eṣa etena yajñakratuneṣṭvā pāpmānaṃ bhrātṛvyaṃ vyavaghnāna eti
17.54.3	sa eṣa vasiṣṭhayajñaḥ keśiyajñaḥ sārvaseniyajñaḥ
17.54.4	vasiṣṭho ha yatra saudāsān abhicacāraivaṃ hainān abhicacāra
17.54.5	keśī ha yatra khāṇḍikam abhicacāraivaṃ hainam abhicacāra
17.54.6	sārvasenir ha yatra bhrātṛvyān abhicacāraivaṃ hainān abhicacāra
17.55.1	cāturmāsyaiḥ somair yakṣyamāṇo bhavati
17.55.2	sa dvayān saṃbhārān upakalpayata āgniṣṭomikāṃś ca vaiśvadevasaṃbhārāṃś ca
17.55.3	sa purastāt phālgunyai vā caitryai vā paurṇamāsyā āmāvāsyena haviṣeṣṭvā dīkṣate
17.55.4	tasyāparimitā dīkṣās tisra upasadaḥ
17.55.5	sa tathā rājānaṃ krīṇāti yathā manyate paurṇamāsyai me yajñiye 'han sutyā saṃpatsyata iti
17.55.6	tasya tathā saṃpadyate
17.55.7	prasiddhena karmaṇopavasathād eti
17.55.8	athāsyaitad ahar viśvebhyo devebhyo vatsā apākṛtā bhavanti
17.55.9	vaiśvadevaṃ payo dohayati sāṃnāyyasya vāvṛtā tūṣṇīṃ vā
17.55.10	atha vasatīvarīḥ parihṛtya payāṃsi viśiṣyopavasanti
17.55.11	atha prātas trivṛd barhiḥ
17.55.12	tad ekavad eva stṛṇāti
17.55.13	athāgneyaṃ paśum upākaroti
17.55.14	tasya vaiśvadeva upālambhyo bhavati
17.55.15	tasya prātaḥsavanīyān anuvartante vaiśvadevahavīṃṣi
17.55.16	praiṣavantaḥ savanīyāḥ
17.55.17	anubrūhi yajetītareṣāṃ haviṣām
17.55.18	ṛjudhā trivṛd agniṣṭomaḥ saṃtiṣṭhate
17.55.19	purastād dhānāsomānāṃ vājinena carati
17.55.20	samānaṃ karmāvabhṛthāt
17.55.21	prasiddho 'vabhṛthaḥ
17.55.22	udayanīyayeṣṭyeṣṭvā maitrāvaruṇīṃ vaśām upākaroti
17.55.23	tasyai dyāvāpṛthivyopālambhyā bhavati
17.55.24	tayoḥ prasiddhaṃ vapābhyāṃ caritvā paśupuroḍāśau nirvapati
17.55.25	saṃtiṣṭhate yathā dvipaśuḥ paśubandhas tathā
17.55.26	atha paurṇamāsavaimṛdhābhyām iṣṭvety uktam etad
17.55.27	athātaś caturṣu māseṣu
17.56.1	varuṇapraghāsābhyāṃ somābhyāṃ yakṣyamāno bhavati
17.56.2	dīkṣate
17.56.3	tasyāparimitā dīkṣā dvādaśopasadaḥ
17.56.4	sa tathā rājānaṃ krīṇāti yathā manyate paurṇamāsyai me yajñiye 'han dvitīyam ahaḥ saṃpatsyata iti
17.56.5	tasya tathā saṃpadyate
17.56.6	prasiddhena karmaṇopavasathād eti
17.56.7	athāsyaitad ahar marudbhyo vatsā apākṛtā bhavanti
17.56.8	mārutaṃ payo dohayati sāṃnāyyasya vāvṛtā tūṣṇīṃ vā
17.56.9	atha vasatīvarīḥ parihṛtya payāṃsi viśiṣyopavasanti
17.56.10	atha prātar āgneyaṃ paśum upākaroti
17.56.11	tasya māruta upālambhyo bhavati
17.56.12	tasya prātaḥsavanīyān anuvartante sapta varuṇapraghāsahavīṃṣi
17.56.13	sa yatra prātaḥsavane dhiṣṇiyān viharati tad ajasraṃ mārjālīyaṃ karoti
17.56.14	samāsanneṣu haviḥṣu gārhapatye karambhapātrāṇy abhiparyagnikṛtvā tair mārjālīye pracarati
17.56.15	praiṣavantaḥ savanīyāḥ
17.56.16	anubrūhi yajetītareṣāṃ haviṣām
17.56.17	ṛjudhā pañcadaśa ukthyaḥ saṃtiṣṭhate
17.56.18	ahīnasaṃtatiṃ karoti
17.56.19	athāsyaitad ahar varuṇāya vatsā apākṛtā bhavanti
17.56.20	vāruṇaṃ payo dohayati sāṃnāyyasya vāvṛtā tūṣṇīṃ vā
17.56.21	atha vasatīvarīḥ parihṛtya payāṃsi viśiṣyopavasanti
17.56.22	atha prātar āgneyaṃ paśum upākaroti
17.56.23	tasya vāruṇa upālambhyo bhavati
17.56.24	tasya prātaḥsavanīyān anuvartete vāruṇī ca kāyaś ca
17.56.25	praiṣavantaḥ savanīyāḥ
17.56.26	anubrūhi yajetītarayor haviṣoḥ
17.56.27	ṛjudhā saptadaśa ukthyaḥ saṃtiṣṭhate
17.56.28	purastād dhānāsomānāṃ vājinābhyāṃ carati
17.56.29	samānaṃ karmāvabhṛthāt
17.56.30	athaitasminn avabhṛtha upādadate vāruṇyai niṣkāsaṃ tuṣān iti
17.56.31	vāruṇasya vāruṇyāmikṣādhyavadānīyā bhavati
17.56.32	ṛjīṣeṇa saha tuṣān saṃprakiranti
17.56.33	prasiddho 'vabhṛthaḥ
17.56.34	udayanīyayeṣṭyeṣṭvā maitrāvaruṇīṃ vaśām upākaroti

17.59.8	dīkṣate

17.59.10	sa tathā rājānaṃ krīṇāti yathā manyate paurṇamāsyai me yajñiye 'han sutyā saṃpatsyata iti
17.59.11	tasya tathā saṃpadyate
17.59.12	prasiddhena karmaṇopavasathād eti
17.59.13	athāsyaitad ahar dvayā vatsā apākṛtā bhavanti marudbhyo varuṇāyeti
17.59.14	dvayaṃ payo dohayati sāṃnāyyasya vāvṛtā tūṣṇīṃ vā
17.59.15	atha vasatīvarīḥ parihṛtya payāṃsi viśiṣyopavasanti
17.59.16	atha prātar āgneyaṃ paśum upākaroti
17.59.17	tasya māruto vāruṇa ity upālambhyau bhavataḥ
17.59.18	tasya prātaḥsavanīyān anuvartante sapta varuṇapraghāsahavīṃṣi
17.59.19	sa yatra prātaḥsavane dhiṣṇiyān viharati tad ajasraṃ mārjālīyaṃ karoti
17.59.20	samāsanneṣu haviḥṣu gārhapatye karambhapātrāṇy abhiparyagnikṛtvā tair mārjālīye pracarati
17.59.21	praiṣavantaḥ savanīyāḥ
17.59.22	anubrūhi yajetītareṣāṃ haviṣām
17.59.23	mādhyaṃdinīyān anuvartete vāruṇī ca kāyaś ca
17.59.24	praiṣavantaḥ savanīyāḥ
17.59.25	anubrūhi yajetītarayor haviṣoḥ
17.59.26	ṛjudhā jyotirukthyaḥ saṃtiṣṭhate
17.59.27	samānam uttaraṃ karma yathā dvirātre tathā
17.59.28	athātaś caturṣu māseṣu
17.60.1	sākamedhena somena yakṣyamāṇo bhavati
17.60.2	dīkṣate

17.60.4	sa tathā rājānaṃ krīṇāti yathā manyate paurṇamāsyai me yajñiye 'han sutyā saṃpatsyata iti

17.61.2	jyotiratirātra ity eka āhuḥ

17.61.5	sa tathā rājānaṃ krīṇāti yathā manyate paurṇamāsyai me yajñiye 'han sutyā saṃpatsyata iti

17.62.11	purastād dhānāsomānāṃ vājinaiś caritvā traiyambakaiś carati
17.62.12	samānaṃ karmāvabhṛthāt

17.62.14	vāruṇasya vāruṇyāmikṣādhyavadānīyā bhavati
17.62.15	ṛjīṣeṇa saha tuṣān saṃprakiranti
17.62.16	prasiddho 'vabhṛthaḥ
17.62.17	udayanīyayeṣṭyeṣṭvā maitrāvaruṇīṃ vaśām upākaroti
17.62.18	tasyai dyāvāpṛthivyā kāyā vaiśvakarmaṇī saurīty upālambhyā bhavanti
17.62.19	tāsāṃ prasiddhaṃ vapābhiś caritvā paśupuroḍāśān nirvapati
17.62.20	tān anuvartanta ādityaprabhṛtīni śunāsīrīyahavīṃṣi
17.62.21	praiṣavantaḥ paśupuroḍāśāḥ
17.62.22	anubrūhi yajetītareṣāṃ haviṣām
17.62.23	saṃtiṣṭhate yathā pañcapaśuḥ paśubandhas tathā
17.62.24	atha paurṇamāsavaimṛdhābhyām iṣṭvā yajamānāyatana upaviśya treṇyā śalalyā lohitāyasasya ca kṣureṇa śīrṣan ni ca vartayate pari ca vapate purastād evāgre 'tha dakṣiṇato 'tha paścād athottarato 'thopariṣṭāt
17.62.25	saṃtiṣṭhante cāturmāsyāḥ somāḥ saṃtiṣṭhante cāturmāsyāḥ somāḥ
18.1.1	bṛhaspatisavena yakṣyamāṇo bhavati
18.1.2	sa upakalpayate 'śvacatustriṃśā dakṣiṇāḥ kṛṣṇājinaṃ suvarṇarajatau ca rukmau parṇamayaṃ pātram ājyam abhiṣecanāya
18.1.3	atha vai brāhmaṇaṃ bhavati
18.1.4	parisrajī hotā bhavaty aruṇo mirmiras triśukra iti
18.1.5	eṣa ha vai parisrajī yaḥ khalatiḥ parikeśyaḥ
18.1.6	atha haiṣa mirmiro yaḥ śuklo viklidhas tilakavān piṅgākṣaḥ
18.1.7	atha haiṣa triśukro yas trivedaḥ
18.1.8	dīkṣate
18.1.9	tasyaikarātrīṇasya somaṃ krīṇanti
18.1.10	tisra upasadaḥ
18.1.11	tāyate trivṛdagniṣṭomo rathaṃtarasāmā pravargyavān
18.1.12	gāyatrīṣv eka stomaḥ
18.1.13	prajñātaṃ devasuvāṃ haviṣāṃ karaṇam
18.1.14	tasya bārhaspatyo 'tigrāhyaḥ
18.1.15	bārhaspatyaḥ paśur upālambhyaḥ
18.1.16	samānam ābhiṣekasya kālāt
18.1.17	abhiṣekasya kāle yajamānāyatane kṛṣṇājinaṃ prācīnagrīvam uttaralomopastṛṇāti
18.1.18	tad yajamānaṃ prāñcam upaveśya suvarṇarajatābhyāṃ rukmābhyāṃ paryupāsya parṇamaye pātra ājyam ānīyābhiṣiñcati bṛhaspatiḥ prathamaṃ jāyamāno maho jyotiṣaḥ parame vyoman / saptāsyas tuvijāto raveṇa vi saptaraśmir adhamat tamāṃsi
18.1.19	devasya tvā savituḥ prasave 'śvinor bāhubhyāṃ pūṣṇo hastābhyāṃ sarasvatyai vāco yantur yantreṇa bṛhaspatisavenābhiṣiñcāmīti
18.1.20	samunmṛṣṭe samutkrośantīti samānam ā mukhasya vimārjanāt
18.2.1	tasya prātaḥsavane sanneṣu nārāśaṃseṣv ekādaśa dakṣiṇā nīyante
18.2.2	ekādaśa mādhyaṃdine savane sanneṣu nārāśaṃseṣu
18.2.3	aśvadvādaśās tṛtīyasavane sanneṣu nārāśaṃseṣu
18.2.4	mādhyaṃdina eva savane 'śvaṃ dadyād iti ha smāha maudgalyaḥ
18.2.5	sa vā eṣa naimārjano yajñaḥ
18.2.6	sa yathā ha vā iyaṃ gaireyī nadī nimṛjaty evaṃ ha vā eṣa etena yajñakratuneṣṭvā pāpmānaṃ bhrātṛvyaṃ nimṛjann eti
18.2.7	sa etasminn eva pūrvapakṣe catuṣṭomenāgniṣṭomena yajeta purā bhreṣāc chāntyai
18.2.8	rājā rājasūyenejāna icchati bṛhaspatisavenābhiṣicyeyeti
18.2.9	tad u vā āhur na vai rājasūyābhiṣikto 'nyena yajñakratunābhiṣicyeta
18.2.10	apratyavarohī ha bhavatīti
18.2.11	ubhābhyāṃ brahmakṣatrābhyām abhiṣicyā ity abhiṣicyetaiveti
18.2.12	dīkṣate
18.2.13	tasya tisro dīkṣās tisra upasadaḥ
18.2.14	samānam ābhiṣekasya kālāt
18.2.15	abhiṣekasya kāle mādhyaṃdinīyā evainaṃ camasā nimṛjanto yanti
18.2.16	caturviṃśa eṣa bhavati
18.2.17	rājā rājasūyena yakṣyamāṇa ādhyāyati triṣu varṇeṣv abhiṣikteṣv adhyabhiṣicyeya purohite sthapatau sūta iti
18.2.18	purohito dīkṣate
18.2.19	tasya tisro dīkṣās tisra upasadaḥ
18.2.20	samānam ābhiṣekasya kālāt

18.5.19	atha devikāhavirbhir yajate

18.6.2	atha vai brāhmaṇaṃ bhavati

18.6.4	sa āmāvāsyena haviṣeṣṭvāṣṭāv ahāny ānumataprabhṛtibhir eti saptendraturīyaprabhṛtibhiḥ

18.6.10	devasya tvā savituḥ prasave 'śvinor bāhubhyāṃ pūṣṇo hastābhyāṃ sarasvatyai vāco yantur yantreṇa pṛthisavenābhiṣiñcāmīti

18.6.15	atha pūrvaiḥ prayujāṃ havirbhir yajate
18.6.16	atha paurṇamāsavaimṛdhābhyām iṣṭvottaraiḥ prayujāṃ havirbhir yajate
18.6.17	atha devikāhavirbhir yajate

18.7.4	samānam ābhiṣekasya kālāt

18.7.6	tad yajamānaṃ prāñcam upaveśya suvarṇarajatābhyāṃ rukmābhyāṃ paryupāsya parṇamaye pātre pratidhug ānīya bṛhata stotraṃ pratyabhiṣiñcati revaj jātaḥ sahasā vṛddhaḥ kṣatrāṇāṃ kṣatrabhṛttamo vayodhāḥ / mahān mahitve tastabhānaḥ kṣatre rāṣṭre ca jāgṛhi / prajāpates tvā parameṣṭhinaḥ svārājyenābhiṣiñcāmi
18.7.7	devasya tvā savituḥ prasave 'śvinor bāhubhyāṃ pūṣṇo hastābhyāṃ sarasvatyai vāco yantur yantreṇa gosavenābhiṣiñcāmīti
18.7.8	samunmṛṣṭe samutkrośantīti samānam ā mukhasya vimārjanāt
18.7.9	sa eṣa gosavaḥ ṣaṭtriṃśaḥ sarva ukthya ubhayasāmāyutadakṣiṇaḥ
18.7.10	pavamāne kaṇvarathaṃtaraṃ kurvanti
18.8.1	odanasavena yakṣyamāṇo bhavati sa upakalpayate rohitaṃ carmānaḍuhaṃ suvarṇarajatau ca rukmau śatamānaṃ ca pravartaṃ caturo varṇān brāhmaṇaṃ rājanyaṃ vaiśyaṃ śūdraṃ caturo rasān madhu surāṃ paya apaś catvāri pātrāṇi sauvarṇaṃ rājataṃ kāṃsyaṃ mṛnmayaṃ catasro dakṣiṇāḥ śatamānaṃ hiraṇyaṃ tisṛdhanvam aṣṭrāṃ māṣaiḥ pūrṇaṃ kamaṇḍaluṃ catuṣṭayīḥ śalākāḥ parṇamayyau naiyagrodhyāv āśvatthyau phālgunapācyau catvāri nānāvṛkṣyāṇi pātrāṇi saktūṃs trīṇi darbhapuñjīlāny audumbaraṃ droṇaṃ catuḥsrakti catuṣaṭayīr apo digbhyaḥ saṃbhṛtāḥ śataṃ ca rathaṃ ca
18.8.2	etenopak.lptena rohiṇīm āyatīm uparamati
18.8.3	atha rohiṇyeti pūrvāgnim anvavasyaty uttapanīyaṃ śālīno 'nvāhāryapacanam āhitāgniḥ
18.8.4	athādhvaryur apararātra ādrutya saṃśāsty ekaudanaṃ śrapayateti
18.8.5	taṃ tathā śrapayanti yathā purādityasyodayāc chṛto bhavati
18.8.6	udyatā sūryeṇa kārya iti brāhmaṇam

18.8.10	athaitāṃś caturo varṇān dakṣiṇata udaṅmukhān upaveśayati

18.9.1	athaitat sauvarṇaṃ pātraṃ yācati
18.9.2	tasmiṃs tiraḥ pavitraṃ madhv ānīya saktūn opya parṇamayībhyāṃ śalākābhyām upamanthatīndrāya tvā tejasvate tejasvantaṃ śrīṇāmīti
18.9.3	tejo 'sīti brāhmaṇāya prayacchati
18.9.4	tat te prayacchāmīti brāhmaṇaḥ pratigṛhṇāti
18.9.5	atha yajamāno mukhaṃ vimṛṣṭe tejasvad astu me mukhaṃ tejasvac chiro astu me / tejasvān viśvataḥ pratyaṅ tejasā saṃpipṛgdhi meti
18.9.6	trir ācamya praśaṃsati
18.9.7	tasmā etac caiva pātraṃ dadāti śatamānaṃ ca hiraṇyam
18.9.8	athaitad rājataṃ pātraṃ yācati
18.9.9	tasmiṃs tiraḥ pavitraṃ surām ānīya saktūn opya naiyagrodhībhyāṃ śalākābhyām upamanthatīndrāya tvaujasvata ojasvantaṃ śrīṇāmīti
18.9.10	ojo 'sīti rājanyāya prayacchati
18.9.11	tat te prayacchāmīti rājanyaḥ pratigṛhṇāti
18.9.12	atha yajamāno mukhaṃ vimṛṣṭa ojasvad astu me mukham ojasvac chiro astu me / ojasvān viśvataḥ pratyaṅṅ ojasā saṃpipṛgdhi meti
18.9.13	trir ācamya praśaṃsati
18.9.14	tasmā etac caiva pātraṃ dadāti tisṛdhanvaṃ ca
18.9.15	athaitat kāṃsyaṃ pātraṃ yācati
18.9.16	tasmiṃs tiraḥ pavitraṃ paya ānīya saktūn opyāśvatthībhyāṃ śalākābhyām upamanthatīndrāya tvā payasvate payasvantaṃ śrīṇāmīti
18.9.17	payo 'sīti vaiśyāya prayacchati
18.9.18	tat te prayacchāmīti vaiśyaḥ pratigṛhṇāti
18.9.19	atha yajamāno mukhaṃ vimṛṣṭe payasvad astu me mukhaṃ payasvac chiro astu me / payasvān viśvataḥ pratyaṅ payasā saṃpipṛgdhi meti
18.9.20	trir ācamya praśaṃsati
18.9.21	tasmā etac caiva pātraṃ dadāty aṣṭrāṃ ca
18.9.22	athaitan mṛnmayaṃ pātraṃ yācati
18.9.23	tasmiṃs tiraḥ pavitram apa ānīya saktūn opya phālgunapācībhyāṃ śalākābhyām upamanthatīndrāya tvāyuṣmata āyuṣmantaṃ śrīṇāmīti
18.9.24	āyur asīti śūdrāya prayacchati
18.9.25	tat te prayacchāmīti śūdraḥ pratigṛhṇāti
18.9.26	atha yajamāno mukhaṃ vimṛṣṭa āyuṣmad astu me mukham āyuṣmac chiro astu me / āyuṣmān viśvataḥ pratyaṅṅ āyuṣā saṃpipṛgdhi meti
18.9.27	trir ācamya praśaṃsati
18.9.28	tasmā etac caiva pātraṃ dadāti māṣaiś ca pūrṇaṃ kamaṇḍalum
18.9.29	athaitam odanam abhyutsṛpya prāśnāti
18.9.30	tasya yan na sahate tad apsu praveśayati
18.9.31	atha hiraṇyād ghṛtaṃ niṣpibati
18.9.32	niṣpibantam anumantrayata imam agna āyuṣe varcase kṛdhi priyaṃ reto varuṇa soma rājan / mātevāsmā adite śarma yaccha viśve devā jaradaṣṭir yathāsad iti
18.9.33	athaitaṃ pravartam adbhiḥ prakṣālya dakṣiṇe karṇa ābadhnīta āyuṣ ṭe viśvato dadhad iti
18.9.34	athainam anuparivartayata āyur asi viśvāyur asi sarvāyur asi sarvam āyur asīti
18.9.35	athainaṃ tribhir darbhapuñjīlaiḥ pavayati yato vāto manojavā yataḥ kṣaranti sindhavaḥ / tāsāṃ tvā sarvāsāṃ rucābhiṣiñcāmi varcaseti
18.9.36	athāsya dakṣiṇam akṣikaṭaṃ nyacati samudra ivāsi gahmanā soma ivāsy adābhyaḥ / agnir iva viśvataḥ pratyaṅ sūrya iva jyotiṣā vibhūr iti
18.10.1	yāvad evātrādhvaryuś ceṣṭati tāvad eṣa pratiprasthātaudumbare droṇe catuṣṭayīr apaḥ samavanīya caturo grahān gṛhṇāty apāṃ yo dravaṇe rasas tam aham asmā āmuṣyāyaṇāya tejase brahmavarcasāya gṛhṇāmīti parṇamayena
18.10.2	apāṃ ya ūrmau rasas tam aham asmā āmuṣyāyaṇāyaujase vīryāya gṛhṇāmīti naiyagrodhena
18.10.3	apāṃ yo madhyato rasas tam aham asmā āmuṣyāyaṇāya puṣṭyai prajananāya gṛhṇāmīty āśvatthena
18.10.4	apāṃ yo yajñiyo rasas tam aham asmā āmuṣyāyaṇāyāyuṣe dīrghāyutvāya gṛhṇāmīty audumbareṇa
18.10.5	athaitad rohitaṃ carmānaḍuhaṃ prācīnagrīvam uttaralomopastṛṇāti
18.10.6	tad yajamānaṃ prāñcam upaveśya suvarṇarajatābhyāṃ rukmābhyāṃ paryupāsyābhiṣiñcaty apāṃ yo dravaṇe rasas tenāham imam āmuṣyāyaṇaṃ tejase brahmavarcasāyābhiṣiñcāmīti parṇamayena
18.10.7	apāṃ ya ūrmau rasas tenāham imam āmuṣyāyaṇam ojase vīryāyābhiṣiñcāmīti naiyagrodhena
18.10.8	apāṃ yo madhyato rasas tenāham imam āmuṣyāyaṇaṃ puṣṭyai prajananāyābhiṣiñcāmīty āśvatthena
18.10.9	apāṃ yo yajñiyo rasas tenāham imam āmuṣyāyaṇam āyuṣe dīrghāyutvāyābhiṣiñcāmīty audumbareṇa
18.10.10	samunmṛṣṭe samutkrośantīti samānam ā mukhasya vimārjanāt
18.10.11	uttarata etad dhūpāyitaṃ śataṃ tiṣṭhati rathaś ca
18.10.12	tad abhipraity abhiprehi vīrayasvograś cettā sapatnahā / ātiṣṭha mitravardhanas tubhyaṃ devā adhibravann iti
18.10.13	atha rathasya pakṣasī saṃmṛśaty aṅkau nyaṅkāv abhito rathaṃ yāv iti
18.10.14	ratham ātiṣṭhaty ātiṣṭha vṛtrahann iti pratipadyāyaṃ pṛṇaktu rajasī upastham ity ātaḥ
18.10.15	athaitac chataṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇaṃ pariyāya puraskṛtyāyāti
18.10.16	tad adhvaryave dadāti
18.10.17	sa eṣa odanasavo rājño vā brāhmaṇasya vā vaiśyasya vā puṣṭikāmasya yajñaḥ

18.15.7	catuścatvāriṃśaṃ maitrāvaruṇasya vāmadevyaṃ ca śakvaraṃ ca sāmanī anyatareṇānyatarat pariṣṭuvanti

18.16.1	mṛtyusavena yakṣyamāṇo bhavati
18.16.2	sa upakalpayate śārdūlacarma suvarṇarajatau ca rukmau vaiyāghryāv upānahau cārmapakṣyāv upānahau vṛṣṇivāsasaṃ ca kṣaumaṃ ca tisṛdhanvam āsandīṃ sādhīvāsāṃ dundubhiṃ vimitam audumbaraṃ droṇaṃ catuḥsrakti catuṣṭayīr apo digbhyaḥ saṃbhṛtāḥ śataṃ ca rathaṃ ca

18.16.7	atha vaiyāghryāv upānahāv upamuñcate dyaur asīti dakṣiṇe pāde pṛthivy asīty uttare
18.16.8	atha dakṣiṇaṃ jānv ācyābhisarpati vyāghro vaiyāghre 'dhi viśrayasva diśo mahīḥ / viśas tvā sarvā vāñchantu mā tvad rāṣṭram adhi bhraśad iti
18.16.9	athāsmai dhanuḥ prayacchati yathā rājasūye tathā

18.17.1	yā divyā āpaḥ payasā saṃbabhūvur yā antarikṣa uta pārthivīr yāḥ / tāsāṃ tvā sarvāsāṃ rucābhiṣiñcāmi varcasā
18.17.2	abhi tvā varcasāsicaṃ divyena payasā saha / yathāsā rāṣṭravardhanas tathā tvā savitā karat
18.17.3	indraṃ viśvā avīvṛdhan samudravyacasaṃ giraḥ / rathītamaṃ rathīnāṃ vājānāṃ satpatiṃ patim
18.17.4	vasavas tvā purastād abhiṣiñcantu gāyatreṇa chandaseti purastāt
18.17.5	etā eva tisro 'nudrutya rudrās tvā dakṣiṇato 'bhiṣiñcantu traiṣṭubhena chandaseti dakṣiṇataḥ
18.17.6	etā eva tisro 'nudrutyādityās tvā paścād abhiṣiñcantu jāgatena chandaseti paścāt
18.17.7	etā eva tisro 'nudrutya viśve tvā devā uttarato 'bhiṣiñcantv ānuṣṭubhena chandasety uttarataḥ
18.17.8	etā eva tisro 'nudrutya bṛhaspatis tvopariṣṭād abhiṣiñcatu pāṅktena chandasety upariṣṭāt
18.17.9	athāsyora ūrdhvam unmṛjyate 'ruṇaṃ tvā vṛkam ugraṃ khajaṃkaram iti
18.17.10	athāsya bāhū anumārṣṭi pra bāhavā sisṛtaṃ jīvase na iti
18.17.11	athaināv upāvaharatīndrasya te vīryakṛto bāhū upāvaharāmīti
18.17.12	atrāsmai dhanuḥ prayacchati yadi purastād aprattaṃ bhavati
18.17.13	samunmṛṣṭe samutkrośantīti samānam ā mukhasya vimārjanāt

18.17.17	atha ratham upatiṣṭhate namas ta ṛṣe gadeti
18.17.18	atha raśmīn ādatta evā brahman taved astu tiṣṭhā rathe adhi yad vajrahastaḥ / ā raśmīn deva yuvase svaśva iti
18.17.19	ratham ātiṣṭhaty ātiṣṭha vṛtrahan ratham ātiṣṭhantaṃ pary anu tvendro madatv indraṃ viśvā avīvṛdhann ity ātaḥ

18.17.23	tāṃ tathā pratyavarohati yathā rājasūye tathā

18.34.10	yaḥ kāmayetānnādī me prajā syād annādyam avarundhītānnādyam asyāṃ pratitiṣṭhed iti sa etena yajñakratunā yajeta
18.34.11	annādy evāsya prajā bhavaty annādyam avarunddhe 'nnādyam asyāṃ pratitiṣṭhati
18.34.12	tasya catasṛṣu bahiṣpavamāno 'ṣṭāsvaṣṭāsv ājyāni dvādaśo mādhyaṃdinaḥ pavamānaḥ ṣoḍaśāni pṛṣṭhāni saviṃśa ārbhavaḥ pavamānaś caturviṃśam agniṣṭomasāma
18.34.13	taṃ diśāṃ catuṣṭoma ity ācakṣate
18.34.14	chandāṃsy akāmayanta yaśo 'śnuvīmahi yaśo 'varundhīmahi yaśo 'smāsu pratitiṣṭhed iti
18.34.15	tāny etaṃ yajñakratum apaśyan
18.34.16	tam āharan
18.34.17	tenāyajanta
18.34.18	tato vai tāni yaśo 'śnuvata yaśo 'vārundhata yaśa eṣu pratyatiṣṭhat
18.34.19	yaḥ kāmayeta yaśo 'śnuvīya yaśo 'varundhīya yaśo mayi pratitiṣṭhed iti sa etena yajñakratunā yajeta
18.34.20	yaśa evāśnute yaśo 'varunddhe yaśo 'smin pratitiṣṭhati
18.34.21	tasya stomā astuvataikasyām atha tisṛṣv ekasyām atha tisṛṣu
18.34.22	tam etaṃ chandasām ekatrika ity ācakṣate
18.34.23	stomā akāmayanteti samānaḥ parivādaḥ
18.34.24	tasya stomās trivṛd atha trayaḥ pañcadaśās trivṛd atha trayaḥ saptadaśās trivṛd atha traya ekaviṃśāḥ
18.34.25	tam etaṃ stomānām ekatrika ity ācakṣate
18.35.1	indrāgnī vā akāmayetāṃ samānalokau syāva samānaṃ lokam iyāveti
18.35.2	tāv etaṃ yajñakratum apaśyatām
18.35.3	tam āharatām
18.35.4	tenāyajetām
18.35.5	tato vai tau samānalokāv abhavatāṃ samānaṃ lokam aitāṃ samānalokāv api
18.35.6	atha yau kāmayetāṃ rājā ca purohitaś ca samānalokau syāva samānaṃ lokam iyāveti tāv etena yajñakratunā yajeyātāṃ samānalokāv eva bhavataḥ samānaṃ lokam itaḥ
18.35.7	aśvaratho yajñāyudhaḥ prāsaṅgyaś camasaḥ sā brāhmaṇasya dakṣiṇā
18.35.8	aśvatarīrathaḥ sarvāyudho 'prāsaṅgyaḥ kāṃsyas tūṇībandhaḥ sā rājanyasya dakṣiṇā

18.36.1	abhicaraṇīyaiḥ somair yakṣyamāṇo bhavati
18.36.2	sa dvayāni yajñāyudhāny upakalpayate bādhakāni ca tailvakāni ca śavānaso 'dhiṣavaṇe phalake puruṣāsthasya vṛṣaṇau
18.36.3	sa yatrādhvaryur upāṃśuṃ grahīṣyan rājānam abhiṣuṇoti tasya yo 'ṃśuḥ parāpatati tam etasmin pātra ādhāyopasaṃgṛhyāthāhāmuṃ jahy atha tvā hoṣyāmīti
18.36.4	ā tamitor āste
18.36.5	athaitaṃ bhaṅgam āhavanīye 'nupraharatīdam aham amum āmuṣyāyaṇaṃ pariplunā bhaṅgena vidhyāmīti
18.36.6	atra yaṃ yajamāno dveṣṭi taṃ manasā dhyāyati
18.36.7	athaitat pātraṃ khare yathāyatanaṃ sādayaty amuṣya tvā prāṇe sādayāmīti

18.37.1	duraśena yakṣyamāṇo bhavati
18.37.2	sa upakalpayate ṣaṣṭiṃ śatamānāni hiraṇyāni triṃśataṃ suvarṇāni triṃśataṃ rajatāni bahv anyad dhiraṇyam
18.37.3	sa āmāvāsyena haviṣeṣṭvā sauryaṃ caruṃ nirvapati
18.37.4	tasmin suvarṇaṃ śatamānaṃ dadāti
18.37.5	atha sāyaṃ hute 'gnihotre cāndramasaṃ caruṃ nirvapati
18.37.6	tasmin rajataṃ śatamānaṃ dadāti
18.37.7	sa evam evaitābhyām iṣṭibhyām aharahar yajamāno māsam eti
18.37.8	atha dīkṣate
18.37.9	dīkṣaṇīyāyāṃ dvādaśamānaṃ hiraṇyaṃ dadāti
18.37.10	prāyaṇīyāyāṃ caturviṃśatimānaṃ dadāti
18.37.11	ātithyāyāṃ dve caturviṃśatimāne dadāti
18.37.12	prathamāyām upasadi catvāri dadāti
18.37.13	dvitīyasyām upasady aṣṭau dadāti
18.37.14	tṛtīyasyām upasadi ṣoḍaśa dadāti
18.37.15	caturthyām upasadi dvātriṃśataṃ dadāti
18.37.16	pañcamyām upasadi catuḥṣaṣṭiṃ dadāti
18.37.17	ṣaṣṭhyām upasady aṣṭāviṃśaṃ śataṃ caturviṃśatimānānāṃ dadāti
18.37.18	athātaḥ śatasaṃkhyaiva
18.37.19	agnīṣomīyasya hutāyāṃ vapāyāṃ dve śate dadāti
18.37.20	āgneyasya hutāyāṃ vapāyāṃ catvāri dadāti
18.37.21	prātaḥsavanīyeṣv aṣṭau dadāti
18.37.22	mādhyaṃdinīyeṣu ṣoḍaśa dadāti
18.37.23	dakṣiṇānāṃ kāle dvātriṃśataṃ dadāti
18.37.24	tṛtīyasavanīyeṣu catuḥṣaṣṭiṃ dadāti
18.37.25	anūbandhyasya hutāyāṃ vapāyām aṣṭāviṃśaṃ śatānāṃ dadāti
18.37.26	sa yad etābhyām iṣṭibhyām aharahar yajate sūryācandramasor eva tat sāyujyaṃ salokatām āpnoti
18.38.1	atha yad dhiraṇyadakṣiṇo bhavati hiraṇmayam eva tad yajamāna ātmānaṃ saṃskurute
18.38.2	tasya yad ūrdhvaṃ nābhes tat suvarṇam arvāṅ rajatam
18.38.3	yadā ha vai hiraṇmayo bhavaty athāmṛto bhavati
18.38.4	hiraṇmayā ha vai devāḥ
18.38.5	tasmāt te 'mṛtāḥ
18.38.6	saptadaśa stomo bhavati
18.38.7	saptadaśaḥ prajāpatiḥ
18.38.8	prajāpater āptyai
18.38.9	ubhe sāmanī bhavataḥ
18.38.10	chandomayāv etat pakṣau yajamāna ātmānaṃ saṃskurute
18.38.11	etasya lokasya jityai
18.38.12	sa yad etena yajñakratunā yajate sūryācandramasor eva tat sāyujyaṃ salokatāṃ jayati
18.38.13	tena duraśaḥ
18.38.14	duraśa iva hy etayor devatayor lokaḥ
18.38.15	atha durṇāśena yakṣyamāṇo bhavati
18.38.16	sa upakalpayate 'naḍucchataṃ ca trayastriṃśataṃ ca niṣkān
18.38.17	tena haitenānaḍuho lokaṃ jayati
18.38.18	tena haitena jyotiṣmantaṃ lokaṃ jayati
18.38.19	tena haitena jyotiṣo 'dhi svargaṃ lokaṃ jayati
18.38.20	saptadaśa stomo bhavati
18.38.21	saptadaśaḥ prajāpatiḥ
18.38.22	prajāpater āptyai
18.38.23	ubhe sāmanī bhavataḥ
18.38.24	chandomayāv evaitat pakṣau yajamāna ātmānaṃ saṃskurute
18.38.25	etasya lokasya jityai

18.39.7	tasya caturviṃśo bahiṣpavamānas trivṛtpañcadaśāny ājyāni
18.39.8	tās tisro gāyatryaḥ
18.39.9	caturviṃśo mādhyaṃdinaḥ pavamānaḥ pañcadaśasaptadaśāni pṛṣṭhāni
18.39.10	te dve triṣṭubhau

18.40.1	indro 'kāmayatarṣabha iva paśūnām aiśvaryam ādhipatyaṃ rājyaṃ devānāṃ parīyām iti
18.40.2	sa etaṃ yajñakratum apaśyat tam āharat tenāyajata
18.40.3	tato vai sa ṛṣabha iva paśūnām aiśvaryam ādhipatyaṃ rājyaṃ devānāṃ paryait
18.40.4	yaḥ kāmayetarṣabha iva paśūnām aiśvaryam ādhipatyaṃ rājyaṃ samānānāṃ parīyām iti sa etena yajñakratunā yajeta
18.40.5	ṛṣabha iva paśūnām aiśvaryam ādhipatyaṃ rājyaṃ samānānāṃ paryeti
18.40.6	tasyātigrāhyo vṛṣā so aṃśuḥ pavate haviṣmānt soma indrasya bhāga ṛtayuḥ śatāyuḥ / sa mā vṛṣāṇaṃ vṛṣabhaṃ kṛṇotu priyaṃ viśāṃ sarvavīraṃ suvīram upayāmagṛhīto 'sīndrāya tvarṣabhāya juṣṭaṃ gṛhṇāmīti
18.40.7	parimṛjya sādayaty eṣa te yonir indrāya tvarṣabhāyeti
18.40.8	tasya pañcadaśasya sata ekaviṃśaṃ hotuḥ pṛṣṭhaṃ kakudo rūpam
18.40.9	indreṇa ha sma vai pūrve samājigamiṣanto vaniṣṭhusavena yajante tṛpto na indra āvirbhaviṣyati tasmai kāmān vakṣyāma iti vadantaḥ
18.40.10	vaniṣṭhusavena yakṣyamāṇo bhavati
18.40.11	sa upakalpayate śatam ukṣavehataḥ śataṃ dārvācitāni śataṃ sarpiṣpātrāñ chataṃ payaḥpātrāñ chataṃ dadhipātrāñ chataṃ vasāpātrān audumbarīṃ nāvam ubhayato'bhipatanāṃ parigṛhītām atha praṇetṝn
18.40.12	etenopak.lptena citrām āyatīm uparamati
18.40.13	atha citrayeti pūrvāgnim anvavasyaty uttapanīyaṃ śālīno 'nvāhāryapacanam āhitāgniḥ
18.40.14	athaitāni dārvācitāni pradoṣa evāgnāv ādadhāti
18.40.15	teṣu prajyotiṣūkṣavehato nighnanti
18.40.16	athaiṣām abhyardhān vaniṣṭhūn medāṃsīti śrapayanti
18.40.17	athodita āditya āyātayaty audumbarīṃ nāvam ubhayato'bhipatanāṃ parigṛhītāṃ praṇetṛbhiḥ
18.40.18	tasyām upastṛṇīte pañcāśatā sarpiṣpātraiḥ pañcāśatā payaḥpātraiḥ pañcāśatā dadhipātraiḥ pañcāśatā vasāpātraiḥ
18.40.19	tasyāṃ vaniṣṭhūn medāṃsīti saṃprakīryāthābhighārayati pañcāśatā vasāpātraiḥ pañcāśatā dadhipātraiḥ pañcāśatā payaḥpātraiḥ pañcāśatā sarpiṣpātraiḥ
18.40.20	atha puro'nuvākyām anvāha
18.41.1	indro yāto 'vasitasya rājā śamasya ca śṛṅgiṇo vajrabāhuḥ / sed u rājā kṣeti carṣaṇīnām arān na nemiḥ pari tā babhūveti
18.41.2	yajatīndro rājā jagataś carṣaṇīnām adhi kṣami viṣurūpaṃ yad asti / tato dadātu dāśuṣe vasūni codad rādha upastutaś cid arvāk svāheti
18.41.3	tṛpta evāsmā indra āvirbhavati

18.42.1	manur vaivasvato 'kāmayata prajāṃ sṛjeya prajām avarundhīya prajāṃ vindeyā mā prajayā cakṣīrann iti

18.42.4	yaḥ kāmayeta prajāṃ sṛjeya prajām avarundhīya prajāṃ vindeyā mā prajayā cakṣīrann iti sa etena yajñakratunā yajeta

18.42.8	sa etaṃ yajñakratum apaśyat tam āharat tenāyajata

18.42.10	yaḥ kāmayetānnādī me prajā syād annādyam avarundhītānnādyam asyāṃ pratitiṣṭhed iti sa etena yajñakratunā yajetānnādy evāsya prajā bhavaty annādyam avarunddhe 'nnādyam asyāṃ pratitiṣṭhati

18.44.17	sā tvā saṃvatsaraṃ kāmayamānānvacāriṣam
18.44.18	tāṃ mā jāyāṃ vindasveti
18.44.19	durupacārā ha vai bhavati devā iti hovāca
18.44.20	kā ta upacaryeti
18.44.21	śataṃ mamopasadaḥ syuḥ
18.44.22	śataṃśataṃ mā sarpiṣkumbhā aharahar āgaccheyus tadāśanā syām
18.44.23	na tvā nagnaṃ paśyeyam iti
18.44.24	sarvam evaitad bhagavati sukaram iti hovāca
18.44.25	kathā tv api jāyā patiṃ nagnaṃ na paśyatīti
18.44.26	antarvāsaṃ vasīthā iti hovācānagno bhaveti
18.44.27	tayā sahovāsāntarvāsaṃ vasānaḥ
18.44.28	sā ha sma jātāñjātān eva putrān apavidhyati
18.44.29	tāṃ ha rājovāca putrakāmā ha vai bhagavati vayaṃ manuṣyāḥ smo jātāñjātān u tvam apavidhyasīti
18.44.30	sā hovāca paryavetarātrayo bhavanti kṣīṇāyuṣo 'nye
18.44.31	bhūyaḥ priyaṃ karavāvahā iti
18.44.32	sāyuṃ cāmāvasuṃ ca janayāṃ cakāra
18.44.33	sā hovācemau bibhṛtemau sarvam āyur eṣyata iti
18.44.34	prāṅ āyuḥ pravavrāja
18.44.35	tasyaite kurupañcālāḥ kāśividehā iti
18.44.36	etad āyavaṃ pravrājam
18.44.37	pratyaṅ amāvasuḥ
18.44.38	tasyaite gāndhāraya sparśavo 'rāṭṭā iti
18.44.39	etad āmāvasavam
18.45.1	atho hāsyā eṣā pūrvacittir apsarā svasā babhūva
18.45.2	sā hekṣāṃ cakre jyog vai me svasā manuṣyeṣv avātsīd dhantainām acchāyānīti
18.45.3	tayā sahāgatyaiva saṃgamaṃ na lebhe
18.45.4	atho hāsyā aviyūtham upasthāpad āsa
18.45.5	evaṃ ha sma vai pūrvāsāṃ mahiṣīṇāṃ rūpaṃ bhavati
18.45.6	tad vṛkarūpaṃ kṛtvā pramāthaṃ cikāya
18.45.7	atho hāsyā uraṇaḥ kṣīrapa āsandīpāde baddha āsa
18.45.8	taṃ sā pramamātha
18.45.9	tasmin hriyamāṇe ruruve 'yam avīraja iti
18.45.10	tac chrutvā rājotpapāta
18.45.11	tām abhyānaśa tām abhyupeyāya
18.45.12	taṃ sā nakulī bhūtvā pratyupeyāya
18.45.13	tasya hāntarvāsam avalulopa
18.45.14	atha ha sā vidyutaṃ janayāṃ cakāra
18.45.15	taṃ sā vidyuti nagnam anucakhyau
18.45.16	atho ha rājājagāmāsvāruhaṃ vā aham ajīta uruṇam atyasāruhaṃhi nūnam iti pratyahaṃ prajahiṣyāmīti
18.45.17	kiṃ vyabhūd iti
18.45.18	nagnaṃ tvādarśam iti hovāca
18.45.19	tasyāṃ pravrajitāyām apriyaviddhaḥ śocaṃś cacāra
18.45.20	taṃ hovāca bṛhaspatir āṅgiraso hanta tvā śadena yājayiṣyāmyāpayitvā punar jinviṣyāmīti
18.45.21	taṃ śadena bṛhaspatir āṅgiraso yājayāṃ cakāra
18.45.22	tāṃ hāvabhṛthād evodetya pratidadarśa
18.45.23	tāṃ ha putrau pratītyocatur iha nau naya yatra te gatir balinau vāṃ pitaram aśuśuca iti
18.45.24	sā hovāca saṃ vāṃ putrakau janeya sāham iha tisra eva rātrīr vatsyāmi no brāhmaṇasya vaco mogham asad iti
18.45.25	tayā saha tisra eva rātrīr uvāsāntarvāsaṃ vasānaḥ
18.45.26	tasyāṃ retaḥ siṣice
18.45.27	sā hovāca katham idaṃ syād iti
18.45.28	kathaṃ hi nūnā3m iti rājā pratyuvāca
18.45.29	sā hovāca navāṃ kumbhīm āhareti
18.45.30	tasyām enan niḥṣiṣeca
18.45.31	atha ha kurukṣetre bisavatyo nāma puṣkariṇyaḥ
18.45.32	tāsām uttarārdhyā suvarṇasavanī
18.45.33	tasyām enan nicakhāna
18.45.34	tad aśvattho jajñe śamyā parivṛto retaso 'śvattha āśayāc chamī
18.45.35	eṣaiva śamīgarbhasya sṛṣṭir etan nidānam
18.45.36	atha vai bhavati
18.45.37	sarveṇa vai devāḥ suvargaṃ lokam āyann iti
18.45.38	sa yatra haitad yajño devebhyo 'dhi manuṣyān pratyavarurohāśvatthaṃ haiva tat pratyavaruroha
18.45.39	tasyāraṇī cakrire 'yaṃ vāva sa yajña iti
18.45.40	atho khalu ya eva kaścāśvatthaḥ sa śamīgarbhaḥ
18.45.41	sa yad āhorvaśy asy āyur asi purūravā ity eteṣām evaitat pitāputrāṇāṃ nāmāni gṛhṇāti
18.45.42	atho sāmānyam evaitad ūheta
18.45.43	tasyāṃ pravrajitāyāṃ punar evāpriyaviddhaḥ śocaṃś cacāra
18.45.44	taṃ hovāca bṛhaspatir āṅgiraso hanta tvaupaśadena yājayiṣyāmi vi vai te 'priyam evaiṣyatīti
18.45.45	tam aupaśadena bṛhaspatir āṅgiraso yājayāṃ cakāra
18.45.46	tato vai tasyāpriyaṃ vinināya
18.45.47	tau ha vā etau paurūravasau nāma śadaupaśadau
18.45.48	sa yo vittaṃ siṣādhayiṣet taṃ śadena yājayet
18.45.49	tasya daśasu bahiṣpavamānaḥ
18.45.50	ekaikopaśīyata aikaviṃśatyai sunotīhaiva
18.45.51	atha yo 'priyaṃ vininīṣet tam aupaśadena yājayet
18.45.52	tasyaikaviṃśatyāṃ bahiṣpavamānaḥ
18.45.53	ekaikāvaśīyata ā daśabhyaḥ
18.45.54	atha prājāpatyau nāma śadaupaśadau
18.45.55	tasya tisṛṣu bahiṣpavamānaḥ
18.45.56	tisrastisra upaśīyanta ā ṣaṭtriṃśataḥ
18.45.57	ṣaṭtriṃśatsu bahiṣpavamānaḥ
18.45.58	tisrastirso 'vaśīyanta ā tisṛbhyaḥ
18.45.59	atha naidhruvasya kaśyapasya śadaupaśadau
18.45.60	tasya catasṛṣu bahiṣpavamānaḥ
18.45.61	catasraścatasra upaśīyanta āṣṭācatvāriṃśataḥ
18.45.62	aṣṭācatvāriṃśatsu bahiṣpavamānaḥ
18.45.63	catasraścatasro 'vaśīyanta ā catasṛbhyaḥ
18.46.1	devāsurā ha yatra mahāsaṃgrāmaṃ saṃyetire tad dhemāni bhūtāni dvedhaiva vyapacakramur devān evānv anyāny asurān evānv anyāni
18.46.2	bṛhaspatir devānāṃ purohita āsīd uśanā kāvyo 'surāṇām
18.46.3	brahmaṇvanto devā āsan brahmaṇvanto 'surāḥ
18.46.4	te bahūn saṃgrāmān avijayamānā āsāṃ cakrire
18.46.5	teṣāṃ na katare cana bhaviṣyad ājajñuḥ
18.46.6	gandharvo haiva sūryavarcā bhaviṣyad ājajñe
18.46.7	tasyo hendro jāyāyā upahāsya āsa
18.46.8	tāṃ hovācāmuditāṅgi tvam idaṃ gandharvaṃ pṛccha kimartham idaṃ devāsurā na vijayantīti
18.46.9	taṃ tatheti hovāca tvam api śva āgacchatād iti
18.46.10	sa hāntaḥ samudre hiraṇmayyā nāvayā sahajāni kumārayāṃ cakre
18.46.11	atho hendra ājagāma
18.46.12	sa ha sauvarṇaḥ paṭaro bhūtvā naumaṇḍa upaśiśleṣa
18.46.13	taṃ hāgatam eva viditvā papracchāmuditāṅga tvam idaṃ brūhi kimartham idaṃ devāsurā na vijayantīti
18.46.14	moccair iti hovāca karṇinī vai naur āpa iti
18.46.15	brahmaṇvanto devā iti hovāca brahmaṇvanto 'surā iti
18.46.16	tac chrutvendro hariśukarūpaṃ kṛtvotpapāta
18.46.17	taṃ ha dṛṣṭvaivāha maghavan bho iti yatareṣāṃ haris te jeṣyantīti
18.46.18	sa ha gatvaivośanasaṃ kāvyam upamantrayāṃ cakre jayantyā ca duhitrā catasṛbhiś ca kāmadughābhiḥ
18.46.19	sa hājñapto 'surebhyo 'dhi devān upasamiyāya
18.46.20	tato ha vā etad devā asurān mahāsaṃgrāmaṃ jigyuḥ
18.47.1	sa ha gurur iva mene garam iva gīrtvā bahu vittam asurāṇāṃ pratigṛhya
18.47.2	sa hovāca gurur ivāsmi garam iva gīrtvā bahu vittam asurāṇāṃ pratigṛhya hanta mā yājayeti
18.47.3	taṃ dvādaśastomenāgniṣṭomena bṛhaspatir āṅgiraso yājayāṃ cakāra
18.47.4	tena heṣṭvordhvaṃ hiraṇyam ujjagāra
18.47.5	tad dha dṛṣṭvekṣāṃ cakre hantāham idam asurebhyo nirharāṇīti
18.47.6	tad dhendra ājñāyaiva śilāṃ cakāra
18.47.7	te ha vā eta auśanasā nāma kurukṣetre parvatagāḥ
18.47.8	sa ha laghur ivācarad apratiṣṭhitaḥ
18.47.9	sa hovāca laghur iva vā asmy apratiṣṭhitaḥ
18.47.10	hanta mā yājayeti
18.47.11	tam ekaviṃśatistomenāgniṣṭomena bṛhaspatir āṅgiraso yājayāṃ cakāra
18.47.12	tato vai sa pratitasthau
18.47.13	atho hendraḥ kāmadughā avarurudhe
18.47.14	taṃ ha sāyam etam uvāca prātar etād iti
18.47.15	prātar etam uvāca sāyam etād iti
18.47.16	sa evam eva saṃvatsaraṃ nenīyāmāsa
18.47.17	sa hovāca prātar etād iti
18.47.18	mā sāyam āttha sāyam etād iti
18.47.19	mā prātar āttha ko 'yam etaḥ katamo 'yam etaḥ
18.47.20	yam enam etaṃ maghavan bravīṣīti hoktvā pravavrāja
18.47.21	atho hendra ukthāni kāmadughāś cakāra
18.47.22	tāṃ ha sa varuṇāya pradadāv idaṃ tava mama cedam amuṣya ca nau saheti
18.47.23	bṛhaspataya āṅgirasāyedaṃ nāv ākhyās tā vidhārayānāvahasyedamajyasīti viṣṇave śipiviṣṭāya ceti
18.47.24	eṣaivokthānāṃ sṛṣṭir etan nidānam
18.47.25	atho hāsyaiva manur vaivasvataḥ śūnyamānaḥ san sakhāsa
18.47.26	tasmai caturthīṃ pradadau
18.47.27	tāṃ so 'syāṃ nyadadhāt
18.47.28	seyaṃ kṛṣṭir eva
18.47.29	eṣa kṛṣṭeḥ sṛṣṭir etan nidānam
18.47.30	tau ha vā etāv auśanasau nāma punastomau bhavataḥ
18.47.31	sa yo gurur iva manyeta garam iva gīrtvāyājyaṃ vā yājayitvāpratigrāhyasya vā pratigṛhya taṃ dvādaśastomenāgniṣṭomena yājayet
18.47.32	aśnute haiva laghutām
18.47.33	atha yo laghur iva cared apratiṣṭhitas tam ekaviṃśatistomenāgniṣṭomena yājayet
18.47.34	praty eva tiṣṭhati
18.48.1	atha praṇodaḥ
18.48.2	samānam abhicaraṇīyam
18.48.3	prātaḥsavanīyān anuvartate 'gnaye pravate puroḍāśo 'ṣṭākapālaḥ
18.48.4	trivṛd eṣa bhavati
18.48.5	atha vibādhaḥ
18.48.6	samānam abhicaraṇīyaṃ śilpam
18.48.7	mādhyaṃdinīyān anuvartate 'gnaye vibādhavate puroḍāśo 'ṣṭākapālaḥ
18.48.8	trivṛd evaiṣa bhavati
18.48.9	atha pratinodaḥ
18.48.10	samānam abhicaraṇīyaṃ śilpam
18.48.11	tṛtīyasavanīyān anuvartate 'gnaye pratīkavate puroḍāśo 'ṣṭākapālaḥ
18.48.12	trivṛd evaiṣa bhavati
18.48.13	athāgner ativyādhaḥ
18.48.14	samānam abhicaraṇīyaṃ śilpam
18.48.15	anūbandhyasya paśupuroḍāśam anuvartate 'gnaye vasumate puroḍāśo 'ṣṭākapālaḥ

18.48.18	samānam abhicaraṇīyaṃ śilpam
18.48.19	pañcadaśa eṣa bhavati
18.48.20	śunaskarṇo ha vai śaivyo rājā puṇyakṛd bahuyājy āsa
18.48.21	sa ha pāpīyāñ janatāṃ pratihitāṃ pratikhyāyartvijaḥ papracchāsti svit sa yajñakratur yenāham iṣṭvaiva prayāyām iti
18.48.22	asti hīti hainam ṛtvijaḥ pratyūcuḥ
18.48.23	tasmā adhvaryur ayonīn apurorukkān grahān jagrāha
18.48.24	svarāṇy udgātā sāmāny anaiḍāny anidhanāni
18.48.25	parāṅ evargmiyaṃ hotānuvāca
18.48.26	sa hāvabhṛthād evodetya mamāra
18.48.27	yaṃ dviṣyāt tasyaivaṃ yajñaṃ kuryād upasṛtaṃ vā yājayet
18.48.28	kṣipraṃ haivāsmāl lokāt praiti
18.48.29	atha rāśimarāyāv ity ācakṣate
18.48.30	catuṣṭome rāśikṛtaṃ dhānyaṃ dadāti
18.48.31	sa rāśiḥ
18.48.32	catuṣṭoma eva marāyakṛtam
18.48.33	sa marāyaḥ
18.48.34	athāñjanābhyañjanāv ity ācakṣate
18.48.35	āktākṣā alaṃkṛtā ṛtvijaḥ pracaranti
18.48.36	sa āñjanaḥ
18.48.37	abhyaktāḥ śāmūlavāsasaḥ
18.48.38	so 'bhyañjanaḥ
18.48.39	atha viṣūcīnaśālo bhrātṛvyavato yajñaḥ
18.48.40	sa tathā devayajanaṃ joṣayate yathā prācīnam āhavanīyāt pravaṇaṃ syāt pratīcīnaṃ gārhapatyād iti
18.48.41	tad ete viṣūcīnaśāle māpayanti
18.48.42	pracaranti prāñcaḥ pratyañcaḥ pracaranti
18.48.43	madhye gārhapatyo bhavati

18.48.45	anudiśaṃ stomau syātām ity etad ekam
18.48.46	ekaviṃśau syātām ity etad ekam
18.48.47	anādṛtya tac catuṣṭomāv eva kurvanti
18.49.1	devāsurā ha yatra mahāsaṃgrāmaṃ saṃyetire tad dha śibir auśīnaro devānāṃ vargād asurān jigāya
18.49.2	tasyo hendro jitavaraṃ dadau
18.49.3	sa hovāca śibiṃ naiṣṭhyaṃ bhayaṃ na gacched iti
18.49.4	taṃ varṣiṣṭhīyaprasthe sarvatomukhena yājayāṃ cakāra
18.49.5	tato ha vā etac chibiṃ naiṣṭhyaṃ bhayaṃ na gacchati
18.49.6	yaṃ kāmayetānapajayyaṃ jayed iti taṃ varṣiṣṭhīyaprasthe sarvatomukhena yājayet
18.49.7	anapajayyam eva jayati
18.49.8	tad etāś catasraḥ śālā anudiśaṃ māpayanti
18.49.9	pracaranti prāñcaḥ pracaranti dakṣiṇā pracaranti pratyañca udañcaḥ pracaranti
18.49.10	madhye gārhapatyo bhavati
18.49.11	madhyata āsīnāyāśvatarīrathair bhakṣān saṃvahanti
18.49.12	anudiśaṃ stomāḥ syur ity etad ekam
18.49.13	ekaviṃśāḥ syur ity etad ekam

18.49.15	pārthaḥ
18.49.16	pārthī ha sthapatir devān aipsat

18.49.18	sa ha devān āpa
