18.50.1	yamābhyāṃ stomābhyāṃ yakṣyamāṇo bhavati
18.50.2	sa tathā devayajanaṃ joṣayate yathāntareṇa cātvālotkarāv udaksaṃcarī syād iti
18.50.3	tad ete prabāhuk śāle māpayanti
18.50.4	sa dakṣiṇārdhyāṃ śālām adhyavasāya mathitvāgnīn vihṛtya dīkṣaṇīyām iṣṭiṃ nirvapati
18.50.5	athottarārdhyāṃ śālām adhyavasāya mathitvāgnīn vihṛtya dīkṣaṇīyām iṣṭiṃ nirvapati
18.50.6	tayeha pracaryāthāmutra pracarati
18.50.7	iha dīkṣāhutīr juhoty athāmutra
18.50.8	iha prāyaṇīyām iṣṭiṃ nirvapaty athāmutra
18.50.9	tayeha pracaryāthāmutra pracarati
18.50.10	iha padena caritvā rājānaṃ krītvohyātithyaṃ nirvapaty athāmutra
18.50.11	teneha pracaryāthāmutra pracarati
18.50.12	iha prathamābhyāṃ pravargyopasadbhyāṃ pracaraty athāmutra
18.50.13	iha madhyamābhyāṃ pravargyopasadbhyāṃ pracaraty athāmutra
18.50.14	iha mahāvedyai pūrvaṃ parigrāhaṃ parigṛhṇāty athāmutra
18.50.15	ihottamābhyāṃ pravargyopasadbhyāṃ pracaraty athāmutra
18.50.16	ihāhavanīyaṃ praṇayaty athāmutra
18.50.17	iha sadohavirdhāne saṃminoty athāmutra
18.50.18	ihāgnīṣomau praṇayaty athāmutra
18.50.19	iha yūpasyāvṛtā yūpam ucchrayati svarvantaṃ yūpam utsṛjyāgnīṣomīyaṃ paśum upākaroty athāmutra
18.50.20	tasyeha prasiddhaṃ vapayā caritvā vasatīvarīr gṛhṇāty athāmutra
18.50.21	iha paśupuroḍāśaṃ nirvapaty athāmutra
18.50.22	teneha pracaryāthamutra pracarati
18.50.23	ihāgnīṣomīyeṇa pracaraty athāmutra
18.50.24	iha vasatīvarīḥ parihṛtya payāṃsi viśiṣyopavasanty athāmutra
18.50.25	iha tv eva saṃviśanti
18.50.26	iha rājānam upāvahṛtya prātaranuvākam upākaroty athāmutra
18.50.27	ihānupūrvaṃ savanāni saṃtiṣṭhanta ā samuditāt
18.50.28	evam evottarasyāṃ śālāyāṃ savanāni saṃtiṣṭhanta ā samuditāt
18.50.29	ihāvabhṛthena pracaraty athāmutra
18.50.30	ihodayanīyām iṣṭiṃ nirvapaty athāmutra
18.50.31	tayeha pracaryāthāmutra pracarati
18.50.32	ihaiva maitrāvaruṇīṃ vaśām upākaroty athāmutra
18.50.33	tayeha pracaryāthāmutra pracarati
18.50.34	samāny udavasanīyeṣṭiḥ
18.50.35	atha yat prāk savanebhyo 'dhi vyatiṣaktāni karmāṇi kriyante tasmād yamāv antar udare vyatiṣaktau saha śayāte
18.50.36	atha yad anupūrvaṃ savanāni saṃtiṣṭhante tasmād anupūrvau jāyete
18.50.37	atha yad ūrdhvaṃ savanebhyo 'dhi vyatiṣaktāni karmāṇi kriyante tasmāt sahāśayanti saha pāyayanti saha carataḥ
18.50.38	atha yat samāny araṇis tasmāt samānī yonir
18.50.39	agniś ca ha vā ādityaś ca samānalokaṃ jigīṣamāṇāv etaṃ yajñakratum apaśyatāṃ tam āharatāṃ tenāyajetām
18.50.40	tato vai tau samānalokāv abhavatāṃ samānaṃ lokam aitām
18.50.41	yaḥ kāmayetāgneś cādityasya ca samānaṃ lokam iyām iti sa etena yajñakratunā yajeta
18.50.42	agniś caivādityasya ca samānaṃ lokam eti
18.51.1	vājayājī ha vā anyo bhavaty anya u vājapeyayāji
18.51.2	eṣa ha vai vājayājī yaḥ peyair aniṣṭvātha vājena yajata eṣa u vājapeyayājī yaḥ peyair iṣṭvātha vājena yajate
18.51.3	tasmād u peyair eveṣṭvātha vājena yajeta
18.51.4	peyair yakṣyamāṇo bhavati
18.51.5	so 'niṣṭvaiva paurṇamāsīṃ dīkṣate
18.51.6	tasyāparimitā dīkṣā dvādaśopasadaḥ
18.51.7	sa tathā rājānaṃ krīṇāti yathā manyate 'māvāsyāyai me yajñiye 'han sutyā saṃpatsyata iti
18.51.8	tasya tathā saṃpadyate
18.51.9	prasiddhena karmaṇopavasathād eti
18.51.10	atha vasatīvarīḥ parihṛtya payāṃsi viśiṣyopavasanti
18.51.11	athaitāṃ savaneṣṭiṃ nirvapaty āgneyam aṣṭākapālam aindram ekādaśakapālaṃ vaiśvadevaṃ dvādaśakapālam
18.51.12	tayā dvādaśāhāni yajate
18.51.13	atha trayodaśe 'hni paurṇamāsena haviṣā yajate yenāsyāniṣṭaṃ bhavati
18.51.14	atha caturdaśe 'hany āmāvāsyena haviṣā yajate yenāsyāniṣṭaṃ bhavati
18.51.15	athaiteṣāṃ yajñakratūnām ekena yajate
18.51.16	atha punar dīkṣate
18.51.17	sa evam eva saṃvatsaraṃ yajate
18.51.18	tasyāhāni trivṛtpañcadaśo 'tha trivṛtsaptadaśo 'tha trivṛdekaviṃśo 'tha trivṛttriṇavo 'tha trivṛttrayastriṃśo 'tha trivṛccatuṣṭomaḥ
18.51.19	māsānām eva rūpaṃ peyāḥ
18.51.20	saṃvatsarasya rūpaṃ vājaḥ
18.51.21	evam asyaiṣa saṃvatsaraḥ parīṣṭa evam āpto bhavati
18.51.22	athāhīnavidhiḥ
18.51.23	tasyāhāni trivṛt pañcadaśaḥ saptadaśaś catuṣṭomas trivṛd evāthaikaviṃśo 'tha triṇavo 'tha catuṣṭomas trivṛd evātha trayastriṃśo 'tha catuṣṭomas trivṛd evātha catuścatvāriṃśo 'tha catuṣṭomo 'thātirātraḥ
18.51.24	dvādaśa māsāḥ saptadaśa kratavaḥ
18.51.25	navasu māseṣu nava kratūn upaiti
18.51.26	athātiśiṣyante trayaś ca māsā aṣṭau ca kratavaḥ
18.51.27	sa dvau trirātrau kuruta ekaṃ ca dvirātram
18.51.28	yady u vā etad upātyeti catuṣṭomenāgniṣṭomena yajeta
18.51.29	māsānām eva rūpaṃ stutaśastrāṇi saṃvatsarasya rūpam agniṣṭomo vājaḥ
18.51.30	evam asyaiṣa saṃvatsaraḥ parīṣṭa evam āpto bhavati
18.51.31	athāto 'yujaś caiva yugmāś ca
18.51.32	ekasyāṃ stuvate 'tha tisṛṣv iti nv ayujaḥ
18.51.33	atha yugmāḥ
18.51.34	catusṛṣu stuvate 'thāṣṭāsv iti yugmāḥ
18.51.35	ayujāṃ caiva yugmānāṃ caiva sāyujyaṃ salokatām āpnuvanti ya etenāyanena yanti ya u cainad evaṃ viduḥ
18.52.1	athāto diśām eva
18.52.2	trivṛt prācyai
18.52.3	pañcadaśo dakṣiṇāyai
18.52.4	saptadaśaḥ pratīcyai
18.52.5	ekaviṃśa udīcyai
18.52.6	triṇava ita ūrdhvāyai
18.52.7	trayastriṃśo 'muto 'vācyai
18.52.8	sarvāsām eva catuṣṭomaḥ
18.52.9	diśām eva sāyujyaṃ salokatām āpnuvanti ya etenāyanena yanti ya u cainad evaṃ viduḥ
18.52.10	athāta ṛtūnām eva
18.52.11	trivṛd vasantasya
18.52.12	pañcadaśo grīṣmasya
18.52.13	saptadaśo varṣāṇām
18.52.14	ekaviṃśaḥ śaradaḥ
18.52.15	triṇavo hemantasya
18.52.16	trayastriṃśaḥ śiśirasya
18.52.17	sarveṣām eva catuṣṭomaḥ
18.52.18	ṛtūnām eva sāyujyaṃ salokatām āpnuvanti ya etenāyanena yanti ya u cainad evaṃ viduḥ
18.52.19	athāta ṛṣīṇām eva
18.52.20	trivṛd vasiṣṭhasya
18.52.21	pañcadaśo bharadvājasya
18.52.22	saptadaśo viśvāmitrasya
18.52.23	ekaviṃśo jamadagneḥ
18.52.24	triṇavaḥ kaśyapasya
18.52.25	trayastriṃśo gautamasya
18.52.26	agastyasya catuṣṭomaḥ
18.52.27	sarveṣām eva catuṣṭomaḥ
18.52.28	ṛṣīṇām eva sāyujyaṃ salokatām āpnuvanti ya etenāyanena yanti ya u cainad evaṃ viduḥ
18.52.29	athāto devatānām eva
18.52.30	trivṛd agneḥ
18.52.31	pañcadaśa indrasya
18.52.32	saptadaśaḥ prajāpateḥ
18.52.33	ekaviṃśo 'muṣya tapataḥ
18.52.34	triṇavaś candramasaḥ
18.52.35	trayastriṃśo viśveṣāṃ devānām
18.52.36	sarvāsām eva catuṣṭomaḥ
18.52.37	devatānām eva sāyujyaṃ salokatām āpnuvanti ya etenāyanena yanti ya u cainad evaṃ viduḥ
18.53.1	athāto darśapūrṇamāsayor ayanam ity ācakṣate
18.53.2	sūryācandramasor ayanam ity eka āhuḥ
18.53.3	paurṇamāsena somena yakṣyamāṇo bhavati
18.53.4	dīkṣate
18.53.5	tasyāparimitā dīkṣāḥ ṣaḍ upasadaḥ
18.53.6	sa tathā rājānaṃ krīṇāti yathā manyate paurṇamāsyai me yajñiye 'han sutyā saṃpatsyata iti
18.53.7	tasya tathā saṃpadyate
18.53.8	prasiddhena karmaṇopavasathād eti
18.53.9	atha vasatīvarīḥ parihṛtya payāṃsi viśiṣyopavasanti
18.53.10	atha prātar āgneyaṃ paśum upākaroti
18.53.11	tasyāgnīṣomīya upālambhyo bhavati
18.53.12	tasya prātaḥsavanīyān anuvartante paurṇamāsahavīṃṣi
18.53.13	praiṣavantaḥ savanīyā anubrūhi yajetītareṣāṃ haviṣām
18.53.14	ṛjudhā jyotir ukthyaḥ saṃtiṣṭhate
18.53.15	āmāvāsyena somena yakṣyamāṇo bhavati
18.53.16	dīkṣate
18.53.17	tasyāparimitā dīkṣā dvādaśopasadaḥ
18.53.18	sa tathā rājānaṃ krīṇāti yathā manyate 'māvāsyāyai me yajñiye 'han sutyā saṃpatsyata iti
18.53.19	tasya tathā saṃpadyate
18.53.20	prasiddhena karmaṇopavasathād eti
18.53.21	athāsyaitad ahar indrāya vatsā apākṛtā bhavanti
18.53.22	aindraṃ payo dohayati sāṃnāyyasya vāvṛtā tūṣṇīṃ vā
18.53.23	atha vasatīvarīḥ parihṛtya payāṃsi viśiṣyopavasanti
18.53.24	atha prātar āgneyaṃ paśum upākaroti
18.53.25	tasyaindra ṛṣabha upālambhyo bhavati
18.53.26	tasya prātaḥsavanīyān anuvartanta āmāvāsyāni havīṃṣi
18.53.27	praiṣavantaḥ savanīyā anubrūhi yajetītareṣāṃ haviṣām
18.53.28	ṛjudhā jyotir atirātraḥ saṃtiṣṭhate
18.53.29	sūryācandramasayor eva tat sāyujyaṃ salokatām āpnuvanti ya etenāyanena yanti ya u cainad evaṃ vidur ya u cainad evaṃ viduḥ
19.1.1	sāvitraṃ svargakāmaś cinvīta
19.1.2	paśubandhe cec cīyate ṣaḍḍhotāraṃ hutvā yūpāhutiṃ hutvā yūpaṃ sayajuṣaṃ kṛtvā vediṃ vimimīte
19.1.3	veditṛtīye yajeteti vijñāyate
19.1.4	tasyāḥ saumikaṃ mānam etāvad eva nānā
19.1.5	saumikāt prakramāt tṛtīyo 'ṃśaḥ prakramaḥ syāt tena vediṃ vimimīte
19.1.6	api vā padākṣṇayā pārśvamānī padaṃ tiraḥ paśumānena tayor yaḥ karṇasaṃmitaḥ prakramaḥ sa iṣyate
19.1.7	padād vā navamas tadakṣṇayā tayos tu yaḥ karṇasaṃmitaḥ sa prakramārthas tena meyā saumikī vediḥ
19.1.8	agnīn anvādadhyād vratam upeyād idhmābarhiḥ saṃnahya stambayajur harati
19.1.9	idam eva prasiddhaṃ pauroḍāśikam
19.1.10	trir yajuṣā tūṣṇīṃ caturthaṃ
19.1.11	pūrvaṃ parigrāhaṃ parigṛhṇāti
19.1.12	karaṇaṃ japati
19.1.13	uddhanti
19.1.14	uddhatād āgnīdhras trir harati
19.1.15	yad āgnīdhras trir haraty athaitam agniṃ pratyañcaṃ yūpāvaṭīyāc chaṅkor vimimīte
19.1.16	pakṣaḥsaṃmitaś cetavya iti rathacakramātra evaiṣa ukto bhavati
19.1.17	athāpy udāharanti dvyaratniḥ prathamaṃ cakraṃ dvau sārdhau madhyamaṃ tribhāgonās traya uttamam iti
19.1.18	teṣām anyatamamātrīṃ rajjum ubhayataḥpāśāṃ kṛtvottaravedideśasya madhye śaṅkuṃ nihatya tasmin pāśau pratimucya tasminn ante 'nyaṃ śaṅkuṃ prāsya tenainaṃ pradakṣiṇaṃ parimaṇḍalaṃ parilikhati
19.1.19	apoddhṛtya spandyāṃ karṣūḥ khānayanti
19.1.20	ucchrayanty apasyāḥ
19.1.21	dakṣiṇataś ca paścāc ca varṣīyasīḥ kurvanti
19.1.22	atha yācaty ājyasthālīṃ sasruvāṃ sphyaṃ darbhastambam udapātram auttaravedikāṃś ca saṃbhārān dadhi madhumiśraṃ hiraṇyaṃ ca śarkarāḥ sikatāś ca darbhān iti
19.1.23	etat samādāyottarārdhe saṃsādayanti
19.1.24	atha dvābhyām ātmany agniṃ gṛhṇīte mayi gṛhṇāmy agre agniṃ yo no agnir iti
19.1.25	svayaṃcitiṃ japati yās te agne samidho yāni dhāmeti
19.1.26	śvetam aśvam abhimṛśyāntaḥśarkaram imām upadadhāti prajāpatis tvā sādayatu tayā devatayāṅgirasvad dhruvā sīdeti
19.1.27	atha śaṅkum udvṛhyodapātram upaninīya darbhastambam upadadhāti vāk tvā samudra upadadhātv iti vā tūṣnīṃ vā
19.1.28	athainaṃ sruvāhutibhir abhijuhoti sajūr abdo 'yāvabhir iti pañcabhiḥ
19.1.29	tayādevataṃ kṛtvā sūdadohasaṃ karoti
19.2.1	atha cātvālasyāvṛtā cātvālaṃ parilikhati
19.2.2	uttaraveder āvṛtottaravediṃ nivapati
19.2.3	uttaranābhim utsādya yūpāvaṭaṃ khātvā prokṣya vyāghāryālaṅkṛtya sikatā nivapaty agne tava śravo vaya iti ṣaḍbhir anucchandasam
19.2.4	athordhvacita upadadhāti cita stha paricita ūrdhvacitaḥ śrayadhvaṃ tayā devatayāṅgirasvad dhruvāḥ sīdateti
19.2.5	athānuvyūhaty āpyāyasveti gāyatryā brāhmaṇasya saṃ te payāṃsīti triṣṭubhā rājanyasya
19.2.6	yathāsuṣṭhu yathāśarkaram anuvyūhati
19.2.7	tasyāṃ nava parimaṇḍalā lekhā likhati
19.2.8	atha dadhnā madhumiśreṇa śarkarāḥ samajya sāyamagnihotraṃ hutvāgnīn paristīryopavasati
19.2.9	atha prātar hute 'gnihotre yācaty udapātraṃ bhasma purīṣam ūṣān sikatā yāvad uttamam aṅgulikāṇḍaṃ yajñaparuṣā saṃmitaṃ tāvan mātrīḥ pañcāśītiśataṃ hiraṇyeṣṭakāḥ śarkarā vā ghṛtāktās tāvatyo lokaṃpṛṇā aparimitā vā catasraḥ svayamātṛṇṇāḥ sahasraṃ hiraṇyaśalkān ūrdhvaṃ tribhyaḥ
19.2.10	aparimitān ity eka āhuḥ
19.2.11	te yadi sahasraṃ bhavanti dvedve śate pattranāḍīṣv ote bhavataḥ
19.2.12	athodita āditye dvābhyām ātmany agniṃ gṛhṇīte mayi gṛhṇāmy agre agniṃ yo no agnir iti
19.2.13	svayaṃcitiṃ japati yās te agne samidho yāni dhāmeti
19.2.14	śvetam aśvam abhimṛśyādhidravaṇaṃ japaty apām idaṃ nyayanaṃ namas ta iti dvābhyām
19.2.15	athāparārdha udapātram upadadhāti vāk tvā samudra upadadhe suprajāvaniṃ rāyaspoṣavaniṃ mahyaṃ yajamānāyeti
19.2.16	tayādevataṃ kṛtvā sūdadohasaṃ karoti
19.2.17	atha saṃbhārān nivapaty agner bhasmāsīti bhasmāgneḥ purīṣam asīti purīṣaṃ saṃjñānam asi kāmadharaṇam ity ūṣān mayi te kāmadharaṇaṃ bhūyād iti sikatāḥ
19.2.18	athainān saṃprayauti saṃ yā vaḥ priyās tanuvaḥ saṃ priyā hṛdayāni vaḥ / ātmā vo astu saṃpriyaḥ saṃ priyās tanuvo mameti
19.2.19	athainān kalpayati kalpetāṃ dyāvāpṛthivī kalpantām āpa oṣadhīḥ / kalpantām agnayaḥ pṛthak mama jyaiṣṭhyāya savratā iti
19.2.20	tāṃs tathā kalpayati yathā na lekhāḥ saṃlopayante
19.2.21	sadyo vā sarvaṃ kriyate sadyaskāle
19.3.1	athāntamāyāṃ lekhāyāṃ pūrvapakṣasya dineṣṭakā upadadhāti saṃjñānaṃ tayā devatayāṅgirasvad dhruvā sīda vijñānaṃ tayā devatayāṅgirasvad dhruvā sīdeti pañcadaśa
19.3.2	tāsām antarāleṣv eteṣām eva dinānāṃ muhūrteṣṭakā upadadhāti citras tayā devatayāṅgirasvad dhruvā sīda ketus tayā devatayāṅgirasvad dhruvā sīdeti pañcadaśa
19.3.3	sarvāsāṃ pāre sūdadohasaḥ karoti
19.3.4	athābhyantarāyāṃ lekhāyāṃ pūrvapakṣasya kṣapeṣṭakā upadadhāti darśā tayā devatayāṅgirasvad dhruvā sīda dṛṣṭā tayā devatayāṅgirasvad dhruvā sīdeti pañcadaśa
19.3.5	tāsām antarāleṣv etāsām eva kṣapāṇāṃ muhūrteṣṭakā upadadhāti dātā tayā devatayāṅgirasvad dhruvā sīda pradātā tayā devatayāṅgirasvad dhruvā sīdeti pañcadaśa
19.3.6	sarvāsāṃ pāre sūdadohasaḥ karoti
19.3.7	athābhy antarāyāṃ lekhāyām aparapakṣasya dineṣṭakā upadadhāti prastutaṃ tayā devatayāṅgirasvad dhruvā sīda viṣṭutaṃ tayā devatayāṅgirasvad dhruvā sīdeti pañcadśa
19.3.8	tāsām antarāleṣv eteṣām eva dinānāṃ muhūrteṣṭakā upadadhāti savitā tayā devatayāṅgirasvad dhruvā sīda prasavitā tayā devatayāṅgirasvad dhruvā sīdeti pañcadaśa
19.3.9	sarvāsāṃ pāre sūdadohasaḥ karoti
19.3.10	athābhyantarāyāṃ lekhāyām aparapakṣasya kṣapeṣṭakā upadadhāti sutā tayā devatayāṅgirasvad dhruvā sīda sunvatī tayā devatayāṅgirasvad dhruvā sīdeti pañcadaśa
19.3.11	tāsām antarāleṣv etāsām eva kṣapāṇāṃ muhūrteṣṭakā upadadhāty abhiśāstā tayā devatayāṅgirasvad dhruvā sīdānumantā tayā devatayāṅgirasvad dhruvā sīdeti pañcadaśa
19.3.12	sarvāsāṃ pāre sūdadohasaḥ karoti
19.3.13	athābhyantarāyāṃ lekhāyāṃ pūrvapakṣeṣṭakā upadadhāti pavitraṃ tayā devatayāṅgirasvad dhruvā sīda pavayiṣyaṃs tayā devatayāṅgirasvad dhruvā sīdeti dvādaśa
19.3.14	sarvāsāṃ pāre sūdadohasaḥ karoti
19.3.15	athābhyantarāyāṃ lekhāyām aparapakṣeṣṭakā upadadhāti sahasvāṃs tayā devatayāṅgirasvad dhruvā sīda sahīyāṃs tayā devatayāṅgirasvad dhruvā sīdeti dvādaśa
19.3.16	sarvāsāṃ pāre sūdadohasaḥ karoti
19.3.17	athābhyantarāyāṃ lekhāyāṃ māseṣṭakā upadadhāty aruṇas tayā devatayāṅgirasvad dhruvā sīdāruṇarajās tayā devatayāṅgirasvad dhruvā sīdeti trayodaśa
19.3.18	sarvāsāṃ pāre sūdadohasaḥ karoti
19.3.19	athātraike lekhāntarāleṣu sikatā nivapanty ejatkā jovatkā iti
19.3.20	athābhyantarāyāṃ lekhāyāṃ muhūrtānāṃ muhūrteṣṭakā upadadhātīdānīṃ tayā devatayāṅgirasvad dhruvā sīda tadānīṃ tayā devatayāṅgirasvad dhruvā sīdeti pañcadaśa
19.3.21	sarvāsāṃ pāre sūdadohasaḥ karoti
19.3.22	athābhy antarāyāṃ lekhāyāṃ kratviṣṭakāś cartviṣṭakāś copadadhāty agniṣṭomas tayā devatayāṅgirasvad dhruvā sīdokthyas tayā devatayāṅgirasvad dhruvā sīdeti ṣaṭ
19.3.23	agnir ṛtus tayā devatayāṅgirasvad dhruvā sīda sūrya ṛtus tayā devatayāṅgirasvad dhruvā sīdeti tisraḥ
19.3.24	sarvāsāṃ pāre sūdadohasaḥ karoti
19.3.25	atha madhye nābhyāṃ saṃvatsareṣṭakā upadadhāti prajāpatis tayā devatayāṅgirasvad dhruvā sīda saṃvatsaras tayā devatayāṅgirasvad dhruvā sīdeti catasraḥ
19.3.26	sarvāsāṃ pāre sūdadohasaḥ karoti
19.4.1	tad etāś catasraḥ svayamātṛṇṇā yācati
19.4.2	tā dikṣūpadadhāti bhūr agniṃ ca pṛthivīṃ ceti purastād bhuvo vāyuṃ cāntarikṣaṃ ceti dakṣiṇataḥ svar ādityaṃ ca divaṃ ceti paścād bhūr bhuvaḥ svaś candramasaṃ ca diśaś cety uttarataḥ
19.4.3	sarvāsāṃ pāre sūdadohasaḥ karoti
19.4.4	atha lokaṃpṛṇā upadadhāti lokaṃ pṛṇa chidraṃ pṛṇātho sīda śivā tvam / indrāgnī tvā bṛhaspatir asmin yonāv asīṣadann iti
19.4.5	tayādevataṃ karoti tayā devatayāṅgirasvad dhruvā sīdeti
19.4.6	atha sūdadohasaṃ karoti tā asya sūdadohasaḥ somaṃ śrīṇanti pṛśnayaḥ / janman devānāṃ viśas triṣv ā rocane diva iti
19.4.7	prācyātra lokaṃpṛṇayā prasauty agniṃ prācībhiḥ saṃpracchādayanti
19.4.8	saṃpracchannaṃ palāśaśākhayā parikraṣati lokaṃ pṛṇa chidraṃ pṛṇeti
19.4.9	athānabhimṛṣṭaṃ citik.lptyā bhavati
19.4.10	athāgnim abhimṛśati yat te 'citaṃ yad u citaṃ te agna iti dvābhyām
19.4.11	atra citik.lptyābhimṛśati cittim acittiṃ cinavad vi vidvān iti
19.4.12	agne devāṃ ihāvahety āgneyyā gāyatryaitāṃ citim abhimṛśya dve avadravaṇe japati vāṅ ma āsan prāṇadā iti
19.4.13	atha kṛṣṇam aśvam abhimṛśya tanupurīṣam upadadhāti pṛṣṭo divīti
19.4.14	tayādevataṃ kṛtvā sūdadohasaṃ karoti
19.4.15	atha pātryām apa ānīya hiraṇyaśalakān saṃprakīrya dvābhyāṃdvābhyāṃ śatābhyāṃ prokṣati sahasrasya pramā asīti purastāt sahasrasya pratimā asīti dakṣiṇataḥ sahasrasya vimā asīti paścāt sahasrasyonmā asīty uttarataḥ
19.4.16	atha madhyaṃ dvābhyāṃ śatābhyāṃ prokṣati sāhasro 'si sahasrāya tveti
19.4.17	athottarārdhe tiṣṭhann iṣṭakā dhenūḥ kuruta imā me agna iṣṭakā dhenavaḥ santv ity āntād anuvākasya
19.4.18	atraike 'rkaparṇenājakṣīreṇa caramāyām iṣṭakāyāṃ juhvati
19.4.19	sa yady u hainam kariṣyan bhavaty athaitasyārkaparṇasya puṭam antaravasrāviṇaṃ kṛtvodaṅ tiṣṭhan mukhadaghne dhārayann āhāharānayeti
19.4.20	sa yatra dhāreṣṭakāṃ prāpnoti tat pratipadyate tvam agne rudra ity āntād anuvākasya
19.4.21	atraitad arkaparṇaṃ yaṃ dveṣṭi tasya saṃcare paśūnāṃ nyasyati
19.4.22	yady u vai na dveṣṭy ākhvavaṭe nyasyati
19.4.23	athainam upatiṣṭhate tvam eva tvāṃ vettha yo 'si so 'sīty etenānuvākena
19.4.24	atha saṃhāravihārābhyām upatiṣṭhate saṃvatsaro 'si parivatsaro 'sīty etenānuvākena
19.4.25	athāha hotar agner ukthenāgnim anuśaṃseti
19.4.26	yadi hotā na kāmayate yajamāna eva jaghanenāgniṃ tṛṇāni saṃstīrya teṣūpaviśyāgner ukthenāgnim anuśaṃsati
19.4.27	bhūr bhuvaḥ svar ity etābhyām ṛgbhyāṃ tristrir ekaikām anvāha praṇavenābhisaṃdhānam evam anyatrāpy ṛgupasaṃdhāne praṇavenaivābhisaṃdhānam
19.4.28	atra ye brāhmaṇā bahuvidas tebhyo yad dakṣiṇā na nayed duriṣṭaṃ syāt
19.4.29	agnim asya vṛñjīran
19.4.30	tebhyo yathāśraddhaṃ dadyāt
19.4.31	sviṣṭam evaitat kriyate
19.4.32	nāsyāgniṃ vṛñjata iti brāhmaṇam
19.5.1	athābhyādhānaprabhṛti pāśubandhikaṃ karma tāyate
19.5.2	siddham āgnipraṇayanāt kṛtvāgniṃ praṇīyopasamādhāyādhvarāhutibhir abhihūya nānācaturgṛhītair etā āhutīr juhoti
19.5.3	tvam agne rudra iti śatarudrīyasya rūpam
19.5.4	agnāviṣṇū iti vasordhārāyai
19.5.5	annapata ity annahomaḥ
19.5.6	sapta te agne samidhaḥ sapta jihvā iti viśvaprīr iti
19.5.7	atha sruveṇopaghātam ekaviṃśatim āhutīr juhoty asave svāhā vasave svāheti
19.5.8	hutvāhutvaiva saṃsrāvān yajamānasyāñjalāv āvapati
19.5.9	tair yajamāno mukhaṃ vimṛṣṭe rājñī virājñīty etenānuvākena
19.5.10	uttaraparigrāhaprabhṛti pāśubandhikaṃ karma tāyate
19.5.11	siddham ā manotāyāḥ kṛtvā manotām anudrutya paśor avadānāni saṃmṛśyaudumbare pātre yūṣṇo mṛtyugrahaṃ gṛhṇāti vipaścite pavamānāya gāyatety anudrutyopayāmagṛhīto 'si mṛtyave tvā juṣṭaṃ gṛhṇāmīti
19.5.12	darbhaiḥ parimṛjyottaravedyāṃ saṃsādayaty eṣa te yonir mṛtyave tveti
19.5.13	atha paśunā carati
19.5.14	atha vanaspatinā carati
19.5.15	atha purastāt sviṣṭakṛto 'thaitaṃ grahaṃ hoṣyann apa upaspṛśati vidyud asi vidya me pāpmānam iti
19.5.16	atha juhoty apa mṛtyum apa kṣudham apetaḥ śapathaṃ jahi / adhā no agna āvaha rāyaspoṣaṃ sahasriṇam
19.5.17	ye te sahasram ayutaṃ pāśā mṛtyo martyāya hantave / tān yajñasya māyayā sarvān avayajāmahe svāheti
19.5.18	atha hutvopaspṛśed vṛṣṭir asi vṛśca me pāpmānam iti
19.5.19	atha sviṣṭakṛtā carati
19.5.20	upahūyamānāyām iḍāyām upagṛhanti graham
19.5.21	upahūtaṃ grahaṃ yajamāno bhakṣayati bhakṣo 'sy amṛtabhakṣas tasya te mṛtyupītasyāmṛtavataḥ svagākṛtasya madhumata upahūtasyopahūto bhakṣayāmīti
19.5.22	bhakṣayitvātmānaṃ pratyabhimṛśate mandrābhibhūtiḥ ketur yajñānām ity āntād anuvākasya
19.5.23	anūyājaprabhṛti pāśubandhikaṃ karma tāyate
19.5.24	siddham ā dakṣiṇānāṃ kālāt
19.5.25	dakṣiṇānāṃ kāle dhenum ṛṣabham anaḍvāhaṃ dattvaikaviṃśatir dakṣiṇā dadāti
19.5.26	śataṃ dadāti
19.5.27	sahasraṃ dadāti
19.5.28	anviṣṭakaṃ dakṣiṇā dadāti
19.5.29	yadi na vindeta manthān etāvato dadyād odanān vā
19.5.30	paṣṭhauhīṃ tv antarvatīṃ dadyāt
19.5.31	hiraṇyaṃ dadāti
19.5.32	vāso dadāti
19.5.33	tenāyuḥ pratirata iti brāhmaṇam
19.5.34	taṃ cet saumye 'dhvare cinvīta prathamāyām upasadi kṣetrakaraṇam
19.5.35	madhyamottame upasadāv antareṇopadhānam
19.5.36	kāle 'gnipraṇayanam
19.5.37	dakṣiṇānāṃ kāle dakṣiṇāḥ
19.5.38	savanīyasya yūṣṇo mṛtyugrahaḥ
19.5.39	taṃ ced ahīne sattre vā cinvīta prathame 'hani dakṣiṇāḥ prathame 'hani yūṣṇo mṛtyugrahaḥ
19.5.40	na sattre dakṣiṇā nīyante
19.5.41	nāciketa eva mṛtyugrahaḥ syād ity etad aparam
19.5.42	agniṃ citvā sautrāmaṇyā yajeta maitrāvaruṇyāmikṣayā veti
19.5.43	tasyai sāyamagnihotre hute sāyaṃdohaḥ prātaragnihotre hute prātardohaḥ
19.5.44	paśupuroḍāśena saha śrapaṇam
19.5.45	asamudite caryā
19.5.46	saṃtiṣṭhate sāvitraḥ
19.6.1	atha nāciketasya
19.6.2	prasiddhaṃ kṣetrakaraṇaṃ yathā sāvitrasya
19.6.3	etāvad eva nānā
19.6.4	nātra lekhā bhavanti
19.6.5	atha yājuṣīr upadadhāti loko 'si svargo 'sīty añjalinaikaviṃśatiṃ yathā nipatanti tās tatratatropadadhāti
19.6.6	tad etad anyatrāpi prakīrṇānām upadhānasya nidhānam
19.6.7	yadi pāṅktaḥ pañca purastāt pañca dakṣiṇataḥ pañca paścāt pañcottarata ekāṃ madhye
19.6.8	atha yadi trivṛt sapta purastāt tisro dakṣiṇataḥ sapta paścāt tisra uttarata ekāṃ madhye
19.6.9	atha yad ūrdhvāḥ paścāt koṭyāḥ prabhṛty ūrdhvāḥ svayamātṛṇṇāvakāśāt
19.6.10	atha yadi prācīḥ svayamātṛṇṇāvakāśāt prabhṛti prācīḥ
19.6.11	svayamātṛṇṇābhyaḥ prabhṛti siddham ata ūrdhvam
19.6.12	sa yadīcchet tejasvī yaśasvī brahmavarcasī syām iti prāṅ ā hotur dhiṣṇyād utsarped ity āhavanīyasakāśāt
19.6.13	yeyaṃ prāgād yaśasvatī sā mā prorṇotu tejasā yaśasā brahmavarcaseneti
19.6.14	tejasvy eva yaśasvī brahmavarcasī bhavatīti
19.6.15	atha yadīcched bhūyiṣṭhaṃ me śraddadhīran bhūyiṣṭhā dakṣiṇā nayeyur iti dakṣiṇāsu nīyamānāsu prācy ehi prācy ehīti prācī juṣāṇā vetv ājyasya svāheti sruveṇopahatyāhavanīye juhuyāt
19.6.16	bhūyiṣṭham evāsmai śraddadhate
19.6.17	bhūyiṣṭhā dakṣiṇā nayantīti brāhmaṇam
19.6.18	saṃtiṣṭhate nāciketaḥ
19.7.1	atha brahmacitaḥ
19.7.2	prasiddhaṃ kṣetrakaraṇaṃ yathā sāvitrasya
19.7.3	etāvad eva nānā
19.7.4	nātra lekhā bhavanti
19.7.5	atha purastād udīcīr daśahotreṣṭakā upadadhāti cittiḥ sruk tayā devatayāṅgirasvad dhruvā sīda cittam ājyaṃ tayā devatayāṅgirasvad dhruvā sīdeti daśa
19.7.6	atha hṛdayeṣṭakām upadadhāti suvarṇaṃ gharmaṃ pariveda venam ity anudrutya devaiḥ sa mānasīna ātmā janānām ity ātaḥ
19.7.7	atha yajuriṣṭake upadadhāty agnir yajurbhis tayā devatayāṅgirasvad dhruvā sīda savitā stomais tayā devatayāṅgirasvad dhruvā sīdeti
19.7.8	atha patnīṣṭake upadadhāti senendrasya tayā devatayāṅgirasvad dhruvā sīda dhenā bṛhaspates tayā devatayāṅgirasvad dhruvā sīdeti
19.7.9	sarvāsāṃ pāre sūdadohasaḥ karoti
19.7.10	atha dakṣiṇataḥ prācīś caturhotreṣṭakā upadadhāti pṛthivī hotā tayā devatayāṅgirasvad dhruvā sīda dyaur adhvaryus tayā devatayāṅgirasvad dhruvā sīdeti catasraḥ
19.7.11	atha hṛdayeṣṭakām upadadhāti brahmendram agnim ity anudrutya yajñam etaṃ caturhotṝṇām ātmānaṃ kavayo nicikyur ity ātaḥ
19.7.12	atha yajuriṣṭake upadadhātīndra ukthāmadais tayā devatayāṅgirasvad dhruvā sīda mitrāvaruṇāv āśiṣā tayā devatayāṅgirasvad dhruvā sīdeti
19.7.13	atha patnīṣṭake upadadhāti pathyā pūṣṇas tayā devatayāṅgirasvad dhruvā sīda vāg vāyos tayā devatayāṅgirasvad dhruvā sīdeti
19.7.14	sarvāsāṃ pāre sūdadohaḥ karoti
19.7.15	atha paścād udīcīḥ pañcahotreṣṭakā upadadhāty agnir hotā tayā devatayāṅgirasvad dhruvā sīdāśvinādhvaryū tayā devatayāṅgirasvad dhruvā sīdeti catasraḥ
19.7.16	api vāśvinādhvaryū ity etenaiva mantreṇa dve iṣṭake samānatayādevate upadadhāti
19.7.17	tayā devatayāṅgirasvad dhruve sīdatam iti mantraṃ saṃnamayati
19.7.18	atha hṛdayeṣṭakām upadadhāti śataṃ niyutaḥ parivedety anudrutya prāṇam ulbaṃ tena k.lpto 'mṛtenāham asmīty ātaḥ
19.7.19	atha yajuriṣṭake upadadhāty aṅgiraso dhiṣṇiyair agnibhis tayā devatayāṅgirasvad dhruvā sīda marutaḥ sadohavirdhānābhyāṃ tayā devatayāṅgirasvad dhruvā sīdeti
19.7.20	atha patnīṣṭake upadadhāti dīkṣā somasya tayā devatayāṅgirasvad dhruvā sīda pṛthivy agnes tayā devatayāṅgirasvad dhruvā sīdeti
19.7.21	sarvāsāṃ pāre sūdadohasaḥ karoti
19.7.22	athottarataḥ prācīḥ ṣaḍḍhotreṣṭakā upadadhāti vāg ghotā tayā devatayāṅgirasvad dhruvā sīda dīkṣā patnī tayā devatayāṅgirasvad dhruvā sīdeti ṣaṭ
19.7.23	atha hṛdayeṣṭakām upadadhāti suvarṇaṃ kośaṃ rajasā parīvṛtam ity anudrutyendrasyātmānaṃ śatadhā carantam ity ātaḥ
19.7.24	atha yajuriṣṭake upadadhāty āpaḥ prokṣaṇībhis tayā devatayāṅgirasvad dhruvā sīdauṣadhayo barhiṣā tayā devatayāṅgirasvad dhruvā sīdeti
19.7.25	atha patnīṣṭake upadadhāti vasūnāṃ gāyatrī tayā devatayāṅgirasvad dhruvā sīda rudrāṇāṃ triṣṭuk tayā devatayāṅgirasvad dhruvā sīdeti
19.7.26	sarvāsāṃ pāre sūdadohasaḥ karoti
19.7.27	athopariṣṭāt prācīḥ saptahotreṣṭakā upadadhāti mahāhavir hotā tayā devatayāṅgirasvad dhruvā sīda satyahavir adhvaryus tayā devatayāṅgirasvad dhruvā sīdeti ṣaṭ
19.7.28	api vānādhṛṣyaś cāpratidhṛṣyaś ca yajñasyābhigarāv ity etena mantreṇa dve iṣṭake samānatayādevate upadadhāti
19.7.29	tayā devatayāṅgirasvad dhruve sīdatam iti mantraṃ saṃnamayati
19.7.30	atha hṛdayeṣṭakām upadadhātīndro rājā jagato ya īśa ity āntād anuvākasya
19.7.31	atha yajuriṣṭakā upadadhāty aditir vedyā tayā devatayāṅgirasvad dhruvā sīda somo dīkṣayā tayā devatayāṅgirasvad dhruvā sīdeti trayodaśa
19.7.32	atha patnīṣṭakā upadadhāty ādityānāṃ jagatī tayā devatayāṅgirasvad dhruvā sīda viṣṇor anuṣṭuk tayā devatayāṅgirasvad dhruvā sīdety aṣṭādaśa
19.7.33	sarvāsāṃ pāre sūdadohasaḥ karoti
19.7.34	atha yathāvakāśaṃ graheṣṭakā upadadhāti vācaspate vidhe nāmann iti daśahotur vācaspate vāco vīryeṇeti caturhotuḥ somaḥ somasya purogā iti pañcahotur bhūr bhuvaḥ suvar iti ṣaḍḍhotur vācaspate hṛdvidhe nāmann iti saptahotuḥ
19.7.35	sarvāsāṃ pāre sūdadohasaḥ karoti
19.7.36	atha yathāvakāśam eva pratigraheṣṭakā upadadhāti
19.7.37	devasya tvā savituḥ prasava ity anudrutyaiṣā te kāma dakṣiṇottānas tvāṅgirasaḥ pratigṛhṇātv ity ekānnaviṃśam
19.7.38	api vā gandharvāpsarābhyaḥ sragalaṅkaraṇe ity etena mantreṇa dve iṣṭake samānatayādevate upadadhāti
19.7.39	tayā devatayāṅgirasvad dhruve sīdatam iti mantraṃ saṃnamayati
19.7.40	svayamātṛṇṇābhyaḥ prabhṛti siddham ata ūrdhvam
19.7.41	saṃtiṣṭhate brahmacit
19.8.1	atha samastasya
19.8.2	prasiddhaṃ kṣetrakaraṇaṃ yathā sāvitrasya
19.8.3	etāvad eva nānā
19.8.4	sāvitro 'gniḥ prathamā citiḥ
19.8.5	lokaṃpṛṇā dvitīyā
19.8.6	nāciketas tṛtīyā
19.8.7	lokaṃpṛṇā caturthī
19.8.8	brahmacit pañcamī
19.8.9	sarvāsu citiṣu svayamātṛṇṇā
19.8.10	purīṣāntāś citayaḥ
19.8.11	agne devāṃ ihāvahety etābhiḥ pañca citīr abhimṛśati
19.8.12	taṃ cet saumye 'dhvara uttama eva cakre cinvīta prāgdīkṣaṇīyāyai divaḥ śyenībhir yajetodavasānīyāyā apāghābhiḥ
19.8.13	sakṛt prayujya samasyati
19.8.14	saṃtiṣṭhate samastaḥ
19.9.1	atha vaiśvasṛjasya
19.9.2	prasiddhaṃ kṣetrakaraṇaṃ yathā sāvitrasya
19.9.3	etāvad eva nānā
19.9.4	tisro lekhā bhavanti
19.9.5	athāntamāyāṃ lekhāyām upadadhāti yac cāmṛtaṃ yac ca martyam ity aṣṭādaśa
19.9.6	sarvāsāṃ pāre sūdadohasaḥ karoti
19.9.7	athābhyantarāyāṃ lekhāyām upadadhāti sarvā diśo dikṣv iti pañcadaśa
19.9.8	sarvāsāṃ pāre sūdadohasaḥ karoti
19.9.9	athābhyantarāyāṃ lekhāyām upadadhāti sarvān divaṃ sarvān devān divīti nava
19.9.10	sarvāsāṃ pāre sūdadohasaḥ karoti
19.9.11	svayamātṛṇṇābhyaḥ prabhṛti siddham ata ūrdhvam
19.9.12	taṃ ced ahīne sattre vā cinvīta śatarātre viśvajiti sarvapṛṣṭhe dakṣiṇānāṃ kāle brahmā sadasyāsīno vaiśvasṛjān vyācaṣṭa ṛcāṃ prācī mahatī dig ucyata iti paccho 'rdharcaśo brāhmaṇe vākyaśaḥ
19.9.13	tasmā adhvaryuḥ pratigṛṇāty oṃ bṛhad ṛtaṃ bṛhat satyaṃ bṛhad arātsma bṛhad iti
19.9.14	tasyottame paryāye 'rātsma bṛhat saṃpadyate
19.9.15	saṃtiṣṭhate vaiśvasṛjaḥ
19.10.1	etenāruṇaketuko vyākhyātaḥ
19.10.2	yāvan mantram abīṣṭakāḥ
19.10.3	lokaṃpṛṇāś ca svayamātṛṇṇāś cāpa eva
19.10.4	puṣkaraparṇaṃ rukmaṃ hiraṇmayaṃ puruṣaṃ kūrmam iti
19.10.5	ātapati varṣyā iti yathāsamāmnātam
19.10.6	palvalyā ity aviśoṣyā ity arthaḥ
19.10.7	uttaravedyāvapanakāle tāṃ tūṣṇīṃ jānudaghnīṃ khātvānyatra mṛdaṃ nivapati
19.10.8	vider agnir ity ādi lupyate
19.10.9	dhruvāsīti pratipadyate
19.10.10	hastagrāham abīṣṭakā upadadhyāt
19.10.11	bhadraṃ karṇebhir iti dvābhyāṃ śāntiṃ kṛtvā tābhyām upadadhāti
19.10.12	āpam āpām iti pañcabhir mahānāmnībhir uṣṇodakam
19.10.13	śivā naḥ śaṃtameti sauṣadhyo 'po 'dhvaryave dadāti
19.10.14	sa tāḥ pratigṛhya śivā na ity upadadhāti
19.10.15	sumṛḍīketi bhūmivatīm upadadhyād etāḥ purastāt
19.10.16	smṛtiḥ pratyakṣam ity aṣṭau madhye śukraṃ te anyad iti ca
19.10.17	sākaṃjānām ity ekādaśa purastāt
19.10.18	dakṣiṇato 'kṣiduḥkhotthitasyaiveti ṣaḍ iheha vaḥ svatapasa iti ca
19.10.19	atitāmrāṇīti catasro madantīs taptāḥ pravargyavadādyantayoḥ śāntiṃ kṛtvā
19.10.20	atyūrdhvākṣa iti trīṇy ṛtumaṇḍalāny ava drapsa iti ca
19.10.21	āroga ity aṣṭau sūryanāmabhiḥ padaśo yat te śilpam iti ca
19.10.22	vyāhṛtīr japitvāpo va iti yajamāna upatiṣṭhate
19.10.23	evam uttarair upasthānaṃ vyāhṛtīr japitvā
19.10.24	sapta sūryāḥ sapta diśo nānāsūryās yad dyāvaś citraṃ devānām iti catasraḥ saurīḥ purastāt kvedam abhram ity ekām
19.10.25	ardhamāsā ity upariṣṭāt
19.10.26	kālā apsu niviśanta iti dakṣiṇataḥ
19.10.27	kiṃ svid atreti pañca vaiṣṇavīḥ
19.10.28	pṛcchāmi tvā paraṃ mṛtyum iti catasro mṛtyumatīḥ
19.10.29	pṛcchāmi tvā pāpakṛta iti catasro nirayavatīḥ
19.10.30	ā yasminn agne nayeti dve
19.10.31	agniś ca jātavedāś cety aṣṭau diśyā diśo va iti yajamānaḥ
19.10.32	prabhrājamānā ity ekādaśa rudrāḥ
19.10.33	prabhrājamānya ity ekādaśa rudrāṇyaḥ padaśo madhye
19.10.34	rūpāṇi va iti yajamānaḥ
19.10.35	svāna bhrāḍ ity ekādaśa gandharvagaṇāḥ padaśaḥ paścāt
19.10.36	gaurī mimāyety ekāḥ
19.10.37	varāhavaḥ svatapasa iti sapta vātāḥ padaśaḥ
19.10.38	samānam etad iti vṛṣṭimatī
19.10.39	yad akṣaram iti lokaḥ
19.10.40	jamadagnir ity āpyāyitaḥ
19.10.41	tac chaṃyor iti śaṃyuḥ
19.10.42	sahasravṛd ity aṣṭau saṃyānīḥ
19.10.43	sa saṃgrāma iti dve ca
19.10.44	pavitravantaḥ pavitraṃ te brahmā devānām asataḥ sadya iti catasraḥ pavitravatya uttarataḥ
19.10.45	amī ya ṛkṣā iti sapta madhye
19.10.46	andho maṇim iti pañca vaiśvadevīr uttaraḥ
19.10.47	ā tam agne ratham iti tisraḥ
19.10.48	ātanuṣveti catasraḥ
19.10.49	ā mandrair ity ekāṃ yajamāna upadadhyāt
19.10.50	aṇubhiś ceti dve
19.10.51	subrahmaṇyom ity ekām
19.10.52	aruṇāśvā iti catasro revatīḥ
19.10.53	brahmaṇa udaraṇam asīti catasro brahmasadanāḥ
19.10.54	aṣṭayonīm ity aṣṭau diśyāḥ
19.10.55	mitraś ca varuṇaś cety aṣṭau diśyāḥ
19.10.56	puṣkaraparṇaṃ rukmaṃ hiraṇmayaṃ puruṣaṃ kūrmam iti mahāgnivad eva
19.10.57	tāny upadhāya haṃsaḥ śuciṣad iti dve dūrohaṇe puruṣam abhitaḥ
19.10.58	tad it padam iti dve madhye
19.10.59	vasūnāṃ rudrāṇām ity aṣṭāv uttarataḥ
19.10.60	raśmayo va iti yajamānaḥ
19.10.61	ārogasyety aṣṭāv upariṣṭāt
19.10.62	āpo va iti yajamānaḥ
19.10.63	prabhrājamānānām ity ekādaśa prabhrājamānīnām iti caikādaśa madhye
19.10.64	rūpāṇi va iti yajamānaḥ
19.10.65	agneḥ pūrvadiśyasyety aṣṭau diśyāḥ
19.10.66	diśo va iti yajamānaḥ
19.10.67	dakṣiṇapūrvasyām iti catasro narakavatīr yathāliṅgam
19.10.68	ā yasminn indriyāṇi śatakratav iti dve dakṣiṇataḥ
19.10.69	indraghoṣā vaḥ saṃjñānam iti ṣaḍ diśyāḥ
19.10.70	āditya sarva iti pañca diśyāḥ
19.10.71	evā hy eveti ṣaḍ diśyāḥ
19.10.72	āpamāpām iti navopariṣṭāt
19.10.73	apāṃ rasam ity ekām
19.10.74	kāmas tad agra iti saṃkalapavatīm
19.10.75	āpo ha yad ity oghavatīm
19.10.76	vidhāya lokān iti stambhanavatīm
19.10.77	ketava ity ekām
19.10.78	imā nu kam iti tisraḥ
19.10.79	āplavasveti saptadaśa kṣapaṇyaḥ
19.10.80	viśīrṣṇīm iti dve
19.10.81	parjanyāyeti tisraḥ
19.10.82	punar mām aitv iti ca tisraḥ
19.10.83	svayamātṛṇṇādi samānam uttaraṃ sāvitreṇa
19.10.84	svayamātṛṇṇā lokaṃpṛṇāś caitā āpaḥ pañca citayo bhavanti
19.10.85	pratidiśaṃ citīḥ puṣkaraparṇādibhiḥ pracchādanam
19.10.86	anyāḥ prathamacitivat
19.10.87	na puṣkaraparṇādayaḥ
19.10.88	uttarato lokaṃpṛṇayāpavargaḥ
19.10.89	dīrghadārubhir mañcaṃ kṛtvā pṛṣṭo divīti purīṣavyūhanam
19.10.90	antyeṣṭake śatarudrīyahomaḥ
19.10.91	anuśaṃsanānte 'gnipraṇayanam
19.10.92	hūyamānāyāṃ vaiśravaṇayajño brāhmaṇena vyākhyāto 'nnakāmasya sarvakāmasya vā parvaṇiparvaṇi vaiśravaṇayajñaḥ
19.10.93	sottaravediṣu kratuṣu cinvīteti yathābrāhmaṇam
19.10.94	tasyaitad vratam iti yathābrāhmaṇaṃ saṃmitāś ca vratasamuccayāḥ
19.10.95	āpo na bībhatsyā yathābrāhmaṇam ekakāmaḥ sarvakāmo vā
19.10.96	āpo vā idaṃ sarvam iti brāhmaṇaṃ vijñāyate brahma vā āpo yad āpa upadhīyante brahma vai tad ātman dhatte brahmaṇaḥ sāyujyaṃ salokatām āpnoti ya etam agniṃ cinuta iti
19.10.97	saṃtiṣṭhata āruṇaketukaḥ saṃtiṣṭhata āruṇaketukaḥ
20.1.1	upavasatha iti
20.1.2	katham u khalūpavasathaṃ jānīyāt
20.1.3	saṃdhyaḥ svid evopapādyo 'tha 'pūri nādarśīti
20.1.4	sādhu khalu saṃdhyaḥ sādhu saṃdher upapādanam
20.1.5	nanu khalu saṃdhyaḥ sūpapādaya iva sarveṣāṃ tv eva saṃdhya iveti
20.1.6	sa ha smāha baudhāyana yatraitad upavasato 'stamita āditye purastāc candramā lohitībhavann ivodiyāt tam apy upavasathaṃ jānīyād iti
20.1.7	atro ha smāha śālīkir atipannaḥ khalv eṣa bhavati
20.1.8	sa saṃdhyaṃ vaivopapādayiṣet pūrṇaṃ vābhiyajeta
20.1.9	tasya ced upavasato 'stamita āditye purastāc candraṃ lohitībhavann ivodiyād āramatāgnihotreṇety uktvā pārvaṇena prakrāmet
20.1.10	saṃsthite pārvaṇe 'gnihotraṃ juhuyāt
20.1.11	iti nu khalu paurṇamāsyām
20.1.12	athāmāvāsyāyām iti
20.1.13	sa ha smāha baudhāyano 'dṛśyamāna evopavasen na dṛśyamāna iti
20.1.14	evaṃ caiva khalu kuryād iti śālīkir asti tv api dṛśyamāna upavasathaḥ
20.1.15	yatraitad rātrībhir upapanno 'ṇuś candramāḥ parinakṣatram upavyuṣaṃ bhavati na sa śvo bhūte dṛśyate tam apy upavasathaṃ jānīyād iti
20.1.16	agnīnām anvādhāna iti
20.1.17	sūtram aupamanyavīputrasya
20.1.18	atro ha smāha baudhāyano vihavyābhir agnīn anvādadhyāt tisṛbhistisṛbhir ekaikaṃ ye nava samāmaneyuḥ
20.1.19	atha ye 'ṣṭau prathamāṃ vottamāṃ vā dvir abhyāvartayeyuḥ
20.1.20	atha ye daśa tisṛbhistisṛbhir ekaikam anvādhāyottareṇāhavanīyaṃ tiṣṭhan daśamīṃ nigaded iti
20.1.21	atro ha smāha śālīkir yo nu khalu gārhapatyaḥ sakṛdanvāhita eṣa bhavati
20.1.22	grāmayonir anvāhāryapacanaḥ
20.1.23	āhavanīyam evaikaṃ vihavyayānvādadhyāt
20.1.24	athātiśiṣṭā uttareṇāhavanīyaṃ tiṣṭhan nigaded iti
20.1.25	atro ha smāhaupamanyavo vihavyābhir evāgnīn anvādadhyād ekaikam ekaikayā
20.1.26	athātiśiṣṭā uttareṇāhavanīyaṃ tiṣṭhan nigaded iti
20.1.27	atro ha smāha maudgalya āhavanīyam evaikam anvādadhyād agniṃ gṛhṇāmi surathaṃ yo mayobhūr ya udyantam ārohati sūryam ahne / ādityaṃ jyotiṣāṃ jyotir uttamaṃ śvo yajñāya ramatāṃ devatābhyaḥ
20.1.28	vasūn rudrān ādityān indreṇa saha devatāḥ / tāḥ pūrvaḥ parigṛhṇāmi sva āyatane manīṣayā
20.1.29	imām ūrjaṃ pañcadaśīṃ ye praviṣṭās tān devān parigṛhṇāmi pūrvaḥ / agnir havyavāḍ iha tān āvahatu paurṇamāsaṃ havir idam eṣāṃ mayīti paurṇamāsyām
20.1.30	āmāvāsyaṃ havir idam eṣāṃ mayīty amāvāsyāyām iti
20.1.31	atro ha smāha maitreya āhavanīyam evaikaṃ vihavyayānvādadhyāt tūṣṇīm itarāv athātiśiṣṭā uttareṇāhavanīyaṃ tiṣṭhan nigaded iti
20.1.32	vyāhṛtībhir evāgnīn anvādadhyād iti rāthītaraḥ
20.1.33	ātañcaneṣv iti
20.1.34	sa ha smāha baudhāyano havirātañcanāny etāni bhavantīti
20.1.35	atro ha smāha śālīkir dadhi khalv ātañcanārthe dṛṣṭaṃ bhavati
20.1.36	tasminn avidyamāna eteṣām ekenātañcyād iti
20.1.37	vratopāyana iti
20.1.38	sa ha smāha baudhāyanaḥ saṃgavakāle vā vratam upeyād dhenuṣu vā dohyamānāsu praṇītāsu vā praṇeṣyatsu haviḥṣu vāsanneṣv iti
20.1.39	atro ha smāha śālīkiḥ pūrvedyuḥkālaṃ khalu vratopāyanaṃ bhavatīti brāhmaṇaṃ barhiṣā pūrṇamāse vratam upaiti vatsair amāvāsyāyām iti sa saṃgavakāla eva vratam upeyād iti
20.1.40	anvādhānaprabhṛtīty aupamanyavaḥ
20.1.41	abhyuditeṣṭyām iti
20.1.42	sa ha smāha baudhāyanaḥ siddhair evāmāvāsyair havirbhir iṣṭvā punar upoṣya śvo bhūte kālyām anabhyuditām avyāpannāṃ yajeteti
20.1.43	atro ha smāha śālīkir yaiṣā brāhmaṇajeṣṭis tayā vyaktayeṣṭvā punar upoṣya śvo bhūte kālyām anabhyuditām avyāpannāṃ yajeta
20.1.44	iti nu khalu saṃnayataḥ
20.1.45	athāsaṃnayataḥ
20.1.46	samānaḥ kalpo baudhāyanasya
20.1.47	atro ha smāha śālīkir apsv evaitāni havīṃṣi śrapayitvā punar upoṣya śvo bhūte kālyām anabhyuditām avyapannāṃ yajetāpi vopavasatha evātipravardheteti
20.1.48	ācchāyana iti
20.1.49	sa ha smāha baudhāyano vācaṃyama eva śākhām āccheyād vācaṃyama evāharet
20.1.50	evam evāhar iti
20.1.51	evaṃ caiva khalu kuryād iti śālīkir brāhmaṇena ca yathārtham antarhasann eva saṃbhāṣeta nābrāhmaṇeneti
20.1.52	śākhāyā ācchedana iti
20.1.53	sa ha smāha baudhāyana iṣe tveti śākhām ācchindyād ūrje tvety anumṛjyād vānvīkṣeta veti
20.1.54	anvīkṣetaiveti śālīkiḥ
20.1.55	vatsāpākaraṇa iti
20.1.56	sa ha smāha baudhāyano vāyava stheti puṃsa evāpākuryād upāyava stheti striyaḥ
20.1.57	atha yady anyatare syur naiva mantraṃ parijahyāt
20.1.58	saṃsṛṣṭenaiveti śālīkiḥ
20.2.1	śākhāyai saṃcara iti
20.2.2	agreṇāhavanīyaṃ saṃcārayed iti baudhāyanaḥ
20.2.3	jaghanena gārhapatyam iti śālīkiḥ
20.2.4	eṣa sarvakalpe śākhāyai saṃcaraḥ payasāṃ cānyatra prāvargikād iti
20.2.5	ubhayor evāpareṇa prāvargikaṃ saṃcārayed ity aupamanyavaḥ
20.2.6	pravasato yājamāna iti
20.2.7	sa ha smāha baudhāyanaḥ sahayājamānaḥ khalv ayaṃ yajamānaḥ pravasati
20.2.8	sa yatra syāt tad enaṃ manasā dhyāyet
20.2.9	sa yadi visaṃsthita āgacchet kṛtam anumantrya karmāntena prakrāmed iti
20.2.10	atro ha smāha śālīkir yady asya putro vāntevāsī vālaṃkarmīṇaḥ syāt taṃ tatra preṣyet
20.2.11	sa yadi visaṃsthita āgacchet kṛtāntād vā prakrāmen nā vā driyeta
20.2.12	ubhau tv eva yajamānabhāgaṃ prāśnīyātām iti
20.2.13	idhmābarhiṣor upakalpana iti
20.2.14	sūtram ācāryayoḥ
20.2.15	aparāhṇe pitṛbhyo dattvedhmābarhiḥ saṃnahyed ity āñjīgaviḥ
20.2.16	śvo bhūte haviṣkṛdanta ity aupamanyavaḥ
20.2.17	asidasya pratitapana iti
20.2.18	sa ha smāha baudhāyanaḥ pratitaped evāsidam evam aśvaparśuṃ rakṣo'pahananāyeti
20.2.19	atro ha smāha śālīkir na tejasi tejaḥ pratitaped aśvaparśvāṃ khalv ete mantrā dṛṣṭā bhavanti
20.2.20	so 'śvaparśum eva pratitapen nāsidaṃ krūrāpahananāyeti
20.2.21	prakrameṣv iti
20.2.22	sa ha smāha baudhāyana āhavanīyād evāgre trīn vā caturo vā prācaḥ prakramān prakramyātha tāṃ diśam abhipravrajed yatra barhir vetsyan manyeteti
20.2.23	āhavanīyād eva yathārthaṃ gacchen na tu dakṣiṇayā dvāreti śālīkiḥ
20.2.24	pariṣavaṇa iti
20.2.25	sa ha smāha baudhāyanas trir eva mantraṃ brūyāt triḥ karmāvartayet
20.2.26	evaṃ yūpāvaṭasya parilekhana evaṃ somakrayaṇyai pada evam audumbaryā avaṭa evam uparaveṣv iti
20.2.27	sakṛd eva mantraṃ brūyāt triḥ karmāvartayed iti śālīkiḥ
20.2.28	ācchedaneṣv iti
20.2.29	sūtraṃ baudhāyanasya
20.2.30	pratyagāśīḥ khalv eṣa mantro dṛṣṭo bhavati
20.2.31	mantrapratyabhimarśanam evaitat syād iti śālīkiḥ
20.2.32	prastarasya saṃnahana iti
20.2.33	sa ha smāha baudhāyano 'bhyardhāc cainaṃ saṃnahyed anyatra ca
20.2.34	etasmād ayugmāyugmaṃ nidhanāni kuryād iti
20.2.35	atro ha smāha śālīkiḥ prastarasya khalu mantrapratilābhāt sarvaṃ barhirmantraṃ labhate na cainam abhyardhāt saṃnahyed etac caivāyugmatamaṃ syād iti
20.2.36	śulbasya karaṇa iti
20.2.37	adhikaraṇaṃ caturthaṃ syād iti baudhāyanaḥ
20.2.38	adhikaraṇam eva tṛtīyam iti śālīkiḥ
20.2.39	barhiṣaḥ saṃbaraṇa iti
20.2.40	sa ha smāha baudhāyano yāny anyāni yājuṣān nidhanāni tāni pūrvāṇi mantreṇa saṃbhṛtyāthopariṣṭād yājuṣaṃ mantreṇaiva saṃbhared iti
20.2.41	atro ha smāha śālīkir yāny anyāni yājuṣān nidhanāni tāni pūrvāṇi tūṣṇīṃ saṃbhṛtyāthopariṣṭād yājuṣaṃ mantreṇaiva saṃbhared iti
20.2.42	atro ha smāhaupamanyavo ya evādir lavane sasaṃbharaṇe sayājuṣam evāgre mantreṇa saṃbhṛtya tūṣṇīm itarāṇi saṃbhṛtya viparikṛṣya granthiṃ kuryād iti
20.3.1	granthikaraṇa iti
20.3.2	sūtraṃ baudhāyanasya
20.3.3	samāyacchann evaitaṃ mantraṃ japed iti śālīkiḥ
20.3.4	paścāt prāñcam upagūhatīti
20.3.5	sūtraṃ baudhāyanasya
20.3.6	purastātpratyañcam iti śālīkiḥ
20.3.7	barhiṣo nidhāna iti
20.3.8	sa ha smāha baudhāyanaḥ sphyaṃ vā śakalaṃ vāntarvedi nidhāya tasmin mantreṇa pratiṣṭhāpya tato yathāsuṣṭhu nidadhyād iti
20.3.9	yatraiva nidhāsyan syāt tan mantreṇaiva nidadhyād iti śālīkiḥ
20.3.10	paridhīnāṃ karaṇa iti
20.3.11	sa ha smāha baudhāyana uraḥsaṃmito madhyamaḥ syād athetarau bāhumātrau syātām iti
20.3.12	sarva eva bāhumātrāḥ syur iti śālīkiḥ
20.3.13	idhmasya karaṇa iti
20.3.14	anusāmidhenīdhmaṃ kuryād iti baudhāyanaḥ
20.3.15	aparimitam iti śālīkiḥ
20.3.16	vedasya karaṇa iti
20.3.17	vatsajñuṃ kuryād iti baudhāyanaḥ
20.3.18	mūtakāryam iti śālīkiḥ
20.3.19	trivṛtam ity aupamanyavaḥ
20.3.20	ūrdhvāgram ity aupamanyavīputraḥ
20.3.21	pitṛyajñabarhiṣīti
20.3.22	samūlam etad barhir bhavatīti baudhāyanaḥ pitṛyajñasāmānyād iti
20.3.23	mahāpitṛyajña evaitad dṛṣṭaṃ bhavati
20.3.24	amūlam evaitad barhiḥ syād iti śālīkiḥ
20.3.25	iṣṭisaṃnipāta iti
20.3.26	sa ha smāha baudhāyano yāḥ kāśceṣṭayaḥ samāne 'hani saṃnipateyus tantrāyatantrāya cāsāṃ barhirlāvo gacchel lūnaṃ vāsādayet tantretantre cāsāṃ vratam upetya tantrāpavarge vrataṃ visṛjeteti
20.3.27	atro ha smāha śālīkir yāḥ kāśceṣṭayaḥ samāne 'hani saṃnipateyuḥ sakṛd evāsāṃ sarvāsāṃ barhirlāvo gacchel lūnaṃ vāsādayed āditaś cāsāṃ vratam upetya sarvāsāṃ pāre vrataṃ visṛjeteti
20.3.28	parṇatsarūṇāṃ nivapana iti
20.3.29	sūtraṃ śālīkeḥ
20.3.30	atro ha smāha baudhāyanas tṛtīyam agnyagāra udvapet tṛtīyam antarvedi nivapet tṛtīyena vatsānāṃ dhūnanaṃ kuryāt
20.3.31	evam iva hi paśūnāṃ nedīyān bhavatīti
20.3.32	paurṇamāsyām upaveṣakaraṇa iti
20.3.33	kuryād iti baudhāyanaḥ
20.3.34	na kuryād iti śālīkiḥ
20.3.35	dohanapavitrasya karaṇa iti
20.3.36	sa ha smāha baudhāyano mūle mūlāni baddhvā dviguṇāṃ rajjuṃ saṃprasāryāgre nigrathnīyāt
20.3.37	evam asyāgram agrair abhisaṃpannaṃ bhavatīti

20.4.1	agnihotroccheṣaṇasya karaṇa iti
20.4.2	sa ha smāha baudhāyano yady asyājyena vauṣadhena vā prakrāntaṃ syāt payasaiva tāṃ rātriṃ juhuyāt payasa evāgnihotroccheṣaṇaṃ kuryād iti
20.4.3	atro ha smāha śālīkir nāsamāpte kāma āvartayed yady asyājyena vauṣadhena vā prakrāntaṃ syāt tasya hutvā tasyaivāgnihotroccheṣaṇaṃ kuryād iti
20.4.4	sāṃnāyyapātrāṇāṃ prokṣaṇa iti
20.4.5	tūṣṇīṃ saṃskṛtābhir adbhiḥ prokṣed iti baudhāyanaḥ
20.4.6	kamaṇḍalugatābhir iti śālīkiḥ
20.4.7	atha jaghanena gārhapatyam upaviśyopaveṣeṇodīco 'ṅgārān nirūhatīti
20.4.8	sūtraṃ śālīkeḥ
20.4.9	atro ha smāha baudhāyanas tūṣṇīm aṅgārān nirūhet
20.4.10	sarva evaiṣo 'dhiśrayaṇamantraḥ syād iti
20.4.11	dohanapavitrasyādhāna iti
20.4.12	mantreṇa kṛtvā mantreṇa sthālyām ādadhyād iti baudhāyanaḥ
20.4.13	tūṣṇīṃ kṛtvā mantreṇa sthālyām ādadhyād iti śālīkiḥ
20.4.14	ardhena kṛtvārdhena sthālyām ādadhyād ity aupamanyavaḥ
20.4.15	dhenūnām anumantraṇa iti
20.4.16	sa ha smāha baudhāyana ekaikām evāsām anumantrayetāthāsām ekaikāṃ dohayed iti
20.4.17	atro ha smāha śālīkiḥ sakṛd evaināḥ sarvā anumantrayetāthāsām ekaikāṃ dohayed iti
20.4.18	atro ha smāhaupamanyavaḥ sakṛd evaināḥ sarvā anumantrayeta sakṛc cainā dohayed atra caiva stokān parinistiṣṭhed iti
20.4.19	ekaikām evāsāṃ sarveṇasarveṇa karmaṇā parinistiṣṭhed ity aupamanyavīputraḥ
20.4.20	stokānām anumantraṇa iti
20.4.21	sūtraṃ śālīkeḥ
20.4.22	ākhyātam aupamanyavasya
20.4.23	atro ha smāha baudhāyana ātacyaiva stokān anumantrayeta
20.4.24	atraiva hi stokānām anto bhavatīti
20.4.25	uttarāsāṃ dohana iti
20.4.26	visṛṣṭavāg ananvārabhyottarā dohayed iti baudhāyanaḥ
20.4.27	ānīyamāna evānu cārabheta vācaṃ ca yacched iti kātyaḥ
20.4.28	dugdhaṃ labhamānasyeti
20.4.29	vatsāpākaraṇaprabhṛtīn mantrān sādhayed iti baudhāyanaḥ
20.4.30	āsecanaprabhṛtīn iti śālīkiḥ
20.4.31	ātañcana iti
20.4.32	caturthe sruva ānayed yāvatā mūrcchayiṣyan manyeteti baudhāyanaḥ
20.4.33	tṛtīye sruva ānayed yāvatā mūrcchayiṣyan manyeteti śālīkiḥ
20.4.34	agnihotroccheṣaṇam abhyātanaktīti
20.4.35	sūtraṃ śālīkeḥ
20.4.36	atro ha smāha baudhāyano 'gnihotroccheṣaṇam ānīya havirātañcanam ānayet
20.4.37	evam asyobhayam abhyātaktaṃ bhavatīti
20.4.38	udanvatāpidadhātīti
20.4.39	udanvatāpidhāya sarvāṃ rātriṃ pariśāyayed iti baudhāyanaḥ
20.4.40	udanvatāpidhāya siktvaitā apo 'pidadhyād iti śālīkiḥ
20.4.41	agnīnāṃ paristaraṇa iti
20.4.42	sūtram ācāryayoḥ
20.4.43	atro ha smāhaupamanyava upavasatha evāgnīn yathotpannaṃ paristṛṇīyāt
20.4.44	evaṃ hi brāhmaṇaṃ bhavaty upāsmiñ chvo yakṣyamāṇe devatā vasanti ya evaṃ vidvān agnim upastṛṇātīti
20.4.45	aśanānaśana iti

20.5.1	pāṇisaṃmarśana iti

20.5.36	praṇītāḥ praṇīya pratyaṅ dravan daśahotāraṃ vyācakṣītety ācāryayoḥ
20.5.37	muṣṭim eva grahīṣyann ity aupamanyavaḥ
20.5.38	nirvapaṇa iti
20.5.39	sūtraṃ śālīkeḥ
20.5.40	atro ha smāha baudhāyanaḥ śakaṭād eva nirvapet
20.5.41	dhurau vyabhimṛśyākṣapāliṃ krāmed viṣṇus tvā kramatām iti
20.5.42	puroḍāśīyān prekṣyābhimṛśed yacchantāṃ pañceti

20.6.1	pañcāvattasya prakramaṇa iti
20.6.2	nirvapaṇāt pañcāvattaṃ prakrāmed iti baudhāyanaḥ
20.6.3	avadānata iti śālīkiḥ
20.6.4	pradānata ity aupamanyavaḥ
20.6.5	cātuṣprāśyād ity aupamanyavīputraḥ
20.6.6	atiśiṣṭānām āvapana iti
20.6.7	tān koṣṭhe vā palve vāvaped iti baudhāyanaḥ
20.6.8	atraivainān āvapeyur iti śālīkiḥ
20.6.9	ājyasya nirvapaṇa iti
20.6.10	sūtraṃ śālīkeḥ
20.6.11	atro ha smāha baudhāyana auṣadhasyāntaṃ gatvājyaṃ nirvapet

20.6.13	paridāna iti
20.6.14	yathāniruptaṃ paridadīteti baudhāyanaḥ
20.6.15	atro ha smāha śālīkir agne havyaṃ rakṣasvety eva brūyād viṣṇo havyaṃ rakṣasveti payaḥ

20.6.17	prokṣaṇīnām utpavana iti
20.6.18	sūtraṃ baudhāyanasya
20.6.19	nigadann evaitām ṛcaṃ trir utpunuyād iti śālīkiḥ
20.6.20	puroḍāśīyānāṃ prokṣaṇa iti

20.6.22	devatāḥ samanudrutya trir eveti śālīkiḥ

20.6.27	etā eva pariśayīrann iti baudhāyanaḥ
20.6.28	siktvetā apa upariṣṭād anyāḥ saṃskurvīteti śālīkiḥ
20.6.29	kṛṣṇājinasyāvadhavana iti
20.6.30	upaniṣkramyāgnyagārād uttare 'pare 'vāntaradeśe kṛṣṇājinam avadhunuyād iti baudhāyanaḥ
20.6.31	antar evaitāṃ diśam iti śālīkiḥ
20.6.32	kṛṣṇājinasyāstaraṇa iti

20.8.2	atro ha smāha baudhāyana ādita eva dhṛṣṭim ādadīta dhṛṣṭir asi brahma yaccheti
20.8.3	gārhapatyam abhimantrayetāpāgne 'gnim āmādaṃ jahīti
20.8.4	niṣ kravyādaṃ sedheti dakṣiṇāṅgāraṃ nirasyet
20.8.5	athānyān kalpayed ā devayajaṃ vaheti
20.8.6	teṣu carusthālīm adhiśrayed dhruvāsi pṛthivīṃ dṛṃhāyur dṛṃha prajāṃ dṛṃha sajātān asmai yajamānāya paryūheti
20.8.7	athaināṃ pradakṣiṇam aṅgāraiḥ paricinuyān nirdagdhaṃ rakṣo nirdagdhā arātaya iti

20.10.14	atro ha smāha śālīkiḥ sakṛd evaināḥ sarvāḥ saṃnahyed ekaikāṃ gārhapatyam īkṣayed ekaikām ājyam avekṣayed iti
20.10.15	atro ha smāhaupamanyavaḥ sakṛd evaināḥ sarvāḥ saṃnahyet sakṛd gārhapatyam īkṣayed ekaikām ājyam avekṣayed iti
20.10.16	ekaikām evāsāṃ sarveṇasarveṇa karmaṇā parinistiṣṭhed ity aupamanyavīputraḥ
20.10.17	granthikaraṇa iti
20.10.18	avācīnapāśam ūrdhvanirmocanam ity ācāryayoḥ
20.10.19	ūrdhvapāśam avācīnanirmocanam iti dīrghavātsyaḥ
20.10.20	evam iva hi prajāḥ prajāyanta iti
20.10.21	patnyām avidyamānāyām iti
20.10.22	sa ha smāha baudhāyano yajamānāyatana āsīno yajamāna evaitān mantrān nigaded iti
20.10.23	atro ha smāha śālīkiḥ patnīsaṃyojakāḥ khalv ete mantrā dṛṣṭā bhavanti
20.10.24	tasyām avidyamānāyāṃ naivainān ādriyeteti
20.10.25	athainām ājyam avekṣayatīti
20.10.26	sūtraṃ śālīkeḥ
20.10.27	atro ha smāha baudhāyanaḥ patnyā tad avekṣitam upayacchīta tejo 'sīti
20.10.28	athainac chakalenopayatya haret tejo 'nu prehīti
20.10.29	athainad āhavanīye 'dhiśrayed agnis te tejo mā vinaid iti
20.10.30	athainad dhṛtvottareṇa prokṣaṇīḥ sādayitvāvekṣitvotpunuyād ājyavatībhyāṃ prokṣaṇīr iti
20.10.31	ājyasyāvekṣaṇa iti
20.10.32	sūtraṃ baudhāyanasya
20.10.33	sarvair evāvekṣitam ājyam utpunuyād iti śālīkiḥ
20.10.34	ājyagrahāṇāṃ grahaṇa iti
20.10.35	sa ha smāha baudhāyano 'dhvaryur evobhayair mantrair gṛhṇīyāt pauroḍāśikaiś ca yājamānaiś ca
20.10.36	yājamānair yajamāno 'numantrayeteti
20.10.37	atro ha smāha śālīkir adhvaryur evobhayair mantrair gṛhṇīyāt pauroḍāśikaiś ca yājamānaiś ca
20.10.38	na yājamānair yajamāno 'numantrayeteti

20.10.41	tristrir ekaikaṃ prokṣed iti baudhāyanaḥ
20.10.42	sakṛtsakṛd iti śālīkiḥ
20.11.1	barhiṣaḥ prokṣaṇa iti
20.11.2	sūtraṃ śālīkeḥ
20.11.3	atro ha smāha baudhāyanas tiṣṭhan dive tvety agrāṇi prokṣet prahvo 'ntarikṣāya tveti madhyāny upaviśya pṛthivyai tveti mūlāni
20.11.4	saha srucā purastāt pratyañcaṃ granthiṃ pratyukṣyātiśiṣṭāḥ prokṣāṇīr ninayed dakṣiṇāyai śroṇer ottarāyai śroṇeḥ svadhā pitṛbhya ūrg bhava barhiṣadbhya ūrjā pṛthivīṃ gacchateti

20.11.7	jaghanenātmānam udīcīm udūhed iti śālīkiḥ

20.11.11	pūrvaḥ kalpaḥ śālīker uttaro baudhāyanasya
20.11.12	śulbasyāyātana iti
20.11.13	sūtraṃ baudhāyanasya

20.11.15	vedyai staraṇa iti

20.11.17	ata evaināṃ prācīṃ dhātuśa stṛṇīyād iti śālīkiḥ
20.11.18	paridhīnāṃ paridhāna iti

20.11.20	anīkasaṃspṛṣṭān evainān paridadhyād iti śālīkiḥ
20.11.21	atha sūryeṇa purastāt paridadhātīti
20.11.22	sūtraṃ baudhāyanasya
20.11.23	āhavanīyam evaitena yajuṣopatiṣṭheteti śālīkiḥ

20.12.1	dohanapavitrasyāsādana iti

20.12.17	āghārāv iti

20.12.19	abhīṣū iva vyatiṣaktau syātām iti śālīkiḥ
20.12.20	saṃpraiṣa iti
20.12.21	agnīd agnīn iti baudhāyanaḥ
20.12.22	agnim agnīd iti śālīkiḥ
20.12.23	agnīt paridhīṃś cāgniṃ cety aupamanyavaḥ
20.12.24	atyākramaṇa iti

20.12.26	dakṣiṇena pradāsyann atyākrāmed dhutvāmutaḥ savyeneti śālīkiḥ
20.12.27	āśrāvaṇa iti

20.12.31	pravara iti
20.12.32	sūtraṃ śālīkeḥ
20.12.33	atro ha smāha baudhāyana utkara ūrdhvāgraṃ sphyaṃ nihatya pravaraṃ pravṛṇīyād atraiva ca sphyam udasyed upariṣṭāc copaspṛśed iti
20.12.34	hotur varaṇa iti
20.12.35	sa ha smāha baudhāyano yady asya pitā vācāryo vā jyāyān vā hotā syād upāṃśv eteṣāṃ gurūṇāṃ nāmāni gṛhṇīyād iti
20.12.36	uccair eva hotur nāma gṛhṇīyād iti śālīkiḥ
20.13.1	abhikrāmaṃ juhotīti
20.13.2	sa ha smāha baudhāyanaḥ sarveṇābhikrāmet padbhyām āhutībhiḥ svareṇa
20.13.3	uttarāmuttarām āhutiṃ jyāyasīṃjyāyasīṃ juhuyād iti
20.13.4	padbhyām evābhikrāmaṃ samānatrāhutīr juhuyād iti śālīkiḥ
20.13.5	samānatra tiṣṭhann āhutībhir evābhikrāmed ity aupamanyavaḥ
20.13.6	samānatraiva tiṣṭhan pradakṣiṇam anudiśaṃ hutvā madhye svāhākāraṃ juhuyād ity āñjīgaviḥ
20.13.7	ājyabhāgayor homa iti
20.13.8	pūrvārdhe pratimukhaṃ prabāhug juhuyād iti baudhāyanaḥ
20.13.9	pūrvārdha eva prabāhug iti śālīkiḥ
20.13.10	haviṣām avadāna iti
20.13.11	sa ha smāha baudhāyanaḥ pūrvārdhād evāgre prathamaṃ mukhyasya haviṣo 'vadyed athāparārdhāt
20.13.12	evam asya pradakṣiṇaṃ haviṣām avattaṃ bhavatīti
20.13.13	atro ha smāha śālīkir aparārdhād evāgre prathamaṃ mukhyasya haviṣo 'vadyed atha pūrvārdhāt
20.13.14	evam asya prāksaṃsthāni havīṃṣi bhavantīti
20.13.15	madhyāt pūrvārdhāt paścārdhāt pañcāvattinām ity aupamanyavaḥ
20.13.16	āhutīnām āyatana iti
20.13.17	sa ha smāha baudhāyanas trīṇy evaitāny ādiṣṭasthānāni bhavanty ājyabhāgau sviṣṭakṛt
20.13.18	athetarā yathāvakāśaṃ juhuyād iti
20.13.19	praṣṭīr evāhutīr juhvat pūrvārdhe sviṣṭakṛtaṃ juhuyād iti śālīkiḥ
20.13.20	srucyam āghārapatham abhijuhuyād ity aupamanyavaḥ
20.13.21	madhye pradakṣiṇaṃ maṇḍalākāram iti rāthītaraḥ
20.13.22	upāṃśuyājasya karaṇa iti
20.13.23	sūtraṃ maudgalyasya
20.13.24	atro ha smāha baudhāyana auṣadhasyopāṃśuyājaṃ kuryād agnīṣomīyaṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ vaiṣṇavam amāvāsyāyām iti
20.13.25	atro ha smāha śālīkir ājyasyopāṃśuyājaṃ kuryāt saumyaṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ vaiṣṇavam amāvāsyāyām iti
20.13.26	atro ha smāhaupamanyava auṣadhasyaivopāṃśuyājaṃ kuryāt sarasvataḥ paurṇamāsyāṃ sarasvatyā amāvāsyāyām iti
20.13.27	ubhayatraivājyasya vaiṣṇava iti rāthītaraḥ
20.13.28	atro ha smāha kauṇapatantriś caruś ca syād vaiṣṇavaś ca syāt svayaṃ caiva yajamānaḥ prāśnīyād iti

20.13.30	auṣadhasyābhivardhayed iti baudhāyanaḥ

20.23.1	viparidhāna iti
20.23.2	sa ha smāha baudhāyana āhavanīyenaikena viparidhāya pravrajet
20.23.3	proṣya punarāgamya sarvair mantrair āhavanīyaṃ pratyupatiṣṭheteti
20.23.4	atro ha smāha śālīkir yathopapannam evāgnibhir viparidhāya pravrajet
20.23.5	proṣya punarāgamya sarvair mantrair ekaikaṃ pratyupatiṣṭheteti
20.23.6	anupasthāya pravrajitasyeti
20.23.7	yatra smaret parokṣaṃ tata enaṃ nityenopatiṣṭheteti baudhāyanaḥ
20.23.8	na cet smaret proṣya punarāgamya nityenaiveti śālīkiḥ
20.23.9	pravasathāhutāv iti
20.23.10	sa ha smāha baudhāyano yadi kṛtaṃ prāyaścittaṃ syān nādriyeta tatra hotum
20.23.11	atha yady akṛtaṃ syāt tatraināṃ juhuyād iti
20.23.12	atro ha smāha śālīkir ye pratyāmnātaprāyaścittā bhreṣāḥ syus tāny eva tatra pāyaścittāni syuḥ
20.23.13	atha ye 'pratyāmnātaprāyaścittā bhreṣāḥ syur naivainām ādriyeteti
20.23.14	atro ha smāhaupamanyavo yadi caiva kṛtaṃ prāyaścittaṃ syād yadi cākṛtaṃ juhuyād eva tatra pravasathāhutim iti
20.23.15	virājakrameṣv iti
20.23.16	pūrvaḥ kalpo baudhāyanasyottaraḥ śālīkeḥ
20.23.17	apām ācamana iti
20.23.18	dvir mantreṇāpa ācāmet sakṛt tūṣṇīm iti baudhāyanaḥ
20.23.19	sakṛn mantreṇāpa ācāmed dvis tūṣṇīm iti śālīkiḥ
20.23.20	sākṣīkaraṇa iti
20.23.21	sa ha smāha baudhāyanaḥ sarvā evaitā devatāḥ sākṣiṇīḥ kurvītāgne vratapate vrataṃ cariṣyāmīti
20.23.22	agnir vai devānāṃ vratapatir ity etad eva nātimanyeteti śālīkiḥ
20.23.23	kapāle naṣṭe bhinne veti
20.23.24	sūtram ācāryayoḥ
20.23.25	atro ha smāhaupamanyavo mano jyotir juṣatāṃ trayastriṃśat tantava ity ete sruvāhutī hutvāthānyad apisṛjed gharmo devāṃ apyetv iti
20.23.26	sa eṣa mantro bhavati saṃ tvā siñcāmi yajuṣeti
20.23.27	payo vājyaṃ vāsiktam etenaiva mantreṇa saṃsiñced iti
20.23.28	ājyagrahāṇāṃ grahaṇa iti
20.23.29	sa ha smāha baudhāyano 'dhvaryur evobhayair mantrair gṛhṇīyāt pauroḍāśikaiś ca yājamānaiś ca
20.23.30	yājamānair yajamāno 'numantrayeteti
20.23.31	atro ha smāha śālīkir adhvaryur evobhayair mantrair gṛhṇīyāt pauroḍāśikaiś ca yājamānaiś ca
20.23.32	na yājamānair yajamāno 'numantrayeteti
20.23.33	atro ha smāhaupamanyavo yathāpi pauroḍāśikā mantrā nābhivartanta evam evāpi yājamānā mantrā nābhivarterann iti
20.23.34	paridhīnāṃ paridhāna iti
20.23.35	sa ha smāha baudhāyano 'dhvaryur evobhayair mantraiḥ paridadhyāt pauroḍāśikaiś ca yājamānaiś ca
20.23.36	yājamānair yajamāno 'numantrayeteti
20.23.37	atro ha smāha śālīkir adhvaryur evobhayair mantraiḥ paridadhyāt pauroḍāśikaiś ca yājamānaiś ca na yājamānair yajamāno 'numantrayeteti
20.23.38	atro ha smāhaupamanyavo yathāpi pauroḍāśikā mantrā nābhivartanta evam evāpi yājamānā mantrā nābhivarterann iti

20.24.1	atha bhūr bhuvaḥ suvar ity agnihotram etābhir vyāhṛtībhir upasādayed iti
20.24.2	sa evam eva saṃvatsaresaṃvatsara iti sūtraṃ śālīkeḥ
20.24.3	atro ha smāha baudhāyano yasyāṃ rātryām ādita upasādayet saṃvatsare paryavete tasyām upasādya na tata ūrdhvam ādriyeteti
20.24.4	atro ha smāhaupamanyavo 'bhyārūḍhaḥ khalv asyaiva saṃvatsaro bhavati
20.24.5	yasyāṃ rātryām ādita upasādayet saṃvatsare paryavete yā tataḥ pūrvā rātriḥ syāt tasyām upasādya na tata ūrdhvam ādriyeteti
20.24.6	darśapūrṇamāsāv ālabhamāna etābhir vyāhṛtībhir havīṃṣy āsādayed iti

20.24.9	atro ha smāhaupamanyavo 'bhyārūḍhaḥ khalv asyaiva saṃvatsaro bhavati
20.24.10	yasyāṃ paurṇamāsyām ādita āsādayet saṃvatsare paryavete yā tataḥ pūrvā paurṇamāsī syāt tasyām āsādya na tata ūrdhvam ādriyeteti
20.24.11	cāturmāsyāny ālabhamāna etābhir vyāhṛtībhir havīṃṣy āsādayed iti
20.24.12	sa evam eva saṃvatsaresaṃvatsara iti sūtraṃ śālīkeḥ
20.24.13	atro ha smāha baudhāyano yasyāṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ vaiśvadevahavīṃṣy āsādayet saṃvatsare paryavete tasyāṃ vaiśvadevahavīṃṣy āsādya na tata ūrdhvam ādriyeteti
20.24.14	atro ha smāhaupamanyavo 'bhyārūḍhaḥ khalv asyaiva saṃvatsaro bhavati
20.24.15	yāsyāṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ vaiśvadevahavīṃṣy āsādayet saṃvatsare paryavete yā tataḥ pūrvā paurṇamāsī syāt tasyāṃ śunāsīrīyahavīṃṣy āsādya na tata ūrdhvam ādriyeteti
20.24.16	vyāhṛtīnāṃ dhāna iti

20.24.18	prāśītre 'vadīyamāne japatīti
20.24.19	sūtraṃ maitreyasya
20.24.20	athācāryayoḥ prāśitre 'vadīyamāne japaty agnir mā duriṣṭāt pātu savitāghaśaṃsād iti
20.24.21	yajamānabhāge yo me 'nti dūre 'rātīyati tam etena jeṣam iti
20.24.22	sarva evaiṣa sviṣṭakṛd anumantraṇo mantraḥ syād ity aupamanyavaḥ
20.24.23	vede yajamānaṃ vācayatīti
20.24.24	sūtraṃ śālīkeḥ
20.24.25	atro ha smāha baudhāyano vede yajamānaṃ vācayati vedo 'si vittir asi videyeti

20.24.27	tad evāsya sarvaṃ vṛṅkta iti
20.24.28	atha yadi yajamānaḥ surāpo vā bhavati pravasati veti
20.24.29	sa ha smāha baudhāyanaḥ pravasataḥ prastareṇaivāsya saha yajamānabhāgam anuprahared dhruvāyai vājyena paryupastīrya juhvām avadhāya juhuyāt
20.24.30	prastarabhūyaṃ yajamānabhāgo gacchatīti
20.24.31	atro ha smāha śālīkir ādita eva na surāpeṇa saṃsṛjyeta

20.24.33	bhakṣayec caiva bhakṣān ity aupamanyavaḥ

21.11.17	tūṣṇīm iti śālīkiḥ
21.11.18	prāyaṇīyasya caryāyā iti

21.11.20	uccair iti śālīkiḥ
21.11.21	ādityasyodīkṣaṇa iti

21.11.23	anantardhāyaiveti śālīkiḥ

21.11.25	sadasaḥ kāle 'tivitsayed iti baudhāyanaḥ

21.11.27	somakrayaṇyai padasyānunikramaṇa iti

21.12.1	udapātrasyopaninayana iti

21.12.3	yathopapādam iti śālīkiḥ
21.12.4	rājña upasthāna iti
21.12.5	sa ha smāha baudhāyana uṣasā nāmeyam oṣadhir bhavati
21.12.6	tāṃ dūtīṃ kurvītaiṣa te gāyatro bhāga iti me somāya brūtād eṣa te traiṣṭubho bhāga iti me somāya brūtād eṣa te jāgato bhāga iti me somāya brūtāc chandomānāṃ sāmrājyaṃ gaccheti me somāya brūtād iti
21.12.7	atro ha smāha śālīkiḥ pratyakṣaḥ khalv ayaṃ rājā bhavati pratyakṣavad evopatiṣṭhetaiṣa te gāyatro bhāga eṣa te traiṣṭubho bhāga eṣa te jāgato bhāgaś chandomānāṃ sāmrājyaṃ gaccheti

21.12.10	nigadann evaitām ṛcaṃ pañca kṛtvo mimīteti śālīkiḥ

21.12.12	sūtraṃ baudhāyanasya
21.12.13	gavā te krīṇānīty eva brūyād iti śālīkiḥ

21.12.22	ūrdhvagrīveṇa bahirlomneti śālīkiḥ

21.14.1	stambayajuṣo haraṇa iti

21.14.23	havirdhānayoḥ prokṣaṇa iti

21.14.28	atro ha smāha baudhāyano dakṣiṇasya havirdhānasya vartanim abhijuhuyāt sarvā akṣadhura upāñjyāt sarvataś ca parimṛśed iti
21.14.29	atro ha smāha śālīkiḥ sarvā eva vartanīr abhijuhuyāt sarvā akṣadhura upāñjyāt sarvataś ca parimṛśed iti

21.15.23	dhiṣṇiyānāṃ nivapana iti

22.8.3	pūrvedyur eva purīṣacitiṃ parinistiṣṭhed iti śālīkiḥ
22.8.4	aśvāv abhitas tiṣṭhetāṃ kṛṣṇā uttaraḥ śveto dakṣiṇa iti
22.8.5	atraivābhyāṃ tiṣṭhadbhyāṃ ghāsam āhārayed iti baudhāyanaḥ
22.8.6	kālekāla evaināv udānayeyur iti śālīkiḥ
22.8.7	vālakhilyānām upadhāna iti
22.8.8	upariṣṭād vālakhilyā upadadhyād iti baudhāyanaḥ
22.8.9	pārśvata iti śālīkiḥ
22.8.10	sṛṣṭīnām āyātana iti
22.8.11	agreṇa svayamātṛṇṇām udīcīrenā āyātayed ottarasmāt pakṣasaṃdheḥ sarvato veti
22.8.12	pūrvaḥ kalpo baudhāyanasyottaraḥ śālīkeḥ
22.8.13	vyuṣṭīnām upadhāna iti
22.8.14	sūtraṃ śālīkeḥ
22.8.15	atro ha smāha baudhāyanaḥ purastād enāḥ pratīcīr upadadhyāt
22.8.16	purastād dhi pratīcī rātrir vyucchatīti
22.8.17	tāsāṃ purīṣavatīṃ madhya upadadhātīti
22.8.18	sa ha smāha baudhāyanaḥ purīṣeṇa vā sahopadadhyāt purīṣaṃ vaiveti
22.8.19	mantrapurīṣaivaiṣā syād iti śālīkiḥ
22.8.20	vairājānām upadhāna iti
22.8.21	pūrvaḥ kalpo baudhāyanasyottaraḥ śālīkeḥ
22.8.22	yājñasenīnām upadhāna iti
22.8.23	pūrvaḥ kalpaḥ śālīker uttaro baudhāyanasya
22.8.24	ghṛteṣṭakānām upadhāna iti
22.8.25	sa ha smāha baudhāyano ghṛtena vā sahopadadhyād ghṛtena vābhyajyeti
22.8.26	mantraghṛtā evaitāḥ syur iti śālīkiḥ
22.8.27	ghṛtapiṇḍān evātropadadhyād ity aupamanyavaḥ
22.8.28	iṣṭakānām āvāpasthāna iti
22.8.29	antareṇa jyotiṣmatīś ca bhūteṣṭakāś caitad iṣṭakānām āvāpasyānaṃ bhavatīti
22.8.30	sa ha smāha baudhāyanaḥ saṃveśanayajuḥ prabuddhayajuḥ prayāṇayajur aparyāṇayajuḥ sāmidhenīr āprīr atītāṃś ceṣṭakāgaṇān atropadadhyād iti
22.8.31	atro ha smāha śālīkir nāniṣṭakaṃ mantram iṣṭakāvad āpādayet
22.8.32	atītān eveṣṭakāgaṇān atropadadhyād iti
22.8.33	paurṇamāsyā upadhāna iti
22.8.34	sūtraṃ baudhāyanasya
22.8.35	uttara evāṃse paurṇamāsīm upadadhyād iti śālīkiḥ
22.8.36	nakṣatreṣṭakānām upadhāna iti
22.8.37	sūtraṃ śālīkeḥ
22.8.38	atro ha smāha baudhāyanaḥ pratitārakaṃ cātreṣṭakā upadadhyāt tatratatra ca rocayed iti
22.8.39	sarvatomukhasyopadhāna iti
22.8.40	sūtraṃ śālīkeḥ
22.8.41	atro ha smāha baudhāyano vyavetaṃ khalv idaṃ kṛṣṇasyābhimarśanena bhavati
22.8.42	sarvatomukham upadhāsyañ chvetam aśvam abhimṛśed iti
22.8.43	vardhaneṣv iti
22.8.44	sūtraṃ śālīkeḥ
22.8.45	atro ha smāha baudhāyano yāvanti vardhanāni samāne 'hani saṃnipateyuḥ sarveṣāṃ pāre tayādevatasūdadohasaḥ kurvīteti
22.9.1	atha prokṣaṇīṣu hiraṇyaśalkān pratyasyaty ūrdhvaṃ tribhyo 'parimitān iti sahasram iti proktaṃ
22.9.2	pūrvaḥ kalpo baudhāyanasyottaraḥ śālīkeḥ
22.9.3	śatarudrīyasya homa iti
22.9.4	sūtram ācāryayoḥ
22.9.5	pūrvasminn evānīke juhuyād iti gautamaḥ
22.9.6	namaskārair upasthāna iti
22.9.7	sa ha smāha baudhāyanaḥ sadhanuṣka evopatiṣṭhetottarasyā eva diśa āvṛtyaitenaiva yathetam etya paścāt prāṅ tiṣṭhann ūrdhvām upatiṣṭheteti
22.9.8	atro ha smāha śālīkir dattvaiva dhanur upatiṣṭhetaitasyai caiva diśa āvṛtyaitenaiva yathetam etya paścāt prāṅ tiṣṭhann ūrdhvām upatiṣṭheteti
22.9.9	pariṣicyamāne yajamānaṃ vācayatīti
22.9.10	sūtraṃ śālīkeḥ
22.9.11	atro ha smāha baudhāyanaḥ pariṣicyapariṣicyaivāśmani kumbhaṃ nidadhyāt
22.9.12	aśmaṃs te kṣud amuṃ te śug ṛcchatv ity abhinirdiśed yaṃ dviṣyād iti
22.9.13	vikarṣaṇa iti
22.9.14	ardharcaśo vikarṣed iti baudhāyanaḥ
22.9.15	ṛcarceti śālīkiḥ
22.9.16	svayamātṛṇṇāyai vyāghāraṇa iti
22.9.17	sūtraṃ baudhāyanasya
22.9.18	agnicaturaśrām enāṃ vyāghārayed iti śālīkiḥ
22.9.19	vaiśvānaramārutānāṃ mantrāmantra iti
22.9.20	mantravantaḥ syur iti baudhāyanaḥ
22.9.21	tūṣṇīkā iti śālīkiḥ
22.9.22	vaiśvānara eva mantravān syāt tūṣṇīkā mārutā ity aupamanyavaḥ
22.9.23	ānīkavatasya homa iti
22.9.24	sūtraṃ baudhāyanasya
22.9.25	āhavanīya evānīkavataṃ juhuyād iti śālīkiḥ
22.9.26	athainaṃ saṃcitam ājyaprokṣeṇa prokṣatīti
22.9.27	sūtraṃ śālīkeḥ
22.9.28	atro ha smāha baudhāyano mantrānudiśaṃ cainaṃ prokṣan mantrānulokaṃ ceti
22.9.29	idhmasya nidhāna iti
22.9.30	sa ha smāha baudhāyana ubhayenedhmaṃ nidadhyād ādhvarikeṇa cāgnikena ceti
22.9.31	āgnikenaiveti śālīkiḥ
22.10.1	śākalaiḥ paridhāna iti
22.10.2	āhavanīyaṃ paridadhyād iti baudhāyanaḥ
22.10.3	puccham eveti śālīkiḥ
22.10.4	sruvāhutyoḥ karaṇa iti

22.10.6	na kuryād iti śālīkiḥ

22.10.9	na kuryād iti śālīkiḥ
22.10.10	atra juhvan manasā diśo dhyāyed iti
22.10.11	digbhyo 'ham agnim abhisaṃbharāṇīti vā tūṣṇīṃ veti
22.10.12	pūrvaḥ kalpo baudhāyanasyottaraḥ śālīkeḥ
22.10.13	prasekasyāyātana iti

22.10.17	nopastṛṇīteti śālīkiḥ
22.10.18	prasekasyānupraharaṇa iti

22.10.20	nānuprahared iti śālīkiḥ

22.10.23	etasminn eveti śālīkiḥ
22.10.24	brahmaudanasya prāśana iti
22.10.25	uttare śroṇyante prāśnīyur iti baudhāyanaḥ
22.10.26	puccham evābhita iti śālīkiḥ
22.10.27	vātanāmānāṃ homa iti

22.10.29	vātam apy atrāñjalinā juhuyād iti śālīkiḥ

22.10.31	śākalānām anupraharaṇa iti
22.10.32	anuprahared iti baudhāyanaḥ
22.10.33	nānuprahared iti śālīkiḥ
22.11.1	agnidhiṣṇiyānām upadhāna iti
22.11.2	sūtraṃ baudhāyanasya
22.11.3	sarvā eva yājuṣīr upadadhyād iti śālīkiḥ
22.11.4	nānābījānāṃ nirvapaṇa iti
22.11.5	nirvapaṇenānusametya vyabhimṛśed iti baudhāyanaḥ
22.11.6	tattad eva haviḥ parinistiṣṭhed iti śālīkiḥ
22.11.7	teṣāṃ vrīhiṣv eva haviṣkṛtam udvādayaty upodyacchante yavān iti
22.11.8	sūtraṃ śālīkeḥ
22.11.9	atro ha smāha baudhāyana āvapanaprabhṛti yaveṣu mantrakarmābhyāvarteta tantraṃ tu haviṣkṛt syād iti
22.11.10	āpyaninayana iti
22.11.11	jaghanena gārhapatyam āpyebhyo ninayed iti baudhāyanaḥ
22.11.12	agreṇātihāyeti śālīkiḥ
22.11.13	agreṇa vā jaghanena vety aupamanyavaḥ
22.11.14	sacarupaśupuroḍāśā evetareṣāṃ haviṣām iḍā avadyed abhyardhād veti
22.11.15	sapaśupuroḍāśānāṃ veti
22.11.16	pūrvaḥ kalpo baudhāyanasyottaraḥ śālīkeḥ
22.11.17	atyākramaṇa iti
22.11.18	sūtraṃ baudhāyanasya
22.11.19	saha sviṣṭakṛtātyākrāmed iti śālīkiḥ
22.11.20	abhiṣeka iti
22.11.21	sūtram ācāryayoḥ
22.11.22	atro ha smāhaupamanyavaḥ purastāt sviṣṭakṛto yāvad āmnātenābhiṣiñcen nātra kṛṣṇājinaṃ na rukmau na pārthāni bhavanti kuśān eva saṃstīrya teṣv enam abhiṣiñced iti
22.11.23	yoge vimoka iti
22.11.24	aharahar yuñjyād aharahar vimuñced iti baudhāyanaḥ
22.11.25	aharahar yuñjyād ante vimuñced iti śālīkiḥ
22.11.26	ādita eva yuñjyād ante vimuñced ity aupamanyavaḥ
22.11.27	kratukaraṇa iti
22.11.28	sūtraṃ baudhāyanasya
22.11.29	yathākratv evāsya kratukaraṇāni kuryād iti śālīkiḥ
22.11.30	aikādaśinānāṃ paśūnām upākaraṇa iti

22.11.32	ekayūpa evaikādaśinān paśūn upākuryād iti śālīkiḥ

22.16.24	saṃtanīnām anuprayoga iti
22.16.25	sa ha smāha baudhāyano yad ahar iṣṭyā vā paśunā vā yajetāpi tad ahaḥ saṃtanī prayuñjīteti
22.16.26	atro ha smāha śālīkir aharahar āśrāvaṇārthe khalv ete dṛṣṭe bhavataḥ
22.16.27	yad ahar iṣṭyā vā paśunā vā yajeta na tad ahaḥ saṃtanī prayuñjīteti
22.16.28	cāturmāsyānām anuprayoga iti
22.16.29	sa ha smāha baudhāyano yad ahaś cāturmāsyāni prayuñjītāpi tad ahaḥ saṃtanī prayuñjīteti
22.16.30	atro ha smāha śālīkir aharahar āśrāvaṇārthe khalv ete dṛṣṭe bhavataḥ
22.16.31	yad ahaś cāturmāsyāni prayuñjīta na tad ahaḥ saṃtanī prayuñjīteti

22.21.1	teṣām utthāneṣv iti

22.21.7	itareṣām eva haviṣāṃ na bārhaspatyasyeti śālīkiḥ

23.1.1	athāta iṣṭikalpaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ
23.1.2	sa ha smāha baudhāyanaḥ pañcadaśasāmidhenīkāḥ syur vārtraghnāv ājyabhāgāv uccairdevatā iti
23.1.3	atro ha smāha śālīkiḥ saptadaśasāmidhenīkāḥ syur vṛdhanvantāv ājyabhāgāv upāṃśudevatā iti
23.1.4	yājamānasya karaṇa iti
23.1.5	saṃsiddham iṣṭipathe yājamānaṃ kuryād iti baudhāyanaḥ
23.1.6	kuryād yathāvakāśaṃ yājamānam iti śālīkiḥ
23.1.7	agnaye pathikṛte puroḍāśam aṣṭākapālaṃ nirvaped yo darśapūrṇamāsayājī sann amāvāsyāṃ vā paurṇamāsīṃ vātipādayed iti
23.1.8	sa ha smāha baudhāyanaḥ pāthikṛtaṃ nirupya vaiśvānaraṃ dvādaśakapālam anunirvaped athātipannāṃ pratiyajed iti
23.1.9	atro ha smāha śālīkiḥ pāthikṛtaṃ nirupya vaiśvānaraṃ dvādaśakapālaṃ samānatantram anunirvapen na cātipannāṃ pratiyajed iti
23.1.10	anyatareṇaiva sahātipannāṃ pratiyajed ity aupamanyavaḥ
23.1.11	atro ha smāhāñjīgavir vi vā etasya yajñaś chidyate yasya tantre pratate 'nyat tantraṃ pratāyate
23.1.12	ya evaiṣo 'cyuta āgneyo 'ṣṭākapālas tam eva paurṇamāsyāṃ vāmāvāsyāyāṃ vā pāthikṛtaṃ kuryān na cātipannāṃ pratiyajed iti
23.1.13	agnaye vratapataye puroḍāśam aṣṭākapālaṃ nirvaped ya āhitāgniḥ sann avratyam iva cared iti
23.1.14	ādhānaprabhṛty evaitad uktaṃ bhavatīti baudhāyanaḥ
23.1.15	anvāhiteṣu caivopasamāhiteṣu cāgniṣv iti śālīkiḥ
23.1.16	agnaye rakṣoghne puroḍāśam aṣṭākapālaṃ nirvaped yaṃ rakṣāṃsi sacerann iti
23.1.17	hutvāgnihotram iṣṭiṃ saṃsthāpayed iti baudhāyanaḥ
23.1.18	saṃsthitāyām iṣṭyām agnihotraṃ juhuyād iti śālīkiḥ
23.1.19	agnaye rudravate puroḍāśam aṣṭākapālaṃ nirvaped abhicarann iti
23.1.20	sa ha smāha baudhāyano lohitoṣṇīṣā lohitavāsasaś cartvijaḥ pracareyur iti
23.1.21	yājyāpuro'nuvākyābhyām evaitad uktaṃ bhavatīti śālīkiḥ
23.1.22	agnaye surabhimate puroḍāśam aṣṭākapālaṃ nirvaped yasya gāvo vā puruṣā vā pramīyeran yo vā bibhīyād iti
23.1.23	sa ha smāha baudhāyanaḥ prokṣaṇīṣu ca gandhān āvapeyur gandhavantaś cartvijaḥ pracareyur iti
23.1.24	yājyāpuro'nuvākyābhyām evaitad uktaṃ bhavatīti śālīkiḥ
23.1.25	agnaye kāmāya puroḍāśam aṣṭākapālaṃ nirvaped yaṃ kāmo nopanamed iti
23.1.26	sa ha smāha baudhāyano yā tatrāmnātā syāt tāṃ cen nirvapataḥ kāmo na samṛdhyetāthaivaṃ kuryād iti
23.1.27	eṣaiva sārvakāmikī syād iti śālīkiḥ
23.1.28	kāmekāma eṣā syād ity aupamanyavaḥ
23.1.29	agnaye jyotiṣmate puroḍāśam aṣṭākapālaṃ nirvaped yasyāgnir uddhṛto 'hute 'gnihotra udvāyed iti
23.1.30	sūtraṃ śālīkeḥ
23.1.31	atro ha smāha baudhāyano manthanam adhimanthanam upasamindhanam ity etān mantrān nigaded iti
23.1.32	vaiśvānaraṃ dvādaśakapālaṃ nirvapet putre jāta iti
23.1.33	sa ha smāha baudhāyana utthitāyāṃ nirdaśāyāṃ vaiśvānaraṃ dvādaśakapālaṃ nirvapet saṃsrāvasya ca kumāraṃ pralehayed iti
23.1.34	jātam eva viditveti śālīkir na ca saṃsrāvasya kumāraṃ pralehayed iti
23.1.35	anantare parvaṇīty aupamanyavaḥ
23.2.1	viparyastahaviṣīti
23.2.2	mārutaḥ prathamaṃ mantrakarma labheteti baudhāyanaḥ
23.2.3	avadānata iti śālīkiḥ
23.2.4	pradānata ity aupamanyavaḥ
23.2.5	cātuṣprāśyād ity aupamanyavīputraḥ
23.2.6	vaiśvānaraṃ dvādaśakapālaṃ nirvaped āyatanaṃ gatveti
23.2.7	yatraiva yatiṣyamāṇaḥ syāt tad āyatanam
23.2.8	tad gatvā vaiśvānaraṃ dvādaśakapālaṃ nirvaped iti baudhāyanaḥ
23.2.9	svasthāneṣv evāgniṣv iti śālīkiḥ
23.2.10	yayā rajjvottamāṃ gām ājed iti
23.2.11	sūtraṃ baudhāyanasya
23.2.12	imāṃ te 'sau prāhaiṣīd ity eva brūyād iti śālīkiḥ
23.2.13	balbajān apīdhme saṃnahyed iti
23.2.14	sūtraṃ baudhāyanasya
23.2.15	balbajānām apy atra barhiḥ saṃnaddhaṃ bhavatīti śālīkiḥ
23.2.16	āgnāvaiṣṇavam ekādaśakapālaṃ nirvaped abhicarann iti
23.2.17	sūtraṃ baudhāyanasya
23.2.18	pratyabhicarantam eva viditveti śālīkiḥ
23.2.19	sārasvatam ājyam iti
23.2.20	mantraniruptam etad ghṛtaṃ syād iti baudhāyanaḥ
23.2.21	tūṣṇīkam iti śālīkiḥ
23.2.22	kālekāla evainad dhruvājyād gṛhṇīyād ity aupamanyavaḥ
23.2.23	adhvarakalpāyām iti
23.2.24	sa ha smāha baudhāyana iḍāntaṃ prathamaṃ tantraṃ kuryād evaṃ dvitīyaṃ tṛtīyena sahāvaśeṣaṃ vartayed iti
23.2.25	atro ha smāha śālīkir ā praṇīnāt prathamasya tantrasya pariśāyayet
23.2.26	eva dvitīyam eva tṛtīyam
23.2.27	tṛtīyena sahāvaśeṣaṃ vartayed iti
23.2.28	sapūrṇapātraviṣṇukramā ity aupamanyavaḥ
23.2.29	yo brahmavarcasakāmaḥ syāt tasmā etaṃ somāraudraṃ caruṃ tiṣyāpūrṇamāse nirvaped iti
23.2.30	upavasathīye 'han nirvaped iti baudhāyanaḥ
23.2.31	yajanīye 'hann iti śālīkiḥ
23.2.32	ājyaṃ prokṣaṇam ājyena mārjayanta iti
23.2.33	udakumbha ājyasruvaṃ pratyasyed iti baudhāyanaḥ
23.2.34	prokṣaṇaṃ caiva mārjanaṃ cājyena kuryād athetarad adbhiḥ kuryād iti śālīkiḥ
23.2.35	yat kiṃ cādbhiḥ kāryaṃ syāt sarvaṃ tad ājyena kuryād ity aupamanyavaḥ
23.2.36	yadi bibhīyād duścarmā bhaviṣyāmīti somāpauṣṇaṃ caruṃ nirvaped iti
23.2.37	vijñāteṣu rūpeṣu nirvaped iti baudhāyanaḥ
23.2.38	purastād eva śaṅkamāna iti śālīkiḥ
23.2.39	ardheṣv iti
23.2.40	saṃsthitāyām iṣṭyām ardhān abhyādadhyād iti baudhāyanaḥ
23.2.41	atraiva pariśayīrann iti śālīkiḥ
23.3.1	viparyastahaviṣīti
23.3.2	mārutaḥ prathamaṃ mantrakarma labheteti baudhāyanaḥ
23.3.3	avadānata iti śālīkiḥ
23.3.4	pradānata ity aupamanyavaḥ
23.3.5	cātuṣprāśyād ity aupamanyavīputraḥ
23.3.6	mārutībhyāṃ hotā yajatīti
23.3.7	sa ha smāha baudhāyana ādita eva hotā maruta āvāhayed anuvācanato 'dhvaryur iti
23.3.8	yājyāpuro'nuvākyābhyām evaitad uktaṃ bhavatīti śālīkiḥ
23.3.9	ādityebhyo bhuvadvadbhyaś caruṃ nirvaped bhūtikāma iti
23.3.10	sūtraṃ śālīkeḥ
23.3.11	atro ha smāha baudhāyanaḥ sarvāḥ sapadāḥ sarvāḥ sasāvitrāḥ sarvāḥ samayūkhedhmā iti
23.3.12	padapāṃsūnāṃ haraṇa iti
23.3.13	sūtraṃ śālīkeḥ
23.3.14	atro ha smāha baudhāyanaḥ samastenaivāsya mantreṇa padapāṃsūn hṛtvottaravargya āvapet
23.3.15	atha tūṣṇīm urasy anuninayed iti
23.3.16	śataṃ suvarṇāni kṛṣṇalāni bhavantīti
23.3.17	sūtraṃ baudhāyanasya
23.3.18	upaśatāny evaitāni syur iti śālīkiḥ parihārayec caiṣām iti
23.3.19	catvāricatvāri kṛṣṇalāny avadyati caturavattasyāptyā iti
23.3.20	sa ha smāha baudhāyano yāny avattāni syur juhuyād eva tāni
23.3.21	atha yāni bhakṣārthāni syus tad vyavagṛhītāny eva tāni syuḥ
23.3.22	athetarāṇi samāvaccho vibhajerann iti
23.3.23	atro ha smāha śālīkir yāny avattāni syur juhuyād eva tāni
23.3.24	atha yāni bhakṣārthāni syus tad vyavagṛhītāny eva tāni syuḥ
23.3.25	athetarāṇi prāśitraharaṇa opya brahmaṇe parihārayed iti
23.3.26	yaḥ pāpayakṣmagṛhītaḥ syāt tasmā etam ādityaṃ carum amāvāsyāyāṃ nirvaped iti
23.3.27	upavasathīye 'han nirvaped iti baudhāyanaḥ
23.3.28	yajanīye 'hann iti śālīkiḥ
23.3.29	sāṃgrahaṇyai paridhiṣv iti
23.3.30	aiṣṭikaiḥ paridhāya pauroḍāśikaiḥ paridadhyād iti baudhāyanaḥ
23.3.31	aiṣṭikair eveti śālīkiḥ
23.3.32	āhutīnāṃ homa iti
23.3.33	sūtraṃ śālīkeḥ
23.3.34	atro ha smāha baudhāyana audumbaraiḥ pātrair etā āhutīr juhuyād dhutvā caitāni pātrāṇy atraivānuprahared iti
23.3.35	ājyasyāvekṣaṇa iti
23.3.36	sūtraṃ baudhāyanasya
23.3.37	yan navam ait tan navanīyam abhavad ity etair evājyam avekṣitam utpunuyād iti śālīkiḥ
23.4.1	yāvato 'śvān pratigṛhṇīyāt tāvato vāruṇāṃś catuṣkapālān nirvaped ekātiriktān iti
23.4.2	sa ha smāha baudhāyano vaiśvānareṇaikaṃ pratigṛhṇīyāt
23.4.3	evaṃ dvau
23.4.4	gaṇaṃ tu pratigṛhya kurvīta bahuṣu vāruṇān ekātiriktān iti
23.4.5	atro ha smāha śālīkir vaiśvānareṇaikaṃ pratigṛhṇīyān na tu dvau
23.4.6	gaṇaṃ tu pratigṛhya kurvīta na tu dvayor bahuṣu vā vāruṇān ekātiriktān iti
23.4.7	āmikṣāyai mantrāmantra iti
23.4.8	mantravatī syād iti baudhāyanaḥ
23.4.9	tūṣṇīketi śālīkiḥ
23.4.10	punaḥ samūhati samūhyāvadyatīti
23.4.11	sūtraṃ baudhāyanasya
23.4.12	etair eva mantraiḥ pratisamūhyāvadyed iti śālīkiḥ
23.4.13	trayastriṃśat kapālaṃ puroḍāśaṃ nirvapatīti
23.4.14	sūtraṃ baudhāyanasya
23.4.15	saṃdigdhapuroḍāśa evaiṣa syād iti śālīkiḥ
23.4.16	varṣāhūstambasyābhihoma iti
23.4.17	sūtraṃ baudhāyanasya
23.4.18	yatraiva varṣāhūstambaḥ syāt tad gacched iti śālīkiḥ
23.4.19	kṛṣṇājinasyāvadhavana iti
23.4.20	antarvedi tiṣṭhan kṛṣṇājinam avadhunuyād iti baudhāyanaḥ
23.4.21	bahirvedīti śālīkiḥ
23.4.22	añjaḥsavakārīryai karaṇa iti
23.4.23	kuryād iti baudhāyanaḥ
23.4.24	na kuryād iti śālīkiḥ
23.4.25	saṃsarge prāyaścittakaraṇa iti
23.4.26	sūtram ācāryayoḥ
23.4.27	atro ha smāhaupamanyavo yo nu khalv āhavanīyo 'ta evaiṣa uddhṛto bhavati
23.4.28	grāmayonir anvāhāryapacanaḥ
23.4.29	tatratatra nāsti prāyaścittam
23.4.30	praśasto hi vṛthāgnisaṃsarga iti
23.4.31	itīn nvā imā iṣṭayo vyākhyātāḥ
23.5.1	abhikrāmaṃ juhotīti
23.5.2	kiyati nu khalv etad uktaṃ bhavatīti
23.5.3	pañca prayājā iti baudhāyanaḥ
23.5.4	yat prāk śālāyā iti śālīkiḥ
23.5.5	yadi paśor avadānaṃ naśyed ājyasya pratyākhyāyam avadyed iti
23.5.6	sa ha smāha baudhāyano yadi paśor avadānaṃ naśyed yady ekaṃ yadi dve ājyasya pratyākhyāyam iṣṭvā tat kṛtvā punar yajeteti
23.5.7	atro ha smāha śālīkir yadi paśor avadānaṃ naśyed yady ekaṃ yadi dve ājyasya pratyākhyāyam iṣṭvā tat kṛtvā kṛtam eva manyeta
23.5.8	atha yadi bhūyo 'thaivaṃ kuryād iti
23.5.9	saṃsava iti
23.5.10	yatra kvaca nāvyā vā nadī syād antareṇodayakṣmavatī vāsaṃsavas tatreti baudhāyanaḥ
23.5.11	yatra kvacana śabdā na saṃsṛjyerann asaṃsavas tatreti śālīkiḥ
23.5.12	yatra kvacanāntareṇeyād asaṃsavas tatrety aupamanyavaḥ
23.5.13	prasthayor eva janapadayor asaṃsavas tatrety aupamanyavīputraḥ
23.5.14	nāvidviṣāṇayoḥ saṃsavo vidyata iti chāgaleyabrāhmaṇaṃ bhavatīty āñjīgaviḥ
23.5.15	abhibhūtīnāṃ homa iti
23.5.16	ādhvarā hutvā sāttrāyaṇikā juhuyād iti baudhāyanaḥ
23.5.17	sāttrāyaṇikā eveti śālīkiḥ
23.5.18	dīrṇapravṛtteṣv iti
23.5.19	sūtraṃ śālīkeḥ
23.5.20	atro ha smāha baudhāyano yābhyām etad ṛgbhyāṃ pūtabhṛdādhavanīyayor juhuyāt tābhyāṃ grahegrahe juhuyāt
23.5.21	atha tūṣṇīṃ saṃsrāvam avanayed iti
23.5.22	nitye grahaṇe vaiṣṇavīm ṛcam anuvartayatīti
23.5.23	sūtraṃ baudhāyanasya
23.5.24	pṛṣadājya evaiṣānuvartayitavyā bhavatīti śālīkiḥ
23.5.25	sa ukthamukthaṃ vaiva pratigīryokthaśā ity āha savanaṃsavanaṃ veti
23.5.26	pūrvaḥ kalpo baudhāyanasyottaraḥ śālīkeḥ
23.5.27	pṛṣṭhyagrahāṇāṃ grahaṇa iti
23.5.28	sūtraṃ śālīkeḥ
23.5.29	atro ha smāha baudhāyano yatra kvacaitāny ahāni saṃgaccheyur gṛhṇīyād eva tatra pṛṣṭhyagrahān iti
23.5.30	saṃvatsara evaite dṛṣṭā bhavanti
23.5.31	saṃvatsara evainān gṛhṇīyād ity aupamanyavaḥ
23.5.32	pṛṣṭhyagrahāṇāṃ bhakṣaṇa iti
23.5.33	sa ha smāha baudhāyano 'nusavanabhakṣeṇa caivainān bhakṣayen nityena ceti
23.5.34	nityenaiveti śālīkiḥ
23.5.35	aṃśūnāṃ pravṛṃhaṇa iti
23.5.36	ekaikaśaḥ pravṛhed iti baudhāyanaḥ
23.5.37	sarvān saheti śālīkiḥ
23.6.1	ādhavana iti
23.6.2	vyaticāram ādhunuyād iti baudhāyanaḥ
23.6.3	yathādhavitram iti śālīkiḥ
23.6.4	mekṣayed ity aupamanyavaḥ
23.6.5	aṃśor homa iti
23.6.6	sūtraṃ śālīkeḥ
23.6.7	atro ha smāha baudhāyano yābhyām etad ṛgbhyām upaspṛśet tābhyām enaṃ juhuyāt
23.6.8	atha tūṣṇīm upaspṛśed iti
23.6.9	pṛśnigrahāṇāṃ grahaṇa iti
23.6.10	pūrvaḥ kalpo baudhāyanasyottaraḥ śālīkeḥ
23.6.11	tena kakṣam upoṣatīti
23.6.12	sūtraṃ baudhāyanasya
23.6.13	apūpenaivāpy atra kakṣam upoṣed iti śālīkiḥ
23.6.14	ṛṣabho goṣu jīryatīti
23.6.15	sūtraṃ śālīkeḥ
23.6.16	atro ha smāha baudhāyano yam apy anyaṃ bahis tantrāt paśum ālabheta tatrāpy etāni kuryād upākaraṇīyayor vapāyāṃ devatāsv iti
23.6.17	aṣṭāpadyai garbhasya vasāhoma iti
23.6.18	sūtraṃ baudhāyanasya
23.6.19	na garbhasya vasāhomaṃ juhuyād iti śālīkiḥ
23.6.20	na ca garbhasya vasāhomaṃ juhuyān neḍāṃ na sviṣṭakṛtam ity aupamanyavaḥ
23.7.1	ajavaśāyā upākaraṇa iti
23.7.2	sūtraṃ baudhāyanasya
23.7.3	vāyavyayaivainām upākuryād iti śālīkiḥ
23.7.4	atro ha smāha jyāyān kātyāyano yathāpy upākaraṇa upākaraṇaṃ nudata evam evāpy uttare mantrā nudyerann iti
23.7.5	yad ālabdhāyām abhro bhavatīti
23.7.6	sa ha smāha baudhāyano yadyahāntaśritā akṛṣṇā meghāḥ syuḥ saṃsthāpayed eva
23.7.7	atha cet kṛṣṇāḥ syur athaivaṃ kuryād iti
23.7.8	atro ha smāha śālīkir yadyaha nādityam antardadhyuḥ saṃsthāpayed eva
23.7.9	atha ced enam antardadhyur athaivaṃ kuryād iti
23.7.10	nālabdhāyām asaṃsthāpanaṃ vidyata iti gautamaḥ
23.7.11	jayeṣv iti
23.7.12	pūrvaḥ kalpo baudhāyanasyottaraḥ śālīkeḥ
23.7.13	abhyātāneṣv iti
23.7.14	pūrvaḥ kalpaḥ śālīker uttaro baudhāyanasya
23.7.15	atro ha smāhaupamanyavo 'bhyātānāñ jayān rāṣṭrabhṛta iti sruvāhutīr evaitā juhuyād gaccheyuś ca darśapūrṇamāsāv abhyātānāñ jayān rāṣṭrabhṛta iti
23.7.16	śamyāparidhiṣv iti
23.7.17	śamyaiva śamyāparidhīn kuryād iti baudhāyanaḥ
23.7.18	prākṛtā evaitāḥ syur iti śālīkiḥ
23.7.19	dviḥsvāhākāraṃ rāṣṭrabhṛto juhotīti
23.7.20	vigrāhaṃ juhuyād iti baudhāyanaḥ
23.7.21	dvedve sruvāhutī iti śālīkiḥ
23.7.22	adhidevane juhoti rathamukhe juhoti rathanāḍyāṃ juhotīti
23.7.23	sūtraṃ baudhāyanasya
23.7.24	etad agnīn evaitāni syur iti śālīkiḥ
23.7.25	naiyagrodha audumbara āśvatthaḥ plākṣa itīdhmo bhavatīti
23.7.26	sūtraṃ baudhāyanasya
23.7.27	pṛthag evaitānīdhmāny abhyajya pṛthag abhyādadhyād iti śālīkiḥ
23.7.28	yad vācaḥ krūraṃ tena vaṣaṭkarotīti
23.7.29	sūtraṃ śālīkeḥ
23.7.30	atro ha smāha baudhāyana udaśvit kṣāramiśram arkaparṇena saha juhuyāt
23.7.31	jahīti vā kaḍ iti vā vaṣaṭkuryād iti
23.7.32	prasava iti
23.7.33	sa ha smāha baudhāyana ubhayena prasauyād vāsiṣṭhīyābhiś ca sāvitreṇa ceti
23.7.34	sāvitreṇaiveti śālīkiḥ
23.8.1	atikrāmeṣv iti
23.8.2	pūrvaḥ kalpo baudhāyanasyottaraḥ śālīkeḥ
23.8.3	atīmokṣeṣv iti
23.8.4	pūrvaḥ kalpaḥ śālīker uttaro baudhāyanasya
23.8.5	prāṇagrahāṇāṃ grahaṇa iti
23.8.6	sūtraṃ baudhāyanasya
23.8.7	saṃvatsara evaite dṛṣṭā bhavanti
23.8.8	saṃvatsara evainān gṛhṇīyād iti śālīkiḥ
23.8.9	tāṃ dugdhvā brāhmaṇāya dadyād yasyānnaṃ nādyād iti
23.8.10	sūtraṃ śālīkeḥ
23.8.11	atro ha smāha baudhāyananaḥ prāk ced vijijñāsāyai niṣīded athaivaṃ kuryād iti
23.8.12	yasyāhavanīye 'nudvāte gārhapatya udvāyed iti
23.8.13	sūtraṃ śālīkeḥ
23.8.14	atro ha smāha baudhāyanaḥ samastam etam agniṃ sate samupya dakṣiṇena vihāraṃ paryāhṛtya gārhapatyasyāyatanād bhasmodvāpya śakṛtpiṇḍena parilipya nyupyopasamādhāya jvalantam āhavanīyam uddhṛtyāhavanīyasyāyatanād bhasmodvāpya śakṛtpiṇḍena parilipya nyupyopasamādhāya samidvatyāhavanīye ṣaṭ sruvāhutīr juhuyād ud budhyasvāgne tvam agne saprathā asi mano jyotir juṣatāṃ tantuṃ tanvann ud u tyaṃ citram iti
23.8.15	atiriktasomeṣv iti
23.8.16	pūrvaḥ kalpo baudhāyanasyottaraḥ śālīkeḥ
23.8.17	dhruve parihīṇe prāyaścittakaraṇa iti
23.8.18	sa ha smāha baudhāyanaḥ prāk ced avabhṛthāc chandogabahvṛceṣu labherann abhyāvarttayeyu stutaśastrāṇi syus tat kṛtvā punar yajeteti
23.8.19	atro ha smāha śālīkiḥ prāk ced avabhṛthāc chandogabahvṛceṣu labherann abhyāvartayeyu stutaśastrāṇi syus tat kṛtvā kṛtam eva manyeteti
23.8.20	ahnāṃ grahaṇa iti
23.8.21	sūtraṃ baudhāyanasya
23.8.22	yad evānantaram ahaḥ syāt tasmin maitrāvaruṇāgrān grahān gṛhṇīrann iti śālīkiḥ
23.8.23	yūpe virūḍhe prāyaścittakaraṇa iti
23.8.24	sūtraṃ baudhāyanasya
23.8.25	antas tantram eva yūpe virūḍhe prāyaścittaṃ kuryād iti śālīkiḥ
23.8.26	yasya soma upadasyet suvarṇaṃ hiraṇyaṃ dvedhā vicchidyarjīṣe 'nyad ādhunuyāj juhuyād anyad iti
23.8.27	sūtraṃ baudhāyanasya
23.8.28	sahiraṇyā evāsyāta ūrdhvaṃ mukhyāś camasā hūyerann abhyunnīyerann iti śālīkiḥ
23.8.29	ādārasomeṣv iti
23.8.30	sūtraṃ baudhāyanasya

23.9.1	athāto dvādaśāhaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ
23.9.2	cinvīta dvādaśāhe 'gnim iti baudhāyanaḥ
23.9.3	na cinvīteti śālīkiḥ
23.9.4	atigrāhyā iti
23.9.5	sa ha smāha baudhāyano gṛhapatir evāraṇyoḥ samāropayet
23.9.6	etad atigrāhyasya rūpaṃ bhavatīti
23.9.7	atro ha smāha śālīkiḥ pṛthag evāraṇīṣu samāropayeran gṛhapater eva prathamasya mathitvā jvalatsu jvalato 'pi visṛjerann iti
23.9.8	etad atigrāhyasya rūpaṃ bhavatīti
23.9.9	saṃnivāpa iti
23.9.10	sa ha smāha baudhāyanaḥ saṃnivapsyanto 'gnaye brahmaṇvate puroḍāśam aṣṭākapālaṃ nirvapeyur agnaye kṣatravate 'gnaye kṣatrabhṛta iti
23.9.11	atro ha smāha śālīkir agnisaṃyojanī khalv eṣeṣṭir bhavati
23.9.12	yatraivāgniṃ ceṣyamāṇaḥ syāt tatraināṃ nirvaped iti
23.9.13	prājāpatyaṃ paśupuroḍāśam anuvartayetety aupamanyavaḥ
23.9.14	pavana iti
23.9.15	ekaikaśa evainān pavayitvaikaikaśa udānayeyur iti baudhāyanaḥ
23.9.16	sakṛd evainān pavayitvaikaikaśa udānayeyur iti śālīkiḥ
23.9.17	sakṛd evainān pavayitvā sarvān sahodānayeyur ity aupamanyavaḥ
23.9.18	ārṣeyavaraṇa iti
23.9.19	sa ha smāha baudhāyano ye kecana samānagotrā avyavetā anyathāgotrāḥ syur ekasyārṣeyaś ca varaṇa eva teṣāṃ varaṇaṃ syād iti
23.9.20	atro ha smāha śālīkir yadi caiva vyavetā yadi cāvyavetāḥ samānagotrā ekasyārṣeyavaraṇa eva teṣāṃ varaṇaṃ syād iti
23.9.21	vratadhukṣv iti
23.9.22	samātacya samāvaccho vibhajerann iti baudhāyanaḥ
23.9.23	pṛthag evaiṣāṃ vratadughaḥ syur iti śālīkiḥ
23.9.24	ṣaṣṭhyām upasady uttaravediṃ saṃnivapantīti sūtram ācāryayor api vaikādaśyām iti vidhiḥ
23.9.25	vasatīvarīṇām abhigrahaṇa iti
23.9.26	sūtraṃ śālīkeḥ
23.9.27	atro ha smāha baudhāyano yadi sātiśeṣaḥ kalaśaḥ syāt tūṣṇīm avanayet
23.9.28	yady u vai sarvaśa eva lepaḥ samavanītaḥ syād athaivaṃ kuryād iti śālīkiḥ
23.9.29	so 'tra vaiva yajñasya punarālambhaṃ japati yajñāyajñīyasya vā stotre śaṃyuvāke veti
23.9.30	pūrvaḥ kalpo baudhāyanasyottaraḥ śālīkeḥ
23.9.31	vivartayanti paridhīn anupraharati prastaram iti

23.9.33	anuprahared evātra prastaraparidhīn iti śālīkiḥ

23.11.17	grahādhāneṣv anusaṃvrajyāyā iti
