23.18.38	yaṃyaṃ grahaṃ gṛhṇīyāt taṃtaṃ parimṛjya sādayed iti śālīkiḥ
23.18.39	śvetam aśvaṃ dadāti
23.18.40	śvetāṃ vaḍabāṃ dadāti
23.18.41	aśvam asitaṃ dadāti
23.18.42	garbhiṇīṃ vaḍabāṃ lalāmīṃ dadāti
23.18.43	anaḍucchataṃ dadāti
23.18.44	trayastriṃśataṃ niṣkān dadāti
23.18.45	somacamasaṃ dadāti
23.18.46	hiraṇmayaṃ camasaṃ dadāti
23.18.47	rāśikṛtaṃ dhānyaṃ dadāti
23.18.48	marāyakṛtaṃ dhānyaṃ dadātīti
23.18.49	etāni ca nityāni ca dadyād iti baudhāyanaḥ
23.18.50	etāny eveti śālīkiḥ
23.19.1	athātaḥ sarvatomukhaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ
23.19.2	cinvīta sarvatomukhe 'gnim iti baudhāyanaḥ
23.19.3	na cinvīteti śālīkiḥ
23.19.4	atro ha smāha maudgalyaḥ pūrvasminn evāgnicaya itareṣu sāvitrāḥ syur ity
23.19.5	etad api na kuryād ity āñjīgaviḥ
23.19.6	araṇyoḥ samāropaṇa iti
23.19.7	sūtram ācāryayoḥ
23.19.8	atro ha smāha gautamo gṛhapatir eva prathamam araṇyoḥ samāropayet tata itare sattra iti
23.19.9	śālāyā iti
23.19.10	prākṛtena prakrameṇa mīyāt
23.19.11	madhye gārhapatya iti
23.19.12	sūtraṃ baudhāyanasya
23.19.13	atro ha smāha śālīkiḥ tripadena prakrameṇa sarvata iti
23.19.14	trivṛt prācyāṃ diśi bhavati pañcadaśo dakṣiṇataḥ saptadaśaḥ paścād ekaviṃśa uttarataḥ
23.19.15	sarvato vā jyotiṣṭomaḥ sarve jyotiṣṭomadakṣiṇā iti
23.19.16	pravargyasya karaṇa iti
23.19.17	sūtraṃ baudhāyanasya
23.19.18	nokthye pravṛñjyād iti śālīkiḥ
23.19.19	yājamāna iti
23.19.20	abhīnāma yājamānaṃ kuryād iti baudhāyanaḥ
23.19.21	kuryād yathāvakāśaṃ yājamānam iti śālīkiḥ
23.19.22	ye 'gnisaṃskārāḥ syus tān kāmam itarat tantreṇety aupamanyavaḥ
23.19.23	agnyanvādhāna iti
23.19.24	sūtraṃ baudhāyanasya
23.19.25	atro ha smāha śālīkir gārhapatyaḥ sakṛd anvāhitaḥ syād grāmayonir anvāhāryapacana āhavanīyaṃ sakṛd anvādhāya tato yathārthaṃ gacched iti
23.19.26	bhakṣaṇa iti
23.19.27	sūtraṃ baudhāyanasya
23.19.28	sarvaṃ samavadhāya sakṛd eva bhakṣayed iti śālīkiḥ
23.19.29	mārjana iti
23.19.30	sūtraṃ baudhāyanasya
23.19.31	sakṛd ekasminn iti śālīkiḥ
23.19.32	lokāgnīnāṃ haraṇa iti
23.19.33	sūtram ācāryayoḥ
23.19.34	atro ha smāha dīrghavātsyaḥ pūrvasminn eva yājamānaṃ syād iti
23.19.35	kratupaśūnāṃ karaṇa iti
23.19.36	sūtraṃ baudhāyanasya
23.19.37	kratupaśava aikādaśināś ca vikalpanta iti śālīkiḥ
23.19.38	samañjana iti
23.19.39	sūtram aupamanyavīputrasya
23.19.40	yāvanta stomās tāvatkṛtvaḥ pracaraṇyā samanaktīti baudhāyanaḥ
23.19.41	dadhigraha iti
23.19.42	sūtraṃ maudgalyasya
23.19.43	payasā vājyena veti
23.19.44	pūrvaḥ kalpo baudhāyanasyottaraḥ śālīkeḥ
23.19.45	aṃśvadābhyayor grahaṇa iti
23.19.46	sūtraṃ baudhāyanasya
23.19.47	atro ha smāha śālīkir vājapeye dvādaśāhe sattre tāṇḍinām ayana udbhidi valabhidīti tasya syād iti
23.19.48	evam eva pṛśnigrahaiḥ prāṇagrahair iti
23.19.49	ṣoḍaśigrahāṇāṃ grahaṇa iti
23.19.50	sūtraṃ baudhāyanasya
23.19.51	anusavanaṃ gṛhṇīyur iti śālīkiḥ
23.19.52	atigrāhyāṇāṃ homa iti
23.19.53	sūtraṃ baudhāyanasya
23.19.54	māhendrasyānuvaṣaṭkāram upajuhuyur iti śālīkiḥ
23.19.55	ṣoḍaśina stotram upākarotīti
23.19.56	sūtraṃ baudhāyanasya
23.19.57	yena kena cid iti śālīkiḥ
23.19.58	hṛdayaśūlānām udvāsana iti
23.19.59	ekaikaśa udvāsayed iti baudhāyanaḥ
23.19.60	sarvān saheti śālīkiḥ
23.19.61	avabhṛtha iti
23.19.62	sūtraṃ baudhāyanasya
23.19.63	prāñca evāvabhṛtham aveyur iti śālīkiḥ
23.19.64	araṇyoḥ samāropaṇa iti

23.19.66	atro ha smāha gautamo gṛhapatir evāraṇyoḥ samāropayet tata itara iti
24.1.1	pañcatayena kalpam avekṣeta chandasā brāhmaṇena pratyayena nyāyena saṃsthāvaśeneti
24.1.2	chandaseti yad avocāma yathāmnāyapraṇidhīdaṃ pūrvam idam uttaram iti
24.1.3	athāpi mantra eva svayaṃ karma prabrūte
24.1.4	karmānuvādo bhavati
24.1.5	yathaitad bhavati preyam agād dhiṣaṇā barhir acchorv antarikṣam anvihi devasya tvā savituḥ prasave 'śvinor bāhubhyāṃ pūṣṇo hastābhyām agnaye juṣṭaṃ nirvapāmīti
24.1.6	yac chandasā na śaknuyāt kalpayituṃ brāhmaṇena tac cikalpayiṣet
24.1.7	brāhmaṇam u haivainān mantrān aprajñātān vidadhātīdam anena karotīdam aneneti
24.1.8	yathaitad bhavatīṣe tvorje tveti śākhām ācchinatti vāyava sthopāyava stheti vatsān apākarotīti
24.1.9	athāpy amantrāṇi karmāṇi vidadhāti
24.1.10	yathaitad bhavaty aṣṭāsu prakrameṣu brāhmaṇo 'gnim ādadhītaikādaśasu rājanyo dvādaśasu vaiśya ity evaṃ vyavasthāvarṇasaṃyogāt
24.1.11	yatho etat pratyayeneti chandogabahvṛcādhvaryupratyayeneti
24.1.12	yatho etan nyāyeneti prākṛte tantre prākṛtaṃ nyāyam anadhigacchan grāmanyāyaṃ pratīyād ayam ihārhatāṃ samārambha iti
24.1.13	yatho etat saṃsthāvaśeneti some 'pahṛta ādārāṃś ca phālgunāni cābhiṣuṇuyād iti
24.1.14	catuṣṭayena mantrā vartante stutyā nirdeśenāśiṣā naiva stutyā nāśiṣā na nirdeśeneti caturtham
24.1.15	atheme pañca havirākārā auṣadhaṃ payaḥ paśuḥ soma ājyam iti
24.2.1	teṣāṃ pṛthakpṛthag dharmāḥ pṛthag adhikaraṇāni
24.2.2	yathādhikaraṇaṃ mantrā dṛṣṭāḥ
24.2.3	tān na mithaḥ saṃsādayed anādeśāt
24.2.4	yenayena yad dhaviḥ saṃsidhyet tenatena tat kuryāt tat tasyādhikaraṇam
24.2.5	uktāny adhikaraṇāni
24.2.6	yajña iti
24.2.7	kim upajño yajñaḥ śraddhopajño māṅgala iti
24.2.8	kva u khalu yajña iti
24.2.9	puruṣa iti
24.2.10	kā u khalu devatā dīkṣeti
24.2.11	vāg iti
24.2.12	kā u khalu pathyā svastir iti
24.2.13	vāg eveti
24.2.14	kā u khalv ekākṣarā gāyatrīti
24.2.15	vāg eveti
24.2.16	ka u khalu yajñasyārambhaḥ kā pratiṣṭheti
24.2.17	vijñāyate svāhā yajñaṃ manasā svāhā dyāvāpṛthivībhyāṃ svāhoror antarikṣāt svāhā yajñaṃ vātād ārabha iti
24.2.18	vāta eva yajñasyārambho vātaḥ pratiṣṭheti
24.3.1	katham u khalv etaj jānīyād idaṃ tantram ayam āvāpa iti
24.3.2	agnyanvādhānaprabhṛti tantram ājyabhāgābhyām anyatrauṣadhāt
24.3.3	tasmiṃs tantre saty āvāpasthānāni bhavanti yathaitad dhenūnāṃ dohanaṃ kapālānām upadhānaṃ stambayajuṣo haraṇam ājyagrahā iti yac ca kiṃ cābhinivapati
24.3.4	ūrdhvam ājyabhāgābhyām eṣa madhyata āvāpo bhavati yasminn etad dhavīṃṣy opyante tasminn evāvāpajāni tantrasthānaṃ bhajante yathaitat prāśitraṃ yajamānabhāgabrahmabhāgau sviṣṭakṛc ceḍā ceti
24.3.5	avadānata āvāpo bhavati tantraṃ tu pradānataḥ
24.3.6	kva u khalu tantram āvāpabhūyaṃ gacchaty āvāpo vā tantrabhūyam iti
24.3.7	maitrābārhaspatye 'py anyasmiṃs tantram u ha nirvapaṇato bhavaty āvāpa u pradānataḥ
24.3.8	atha vāruṇīṣu ca saṃjñānīṣṭyāṃ cāvāpo ha nirvapaṇato bhavati tantraṃ tu pradānataḥ
24.3.9	anūyājaprabhṛti tantram ā samiṣṭayajuṣo homāt
24.3.10	kiṃdevatyā u khalv anūyājā bhavantīti
24.3.11	āgneyā ity eva brūyāt
24.3.12	vijñāyate taṃ devā āhutībhir anūyājeṣv anvavindan yad anūyājān yajaty agnim eva tat saminddha iti
24.3.13	ṛtudevatā u khalu prayājā bhavantīti
24.4.1	kiyatyaḥ pākayajñasaṃsthāḥ kiyatyo haviryajñasaṃsthāḥ kiyatyaḥ somasaṃsthā iti
24.4.2	hutaḥ prahuta āhutaḥ śūlagavo baliharaṇaṃ pratyavarohaṇam aṣṭakāhoma iti sapta pākayajñasaṃsthā iti
24.4.3	aparimitā u haike bruvate
24.4.4	yac ca kiṃ cānyatra vihārād dhūyate sarvās tāḥ pākayajñasaṃsthā iti
24.4.5	atha haviryajñasaṃsthā agnyādheyam agnihotraṃ darśapūrṇamāsāv āgrayaṇaṃ cāturmāsyāni dākṣāyaṇayajñaḥ kauṇḍapāyinya iti
24.4.6	sautrāmaṇim u haike bruvate
24.4.7	atha somasaṃsthāḥ
24.4.8	agniṣṭomo 'tyagniṣṭoma ukthyaḥ ṣoḍaśī vājapeyo 'tirātro 'ptoryāma iti sapta somasaṃsthāḥ
24.4.9	yad agniṣṭomasya kratukaraṇaṃ tad atyagniṣṭomasya
24.4.10	yad ukthyasya tat ṣoḍaśivājapeyayoḥ
24.4.11	yad atirātrasya tad aptoryāmasyeti
24.4.12	saptānāṃ somāsaṃsthānāṃ dve sattrāṇi na gacchato vājapeyaś cāptoryāmaś ceti
24.5.1	katham u khalv etaj jānīyād iyaṃ pūrvā tatir iyam uttareti
24.5.2	yā prakṛtiḥ sā pūrvā tatiḥ
24.5.3	atha yad vidadhāti sottarā tatiḥ
24.5.4	agnyādheyaṃ pūrvā tatiḥ punarādheyam uttarā tatiḥ
24.5.5	darśapūrṇamāsāv iṣṭīnāṃ pūrvā tatiḥ sarvāḥ kāmyā iṣṭaya uttarā tatiḥ
24.5.6	aindrāgno nirūḍhapaśubandhānāṃ pūrvā tatiḥ sarve kāmyāḥ paśava uttarā tatiḥ
24.5.7	jyotiṣṭomaḥ somānāṃ pūrvā tatiḥ sarve somā uttarā tatiḥ
24.5.8	śyenacid agnīnāṃ pūrvā tatiḥ sarve kāmyā agnaya uttarā tatiḥ
24.5.9	dvirātro 'hīnānāṃ pūrvā tatiḥ sarve 'hīnā uttarā tatiḥ
24.5.10	dvādaśāho 'hargaṇānāṃ pūrvā tatiḥ sarve 'hargaṇā uttarā tatiḥ
24.5.11	gavāmayanaṃ sāṃvatsarikāṇāṃ sattrāṇāṃ pūrvā tatiḥ sarvāṇi sāṃvatsarikāṇi sattrāṇy uttarā tatiḥ
24.5.12	kiyanti nu khalu gavāmayanāni bhavantīti
24.5.13	vijñāyate yathaitan māsi pṛṣṭham uttame māsi sakṛt pṛṣṭhāny upeyur daśamāsyaṃ tṛtīyam
24.5.14	sapta grāmyā oṣadhayaḥ saptāraṇyāḥ
24.5.15	sapta grāmyāḥ paśavaḥ saptāraṇyāḥ
24.5.16	sapta chandāṃsi caturuttarāṇīti
24.5.17	sapta grāmyā oṣadhayas tilamāṣavrīhiyavāḥ priyaṅgavo 'ṇavo godhūmāḥ saptame
24.5.18	kulatthān u haike bruvate
24.5.19	saptāraṇyāḥ śyāmākāś ca nīvārāś ca jartilāś ca gavīdhukāś ca gārmutāś ca vāstvāni ca veṇuyavāś ca saptame
24.5.20	kuruvindān u haike bruvate
24.5.21	sapta grāmyāḥ paśavo goaśvam ajāvikaṃ puruṣaś ca gardabhaś coṣṭraś ca saptame
24.5.22	aśvataram u haike bruvate
24.5.23	saptāraṇyā dvikhurāś ca śvāpadāni ca pakṣiṇaś ca sarīsṛpāṇi ca hastī ca markaṭaś ca nādeyā saptame
24.5.24	sapta chandāṃsi caturuttarāṇīti gāyatry uṣṇig anuṣṭhub bṛhatī paṅktis triṣṭub jagatīti
24.6.1	athedaṃ trayaṃ bhavati karmābhyāvarti devatābhyāvarti saṃkhyābhyāvartīti
24.6.2	sāvitraṃ nu khalv idaṃ karmābhyāvarti bhavati
24.6.3	atha devatābhyāvarti dhruvājyaṃ droṇakalaśaḥ sarvapṛṣṭheti
24.6.4	atha saṃkhyābhyāvarti triḥ pṛcchati śṛtaṃ havī3ḥ śamitar iti
24.6.5	athāpi rājño mānam

24.6.8	sthānāt sthānam iti yad avocāma yo 'nantaro mantra āmnātaḥ syāt tenainaṃ saha kalpayet pūrvakālena vottarakālena veti
24.6.9	yatho etad ābhirūpyeṇeti yathaitad bhavaty āśāsānaḥ suvīryaṃ rāyaspoṣaṃ svaśviyam / bṛhaspatinā rāyā svagākṛto mahyaṃ yajamānāya tiṣṭheti
24.6.10	yatho etat prauheṇety agnikalpaḥ khalv ayam iṣṭakābhūyān samāmnātaḥ
24.6.11	tatra yo mantro 'ntaritaḥ syād iṣṭakābhūyam enam āpādayet
24.7.1	athāyam aśvamedha āhutibhūyān samāmnātaḥ
24.7.2	tatra yo mantro 'ntaritaḥ syād āhutibhūyam enam āpādayet
24.7.3	nāprakrāntaṃ prakramayen na prakrāntaṃ karma tūṣṇīṃ karmaṇābhipūrayiṣed iti
24.7.4	nāprakrāntam iti yad avocāma barhirlavanaḥ khalv ayaṃ hrasvo mantra āmnāto bhavati dīrgham u karma
24.7.5	na karmaṇo hetor mantro 'bhinivarteta
24.7.6	athāyaṃ paśor viśasano hrasvo mantra āmnāto bhavati dīrgham u karma
24.7.7	na karmaṇo hetor mantro 'bhinivarteta
24.7.8	athāsyāṃ svayamātṛṇṇāyāṃ dīrgho ha mantra āmnāto bhavati hrasvam u karma
24.7.9	na karmaṇo hetor mantro viramyet
24.7.10	yatho etat trir yajuṣā sakṛt tūṣṇīm iti
24.7.11	lokāgnīṃś ca teṣām upaśrutya stambayajuś ceti
24.7.12	yatho etat pañcakṛtvo yajuṣā pañcakṛtvas tūṣṇīm iti rājñas teṣāṃ mānam upaśrutyeti
24.7.13	yatho etat sakṛd yajuṣā sakṛt tūṣṇīm iti rājña eva teṣāṃ mānam upaśrutyeti
24.7.14	yatho etac caturo muṣṭīn vrīhīṇāṃ nirvapatīti dvau devatāyai sviṣṭakṛte tṛtīya iḍāyai caturtha iti sarva evaiteṣāṃ brāhmaṇavantaḥ
24.8.1	athāta ādeśakāritāni vyākhyāsyāmaḥ
24.8.2	anādiṣṭo 'gniḥ
24.8.3	api tu yathaitad bhavaty adhidevane juhoti rathamukhe juhoti rathanāḍyāṃ juhoti catuṣpathe juhoti vartmanor juhoty āvraścane juhoti pade juhoty ajāyāṃ juhoty ajasya dakṣiṇe karṇe juhoty ajasya dakṣiṇe śṛṅge juhoti brāhmaṇasya dakṣiṇe haste juhoti darbhastambe juhoty apsu juhoty audumbaryāṃ juhoti valmīkavapāyāṃ juhoty aupāsane juhoty uttapanīye juhoti śāmitre juhoty āgnīdhrīye juhoty anvāhāryapacane juhoti gārhapatye juhotīti
24.8.4	anādiṣṭa āhavanīya eva hotavyam

24.8.8	anādiṣṭaṃ pātram
24.8.9	api tu yathaitad bhavaty añjalinā juhoti śūrpeṇa juhoti kṛṣṇājinapuṭena juhoti madhyamena parṇena juhoty antamena parṇena juhoty arkaparṇena juhoti parṇamayena sruveṇa juhoty audumbareṇa sruveṇa juhoty aṅguṣṭhābhyāṃ juhoti visraṃsikākāṇḍābhyāṃ juhoti gomṛgakaṇṭhena juhoty aśvaśaphena juhoty ayasmayena kamaṇḍalunā juhotīti
24.8.10	anādiṣṭe srucaiva hotavyam
24.8.11	anādiṣṭā samit
24.8.12	ādeśād eva samidhaṃ jānīyāt

24.8.15	anādiṣṭa upasamādhāyaiva hotavyam
24.9.1	athāto 'vadānakalpaḥ
24.9.2	catur unnayati caturavattaṃ bhavatīti
24.9.3	anādiṣṭa upahatyaiva hotavyam
24.9.4	anādiṣṭaṃ haviḥ
24.9.5	ādeśād evānyad vrīhiyavebhyo jānīyāt
24.9.6	api tu nu khalu kṣiprasaṃskāratamam ājyaṃ bruvate
24.9.7	anādiṣṭaḥ paśuḥ
24.9.8	ādeśād evānyam ajāj jānīyād aindrāgnāt
24.9.9	yad abhihāraṃ tantraṃ syāt tad abhihāraṃ kuryāt
24.9.10	agnyabhihārau darśapūrṇamāsau
24.9.11	soma indrābhihāraḥ
24.9.12	sāvitram auṣadhasya nirvapaṇaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ bhavati
24.9.13	kiṃ svit sāṃnāyyasya paśo rājña iti
24.9.14	dohanaṃ sāṃnāyyasya
24.9.15	upākaraṇaṃ paśoḥ
24.9.16	yad upāṃśusavanam abhi mimīte tad rājñaḥ
24.9.17	prajñātam anyeṣāṃ haviṣāṃ paryagnikaraṇam

24.21.20	agnīn anvādadhyād upasthaṃ kṛtvā gārhapatyam ūrdhvajñur anvāhāryapacanaṃ prahva āhavanīyaṃ tiṣṭhan daśamīṃ nigaded iti
24.22.1	anvāhitāś ced agnaya udvāyeyuḥ savanīyaṃ gārhapatyasya
24.22.2	āhavanīya udvāte bhasmodvāpya śakṛtpiṇḍena parilipya jvalantam āhavanīyam uddhṛtya nyupyopasamādhāya punaranvādhāya vyāhṛtībhir upatiṣṭheta
24.22.3	atha yad anvāhāryapacana udvāyed evam evainaṃ haret
24.22.4	anārtā hy eṣā devatā yad anvāhāryapacana iti
24.22.5	punaranvādhāya vyāhṛtībhir upatiṣṭheta
24.22.6	atha yasyāgnim anuddhṛtaṃ sūryo 'bhyastamiyād vābhyudiyād vā yathāsūtraṃ vā kuryād api vā saṃtanīṃ juhuyān mano jyotir juṣatāṃ trayastriṃśat tantava tantava ity ete sruvāhutī hutvā vyāhṛtībhir upatiṣṭheta
24.22.7	athābhyastamite vāruṇīṃ sruvāhutiṃ hutvā vyāhṛtībhir upatiṣṭheta
24.22.8	athābhyudite maitrīṃ sruvāhutiṃ hutvā vyāhṛtībhir upatiṣṭheta
24.22.9	vyāhṛtībhir evānvāhāryapacanam
24.22.10	athāraṇyor agniṣu samārūḍheṣv ātmani vādhvagate na prāyaścittam ācāryā bruvate
24.22.11	tatrodāharanti kāmam ātmani samārūḍheṣv araṇyor upāvarohya manthet
24.22.12	api vāmātyaṃ vihṛtya tasminn upāvarohya juhuyāt
24.22.13	athāraṇyoḥ samārūḍheṣu mathitvāgnīn vihṛtya juhuyāt
24.22.14	api vāmātyaṃ vihṛtyāgnīn antarāraṇī nidhāya juhuyāt
24.23.1	yathā rājaviśām evaṃ nirmanthyo vṛthāgneḥ
24.23.2	tat siddham eke bruvate
24.23.3	yāvati kṛṣṇamṛga upaviśet tāvad avarārdho 'dhvagato vihāraḥ
24.23.4	agnīn anvādadhyād vratam upeyād vratopetasya parṇaśākhām āccheyād etad atrānupūrvyaṃ bhavati
24.23.5	trīṇi palāśajātāni bhavanti ślakṣṇako lomaśako vratatir iti
24.23.6	lomaśakasyaivaiṣā chettavyā bhavati
24.23.7	yāvanmātre gaur nikarṣeta na tata ūrdhvaṃ chindyāt
24.23.8	apaśavyāta ūrdhvaṃ syāt
24.23.9	sa yady u hāgnihotroccheṣaṇāt pramādyet tat punar evāgnihotraṃ juhuyāt
24.23.10	athemāḥ sāṃnāyyaduhaḥ ṣaḍavamāḥ samāmnātā bhavanti
24.23.11	tāś cet tisra eva syuḥ prathamāṃ vottamāṃ vā catur vigṛhṇīyāt
24.23.12	atha ced dve eva syātām itaretarāṃ tristrir vigṛhṇīyāt
24.23.13	atha ced ekaiva syāt tām eva ṣaṭ kṛtvo vigṛhṇīyāt
24.23.14	visṛṣṭavāg ananvārabhyottarā dohayed ity aparimitānām evaitad uktaṃ bhavatīti
24.24.1	dvādaśa dvandvāni darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ
24.24.2	tāni saṃpādyānīti
24.24.3	sphyaś ca kapālāni ceti pañca
24.24.4	vatsaṃ copāvasṛjaty ukhāṃ cādhiśrayatīti sapta
24.24.5	tāni dvādaśa
24.24.6	amāvāsyāyām evaitat saṃnayata upapadyate nāsaṃnayate
24.24.7	atheyaṃ dārśapaurṇamāsikī vedir yajamānamātrī bhavaty aparimitā vā
24.24.8	yathāsannāni havīṃṣi saṃbhaved evaṃ tiraścī
24.24.9	prāñcau vedyaṃsāv unnayaty āhavanīyasya parigṛhītyai
24.24.10	pratīcī śroṇī nirūhati gārhapatyasya parigṛhītyai
24.24.11	purastād aṃhīyasī paścāt prathīyasī madhye saṃnatatarā bhavatīty evam iva hi yoṣeti
24.24.12	tasyai vadatīyatīṃ khanati prajāpatinā yajamānamukhena saṃmitām ā pratiṣṭhāyai khanatīti
24.24.13	dvyaṅgulaṃ kheyety ekeṣām
24.24.14	tryaṅgulaṃ kheyety ekeṣām
24.24.15	caturaṅgulaṃ kheyety ekeṣām
24.24.16	sītāmātrīty ekeṣām
24.24.17	rathavartmamātrīty ekeṣām
24.24.18	yāvatpārṣṇiyai śvetam ity ekeṣām
24.24.19	etad eva sad anyeṣām anunikrāntataraṃ bhavati
24.24.20	naitā mātrā atikhanet
24.24.21	dakṣiṇato varṣoyasīṃ karoti
24.24.22	purīṣavatīṃ karoti
24.24.23	prācīm udīcīṃ pravaṇāṃ nistiṣṭhantītīyantaṃ gṛhṇātīti prastarasya vadati
24.25.1	saṃnakhamātro grahītavya ity ekeṣām
24.25.2	viśāruko grahītavya ity ekeṣām
24.25.3	srugdaṇḍamātro grahītavya ity ekeṣām
24.25.4	sruvadaṇḍamātro grahītavya ity ekeṣām
24.25.5	urvasthimātro grahītavya ity ekeṣām
24.25.6	aṅguṣṭhaparuṣā saṃmito grahitavya ity ekeṣām
24.25.7	aparimito grahītavya ity ekeṣām
24.25.8	iyatīr bhavantīti
24.25.9	samidhāṃ vadati
24.25.10	prādeśamātrīr evaitā uktā bhavanti
24.25.11	anena saṃmitāḥ kāryā ity āhuḥ
24.25.12	anena hy agre prajāpatiḥ prajā asṛjateti
24.25.13	kiṃdevatye u khalu pavitre kiṃpūte bhavata iti
24.25.14	vaiṣṇavī vāyupūte ity eva brūyāt
24.25.15	anakhacchinne syātām
24.25.16	praṇītāḥ praṇayann anayāpaḥ praṇayāmīti pṛthivīṃ manasā dhyāyet
24.25.17	samāny etāni kuryāt praṇītā āhavanīyaṃ brahmāṇam idhmābarhir iti yajñasya śira ity etad ācakṣate
24.25.18	kiṃprokṣitā u khalu prokṣiṇyo bhavantīti
24.25.19	vijñāyate brahmavādino vadanty adbhir havīṃṣi praukṣīḥ kenāpa iti
24.25.20	brahmaṇeti
24.25.21	brahmaprokṣitā eva bhavanti
24.25.22	haviṣkṛd ehīti brāhmaṇasya vadati haviṣkṛd āgahīti rājanyasya haviṣkṛd ādraveti vaiśyasya
24.25.23	haviṣkṛd ehīti parjanya evaiṣa ukto bhavati
24.25.24	athāpy udāharanti haviḥsaṃskārīm evaitad āheti
24.25.25	dṛṣadupale vṛṣāraveṇoccaiḥ samāhantīti
24.25.26	vijñāyate brāhmaṇam uccaiḥ samāhantavā āha vijityai
24.25.27	yāvanto 'sya bhrātṛvyā yajñāyudhānām udvadatām upaśṛṇvanti te parābhavantīti
24.25.28	dvirdvir dṛṣadi sakṛtsakṛd upalāyām
24.25.29	nava kṛtvaḥ saṃpādayatīti vijñāyate
24.26.1	apāgne 'gnim āmādaṃ jahīti
24.26.2	ko nu khalv āmād bhavatīti
24.26.3	aparāgnir evaiṣa ukto bhavati
24.26.4	niṣkravyādaṃ sedhety ādahanāgnir evaiṣa ukto bhavati
24.26.5	ā devayajaṃ vahety āhavanīya evaiṣa ukto bhavati
24.26.6	ko nu khalu kavyavāhana ity anvāhāryapacana ity eva brūyāt
24.26.7	vijñāyate yad agne kavyavāhana pitṝn yakṣy ṛtāvṛdha iti
24.26.8	kuto nu khalu piṣṭāni saṃvapet kṛṣṇājinād ity eva brūyāt
24.26.9	saṃvapan piṣṭāni vācaṃ yacchati
24.26.10	tām avidahantaḥ śrapayatety eva vācaṃ visṛjate
24.26.11	yo vidagdhaḥ sa nairṛto yo 'śṛtaḥ sa raudro yaḥ śṛtaḥ sa sadeva iti
24.26.12	sādhuśṛtaṃ śrapayatīty evedam uktaṃ bhavati
24.26.13	saṃ brahmaṇā pṛcyasveti
24.26.14	vijñāyate vāg vai brahma vācaivainam etat saṃpṛṇakti
24.26.15	kva u khalu haviḥ pṛktaṃ śrapyata iti
24.26.16	yadaivaitad āpyebhyo ninayaty ekatāya svāhā dvitāya svāhā tritāya svāheti
24.26.17	ko nu khalv ekataḥ ko dvitaḥ kas trita iti
24.26.18	pitā pitāmahaḥ prapitāmaha ity eke
24.26.19	pṛthivy antarikṣaṃ dyaur ity eke
24.26.20	agnir ādityo vaidyuta ity eke
24.27.1	agnes trayo jyāyāṃso bhrātara āsann ity eke
24.27.2	ṛṣaya etan nāmadheyā babhūvur ity eke
24.27.3	te devā āpyeṣv amṛjatety āpyanāmadheyā devā bhavanti
24.27.4	kva u khalu paurṇamāsyāṃ pitṛbhyo dīyata iti
24.27.5	yad evaitac chroṇyor ninayatīti
24.27.6	kimabhighāritaṃ nu khalv ājyaṃ bhavatīti
24.27.7	satyābhighāritam ity eva brūyāt
24.27.8	vijñāyate satyena tvābhighārayāmi tasya te bhakṣīyeti
24.27.9	pañcānāṃ tvā vātānāṃ yantrāya dhartrāya gṛhṇāmīty anudiśaṃ vātāḥ
24.27.10	viṣvagvāta evaiṣāṃ pañcamo bhavati
24.27.11	pañcānāṃ tvartūnāṃ yantrāya dhartrāya gṛhṇāmīti hemantaśiśirāv atra samāsaṃ gacchataḥ
24.27.12	pañcānāṃ tvā diśāṃ yantrāya dhartrāya gṛhṇāmītīyam evāsām ūrdhvā dik pañcamī bhavati
24.27.13	pañcānāṃ tvā pañcajanānāṃ yantrāya dhartrāya gṛhṇāmīti devā manuṣyā asurā rākṣasāḥ
24.27.14	gandharvā evaiṣāṃ pañcamā bhavanti
24.27.15	caros tvā pañcabilasya yantrāya dhartrāya gṛhṇāmīty ayam evaiṣa ākāśaś caruḥ pañcabilo bhavati
24.27.16	diśo 'sya pañca bilāni bhavanti vāyur mekṣaṇam iti
24.27.17	atrāpy udāharanti saṃvatsara evāpi caruḥ pañcabilo bhavati
24.27.18	ṛtavo 'sya bilāni bhavanti vāyur mekṣaṇam iti
24.28.1	athādhvaryoś ca hotuś ca prapadanam
24.28.2	antareṇa vedyutkarau prāgāvṛtto 'dhvaryuḥ prapadyate pratyagāvṛtto hotā
24.28.3	adhvaryur anantaro 'gneḥ syāt
24.28.4	ārṣeyam asaṃprajānānasya pravaraṃ brūhīti manuṣvad bharatavan manuvad ity eva brūyāt
24.28.5	vijñāyate mānavyo hi prajā iti brāhmaṇam
24.28.6	purohitapravaro vā rājñaḥ
24.28.7	athāprajñātabandhur ācāryāmuṣyāyaṇam anubravītācāryapravaram u haiva pravṛṇītātha hotāraṃ pravarayet
24.28.8	payasā daivatam abhivardhayed dadhnā sviṣṭakṛtaṃ vyatiṣajyaivāṅgulī avadyet
24.28.9	aṅguṣṭhaparvamātrāṇi daivatāny avadānāni bhavanti jyāyāṃsi sauviṣṭakṛtāny aiḍāni ca
24.28.10	caturdhākaraṇāni brahma pratiṣṭheti
24.28.11	hutvā sviṣṭakṛtaṃ srucam adbhiḥ pūrayitvāntaḥparidhi ninayed vaiśvānare havir idaṃ juhomīti
24.28.12	kim u khalv asamuditaṃ bhavatīti prāgānūyājikāt saṃpraiṣād ity eva brūyāt
24.29.1	kiṃdakṣiṇam agnihotraṃ darśapūrṇamāsau kāmyā iṣṭayaḥ paśubandha iti
24.29.2	upadohadakṣiṇam agnihotram ity eke
24.29.3	śarāvadakṣiṇam agnihotram ity eke
24.29.4	yat sāyaṃ juhoti rātrim eva tena dakṣiṇyāṃ kurute
24.29.5	yat prātar ahar eva tena dakṣiṇyaṃ kurute
24.29.6	yat tato dadāti sā dakṣiṇeti
24.29.7	yad ahorātrayor dadātīty evedam uktaṃ bhavati
24.29.8	atha darśapūrṇamāsayor anvāhāryaś ca puroḍāśasya ca caturdhākaraṇam
24.29.9	vijñāyate dakṣiṇaivāsyaiṣā
24.29.10	atho yajñasyaiva chidram apidadhātīti
24.29.11	yathaivādaḥ saumye 'dhvara ādeśam ṛtvigbhyo dakṣiṇā nīyanta evam evāpi dakṣiṇaṃ puroḍāśaṃ caturdhā kṛtvā barhiṣadaṃ karoti
24.29.12	vāsodakṣiṇāḥ kāmyā iṣṭayo yā anādiṣṭadakṣiṇāḥ
24.29.13	godakṣiṇaḥ paśubandhaḥ
24.29.14	nityo 'nvāhāryaḥ
24.29.15	yatho etac chālīkeḥ kalpaṃ vedayante patnīsaṃyājeṣu sarva evottareṇa gārhapatyaṃ parikrāmeyur ity anabhyāvṛtyaivātra phalīkaraṇahomo hotavyo bhavati
24.29.16	atha haike rākāṃ ca sinīvālīṃ ca kuhūṃ cānumatiṃ ca patnīhomaṃ ca nāriṣṭhau ca homau purastād gṛhapater upajuhvati saṃ patnī patyā sukṛtena gacchatāṃ yajñasya yuktau dhuryāv abhūtām / saṃjānānau vijahatām arātīr divi jyotir ajaram ārabhetāṃ svāhā
24.29.17	daśa te tanuvo yajña yajñiyās tāḥ prīṇātu yajamāno ghṛtena / nāriṣṭhayoḥ praśiṣam īḍamāno devānāṃ daivye 'pi yajamāno 'mṛto 'bhūt svāhā
24.29.18	yaṃ vāṃ devā akalpayann ūrjo bhāgaṃ śatakratū / etad vāṃ tena prīṇāni tena tṛpyatam aṃhahau svāheti
24.30.1	athedam agnihotraṃ sāyam upakramaṃ prātar apavargam ācāryā bruvate
24.30.2	tatrodāharanti jyotiṣī ime saṃnipatite bhavata ādityasya cāgneś ca
24.30.3	te na vyaveyāt
24.30.4	sāyam āhavanīyam uddharan purastāt pratyaṅmukho nivapet prātar āhavanīyam uddharan paścāt prāṅmukho nivapet
24.30.5	sāyamagnihotraṃ hoṣyann agreṇa parītya juhuyāt prātaragnihotraṃ hoṣyann apareṇa parītya juhuyāt
24.30.6	evam asyaite jyotiṣī avyavete bhavataḥ
24.30.7	athāyam uddharaṇamantro vācā tvā hotrā prāṇenodgātrā cakṣuṣādhvaryuṇā manasā brahmaṇā śrotreṇāgnīdhaitais tvā pañcabhir daivyair ṛtvigbhir uddharāmi bhūr bhuvaḥ suvar uddhriyamāṇa uddhara pāpmano mā yad avidvān yac ca vidvāṃś cakāra / ahnā yad enaḥ kṛtam asti pāpaṃ sarvasmān moddhṛto muñca tasmād iti sāyam
24.30.8	rātriyā yad enaḥ kṛtam asti pāpaṃ sarvasmān moddhṛto muñca tasmād iti prātar
24.30.9	agniṃ nidadhāty amṛtāhutim amṛtāyāṃ juhomy agniṃ pṛthivyām amṛtasya jityai / tayānantaṃ kāmam ito jayema prajāpatir yaṃ prathamo jigāyāgnim agnau vaiśvānare 'mṛtaṃ juhomi svāheti sāyam
24.30.10	sūryam agnau vaiśvānare 'mṛtaṃ juhomi svāheti prātar
24.30.11	etad dha vā agner agnihotraṃ payohotram itarat
24.30.12	hoṣyan yathāhitam agnīn pariṣiñced dhutvāhavanīyam evaikaṃ pariṣiñcet
24.30.13	hoṣyaṃś caiva hutvā cāhavanīyam evaikaṃ pariṣiñcet
24.30.14	naiva pariṣiñced ity etad aparam
24.30.15	athedaṃ parokṣopasthānaṃ bhavatīhaiva san tatra sato vo agnayaḥ prāṇena vācā manasā bibharmi / tiro mā santam āyur mā prahāsīj jyotiṣā vo vaiśvānareṇopatiṣṭha iti
24.30.16	athemāṃ samidhaṃ pravasatas tūṣṇīm abhyādadhyāt
24.30.17	pravasan yājamānaṃ kurute
24.31.1	athemaṃ samastahomaṃ yāyāvaradharmeṇa vidyamānam ācāryā bruvate
24.31.2	tatrodāharanti yāyāvarā ha vai nāmarṣaya āsan
24.31.3	te 'dhvany aśrāmyan
24.31.4	te samastam ajuhavuḥ
24.31.5	tasmād yāyāvaradharmeṇādhvani samastaṃ hotavyam
24.31.6	tasyānimitto homaḥ
24.31.7	saṃveśanena vā nimīlanena vopasamādhānena vāntardadhyāt
24.31.8	na śūdragavyā agnihotraṃ juhuyān nāhitāyai na mṛtavatsāyai na vahalāyai na vāhinyai na vānyāyai na vānyavatsāyai nānudeśyapratigṛhītāyai nānustaraṇīpratigṛhītāyai
24.31.9	naikasyai dugdhena bahavo juhuyur na bahvīnām evaikaḥ
24.31.10	dugdhaṃ labhamānasyopasādanaprabhṛti skannānumantraṇaṃ bhavati
24.31.11	dīpyamāneṣv ahūyamāneṣu yāvanty agnihotrāṇy abhyatikrāntāni syus tāni pratisaṃkhyāya pratijuhuyāt
24.31.12	sa yady anastamite juhuyāt punar evāstamite juhuyāt
24.31.13	atha yadi mahārātre juhuyāt punar evauṣasaṃ juhuyād iti
24.32.1	katham u khalu jīvapituḥ piṇḍadānaṃ bhavatīti
24.32.2	yebhya eva pitā dadāti tebhyaḥ putro dadāti
24.32.3	dvābhyāṃ jīvapitā dadāti
24.32.4	ekasmai jīvapitāmaho dadāti
24.32.5	na jīvantam atidadyād ity eke
24.32.6	pitṛvyasya cet sagotrasya dāyam upayaccheta kathaṃ tatra piṇḍadānaṃ bhavatīti
24.32.7	yasmin kāle pitre piṇḍaṃ dadāti tasmin kāle 'sya piṇḍaṃ nipṛṇuyāt
24.32.8	atha ced asagotrasya dāyam upayaccheta kathaṃ tatra piṇḍadānaṃ bhavatīti
24.32.9	svebhyo dattvā prativeśaṃ barhi stīrtvā barhiḥprabhṛti piṇḍaṃ dadyāt
24.32.10	api vāgāra eva sthālīpākaṃ śrapayitvā barhiḥprabhṛty eva piṇḍaṃ dadyāt
24.32.11	katham u khalu putrikāputrasya piṇḍadānaṃ bhavatīti
24.32.12	etat te 'muṣyai tata mama pitāmaha ye ca tvām anv etat te 'muṣyai pitāmaha mama prapitāmaha ye ca tvām anv etat te 'muṣyai prapitāmaha mama praprapitāmaha ye ca tvām anv iti
24.32.13	pravidānakalpena vā dadyāt svadhā pitṛbhyaḥ pṛthivīṣadbhyaḥ svadhā pitṛbhyo 'ntarikṣasadbhyaḥ svadhā pitṛbhyo diviṣadbhya iti
24.32.14	pituś cet pitāmahasya prapitāmahasyeti nāmāni na jānīyāt kathaṃ tatra piṇḍadānaṃ bhavatīti
24.32.15	pravidānakalpena vā dadyāt
24.32.16	api vaitat te tata ye ca tvām anv etat te pitāmaha ye ca tvām anv etat te prapitāmaha ye ca tvām anvti
24.32.17	uttara āyuṣi loma chindīteti
24.32.18	kasminn u khalv etat kāle chettavyaṃ bhavatīti
24.32.19	ūrdhvaṃ ṣaṭṣaṣṭibhyaś ca varṣebhyo 'ṣṭābhyaś ca māsebhya ity etasminn evaitat kāle chettavyaṃ bhavatīti
24.32.20	katham u khalv anāhitāgneḥ piṇḍapitṛyajño bhavatīti
24.32.21	aniruptaṃ sthālīpākaṃ śrapayitvāgnim upasamādhāya saṃparistīryāhutīr hutvā dakṣiṇenāgniṃ dakṣiṇāgraṃ barhi stīrtvā barhiḥprabhṛti piṇḍaṃ dadyāt

24.33.1	yatho etad baudhāyanasya kalpaṃ vedayante haviṣkṛtā vācaṃ visṛjyājyānīr juhuyāt kasminn u khalv enāḥ kāle juhuyād iti
24.33.2	praskandanāntaṃ karma kṛtvaitasminn enāḥ kāle juhuyāt
24.33.3	katham u khalv anāhitāgner āgrayaṇaṃ bhavatīti
24.33.4	aniruptaṃ sthālīpākaṃ śrapayitvāgnim upasamādhāya saṃparistīryāghārāv āghāryājyabhāgāv iṣṭvāgrayaṇadevatābhyaḥ sviṣṭakṛccaturthībhyo juhuyāt
24.33.5	kāmaṃ purastāt sviṣṭakṛto 'jyānīr upajuhuyāt

24.33.10	nityenopasthāya virājakramair upatiṣṭheta proṣya punarāgamya virājakramair upasthāya nityenaivopatiṣṭheta
24.33.11	etenaiva bahirvirājam uktam antarbahirvirājaṃ ceti
24.33.12	so 'dhaḥ saṃveśy amāṃsāśy astryupāyī pravasati
24.33.13	viparītanāmadheya eṣa bhavati
24.33.14	sa svid yathedaṃ prāyaścittaṃ madhye patitam āśvino dvikapālas tam antam eva pariṇayet
24.33.15	dīkṣaṇīyāyāṃ cen naśyet prāyaṇīyām anuvarteta
24.33.16	prāyaṇīyāyāṃ cen naśyed ātithyām anuvarteta
24.33.17	ātithyāyāṃ cen naśyed agnīṣomīyasya paśupuroḍāśam uttaramuttaraṃ tantram anuvartī syāt
24.33.18	atha ced agnidīkṣaṇīyāyāṃ naśyet kasminn u khalv enaṃ kāle nirvaped iti
24.33.19	dīkṣāhutīr hutvaitasminn enaṃ kāle nirvapet
24.33.20	api vā prāg audgrahaṇāt
24.33.21	yatho etad baudhāyanasya kalpaṃ vedayante pravasataḥ prastareṇaivāsya saha yajamānabhāgam anuprahared dhruvāyai vājyena paryupastīrya juhvām avadhāya juhuyāt prastarabhūyaṃ yajamānabhāgo gacchatīti pravasataḥ prastareṇaivāsya saha yajamānabhāgam anuprahared iti
24.34.1	athāyaṃ paśuḥ sopavasathaḥ
24.34.2	tasya kaḥ karmaṇa upakramo bhavatīti
24.34.3	ajasrair agnibhir udavasāya ṣaḍḍhotāraṃ hutvā yūpāhutiṃ hutvā yūpaṃ sayajuṣaṃ kṛtvā vediṃ vimāya vratopāyanīyam aśitvāgnīn anvādadhyāt
24.34.4	vratam upeyāt
24.34.5	idhmābarhiḥ saṃnahyopavaset
24.34.6	atha prātar āgneyenāṣṭākapālena yajeteti nu baudhāyanasya kalpaḥ

24.34.9	paristṛṇīyāt
24.34.10	pātrāṇi nirṇijya saṃsādayet

24.34.12	praṇīte tvauttaravedike mantreṇopaviśet

24.34.18	vratam upeyāt

24.34.20	pāṇī saṃmṛśīta

24.34.26	ājyaṃ nirupyādhiśritya paryagnikṛtvā gārhapatya ājyaṃ vilāpyotpūya sruci caturgṛhītaṃ gṛhītvā samidvatyāhavanīye pūrṇāhutiṃ hutvā sphyahastaḥ prāṅ etya stambayajur haret

24.36.1	kiyan nu khalu paśubandhe yājamānaṃ bhavatīti
24.36.2	vratopāyanavratavisarjane yajñasya punarālambhaḥ

24.36.10	svāhākṛtipraiṣeṇa caritvā prāg vapāyai

24.37.1	niravadāyaivāsya sviṣṭakṛtam iḍām avadyet katham atra caturavattaṃ bhavatīti

24.37.3	evam asya caturavattaṃ bhavati
24.37.4	atha haika ācāryā ekādaśa dharmān paśubandha utsādayanty agnyanvādhānaṃ vratopāyanaṃ pṛṣṭhyāṃ praṇītāṃ yājamānam ājyabhāgau prāśitraṃ yajamānabhāgabrahmabhāgau caturdhākaraṇaṃ viṣṇukramān iti

25.5.1	athāto devayajanakalpaḥ

25.14.7	athaiṣa āgnīdhraḥ pūrvaḥ patnīśālaṃ drutvāgnīn upasamādhāya saṃparistīrya pātrāṇi nirṇijya saṃsādyājyaṃ vilāpyopāste

25.14.14	athaiṣa unnetā grāvovāyavyaṃ saṃprakṣālya droṇakalaśe daśāpavitre samavadhāya dakṣiṇasya havirdhānasya puro 'kṣaṃ saṃsādayati

25.22.12	katham u khalu rathaṃtarapṛṣṭhe māhendraṃ grahaṃ gṛhṇīyāt
25.22.13	mahāṃ indro ya ojasety etayā gāyatryā māhendraṃ gṛhṇīyāt
25.22.14	atha bṛhatpṛṣṭhe mahāṃ indro nṛvad ā carṣaṇiprā ity etayā triṣṭubhā māhendram
25.22.15	athobhayapṛṣṭhe yayā pṛṣṭhaṃ tayā gṛhṇīyāt purorucam itarāṃ kuryād iti
25.23.1	katham u khalu savanīyasya paśoś caryāyā upakramo bhavatīti
25.23.2	iḍasūnaṃ saṃstīrya pṛṣadājyaṃ vihatya juhvāṃ samānīyāntareṇa cātvālotkarāv udaṅṅ upaniṣkramya saṃvadetābhighārayed āsādayet paśuṃ pañcahotrā catasṛṣūpastṛṇīte
25.23.3	manotāprabhṛtineḍāntena caret
25.23.4	siddham ata ūrdhvam
25.23.5	athokthyavigraheṣu ya eva prātaḥsavaniko grahaṇamantraḥ sa eva mādhyaṃdinīyaḥ sa tṛtīyasavanikaḥ
25.23.6	devatām eva vyañjayet
25.23.7	camasāyacamasāyaiva trīṃstrīn puroḍāśaśakalān upāsyen nava hotṛcamasa iti
25.23.8	trayāṇām evaiṣa ukto bhavati
25.23.9	athāyam āgrayaṇas trayastriṃśato devatānāṃ gṛhyate
25.23.10	kva u khalv etāḥ pradāne vijñāyanta iti
25.23.11	pātnīvate
25.23.12	vijñāyate patnīvatas triṃśataṃ trīṃś ca devān iti
25.23.13	katham u khalu pātnīvataṃ bhakṣayet
25.23.14	ādityavadgaṇasya soma deva te matividas tṛtīyasya savanasya jagatīcchandaso 'gninā vaiśvānareṇa patnīvatā tvaṣṭrā pītasya madhumata upahūyasyopahūto bhakṣayāmīti
25.24.1	katham u khalv antarukthyo bhavatīti
25.24.2	prasiddhaṃ tṛtīyasavana āgrayaṇaṃ gṛhītvokthyaṃ gṛhṇīyāt
25.24.3	athainaṃ dhruvam upasthāpya triṣūrdhvapātreṣu vigṛhṇīyāt upayāmagṛhīto 'si devebhyas tvā devāyuvam ukthyebhya ukthāyuvaṃ yajñasyāyuṣa indrāvaruṇābhyāṃ juṣṭaṃ gṛhṇāmīti
25.24.4	punar havir asīty ukthyasthālīṃ pratyabhimṛśati
25.24.5	parimṛjya sādayaty eṣa te yonir indrāvaruṇābhyāṃ tveti
25.24.6	tadānīm evāparaṃ gṛhṇāty upayāmagṛhīto 'si devebhyas tvā devāyuvam ukthyebhya ukthāyuvaṃ yajñasyāyuṣa indrābṛhaspatibhyāṃ juṣṭaṃ gṛhṇāmīti
25.24.7	punar havir asīty ukthyasthālīṃ pratyabhimṛśati
25.24.8	parimṛjya sādayaty eṣa te yonir indrābṛhaspatibhyāṃ tveti
25.24.9	tadānīm evāparaṃ gṛhṇāty upayāmagṛhīto 'si devebhyas tvā devāyuvam ukthyebhya ukthyāyuvaṃ yajñasyāyuṣa indrāviṣṇubhyāṃ juṣṭaṃ gṛhṇāmīti
25.24.10	nātra punar havir asīty ukthyasthālīṃ pratyabhimṛśati
25.24.11	daśābhir evaināṃ mṛṣṭvā nyubjati
25.24.12	parimṛjya sādayaty eṣa te yonir indrāviṣṇubhyāṃ tveti
25.24.13	athainān dhruve 'vanīya hotṛcamase 'vanayet
25.24.14	stotre stotrāṇy āvapec chastre śastrāṇi
25.24.15	tasya prattasya bhakṣa indrāvaruṇābhyām indrābṛhaspatibhyām indrāviṣṇubhyām agninā vaiśvānareṇa marudbhiḥ pītasya madhumata upahūtasyopahūto bhakṣayāmīty etenaiva vā bhakṣayet
25.24.16	api vā nityapūrveṇādityavadgaṇasya soma deva te matividas tṛtīyasya savanasya jagatīcchandasa indrāvaruṇābhyām indrābṛhaspatibhyām indrāviṣṇubhyām agninā vaiśvānareṇa marudbhiḥ pītasya madhumata upahūtasyopahūto bhakṣayāmīti
25.24.17	yatho etad aupamanyavasya kalpaṃ vedayante purastān mindāhutī juhuyāt
25.24.18	mindāhutī hutvā hāriyojanaṃ grahaṃ gṛhṇīyād iti
25.24.19	atha haike cātvāladeśe 'vabhṛthaṃ nidhāya dadhnā payasā madhumiśreṇa naiṣṭyayanair ṛjīṣam abhijuhvati yat te grāvṇā cicchiduḥ soma rājann iti
25.24.20	avabhṛthayajūṃṣi juhotīti
25.24.21	katamāni khalv imāny avabhṛthayajūṃṣi bhavantīti
25.24.22	yad evainad āhavanīye śākalaiś caranti devakṛtasyainaso 'vayajanam asi manuṣyakṛtasyainaso 'vayajanam asi pitṛkṛtasyainaso 'vayajanam asīti
25.24.23	avabhṛthāhutāv iti
25.24.24	katamā u khalv iyam avabhṛthāhutir bhavatīti
25.24.25	apa udgṛhya juhoti yajñasya tvā yajñapate havirbhiḥ / sūktavāke namovāke vidhema svāheti
25.24.26	tiṣṭhanta evāvabhṛthena pracareyuḥ
25.24.27	parāṅāvṛttaḥ prapadenodakāntaṃ pratyasyet siddham ata ūrdhvam
25.25.1	athāyam udayanīyaḥ
25.25.2	tasya kaḥ karmaṇa upakramo bhavatīti

25.25.4	pāṇī saṃmṛśīta
25.25.5	paristṛṇīyāt
25.25.6	pātrāṇi nirṇijya saṃsādayet
25.25.7	brahmāṇaṃ dakṣiṇata upaveśyātraivottarata udapātraṃ nidhāya jaghanena gārhapatyaṃ sphyaṃ nidadhyāt
25.25.8	sphyopari pātrīm

25.25.11	athājyaṃ nirvapet
25.25.12	athājyam adhiśrayet
25.25.13	ubhayaṃ paryagni kṛtvā jaghanena gārhapatyam aupasadāyāṃ vedyāṃ stambayajur haret
25.25.14	siddham ata ūrdhvam
25.25.15	tasya śṛtasyāsādanam
25.25.16	dakṣiṇaṃ paridhisandhim aparaṃ vimucya dakṣiṇaṃ vā paridhim agreṇa prāñcaṃ prāyaṇīyam āsādayet pratyañcam udayanīyam
25.25.17	agnimukhā atra devatā ijyante
25.25.18	śaṃyvanta udayanīyaḥ saṃtiṣṭhate
25.26.1	atha yadi paśur upak.lptaḥ syāt pāṇī saṃmṛśīta
25.26.2	paristṛṇīyāt
25.26.3	pātrāṇi nirṇijya saṃsādayet
25.26.4	prokṣaṇīḥ saṃskṛtya pātrāṇi prokṣet
25.26.5	ājyaṃ nirupyādhiśritya paryagni kṛtvā sphyam ādadīta
25.26.6	saṃpraiṣaprabhṛti pāśubandhikaṃ karma tāyate
25.26.7	siddham ata ūrdhvam
25.26.8	yatho etac chālīkeḥ kalpaṃ vedayante maitrāvaruṇyāmikṣayā yajeteti tasyai saha savanīyair vatsāpākaraṇaṃ saha sāyaṃdoham
25.26.9	udayanīyena caritvā pāṇī saṃmṛśīta
25.26.10	paristṛṇīyāt
25.26.11	pātrāṇi nirṇijya saṃsādayet
25.26.12	prokṣaṇīḥ saṃskṛtya pātrāṇi prokṣet
25.26.13	atha prātardohaṃ dhenūr dohayet

25.26.15	athājyaṃ nirvapet
25.26.16	athājyam adhiśrayet
25.26.17	ubhayaṃ paryagni kṛtvāhavanīye vaidalakān paridhīn paridhāyāthaināṃ punar adhiśrityābhighāritām udvāsyāntarvedy āsādayet
25.26.18	ājyabhāgāntaṃ karma kṛtvā dakṣiṇe vedyante keśaśmaśru vapate nakhāni nikṛntate

25.26.22	asaṃnaddhā patnī yajñapuccham anvāste
25.27.1	athemam agnicayaṃ tryupasatkaṃ ṣaḍupasatkaṃ dvādaśopasatkam iti cinvate
25.27.2	sa yadi sāhasraṃ tryupasatkaṃ ceṣyamāṇo bhavati pūrvāhṇe pravargyopasadbhyāṃ pracarya prathamāṃ citiṃ sapurīṣām upadhāya saṃcitāhutī juhoti
25.27.3	dvitīyāṃ citiṃ sapurīṣām upadhāya saṃcitāhutī juhoti
25.27.4	śvo bhūte pravargyopasadbhyāṃ pracarya tṛtīyāṃ citiṃ caturthīṃ citiṃ pañcamīṃ citiṃ ṣaṣṭhīṃ citiṃ sapurīṣām upadhāya saṃcitāhutī juhoti
25.27.5	aupavasathikaiva tṛtīyā
25.27.6	atha yadi sāhasraṃ ṣaḍupasatkaṃ ceṣyamāṇo bhavati pūrvāhṇe pravargyopasadbhyāṃ pracarya prathamāṃ citiṃ sapurīṣām upadhāya saṃcitāhutī juhoti
25.27.7	śvo bhūte pravargyopasadbhyāṃ pracarya dvitīyāṃ citiṃ sapurīṣām upadhāya saṃcitāhutī juhoti
25.27.8	sa evam eva pañcāham
25.27.9	aupavasathikaiva ṣaṣthī
25.27.10	atha yadi sāhasraṃ dvādaśopasatkaṃ ceṣyamāṇo bhavati yathāsūtraṃ tathā
25.27.11	atha yadi dviṣāhasraṃ tryupasatkaṃ ceṣyamāṇo bhavati pūrvāhṇe pravargyopasadbhyāṃ pracarya prathamāṃ citiṃ sapurīṣām upadhāya saṃcitāhutī hutvāhāryāṃ sapurīṣām upadadhāti
25.27.12	dvitīyāṃ citiṃ sapurīṣām upadhāya saṃcitāhutī hutvāhāryāṃ sapurīṣām upadadhāti
25.27.13	śvo bhūte pravargyopasadbhyāṃ pracarya tṛtīyāṃ citiṃ caturthīṃ citiṃ pañcamīṃ citiṃ ṣaṣṭhīṃ citiṃ sapurīṣām upadhāya saṃcitāhutī hutvāhāryāṃ sapurīṣām upadadhāti
25.27.14	aupavasathikaiva tṛtīyā
25.27.15	atha yadi dviṣāhasraṃ ṣaḍupasatkaṃ ceṣyamāno bhavati pūrvāhṇe pravargyopasadbhyāṃ pracarya prathamāṃ citiṃ sapurīṣām upadhāya saṃcitāhutī hutvāhāryāṃ sapurīṣām upadadhāti
25.27.16	śvo bhūte pravargyopasadbhyāṃ pracarya dvitīyāṃ citiṃ sapurīṣām upadhāya saṃcitāhutī hutvāhāryāṃ sapurīṣām upadadhāti
25.27.17	sa evam eva pañcāham
25.27.18	aupavasathikaiva ṣaṣṭhī
25.27.19	atha yadi dviṣāhasraṃ dvādaśopasatkaṃ ceṣyamāṇo bhavati pūrvāhṇe pravargyopasadbhyāṃ pracarya prathamāṃ citim upadhāyādhyastapurīṣa etāṃ rātriṃ vasati
25.27.20	śvo bhūte pravargyopasadbhyāṃ pracarya purīṣam upadhāya saṃcitāhutī hutvāhāryāṃ sapurīṣām upadadhāti
25.27.21	sa evam eva yathāsūtraṃ tathā vartamānaḥ purīṣaṃpurīṣam upadhāya saṃcitāhutī hutvāhāryāṃ sapurīṣām upadadhāti
25.27.22	aupavasathikaiva dvādaśī
25.28.1	atha yadi triṣāhasraṃ tryupasatkaṃ ceṣyamāṇo bhavati pūrvāhṇe pravargyopasadbhyāṃ pracarya prathamāṃ citiṃ sapurīṣām upadhāya saṃcitāhutī hutvā dve āhārye sapurīṣe upadadhāti
25.28.2	dvitīyāṃ citiṃ sapurīṣām upadhāya saṃcitāhutī hutvā dve āhārye sapurīṣe upadadhāti
25.28.3	śvo bhūte pravargyopasadbhyāṃ pracarya tṛtīyāṃ citiṃ caturthīṃ citiṃ pañcamīṃ citiṃ ṣaṣṭhīṃ citiṃ sapurīṣām upadhāya saṃcitāhutī hutvā dvedve āhārye sapurīṣe upadadhāti
25.28.4	aupavasathikaiva tṛtīyā
25.28.5	atha yadi triṣāhasraṃ ṣaḍupasatkaṃ ceṣyamāṇo bhavati pūrvāhṇe pravargyopasadbhyāṃ pracarya prathamāṃ citiṃ sapurīṣām upadhāya saṃcitāhutī hutvā dve āhārye sapurīṣe upadadhāti
25.28.6	śvo bhūte pravargyopasadbhyāṃ pracarya dvitīyāṃ citiṃ sapurīṣām upadhāya saṃcitāhutī hutvā dve āhārye sapurīṣe upadadhāti
25.28.7	sa evam eva pañcāham
25.28.8	aupavasathikaiva ṣaṣṭhī
25.28.9	atha yadi triṣāhasraṃ dvādaśopasatkaṃ ceṣyamāṇo bhavati pūrvāhṇe pravargyopasadbhyāṃ pracarya prathamāṃ citim upadhāyādhyastapurīṣa etāṃ rātriṃ vasati
25.28.10	śvo bhūte pravargyopasadbhyāṃ pracarya purīṣam upadhāya saṃcitāhutī hutvā dve āhārye sapurīṣe upadadhāti
25.28.11	sa evam eva yathāsūtraṃ tathā vartamānaḥ purīṣaṃpurīṣam upadhāya saṃcitāhutī hutvā dvedve āhārye sapurīṣe upadadhāti
25.28.12	aupavasathikaiva dvādaśī
25.28.13	katham u khalv antarupasatkaṃ bahirupasatkam antarbahirupasatkam iti vijānīyāt
25.28.14	daikṣasya saṃvatsarasya dvādaśāvaśiṣya rājānaṃ krīṇīyāt so 'ntarupasatkaḥ
25.28.15	saṃvatsare paryavete rājānaṃ krīṇīyāt sa bahirupasatkaḥ
25.28.16	daikṣasya saṃvatsarasya ṣaḍ avaśiṣya rājānaṃ krīṇīyāt tāś copasadaḥ syur uttaraś ca ṣaḍrātraḥ so 'ntarbahirupasatkaḥ
25.29.1	mṛdam etāṃ samāṃ bilena karotīti
25.29.2	samāṃ bhūmyāṃ nidadhātīty evedam uktaṃ bhavati
25.29.3	athaitāv aśvagardabhāv uttarata upasthāpayati purastād vā pratyañcau
25.29.4	sa yadi purastātpratyañcau dakṣiṇo 'śva uttarato gardabhaḥ
25.29.5	atha yady uttarataḥ pūrvo 'śvo 'paro gardabhaḥ
25.29.6	agnibhyaḥ paśūn ālabhata iti

25.29.9	apo dehān abhyavaharantīti vijñāyate

25.30.1	uttaramuttaraṃ prati balīvardam uttarāmuttarāṃ sītāṃ kṛṣan sarvauṣadhaṃ vapan svayamātṛṇṇāvakāśaṃ nāvakrāmed iti
25.30.2	atha haike puruṣe ca svayamātṛṇṇāyāṃ ca sāma gāyanti
25.30.3	kim u khalu svayamātṛṇṇānikotaṃ bhavatīti
25.30.4	hiraṇyeṣṭakā maṇḍaleṣṭakā retaḥsig ity eva brūyāt
25.30.5	yaṃyam iṣṭakāgaṇam upadadhyāt taṃtaṃ na vyaveyād dakṣiṇena dakṣiṇam uttareṇottaram
25.30.6	sa yadi dakṣiṇataḥ purastād veṣṭakā upadadhyād apasalair atrāvarteta
25.30.7	atha yady uttarataḥ paścād vā pradakṣiṇam āvṛtya svayamātṛṇṇām evābhimukha iṣṭakā upadadhyāt
25.30.8	kṛttikā upadadhātīti

25.30.12	saha sā na purīṣacitiḥ ṣaṣṭhyā vṛddhijeti
25.30.13	vṛddhijaiveti śālīkiḥ
25.30.14	ṣaṣṭhaṃ pracchādam āharamāṇaḥ kasminn u khalv enat kāla āhared iti
25.30.15	nakṣatreṣṭakā upadhāyety eva brūyāt
25.30.16	sa tribhiḥ karmabhir abhipraiti purīṣasyopadhānena sāhasravatā prokṣaṇena dhenukaraṇeneti
25.30.17	so 'ṣṭābhiḥ karmabhir abhipraity uttame saṃcitāhutī śatarudrīyaṃ namaskārāḥ pariṣecanaṃ vikarṣaṇaṃ sarpāhutīḥ sāmabhir upasthānam anuśaṃsanam iti
25.31.1	atha kiṃ nānābījānāṃ nirvapaṇe tantram iti
25.31.2	srugādānaṃ tantraṃ śūrpādānaṃ tantraṃ dhūḥprabhṛtayaḥ śakaṭamantrāḥ sarve tantraṃ bhavaty ā sāvitrāt
25.31.3	bījaṃbījam abhyāvartate sāvitram
25.31.4	tantraṃ daśahotābhipravrajanaṃ paridānam iti tantraṃ bhavati
25.31.5	tantraṃ kṛṣṇājināvadhavanaṃ tantram ulūkhalādhyūhanaṃ tantraṃ puroḍāśīyānām āvapanaṃ tantraṃ musalasyāvadhānaṃ tantraṃ śūrpasyopohanaṃ tantraṃ haviṣkṛt
25.31.6	āvapanaprabhṛtimantro bījaṃbījam abhyāvartate praskandanāntaḥ
25.31.7	yatho etac chālīkeḥ kalpaṃ vedayante saha sviṣṭakṛtātyākrāmed ity ekādaśaprayāja evaitad upapadyate na pañcaprayāje
25.31.8	yatho etad aupamanyavasya kalpaṃ vedayante purastāt sviṣṭakṛto yāvad āmnātenābhiṣiñcen nātra kṛṣṇājinaṃ na rukmau na pārthāni bhavanti kuśān eva saṃstīrya teṣv enam abhiṣiñced iti
25.31.9	katham u khalu sattriṇām abhiṣeka āvartata iti
25.31.10	abhiṣeka āvedanaṃ prathame 'hny abhiṣekaḥ prathame 'hny aśvasyāvaghrāpaṇam āditaś cāntataś ca bahiṣpavamānam āstāve stuvīrann aharahar yajñāyajñiyasya stotre dvābhyām abhimṛśed iti
25.32.1	katham u khalv ekādaśinānāṃ paśūnāṃ caryāyā upakramo bhavatīti
25.32.2	iḍasūnaṃ saṃstīrya pṛṣadājyaṃ vihatya juhvāṃ samānīyāntareṇa cātvālotkarāv udaṅṅ upaniṣkramya saṃvadetābhighārayed āsādayet paśuṃ pañcahotrā catasṛṣūpastṛṇīte
25.32.3	mukhyasya paśor daivatam avadāya vṛkyamedo yūṣann avadhāya tena juhūṃ prorṇuyāt
25.32.4	yūṣṇopasicyābhighārayet
25.32.5	athopabhṛti sviṣṭakṛte sarveṣāṃ tryaṅgāṇāṃ sakṛtsakṛt sviṣṭakṛte samavadāya vṛkyamedo yūṣann avadhāya tenopabhṛtaṃ prorṇuyāt
25.32.6	yūṣṇopasicya nābhighārayet
25.32.7	atha hṛdayaṃ jihvāṃ vakṣas tanima matasnau vaniṣṭhum iti pātryāṃ samavadhāya yūṣṇopasicya nābhighārayet
25.32.8	atha kaṃse vā camase vā vasāhomaṃ gṛhītvā yūṣṇopasicyāthābhighārayet
25.32.9	saṃmṛśet paśum
25.32.10	pārśvena vasāhomaṃ prayauyān maṃstaḥ kumbataḥ
25.32.11	jaghanenottaravediṃ parikramyāśrāvayed yājyāyā ardharce pratiprasthātā vasāhomaṃ juhuyāt
25.32.12	pariśiṃṣyāc ca digbhyaḥ
25.32.13	athetarad vasāhomahavanyāṃ samavanayet
25.32.14	vaṣaṭkṛte havir juhoti
25.32.15	so 'niṣṭvaiva sviṣṭakṛtam udaṅṅ atyākramya juhvāṃ caiva vasāhomahavanyāṃ copastṛṇīte
25.32.16	dvitīyasya paśor daivatam avadāya vṛkyamedo yūṣann avadhāya tena juhūṃ prorṇuyāt
25.32.17	yūṣṇopasicyābhighārayet
25.32.18	athopabhṛti sviṣṭakṛte arveṣāṃ tryaṅgāṇāṃ sakṛtsakṛt samavadāya vṛkyamedo yūṣann avadhāya tenopabhṛtaṃ prorṇuyāt
25.32.19	samavattam etad yūṣṇopasicya nābhighārayet
25.32.20	athaiva kaṃse vā camase vā vasāhomaṃ gṛhṇīyād yūṣṇopasiñced athābhighārayet
25.32.21	saṃmṛśet paśum
25.32.22	pārśvena vasāhomaṃ prayauyān maṃsataḥ kumbataḥ
25.32.23	jaghanenottaravediṃ parikramyāśrāvayed yājyāyā ardharce pratiprasthātā vasāhomaṃ juhuyāt
25.32.24	pariśiṃṣyāc ca dibhyaḥ
25.32.25	vaṣaṭkṛte havir juhoti
25.32.26	sa evam eva sarveṣāṃ paśūnām
25.32.27	sa yatra vāruṇasya sviṣṭakṛte 'vadyet tad dvir abhighārayet
25.32.28	samavattam evaitad yūṣṇopasicyābhighārayet
25.32.29	tathaiva kaṃse vā camase vā vasāhoma gṛhṇīyād yūṣṇopasicyābhighārayet
25.32.30	saṃmṛśet paśum
25.32.31	pārśvena vasāhomaṃ prayauyān maṃstaḥ kumbataḥ
25.32.32	jaghanenottaravediṃ parikramyāśrāvayed yājyāyā ardharce pratiprasthātā vasāhomaṃ juhuyāt
25.32.33	pariśiṃṣyāc ca digbhyaḥ
25.32.34	athetarad vasāhomahavanyāṃ samavanayet
25.32.35	vaṣaṭkṛte havir juhoti
25.32.36	atha purastād vanaspateḥ samānyo diśaḥ pratiyajet
25.32.37	atha vanaspatinā caret
25.32.38	atha sviṣṭakṛtā
25.32.39	siddham ata ūrdhvam
25.32.40	yatho etad aupamanyavasya kalpaṃ vedayante maitrāvaruṇyāmikṣayā nirūḍhayā yajeteti siddham
25.32.41	atraupavasathikaṃ karma jānīyād yathāmāvāsyāyāṃ saṃnayato 'nyatra piṇḍapitṛyajñāt
25.32.42	saṃvatsaraṃ na kaṃcana pratyavarohen na śīrṣamāṃsaṃ khāden na vayasāṃ māṃsaṃ nāgniṃ citvā rāmām upeyān nāgnicid varṣati dhāved yadi dhāved upāvarteta
25.32.43	annādyam evābhyupāvartata iti brāhmaṇam
25.33.1	athāsmin vājapeye saptadaśānāṃ rathānāṃ trayastrayo 'śvāḥ
25.33.2	ta ekapañcāśatam
25.33.3	uttarataḥ praṣṭiṃ niyuñjyāt
25.33.4	caturviṃśatiṃ paśūn ity agnīṣomīyaś cānūbandhyaś ca caturviṃśau bhavataḥ
25.33.5	atha vai bhavati
25.33.6	sāvitraṃ juhoti karmaṇaḥkarmaṇaḥ purastād iti
25.33.7	dīkṣaṇīyāṃ nirvapsyan sāvitraṃ juhotīti
25.33.8	sāvitrād eva sāvitraṃ bhavati
25.33.9	dīkṣāhutīr hoṣyan sāvitraṃ juhotīti
25.33.10	sāvitraṃ hutvā dīkṣāhutīr juhuyāt
25.33.11	prāyaṇīyāṃ nirvapsyan sāvitraṃ juhotīti
25.33.12	sāvitrād eva sāvitraṃ bhavati
25.33.13	antarhiraṇyāṃ hoṣyan sāvitraṃ juhotīti
25.33.14	sāvitraṃ hutvāntarhiraṇyāṃ juhuyāt
25.33.15	padena caritvā rājānaṃ krītvohyātithyaṃ nirvapsyan sāvitraṃ juhotīti
25.33.16	sāvitrād eva sāvitraṃ bhavati
25.33.17	prathamābhyāṃ pravargyopasadbhyāṃ pracariṣyan sāvitraṃ juhotīti
25.33.18	sāvitraṃ hutvā prathamābhyāṃ pravargyopasadbhyāṃ pracaret
25.33.19	mahāvedyai pūrvaṃ parigrāhaṃ parigrahīṣyan sāvitraṃ juhotīti
25.33.20	sāvitraṃ hutvā sphyam ādadīta
25.33.21	āhavanīyaṃ praṇeṣyan sāvitraṃ juhotīti
25.33.22	sāvitraṃ hutvedhmam ādadīta
25.33.23	rathavāhane sadohavirdhāne saṃmeṣyan sāvitraṃ juhotīti
25.33.24	sāvitraṃ hutvā rathavāhane sadohavirdhāne saṃminuyāt
25.33.25	agnīṣomau praṇeṣyan sāvitraṃ juhotīti
25.33.26	sāvitraṃ hutvāgnīṣomau praṇayet
25.33.27	yūpam ucchrayiṣyan sāvitraṃ juhotīti
25.33.28	sāvitraṃ hutvā prokṣaṇīr ādadīta
25.33.29	svarvantaṃ yūpam utsṛjyāgnīṣomīyaṃ paśum upākariṣyan sāvitraṃ juhotīti
25.33.30	sāvitraṃ hutvā barhiṣī ādadīta
25.33.31	tasya prasiddhaṃ vapayā caritvā vasatīvarīr grahīṣyan sāvitraṃ juhotīti
25.33.32	sāvitraṃ hutvā kumbham ādadīta
25.33.33	paśupuroḍāśaṃ nirvapsyan sāvitraṃ juhotīti
25.33.34	sāvitrād eva sāvitraṃ bhavati
25.34.1	tūparaś caturaśrir bhavatīti
25.34.2	anudiśam aśrī sthāpayitvāgniṣṭhāṃ ca sūryasthāṃ ca saṃminuyāt
25.34.3	pañcaindrān atigrāhyān gṛhṇātīti
25.34.4	sarva evaite sopayāmā grahītavyā bhavanti
25.34.5	mārutyā pracaryaitān saṃjñapayed iti
25.34.6	tantram ulmukaharaṇaṃ tantram adhrigupraiṣo 'bhyāvarteta
25.34.7	saṃjñaptahoma ūrdhve barhiṣī bhindyāt svāhākṛtipraiṣa ājyaṃ dvedhā vibhajed ubhayabhāginya stokīyāḥ
25.34.8	athedaṃ rathacakraṃ prādeśamātraṃ bhūmer ucchritaṃ bhavati
25.34.9	apareṇa parītya pakṣasī saṃmṛśatīti rathacakre evaite saṃmṛśati
25.34.10	athāhājisṛto dakṣiṇāpathenopātītyeti sūtarājanyā evaita uktā bhavanti
25.34.11	mārutā agreṇāhavanīyaṃ parītyeti kṣatrasaṃtrahītāra evaita uktā bhavanti
25.34.12	atha yajamānaṃ tārpyaṃ paridhāpayatīti
25.34.13	ājyenaivaitat tṛptaṃ vāso bhavati
25.34.14	athāpy udāharanti tṛpā nāma vṛkṣāḥ
25.34.15	teṣām evaitad bhavati

25.34.17	ādeśād eva bṛhatsāmaikaviṃśaṃ vaiṣṇavīṣu śipiviṣṭavatīṣu stuvīrann iti
26.1.1	athāyaṃ rājasūyo 'rdhasaptadaśair māsaiḥ saṃtiṣṭhate 'rdhaṣoḍaśair vā
26.1.2	tasmin somasaṃsthāḥ pañcaikāhā ahīno dvirātraḥ
26.1.3	ṣaṭ chālāḥ
26.1.4	aṣṭau yūpāḥ ṣaḍ u hāgniṣṭomikā dvipaśau paśubandhe sautrāmaṇyām aṣṭamaḥ
26.1.5	tāvanta evāvabhṛthāḥ
26.1.6	kva u khalu haviṣo havir nirupyata iti
26.1.7	ānumata ity eva brūyāt
26.1.8	kṛṣṇaṃ vāsaḥ kṛṣṇatūṣaṃ dakṣiṇeti
26.1.9	kṛṣṇadaśam ity evedam uktaṃ bhavati
26.1.10	kāmam iṣṭyā paśubandheneti
26.1.11	saṃtanyeṣṭyeṣṭvāgrayaṇena vā pārvaṇena vā yajeta
26.1.12	katham u khalu sākamedhaparuṣīti
26.1.13	mahārātre pūrvā saṃtaniḥ śvo bhūta uttarā pradoṣe
26.1.14	kim u khalv asamuditaṃ bhavatīti
26.1.15	prāg anūyājikāt saṃpraiṣād ity eva brūyāt
26.1.16	bārhaspatyaṃ caruṃ nirvapati brahmaṇo gṛha iti
26.1.17	yo 'nyo yājamānāsaṃyukto brāhmaṇo bhavati
26.1.18	bhagāya caruṃ vāvātāyai gṛha iti
26.1.19	yānyā mahiṣyā eva subhagā bhavati
26.1.20	nairṛtaṃ caruṃ parivṛktyai gṛha iti
26.1.21	durbhagaivaiṣoktā bhavati
26.1.22	pauṣṇaṃ caruṃ bhāgadughasya gṛha iti
26.1.23	mahānasika evaiṣa ukto bhavati
26.1.24	athāpy udāharanti yo bhāgalābhī dogdhi sa eṣaiṣa ukto bhavati
26.1.25	dvādaśāhena ratnināṃ havīṃṣi
26.1.26	trayodaśe maitrābārhaspatyam
26.1.27	dvyaho 'vaśiṣṭa etasyaiva pūrvapakṣasya
26.1.28	tasmin saṃtanībhyāṃ yajeta
26.1.29	atha ced ukthye 'bhiṣecanīye 'gniṃ cinvītaitasminn eva dvirātra āgnikāni sāvitrāṇi hutvokhāḥ saṃbhṛtya paśuśīrṣāṇi ca vāyavyena paśunā yajeta
26.2.1	apāṃ patir asīty apāṃpatīyāḥ
26.2.2	samudriyāṇām evaitā uktā bhavanti
26.2.3	marutām oja stheti niveṣṭyāḥ
26.2.4	āvartānām evaitā uktā bhavanti
26.2.5	sūryavarcasa sthety abhidṛśyāḥ
26.2.6	prasannānām evaitā uktā bhavanti
26.2.7	śakvarī stheti gor u jarāyor evaitā uktā bhavanti
26.2.8	so 'traivāgneyenāṣṭākapālena yajeteti
26.2.9	sadyaḥ saṃtiṣṭhamāna ukthya etat sūtraṃ bhavaty atha ced atipravardheta tadānīm evāgneyenāṣṭākapālena yajeta
26.2.10	śvo bhūte sārasvatena
26.2.11	daśadaśātra camasam abhisaṃjānata iti
26.2.12	hotṛcamase codgātṛcamase ca saptasapta
26.2.13	athetareṣu navanava
26.2.14	prasarpaṇaprabhṛtaya evaite bhavanty apsuṣomāntāḥ
26.2.15	athāyaṃ pratīcīnastomaḥ keśavapanīyo 'tirātraḥ ṣoḍaśiko bhavati
26.2.16	tasya hāgniṣṭomikāni stotrāṇy āvṛttāni bhavanty ekaviṃśo bahiṣpavamānaḥ saptadaśāny ājyāni mādhyaṃdinaś ca pavamānaḥ pañcadaśāni pṛṣṭhāny ārbhavaś ca pavamānas trivṛdyajñāyajñiyam iti
26.2.17	atha pratīcīnastomāya keśavapanīyāyātirātrāya dīkṣate
26.2.18	tasya ṣaḍ dīkṣāḥ ṣaḍ upasadas trayodaśyāṃ prasutaś caturdaśyām udavasānam
26.2.19	athaitasminn eva pakṣāvaśeṣe vyuṣṭaye dvirātrāya dīkṣate
26.2.20	sa etāṃ caikāṃ rātriṃ pūrvapakṣasya dīkṣito bhavati dve cāparapakṣasya
26.2.21	tāsāṃ dvādaśopasadaḥ
26.2.22	athopavasati
26.2.23	athopavasathīye 'hany amāvāsyāyāṃ pūrvam ahar bhavaty uttarasminn uttaram iti
26.2.24	saṃtiṣṭhate vyuṣṭir dvirātraḥ
26.2.25	athottarāṃ śālām adhyavasyet
26.2.26	atha mathitvāgnīn vihṛtyodayanīyāyāgniṣṭomāya dīkṣate
26.2.27	tasya tisro dīkṣās tisra upasadaḥ saptamyāṃ prasutaḥ
26.2.28	saṃtiṣṭhata eṣa udayanīyo 'gniṣṭomaḥ sahasradakṣiṇaḥ
26.2.29	athaitasminn eva pakṣāvaśeṣe kṣatrasya dhṛtinābhividhatte devikāhavirbhis traidhātavīyayā sautrāmaṇyeti
26.2.30	saṃtiṣṭhate rājasūyo 'rdhasaptadaśair māsaiḥ

26.3.1	athāto 'ñjasavaḥ
26.3.2	prasiddham eva prathamo 'rdhamāsaḥ saṃtiṣṭhate
26.3.3	pañcāhena cāturmāsyāni dvyahena saṃtanī aṣṭame 'hanīndraturīyaṃ navame 'hni pūrvāṇi devikāhavīṃṣi daśame 'hny uttarāṇy ekādaśe dvādaśe trayodaśa iti triṣaṃyuktaiś caturdaśe vaiśvānaro dvādaśakapālaḥ pañcadaśe vāruṇo yavamayaś carur iti māsaḥ
26.3.4	dvādaśāhena ratnināṃ havīṃṣi trayodaśe maitrābārhaspatyaṃ dvyahena saṃtanī ardhamāsenābhiṣecanīya ukthya iti dvau māsau
26.3.5	ardhamāsena saptadaśo daśapeyo 'rdhamāsaṃ dīkṣite dīkṣitavratīti trayo māsāḥ

26.3.11	ardhamāsenābhiṣecanīya ukthyo 'rdhamāsena saptadaśo daśapeya iti dvau māsau
26.3.12	ardhamāsena pratīcīnastomaḥ keśavapanīyo 'tirātro 'rdhamāsena vyuṣṭir dvirātra iti trayo māsāḥ

26.3.22	saṃtiṣṭhate rājasūyaḥ
26.4.1	athemam iṣṭikalpaṃ pañcadaśasāmidhenīkaṃ ca saptadaśasāmidhenīkaṃ ca samāmanāmaḥ
26.4.2	tatra siddhaṃ yājamānaṃ baudhāyanasya kalpaḥ
26.4.3	yathāmnāyaṃ śālīkeḥ
26.4.4	trīṃs tṛcān anubrūyād iti
26.4.5	triḥ prathamām anūcya tisro 'nantarā anubrūyāt trir uttamām
26.4.6	tāḥ pañcadaśa
26.4.7	pañcadaśānubrūyād iti
26.4.8	ekādaśemāḥ sāmidhenyaḥ samāmanāmaḥ
26.4.9	tāsāṃ triḥ prathamām anvāha trir uttamām
26.4.10	tāḥ pañcadaśa
26.4.11	saptadaśānubrūyād ekaviṃśatim anubrūyāc caturviṃśatim anubrūyāt triṃśatam anubrūyād dvātriṃśatam anubrūyāt ṣaṭtriṃśatam anubrūyāc catvāriṃśatam anubrūyāc catuścatvāriṃśatam anubrūyād aṣṭācatvāriṃśatam anubrūyād iti dhāyyāloka etā dhātavyā bhavanti
26.4.12	āgneyyaḥ sarvā gāyatryaḥ
26.4.13	sarvāṇi chandāṃsy anubrūyād aparimitam anubrūyād iti dhāyyāloka evaitā dhātavyā bhavanti

26.5.1	athemāḥ kāmyā iṣṭayo niṣpurīṣeṇaiva prayoktavyā bhavanti
26.5.2	sa saṃvatsaraṃ payovrataḥ syād dvādaśāhaṃ vā yāvad vā śaṃsīta
26.5.3	tāsāṃ yāḥ samānasaṃyojanā ekāṃ cet tāsāṃ nirvapet sarvā evaitā nirvaptavyā bhavanti yatho etad anāyukto 'gniparicaro 'lpam uddhṛtya punar apy uddharati
26.5.4	katham atra prāyaścittaṃ sidhyatī3 na sidhyatī3 iti

26.5.6	atha haika āhur na sidhyatīti
26.5.7	nirdiṣṭabhāgo vā etayor anyo 'nirdiṣṭabhāgo 'nya iti

26.5.11	gārhapatyasakāśād dhṛṣṭim ādadīta
26.5.12	tayāhavanīye vaiśvānarasya kapālāny upadadhyāt
26.5.13	pradakṣiṇam āvṛtya gārhapatye mārutasya kṛtāni piṣṭāni samupya saṃyutya vyabhimṛśya piṇḍau kṛtvāgreṇa mārutasya piṇḍaṃ paryāhṛtyāhavanīye vaiśvānaram adhipṛñjyāt
26.5.14	pradakṣiṇam āvṛtya gārhapatye mārutaṃ tvacaṃ grāhayitvemaṃ tvacaṃ grāhayet
26.5.15	amuṃ paryagni kṛtvemaṃ paryagni kuryāt
26.5.16	amuṃ śrapayitvemaṃ śrapayet
26.5.17	api vobhayam evobhayatra kuryāt
26.5.18	tasya śṛtasyāsādanaṃ dakṣiṇaṃ paridhisaṃdhim aparaṃ vimucya dakṣiṇaṃ vā paridhim agreṇa
26.5.19	siddham ata ūrdhvam
26.5.20	etasmin vā etau mṛjāte yo vidviṣāṇayor annam attīti
26.5.21	itaram itareṇety evaiṣa ukto bhavati
26.5.22	yaṃ mṛdho 'bhi praveperan rāṣṭrāṇi vābhi samiyur iti
26.5.23	prativeśā rājāno mṛdhaḥ
26.5.24	sva eva janapadā rāṣṭrāṇi viśaḥ
26.5.25	yo hatamanāḥ svayaṃpāpa iva syād iti
26.5.26	sati bale hatamanāḥ svayaṃpāpa iva syād iti
26.5.27	sādhurūpe kule svayaṃpāpaḥ
26.5.28	yasmai prattam iva san na pradīyeteti
26.5.29	prattam anupākṛtaṃ pratibadhyamānam evaitad bhavati
26.5.30	athāsyām adhvarakalpāyām iḍāntaṃ prathamaṃ tantraṃ kuryāt
26.5.31	tṛtīyena sahāvaśeṣaṃ vartayet
26.5.32	katham atra bhakṣā iti
26.5.33	tatratatra vā bhakṣayet
26.5.34	api vā sarvāsāṃ samavadāya hutvāntato bhakṣayet
26.5.35	anaḍvān hotrā deya iti
26.5.36	yajamānasyaivaiṣa gauṣṭhād dātavyo bhavati
26.5.37	vediṃ parigṛhyārdham uddhanyād ardhaṃ neti
26.5.38	dakṣiṇaṃ vā veder ardham aparaṃ veti
26.5.39	aindrasyāvadāya vaiśvadevasyāvadyed athaindrasyopariṣṭād iti
26.5.40	dve evaite avadāne ukte bhavataḥ
26.5.41	upādhāyyapūrvayaṃ vāso dakṣiṇeti
26.5.42	praveṇato vāntato vā tāmrāṇi vā nīlāni vā sūtrāṇy upahitāni bhavanti
26.5.43	api vopadhānarajjur evaiṣoktā bhavati
26.5.44	athāsyāṃ sajñāneṣṭyāṃ sakṛd evānuvācayet sakṛd āśrāvayet
26.5.45	dve hy asyai yājyānuvākye bhavataḥ
26.6.1	atha vai bhavati
26.6.2	yadi nāvagacched imam aham ādityebhyo bhāgaṃ nirvapāmy āmuṣmād amuṣyai viśo 'vagantor iti nirvaped iti nirupyoparamati
26.6.3	paridānāntaṃ karma kṛtvāthaitān vrīhīn kṛṣṇājine samupyottarārdhe 'gnyagārasyāsañjayet
26.6.4	athāvagate saṃsādayet
26.6.5	prokṣaṇaprabhṛtinā karmaṇā pratipadyeta
26.6.6	siddham ata ūrdhvam
26.6.7	yathā nakhanirbhinnāyām evaṃ śatakṛṣṇalāyām
26.6.8	purā vā taṇḍulānām āvapanād rukmam avadadhyāc chṛtam uttaram api vainaṃ śṛtam eva suvarṇarajatābhyāṃ rukmābhyāṃ parigṛhyāntarvedy āsādayet
26.6.9	āgneyasya ca saumyasya caindre samāśleṣayed iti
26.6.10	vyabhimṛṣṭānāṃ piṇḍānāṃ purādhipṛñjanāt samāśleṣayitavyaṃ bhavati
26.6.11	sarveṣām abhigamayann avadyatīti sadaivatasya sasviṣṭakṛtkasyety evedam uktaṃ bhavati
26.6.12	atho khalu yāvatīḥ samā eṣyan manyeta tāvanmānaṃ syād iti
26.6.13	triṃśadvarṣaś cet syāt saptatimānaṃ kurvīta
26.6.14	catvāriṃśadvarṣaś cet syāt ṣaṣṭimānaṃ kurvīta
26.6.15	eṣa evaitasyābhivṛddhikalpaḥ
26.6.16	atha vāruṇeṣu ca saṃjñāneṣṭyāṃ ca sakṛd evānuvācayet sakṛd āśrāvayet sakṛt pradānāḥ samānadevatāḥ
26.6.17	āponaptrīyaṃ caruṃ punaretya nirvaped iti
26.6.18	ko nu khalv apāṃ napād bhavatīti
26.6.19	vaidyuta ity eva brūyāt
26.6.20	kṛṣṇāmadhu ceti
26.6.21	pauttikam ity evedam uktaṃ bhavati
26.6.22	anastrigadham iti
26.6.23	trivalīkam ity evedam uktaṃ bhavati
26.6.24	athāpy udāharanti tricchadiṣkam ity evedam uktaṃ bhavati
26.6.25	yathā tridhātāv evaṃ saṃdigdhapuroḍāśasyāvadānakalpaḥ
26.7.1	sa sarpān asṛjateti
26.7.2	māsā evaita uktā bhavanti
26.7.3	sa vayāṃsy asṛjateti
26.7.4	chandāṃsy evaitāny uktāni bhavanti
26.7.5	sa vaiva syād iti
26.7.6	purāṇagārhapatyam abhyupadiśanti
26.7.7	tasya paśuvelāyām ulmukam ādāya dakṣiṇayā dvāropanirhṛtya dakṣiṇena sadaḥ parītya dakṣiṇena mārjālīyaṃ dhiṣṇiyaṃ paryāhṛtyāntareṇa yūpaṃ cāhavanīyaṃ copātihṛtyāntareṇa cātvālotkarāv udaṅṅ upanirhṛtya tena paśuṃ śrapayeyuḥ
26.7.8	atha yad āhavanīyād ulmukaṃ syād vapayā tat sahāhareyuḥ
26.7.9	kiṃdevatyāni khalv apāvyāni bhavantīti
26.7.10	dve prājāpatye āgneyaṃ vāyavyaṃ vaiśvadevam iti
26.7.11	iṣṭargo vā adhvaryur yajamānasyeṣṭarga iti
26.7.12	uṣṇāgram ity evedam uktaṃ bhavati
26.7.13	athāpy udāharanty adhvaryur evaiṣa ukto bhavati
26.7.14	āsanyān mā mantrāt pāhi kasyāś cid abhiśastyā iti
26.7.15	anuvyāhāro ha vā āsanyo mantraḥ
26.7.16	tasmān mā pāhīty evedam uktaṃ bhavati
26.7.17	tasmād yajñavāstu nābhyavetyam iti
26.7.18	ahorātrāv ity ekam
26.7.19	yāvad agnayaḥ śītāḥ syur ity etad ekam
26.7.20	yāvad enam abhivarṣed ity etad aparam
26.7.21	dvau samudrau vitatāv ajūryāv iti
26.7.22	ahorātrāv evaitāv uktau bhavataḥ
26.7.23	paryāvartete jaṭhareva pādā iti
26.7.24	udare pādā ity evedam uktaṃ bhavati
26.7.25	tayoḥ paśyanto atiyanty anyam apaśyantaḥ setunātiyanty anyam iti
26.7.26	ahaḥ paśyanto atiyanti rātriṃ svapnena setunātiyanty anyam iti
26.7.27	dve dradhasī satatī vasta eka iti
26.7.28	ādityo 'horātre vasta ity evedam uktaṃ bhavati
26.7.29	tirodhāyaity asitaṃ vasānaḥ śukram ādatte anuhāya jāryā iti
26.7.30	rātriṃ vasānas tirodhāyaiti śukram ādatte 'har ity evedam uktaṃ bhavati
26.7.31	kīṭāvapannasyeti
26.7.32	katamo nu khalv ayaṃ kīṭo bhavati
26.7.33	ya evaiṣa piṇḍān saṃvartayatīti
26.7.34	nitye grahaṇe vaiṣṇavīm ṛcam anuvartayatīti
26.7.35	pṛṣadājya evaiṣānuvartayitavyā bhavati
26.8.1	athāto 'tigrāhyān vyākhyāsyāmaḥ
26.8.2	ime nv eva pṛṣṭhyātigrāhyāḥ pañcaindrā vājapeye
26.8.3	paraḥsāmānaś cārvāksāmānaś ca sauryo vaiṣuvate
26.8.4	vaiśvakarmaṇādityau gavāmayane
26.8.5	prājāpatyo mahāvrate
26.8.6	bārhaspatyo bṛhaspatisave
26.8.7	vaimṛdhe codbhidi ca tviṣim ati ca vṛṣā so aṃśuḥ pavata iti ca
26.8.8	dvāv aśvamedhe mahimānau
26.8.9	ādeśād evāśvasya vapāṃ mahimābhyāṃ parijuhuyāt
26.8.10	katham u khalu paraḥsāsnāṃ bhakṣo bhavatīti
26.8.11	rudravadgaṇasya soma deva te mativido mādhyaṃdinasya savanasya triṣṭupchandaso 'dbhir oṣadhībhiḥ pītasyauṣadhībhiḥ prajābhiḥ pītasya prajābhiḥ prajāpatinā pītasya madhumata upahūtasyopahūto bhakṣayāmīti
26.8.12	eṣa evārvāksāmnām āvṛtto bhakṣaḥ
26.8.13	aṣṭāprūḍ ḍhiraṇyaṃ dakṣiṇeti
26.8.14	aṣṭāpilakam ity evedam uktaṃ bhavati
26.8.15	dvau ced garbhau syātāṃ dvādaśaprūṭ syāt
26.8.16	eko ha mahākośaḥ syād dvāv avāntarakośau syātām
26.8.17	athāsthigarbhāyā ājyenaivaitāny asthāni samudāyutya madhyamena parṇenāntaḥparidhi ninayed bhūr bhuvaḥ suvar iti
26.9.1	yad ālabdhāyām abhro bhavatīti
26.9.2	ālabdhāyāṃ ced abhraḥ syāt saṃsthāpayed eva
26.9.3	atha ced upākṛtāyām abhraḥ syād anyam etasmin sthāna upākṛtyottaram ameghasaṃpannam etayāgamyerann iti
26.9.4	atheme jayā abhyātānā rāṣṭrabhṛta ity āhitāgneś cānāhitāgneś cānyatra vihārād dṛṣṭā bhavanti
26.9.5	abhisamārambhāt tv evainān ācāryāḥ prāk sviṣṭakṛta upajuhvati
26.9.6	aṣṭau vasava iti
26.9.7	katame nu khalv ime vasavo bhavantīti
26.9.8	pṛthivy antarikṣaṃ dyaur agnir vāyur ādityaś candramā āpa ity ete 'ṣṭau vasavaḥ
26.9.9	eteṣu vā idaṃ sarvaṃ pratiṣṭhitaṃ yad idaṃ kiṃ ca
26.9.10	ya evaṃ veda praty eva tiṣṭhati
26.9.11	ekādaśa rudrā iti
26.9.12	prāṇā evaita uktā bhavanti
26.9.13	dvādaśādityā iti
26.9.14	māsā evaita uktā bhavanti
26.9.15	pañca gṛhyante navanava gṛhyante pañcadhā vigṛhyante
26.9.16	navanavāṃśavo bhavanti
26.9.17	atha ya eva daśamo mantra eteṣām evaiṣo 'bhigrahaṇārtho dṛṣṭo bhavati
26.9.18	tāṃ dugdhvā brāhmaṇāya dadyād yasyānnaṃ nādyād iti
26.9.19	bhaikṣāya pratyavasthitāyaivaiṣā dātavyā bhavati
26.9.20	kiṃdevatyā u khalv atiriktasomā bhavantīti
26.9.21	yaṃyaṃ graham abhyatiricyeraṃs tattaddevatyā eva syur ity etad ekam
26.9.22	athāparam
26.9.23	vijñāyata u khalv eṣāṃ brāhmaṇam atha kasmād aindro yajña ā saṃsthātor ity etasmād aindrāvaiṣṇavā eva bhavanti
26.9.24	tena śītībhavatā ṣaḍahasaṃsthāṃ kāṅkṣeyur iti
26.9.25	ṣaḍahabrāhmaṇam evaitad bhavati
26.9.26	atha ced ahaḥsaṃyoga evam āpadyeta yathāpi nava madhyamāni sāṃvatsarikāṇy ahāni saṃnigaccheyus tadānīm evainaṃ śītīkṛtvā saṃcinuyuḥ
26.9.27	atha ced udayanīye 'tirātra etad eva

26.10.1	āśvinaṃ prāg āśvinam iti
26.10.2	kiyan nu khalv āśvinaṃ bhavatīti
26.10.3	dviyojanaṃ vā yāvad vāśvo 'hnā gacchet

26.10.5	āgnikasya prakramasya caturaśrakṛtasyākṣṇayāmānam ādadīta

26.10.7	tena vediṃ vimimīta
26.10.8	api vā viṃśatyāś ca rathākṣāṇām ekaviṃśatyāś ca padānām aṣṭāṅgulasya ca caturviṃśaṃ bhāgam ādadīta

26.10.18	yo 'sya pitur anujāyāḥ putraḥ sa purastān nayaty atha yo 'sya mātur anvādheyāyai putraḥ so 'paraḥ
26.10.19	jaratpūrvayā savyaṃ jānu veṣṭayitveti

26.10.21	śataṃ vai talpyā rājaputrā iti
26.10.22	pratihitā evaita uktā bhavanti
26.10.23	śataṃ rājāna ugrā iti
26.10.24	rājanyā evaite nābhiṣecyā bhavanti

26.10.29	etad atraikāhikaṃ karma jānīyāt
26.10.30	uttarataś ca devayajanād udavasyec cāturmāsikānāṃ paśūnām evaṃ vāyavyāya paśava evaṃ tūparāya
26.10.31	saptāhāny etayeṣṭyā yajata iti

26.10.37	pautudravāv abhito bhavataḥ puṇyasya gandhasyāvaruddhyā iti

26.11.1	ekasmai svāhā dvābhyāṃ svāheti
26.11.2	katham u khalv etān anuvākāñ juhuyād iti
26.11.3	yathāprakṛtyas tathānantarāyaṃ hotavyāḥ
26.11.4	caturviṃśatiṃ raśanā ādāya yūpān abhyāyanti catasraścatasra itare parikarmiṇa iti
26.11.5	katham etāsu niyuñjyād iti
26.11.6	aśvas tūparo gomṛga iti te trayaḥ samānaraśanāḥ
26.11.7	rarāṭyeṣu tisraḥ
26.11.8	paryaṅgyeṣu pañca
26.11.9	agnaye 'nīkavate rohitāñjir anaḍvān ity eteṣv aṣṭau

26.11.12	mukhyasyaivaiṣāṃ caturthī bhavati

26.11.15	dvicatvāriṃśatam eṣāṃ śāsā bhavanty aśve 'tra dvau samāsaṃ gacchataḥ
26.11.16	athetareṣāṃ pratipaśu saṃpadyanta indrāgnibhyām ojodābhyām uṣṭārāv iti
26.11.17	prāsaṅgyāv evaitāv uktau bhavataḥ
26.11.18	athaitasmiñ chalmaliśarca āśupiṣṭāni saṃyutyeti
26.11.19	āśukānām evaitāni vrīhīṇāṃ piṣṭāni śalmaliśleṣmaṇā saṃyutāni bhavanti

26.11.22	catvāry evaitāni pradānāni bhavanti
26.11.23	iluvardāya svāhā balivardāya svāheti
26.11.24	sūryācandramasāv evaitāv uktau bhavataḥ
26.11.25	athāpy udāharanti saṃvatsaro vā iluvardaḥ parivatsaro balivarda iti
26.11.26	tasya mūrdhni juhoti jumbakāya svāheti
26.11.27	kiṃdevatyā u khalv iyam āhutir bhavatīti

26.11.29	kikidīvir vidīgaya iti
26.11.30	vididihīvikīdīha kikidīvir bhavati
26.11.31	pṛṣata u pataṃgo vidīgayaḥ
26.11.32	athaitān paśūn upākaroty āgneyam aindrāgnam āśvinam iti
26.11.33	yamā evaite chāgāḥ samānayonayo bhavanti
26.11.34	teṣām uktaṃ caraṇaṃ yathaikādaśinānāṃ paśūnām

26.11.36	ṛtudevatā ity etad ekam
26.11.37	athāparam
26.11.38	āgneyāḥ prathamā aindrā dvitīyā vaiśvadevās tṛtīyā maitrāvaruṇāś caturthā bārhaspatyāḥ pañcamāḥ sāvitrāḥ ṣaṣṭhāḥ saṃvatsarāya nivakṣasa iti prājāpatyāḥ
26.12.1	athāyaṃ dvādaśāha ubhayavidho bhavaty ahīno vā sattraṃ vā
26.12.2	sa yady u haiko dīkṣate 'hīno bhavati
26.12.3	atha yadi bahavaḥ sattram
26.12.4	yadi caivāhīno yadi ca sattram ubhayathaivobhayato'tirātro bhavati
26.12.5	anyatarato 'tirātrā hy ahīnā bhavanty ubhayato'tirātrāṇi sattrāṇi
26.12.6	ādeśād evobhayato'tirātro 'hīno bhavaty ādeśāt tu sattram anatirātraṃ yathaitad agniṣṭomāyanaṃ sārasvatam ayanaṃ viśvasṛjāmayanam iti
26.12.7	katham u khalv eṣāṃ saṃnivāpaḥ syād iti
26.12.8	sāvitrebhyaḥ prathamaṃ saṃnivaperan
26.12.9	hutvā sāvitrāṇi visamārohyāgnihotrāṇi juhuyuḥ
26.12.10	atha vāyavyāya paśave saṃnivaperan
26.12.11	vāyavyeneṣṭvā visamārohyaivāgnihotrāṇi juhuyuḥ
26.12.12	atha yadi dīkṣaṇīyāyai saṃnivaperaṃs teṣāṃ tat saṃnyuptāny eva syur vyudavasānīyāt
26.12.13	vyudavasāyaiva prativeśā yajñapucchāni kurvīran
26.12.14	katham u khalu saṃdīkṣitā viṣṇukramān kramerann iti
26.12.15	mahāpāśābhiparītā vā krameran
26.12.16	api vā pāśān abhisaṃdhitvābhikramaḥ syād athāha kramasvāthāha kramasveti
26.12.17	atigurus tathā kalpaḥ syāt
26.12.18	yatho etat sūtraṃ bhavati ṣaṣṭhyām upasady uttaravediṃ saṃnivapanty api vaikādaśyām iti
26.12.19	anagnicaya evaitad upapadyate na sāgnicaye
26.12.20	katham u khalv eṣām ahīnasaṃtatir bhavatīti
26.12.21	vasatīvarīṇām abhigrahaṇenādhvaryuḥ saṃtanotīdhmābarhiṣor upakalpanena ca payasāṃ viśāsanena ca vāco yamyena brahmātipraiṣeṇa hotā punarabhyāsena ca subrahmaṇyayodgātā yajñasya punarālambhena yajamānaḥ
26.12.22	pracaranta evaitad dhruvājyaṃ samādadate
26.12.23	athemāni savanāni barhīṃṣi saṃcinuyuḥ
26.12.24	teṣāṃ mahārātra utthāyāgnīdhra ājyāni gṛhṇanto jvalayerann iti
26.13.1	katham u khalu divā prātaranuvākasyāhna upakramo bhavatīti
26.13.2	tat patnīsaṃyājāntaṃ vā hṛdayaśūlāntaṃ vāhaḥ kṛtvā samupanahya rājānaṃ kāle vasatīvarīr abhigṛhyāhīnasaṃtatiṃ kṛtvā grāvovāyavyaṃ saṃprakṣālya droṇakalaśe daśāpavitre samavadhāyāgnīdhraṃ drutvā samiddhārā yanti
26.13.3	āhṛtya samidha āhavanīya upasādayanti
26.13.4	parihṛtāsu vasatīvarīṣv āhūtāyāṃ subrahmaṇyāyāṃ saveśanīyāḥ samidho 'bhyādhāyedhmābarhiḥ saṃnahya payāṃsi viśiṣyāgnidhraṃ drutvāgnīdhre saṃveśanarūpāṇi kṛtvā prātaḥkarmaṇā pratipadyate
26.13.5	prasiddhena mahārātrikeṇa
26.13.6	siddham ata ūrdhvam
26.13.7	upastambhanaṃ vā etad yajñasya yad atigrāhyāś cakre pṛṣṭhānīti
26.13.8	trivṛc caikaviṃśaś ca cakre āgneya upastambhanam
26.13.9	pañcadaśaś ca triṇavaś ca cakre aindra upastambhanaṃ saptadaśaś ca trayastriṃśaś ca cakre saurya upastambhanam
26.13.10	yatho etad baudhāyanasya kalpaṃ vedayante nirmanthyo mantravān bhavatīti
26.13.11	ādhvaryavā evātra mantrā āvartante nāgnimanthanīyāḥ
26.13.12	svayam ṛtuyājam evaitad ahar bhavati naitad ahar anyonyasyartuyājaṃ yajatīti
26.14.1	āśrāvyādhvaryur anyasmai grahaṃ pradāyaitenaiva yathetam etya jaghanena havirdhāne upaviśyartusaṃpraiṣam uktvopotthāya hutvā vyavanīya pradakṣiṇam āvṛtya yatrāyākṣīt tat prāṅāsīno hotṛbhakṣaṃ bhakṣayet pratyaṅṅāsīno 'dhvaryubhakṣam
26.14.2	pārucchepīr hotā śaṃsati vālakhilyā maitrāvaruṇo viharati vṛṣākapiṃ brāhmaṇācchaṃsī śaṃsaty evayāmarutam acchāvākaḥ
26.14.3	kiṃkarmā tarhy adhvaryur bhavatīti pratyāgṛṇātīty eva brūyāt
26.14.4	yā etā adhvaryur anuṣṭubha uddhṛtyāharati tāś catasro gāyatryas tās tisro 'nuṣṭubhaḥ
26.14.5	soma rājann ehy avarohety etasyai gāyatryai padamātreṇa rājānam upāvaharet
26.14.6	katham u khalu daśamam ahar bhaktyā sarvacaturviṃśaṃ ca bhavati triṣṭomaṃ cānyatra tūṣṇīṃstomād iti
26.14.7	caturviṃśo bahiṣpavamānaḥ pañcadaśaṃ brahmasāma trayastriṃśam agniṣṭomasāma
26.14.8	tāsām u ha navāgacchanti
26.14.9	tāś caturviṃśatiḥ saṃpadyante
26.14.10	etad evāpi daśamam ahar bhaktyā sarvacaturviṃśaṃ ca bhavati triṣṭomaṃ cānyatra tūṣṇīṃstomād iti
26.14.11	upasṛjan mātre vatsaṃ dhārayan dharuṇo dhayann iti
26.14.12	kiṃdevatyā u khalv iyam āhutir bhavatīti
26.14.13	prājāpatyety eva brūyād iti
26.15.1	athemaṃ dvādaśāhaṃ grahāgrair eva prativyūhāmaḥ
26.15.2	athemaṃ tasya navāhāni prativyūhaṃ gacchanti yāny anyāni prāyaṇīyodayanīyābhyāṃ daśamāc cāhnaḥ
26.15.3	atha chandomāḥ
26.15.4	tat ṣaḍ eva
26.15.5	svasthāno hi prathamas trirātraḥ
26.15.6	gāyatrīprātaḥsavane prathame trirātre 'ṣṭau kṛtvo 'gre prathamam upāṃśv abhiṣavam abhiṣuṇuyāt
26.15.7	ekādaśa kṛtvo dvitīyam
26.15.8	dvādaśa kṛtvas tṛtīyam
26.15.9	mahāṃ indro nṛvad ā carṣaṇiprā ity etayā triṣṭubhā māhendraṃ gṛhṇīyāt
26.15.10	adabdhebhiḥ savitaḥ pāyubhiṣ ṭvam ity etayā jagatyā sāvitram
26.15.11	aṣṭākapālān prātaḥsavanīyān kuryāt
26.15.12	ekādaśakapālān mādhyaṃdinīyān
26.15.13	dvādaśakapālāṃs tṛtīyasavanīyān
26.15.14	vasumadgaṇena gāyatracchandasā prātaḥsavanīyān bhakṣayet
26.15.15	rudravadgaṇena triṣṭupchandasā mādhyaṃdinīyān
26.15.16	ādityavadgaṇena jagatīcchandasā tṛtīyasavanīyān iti
26.15.17	atha jagatīprātaḥsavane dvitīye trirātre dvādaśa kṛtvo 'gre prathamam upāṃśv abhiṣavam abhiṣuṇyāt
26.15.18	aṣṭau kṛtvo dvitīyam
26.15.19	ekādaśa kṛtvas tṛtīyam
26.15.20	mahāṃ indro ya ojasety etayā gāyatryā māhendraṃ grahaṃ gṛhṇīyāt
26.15.21	vāmam adya savitar ity etayā triṣṭubhā sāvitram
26.15.22	dvādaśakapālān prātaḥsavanīyān kuryāt
26.15.23	aṣṭākapālān mādhyaṃdinīyān
26.15.24	ekādaśakapālāṃs tṛtīyasavanīyān
26.15.25	ādityavadgaṇena jagatīcchandasā prātaḥsavanīyān bhakṣayet
26.15.26	vasumadgaṇena gāyatracchandasā mādhyaṃdinīyān
26.15.27	rudravadgaṇena triṣṭupchandasā tṛtīyasavanīyān iti
26.15.28	atha triṣṭupprātaḥsavane tṛtīye trirātra ekādaśa kṛtvo 'gre prathamam upāṃśv abhiṣavam abhiṣuṇuyāt
26.15.29	dvādaśa kṛtvo dvitīyam aṣṭau kṛtvas tṛtīyam
26.15.30	mahāṃ indro ya ojasety etāṃ gāyatrīṃ trir abhyāvartayed anupayāmām
26.15.31	sā jagatī saṃpadyate
26.15.32	tayā māhendraṃ gṛhṇīyāt
26.15.33	hiraṇyapāṇim ūtaya ity etayā gāyatryā sāvitram
26.15.34	ekādaśakapālān prātaḥsavanīyān kuryāt
26.15.35	dvādaśakapālān mādhyaṃdinīyān
26.15.36	aṣṭākapālāṃs tṛtīyasavanīyān
26.15.37	rudravadgaṇena triṣṭupchandasā prātaḥsavanīyān bhakṣayet
26.15.38	ādityavadgaṇena jagatīcchandasā mādhyaṃdinīyān
26.15.39	vasumadgaṇena gāyatracchandasā tṛtīyasavanīyān iti
26.16.1	athāyaṃ vaiṣuvato labheta māsagaṇānām ity eka āhuḥ saptadaśa dīkṣā dvādaśopasado vaiṣuvataṃ triṃśattamam
26.16.2	katham u khalu goāyubhyāṃ stomā bhavantīti
26.16.3	gor nu khalu pañcadaśo bahiṣpavamānastivṛntyājyāni sarvasaptadaśaṃ mādhyaṃdinaṃ savanaṃ sarvaikaviṃśaṃ tṛtīyasvanaṃ sokthyam
26.16.4	athāyos trivṛd bahiṣpavamānaḥ pañcadaśāny ājyāni sarvasaptadaśaṃ mādhyaṃdinaṃ savanaṃ sarvaikaviṃśaṃ tṛtīyasavanaṃ sokthyam
26.16.5	athemau viśvajidabhijitāv agniṣṭomau sattragatau bhavataḥ
26.16.6	ke nu khalv etayo stomā bhavantīti
26.16.7	abhijin nu khalu tryudayaś caturāvṛttaḥ
26.16.8	atha viśvajic caturudayas tryāvṛttaḥ
26.16.9	katham u khalv ekaviṃśatigarbho bhavatīti
26.16.10	abhijitam upetya pṛṣṭhyaṃ ṣaḍaham upeyuḥ
26.16.11	atha trīn paraḥsāmno 'tha vaiṣuvatam atha trīn pratyaksāmno 'thāvṛttaṃ pṛṣṭhyaṃ ṣaḍaham atha viśvajitam
26.16.12	katham u khalu goāyuṣī vihṛte jānīyād iti
26.16.13	purastād abhijito gām upeyāt svasthāna evāyur bhavatīti
26.16.14	kiyanto nu khalu gavāmayane 'gniṣṭomā bhavantīti
26.16.15	jyotir agniṣṭomas trivṛd agniṣṭomo viśvajidabhijitāv agniṣṭomau vaiṣuvataṃ daśamam ahar mahāvratam iti sapteti ha vā idaṃ gavāmayanaṃ prajñātastomaṃ bruvate
26.16.16	tasya hottaraṃ pakṣa āvṛttaṃ bhavati yad anyad goāyubhyāṃ ca daśarātrāc ca
26.16.17	tryanīkān atrāvṛttān grahān gṛhṇīyāt
26.17.1	athemā dvātriṃśatam ekādaśinyo gavāmayane
26.17.2	teṣāṃ pūrvasmin pakṣasi ṣoḍaśa niṣṭhīyante saptadaśa ekādaśinyai bārhaspatyo vaiṣuvate savanīyaḥ saṃpadyate
26.17.3	tasya navāhāny apaśukāny atiricyanta iti
26.17.4	katamāni khalv imāny ahāni bhavantīti
26.17.5	pṛṣṭhyasya ṣaḍahasyottarāṇi trīṇi trayaś chandomā daśamam ahar mahāvratam udayanīyo 'tirātra iti
26.17.6	abhiplavāś cākṣīyanti ca tad aṅgirasāmayanam iti
26.17.7	pṛṣṭhyānām atra sthāne 'bhiplavān eva dadhāti
26.17.8	pṛṣṭhyāś cākṣīyanti ca tad ādityānāmayanam iti
26.17.9	abhiplavānām atra sthāne pṛṣṭhyān eva dadhāti
26.17.10	agniṣṭomāś cākṣīyanti ca tat prajāpaterayanam iti
26.17.11	ubhayeṣām atra pṛṣṭhyābhiplavānāṃ sthāne 'gniṣṭomān eva dadhāti
26.17.12	āghāṭībhiḥ piñcholābhiḥ karkarīkābhir iti
26.17.13	āghāṭyo 'ha koloṣṭhā bhavanti
26.17.14	piñcholā u ha vīṇākāṇabhraśāḥ
26.17.15	vīṇā u karkarīkāḥ
26.17.16	taṃ kāla eva śastryātṛṇattīti
26.17.17	ātṛndyād ity evedam uktaṃ bhavati
26.18.1	atha vai bhavati
26.18.2	brahmavādino vadanti sa tvai yajeta yo 'gniṣṭomena yajamāno 'tha sarvastomena yajeteti
26.18.3	catvāri pañcadaśāny ājyāni
26.18.4	tau dvau triṃśadvargau
26.18.5	tayor itarasmiṃs triṃśadvarge tisra upāsyati
26.18.6	tau dvau triṇavatrayastriṃśau
26.18.7	gāyatraṃ pūrve 'han sāma bhavati traiṣṭubham uttara iti hotur ājyam etāni saṃpādayed evam evottare 'hni hotur evājye
26.18.8	athāsyaiṣā sahasratamy anyataenī kaṇḍūkṛtopak.lptā bhavatīti
26.18.9	saṃsevitety evedam uktaṃ bhavati
26.18.10	kasminn u khalu kāle lakṣmaṇāṃ paṣṭhauhīṃ vārtraghnīṃ dadyād iti

26.18.12	katham u khalu gargatrirātreṇartumukheṣu vihṛtena yajeteti
26.18.13	āṣāḍhe vā śrāvaṇe vā pakṣe 'gniṣṭomena vā yajeta
26.18.14	tat patnīsaṃyājāntaṃ vā hṛdayaśūlāntaṃ vāhaḥ kṛtvā samupanahya rājānaṃ kāle vasatīvarīr abhigṛhyāhīnasaṃtatiṃ kṛtvā grāvovāyavyaṃ saṃprakṣālya droṇakalaśe daśāpavitre samavadhāyāgnīdhraṃ drutvā samiddhārā yanti
26.18.15	āhṛtya samidha āhavanīya upasādayanti
26.18.16	parihṛtāsu vasatīvarīṣv āhūtāyāṃ saubrahmaṇyāyāṃ saṃveśanīyāḥ samidho 'bhyādhāyedhmābarhiḥ saṃnahyāviśiṣya payāṃsy upavasanti
26.18.17	atha śvo bhūte savaneṣṭyā yajeta
26.18.18	tata stambayajur harati
26.18.19	sa evam evāharahar vasatīvarīḥ pariharamāṇaś caturo māsaḥ savaneṣṭhyā yajate
26.18.20	nāgnihotraṃ juhoti na darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ yajate
26.18.21	atha caturṣu māseṣu paryaveteṣu parihṛtāsu vasatīvarīṣv āhūtāyāṃ subrahmaṇyāyām aharahaḥ saṃveśanīyāḥ samidho 'bhyādhāyedhmābarhiḥ saṃnahya payāṃsi viśiṣyopavasanti
26.19.1	atha śvo bhūta ukthyena yajate
26.19.2	tat tathaiva patnīsaṃyājāntaṃ vā hṛdayaśūlāntaṃ vāhaḥ kṛtvā samupanahya rājānaṃ kāle vasatīvarīr abhigṛhyāhīnasaṃtatiṃ kṛtvā grāvovāyavyaṃ saṃprakṣālya droṇakalaśe daśāpavitre samavadhāyāgnīdhraṃ drutvā samiddhārā yanti
26.19.3	āhṛtya samidha āhavanīya upasādayanti
26.19.4	parihṛtāsu vastīvarīṣv āhūtāyāṃ subrahmaṇyāyāṃ saṃveśanīyāḥ samidho 'bhyādhāyedhmābarhiḥ saṃnahyāviśiṣya payāṃsy upavasanti
26.19.5	atha śvo bhūte savaneṣṭyā yajate
26.19.6	tatra tathaiva na stambayajur harati
26.19.7	sa evam evāharahar vasīvarīḥ pariharamāṇo 'parāṃś caturo māsaḥ savaneṣṭyā yajate
26.19.8	naivāgnihotraṃ juhoti na darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ yajate
26.19.9	atha caturṣu māseṣu paryaveteṣu parihṛtāsu vasatīvarīṣv āhūtāyāṃ subrahmaṇyāyām aharahaḥ saṃveśanīyāḥ samidho 'bhyādhāyedhmābarhiḥ saṃnahya payāṃsi viśiṣyopavasanti
26.19.10	atha śvo bhūte 'tirātreṇa yajate sayajñapucchena
26.19.11	athaitāṃ sahasratamīṃ prācīṃ vodīcīṃ vāvartayaṃs tayā vihāraṃ cātmānaṃ ca na vyaveyād iti
26.20.1	kiṃdakṣiṇā u khalv ahīnā bhavantīti
26.20.2	ahargaṇo'hargaṇaḥ sahasradakṣiṇaḥ syād ity etad ekam
26.20.3	ekaikam ahaḥ sahasradakṣiṇaṃ syād ity etad ekam
26.20.4	dvādaśaśatadakṣiṇaṃ syād ity etad ekam
26.20.5	yathāśraddhadakṣiṇaṃ syād ity etad aparam ādeśād eva
26.20.6	etasminn atirātre sahasram anuvihitaṃ dadāti
26.20.7	dvirātraprabhṛtayo 'hīnā bhavanty aikādaśarātrāt
26.20.8	athemāny ahīnābhiparītāni sattrāṇi bhavanti yathaitat saṃvatsaragarbha ekādaśarātraḥ
26.20.9	ubhayavidho hi bharatadvādaśāhaḥ
26.20.10	dvādaśāgniṣṭomā rathaṃtarasāmānaḥ
26.20.11	sa ha bharatadvādaśāhaḥ
26.20.12	athodyatstomeṣu trivṛt prathamam ahaḥ syāt pañcadaśaṃ dvitīyaṃ saptadaśaṃ tṛtīyam ekaviṃśaṃ caturtham itīn nv ekam
26.20.13	athāparas trivṛt prathamasyāhnaḥ prātaḥsavanaṃ pañcadaśaṃ mādhyaṃdinaṃ savanaṃ saptadaśaṃ tṛtīyasavanam
26.20.14	atha dvitīyasyāhnaḥ pañcadaśaṃ prātaḥsavanaṃ saptadaśaṃ mādhyaṃdinaṃ savanam ekaviṃśaṃ tṛtīyasavanam
26.20.15	atha tṛtīyasyāhnaḥ saptadaśaṃ prātaḥsavanam ekaviṃśaṃ mādhyaṃdinaṃ savanaṃ triṇavaṃ tṛtīyasavanam
26.20.16	atha caturthasyāhna ekaviṃśaṃ prātaḥsavanaṃ triṇavaṃ mādhyaṃdinaṃ savanaṃ trayastriṃśaṃ tṛtīyasavanam
26.21.1	athema aupasadāḥ puroḍāśāḥ śūrpādānaprabhṛtaya āpyāntāḥ
26.21.2	sruvāhutyā cainān saha sakṛj juhuyād aupamanyavīyena kalpenāgneyān ekakapālān
26.21.3	anusarasvati prāñco yāntīti
26.21.4	āhavanīyasakāśāc chamyāṃ prāsyet
26.21.5	sā yatra nipatet tad gārhapatyasyāyatanaṃ syāt prācīnaṃ tata āhavanīyaḥ
26.21.6	atha yady aparyāṇā apa upādhigaccheyur aponaptrīyaṃ caruṃ tṛtīyasavanīyānām anunirvāpyaṃ kuryuḥ
26.21.7	athopottaredyuḥ samāpya tv eva śamyāṃ prāsyet
26.21.8	tryahā bhavanti pañcāhā bhavantīti
26.21.9	abhiplavānām evaite 'pacchedā bhavanti
26.21.10	aṣṭame 'hni vājapeya iti

26.22.1	athāyam atirātra ubhayavidho bhavaty ahīno vaikāho vā
26.22.2	api tu khalv asyāhīnasyaiva rūpam
26.22.3	dvādaśopasado 'nekam ahar abhividhatte
26.22.4	athaikāhasyaiva rūpam
26.22.5	sakṛd vasatīvarīr gṛhṇāti sakṛt paśūn upākaroti
26.22.6	ekaṃ kratukaraṇam
26.22.7	samayāviṣite sūrye hiraṇyena ṣoḍaśina stomam upākarotīti
26.22.8	ardhāstamita ity evedam uktaṃ bhavati
26.22.9	tasya ced anupākṛta ādityo 'bhyastamiyād gārhapatye tisraḥ sruvāhutīr juhuyād bhūr bhuvaḥ suvar iti
26.22.10	atha yasyokthye 'tiricyetātirātraṃ kurvīteti
26.22.11	atikrāntāḥ khalv asya dīkṣopasado 'tikrāntaṃ kratukaraṇam atikrāntaṃ ṣoḍaśino grahaṇam
26.22.12	atha tadānīm eva ṣoḍaśipātram upakalpya tisṛbhir ṛgbhir gṛhṇīyāt
26.22.13	athaitena purastād rātriparyāyebhyaś caret
26.22.14	tatraivam eva saṃpraiṣaḥ pratiprasthātar āgrayaṇatṛtīyaṃ gudatṛtīyāni jāghanīḥ pṛṣadājyaṃ gopāyāgnīd āśvinaṃ te dvikapālaṃ śṛtam apy apararātre 'stv iti
26.22.15	kasminn u khalu kāla āśvino dvikapālo nirupyata iti
26.22.16	tārtīyasavanikair vā puroḍāśaiḥ sahāpi vā purastād uttamasya rātriparyāyasya
26.22.17	trivṛd vai stomānām avamas trivṛt parama ity atirātrabrāhmaṇam evaitad bhavati
26.22.18	atheyaṃ sautrāmaṇikī surā pādakiṇvā vā bhavaty api vā pañcikā
26.22.19	śaṣpāṇi ca tokmāṇi ceti
26.22.20	yavānām u ha śaṣpāṇi bhavanti vrīhīṇām u ha tokmāṇi māṣās tu nagnahuḥ
26.22.21	athāyaṃ kārotaro dārumayo vā vaidalo vā mṛnmayo vā carmaṇā tv evābhividi syāt
26.22.22	ayaṃ sutāsutīti
26.22.23	sutam u hāsyāmutra bhavaty āsutam u hāsyeha bhavati

26.23.1	athāsyām ekādaśinyāṃ yūpāhutis tantraṃ yāgnau hūyate
26.23.2	athāvraścanajā saṃcāriṇī
26.23.3	saṃsparśakaṃ karma tad bhavati
26.23.4	agniṣṭhāṃ prathamasyāśriṃ sakṛd āhanyād dvir dvitīyasya tris tṛtīyasyaivam evetareṣām anupūrvaṃ chedanajñāyāya ca
26.23.5	atha vedivimānam
26.23.6	daśānāṃ ca rathākṣāṇām ekādaśānāṃ ca padānām aṣṭāṅgulasya ca caturviṃśaṃ bhāgam ādadīta
26.23.7	sa prakramaḥ syāt
26.23.8	tena vediṃ vimimīta
26.23.9	athemāv upasthāvānau caturaṅgulamātreṇa vikṛṣṭatamau syātām
26.23.10	athetare rathākṣāntarālā eva syur iti
26.23.11	atha vai bhavati
26.23.12	uparasaṃmitāṃ minuyāt pitṛlokakāmasyeti
26.23.13	yāvaty agniṣṭhasyopara tāvanmātrā itare bhavanti
26.23.14	caṣālasaṃmitām indriyakāmasyeti yāvad agniṣṭhasya raśanā tāvanmātrā itare bhavanti
26.23.15	sarvān samān pratiṣṭhākāmasyeti sarvān samān pratiṣṭhākāmasya karoti
26.23.16	ye trayo madhyamās tān samān paśukāmasyeti tān samān paśukāmasya karoti
26.23.17	vyatiṣajed itarān iti sa evam eva dakṣiṇam uttaram ity aṣṭau yūpān vyatiṣajati
26.23.18	atha vai bhavati
26.23.19	yaṃ kāmayeta pramāyukaḥ syād iti gartamitaṃ tasya minuyād uttarārdhyaṃ varṣiṣṭham atha hrasīyāṃsam ity uttarārdhyam atra varṣiṣṭhaṃ minoti dakṣiṇārdhyaṃ hrasīyāṃsam
26.23.20	eṣā vai gartamid yasyaivaṃ minoti tājak pramīyata iti brāhmaṇam

26.24.1	aṅguṣṭhaparvamātreṇāṅguṣṭhaparvamātreṇottaramuttaraṃ yūpaṃ hrasīyāṃsaṃ minuyāt
26.24.2	api vā yūpāvaṭānām evaitā mātrā atikhanet
26.24.3	api vopaśayam evopanidadhate
26.24.4	tābhir mātrābhir abhisaṃpādayet
26.24.5	katham u khalu yūpāvaṭāṃś ca parilikhato yūpāṃś cocchrayataḥ paśūṃś copākurvataḥ saṃcarī syād iti
26.24.6	antareṇāgniṣṭhaṃ copasthāvānaṃ copātītya jaghanenottaravediṃ parikramyāntareṇāgniṣṭhaṃ caivopasthāvānaṃ copātītyaikaikaṃ parilikhed vocchrayed vopākuryād vā
26.24.7	api vā yaṃyaṃ parilikhed vocchrayed vopākuryād vā taṃtaṃ na vyaveyād dakṣiṇena dakṣiṇam uttareṇottaram
26.24.8	api vā sarvān evāgreṇa yūpān parītyaikaikaṃ parilikhed vocchrayed vopākuryād vā
26.24.9	vyatiṣaṅgaṃ tena pūrvāḥ saṃpadyante
26.24.10	evaṃ vyatiṣaktānām evaiteṣāṃ paśūnāṃ pañca dakṣiṇārdhyān paśūn upakramyaiva sthāpayeyuḥ
26.24.11	vāruṇaṃ prathamam atyānayeyur athānupūrvam itarān
26.24.12	antareṇa cātvālotkarāv udaṅṅ upaniṣkramya prasthān vā nihanyur api vā maṇḍalīkṛtān
26.24.13	teṣāṃ vapā utkhidyāhareyur yathā vapābhir vihāraṃ cātmānaṃ ca na vyaveyuḥ
26.24.14	athāyaṃ pātnīvato 'ṅguṣṭhaparvamātreṇottarārdhyād yūpād dhrasīyān syād api vā yathābrāhmaṇam avāṅnābhim acaṣālam anavastīrṇam
26.24.15	athedaṃ sarpāṇāmayanaṃ stomato vikṛtaṃ bhavati
26.24.16	athedaṃ viśvasṛjāmayanaṃ katham idānīntaneṣu syād iti
26.24.17	śataṃ dīkṣāḥ śatam upasadaḥ sahasraṃ prasutaḥ
26.25.1	athedaṃ kuṇḍapāyināmayanam agnihotrapūrvam eke bruvate somapūrvam upayanti
26.25.2	tat patnīsaṃyājāntaṃ vā hṛdayaśūlāntaṃ vāhaḥ kṛtvā samupanahya rājānaṃ kāle vasatīvarīr abhigṛhyāhīnasaṃtatiṃ kṛtvā grāvovāyavyaṃ saṃprakṣālya droṇakalaśe daśāpavitre samavadhāyāgnīdhraṃ drutvā samiddhārā yanti
26.25.3	āhṛtya samidha āhavanīya upasādayanti
26.25.4	parihṛtāsu vasatīvarīṣv āhūtāyāṃ subrahmaṇyāyāṃ saṃveśanīyāḥ samidho 'bhyādhāyedhmābarhiḥ saṃnahyāviśiṣya payāṃsy upavasanti
26.25.5	atha śvo bhūta āmāvāsyena haviṣā yajate
26.25.6	tatra na stambayajur harati
26.25.7	ta evam evāharahar vasatīvarīḥ pariharamāṇā aṣṭāviṃśatim ahāny āmāvāsyena haviṣā yajante
26.25.8	nāgnihotrāṇi juhvati na paurṇamāsīṃ yajante
26.25.9	sa yatra tṛtīyasavane dhiṣṇiyān viharati tad ajasraṃ mārjālīyaṃ karoti
26.25.10	samāsanneṣu haviḥṣu gārhapatye karambhapātrāṇy abhi paryagni kṛtvā tair mārjālīye pracarati
26.25.11	gārhapatya eva piṇḍapitṛyajñaṃ śrapayitvā tena mārjālīya eva pracarati
26.25.12	pratipūruṣam uvevaiṣāṃ pravarān pravṛṇīte
26.25.13	ekaikasyaivaiṣāṃ trayastrayaḥ piṇḍāḥ
26.25.14	te pñcadaśa
26.25.15	mahāpitṛyajñe stīrṇaṃ barhir bhavati na vedim ālikhati na stambayajur harati nājyāni gṛhṇīte
26.25.16	sa yatra tṛtīyasavane dhiṣṇiyān viharati tad ajasraṃ mārjālīyaṃ karoti
26.25.17	samāsanneṣu haviḥṣu gārhapatye mahāpitṛyajñahavīṃṣi śrapayitvā tair mārjālīye pracaret
26.25.18	āhavanīye mārutyā pracaret

26.25.20	vitṛtīyā vedir bhavati prakramāṇām u ha tṛtīyaṃ navamas tu bhūmer bhāgo bhavatīti
26.26.1	atha pañcahaviṣam iṣṭim iṣṭvānvahaṃ punarāvṛttam ekaikena haviṣā yajeta
26.26.2	ekaṃ ced dve vā haviṣī paryavete syātām atha saṃvatsaraḥ samāpyeta kathaṃ tatra kuryād iti
26.26.3	pratikṛṣyaitasya pakṣasya pañcahaviṣam iṣṭiṃ nirvapet
26.26.4	atha saṃvatsaratame 'hni pañcahaviḥ syād iti
26.26.5	prathame dvādaśāhe 'gniṃ cinvīteti
26.26.6	prathame dvādaśāhe 'gniṃ cinvānaś caturahaṃ prathamayopasadā gacchec caturahaṃ madhyamayāṣṭāhonaṃ saṃvatsaram uttamayā
26.26.7	athetarāṃś caturahonāṃś caturahonān ekaikayā caturaścaturo māsān pratyādadīta
26.26.8	caturahaṃ prathamayopasadā gacchec caturahaṃ madhyamayā caturaham uttamayā
26.26.9	api vā caturaścatura eva māsān ekaikayopasadā gacched iti
26.26.10	uttame dvādaśāhe 'gniṃ cinvīteti
26.26.11	uttame dvādaśāhe 'gniṃ cinvāno 'ṣṭāhonaṃ saṃvatsaraṃ prathamayopasadā gacchec caturahaṃ madhyamayā caturaham uttamayā
26.26.12	athetarāṃś caturahonān ekaikayā caturaś caturahonān māsān pratyādadīta
26.26.13	caturahaṃ prathamayopasadā gacchec caturahaṃ madhyamayā caturaham uttamayā
