26.27.1	atha lokaṃpṛṇā iṣṭakā upadadhan māsam etīti
26.27.2	lokaṃpṛṇā iṣṭakā upadadhan māsaṃ gatvā triṃśattamasyām ahaḥ sarvaṃ pracchādaṃ pracchādayet
26.27.3	api vā triṃśato 'vakāśaṃ kṛtvā lokaṃpṛṇā iṣṭakā upadadhan māsam etīti
26.27.4	katham etaṃ māsaṃ gacched iti
26.27.5	iṣṭiḥ prathamātha pūrvāhṇike pravargyopasadāv atheṣṭakā athāparāhṇike pravargyopasadau māsi vasordhāreti
26.27.6	māsaṃ purīṣeṇa yantīti
26.27.7	katham etaṃ māsaṃ gacched iti
26.27.8	iṣṭiḥ prathamātha pūrvāhṇike pravargyopasadāv atha purīṣam athāparāhṇike pravargyopasadau
26.27.9	caturo māsa upasadbhir etīti
26.27.10	yad amutra māsena karoti tad iha daśarātreṇa karoti
26.27.11	caturo māsaḥ sunotīti
26.27.12	katame nu khalv ime māsā bhavantīti
26.27.13	gavāmayanasya prathamottamau ca māsau yau cābhito viṣuvataḥ saha vaiṣuvatena
26.27.14	vasatīvarīṣu mṛtpiṇḍam anvavadhāyeti
26.27.15	kimartho nu khalv ayaṃ mṛtpiṇḍo bhavatīti
26.27.16	saṃtanyartha eṣa bhavatīti
26.27.17	bhinne kumbhe 'nyasmin kumbha etaṃ mṛtpiṇḍam anvavadhāyāpa ānayet
26.27.18	tat patnīsaṃyājāntaṃ vā hṛdayaśūlāntaṃ vāhaḥ kṛtvā samupanahya rājānaṃ kāle vasatīvarīr abhigṛhyāhīnasaṃtatiṃ kṛtvā grāvovāyavyaṃ saṃprakṣālya droṇakalaśe daśāpavitre samavadhāyāgnīdhraṃ drutvā samiddhārā yanti
26.27.19	āhṛtya samidha āhavanīya upasādayanti
26.27.20	parihṛtāsu vasatīvarīṣv āhūtāyāṃ subrahmaṇyāyāṃ saṃveśanīyāḥ samidho 'bhyādhāyedhmābarhiḥ saṃnahyāviśiṣya payāṃsy upavasanti

26.32.5	athainam abhyajya pavayitvodānayatīti
26.32.6	siddham atrāgniṣṭomikaṃ karma jānīyād ottarasmād upaghātāt
26.32.7	etasmiṃś ca kāle trīṇi barhīṃṣi yajuṣā kuryād dīkṣaṇīyāyāḥ prāyaṇīyāyā ātithyāyā iti
26.32.8	atha nirvaped dīkṣaṇīyāṃ prāyaṇīyām ātithyād ājyena vartayed yāvad rathā āgaccheyuḥ sahaniruptam ājyaṃ tisṛṣu sthālīṣu vigṛhṇīyāt
26.32.9	yā dīkṣaṇīyāyai saṃsthā tayā dīkṣaṇīyāṃ saṃtiṣṭhāpayiṣet
26.32.10	praṇītābhiḥ prāyaṇīyasya pratipadyeta
26.32.11	eṣa evātithyāyā upakramo bhavatīti
26.32.12	trivatsena sāṇḍena vatsatareṇa rājānaṃ krītvohyātithyaṃ nirvapatīti
26.32.13	trihāyaṇenety evedam uktaṃ bhavati
26.32.14	katham u khalv asya mantrān abhinamayet
26.32.15	cid asi mano 'si dhīr asi dakṣiṇo 'si yajñiyo 'si kṣatriyo 'sy aditir asy ubhayataḥśirāḥ sa naḥ suprāṅ supratyaṅ saṃbhaveti
26.32.16	ekagaṇā upasado bhavantīti
26.32.17	pūrvāhṇikā evaitā uktā bhavanti
26.32.18	khalevālī yūpo bhavatīti
26.32.19	etām evaiṣāṃ methīṃ kurvanti
26.32.20	sa khalevālī yūpaḥ
26.32.21	tasyai kaṭe param iva caṣālabhājanaṃ bhavatīti
26.32.22	ākuṭṭa ity evedam uktaṃ bhavati
26.32.23	athaitān paśūn upākaroty agnīṣomīyam āgneyam anūbandhyam iti
26.32.24	yamā evaite chāgāḥ samānayonayo bhavanti
26.32.25	teṣām uktaṃ caraṇam
26.32.26	athāsyāṃ sadyaskriyām anukriyāṃ parikriyām atikriyām avabhṛthaprabhṛty astamite yajñapuccham
26.32.27	tāsāṃ prathamaiva sarathā prathamā citsasomakrayaṇī prathamāgnihotroccheṣaṇavratā
26.32.28	athāsyāṃ sadyaskriyām anukriyāṃ parikriyām atikriyāṃ tristanadvistanaikastanavratasya rūpāṇi kurvanti
26.32.29	kva u khalv ekāhe dṛṣṭaḥ saṃnivāpo bhavatīti
26.32.30	vrātyastome cendrāgnyoś ca kulāya ity eva brūyāt
26.32.31	athāsmin vrātyastome bahava ekasmai dīkṣante
26.32.32	adīkṣitā evainān yājayanti
26.32.33	daṇḍopānahaṃ śāmulājinam iti
26.32.34	śāmulakānām u ha dabhramiśrāḥ kambalā bhavanti sa ca bhavati śvetaṃ caur abhrājinam
26.33.1	sa eṣa jyeṣṭhānām agniṣṭomaḥ
26.33.2	eṣa eva san kanīyasām ukthyaḥ
26.33.3	catuṣṭomaṃ pūrvam ahar bhavati pañcastomam uttaram
26.33.4	ratho havirdhānam
26.33.5	kuryāt talparūpam uttaraṃ havirdhānam
26.33.6	utsīdeyuḥ śakaṭamantrāḥ
26.33.7	dvau trayastriṃśau madhyata stomau bhavata iti
26.33.8	pṛṣṭhyastomāv evaitāv itaś cāmutaś ca pratilomau bhavataḥ
26.33.9	athāmāvāsyāyāṃ pratisamasya cāndramasaṃ piṇḍapitṛyajñaṃ dadyāt
26.33.10	taṃ brahmaṇaḥ santaṃ paryupaviśya bhakṣayanti yad ṛtaṃ manyante tena brāhmaṇam
26.33.11	brāhmaṇo vai varṇānāṃ śreṣṭho 'gnir devānām ity etena vā bhakṣayed api vā vyāhṛtībhiḥ
26.33.12	catuṣṭoma eṣa bhavatīti caturuttarīya eṣa diśāṃ catuṣṭomo bhavati
26.33.13	athāsmin kānāndhayajñe 'vabhṛthaprabhṛty astamite yajñapuccham
26.33.14	tasya daśasu bahiṣpavamānaḥ śate sahasre 'yute niyute prayute 'rbude nyarbude samudre madhye 'nte parārdhe padve palve nityam uktvā manasaiva stuvāno manyata etāvati me stutam iti
26.33.15	atha sakṛt pravargya ekam evāgnihotram
26.33.16	athāsmiñ chunaskarṇayajñe
26.33.17	tilamiśram aśitvā matsyān khāditvā kṣāramātraṃ pibet
26.33.18	atha sāmapathe saṃviśet
26.33.19	svapnād eva svapne gacchati
26.33.20	rāśikṛtaṃ dhānyaṃ dadāti marāyakṛtaṃ dhānyaṃ dadātīti
26.33.21	mūtakṛtam ity evedam uktaṃ bhavati
26.33.22	pracaranti prāñcaḥ pratyañcaḥ pracarantīti
26.33.23	yaḥ pratyaṅ vihāro dakṣiṇataupacāra eṣa bhavati
26.33.24	etenaivāpi sarvatomukho vyākhyātaḥ
26.33.25	etena sahasraśālaḥ
26.33.26	athainam iha pavayitvāmutra pavayantīti
26.33.27	siddham atrāgniṣṭomikaṃ karma jānīyād uttarasyaiva śālāyai
26.33.28	sa dvau trirātrau kuruta ekaṃ ca dvirātram iti
26.33.29	dīkṣopasadbhir evāsyaitāny ahāny abhividhatte
26.33.30	ahīnavidho 'ti yajñaṃ dadyāt
26.33.31	tad idaṃ proktaṃ yad ak.lptaṃ sūtrataḥ
26.33.32	sāmayikaṃ tv eva kratuyogaṃ yajñe yajñam upalakṣayeteti baudhāyano yajñe yajñam upalakṣayeteti baudhāyanaḥ
27.1.1	athāto mantragaṇāmnātāni prāyaścittāni vyākhyāsyāmaḥ
27.1.2	sarvatropariṣṭān mantrakṛtaṃ yady adhastān nipated brahma pratiṣṭhā manasa ity etayā pratiṣṭhāpyaitayaiva sruvāhutiṃ juhuyāt
27.1.3	hutvā vā pratiṣṭhāpayed dhutvānantaraṃ karma kuryāt
27.1.4	evam anyeṣv api
27.1.5	atikrāntaṃ karma nādriyeta yady arthaluptaṃ bhavati
27.1.6	sarvatrāśrāvitapratyāśrāvitavaṣaṭkārāṇām atyuktānuktahīneṣv āśrāvitam atyāśrāvitam ity etayā sruvāhutiṃ juhuyāt
27.1.7	sarvatra devoccāraṇeṣu bhāginīṃ devatām anuccārayitvā yonyām uccārayed yad vo devā atipādayānīty etayā sruvāhutiṃ juhuyāt
27.1.8	sarvatra devatāvāhaneṣu bhāginīṃ devatām anāvāhayitvā yonyām āvāhayed etayaiva sruvāhutiṃ juhuyād yatra smaret tad upotthāyaināṃ manasāvāhayed athātiriktām ājyena yathoḍhāṃ yajeta
27.1.9	sarvatra praṇītānāṃ praṇīyamānānāṃ praṇītānāṃ vā yadi vipruṣo vipateyuḥ sraved vā camasa āpo hi ṣṭhā mayobhuva iti tisṛbhir adbhiḥ pūrayitvā tataṃ ma āpas tad u tāyate punar ity etayā sruvāhutiṃ juhuyāt
27.1.10	sarvatra vitate yajñakarmaṇi yadi sūryo nāvirbhavaty anyatrādeśād ud vayaṃ tamasas pary ud u tyaṃ citram ity etābhiḥ sruvāhutīr juhuyāt
27.1.11	yadi sūryācandramasor grahaṇaṃ vidyata etad eva
27.1.12	atha yadi yajamānasyartvijāṃ vā svapne retovisargaḥ syād imaṃ me varuṇa tat tvā yāmīty etābhyāṃ sruvāhutī juhuyāt
27.1.13	sarvatra havirdevatāyājyāpuro'nuvākyāhutīnāṃ hutāhutabhreṣeṣv antarite viparyāse ca tvaṃ no agne sa tvaṃ no agna ity etābhyāṃ sruvāhutī juhuyāt
27.1.14	sarvatra darvikūrcaprastaraparidhibarhirvidhṛtipavitravedopaveṣedhmadravyasaṃbhārāṇāṃ chedadāhopaghāteṣu nāśe vināśe vānyaṃ yathāliṅgaṃ kṛtvā yathāliṅgam upasādya tvam agne ayāsi prajāpata ity etābhyāṃ sruvāhutī juhuyāt
27.1.15	sarvatra vitate yajñakarmaṇi
27.2.1	yadi purā prajājebhyo bahiḥparidhy aṅgārā abhiparyāvarteran brāhmaṇoktaṃ prāyaścittaṃ kṛtvemaṃ jīvebhyaḥ paridhiṃ dadhāmīty etayā sruvāhutiṃ juhuyāt
27.2.2	sarvatra vitate yajñakarmaṇi yadi yajñabhreṣa āgacched iṣṭebhyaḥ svāhā vaṣaḍ aniṣṭebhyaḥ svāhety etair aṣṭābhiḥ sruvāhutīr juhuyāt
27.2.3	sarvatra vitate yajñakarmaṇi yadi janyaṃ bhayam āgacched yata indra bhayāmahe svastidā viśaspatir ity etābhyāṃ sruvāhutī juhuyād abhaye vā punar yajeta
27.2.4	sarvatropāṃśuprabhṛti vāca sthānānāṃ svarākṣarapadavṛttabhreṣeṣv ābhir gīrbhir yad ato na ūnam ity etayā sruvāhutiṃ juhuyāt
27.2.5	sarvatrānājñātaprāyaścitteṣv anājñātaṃ puruṣasaṃmita ity etābhyāṃ sruvāhutī juhuyāt
27.2.6	sarvatredhmābarhiṣaḥ prayājānūyājānāṃ pākatrākarmasu yat pākatrā manasety etayā sruvāhutiṃ juhuyāt
27.2.7	sarvatra skanne bhinne chinne bhagne naṣṭe kṣāme viparyāsa uddāha ūnātirikte vā yan ma ātmano mindābhūt punar agniś cakṣur adād ity etābhyāṃ sruvāhutī juhuyāt sarveṣv agnyupaghāteṣu punas tvādityā rudrā vasavaḥ samindhatām ity etayā samidham ādadhyād etayaiva sruvāhutiṃ juhuyāt sarveṣu yajñakratuṣu patnīḥ saṃyājya prāṅ etya dhruvām āpyāyya dhruvātaḥ sarvaprāyaścittāni juhoti brahma pratiṣṭhā manasa ity etenānuvākena pratyṛcam
27.2.8	atha vai bhavati
27.2.9	samiṣṭayajūṃṣi juhoti yajñasya samiṣṭyai
27.2.10	yad vai yajñasya krūraṃ yad viliṣṭaṃ yad atyeti yan nātyeti yad atikaroti yan nāpikaroti tad eva taiḥ prīṇātīti brāhmaṇam
27.2.11	etāny eva brāhmaṇavidhivihitāny āpyāyanāni mantravanti bhavantīti baudhāyanaḥ
27.2.12	mantragaṇāmnātāni naimittikānīti śālīkiḥ
27.3.1	atha kapālakaraṇe rathacakracityākṛty aśvaśaphamātraṃ sthānaṃ kalpitaṃ bhavati
27.3.2	saṃkalpo 'dhikāraḥ kapālavṛddhiḥ kapālahrāso vā kapālānām anabhiprathane vyāhṛtībhir āhavanīye sruvāhutīr juhuyād bhūr bhuvaḥ suvar ity etāvad eva nānāprathane cātiprathane ca
27.3.3	atha haviṣām aśṛtadravadāhotsekanisrāve prāyaścittiḥ
27.3.4	aśṛte rudrāya svāhety āhavanīye sruvāhutiṃ juhuyād drave vāyave vidagdhe nirṛtyai
27.3.5	yadi dagdhaṃ syād yat tatra śṛtaṃ syāt tena pracaret
27.3.6	atha yadi sarvam eva dagdhaṃ syād apo 'bhyavahṛtya mindāhutī juhuyāt
27.3.7	athānyaṃ nirvaped ājyena vā pracaret
27.3.8	saiva tataḥ prāyaścittiḥ
27.3.9	yasyaiyasyai diśy utsicyeta tasyaitasyai devatāyai sruvāhutiṃ juhuyād yadi prāg agnaye yadi dakṣiṇato yamāya yadi paścād varuṇāya yady uttarataḥ somāya
27.3.10	atha yadi sarvata evotsicyetaitābhyaḥ sarvābhyo devatābhyaḥ sruvāhutīr juhuyāt
27.3.11	tam ājyenāpyāyanībhyām āpyāyayaty āpyāyasva saṃ ta iti
27.3.12	atha haviṣām udvāsanakāle patanaphālanakhaṇḍanodvartanasaṃsarpaṇaviparītavyavāyakaraṇeṣu vyāhṛtībhir āhavanīye sruvāhutīr juhuyād bhūr bhuvaḥ suvar iti
27.3.13	athāntareṇa vedyutkarāv udaṅṅ upaniṣkramyā tamitor udaṅṅ upaniḥsṛpya vyāhṛtīr uktvā vyāhṛtībhir eva pratipadyate
27.4.1	vyāhṛtayas tu catuṣpādā navāṃśāś ca ṣaḍakṣarāḥ / caturṇām api vedānām ādimadhyāvasānikāḥ
27.4.2	mantronaṃ vātiriktaṃ vā duriṣṭaṃ vāpi yad bhavet / vyapohayanti pāpmānaṃ tasmād vyāhṛtayaḥ smṛtā iti
27.4.3	yady ṛkto yajñabhreṣa āgacched bhūr iti gārhapatye juhuyāt
27.4.4	yadi yajuṣṭo bhuva ity anvāhāryapacane
27.4.5	yadi sāmataḥ suvar ity āhavanīye
27.4.6	yadi sarvataḥ sarvā juhuyāt
27.4.7	uddhṛte tu puroḍāśe vepite syandite tathā
27.4.8	bhinne saṃsarpaṇe cāpi prāyaścittaṃ kathaṃ bhaved iti
27.4.9	vijñāyate
27.4.10	uddhṛte tu kulaṃ hanyād vepite naśyati prajā
27.4.11	bhinne saṃsarpaṇe cāpi yajamānaḥ pramīyata iti
27.4.12	atha patanaphālanakhaṇḍanodvatanasaṃsarpaṇeṣu prasiddham udvāsya barhiṣadaṃ kṛtvā prabhūtena sarpiṣāvasicyābhimantrayate kim ut patasi kim ut proṣṭhāḥ śāntaḥ śānter ihāgahi
27.4.13	aghoro yajñiyo bhūtvāsīda sadanaṃ svam āsīda sadanaṃ svam iti
27.4.14	brahmaṇe varaṃ dattvāntarvedy āsādayet
27.4.15	tasyāṃ saṃsthitāyāṃ surabhimatīṃ nirvapet
27.4.16	tasyāṃ saṃsthitāyāṃ tantumatīṃ nirvapet
27.4.17	āyuṣmatyas tu kartavyā uttarāś chandasaḥ kriyāḥ
27.4.18	havirbhreṣavidhis tv eṣa vihitas tattvadarśibhir iti
27.4.19	skanne grahaṇanirvāpe dravyāṇāṃ cānumantraṇe
27.4.20	yasmin kāle vijānīyāt tat kuryāt karmasaṃstare
27.4.21	praṇavo vyāhṛtayaś caiva yajña eṣa paro 'varaḥ
27.4.22	tasmād yajñasya yat skannaṃ viparītaṃ ca yad bhavet
27.4.23	tat sarvaṃ vyāhṛtībhiḥ kuryād anyatra ca vaṣaṭkṛtāt
27.4.24	ajānadbhiḥ kṛtaṃ yac ca tvaramāṇaiś ca yat kṛtam
27.4.25	vyāhṛtīnāṃ prayogeṇa yat kṛtaṃ kṛtam eva tat iti
27.4.26	kapālānāṃ pramāṇāni brūyād ādhvaryave vidhau
27.4.27	samāni caturaśrāṇi dvyaṅgulāni samantataḥ
27.4.28	havirvikārāṇāṃ pramāṇena samaviṣamāṇi vardhayantīti baudhāyanaḥ
27.5.1	athāraṇigatānām ātmagatānām ajasrāṇām anvāhitānāṃ savanagatānāṃ cāgnīnām udvātānāṃ prāyaścittiḥ
27.5.2	araṇigataṃ mathitvā vihāraṃ kalpayitvā gārhapatya ājyaṃ vilāpyotpūya sruci caturgṛhītaṃ gṛhītvāhavanīye saṃtanīṃ juhoti mano jyotir juṣatām ājyaṃ vicchinnaṃ yajñaṃ sam imaṃ dadhātu / yā iṣṭā uṣaso nimrucaś ca tāḥ saṃdadhāmi haviṣā ghṛtena svāheti
27.5.3	etat prāyaścittam anugate 'hute 'bhyudite 'bhinimrukte ca
27.5.4	etat parivittasya
27.5.5	etat parivinnasya
27.5.6	etat parivividānasya
27.5.7	etat somavāmine somātipavitāya bhakṣāntaritasya
27.5.8	etad bhakṣarahitasya

27.5.10	etat pariyaṣṭuḥ
27.5.11	etad eva yasya puruṣo ratho 'śvo gaur mahiṣo varāho 'hir mṛgaḥ śvā vānyad vā śvāpadam antarāgnīn gacchet
27.5.12	etad eva yasyāgner ekadeśam apahareyuḥ

27.6.1	atha darśapūrṇamāsayoś catvāra ṛtvijaḥ
27.6.2	teṣām ekasminn avidyamāne trayaḥ pracareyur dvau vā
27.6.3	atha yady eka eva syāt purā prayājebhya ājyasthālyāḥ sruveṇopaghātam ekādhvaryavaprāyaścittāni juhoti juṣṭo vāco bhūyāsaṃ juṣṭo vācaspataye devi vāk
27.6.4	yad vāco madhumat tasmin mā dhāḥ sarasvatyai svāhā
27.6.5	imām evāśvinā yajñasya yad vāco yad duriṣṭam
27.6.6	tad aśvinau bheṣajena saṃdadhātāṃ svāhā
27.6.7	trātāram indram avitāram indraṃ havehave suhavaṃ śūram indram
27.6.8	huve nu śakraṃ puruhūtam indraṃ svasti no maghavā dhātv indraḥ svāhā
27.6.9	yan me manasaś chidraṃ yad vāco yac ca me hṛdaḥ
27.6.10	devās tac chamayantu sarvaṃ somo bṛhaspatiś ca svāhā
27.6.11	yad vidvāṃso yad avidvāṃso mugdhāḥ kurvanty ṛtvijaḥ
27.6.12	agnir mā tasmād enasaḥ śraddhā devī ca muñcatāṃ svāhā
27.6.13	yad antarikṣaṃ pṛthivīm uta dyāṃ yan mātaraṃ pitaraṃ vā jihiṃsima
27.6.14	agnir mā tasmād enaso gārhapatyaḥ pramuñcatu duritā yāni cakṛma karotu mām anehasaṃ svāhā
27.6.15	brahmatve hautra ādhvaryava āgnīdhre yājamāne caika eva yajñe yat paryāṇi tan me devā rakṣantāṃ prāṇān me mā hiṃsiṣuḥ svāhā
27.6.16	ahaṃ brahmāhaṃ hotāham adhvaryur aham agnīdhro 'haṃ yajamāna eka eva yajñe paryāṇi tan me devā rakṣantāṃ prāṇān me mā hiṃsiṣuḥ svāheti
27.6.17	ekādhvaryavaprāyaścittāni hutvānatarvedyāsīnaḥ sarvā devatā yajatīti vijñāyate
27.6.18	atikrānteṣu homeṣu parvasv āgrayaṇeṣu ca / araṇyor dhriyamāṇeṣu kathaṃ tantraṃ na lupyate
27.6.19	śuciś ca pāvamānī ca tantumān atha pāthikṛt / etā iṣṭayaḥ prayoktavyās tatas tantraṃ na lupyate
27.6.20	śuciḥ śodhayate pāpaṃ tantus tantaṃ na lopayet / pathikṛt panthānam ārohet pāvamānī tu pāvayed iti nu baudhāyanasya kalpaḥ
27.6.21	darśe vyatīte pāthikṛtī kāryā paurṇamāse vyatīte vaiśvānarī kāryobhaye vyatīta ubhe kārye bahuṣu vyatīteṣv anvārambhaṇīyā syād iti śālīkiḥ
27.7.1	atha yady araṇī jīrṇe syātāṃ jantubhir manthanena vā samāne nave anye araṇī āhṛtyāmāvāsyāyām upoṣya śvo bhūte dārśeneṣṭvā tasmiñ jīrṇe śakalīkṛtya gārhapatye prakṣipya prajvālya dakṣiṇenottarāraṇim ādāya savyenādharāraṇim upary agnau dhārayañ japaty ud budhyasvāgne praviśasva yonim anyāṃ devayajyāṃ voḍhave jātavedaḥ / araṇyā araṇim anusaṃkramasva jīrṇāṃ tanum ajīrṇayā nirṇudasveti
27.7.2	ayaṃ te yonir ṛtviya ity araṇyor agnīn samārohya manthanasyāvṛtā gārhapatyaṃ mathitvā vihāraṃ kalpayitvā gārhapatya ājyaṃ vilāpyotpūya sruci caturgṛhītaṃ gṛhītvāhavanīye saṃtanīṃ juhoti mano jyotir juṣatām ājyaṃ vicchinnaṃ yajñaṃ sam imaṃ dadhātu / yā iṣṭā uṣaso nimrucaś ca tāḥ saṃdadhāmi haviṣā ghṛtena svāheti
27.7.3	athāgnaye tantumate puroḍāśam aṣṭākapālaṃ nirvapati
27.7.4	śarāvaṃ dakṣiṇāṃ dadāti
27.7.5	sā prasiddheṣṭiḥ saṃtiṣṭhate
27.8.1	athāraṇyor vyāpattiṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ
27.8.2	aṣṭābhir nimittair vinaśyaty amedhyaśvacāṇḍālaśūdravāyasapatitarāsabharajasvalābhiś ca saṃsparśane 'raṇyor vināśaḥ
27.8.3	tayor utsṛjya samāne nave anye araṇī āhṛtyāgnisaham agnyādheyam araṇigataṃ punarādheyaṃ naṣṭāraṇī apsu nimajjati bhavataṃ naḥ samanasāv iti
27.8.4	athottarāṃ chittvā bhittvā śakalīkṛtya manthanasāmārthyaṃ samāropaṇasāmarthyaṃ manthanaśeṣaṃ vā pramanthanaṃ ca kuryāt samastaśalyavarjam
27.8.5	saṃtiṣṭhate 'raṇyor vyāpattiḥ
27.9.1	atha havirdoṣān vyākhyāsyāmo yathaitan nīlamakṣikāśātikā matkuṇaś cailaśirasor yūke kīṭo vā piṇḍakārī syāt kṣudrakīṭamakṣikāpipīlikāvarjaṃ śvamārjāranakulakukkuṭamarkaṭadhvāṅkṣākhupurīṣasikpadakeśamṛtanakhakunakhapūtidrapsasvedāsṛksnehāśrukāsakṣavathvārdraghraṇair vopahatam anyair vopahataṃ rajasvalayā vā spṛṣṭaṃ tathāprayatena bhrūṇaghnena vā dṛṣṭaṃ tathāpapātreṇāmedhye vā deśe
27.9.2	skannaṃ duṣṭaṃ havir apo 'bhyavaharanti
27.9.3	śīte bhasmani vā nidhāpayati
27.9.4	mindāhutī hutvāthānyan nirvaped ājyena vā pracaret
27.9.5	api tu khalu kṣiprasaṃskāram ājyaṃ bruvata iti
27.9.6	mindāhutī hutvā manasvatīṃ juhoti
27.9.7	saiva tataḥ prāyaścittiḥ
27.10.1	athāto 'gnīnām udvātānāṃ prāyaścittiḥ
27.10.2	āhutayaḥ saṃskārārthā dṛṣṭā bhavanti
27.10.3	caturhotāra ity eke
27.10.4	vyāhṛtaya ity eke
27.10.5	mindāhutī ity eke
27.10.6	manasvatīty eke
27.10.7	mahāvyāhṛtaya ity eke
27.10.8	atha yadi sarva evodvāyeyur āyatanebhyo 'raṇyor agnīn samārohya manthanasyāvṛtā gārhapatyaṃ manthatītaḥ prathamaṃ jajñe agniḥ svād yoner adhi jātavedāḥ / sa gāyatriyā triṣṭubhā jagatyā devebhyo havyaṃ vahatu prajānan iti
27.10.9	chanodbhir evainaṃ svād yoneḥ prajanayatīti brāhmaṇam
27.10.10	atha yadi mathyamāno na jāyeta yatrānyaṃ paśyet tata āhṛtya hotavyam iti
27.10.11	athānyam atvaramāṇaḥ punar manthet
27.10.12	atha yadi jāta evodvāyet samāropaṇamantraṃ japitvā punar eva manthet
27.10.13	athainam upatiṣṭhata iṣe rayyai ramasva sahase dyumnāyorje 'patyāyeti
27.10.14	athainam upasaminddhe sārasvatau tvotsau samindhātāṃ samrāḍ asi virāḍ asīti
27.10.15	athainam upasamādhāyānvāhāryapacanam āhṛtya jvalantam āhavanīyam uddhṛtya nyupyopasamādhāya gārhapatya ājyaṃ vilāpyotpūya sruci caturgṛhītaṃ gṛhītvā daśahotāraṃ manasānudrutyāhavanīye juhoty anvārabdhe yajamāne svāheti
27.10.16	atha pradakṣiṇam āvṛtya pratyaṅṅ ādrutya gārhapatye daśātmakaṃ brāhmaṇa ekahotety etasyānuvākasya daśa sruvāhutīḥ
27.10.17	atha yady anvāhāryapacana udvāyed gārhapatyād enam uddhṛtyānvāhāryapacane caturhotāraṃ juhoti gārhapatye daśātmakam
27.10.18	atha yady āhavanīya udvāyed gārhapatyād enam uddhṛtyāhavanīye pañcahotāraṃ juhoti gārhapatye daśātmakam
27.10.19	atha yadi savanagatānām agnīnām agnīdhrīya udvāyec chālāmukhīyād enam uddhṛtyāgnīdhrīye ṣaḍḍhotāraṃ juhoti śālāmukhīye daśātmakam
27.10.20	atha yady auttaravedika āhavanīya udvāyed āgnīdhrīyād enam uddhṛtyauttaravedika āhavanīye saptahotāraṃ juhoty āgnīdhrīye daśātmakam
27.11.1	etayaivāvṛtaikasminn udvāte dvayor vā prativibhajya hotṝñ juhuyād vyāhṛtīś ced vyastāḥ samastāś ca juhuyāt tathā mindāhutī juhuyān manasvatīṃ ced āhavanīye juhuyāt saiṣājasrāṇām anvāhitānāṃ savanagatānāṃ cāgnīnām udvātānāṃ prāyaścittir etad eva homakāle 'nvādhānavarjam
27.11.2	atha yasyāgnir uddhṛto 'hute 'gnihotra udvāyed iti yathāsūtraṃ vā kuryād api vā gārhapatyād idhmam ādīpya manthanam adhimanthanam upasamindhanam ity etān mantrān nigaded api vā jyotiṣmatīm iṣṭiṃ nirvaped api vā jyotiṣmatībhyām ṛgbhyāṃ pūrṇāhutiṃ juhuyād api vā jyotiṣmatīṃ sruvāhutiṃ juhuyād agnaye jyotiṣmate svāhetīṣṭapūrṇāhutisruvāhutīnāṃ pūrvaṃ pūrvaṃ vidhiṃ balīyāṃsam ācāryā bruvate
27.11.3	tatrodāharanti
27.11.4	yeye viśeṣā laghavo yatrayatropalakṣitāḥ / karma tair na prasaṅgena kuryād āpatsu tad dhanam
27.11.5	viśeṣān sarvavedebhyaḥ prayatnenopadhārayet / karmaṇāṃ pravicārārtham āpatsu ca samāpnuyād iti
27.11.6	yadi prasaṅgena hutaṃ ca laukye mugdhair vā bālair hutaṃ syād vihṛtaṃ ca patnyā tān araṇyor agnīn samārohyodavasāya mathitvāgnīn vihṛtya pūrṇāhutis tantumatī ca kāryeti
27.11.7	atha yady aprasaṅgena hutaṃ ca laukye mughair vā bālair hutaṃ syād vihṛtaṃ ca patnyā tān vyāhṛtībhir vihṛtya pūrṇāhutis tantumatī ca kāryeti
27.12.1	atha vai bhavati
27.12.2	nirṛtir vā etasya yajñaṃ gṛhṇāti yasyā kasyāṃ ca haviḥ kṣāyati yady avadānāni vindanti nātra prāyaścittaṃ kurvanti
27.12.3	dahati ha vā eṣo 'dhvaryur avadānāni
27.12.4	samūhaitāny eṣa tarpayati
27.12.5	dahati ha vā eṣa ya ājyaṃ purastād ahutvāthāvadānāni juhoty ājyenopariṣṭān nābhighārayati
27.12.6	teṣāṃ saṃdagdhānāṃ na devās tṛpyanti na yajamānaḥ
27.12.7	atha haināny eṣa saṃtarpayati ya ājyaṃ purastād dhutvāthāvadānāni juhoty ājyenopariṣṭād abhighārayati
27.12.8	teṣāṃ saṃtṛptānāṃ tṛpyanti devās tṛpyati yajamānaḥ
27.12.9	atha yady āgneyāt puroḍāśād agnīṣomau yajetāgnīṣomīyād vāgniṃ yajeta naitat pradānam iti
27.12.10	āhavanīye sruvāhutiṃ juhuyād yad vo devā atipādayānīti
27.12.11	devapavitram āgneyyo yājyāpuro'nuvākyā devapavitram aindriyo devapavitraṃ prajāpatyā devapavitraṃ vyāhṛtaya iti
27.12.12	atha yadi hotā yājyāpuro'nuvākyāsu muhyeta sarvābhir āgneyībhir yajeteti
27.12.13	vijñāyate 'gniḥ sarvā devatā iti
27.12.14	aindrībhiḥ
27.12.15	vijñāyata indro vai sarvā devatā iti
27.12.16	prājāpatyābhiḥ
27.12.17	vijñāyate prajāpatiḥ sarvā devatā iti
27.12.18	vyāhṛtībhiḥ
27.12.19	vijñāyate sarvā vā ṛcaḥ sarvāṇi sāmāni sarvāṇi yajūṃṣi yad vyāhṛtaya iti
27.12.20	atha yadi yajamāno yājamāneṣu muhyeta vyāhṛtībhir evāntareṇa vedyutkarau prapadanaṃ vyāhṛtībhir evopaniṣkramaṇaṃ vyāhṛtībhir evānumantraṇam
27.12.21	vijñāyate sarvā vā ṛcaḥ sarvāṇi sāmāni sarvāṇi yajūṃṣi yad vyāhṛtaya iti
27.12.22	upāsate ha vai yajñaṃ devā antaritā idam u no havir na hutaṃ tad dhoṣyata iti
27.12.23	ā sviṣṭakṛta ity eke
27.12.24	eḍāyā ity eke
27.12.25	ānuyājebhya ity eke
27.12.26	ā śaṃyuvākād ity eke
27.12.27	ā samiṣṭayajuṣa ity eke
27.12.28	ūrdhvaṃ cet samiṣṭayajuṣaḥ smaret saṃsthāpyaitām iṣṭim anyām iṣṭim anulbaṇāṃ tanvīta
27.12.29	yajño ha vai yajñasya prāyaścittir iti vijñāyate
27.13.1	atha sāṃnāyyaduho dhayeyuś ced vatsā vāyavyayā yavāgvā sāyaṃ yajeta
27.13.2	apy ekasyāṃ dugdhāyāṃ na dhītāṃ dohayet
27.13.3	dugdhābhiḥ saṃsthāpyādugdhānāṃ vatsān apākṛtya śvaḥ sāṃnāyyena yajeta
27.13.4	sāyaṃdohaś ced ārtim ārched indrāya vrīhīn nirupyopavased iti yathāsamāmnātam
27.13.5	api vā prātardohaṃ dvaidhaṃ kṛtvānyatarad ātacya sāyaṃdohasthāne kuryāc chṛtasthāna itarat
27.13.6	prātardohaś ced ārtim ārcched aindraṃ vā māhendraṃ vā puroḍāśaṃ nirupya tena dadhnā saha pracaret
27.13.7	ubhayaṃ ced ārtim ārcched aindraṃ pañcaśarāvam odanaṃ nirvaped iti
27.13.8	prasiddham āgneyena pracaryaindreṇa pracaret
27.13.9	sarvāṇi ced dhavīṃṣi duṣyeyur naśyeyur apahareyur vājyenaitā devatāḥ pratisaṃkhyāyam iṣṭvaitām iṣṭim anyām iṣṭim anulbaṇāṃ tanvīta
27.13.10	yajño ha vai yajñasya prāyaścittir iti vijñāyate
27.14.1	athātaś chandasy anāmnātāni hutānumantraṇāni vyākhyāsyāmaḥ
27.14.2	vaimṛdham iṣṭam anumantrayata indrasya vaimṛdhasyāhaṃ devayajyayendriyāvy asapatno vīryavāñ chrīmān bhūyāsam ity asapatno vīryavān bhūyāsam iti vā
27.14.3	pary anyasyāhaṃ devayajyayā suyavaso bhūyāsam
27.14.4	somasyāhaṃ devayajyayā pra prajayā ca paśubhiś ca janiṣīya suretā reto dhiṣīyeti vā
27.14.5	savitur ahaṃ devayajyayā svastimān paśumān bhūyāsam
27.14.6	sarasvatyā ahaṃ devayajyayā vācam annādyaṃ puṣeyam
27.14.7	sarasvato 'haṃ devayajyayā śraddhāmanā bhūyāsam
27.14.8	pūṣṇo 'haṃ devayajyayā puṣṭimān paśumān bhūyāsam
27.14.9	marutām ahaṃ devayajyayā prāṇair ṛdhyāsam
27.14.10	viśveṣāṃ devānām ahaṃ devayajyayā prāṇaiḥ sāyujyaṃ gameyam
27.14.11	dyāvāpṛthivyor ahaṃ devayajyayobhayor lokayor ṛdhyāsaṃ bhūmānaṃ pratiṣṭhāṃ gameyam iti vā
27.14.12	vājinām ahaṃ devayajyayā retasvī bhūyāsaṃ varuṇasyāhaṃ devayajyayā dharmabhāg bhūyāsam
27.14.13	kasyāhaṃ devayajyayā śaviṣṭho bhūyāsam
27.14.14	viśvakarmaṇo 'haṃ devayajyayā viśvāni karmāṇy avarundhīya
27.14.15	adityā ahaṃ devayajyayāṃhaso mucyeya
27.14.16	vāyor ahaṃ devayajyayā ratnabhāg bhūyāsam
27.14.17	sūryasyāhaṃ devayajyayā sudṛśīko bhūyāsam
27.14.18	agnāviṣṇavor ahaṃ devayajyayā vīryavān bhūyāsam
27.14.19	viṣṇor ahaṃ devayajyayā śipiviṣṭo bhūyāsam
27.14.20	aryamṇo 'haṃ devayajyayā svargaṃ lokaṃ gameyam iti
27.14.21	yathādevatam iṣṭam anumantrayata evam
27.14.22	anādiṣṭān aṣṭākapālān āgneyavikārān ācakṣata ekādaśakapālān agnīṣomīyavikārān dvādaśakapālān vaiśvadevavikārān ekakapālaṃ bhūmikapālaṃ ca dyāvāpṛthivyavikārāv ato 'nyān āgneyavikārān
27.14.23	carūn saumyavikārān
27.14.24	dadhipayāamikṣāpaśavaḥ sāṃnāyyavikārā vanaspatiḥ sviṣṭakṛdvikāraḥ
27.14.25	upāṃśuyājān upāṃśuyājavikārān ācakṣata iti
27.14.26	athāpy udāharanti haviḥsāmānyaṃ devatāsāmānyaṃ kapālasāmānyam iti havirdevatākapālasāmānye haviḥsāmānyaṃ balīya iti
27.14.27	api vāsya yajñasyāgura ud ṛcam aśīyeti sārvatrikam
28.1.1	atha vai bhavati
28.1.2	yaḥ pāpayakṣmagṛhītaḥ syād yo vāparudhyeta devebhya ṛṣibhyaḥ pitṛbhyo gobhyo brāhmaṇebhyas tenābhiśasto 'bhiśasyamāno vā rahasyeṣṭyā yajeteti
28.1.3	etayeṣṭyā yakṣyamāṇa upakalpayate hiraṇyam
28.1.4	tasyāḥ prajñāta upavasathaḥ
28.1.5	atha prātarhute 'gnihotre purāpāṃ praṇayanād gārhapatya ājyaṃ vilāpyotpūya sruci caturgṛhītaṃ gṛhītvāhavanīye juhoty anvārabdhe yajamāne yena devāḥ pavitreṇātmānaṃ punate sadā / tena sahasradhāreṇa pāvamānyaḥ punantu mā svāheti
28.1.6	aparaṃ caturgṛhītaṃ gṛhītvāhavanīya eva juhoti prājāpatyaṃ pavitraṃ śatodyāmaṃ hiraṇmayam / tena brahmavido vayaṃ pūtaṃ brahma punīmahe svāheti
28.1.7	aparaṃ caturgṛhītaṃ gṛhītvāhavanīya eva juhotīndraḥ sunītī saha mā punātu somaḥ svastyā varuṇaḥ samīcyā / yamo rājā pramṛṇābhiḥ punātu mā jātavedā morjayantyā punātu svāheti
28.1.8	atha pṛṣṭhyāṃ stīrtvāpaḥ praṇīyāgnaye 'ṃhomuce 'ṣṭākapāla iti daśahaviṣam iṣṭiṃ nirvapati śrapayitvāsādayati
28.1.9	tasyāḥ saptadaśa sāmidhenyaḥ
28.1.10	samidhyamānāṃ ca samiddhāṃ cāntareṇa pāvakavatyau dhāyye dadhāty apām idaṃ nyayanaṃ namas ta iti dve
28.1.11	pāvakavantāv evājyabhāgau
28.1.12	agnī rakṣāṃsi sedhati śukraśocir amartyaḥ
28.1.13	śuciḥ pāvaka īḍya iti puro'nuvākyām anūcya yat te pavitram arciṣy agne vitatam antarā
28.1.14	brahma tena punīmaha iti yajati
28.1.15	yo dhārayā pāvakayā pariprasyandate sutaḥ / indur aśvo na kṛtviya iti puro'nuvākyām anūcyā kalaśeṣu dhāvati pavitre pariṣicyate / ukthair yajñeṣu vardhata iti yajati
28.1.16	atha haviṣām agner manve prathamasya pracetasa ity etasminn anuvāke yājyāpuro'nuvākyāḥ sahasaṃyājyā bhavanti
28.1.17	atha purastāt sviṣṭakṛtaḥ sruvāhutīr upajuhoti pavamānaḥ suvarjana ity etenānuvākena pratyṛcam
28.1.18	prasiddheḍā
28.1.19	athānvāhāryam āsādya hiraṇyaṃ dadāti
28.1.20	samānaṃ karmā patnīsaṃyājebhyaḥ
28.1.21	atha purastād gṛhapateḥ sruvāhutīr upajuhoti yad devā devaheḍanam ity etenānuvākena pratyṛcam
28.1.22	saṃtiṣṭhata eṣeṣṭiḥ sapūrṇapātraviṣṇukramāḥ
28.1.23	visṛjate vratam
28.1.24	etayaiva yajetartuvyatikrame dāravyatikrame 'yonau vā retaḥ siktvā
28.1.25	etayaiva yajeta pātakopapātakasaṃyukto dvādaśāhaṃ mahāpātakasaṃyukto māsaṃ puṇyam icchan saṃvatsaram ṛtuṃ vā tām etāṃ mahāpavitreṣṭir ity ācakṣate mṛgāreṣṭir iti vā rahasyeṣṭir iti baudhāyanaḥ
28.2.1	yatho etat so 'parimitaṃ pravasatīti na saṃvatsaram ati pravasatīty evedam uktaṃ bhavati sa u ced ati pravaset pavitreṣṭyā yajeteti
28.2.2	etayeṣṭyā yakṣyamāṇa upakalpayate hiraṇyam
28.2.3	tasyāḥ prajñāta upavasathaḥ
28.2.4	atha prātarhute 'gnihotre purāpāṃ praṇayanād gārhapatya ājyaṃ vilāpyotpūya sruci caturgṛhītaṃ gṛhītvāhavanīye juhoty anvārabdhe yajamāne yena devāḥ pavitreṇātmānaṃ punate sadā / tena sahasradhāreṇa pāvamānyaḥ punantu mā svāheti
28.2.5	aparaṃ caturgṛhītaṃ gṛhītvāhavanīya eva juhoti prājāpatyaṃ pavitraṃ śatodyāmaṃ hiraṇmayam / tena brahmavido vayaṃ pūtaṃ brahma punīmahe svāheti
28.2.6	aparaṃ caturgṛhītaṃ gṛhītvāhavanīya eva juhotīndraḥ sunītī saha mā punātu somaḥ svastyā varuṇaḥ samīcyā / yamo rājā pramṛṇābhiḥ punātu mā jātavedā morjayantyā punātu svāheti
28.2.7	atha pṛṣṭhyāṃ stīrtvāpaḥ praṇīyāgnaye pavamānāya puroḍāśam aṣṭākapālaṃ nirvapati sarasvatyai priyāyā upāṃśv ājyam
28.2.8	agnaye pāvakāya puroḍāśam aṣṭākapālaṃ nirvapati savitre satyaprasavāyopāṃśv ājyam
28.2.9	agnaye śucaye puroḍāśam aṣṭākapālaṃ nirvapati vāyave niyutvata upāṃśv ājyam
28.2.10	agnaye vratapataye puroḍāśam aṣṭākapālaṃ nirvapati viṣṇave śipiviṣṭāyopāṃśv ājyam
28.2.11	agnaye vaiśvānarāya puroḍāśam aṣṭākapālaṃ nirvapati dadhikrāvṇa upāṃśv ājyam iti
28.2.12	śrapayitvāsādayati
28.2.13	tasyāḥ saptadaśa sāmidhenyaḥ
28.2.14	samidhyamānāṃ ca samiddhāṃ cāntareṇa pāvakavatyau dhāyye dadhāty apām idaṃ nyayanaṃ namas ta iti dve
28.2.15	pāvakavantāv evājyabhāgau
28.2.16	agnī rakṣāṃsi sedhati śukraśocir amartyaḥ / śuciḥ pāvaka īḍya iti puro'nuvākyām anūcya yat te pavitram arciṣy agne vitatam antarā
28.2.17	brahma tena punīmaha iti yajati
28.2.18	yo dhārayā pāvakayā pariprasyandate sutaḥ / indur aśvo na kṛtviya iti puro'nuvākyām anūcyā kalaśeṣu dhāvati pavitre pariṣicyate / ukthair yajñeṣu vardhata iti yajati
28.2.19	atha haviṣām agna āyūṃṣi pavase 'gne pavasvety agneḥ pavamānasya
28.2.20	uta naḥ priyā priyāsv imā juhvānā yuṣmad iti sarasvatyāḥ priyāyā
28.2.21	agne pāvaka sa naḥ pāvaketi pāvakasya
28.2.22	ā viśvadevam ā satyeneti savituḥ satyaprasavasya
28.2.23	agniḥ śucivratatama ud agne śucayas taveti śuceḥ
28.2.24	vāyur agregā vāyo śukro ayāmi ta iti vāyor niyutvataḥ
28.2.25	tvam agne vratapā asi yad vo vayaṃ pramināma vratānīti vratapateḥ
28.2.26	pra tat te adya kim it te viṣṇo paricakṣyaṃ bhūd iti viṣṇoḥ śipiviṣṭasya
28.2.27	vaiśvānaro na ūtyā pṛṣṭo divīti vaiśvānarasya
28.2.28	dadhikrāvṇo akāriṣam ā dadhikrā iti dadhikrāvṇaḥ
28.2.29	atha hutānumantraṇam agneḥ pavamānasyāhaṃ devayajyayā śuciḥ pūto medhyo vipāpmā brahmavarcasy annādo bhūyāsam agneḥ pāvakasyāgneḥ śucer agner vratapater agner vaiśvānarasyāhaṃ devayajyayā śuciḥ pūto medhyo vipāpmā brahmavarcasy annādo bhūyāsam iti
28.2.30	upāṃśuyājāyām upāṃśuyājavad iti
28.2.31	atha purastāt sviṣṭakṛtaḥ sruvāhutīr upajuhoti pavamānaḥ suvarjana ity etenānuvākena pratyṛcam
28.2.32	atithivatyau damūnavatyau saṃyājye juṣṭo damūnā atithir duroṇa imaṃ no yajñam upayāhi vidvān
28.2.33	viśvā agne abhiyujo vihatya śatrūyatām ābharā bhojanāni
28.2.34	mārjālyo mṛjyate sve damūnāḥ kavipraśasto atithiḥ śivo naḥ
28.2.35	sahasraśṛṅgo vṛṣabhas tadojā viśvāṃ agne sahasā prāsy anyān iti
28.2.36	prasiddheḍā
28.2.37	athānvāhāryam āsādya hiraṇyaṃ dadāti
28.2.38	samānaṃ karmā patnīsaṃyājebhyaḥ
28.2.39	atha purastād gṛhapateḥ sruvāhutīr upajuhoti yad devā devaheḍanam ity etenānuvākena pratyṛcam
28.2.40	saṃtiṣṭhata eṣeṣṭiḥ sapūrṇapātraviṣṇukramā visṛjate vratam
28.2.41	etayaiva yajetābhiśasto 'bhiśasyamāno vā
28.2.42	etayaiva yajetartuvyatikrame dāravyatikrame 'yonau vā retaḥ siktvā
28.2.43	etayaiva yajeta saṃvatsaram ardhapādam ekaviṃśatirātraṃ vā
28.2.44	tiryagyonigatān jñātīn jātyantare vartamānān duṣkṛtair aparuddhān daśa pūrvān daśāparān ātmānaṃ caikaviṃśaṃ paṅktiṃ ca punāti na ca punarāvartata iti
28.2.45	athāpy udāharanti
28.2.46	vaiśvānarīṃ vrātapatīṃ pavitreṣṭiṃ tathaiva ca
28.2.47	ṛtāvṛtau prayuñjānaḥ punāti daśapūruṣam iti
28.3.1	athāto nakṣatreṣṭīr vyākhyāsyāmaḥ
28.3.2	agnir vā akāmayatānnādo devānāṃ syām iti tā brāhmaṇena vyākhyātāḥ
28.3.3	sā yā vaiśākhyāḥ paurṇamāsyāḥ purastād amāvāsyā bhavati sa sakṛt saṃvatsarasyāpabharaṇībhiḥ saṃpadyate tasyām ārabheteti
28.3.4	tasyā upavasathe 'raṇyor agnīn samārohyodavasāya mathitvāgnīn vihṛtyājasrān vāpi vā paurṇamāsyām amāvāsyāyāṃ vopavased yasyāṃ tal lakṣma saṃpadyate

28.3.11	śrapayitvāsādayati
28.3.12	tasyāḥ saptadaśa sāmidhenyaḥ
28.3.13	samidhyamānāṃ ca samiddhāṃ cāntareṇa śrīmatyau dhāyye dadhāti svāruhā yasya śriyo dṛśe 'dābhyaḥ puraeteti
28.3.14	rayimantau puṣṭimantāv ājyabhāgau yajaty agninā rayim aśnavad gayasphāno amīvaheti
28.3.15	atha haviṣām agnir mūrdhā bhuvo 'nu no 'dyānumatir anv id anumate tvam iti saṃcaryor yājyāpuro'nuvākyā
28.3.16	nakṣatrahaviṣān agnir naḥ pātu kṛttikā iti yathāsamāmnātam
28.3.17	atha purastāt sviṣṭakṛtaḥ sruvāhutīr upajuhoty agnaye svāhā kṛttikābhyaḥ svāheti yathāsamāmnātam
28.3.18	sviṣṭavatyau saṃyājye havyavāhaṃ sviṣṭam iti

28.4.1	evam uttaramuttaraṃ pratitantram uttarauttare 'hani yajeta
28.4.2	viśeṣān vyākhyāsyāmaḥ
28.4.3	prajāpatiḥ savitety upāṃśu
28.4.4	sarpebhya āśreṣābhya ājye karambham iti
28.4.5	sarve yavā bhavanti
28.4.6	adhiśrayaṇakāle tiraḥ pavitram ājyam ānīyādhiśritya tiraḥ pavitraṃ karambhān āvapati
28.4.7	pitṛbhyo maghābhyaḥ puroḍāśaṃ ṣaṭkapālam iti
28.4.8	paitṛyajñikena nirvapaṇaprokṣaṇādhivapanasaṃvapanādīni vyākhyātāni bhavanti
28.4.9	tārtīyasavanikena saumyena pracaraṇakalpo vyākhyātaḥ
28.4.10	athaitad vāyave niṣṭyāyai gṛṣṭyai dugdham iti
28.4.11	payasaḥ prātardohavatsaṃskāraḥ
28.4.12	ā viśākhābhyām iṣṭvā tadānīm eva paurṇamāsīm ājyena yajeta
28.4.13	atha śvo bhūte mitrāyānūrādhebhyaś carum ity uttarābhir aṣāḍhābhir iṣṭvā tadānīm evābhijitā yajeta
28.4.14	atha śvo bhūte viṣṇave śroṇāyai puroḍāśaṃ trikapālam iti
28.4.15	uttareṣu proṣṭhapadeṣu puroḍāśaṃ bhūmikapālam iti
28.4.16	kapālamātraṃ bhūmau parilikhyāṅgāram adhivartayati
28.4.17	tasyaikakapālavatsaṃskāraḥ
28.4.18	āpabharaṇībhir iṣṭvā tadānīm evāmāvāsyām ājyena yajeta
28.4.19	atha śvo bhūte candramase pratīdṛśyāyai puroḍāśaṃ pañcadaśakapālam iti
28.4.20	abhinīyaivāhani nirvaped udite candramasi pracaret
28.4.21	te etam ahorātrābhyāṃ caruṃ niravapatāṃ dvayānāṃ vrīhīṇāṃ śuklānāṃ ca kṛṣṇānāṃ ca savātyor dugdhe śvetāyai ca kṛṣṇāyai ceti
28.4.22	abhinīyaivāhani nirvaped astamite pracaret
28.4.23	api vā sandhāv eva nirvapet sandhāv eva pracaret
28.4.24	nirvapaṇanyāyena pracaret
28.4.25	athaitam uṣase carum iti
28.4.26	abhinīyaiva rātrau nirvaped uṣasi pracaret
28.4.27	athaitasmai nakṣatrāya caruṃ nirvapati
28.4.28	yathā tvaṃ devānām asy evam ahaṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ bhūyāsam iti nirvapaṇakāle yajamānāyatana āsīno yajamāno japati
28.4.29	abhinīyaivāhani nirvaped uditeṣu nakṣatreṣu pracaret
28.4.30	athaitaṃ sūryāya nakṣatrebhyaś carum iti
28.4.31	abhinīyaiva rātrau nirvaped udite sūrye pracaret
28.4.32	athaitam adityai carum athaitaṃ viṣṇave carum iti yajati
28.4.33	yajño vai viṣṇur yajña evāntataḥ pratitiṣṭhatīti brāhmaṇam

28.4.36	prasiddhaḥ paśuḥ
28.4.37	pāthikṛtyeṣṭyeṣṭvā darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ yajeta nakṣatrasattreṇa dyutir ānantyāya
28.4.38	jyotiṣāmayaneneṣṭvā pāpaṃ nirṇudya jyotiṣṭvam upajāyate 'pa punarmṛtyuṃ jayatīti ha smāha baudhāyanaḥ
28.5.1	navair evāmāvāsyāyāṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ vā yajeta navair vāgnihotraṃ juhuyāt

28.5.3	api vā gārhapatye catuḥśarāvam odanaṃ śrapayitvāgrayaṇadevatābhyaḥ sviṣṭakṛccaturthībhyo juhuyāt
28.5.4	api vā navair eva brāhmaṇān bhojayet

28.6.1	athātaḥ paśuprāyaścittāni vyākhyāsyāmaḥ
28.6.2	sa yadi paśur upākṛto vāśyeta yad asya pāre rajasa ity etāṃ hutvā naimittikīṃ dvitīyāṃ juhoti yasmād bhīṣāvāśiṣṭhās tato no abhayaṃ kṛdhi
28.6.3	prajābhyaḥ sarvābhyo mṛḍa namo rudrāya mīḍhuṣe svāheti
28.6.4	yasmād bhīṣāvepiṣṭhāḥ palāyiṣṭhāḥ samajñāsthāḥ śakṛd akṛthā mūtram akṛthā ity eteṣu nimitteṣu ya idam akas tasmai namas tasmai svāheti tṛtīyām

28.7.1	atha yady aṅgahīnaḥ paśū rūpato varṇato vāgneyīm āgnāvaiṣṇavīm aindrīṃ vāyavyāṃ pājāpatyām iti ca hutvā tam evopākuryāt
28.7.2	atha yadi vapām āhriyamāṇāṃ śyeno 'paharen naśyed vā pātryāṃ hiraṇyam antardhāya caturgṛhītaṃ gṛhītvāhavanīye juhoty anvārabdhe yajamāna udyant suparṇo na vibhāti sarvaṃ hiraṇyakukṣiḥ saptaśirāḥ purastāt

28.9.1	athāto 'dhvaradīkṣāprāyaścittāni vyākhyāsyāmaḥ
28.9.2	dīkṣitaś ced anṛtaṃ vaded imaṃ me varuṇa tat tvā yāmi tvaṃ no agne sa tvaṃ no agna iti catasro vāruṇīr japet
28.9.3	kṛṣṇājinād vyavacchinno daṇḍād vā devāñ janam agan yajñas tato mā yajñasyāśīr avatu / vardhatāṃ bhūtir dadhnā ghṛtena muñcatu yajño yajñapatim aṃhasa iti japet
28.9.4	amedhyam aniṣṭaṃ vā dṛṣṭvā japatīty uktam etat
28.9.5	abhivṛṣṭo 'bhivṛṣyamāṇo vā japatīty uktam etat
28.9.6	vratayitvāpa ācamya japati śivāḥ pītā bhavatha yūyam āpo 'smākaṃ yonāv udare suśevāḥ / irāvatīr anamīvā anāgasaḥ svasti no bhavatha jīvasa iti
28.9.7	chardayitvā niṣṭhīvya vā japati yad atrāpi rasasya me nir aṣṭhaviṣam astṛtaḥ / agniṣ ṭat somaḥ pṛthivī punar ātman dadhātu ma iti
28.9.8	reta skannam anumantrayate yan me retaḥ parītoṣāt tad arpitha / agnihotram iva somena tad ahaṃ punar ādada iti
28.9.9	mūtraṃ kariṣyan purīṣaṃ vā pṛthivyā loṣṭam ādatta iyaṃ te yajñiyā tanūr iti
28.9.10	karoty apo muñcāmi na prajām aṃhomucaḥ svāhākṛtāḥ pṛthivīm āviśateti
28.9.11	loṣṭaṃ pratinidadhāti pṛthivyā saṃbhaveti
28.9.12	bībhatsā nāma sthāpaḥ svāhākṛtāḥ pṛthivīm āviśatety aśru
28.9.13	kaphasyā nāma sthāpaḥ svāhākṛtāḥ pṛthivīm āviśateti snūhānam
28.9.14	tapasyā nāma sthāpaḥ svāhākṛtāḥ pṛthivīm āviśateti svedam
28.9.15	duḥsvapnaṃ dṛṣṭvā japaty abhiparyāvartate duḥsvapna pāpasvapnād abhūtyai / brahmāham antaraṃ karavai na hi svapnam upagratha iti
28.9.16	svapne 'nnaṃ bhuktvā japati yad annam adyate naktaṃ na tat prātaḥ kṣudho 'vati / sarvaṃ tad asmān mā hiṃsīn na hi tad dadṛśe diveti
28.9.17	lohitam utpatitaṃ dṛṣṭvā kaṇḍūya vā japati namo rudriyābhyo 'dbhyaḥ svāheti
28.9.18	na varṣati dhāvet
28.9.19	yadi dhāven namo rudrāya vāstoṣpataya ity etām ṛcaṃ japet
28.9.20	nānyena dīkṣitena sameyāt
28.9.21	yadi sameyāt kayā naś citra ābhuvad ity etām ṛcaṃ japet
28.9.22	devayajanād anyatrābhyudito 'bhinisrukto vā sūryo mā devo devebhyaḥ pātv iti japed itīn nvā imāni sarvāsv evādhvaradīkṣāsu prāyaścittāni bhavantīti baudhāyanaḥ
28.9.23	āvāntaradīkṣāyai visargād iti śālīkiḥ
28.10.1	athātaḥ sarvayajñānāṃ prāyaścittāni vyākhyāsyāmaḥ
28.10.2	sarvatra skannacchinnabhinnabhagnanaṣṭaduṣṭaviparītahīneṣu haviḥsyandanāsrāvitapatitasphuṭiteṣv advijaśvānabiḍālakākakharamṛgapaśupakṣisarīsṛpādīnām anyatkīṭānām ṛtvijo 'gnīnām antarāgatānāṃ dvādaśagṛhītena srucaṃ pūrayitvā durgāṃ manasvatīṃ mahāvyāhṛtīs tisro juhuyāj jātavedase sunavāma somam arātīyato nidahāti vedaḥ / sa naḥ parṣad ati durgāṇi viśvā nāveva sindhuṃ duritāty agniḥ svāheti
28.10.3	kāryaviparyāse ca mantrabrāhmaṇamātraṃ darbhedhmābarhiḥparidhividhṛtipavitrahaviḥkapālasruksruvāraṇikṛṣṇājinapraṇītāgnyudvāsanena yat kiṃcit kāryaviparyāsaḥ syād ye cānye cājyasthālyāḥ sruveṇopaghātaṃ prāyaścittāni juhoti prajāpataye svāhā hiraṇyagarbhāya svāheti
28.10.4	atha pitāmahāṃ juhoti bhṛgūṇāṃ pataye svāhāṅgirasāṃ tapase svāheti
28.10.5	atha mahāvyāhṛtīr juhoti bhūr agnaye ca pṛthivyai ca mahate ca svāhā bhuvo vāyave cāntarikṣāya ca mahate ca svāhā suvar ādityāya ca dive ca mahate ca svāhā bhūr bhuva suvaś candramase ca nakṣatrebhyaś ca digbhyaś ca mahate ca svāheti
28.10.6	atha vyāhṛtīr juhoti bhūḥ svāhā bhuvaḥ svāhā suvaḥ svāhā bhūr bhuvaḥ suvaḥ svāheti
28.11.1	mantrahīne 'tirikte vā duradhīte durāgate
28.11.2	anāgate 'vaṣaṭkāre atīte vāpi yad dhute
28.11.3	haviṣaḥ syandanād agner hotur hīnasvareṇa ca
28.11.4	atidāhe ca haviṣāṃ yat kiṃcit pātrabhedane
28.11.5	kapālanāśe bhede ca catuṣpādy antarāgate
28.11.6	praṇāśe ca pavitrasya ājyasyaivāvaloḍane
28.11.7	haviṣāṃ ca viparyāsa ṛtvikṣv aprayateṣu ca
28.11.8	yajñaprasāraṇīkāle dvaidhībhāve samutthite
28.11.9	mindāhutī ca hotavye vyāhṛtyaḥ praṇavādikāḥ
28.11.10	vāruṇyas tantumatyaś cānv agniś ca manasvatī
28.11.11	mahāvyāhṛtayaḥ sapta prājāpatyā tathaiva ca
28.11.12	prasaṃdhānāya yajñasya tv ete mantrāḥ prakīrtitāḥ
28.11.13	aprāyaścittiko yajño hy asuraiḥ saṃprabhujyate
28.11.14	asurair bhuktayajñas tu devān doṣeṇa saṃśrayeta
28.11.15	ṛtvijo yajamānaṃ ca āyuṣo brahmavarcasāt
28.11.16	pracyāvayed duriṣṭaṃ tat tasmād doṣān praṇāśayed iti
28.12.1	athāto 'nugrahān vyākhyāsyāmaḥ
28.12.2	sāyaṃhomaṃ copodayaṃ juhuyāt prātarhomaṃ copāstamayaṃ kālena kālam anatikramya
28.12.3	kālo darśapūrṇamāsayor agnihotrasya ca na skandate na vyathata iti vijñāyate
28.12.4	ā prātarāhutikālāt sāyamāhutikālo nātīyād ā sāyamāhutikālāt prātarāhutikālaḥ
28.12.5	atha yadi sāyaṃ sāyaṃ doṣā vastor namaḥ svāhety āhutiṃ hutvāgnihotraṃ juhuyāt
28.12.6	yadi prātaḥ prātar doṣā vastor namaḥ svāhety āhutiṃ hutvāgnihotraṃ juhuyāt
28.12.7	atha yadi pūrvasyām āhutyāṃ hutāyām āhavanīyo 'nugacched agnir dārau dārāv agnir iti vadañ chakale hiraṇyaṃ nidhāyottarām āhutiṃ juhuyāt
28.12.8	kālātikrameṣv āpaddhomaḥ
28.12.9	āmāvāsyasya kālāt paurṇamāsasya kālo nātīyād ā paurṇamāsād āmāvāsyasya
28.12.10	ā vrīhyāgrayaṇasya kālāc chyāmākāgrayaṇasya kālo nātīyād ā yavāgrayaṇasya kālād vrīhyāgrayaṇasyā śyāmākāgrayaṇād yavāgrayaṇasya
28.12.11	ā varuṇapraghāsānāṃ kālād vaiśvadevasya kālo nātīyād ā sākamedhebhyo varuṇapraghāsānām ā śuṇasīryāt sākamedhānām ā vaiśvadevāc chunāsīryasya
28.12.12	ā dakṣiṇāyanapaśoḥ kālād uttarāyaṇapaśoḥ kālo nātīyād ottarāyaṇapaśor dakṣiṇāyanapaśoḥ
28.12.13	ottaravasantajyotiṣṭomasya kālāt pūrvavasantajyotiṣṭomasya kālo nātīyāt
28.12.14	samastasya saṃvatsarasyā nijyāsutyāḥ
28.12.15	ṛṣayo ha sma tatprayoyugā āsan
28.12.16	te 'rdhamāsāyārdhamāsāyāgnihotram ajuhuvuḥ
28.12.17	pratipadi sāyaṃ caturdaśagṛhītāni gṛhṇāti
28.12.18	sakṛd unnayate haviḥ
28.12.19	ekā samit
28.12.20	sakṛd dhomaḥ sakṛd upasthānam
28.12.21	sakṛt pāṇinimārjanam
28.12.22	evaṃ prātar
28.12.23	atha ṣaṇ māsān ahute 'gnihotre darśapūrṇamāsābhyām aniṣṭvāgrayaṇaiś cāturmāsyaiḥ paśubandhena cāgnaye pathikṛte 'gnaye tantumate 'gnaye vaiśvānarāyāgnaye vratapataya iti puroḍāśān nirupyāgnihotraṃ hutvā darśapūrṇamāsābhyām iṣṭvāgrayaṇaiś cāturmāsyaiḥ paśubandhena ca
28.12.24	atha saṃvatsaram ahute 'gnihotre darśapūrṇamāsābhyām aniṣṭvāgrayaṇaiś cāturmāsyaiḥ paśubandhena cāgnaye pavamānāyāgnaye pāvakāyāgnaye śucaye 'gnaye pathikṛte 'gnaye tantumate 'gnaye vaiśvānarāyāgnaye vratapataya iti puroḍāśān nirupyāgnihotraṃ hutvā darśapūrṇamāsābhyām iṣṭvāgrayaṇaiś cāturmāsyaiḥ paśubandhena ca
28.13.1	atha haviṣām arthe vrīhiyavau
28.13.2	tayor alābhe priyaṅgavaḥ kodravodāravarakavarjaṃ śyāmākanīvāraveṇuyavāstarasaṃpākakandamūlaphalāny āpaḥ saktum iti
28.13.3	ghṛtam ājyārthe
28.13.4	gavyam iti pratyayaḥ
28.13.5	tasyālābhe māhiṣam ājyaṃ vā ghṛtam ājyārthe prayuñjīta
28.13.6	bhojaneṣv aviruddhaṃ manyanta eke
28.13.7	tayor alābhe tailaṃ pratinidhiḥ
28.13.8	tasyālābhe jartilatailam
28.13.9	atasīkusumbhasarṣapavārkṣasnehā iti śiṣṭaprāmāṇyāt
28.13.10	ata ūrdhvam alābhe yavapiṣṭāni vrīhipiṣṭāni śyāmākapiṣṭāni vādbhiḥ saṃsṛjyājyārthe prayuñjīta
28.13.11	kuśā staraṇārthe
28.13.12	teṣām alābhe śaramayakutapāśvavālamuñjasugandhitejanārjunādāradūrvāśyāmākāḥ kṣīravṛkṣā ikṣava ity etebhyaḥ
28.13.13	prastarabarhirvidhṛtipavitrayūparaśanāśālākaparistaraṇāntardhānāsanaśayanastotropākaraṇārthāḥ kāryāḥ sarvatṛṇebhyo vā śuṣkaśuṇṭhinalabalbajakṛṣṇatūlatṛṇavarjam
28.13.14	pālāśaḥ khādiro vedhmas tayor alābhe yājñikānāṃ vā vṛkṣāṇām anyatamas teṣām alābhe 'rarukapitthakovidāraśalmaliśleṣmātakanīpanimbatilakavādhakavibhītakarājavṛkṣakarañjapalāṇḍuvarjam
28.13.15	sarvavanaspatīnām idhmo bhavatīty eke
28.13.16	dakṣiṇānāṃ kāle gaur hiraṇyaṃ vāsaḥ
28.13.17	teṣām alābhe phalānāṃ mūlānāṃ bhakṣyāṇāṃ dadyāt
28.13.18	na tv eva na yajeta
28.13.19	nityaṃ nityeṣu yuktaḥ syāt tathaivājasrikeṣu ca
28.13.20	yasya nityāni luptāni tathaivājasrikāṇi ca
28.13.21	vipathastho na sa svargaṃ gacchate patito hi saḥ
28.13.22	tasmān mūlaiḥ phalair vāpi madhunā tarasena vā
28.13.23	nityaṃ nityāni kurvīta na ca nityāni lopayet
28.13.24	na ca nityāni lopayed iti
29.1.1	athābhidagdhāni sadohavirdhānāni samastadevayajanam āvṛtaiva kriyerann anāvṛtā vā vasatīvarīḥ prathamaṃ gṛhṇīyād iti vādhūlakasya matam
29.1.2	athetarān ānupūrvam iti
29.1.3	atha yadi bhinneṣu kapāleṣu sarvāṇi nipateyus tatra yāvattmūtaṃ purīṣam ādāya vasatīvarībhiḥ saṃyutya visrāvya pracaret tatra pāyaścittaṃ grahāṇām ekena juhuyāt
29.1.4	agnīdhrīyavināśa āgneyyarcā juhuyād agnir mūrdhā diva iti
29.1.5	vaiṣṇavyā havirdhāne viṣṇo tvaṃ no antama iti
29.1.6	āgneyyā srukṣv ayam agniḥ sahasriṇa iti
29.1.7	vāyavyayā vāyavyeṣu vāyo śataṃ harīṇām iti
29.1.8	aindriyā sadasīndraṃ viśvā avīvṛdhann iti
29.1.9	vaiśvadevyā prāgaṃśe viśve devāḥ śṛṇutemaṃ havaṃ ma iti
29.1.10	sarveṣu mindāhutī juhuyād vyāhṛtīś ca
29.1.11	api veṣṭiṃ nirvaped agāradahane kṣāmavān sarvavināśe tantumatī
29.1.12	dagdheṣu someṣu vā naṣṭeṣu vā somānām upaghātāpahāreṣu vā yathālābham aṃśūn gṛhītvā vasatīvarībhiḥ saṃyutyābhiṣutya pracaret
29.1.13	sarvavināśa oṣadhībhir abhiṣutya pracaret
29.1.14	tat kṛtvā punar yajeteti śrutiḥ
29.1.15	evam eva kuryāt
29.1.16	sā prāyaścittir iti
29.2.1	atha hotrakāṇām anyo'nyasya maitrāvaruṇaś codayed api vānyo'nyasya yājyāpuro'nuvākyābhyāṃ yajeta tasya prāyaścittam
29.2.2	brāhmaṇa ekahotety asyānuvākasya prathamena hotur juhuyād dvitīyena maitrāvaruṇasya tṛtīyena brāhmaṇācchaṃsinaś caturthena potuḥ pañcamena neṣṭuḥ ṣaṣṭhenācchāvākasya saptamenāgnīdhrasyādhvaryuḥ pradhānadevatām anuccārayitvā yonyām uccārayet
29.2.3	yad vo devā atipādayānīty etayā sruvāhutiṃ juhuyāt
29.2.4	daśātmakenāṣṭamena navamena pūrvoktaṃ prāyaścittaṃ kuryāt
29.2.5	ukthyaparyāyeṣu yathākrameṇa juhuyād daśamena ṣoḍaśirātriparyāyebhyo rāthaṃtarāya saṃdhaye
29.2.6	tathā śipiviṣṭastotre vājapeye
29.2.7	tathātiriktastotreṣv iti yathācoditam anyo yajet tat prathamo yajej japed vā svayaṃ coditaḥ svayam eva yajed dvitīya eva prāyaścittaṃ bhavet some 'nyatraivaṃ kuryād dhotānyena yajed anyenaiva maitrāvaruṇo vā pūrvoktaṃ prāyaścittaṃ kuryāt
29.2.8	tathā yājyāpuro'nuvākyāsv anyathānyat prāyaścittaṃ bhavet
29.2.9	athāśvamedhasyānnahomeṣv āraṇyānāṃ paśūnāṃ sruvāhutyā ūnātiriktapunaruktavyāghāteṣu mindāhutī juhuyāt
29.2.10	tatheṣṭakopadhāne
29.2.11	atha devasuvāṃ haviṣām anyad bījam anyadaivatasya kuryāt tad utsṛjya punar utpādya yajet
29.2.12	atiśiṣṭaṃ saha yajej japed vā
29.2.13	pūrvoktaṃ prāyaścittaṃ kuryād iti
29.3.1	atha vitate yajñakarmaṇi prāyaścittāni vyākhyāsyāmaḥ
29.3.2	tatrauṣadhaṃ payaḥ paśuḥ soma ājyam ity eteṣu nyūneṣu vā naṣṭeṣu vāpahṛteṣu vā punar utpādya gṛhṇīyāt
29.3.3	yatra smaret prāk sviṣṭakṛta utpādanaṃ bhavati
29.3.4	sviṣṭakṛta ūrdhvaṃ smaret tat saṃsthāpyaitenaiva punar yajet saha yajed vā
29.3.5	atha yadi nirupya smared anyaṃ daivatam amuṣmai tveti prativibhajyābhimṛśya sarvaṃ juhuyād amuṣmai svāheti
29.3.6	yatra smaret tatraivam eva kuryād āsādanāt
29.3.7	atha yady āsādya smared anvāyātya sthāneṣu juhuyād anyad vā pūrvotkaṃ prāyaścittaṃ kuryād anyāsu devatāsv iṣṭāsu naṣṭeṣu duṣṭeṣu vā doṣavati tantre pradhānam āvartayet sarveṣṭir aśeṣataḥ
29.3.8	tasya kaḥ karmaṇa upakramo bhavatīti
29.3.9	bhāgino daivatasya śūrpādānaprabhṛti karma kṛtvā śrapayitvāsādya svasthāne pracaret
29.3.10	tatra prāyaścittaṃ mindāhutī juhuyād vyāhṛtīś caivaṃ paśāv upākaraṇaprabhṛty ā sviṣṭakṛtaḥ pūrvoktaṃ prāyaścittaṃ kuryāt
29.3.11	atha yadi prātaranuvākam anupākṛtam ādityo 'bhyudiyāt kathaṃ tatra prāyaścittaṃ bhavatīti
29.3.12	uṣāḥ ketunā juṣatāṃ yajñaṃ devebhir anvitam
29.3.13	devebhyo madhumattamaṃ svāheti mindāhutī vyāhṛtīś ca hutvopākuryāt
29.3.14	atha yadi prātaranuvāke śasyamāna ādityo 'bhyudiyād ud vayaṃ tamasas pary ud u tyaṃ citram ity etābhiḥ sruvāhutīr juhuyāt
29.3.15	atha yadi somo nāviḥ syān navo navo bhavati jāyamāno yam ādityā aṃśum āpyāyayantīty etābhyāṃ sruvāhutī juhuyāt
29.3.16	yadi sūryācandramasor grahaṇaṃ vidyata etad eva
29.4.1	atha yadi grahān grahīṣyamāṇo bhāginīṃ devatām agṛhītvā yonyāṃ gṛhṇīyāt tathāmuṣmai svāheti tadānīm eva sarvaṃ juhuyāt
29.4.2	bhāginīṃ punar gṛhītvā mindāhutī juhuyāt
29.4.3	api vā grahāṇām ekena juhuyāt sarvān vācaspate vidhe nāmann ity evam ādīn grahān hotrakāṇāṃ graheṣu vā camaseṣu vā havirdoṣoktadoṣo bhavet
29.4.4	tathāpo 'bhyavahṛtya tat prāyaścittaṃ hutvā tathā punar gṛhītvā juhuyāc camaseṣu punar unnīya juhuyād dhutvā vā tasmin hiraṇyam antardhāyāpa ānīya bhakṣayet
29.4.5	saiva tataḥ prāyaścittiḥ
29.4.6	atha yadi savanakālo 'tikrāmed agnir mūrdhā diva ity etasyānuvākasya prathamena gāyatreṇa juhuyāt prātaḥsavane
29.4.7	tathā traiṣṭubhena mādhyaṃdine savane
29.4.8	tathā jāgatena tṛtīyasavane
29.4.9	ata ūrdham atirātra uttaram ahar nādhigacchet
29.4.10	yadi gacched yajñabhreṣa āgacchet
29.4.11	tatra prāyaścittaṃ sarvān hotṝn juhuyāt
29.4.12	vijñāyate brahma vai caturhotāra iti
29.4.13	tasmāc caturhotṝn eva juhuyād ata ūrdhvam ahaḥsaṃkhyāṃ nādhigacched ekāheṣu
29.4.14	atha savanīyānāṃ prāyaścittiḥ
29.4.15	atha yadi pūtigandhaḥ syāt tad utsṛjya punar utpādya pracaret
29.4.16	api voṣṇodakena prakṣālyājye 'vadhāya punaḥ śrapayitvā pracaret
29.4.17	tatrāpi yadi pūtigandho bhavet tad utsṛjya punar evotpādya pracaret
29.4.18	tathā savanīyānāṃ puroḍāśānām
29.4.19	tathā sāṃnāyyānām
29.4.20	atha yadi stotraṃ śastraṃ pratigaraṃ votsṛjen mindāhutī hutvopākuryāt
29.4.21	atha yady ekāṃ stotrīyāṃ sūktaṃ varcaṃ vārdharcaṃ vā pratigaraṃ votsṛjen mindāhutī hutvā japet
29.4.22	stotropākaraṇaprabhṛty ā homād vācaṃ yacchet
29.4.23	yadi vācaṃ visṛjed vaiṣṇavīm ṛcaṃ japet
29.4.24	atha yady āśrāvya vācaṃ visṛjed vaiṣṇavīm ṛcaṃ japed viṣṇo tvaṃ no antama iti
29.4.25	punar evāśrāvya yajet
29.4.26	ūnātiriktapunaruktavyāghāteṣv anyeṣu vānyatra prāyaścittaṃ mindāhutī juhuyāt
29.4.27	sarvasthāneṣu mindāhutī yajñaśarīram iti śrutiḥ
29.4.28	tasmāt sarveṣām ācāryāṇāṃ praśastam iti
29.5.1	atha yadi hutāhutau somau saṃsṛjyeyātām āhavanīyād udīco 'ṅgārān nirūhya teṣu juhuyād yajñasya hi stha ṛtviyāv indrāgnī cetanasya ca
29.5.2	hutāhutasya tṛpyatam ahutasya hutasya ca
29.5.3	hutasya cāhutasya cāhutasya hutasya ca
29.5.4	indrāgnī asya somasya vītaṃ pibataṃ juṣethāṃ svāheti
29.5.5	tasya nityabhakṣam anuvartayati mā yajamānaṃ tamo vidan martvijo mo imāḥ prajāḥ
29.5.6	mā yaḥ somam imaṃ pibāt saṃsṛṣṭam ubhayaṃ kṛtam iti
29.5.7	atha yady anyahutāś camasā anyahutaiḥ saṃsṛjyeran some vā somam abhigṛhṇīyād ity etad eva
29.5.8	atha yady anyavṛtā ṛtvijo 'nyavṛtaiḥ saṃsṛjyeran dīkṣitā dīkṣitair vānyatra vrātyastomāt sattrāc cety etad eva
29.5.9	atha yadi sutaḥ somo 'bhivṛṣyeta tad it padaṃ praty asmai pipīṣata ity etābhyāṃ sruvāhutī hutvā tasya nityabhakṣam anuvartayatīndur indum avāgād indor indro 'pāt
29.5.10	tasya ta indav indrapītasya madhumata upahūtasyopahūto bhakṣayāmīti
29.5.11	atha yadi sute some yajamāno mriyeta bhayaṃ vāgacchet sarvāṇi havīṃṣi pātryāṃ samavadhāya droṇakalaśe somaṃ juhvām ājyaṃ paśum anyasyām ity ekām āhutiṃ juhuyād ye devā yeṣām idaṃ bhāgadheyaṃ babhūva yeṣāṃ prayājā utānūyājāḥ
29.5.12	indrajyeṣṭhebhyo varuṇarājabhyo 'gnihotṛbhyo devebhyaḥ svāheti hutvāta ūrdhvaṃ paitṛmedhikaṃ karma pratipadyetābhaye vā punar yajeta
29.5.13	jīrṇasyāśaktasya cāgnihotraceṣṭāyām ātmany agnisamāropaṇaṃ vidyata iti
29.5.14	ātmani samārūḍheṣv agniṣu na khāden na piben nopari śayyāṃ śayīta nāpsu nimajjen na maithunaṃ vrajet kāmaṃ khādet kāmaṃ pibet kāmaṃ tv evopari śayyāṃ śayīta naivāpsu nimajjen na maithunaṃ vrajed iti
29.5.15	prakṣālitapādapāṇir apa ācamya prāṅmukha upaviśyāgnihotrayajuṣā yāvanmātraṃ vratayitvā tūṣṇīṃ bhūyo vratayet prajāpatiṃ manasā dhyāyann iti
29.5.16	evam evopāsītā śrīravimokṣaṇāt
29.6.1	atha vai bhavati
29.6.2	yathā vai putro jāto mriyata evaṃ vā eṣa mriyate yasyāgnir ukhya udvāyati
29.6.3	yan nirmanthyaṃ kuryād vicchindyād bhrātṛvyam asmai janayet
29.6.4	sa eva punaḥ parīdhyaḥ
29.6.5	svād evainaṃ yoner janayati
29.6.6	nāsmai bhrātṛvyaṃ janayatīti brāhmaṇam
29.6.7	ukhyaś ced udvāyed apsu bhasma praveśyokhāṃ śakṛtpiṇḍena parilipya punar evaināṃ pravṛjya paridāyāhutiṣāhaṃ kṛtvāthaināṃ sruvāhutibhir abhijuhoti suvar na gharmaḥ svāhā suvar nārkaḥ svāhā suvar na śukraḥ svāhā suvar na jyotiḥ svāhā suvar na sūryaḥ svāheti
29.6.8	arkavatībhyām arkasamidhāv abhyādadhāty arkaḥ pavitraṃ pavitram arko rajaso vimāna iti dvābhyām

29.6.10	atha vai bhavati
29.6.11	tamo vā etaṃ gṛhṇāti yasyāgnir ukhya udvāyati
29.6.12	mṛtyus tamaḥ
29.6.13	kṛṣṇaṃ vāsaḥ kṛṣṇā dhenur dakṣiṇeti
29.6.14	kṛṣṇaṃ vāsaḥ kṛṣṇāṃ dhenuṃ śatamānaṃ hiraṇyam iti dadāti
29.6.15	tamasaiva tamo mṛtyum apahate
29.6.16	atho tejo vai hiraṇyaṃ
29.6.17	teja evātman dhatta iti brāhmaṇam
29.6.18	atha yady āsandī śikyam agāraṃ vā dahyeta vaiśvānarībhiḥ samidho 'bhyādadhyād vaiśvānaro na ūtyety etenāṣṭārcena
29.6.19	atha yadi vasatīvarīkalaśaḥ pānnejana ekadhanāḥ kumbheṣṭakāḥ kvathaneṣṭakā vā parāsicyeran yūpo vā bhidyeta raśanā vā chidyeta caṣālaṃ vā bhidyetaudumbarī vā bhidyeta grāvā vā bhidyeta droṇakalaśo vā dīryetānyad vā yajñe dārumayaṃ mṛnmayaṃ vā pātraṃ bhidyeta tat svenaiva yajuṣā sva āyatane nidhāyopadhāyābhimantrayate bhūr āyur me dhārayata prāṇaṃ me dhārayata prajāṃ me dhārayata paśūn me dhārayata mā ma āyuḥ prāṇaḥ prajāḥ paśavaḥ parāsicyerann iti
29.6.20	atha yadi dārumayaṃ pātram āhavanīye 'nuprahared atha yadi mṛnmayam apo 'bhyavahared bhūmir bhūmim agān mātā mātaram apyagāt
29.6.21	bhūyāsma putraiḥ paśubhir yo no dveṣṭi sa bhidyatām iti
29.7.1	athāto 'gnihotrasya laukikavidhiṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ
29.7.2	purāgnihotrād gārhapatyād araṇyor agnīn samāropayanty ayaṃ te yonir ṛtviya iti
29.7.3	antarvedy araṇī nidhāya laukike 'gnau juhuyāt

29.8.1	athāpady agnihotrāṇāṃ samāsaḥ
29.8.2	tad yathā rāṣṭravibhramo vyādhayo 'dhvagamanaṃ gurukulavāso deśakāladravyānupapattir anyaiś cāyogo yāsu vidyata iti
29.8.3	tasya kaḥ karmaṇa upakramo bhavatīti
29.8.4	kāmaṃ pūrvāhṇe vāparāhṇe vāgnihotravelāyāṃ vā yathāsūtraṃ vā kuryāt
29.8.5	prasiddhaṃ vā yajamānasyā prasāvāt
29.8.6	prasūtaḥ prasiddhaṃ pratipadi sāyaṃ caturdaśa caturgṛhītāni gṛhṇāti sopavasathe pārvaṇe vāthetarasmin pañcadaśa
29.8.7	prasiddhaṃ sarvaṃ samitprabhṛti karma
29.8.8	mantrāṃś caikavat saṃsthāpya sāyam agnihotrāṇi hutvā prātar agnihotrāṇi juhuyāt
29.8.9	sāyam upakramaḥ prātar apavargaḥ
29.8.10	kāle pārvaṇe na yajeta
29.8.11	nordhvaṃ pākṣikāt samāso na prasaṅge nāśraddadhānasya
29.8.12	athāpy udāharanti
29.8.13	aśraddhā paramaḥ pāpmā pāpmā hy ajñānam ucyate
29.8.14	ajñānāl lupyate dharmo luptadharmo 'dhamaḥ smṛtaḥ
29.8.15	śraddhayā śudhyate buddhiḥ śraddhayā śudhyate matiḥ
29.8.16	śraddhayā prāpyate brahma śraddhā pāpapraṇāśinī
29.8.17	tasmāc chraddadhānenāprasaṅgena sapanne kāle tantumatyā yajeta
29.8.18	evaṃ laukikaprayoga evam ahuta evaṃ vidhyaparādhe ca
29.8.19	athāpy udāharanti na vṛthāgnīn udvāsayen naivānāpatsu
29.8.20	vīrahā vā eṣa devānāṃ yo 'gnim udvāsayata iti
29.8.21	tasmāc chraddadhānasyāprāsaṅgikasya cānyatrāpi
29.8.22	yeye viśeṣā laghavo yatrayatropalakṣitāḥ
29.8.23	taiḥ karmasaṃstare kuryān nyāyopetaṃ yathā bhavet
29.8.24	svaśāstre vidyamāne yaḥ paraśāstreṇa vartate
29.8.25	bhrūṇahatyā samaṃ tasya svaśāstram avamanyataḥ
29.8.26	ārṣeyasya svaśāstrasya pradeśās tad guṇaiḥ samāḥ
29.8.27	karmaṇāṃ pravicārārtham āpatsu ca samāpnuyād iti
29.9.1	yatho etat so 'parimitaṃ pravasati na saṃvatsaram ati pravasatīty aviśeṣāj jāyāpatyor āhitāgnyor ity evedam uktaṃ bhavati
29.9.2	vijñāyate cārdho vā eṣa ātmano yat patnīti
29.9.3	atha yadi pravasati yajamāne patnyāḥ pravāsanimittaṃ syāt tad vāstoṣpatīyaṃ hutvādhvaryuḥ samāropayed ayaṃ te yonir ṛtviya iti
29.9.4	yatra gacchet tatrāno haret
29.9.5	tatra prāpyāgniṃ mathitvā vihāraṃ kalpayitvā gārhapatya ājyaṃ vilāpyotpūya sruci caturgṛhītaṃ gṛhītvāhavanīye saṃtanīṃ juhoti mano jyotir juṣatām ājyaṃ vicchinnaṃ yajñaṃ sam imaṃ dadhātu

29.10.1	atha vai bhavati
29.10.2	sarvān vā eṣo 'gnau kāmān praveśayati yo 'gnīn anvādhāya vratam upaiti sa yad aniṣṭvā prayāyād iti
29.10.3	sa yad aniṣṭvā prayāsyan bhavati tad gārhapatya ājyaṃ vilāpyotpūya sruci caturgṛhītaṃ gṛhītvāhavanīye juhoty anvārabdhe yajamāne tubhyaṃ tā aṅgirastameti
29.10.4	yo 'gnīn anvādhāya vratam upaiti sa yady udvāyatīti tat purastād vyākhyātam
29.10.5	yasyāhitāgner agnir apakṣāyati yāvac chamyayā pravidhyed yadi tāvad apakṣāyet taṃ saṃbhared idaṃ ta ekaṃ para u ta ekam iti
29.10.6	saṃbhṛtyānuprahared agnihotrakāleṣu vānyeṣu vā

29.10.8	anuprayāyāvasyet tad yatraivāvasyet tatra vodvāsayeyuḥ
29.10.9	oṣadhīr vā etasya paśūn payaḥ praviśati yasya haviṣe vatsā apākṛtā dhayanti
29.10.10	tān yad duhyād yātayāmnā haviṣā yajeta
29.10.11	yan na duhyād yajñaparur antariyāt
29.10.12	vāyavyāṃ yavāgūṃ nirvaped iti
29.10.13	athaiteṣāṃ dohayitvā tasminn apa ānīya vrīhiprabhṛti siddham ata ūrdhvam
29.10.14	atha yasya sāyaṃdugdhaṃ havir ārtim ārcchatīndrāya vrīhīn nirupyopavased iti

29.10.16	śṛtasthānaṃ tat kuryāt
29.10.17	atha yasyobhayaṃ havir ārtim ārcchaty aindraṃ pañcaśarāvam odanaṃ nirvaped iti
29.10.18	prakṛtyā vā nirvapec charāveṇa veti

29.11.1	atha yadi dīkṣopasatsu tathāhargaṇeṣv anyeṣv ahaḥsu vā yathā tryahe paryavete gomūtreṇoṣṇodakamiśreṇa lohitaṃ chitsvety uktvā prakṣālya darbhapuñjīlaiḥ pavayatīti
29.11.2	vijñāyata āpo vai darbhās tair hi snātā bhavatīti
29.11.3	vijñāyate brahmahatyāyai hy eṣā varṇaṃ pratimucyāsta iti
29.11.4	tasmād dhavir nānvīkṣeta na spṛśed iti
29.11.5	atha sūtikāyā daśāhe paryavete yathāmnātaṃ śaucaṃ kṛtvā patnīṃ karmasu yojayet
29.11.6	tat karma putro brahmacārī vā kuryāt
29.11.7	tan mantraṃ yajamāno japet
29.11.8	eṣā patny akuśalī yadi syād evam eva kārayed iti
29.11.9	atha yadi sāṃnāyye gharme vā pravṛttāyāṃ payo na syād yena kena cid upāyena kiṃ cit payo dohayitvādbhiḥ saṃsṛjya pracaret
29.11.10	naivānyat paya ānīya kuryāt
29.11.11	saiva tataḥ prāyaścittiḥ
29.11.12	atha yadi somādhānam ārabhya purā dīkṣaṇīyāyā anālambhukā bhavati nāgnihotraṃ juhoti
29.11.13	tryahe paryavete 'psudīkṣāprabhṛti siddham ata ūrdhvam
29.11.14	atha yadi purā vratadohanād anālambhukā bhavati tryahaṃ haviṣyam aśnīyāt
29.11.15	yadi vrate dugdhe haviṣyam eva vratam apo 'bhyavaharet
29.11.16	tryahe paryavete gomūtrādi siddham ata ūrdhvam
29.11.17	atha yadi purā pravargyasya syān na pravṛñjyād dhaviṣyaprabhṛti yathāmnātaṃ śaucaṃ kṛtvā gomūtrādi siddham ata ūrdhvam
29.11.18	atha yadi pravṛkte 'nālambhukā bhavati haviṣyam eva tad ahaḥ saṃsthāpya tryahe paryavete gomūtrādi siddham ata ūrdhvam
29.11.19	atha dīkṣita vācaṃ yaccha vratya vācaṃ yaccha patni vācaṃ yaccheti saṃpraiṣād ekastanaprabhṛty ānālambhukā bhavati siddham āvabhṛthāt kṛtvā tryahe paryavete 'vabhṛtham avayanti
29.11.20	sutye 'hani mārjālīye sikatopopte pariśrityopaviśet
29.11.21	anyeṣv ahaḥsu patnīśālāyām evopaviśet
29.11.22	prāgvaṃśaṃ na prapadyeta

29.13.3	askān dyauḥ pṛthivīm askān ajani prājanīty etābhyāṃ sruvāhutī juhuyāt
